Thlak thikhqi anglakawh ni hoep unawh, thlang him unawh hlan awh ami soei amyihna, nang a khoemnaak ak khuiawh amak awm voel hawh thlangkhqi amyihna, nang ing anih ce am sim qoe voel hyk ti.
Lawk-kqawng ak kai dyt ak hypnaak tit tit na ni ta hyk ti.
Nak kawsonaak ce kak khan awh ak qih soeih na ta tiksaw; hlipui ing ce ni sing malh hyk ti.
Ka pyikhqi awm ni lawh pe tiksaw cekkhqi am tyih kawi na ni sai hyk ti. Nik kqyp khak tiksaw ap cawn thai nyng;
Kak kaw a seet aih awh ka mik qawi awm hyp khoep hawh hy. Aw Bawipa, nang ce khawnghi zung nik khy nyng saw, nang a venawh ka kut qawi ve phyl nyng.
Thlak thi a venawh kawpoek kyi ik-oeih nak dang sak nu? Ak thikhqi ing tho unawh nang nim kyihcah unawh nu?
Phyi awh nang a lungnaak ce amik kqawn nu; seetnaak a hunawh nang a ypawmnaak ce amik kqawn nu?
Thannaak awh nang ak kawpoek kyi ik-oeih sai ce sim na ak awm nu, am awhtaw lunghilhnaak qam awh nang a dyngnaak ik-oieh ai ce a mik sim nu?
Cehlai Aw Bawipa, qeennaak thoeh doena na venawh khy nyng, mymcang hqit awh kak cykcahnaak ing na hai pha law hy.
Ikawtih Aw Bawipa, ni qoeng nawh, na haai na thuh hy voei?
Ka naasen ca awhkawng khuikha sim nyng saw thih pit dyna awm nyng; nak kqih awmnaak zawk nyng saw kawboet ing awm nyng.
Nak kawsonaak ing ni sing khyng nawh; nak kqih awmnaak ing ni plawci sak hy.
Khawnghi zung tuinu amyihna nik chung khoep uhy; cekkhqi ing nik chawi malh uhy.
Ka pyikhqi ingkaw ka lungnaak thlangkhqi ce lo tiksaw; thannaak ve ni ak zoe khyt pyi na a awm hawh hy.

Bawipa a lungnaak ak bau soeih ce kumqui dyna laa na sa kawng nyng; kam kha ingkaw cadil dyna nang a ypawmnaak ce sim sak kawng nyng.
Nang a lungnaak taw kumqui dyna cak hy tice kqawn nyng saw, namah a ypawmnaak ce khawk khan awh caksak hawh hyk ti tice kqawn kawng nyng.
Nang ing Kak tyh thlang ing paipi aw nih nyng saw, ka tyihzawih a venawh awi kam hawh nyng.
Na cahlah qui ce kumqui dyna caksak kawng nyng saw cadil dyna na ngawihdoelh ce caksak kawng,” ti hyk ti.
Aw Bawipa, kawpoek kyi ik-oeih na saikhqi ce khankhqi ing kyihcah unawh, thlakcimkhqing cunnaak awh, nang a ypawmnaak awm kyihcah uhy.
Khawnghik khan awh Bawipa ing nyhtah hly kawi u nu ak awm? Khan ik-oeih sai anglakawh Bawipamyihna u nu ak awm?
Thlakcimkhqing cunnaak awh khawsa ve kqih soeih uhy; amah ak chungkhqi anglakawh amah ve kqih awm khqoet hy.
Aw Bawipa Boeimang thak awm Khawsa, nang amih u nu ak awm bai? Aw Bawipa, nang taw bau nawh na ypawmnaak ing nik chung hy.
Nang ing tuicunlikhqi ce uk tiksaw, a hak tho ce dym sak hyk ti; na baan thak awm ing, na qaalkhqi ce hqe khqi hyk ti.
Nang ing him na ak awm amyihna Rahab ce neet hyk ti; na baan thak awm ing, na qaalkhqi ce hqe khqi hyk ti.
Khan ce nang a koena awm nawh, khawmdek awm nang a koena awm hy; khawmdek ingkaw ak khuiawh ak awm ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce nang ing syn hyk ti.
A sip ingkaw a hawt ce nang ing sai tiksaw; Tabor ingkaw Hermon ing namah ang ming awh zeelnaak laa sa hy.
Na ban taw thaawmnaak ing be nawh; na kut ce ak tha awm hy, nak tang kut ben ce zoeksang na awm hy.
Dyngnaak ingkaw thymnaak ce na ngawihdoelh ang dyih hunna awm nawh; lungnaak ingkaw ypawmnaak ce na haiawh cet hy.
Nang a venawh zeel awi kqawn aham ak cawngkhqi taw a zoseen hy, Aw Bawipa, na haiawh vangnaak ing ak cetkhqi taw a zoseen hy.
Cekkhqi cetaw nang ming awh nynnoet pyt zeel uhy;
Ikawtih, nang taw cekkhqi a thangleeknaak ingkaw thaawmnaak na awm nawh, nak kawzeelnaak ak caming kaimih ak ki ve zoeksang hyk ti.
Kaimih a phuhqa taw Bawipa a koe tak tak ni; kaimih a sangpahrang awm Israelkhqi ak thlangcim soeih na awm hy.
Namah a ypawm thlangkhqi venawh huh saknaak ing hypboet kqawn hyk ti: “Qalkap ak tlung pynoet a venawh thaawmnaak pe nyng; thlangkhqi anglakawhkawng tawngplang pynoet ce zoeksang hawh nyng.
Ka tyihzawih David ce hu hawh nyng; ka situi caih ing anih ce syp hawh nyng.
Ka kut ing dawm kawng nyng saw; ka baan ing tha awm sak kawng nyng.
Han a qal ingawm am kham pe sak kawmsaw; ikawmyih a thlakche ingawm am thekha na ti kaw.
A haiawh a qaalkhqi ce hqawi a neet pek khqi kawng nyng saw, a thunkhakhqi ce him pe kawng nyng.
Ka lungnaak ve ak khan awh ypawm na ta kawng nyng saw, kang ming ak caming ak ki ce zoeksang hqui na awm kaw.
Tuicunli ak khan awh a kut ce taak pe kawng nyng saw, pe kawng nyng.
Anih ing “Nang taw Ka pa, ka Khawsa, anik hulkung lungnu,” tinawh nik khy kaw.
Kai ing anih ce cakcyk na sai kawng nyng saw, khawmdek awh sangpahrangkhqi anglak li awh zoeksang kawng nyng.
A venawh lungnaak ce kumqui dyna cak pe sak kawng, a venawh paipi ka sai awm am plal tham tikaw.
Anih a cahlah qui ce kumqui dyna cak pe sak kawng nyng saw, khan a awm khui a ngawihdoelh ce cak pe sak kawng.
A cakhqi ing ka cawng saknaak awi ve cehta unawh kak awipeek ve a mami hqut awhtaw;
Ka awi tloepnaakkhqi ve eek unawh kak awipeekkhqi ve a mami khoem awhtaw,
Thingboeng ing a thawlhnaakkhqi ce toel kawng nyng, a sai thawlhnaakkhqi ce qawkkek ing toel kawng;
Cehlai ka lungnaak ce a ven awhkawng am lawh pe kawng nyng saw, ka ypawmnaak ve ityk awh awm am zawi valh ti kawng nyng.
Ka paipi ve am eek kawng nyng saw ka hui ing ak kqawn hawh taw ap chawt ti kawng.
Ka ciimnaak ing hypboet ak khoek na awi kam hawh nyng – David a venawh qai ap kqawn ti kawng nyng.
Anih a cahlah qui ce awm phaat kawmsaw ka haiawh khawmik amyihna ngawihdoelh ce awm loet kaw;
Khanhi awh ypawm na ak awm pihla amyihna anih ce caksak loet kawng nyng.”
Cehlai nang ing qoek tiksaw kawna awm am ngai hyk ti; situi na syp ak khan awh nak kawso sak soeih hyk ti.
Na tyihzawih ing paipi na sai ce qoek pe valh nawh a boei lumyk awm dekvai awh hqit pe sak hyk ti.
A vawngkhqi hqe pe boeih nawh a vawng cakkhqi awm plawci sak boeih hyk ti.
Ak thoekkhqi ing ik-oeih qawt pe unawh; a kengsam awhkaw thlangkhqi ak kqawnseet na awm hawh hy.
A qaalkhqi ak tang kut ben ce zoeksang pe tiksaw; a qaalkhqi boeih ce zeel sak hyk ti.
Zawzi ak h qaat ben ce hawi pe khup phlet tiksaw qaal tuknaak kung awh awm am dyih pyi voel hyk ti.
A boeimangnaak ce dyt pe sak nawh a bi ngawihdoelh ce khawmdek na khawng pe hyk ti.
A tai pyngthym hui awhkaw khawnghi ce tawi pe sak nawh, chah phyihnaak hi ing zawl malh hyk ti.
Aw Bawipa, ityk dy aw? Na haai ce na thuh hly loet hawh nawh nu? Nak kawsonaak ce mai amyihna iqyt dy a uih kaw?
Ka hqingnaak ve ikawmyih dyna ang khum a zoe tive sim lawt lah. Nang ing na sai thlanghqing ve a hqawng a h qap mai ni.
Thihnaak amak hu thlanghqing a u mih ak thlang nu awm nawh, hlan a sai thainaak awhkawng amah ingkaw amah ak hul qu thai u nu ak awm?
Aw Bawipa, ma nakaw na lungnaak ak bau soeih ce hana a awm, na ypawmnaak ing a tyihzawih David a venawh awi na kam ce ti?
Bawipa, na tyihzawih qaibu na a awm ce sim poe nawhtaw, pilnam thlangkhqi a thekhanaak awikhqi ikawmyih dyna kak kawlung ing ang yh tice sim law lah.
Aw Bawipa, na qaalkhqi ing thekhanaak ingkaw qaihbu na ami ni sai ve, ve ing nang ing na caksak thlang ce a khaw kan boeih awh qaihbu na sai uhy.
Bawipa venawh thangleek naak kumqui dyna awm seh nyng! Amen coeng awh Amen.

Bawipa, nang taw cadil dyna kaimih a awmnaak hun na awm hyk ti.
Thlangkhqi a awm hlanawh lungdek ingkaw khawmdek na syn hlan awh, kumqui ingkaw kumqui dyna nang taw Khawsa na awm hyk ti.
Thlanghqing ce dekvai na hlat sak tlaih tiksaw, “thlanghqing cakhqi aw, dekvai na hlat tlaih hlah uh,” tina hyk ti.
Kum thongoet awm nang a huh awhtaw ak khum bang khaw nynoet amyihna ni a awm, am awhtaw thanoet amyihna ni a awm.
Thlanghqing ve thihnaak awh ihnaak ing khawl bang tiksaw; mymcang awhkaw qam ak cawn thai amyihna ni a awm.
Myncang hqit awhtaw sai pai hlai uhy, khawmy ben awhtaw zai nawh reu hy.
Nak kawsonaak ing kaimih ve ni ai nawh nam thin tawinaak ce kaimih aham kqih awm soeih hy.
Kaimih a sai thawlhnaakkhqi ce na haiawh ta nawh, kaimih anghyp thawlhnaakkhqi ce na hai awhkaw vangnaak ing coei pheng hy.
Kaimih a khawnghi boeih ve nak kawso ak kaiawh khum boeih hy; kumkhqi boeih ve ko ang kqangnaak ing dyt sak unyng.
Kaimih a khawnghi a sang taw kum khqihkip - tha a awm awhtaw kup kqetkip pha thai mai hy; Cehlai ce ak khuiawh ak leek soeih zani kyinaak ingkaw kawseetnaak hqoeng ni, ang tawnna khum bang nawh, ding bang unyng.
Nang ak kawso thaawmnaak ce u ing a sim? Ikawtih nang ak kawsonaak ve kqih hly kawi dyna bau soeih ky.
kawlung cyihnaak kami huhnaak thai aham, hqingkhui khawnghi ak thym na noet thainaak ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Aw Bawipa, ngai qu dawm cang! Ikchoet nu nak kaw a so hyn kaw? Na tyihzawihkhqi ak khan awh qeennaak ta cang.
Na lungnaak amak dyt thai ing mymcang awh ni phyi sak khqi nawh, cawhtaw zeelnaak laa sa kawng unyng saw ka hqing khui pyt kamik kaw zeel kaw.
Khawnghi khawqyt nani khuikha sak khqi hawh amyihna kawzeelnaak ni pek khqi lawt lah, kawtih kum khawqyt awh kyinaak hu hawh unyng.
Na ik-oeih sai ce na tyihzawihkhqi venawh dang sak nawh, na boeimangnaak ce na cakhqi venawh dang sak lah.
Ningmih a Bawipa Khawsa ak kawzeelnaak ce ningnih ak khan awh awm seh nyng; kaimih a kut bibi ve cak law sak lah.
Sawsang soeih a awmnaak hun awh ak awm taw Boeimang thak awm a hlip awh dym kawm uh.
Bawipa, Anih taw kang thuknaak ingkaw ka vawngcak, ka ypnaak Khawsa na awm hy,” ti kawng nyng.
Anih ing pha aham dawng dun peek a kut khui ingkaw thihnaak tlawhnu khui awhkawng ni loet sak kaw.
Anih ing ang hla ing ni hlip kawmsaw, ang hlak kep awh dymnaak hu kawm uk ti; anih a ypawmnaak ce nang a phuhqa ingkaw kqangdan na awm kaw.
Than kqih awm awm ap kqih kawp ti, dai awh ak ding thai awm ap kqih kawp ti.
Khawmthan awh ak thoek tlawhpui awm ap kqih voel ti kawp ti, khawnghyp awh ak law thihnaak awm ap kqih ti kawp ti.
Na venawh thlang thawnghqa tlu u seiawm, nang a ven am pha qoe kaw.
Namik doeng ing toek hqoeng kawm tiksaw thlakchekhqi phepnaak ce hu kawp ti.
Sawsang Soeih ce na awmnaak hun na na taak awhtaw – kai kang thuknaak, Bawipa ce –
Tlawhnaak qoe qoe ing am ni pha tikaw, ikawmyih a seetnaak ingawm na hi im am pha law ti kaw.
Ikawtih na cehnaak a hoeiawh anik awmpyi aham ak khan na cehnaak a hoeiawh anik awm pyi aham ak khan ceityihkhqi ce awi pe kaw;
Lung awh na khaw am na suknaak aham cekkhqi ing na kut awh ni hak pawm kawm uh.
Sendeih ingkaw ngentau ce leh kawm tiksaw; samthyyn ak bau soeih ingkaw khquih bau ce nawi kawp ti.
Ikawtih Bawipa, Kai ani lungnaak dawngawh, hul kawng nyng; kang ming ce a sim dawngawh, hlip a chung kawng nyng.
Kai ce nik khy kawmsaw, kai ing hlat kawng kyinaak a hu awh ce awmpyi kawng nyng saw, ka hul coengawh zoeksang kawng nyng.
Hqinglung sangnaak ing ngaihqep sak kawng nyng saw ka hulnaak ce huh sak kawng nyng.
Bawipa kyihcah ve nep nawh, Aw sawsang soeih, tumding ing nang ming kyihcah ve leek hy,
mymcang awh na lungnaak kqawn nawh than awh na ypawmnaak kqawn ve nep hy,
A qui pahqa ak law tingtoeng ingkaw qaw tingtoeng ing nang ming kyihcah ve nep hy.
Aw Bawipa, na ik-oeih sai ing ni zeel sak hyk ti; na kut sai awh zeelnaak laa sa nyng
Aw Bawipa, na ik-oeih sai ve bau soeih nawh, nak poeknaak awm dung soeih hy!
Poeknaak amak takhqi ing ce ce am sim uhy, thlakqawkhqi ing am zasim bai uhy,
thlakchekhqi taw qam amyihna cawn nawh ik-oeih amak leek ak saikhqi ing qoeng a taai mai u seiawm, kumqui dyna plawci kawm uh.
Cehlai Bawipa, nang taw kumqui dy zoeksang na awm hyk ti.
Aw Bawipa, na qaalkhqi, na qaalkhqi bai taw plal a tham ngai kawm uh; ik-oeih che ak saikhqi boeih taw a kqeng a zang na awm ngai bit kawm uh.
Vaitawm cai ak ki amyihna kak ki ve zoeksang tiksaw; situi leek ing ni syp hyk ti.
Ka thunkhakhqi noeng na ami awm ce ka mik ing hu nawh; ka qaal thlakchekhqi ing cen khawng hak uhy tice kang haa ing za hawh hy.
Thlakdyng taw thut thing amyihna taai kawmsaw. Lebanon awhkaw sidar thing amyihna a taai nep kaw;
Bawipa a ipkhuiawh ling na ak awm taw, ningnih a Khawsa a vawngup khuiawh taai hqui kaw.
Pacawng nawh kum a sang coengawh awm qah bak bak kaw, a hqing sup na awm loet kaw,
Bawipa taw thlakdyng ni; anih taw ka lungnu na awm nawh, anih awh seetnaak ve tehca awm am awm hy,” tinawh kqawn kaw.

Bawipa taw boei na ngawi nawh, qypawmnaak ing thoeihcam quhy; Bawipa taw qypawmnaak ing thoeihcam qu nawh thaawmnaak ing myk ang dah qu hy. Khawmdek ve ak cak na dyih sak nawh; am thoeih qoe hy.
Na boei ngawihdoelh ce ak kqym awhkawng caksak cena awm hawh hy; nang taw kumqui awhkawng awm hawh hyk ti.
Aw Bawipa, tuicunlikhqi hak zoek qu hy, tuicunlikhqi ing ak awi y uhy; tuicunlikhqi ing tuibak awi y uhy.
Tui ak awi ak hum anglakawh awm khan ben nakaw Bawipa taw ak tha awm khqoet hy.
Nak awipeekkhqi ce ak cak na dyi nawh; Aw Bawipa, cimnaak ing na im ce a dyt ka qoena thoeihcam loet hy.
Aw Bawipa, lu ak lokung Khawsa, lu ak lokung Aw Khawsa, vang pheng lah.
Aw Khawmdek awi ak dengkung, tho lah; ak oek qukhqi ce a nai a koem na thung lah.
Thlakchekhqi iqyt dy, Aw Bawipa, thlakche khqi iqyt dy ami hoel poeng kaw?
Oek qunaak ak awi sa unawh; thlakchekhqi ing oek qunaak ak awi ing be uhy.
Aw Bawipa, nak thlangkhqi ce phep a re unawh; na qo ak pangkhqi ce the a kha na uhy.
Nuhaikhqi ingkaw khinkhqi ce him unawh, pa ak naikhqi ce him uhy.
Bawipa ing am hu hy; Jacob a Khawsa ing kawna am sui hy,” ti uhy.
Nangmih thlang khqing lak awh poeknaak amak takhqi aw, poek hqeet lah thaw voei uk ti; nangmih thlakqaw tloek aw, ityk awh nami cyih kaw?
Haa ak saikung ing am za hly nawh nu? Mik ak saikung ing am hu hly nawh nu?
Pilnam thlang ak cawngpyikung ing am toel hly nawh nu? Thlang ak cawngpyikung ce cyihnaak voet nawh hy voei nu?
Thlanghqing ak kawpoek Bawipa ing sim nawh; cekkhqi taw zilh mai ni tice sim hy.
Aw Bawipa, nang ing nam cuuk thlangkhqi taw a zoseen hy, nang a anaa awi ak cawngkhqi taw a zoseen hy;
thlakche aham lawk-kqawng ak co na a awm hlan dy kyinaak khawnghi ak khui awhkawng cekhqi ce hawih khangnaak pe hyk ti.
Ikawtih, Bawipa ing ak thlangkhqi cetaw am qoek tang; a qo ak pang hly tyng thlangkhqi ce am hlah tikaw.
Awidengnaak ce dyngnaak awh awm kawmsaw, kawlung ak dyng thlangkhqi boeih ing ce ce hquut kawm uh.
Thlakche ak tuk aham ka ham u nu ak dyi kaw? Ik-oeih che ak saikhqi ce u ing nu a oelh law lah voei?
Bawipa ing ama nik pyi mantaw, thihnaak dek khuiawh ni ka awm hly hawh hy.
Kai ing, Ka khaw bah hy,” ka ti awh ce, Aw Bawipa, na lungnaak ing nim thawh hy.
Ka kawpoek a kyi soeih awh, nang ngaihqepnaak ing ka hqingnaak zeel sak hy.
Ak awi tlyhnaak ing kyinaak pe nawh, ak plawci thai boei ngawihdoelh ingkaw nang anglakawh phaqunaak ak awm hly thai aw?
Cekhqi ing za qu unawh thlakdyng ce tuk uhy, ak awm dym ce thih ham dyna dawk sak uhy.
Cehlai Bawipa taw kai a vawngbau cak na awm nawh, kai kang thuknaak lungnu taw Khawsa ni.
Cekkhqi a thawlhnaak ce thung pe kawmsaw ak che sainaak awh cekkhqi ce hqe kaw; Bawipa ningnih a Khawsa ing cekkhqi ce hqe kaw.
Law lah uh, Bawipa venawh zeelnaak laa sa lah usih; ningnih a hulnaak lungnu venawh khawteh na khy lah usih.
Zeelnaak awi kqawn doena a venawh cet unawh taw tumding ing laa sak doena zoeksang lah usih.
Ikawtih Bawipa taw boeimang soeih Khawsa na awm nawh, khawsa boeih ak khan awh Sangpahrang ak bau soeih na awm hy.
A kut awh dek ak dung soeih khqi ce awm nawh, tlangsawmkhqi awm amah a koena awm hy.
Tuicunlikhqi awm amah ing a sai dawngawh, amah a koena awm hy, a kut ing kawngceng awm sai bai hy.
Law lah uh, amah bawk doena koep lah usih, ningnih anik saikung Bawipa haiawh khuk sym lah usih,
anih taw ningnih a Khawsa na awm nawh, ningnih taw a qamno a sainaak awhkaw thlangkhqi na ni awm uhy, amah ing ak khai tukkqeng na ni awm uhy. Tuhngawi awh ak awi naming zaak awhtaw,
Meribaha awh na mik kaw ting sak unawh, Massah khawnghi awh qamkoh awhkaw nami sai amyihna na mik kaw koeh ting sak voel uh,
Ka ik-oeih sai hu hawh hlai uhy, cawh ce na pakhqi ing ni noekdak uhy.
Ikawtih kum phlikip khuiawh cekkhqik khan awh kak kaw so hy; “Ve ak thlangkhqi ve kawlung ak plengkhqi, ka lam amak sim thlangkhqi ni,” ti nyng.
Cedawngawh kawso doena “Vekkhqi ing ityk awh awm kang dymnaak awh am kun hly thai uhy,” tinawh awi kam nyng.
Bawipa venawh lak thai sa unawh; khawmdek thlangkhqi boeih aw, Bawipa venawh laa sa lah uh.
Bawipa venawh laa sa unawh, ang ming ce kyihcah lah uh; nynnoet coeng nynoet awh a hulnaak ce kqawn lah uh.
Pilnam thlang anglakawh a boeimangnaak ce khypyi unawh, thlang boeih a venawh kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a sai ce kqawn lah uh.
Ikawtih Bawipa taw a mang soeih a dawngawh kyihcah aham tyng hy; khawsa boeih anglakawh kqih aham awm hy.
Ikawtih pilnam thlangkhqi a Khawsa taw myi sai mai ni, Cehlai Bawipa ingtaw khan ce sai hy.
Boeimangnaak ingkaw qypawmnaak ce a haiawh awm nawh; a hun ciim awh thaawmnaak ingkaw boeimangnaak ce awm hy.
Aw pilnam cakawkhqi boeih aw, Bawipa ce sim unawh, Bawipa venawh boeimang thaawmnaak ce pe lah uh.
Bawipa venawh ang ming boeimangnaak pe unawh; ik-oeih nawn hly kawi khyn doena a bawkim vawngup khuiawh law lah uh.
Ak ciim ik-oeih ing thoeihcam qu unawh Bawipa ce bawk lah uh; Khawmdek thlangkhqi boeih aw, a haiawh thym lah uh.
Pilnam thlang anglakawh, “Bawipa taw boei na ngawi hy,” tinawh kqawn uh. Khawmdek ve ak cak na ang dyih sak dawngawh am thoeih qoe voel hy; anih ing Khawmdek thlangkhqi ce ang myihlip na awi deng kaw.
Khan zeel seitaw, Khawmdek ak kaw law seh tuicunli ingkaw ak khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih ing awi sa useh;
Lokhqi ingkaw lo ak khuiawh awh ak awmkhqi boeih ing zeelnaak laa sa u seh. Cawhtaw kqawng awhkaw thingkhqi boeih ing zeelnaak laa sa kawm usaw;
Bawipa haiawh laa sa kawm uh, Khawmdek awideng aham law hawh kaw, anih ing Khawmdek ve am dyng na awideng kawmsaw thlangkhqi ce awitak ing awi deng kaw.
Bawipa taw boei na ang ngawih dawngawh, Khawmdek zeel seh; ak hla na ak awm tuisang lak khqi awm zeel u seh.
Myi ingkaw than ing zawl nawh; dyngnaak ingkaw thymnaak ce a boei ngawihdoelh hawihnaak na awm hy.
A haiawh mai cet nawh a kengsam awhkaw a thunkhakhqi ce uih sak hy.
A Khawk phla ing Khawmdek ve coei hlap hlap nawh; Khawmdek ing a huh awh thyn hy.
Tlangkhqi awm Khawmdek a Bawipa haiawh khawiut amyihna tle uhy.
Khankhqi ing a dyngnaak khypyi unawh, thlang boeih ing a boeimangnaak ce hu uhy.
Myihlip ak bawkkhqi boeih taw chahphyi uhy, myihlip awh ak oek qu thlangkhqi ce nangmih khawsakhqi boeih ing amah ce bawk lah uh!
Zion ing ang zaak awh ce zeel nawh Judah qam awhkaw vangcakhqi awm Bawipa, nang ak awidengnaakkhqi awh amik kaw zeel hy.
Nang taw, Bawipa, Khawmdek boeih ak khan awh Sawsang Soeih na awm hyk ti; khawsakhqi boeih ak khan awh zoeksang na awm hy.
Bawipa ak lungnaak thlangkhqi ingtaw ak che ce sawh na u seh, amah a ypawm thlangkhqi ce awm pyi nawh thlakche a kut khui awhkawng hul hy.
Thlakdyng ak khan awh vangnaak awm nawh kawlung ak dyngkhqi venawh zeelnaak awm hy.
Nangmih thlakdyngkhqi aw, Bawipa awh zeel unawh taw, ang ming ciim ce kyihcah lah uh.
Bawipa venawh lak thai sa lah uh, kawtih amah ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ce sai hy; tang kut ben a ban caih ing hulnaak ce amah aham sai hawh hy.
Bawipa ing a thaawngnaak ingkaw a dyngnaak ce pilnam thlangkhqi venawh sim sak nawh dang pe sak hy.
Israel ipkhuikaw venawh amah ak lungnaak ingkaw a ypawmnaak ce sim khak hy; khawdyt nakaw thlang boeih ing ningnih Khawsa thaawngnaak ce hu hawh uhy.
Khawmdek thlangkhqi boeih aw, zeel doena Bawipa venawh khy lah uh; tumding tum doena zeelnaak laa sa lah uh;
tingtoeng ing Bawipa venawh tum unawh, tingtoeng tum doena laa sa lah uh.
Uut awi ingkaw tuu’m cai ak ki yng doena, Bawipa sangpahrang haiawh zeel doena khy lah uh.
Tuicunli ingkaw ak khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih, Khawmdek ingkaw ak khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih ing awi sa u seh.
Lawngnukhqi ing kut bei u seitaw, tlangkhqi ing zeelnaak laa kutoet na sa u seh;
Bawipa haiawh laa sa u seh, kawtih anih taw Khawmdek awideng aham law hy. Anih ing dyngnaak ing Khawmdek deng kawmsaw thlangkhqi ce ang myih pil na awi deng kaw.
Bawipa taw boei na ngawi hy, pilnam thlang boeih thyn u seh nyng; anih taw cherubim anglakawh boei ngawihdoelh awh ngawi hy, deklung deklai ing thyn seh.
Zion awh Bawipa taw boeimang na awm nawh; pilnam boeih ak khan awh zoeksang na awm hy.
Nang ming boeimang ingkaw kqih awm ve kyihcah u seh – anih taw ak ciim ni.
Sangpahrang taw thak awm thlang na awm hy, ak thym ce lungna hy – nang ing ang myih pil na caksak hyk ti; Jacob awh ak dyng ak thym ce sai hawh hyk ti.
Bawipa ningnih a Khawsa ce zoeksang unawh taw a khawkung awh bawk lah uh; anih taw ak ciim ni.
Mosi ingkaw Aaron ve a khawsoeih anglakawh awm nih nawh, ang ming ak khykhqi anglak li awh Samyl taw awm hy; cekkhqi ing Bawipa ce khy unawh anih ing hlat pehy.
Anih ing myi ak dyi awhkawng awi kqawn pe nawh, amah ing a peek awipeek ingkaw ak awi ak kqawn peekkhqi ce ngai pe uhy.
Aw Bawipa kaimih a Khawsa, cekkhqi ce nang ing hlat hyk ti; a sai thawlhnaakkhqi awh nang ing toel hlai hyk ti, Israelkhqi aham qeenkhaw ak ngaikung Khawsa na awm pe hyk ti.
Bawipa ningnih a Khawsa ce zoeksang unawh a tlakang ciim awh bawk lah uh, kawtih ningnih a Bawipa Khawsa taw ciim hy.
Khawmdek thlangkhqi boeih aw, awmhly doena Bawipa venawh khy lah uh.
Zeel doena Bawipa ce bawk unawh taw; zeelnaak laa sak doena a haiawh law lah uh.
Bawipa taw Khawsa ni tice sim uh. Amah ing ningnih ve ani sai khqi a dawngawh, amah a koena ni awm uhy; ak thlang na ni awm unawh, qam a sainaak awhkaw tukkqeng na ni awm uhy.
Zeel awi kqawn doena ak chawmkeng awh kun unawh, amah kyihcah doena a bawkim ipkhui awh kun lah uh; a venawh zeel awi kqawn unawh ang ming ce kyihcah lah uh.
Ikawtih, Bawipa taw leek nawh a lungnaak ce kumqui dyna cak hy; a ypawmnaak awm cadil dyna cak hy.
Aw Bawipa, na lungnaak ingkaw na thymnaak awh laa sa nyng saw, nam kyihnaak laa sa vang nyng.
Coet a kap kaana khaw ka saknaak aham ngaihta vang nyng – ityk awh ka venna na law kaw? Coet amak kap kawlung ing ka ipkhui na cet vang nyng.
Amak leek ik-oeih ce ka mik huh awh am awm sak kawng. Cangnaak amak ta thlangkhqi a ik-oeih saikhqi ce sawh na nyng; cekkhqi ing kai am nim tu kawm uh.
Kawlung amak dyng thlangkhqi taw ka venawh kawng ak hla na awm kawm uh; ak che ik-oeih qoe qoe ce ap kqip ti kawng.
U awm a kengsam awhkaw thlang ang hypna ak kqawnseetkhqi taw, hqe kawng nyng; u awm oek qunaak mik dai nawh kawlung ak oek qu taw, am dun khing ti kawng.
Kai ing ami awm haih thainaak aham, qam khuiawh kaw ypawm thlangkhqi ce toek kawng nyng; coet a kap kaana ak cet thlangkhqi ing ka bibi kawm uh.
Thlak thaikhqi ka ipkhui awh am awm thai kawm uh; amak thym awi ak paukhqi ka haiawh am dyi thai kawm uh.
Qam khuiawh kaw thlakchekhqi ce mymcang qoek awh hqe khqi kawng; ik-oeih che ak saikhqi boeih ce Bawipa khawk bau khuiawh kawng milh sak kawng.
Aw Bawipa, kak cykcahnaak awi ve ngai law lah; bawm aham kang kqang awi ve na ven pha seh.
Ka khuikha awh ve na haai koeh thuh. Kai benna nang haa keng law nawhtaw; ka nik khy awh ang tawnna nim hlat lah.
Ka hqing khui khawnghikhqi ve maikhu amyihna ding bang nawh; ka quhkhqi ve maialh amyihna alh hy.
Kak kawlung ve koh aai nawh qam amyihna reu hy; buh ai aham awm hilh qu hawh nyng.
Kang ko awh ka quh ingkaw ka vyn hqawng ni ak awm hqoeng hawh.
Qamkoh awhkaw bukbu amyihna ngawi hqoeng nyng saw, ak plawci anglakawhkaw bukbu amyihna awm hqoeng nyng.
Ihmyh lonai na awm nyng saw; iptih khanna amah doeng ak ngawi hqoeng pha amyihna awm nyng.
Khawnghi zung ka qaalkhqi ing nik kqawnset unawh, kai anik huhqytkhqi ing kang ming ve kqawn setnaak na hawna uhy.
Maivytkhqi ce buh na ai nyng saw ka awk hly kawi awm mikphli tuikhqi ing kqit uhy,
nak kaw a so aih awh, ni lo hqoet nawh nik khawng hyk ti.
Ka hqingnaak khawnghikhqi ve khawmy benna kaw khawngkawn amyihna awm nawh; qam amyihna reu hy.
Cehlai, Bawipa, nang taw kumqui dy boei ngawihdoelh awh ngawi hyk ti; nang ming awm cadil naa dyna cak hy.
Nang tho kawm tiksaw Zion ce qeen kawp ti, anih a venawh zeelnaak tym qoe hawh ni; a tym a taak ce pha law hawh hy.
Na ceityihkhqi ing anih a lung ce lungna unawh; a dekvai ing cekkhqi ce am thin tlawh sak hy.
Phynlumkhqi ing Bawipang ming kqih kawm usaw, khawmdek awhkaw sangpahrangkhqi boeih ing na boeimangnaak ce kqihchah kawm uh.
Ikawtih Bawipa ing Zion ce sa tlaih kawmsaw a boeimangnaak ing dang tlaih kaw.
Khawdeng ak voethlauhkhqi ak cykcahnaak ce hlat pe kaw; cekkhqi a qeen thoehnaak ce am huhsit pek khqi tikaw.
Ve ve ak law hly kawi cadil naakhqi ham qee na awm seh; saina ak awm hlankhqi ing Bawipa ce kyihcah na seh.
Bawipa ing a hun ciim sang soeih awhkawng nuk toek hy, khan nakawng khawmdek ve nuk toek hy,
thawng ak tlakhqi a ko kqangnaak awi ce ngai peek aham ingkaw thih aham ami palh sak thlangkhqi ce loet sak aham.”
Bawipang ming ce Zion awh kqawn na awm kawmsaw am kyihnaak ce Jerusalem awh awm kaw,
thlangkhqi ingkaw qamkhqi ing Bawipa bawk aham cawn kawm uh.
Khaw ka sak pyngthym mai awh kak tha ni boek pe nawh; ka hqinglung ni tawi pe sak hy.
Cedawngawh kai ing, Aw ka Khawsa, ka hqing huili awh koeh ni lo valh; nang a kumkhqi taw cadil naa dyna ak awm ni.
Ak cykca awh nang ing khawmdek pengnelhnaak sai tiksaw, khankhqi ce na kut ing sai na awm hy.
Ceekhqi taw qeng hlai voei uh, nang taw awm poe kawp ti; cekkhqi taw hi amyihna se kawm uh. Bainaak amyihna thaw kawm tiksaw lawha boeih kaw.
Cehlai nang taw amah toeng na awm poe kawp ti, nang a kumkhqi ingtaw a dytnaak awm am ti kaw.
A tyihzawihkhqi a cakhqi ce na haiawh awm kawm usaw; a cadilkhqi awm na haiawh cak poe hawh kawm uh.”

Aw ka hqingnaak, Bawipa kyihcah lah; kak kawk khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih aw, ang ming ciim ce kyihcah lah uh.
Aw ka hqingnaak, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah, a zoseennaak ani peekkhqi boeih ce koeh hilh –
na thawlhnaakkhqi awh qeenkhaw ngai law nawh na tlawhnaakkhqi boeih ce qoei law sak hy,
lawk-kqawng khuina kawng na hqingnaak ce hul law nawh lungnaak, qeennaak ing ni sing hy,
na taithymnaak ce hu amyihna thai sak pan aham ik-oeih leek ingkaw na ngaihnaak ce sit law sak hy.
thekhanaak ak hukhqi ham Bawipa ing dyngnaak ingkaw thymnaak ce sai hy.
Mosi venawh a lamkhqi ce sim sak nawh, Israel thlangkhqi venawh a ik-oeih sai ce sim sak khqi hy.
Bawipa taw thlang qeenkhaw ak ngai ingkaw lungnaakkung na awm hy, kaw amak so nai, lungnaak ing ak be na awm hy.
Anih thawlh ap puk khing kawmsaw, ak kawlung kumqui dy am so khing kaw;
ningnih a thawlhnaak ing ak tyng na nik khan awh ik-oeih am sai nawh sai thawlhnaak amyihna amni thung khqi bai hy.
Khawmdek awhkawng khawnghi ce a sang soeih amyihna, amah ak kqihkhqi ham lungnaak taw bau soeih hy;
khawlaw ben ingkaw khawtlak ben a hla soeih amyihna, ningnih a thawlhnaakkhqi ce ak hla na ni khoe pek khqi valh hawh hy.
Pa ing a cakhqi a lungnaak amyihna, amah ak kqihkhqi ce Bawipa ing lungna hy;
kawtih ikawmyihna ningnih ve sai na ni awm tice amah ing sim hy, dekvai nani ni awm uh tice amah ing sim loet hy.
Thlanghqing aham taw, a hqing khui khawnghi ve qam amyihna ni a awm, qam a pai amyihna ni a awm;
khaw a hli awhtaw zawn bang nawh am awm voel hy, a awmnaak hun zani am sim voel hy.
Cehlai Bawipa ak kqih thlangkhqi venawh taw a lungnaak ce kumqui coengawh kumqui dy awm poepa nawh, a dyngnaak ce a cakhqi a cakhqi petoe dyna awm pe hy –
a paipi amak hlepkhqi ingkaw ak awipeek ak sim loetkhqi taw cemyihna awm kawm uh.
Bawipa ing a boei ngawihdoelh ce khan na caksak nawh, a qam ing khan boeih ce uk hy.
Tha awm nawh ak awi ngai doena ak kawngaih ik-oeih ak sai peek, nangmih khan ceityihkhqi aw, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah uh.
Amah ak kawngaih ak sai nangmih a tyihzawihkhqi ingkaw khan qalkapkhqi boeih aw, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah uh.
A uknaak hun boeih awhkaw a ik-oeih saikhqi aw, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah uh. Aw ka hqingnaak, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah.
Aw ka hqingnaak, Bawipa kyihcah lah. Aw Bawipa ka Khawsa, nang taw bau soeih hyk ti; boeimang ypawmnaak ing thoeihcam qu hyk ti.
Vangnaak ce hi amyihna bai nawh; khankhqi ce hi im amyihna phyl hy,
a awmnaak ak khan ipkaikhqi ce tuikhqik khan awh zilh ang hlakhqi awh ce ngawi hy.
Zilh ce a ceityihkhqi na sai nawh; maikqawng ing mai ce a tyihzawih na sai hy.
Khawmdek ve ang hangnaak hun awh hawih nawh, am thoeih qoe hy.
Tuihdung ingkaw hi amyihna zawl malh nawh; tlangkhqi ak khan awh tui pha sak hyk ti.
Cehlai nang ing na zyih a dawngawh tuikhqi cen nawh, nang a khawhum awi awh ang tawnna cen hy;
tlangkhqik khanna lawng unawh tuikawkhqi awh awm nung lawng uhy, a mingmih aham hun na qoek na bah peeknaak hun awh lawng uhy.
Cekkhqi amang lawngnaak thai aham qamqi taak pe hyk ti; ityk awh awm khawmdek ve am leu voel tikaw.
Lawngsip awm sak nawh lawnghawi dung awh lawng sak hy; tlangkhqi anglakawh ce lawng hy.
Qam awhkaw chukphakhqi boeih ce awk sak nawh; kqawng meqangkhqi ami tui ngaih sit hy.
Khan nakaw phakhqi ing tuikeng awh bu sawn unawh; thingpangkhqi awh laa sa uhy.
A awmnaak aham im awhkawng tlangkhqi ce tui ing syp nawh; a bibinaak ak thaih ing khawmdek ve phoen phyi sak hy.
Khqin aham qam cawn sak nawh, thlanghqing aham tawihah anhah cawt sak hy – khawmdek awhkawng buh a an taak law pehy:
thlang ak kawlung ak zeel sak misur tui, haai a plangnaak aham situi, ak kawlung tha ak awm sak phaihpi ce pehy.
Bawipa a thingkhqi, Lebanon awh amah ing ang lingkhqi ce khaw ing ak qui na syp hy.
Cawh phakhqi ing bu sawn unawh, sidar a thing awh phungawkhqi ing im ta uhy.
Tlang sangkhqi cetaw sangza sithai awmnaak hun na awm nawh; minpoengkhqi cetaw phihkhqi a awmnaak hun na awm hy.
Hla ing khawcan sim nawh, khawmik ing a nung tlaak tym sim hy.
Nang ing thannaak haw law tiksaw, khawmthan na coeng hy, cawh khqinkhqi lym ang hang uhy.
Sendeihkhqi ing khqin a ai kawi tu aham ami ngaih awh kawk unawh, Khawsa venawh kawng ai sui uhy.
Khawmik ang thoeng law awhtaw qeng sap uhy; a awmnaak lukkawk khuina voei unawh zaih uhy.
Cawh thlang ing bibi aham cet nawh, khawmy dy bi sai hy.
Aw Bawipa, na bibi ve kqeng soeih mah hy! Cyihnaak ing vemyihkhqi boeih ve sai hyk ti; khawmdek ve na sai ik-oeih ing bengen hy.
Ak kau soeih tuicunli awm awm nawh, noet noeng kaana a sai lumngakhqi ak zawi ak bau awm hy.
Cawh lawk baukhqi hu hai na cet unawh, cawh nang ing tuinga ang lymnaak khoek hun ce sai pe hyk ti.
A tym can awh nang ing buh na peek hly ce lamtoen doena nang ce ni toek uhy.
Cekkhqi ce buh na peek awh, a mingmih ing cung hloep uhy, nang ing na kut nak thlek awh cekkhqi ing ik-oeik leek ing be uhy.
Cehlai haai na thuh awh, mawn uhy; cekkhqi ang hqi ce na lawh peek valh awh, thi unawh dekvai na hlat uhy.
Nang Myihla ce na tyih awh, a mingmih ce sai na awm unawh, nang ing khawmdek ce tlaih pan hyk ti.
Bawipa a boeimangnaak taw kumqui dy awm poe seh; a bibinaak awh Bawipa taw zeel seh –
khawmdek toek nawh, tyn sak hy, tlangkhqi bi nawh khu sak hy.
Ka hqing khui pyt Bawipa venawh laa sa kawng nyng; ka hqing khui ka Khawsa kyihcahnaak laa sa vang nyng.
Bawipa awh ka zeel lawt amyihna, kak kawpoeknaak ve a venawh zeelnaak na awm seh.
Cehlai thlak thawlhkhqi taw khawmdek awhkawng cing baat u seitaw thlakchekhqi awm koeh awm voel u seh. Aw ka hqingnaak, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah.
Bawipa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn unawh taw, ang ming ce khy lah uh; a ik-oeih sai ce thlangphyn a venawh sim sak lah uh.
A venawh laa sa unawh taw, am kyihcahnaak laa sa lah uh; kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a sai ce kqawn uh.
Ang ming ciim boeimang seitaw; Bawipa ak suikhqi ak kawlung taw zeel seh.
Bawipa ingkaw ak thaawmnaak ce sui u nawhtaw; a haai ce a poepa na sui lah uh.
Kawpoek kyi ngaihak ik-oeih a saikhqi ingkaw awidengnaak ak kqawn ce sim poe lah uh,
a tyihzawih Abaraham a cadilkhqi aw, amah ing ak tyh Jakob cakhqi aw sim poe lah uh.
Anih taw Bawipa ningnih a Khawsa na awm hy; a awidengnaak taw khawmdek boeih ak khan awh awm hy.
A paipi ce kumqui dyna sim poe nawh, ak awipeek ce, cadil naa thong oet dyna sim poe hy,
Abraham ing ani awk haih paipi ing Isak a venawh awi a taak ce sim khak hy.
Ce ak awi ce awitlyh a myihna Jakob a venawh caksak nawh, Israel a venawh kumqui paipi na tahy:
Kanan qam ce ni pe kawng nyng saw na taham qo amyihna pang kawp ti,” tina hy.
Thlangmi ami zawica awh, ak zawica tloek ce, qam khuiawh khin na awm hy,
phyn pynoet ingkaw pynoet a venawh, qam pynoet ingkaw pynoet a venawh pla khing uhy.
U ingawm cekkhqi ce am thekha nak khqi uhy; a mingmih awh sangpahrangkhqi ce toel hy:
Situi ak sypkhqi ve koeh bi kawm uk ti; ka tawnghakhqi awm nganbawh koeh pe qoe qoe kawm uk ti,” tina hy.
Ram khuiawh khawseet khawkha pha sak nawh cekkhqi a buh boeih ce hqe pehy;
cekkhqi haiawh thlang pynoet – tamnaa na ami zawih Joseph ce tyih pehy.
A khaw awh khawcehkhqi byn pe unawh, a hawng awh thi quikhqi ing khit uhy,
amah ing ak kqawn oepchoeh ce a soep hlan khui, Bawipak awi ing ak thym ce a sim sak hlan dy cemyihna awm hy.
Sangpahrang ing thlang tyi nawh loet sak hy, thlang kqeng ak ukkung ing anih ce loet sak hy.
Anih ce ipkhui awh boei na ta nawh, a taak ik-oeihkhqi boeih ak khan awh ukkung na tahy,
boei capakhqi ce a ngaih amyihna cawngpyi aham ingkaw, a hqamcakhqi cyihnaak cawngpyi aham cemyihna awm sak hy.
Cekcoengawh Israelkhqi ce Izip ram na kun hy; Ham ram awh khin na Jakob ce awm hy.
Bawipa ing ak thlangkhqi ce ak thaih qah sak hy; a qaalkhqi ham khawzah na coeng sak hy,
amah ak thlangkhqi sawhnaak aham cekkhqi ak kawlung ce hawi pe nawh, a tyihzawihkhqi ce huhqyt sak hy.
A tyihzoeih Mosi ingkaw ak thlang tyk Aaqon ce tyi hy.
Cekkqawi ing cekkhqing lak awh kawpoek kyi hatnaak ingkaw ngaihak ik-oeih ce Ham qam awh sai pe hy nih.
Thannaak ce tyi pe nawh rampum awh khaw than sak hy – kawtih ak awi ce cekkhqi ing am eek pehy na ti nawh nu?
Tuikhqi ce thi na thoeng sak nawh, ngakhqi thih pe sak kang hy.
A ram khuiawh ta-ukhqi da pe sak nawh a boeikhqi a ihkhunkhqi dyna awm pe sak hy.
Awi kqawn pe tlaih bai nawh, pikhqi law pe khung bai hy, a rampum awh hlip hqoeng na be sak hy.
Khawtlan ce qeel na thoeng sak nawh, a rampum awh khaw phla pe sak hy;
misurkungkhqi ingkaw thaikungkhqi deh pe kanglak nawh a qam khuiawh kaw thingkhqi tluk pe sak boeih hy.
Awi kqawn tlaih bai nawh, cawh boeikhqi ce law uhy, noet noeng kaana khamkhawkkhqi ce doem hy;
a qam khuiawh kaw thinghah ai pe kanglak nawh dek awh ak cawt tawi a an ai pe kang hy.
Cekcoengawh a ram khui awhkaw cakcyk boeih ce him pehy, thlanghqing ak thaihcykkhqi boeih ce him pehy.
Sui ingkaw ngun phyih sak nawh, Isarel ce cawn sak hy, a pilnam khuiawh tha amak awm pynoet awm am awm hy.
Israel a dawngawh cekkhqi ak khan awh kqihnaak a pha a dawngawh, cekkhqi ami ceh awh Izipkhqi amik kaw zeel hy.
Cekkhqi ak dah aham myi zam sak hy, than awh vangnaak ak pe na mai pehy.
Cekkhqi ing ami thoeh awh, tytyt pe nawh khan nakaw phaihpi ing ak phoenkhqi phyi pe sak hy.
Lungnu awng nawh tui thoeh pe sak hy; kqawng qamkoh awh tuiva a myihna lawng hy.
A tyihzawih Abaraham a venawh a peek a awitaak ciim ce sim khak hy.
Zeel doena ak thlangkhqi ce ceh pyi nawh, ak tyh thlangkhqi ce awmhly khynaak ing hqui a sawi hy;
thlangphyn khqi a ram ce cekkhqi venawh pehy, thlak chang ing a bi a lawh ce ram ce qo na pang uhy –
a mingmih ing ak awipeekkhqi ce hquut unawh a cawngpyinaak awikhqi ce ami hquutnaak thai aham cekkhqi ce sai pehy. Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh.
Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh. Bawipa taw a leek a dawngawh, a venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn lah uh; a lungnaak awm kumqui dyna cak hy.
U ing Bawipa ak thaawm ik-oeih sai ce kqawn thai nawh a kyihcahnaak ce ak kqawn thai boeih kaw?
Ik-oeih thym ce sai phat nawh, ik-oeih thym ce ak sai phatkhqi taw a zoseen hy.
Aw Bawipa nak thlangkhqi venawh nak kaw a law awh kai awm koeh nim hilh, cekkhqi ce na hul awh kai anik hulkung law lawt seh,
nak tyh thlangkhqi a zo awmnaak ce pang lawt kawng nyng saw, na pilnamkhqi a zeelnaak ce ka bawm coengawh namah kyihcah doena ka qo ce pang thai lawt kawng.
Ka pakhqi ami thawlh amyihna, kaimih awm thawlh unyng; ik-oeih sai thawlh unyng ak che soeih na sai unyng.
Ka pakhqi Izip qam awh ami awm awh, nang ak kawpoek kyi ik-oeih saikhqi ce ikaw na awm am poek unawh; nam qeennaak khawzah ce am sim voel uhy, tuicunli keng awh, Tuicunli Sen awh oelh uhy.
Cehlai amah ak thaawm ik-oeih sai thainaak ce ang dang thainaak aham ang ming ak caming cekkhqi ce hul hy.
Tuicunli Sen ce zyi nawh kak qup hy; cekkhqi ce qamkoh awhkaw amyihna tuihdung khuiawh kawng hquisawi poe hy.
A thunkhakhqi kut awhkawng hul nawh; a qaalkhqi kut awhkawng thaawng hy.
Tui ing a qaalkhqi ce sing khup nawh; pynoet awm am loet uhy.
Cawh ak awikamnaak ce cangna unawh amah kyihcahnaak laa ce sa uhy.
Cehlai iqyt awm a dii hlanawh ik-oeih a sai peekkhqi ce hilh nawn bai unawh am cuk kiknaak awm am sim voel bai uhy.
Qamkoh awh a mimah a ngaihnaak awh pe qu unawh; khawkpawng awh Khawsa ce noek a dak uhy.
Cedawngawh cekkhqi ing a thoeh ce pehy, cehlai pimqep tlawhnaak ce pha pe sak hy.
Hi im awh Mosi ingkaw Bawipa venawh nawn na ak awm Aaron ce yt uhy.
Khawmdek ing ang nawh Dathan ce daih hy; Abiqam a pyikhqi ce pup malh hy.
A hubatkhqing lak awh mai kqawng pung nawh, maikqawng ing thlakchekhqi ce ui boeih hy.
Horeb awh vaitaw ca sai unawh cawhkaw myi thi ing ami hloi ce bawk uhy.
A mimah a boeimangnaak ce qam ak ai vaitaw myi ing thung uhy.
Izip qam awh ik-oeih ak bau soeih sai nawh a mingmih ak hulkung Khawsa ce hilh uhy;
anih ing Ham qam awh kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi sai nawh Tuicunli Sen keng awh kqih awm ik-oeih ce sai pehy.
Ce a dawngawh a mingmih ama seetnaak aham ak kawsonaak sit sak aham, amah ak thlang tyh Mosi mah a kunnaak hly kawi awh ama nang dyih khoep mantaw cekkhqi ce plawci sak kaw.
Qam leek soeih mai ikaw na am hu unawh; ak awikamnaak awm ap cangna uhy.
A mimah a hi imkhqi awh kawso unawh Bawipak awi ce am ngai uhy.
Cedawngawh cekkhqi ce qamkoh awh tluk sak aham a kut phyl nawh tuui khyn hy,
a cadil naakhqi ing phynlum kut awh tlu unawh qampum awh a thek a zak na ami awmnaak aham tuui khyn sih hy.
Peor awhkaw Baal benna hawi qu lat nawh, hqingnaak amak ta khawsakhqi venawh ami nawn lucik buh a ankhqi ce ai uhy;
ik-oeih che sainaak ingkaw Khawsak kawsonaak ce ami sai a dawngawh, a mingmih anglakawh tlawhnaak ce tlung pehy.
Cehlai Phinehas ce tho nawh cekkhqing lak awh ang dyih a dawngawh tlawh khap qu dup hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeih a sai awh anih ak law hly kawi amak dyt qoe cadil naa dy ing thlakdyng na kqawn uhy.
Meribah a tuihkawng awh Bawipa kawso sak unawh, cekkhqi dawngawh Mosi a venawh kyinaak pha pehy;
Khawsa Myihla ce amim tu a dawngawh, Mosi a hui awhkawng poek kaana awi thoeng tara hy.
Bawipa ing awi a peeknaak amyihna, cekkhqi ing thlangkhqi cetaw am plawci sak uhy,
cehlai phyn chang thlangkhqi mi kqit qu unawh cekkhqi a singzoe ce oet uhy.
A mimah aham dawng na amik dun qu, thlakchang a myiqawl ce bawk uhy.
Qaai a venawh a capakhqi ingkaw a canukhqi ce lucik bulnaak na pe uhy.
Thawlhnaak amak awm a capakhqi ingkaw a canukhqi a thi ce Kanankhqi a myiqawl ami bawknaak awh thoeh sak unawh, thi ingkaw qam ce tyih ak awm na sai uhy.
A mimah ingawm ik-oeih sai ing tyih awm sak uhy; a ik-oeih sainaak ing pup zawi na coeng uhy.
Cedawngawh Bawipa taw ak thlangkhqik khan awh ak kawso nawh ak qo ak pang hly kawikhqi ce tyih hy.
Cedawngawh cekkhqi ce thlangphyn khqi kut awh pe nawh, a qaalkhqi ing uk khqi hy.
A qaalkhqi ing thekha nak khqi nawh a saithainaak ak kaiawh tak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ce hul khqi khing hawh hlai hy, amah ce ami tuk lat lat a dawngawh a mimah a thawlhnaak awh cum uhy.
Cehlai cekkhqi ang kqangnaak awi ce ang zaak awh ami khuikhanaak ce ngai na bai hy;
cekkhqi ce ak poek awh a paipi sai ce poek tlaih nawh a lungnaak bau soeih awh hul qu tlaih hy.
A mingmih tamnaa na ak sawikungkhqi ce qeen sak khqi nawn hy.
Nang ming ciim awh zeelnaak awi ka mik kqawn thainaak aham, Aw Bawipa kaimih a Khawsa, kaimih ve ni hul khqi nawhtaw, qampum awhkawng ni cunboem khqi tlaih lah.
Bawipa, Israelkhqi a Khawsa venawh kumqui coeng kumqui dy kyihcahnaak awm seh. Thlang boeih ing, “Amen!” ti seh.
Bawipa taw a leek a dawngawh a venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn lah uh; a lungnaak awm kumqui dy cak hy.
Bawipa a hul thlangkhqi ing ve ve kqawn seh – qaal a kut khuiawh kawng a hul thlangkhqi,
qampum awhkawng a cunboem thlangkhqi, khawlaw khawtlak, a sip a hawt awhkaw thlangkhqi boeih ing kqawn seh.
Thlang vang taw khawkpawng qamkoh awh pla unawh, ami awmnaak hly kawi awm am hu uhy.
Phoen cawi tui ngaih unawh zai doek doek hqoeng uhy.
Cemyihna ami khuikha awh Bawipa venawh kqang uhy, anih ing cekkhqi ce ami khuikhanaak awhkawng hul khqi hy.
Anih ing cekkhqi awmnaak hly kawi khawk bau lam dyng awh ce hqui a sawi phat hy.
A lungnaak amak dyt thai ing thlangkhqi ham kawpoek kyi a ik-oeih sainaak awh cekkhqi ing Bawipa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn u seh,
kawtih tui ak ngaih ce tui ngaih sit sak nawh phoen ak cawi ce ik-oeih leek buh ing phoen phyi sak hy.
Thlang vang taw thannaak a hyp tit khuiawh ngawi unawh, kenqui qui ing thawng tla uhy,
Ikawtih cekkhqi ing Khawsak awikhqi ce hilh unawh Sawsang soeih ak awi ynaak ce ikaw na am hu uhy.
Cedawngawh cekkhqi ce bik tlo bi sak khqi hy; bah hlai uhy, ak leng hly kawi u am awm hy.
Kyinaak ami huhnaak khui awhkawng Bawipa venawh khy uhy, cawh anih ing khuikhnaak khui awhkawng cekkhqi ce hul khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ce than a hypnaak awhkawng sawi law nawh kenquikhqi ce hlam pehy.
A lungnaak amak dyt thai ing thlangkhqi ham kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a sainaak awh cekkhqi ing Bawipa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn u seh,
kawtih anih ing qawhum chawh ce hqe nawh a kalhnaak thiboeng awm ek pe sak hy.
A mimah ang hqohqitnaak awh a vang taw qaw unawh, awm tloei tlawhnaak awh khuikha boeih uhy.
Buh a an boeih tyih unawh thihnaak chawmkeng benna thoeih uhy.
Kyinaak ami huh awh Bawipa venawh kqang unawh khuikhanaak khui awhkawng cekkhqi ce hul khqi hy.
Ak awi ce tyi nawh cekkhqi ce qoei sak hy; phyi ak khui awhkawng cekkhqi ce hul hy.
A lungnaak amak dyt thai ing thlangkhqi ham ik-oeih leek a sai a dawngawh Bawipa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn u seh.
Zeelnaak ik-oeih ce nawn u seitaw zeelnaak laakhqi ing a ik-oeih sainaak ce kqawn u seh.
Ak changkhqi taw tuicun awh lawng ing cet uhy; tuibau awh ik-oeih ak zawikhqi na awm uhy.
Cekkhqi ing Bawipa a sai ik-oeih, tuihdung khuiawh ak sai ik-oeihkhqi ce hu uhy.
Ikawtih awi kqawn nawh khaw hli sak hy, ce ing tuinu ak sang na thawh sak hy.
Khawnghi dyna hang tho nawh tuihdung khuina nung tla tlaih hy; kqih a awm aih a dawngawh a qaal leeknaak ce sauh pung hy.
Zukquikhqi amyihna a kenghal na cet unawh; a cyihnaak a dytnaak awh plal pahoei hy.
Kyinaak ami huh awhtaw Bawipa venawh kqang unawh, khuikhanaak khui awhkawng cekkhqi ce hqui a sawi khqi hy.
Khawhli ce zilh na sit sak nawh; tuicunli awhkaw tuinu ce dym sap uhy.
A ming dym sap awh zeel uhy, cawh ang cainaak tuikeng na cekkhqi ce sawi khqi hy.
A lungnaak amak dyt thai ing cekkhqi ce, thlangkhqi hamna kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a saikhqi awh Bawipa a venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn u seh.
Thlang kqeng a cunnaak awh anih ce zoeksang unawh taw a hqamcakhqi amim cunnaak awh kyihcah lah uh.
Anih ing longkhqi ce qamkoh na coeng sak nawh, lawngca awhkawng ce cengdek na coeng sak hy.
Ce hun awh ak awm thlangkhqi a seetnaak awh, lunglai ak leek soeih ce sihtui cidek na coeng sak hy.
Qamkoh ce tui ing be sak hamna ak koh hun awhkawng tui thoeng sak bai hy;
cawh phoen ak cawikhqi ce awm sak khqi nawh, cekkhqi ami awmnaak hly khaw ce syn uhy.
Lokhqi toen unawh misur thingkhqi ling uhy, ak thaihkhqi qah pehy;
cekkhqi ce zoseennaak pe nawh, pung a tai uhy, ak khqinkhqi awm am zawitlak pe sak hy.
Cekcoengawh taw huhsitnaak, khuikhanaak ingkaw kawseetnaak awh thlangmi ce zawi hqui voe voe unawh, ak kaidyt na awm bai uhy;
thlakbaukhqik khan awh khawsi ak qawnkung ing cekkhqi ce khawkpawng lam ama awmnaak awh pla sak khqi hy.
Cehlai anih ing khawdeng thlangkhqi ce hak zoeksang nawh tukkqeng amyihna a ipkhui cakawkhqi ce kqeng sak hy.
Thlakdyng ingtaw hu nawh zeel hlai hy, thlakchekhqi ingtaw amim kha mym khoep uhy.
U awm ak cyi ingtaw, ve ik-oeihkhqi ce poek seitaw Bawipa a lungnaak bau soeih ve poek seh.
Aw Khawsa, kak kawlung ve cak hy; ka hqingnaak boeih ing tingtoeng tum doena laa sa kawng nyng.
Tingtoeng ingkaw qaw tingtoeng nang hqak lah nih! Myncang hi awh thawh na lah vang!
Phynlum thlangkhqing lak awh, Aw Bawipa, nang ce nim kyihcah vang; thlangkhqing lak awh nang laa na ni sa vang.
Ikawtih na lungnaak taw bau nawh, khan anglakawh sang khqoet hy; na ypawmnaak ing khawnghi hak pha hy.
Aw Khawsa, khankhqi ak khan na hak zoeksang qu lah, khawmdek boeih ak khan awh na boeimangnaak awm lah seh.
Na lungnaak thlangkhqi hul na a awmnaak thai aham nak tang kut ing kaimih ve ni hul khqi nawh ni bawm khqi lah.
Khawsa ing a hun ciim awhkawng awi kqawn hawh hy: “Noengnaak ingkaw Shqekem ce qek ang ra kawng nyng saw Sukoth Tuikawk ce tah vang nyng.
Gilead ve kai a koe ni; Ephraim ve ka thi lumyk na awm nawh Judah ve ka cawnghqawl na awm hy.
Moab khaw ka silhnaak beihdung na awm nawh, Edom qam khawmyk ka suhnaak; Philistia qam khan awh noengnaak ing khy nyng.”
Vawngcak ingkaw thingtung khawk bau khui na u ing nu kai a ni kun pyi kaw? U ing Edom qam na ani ceh pyi kaw?
Aw Khawsa, kaimih ni qoeng khqi tiksaw kaimih a qalkapkhqi mi amak cet haih qoe voel ce nang am nu?
Qaal ka mi tuk awh nang ing ni bawm lah, thlanghqing a bawmnaak taw phu am tahy.
Khawsa ingqawi taw ni noeng mare kaw, amah ing ni qaalkhqi ce leh law kaw.

Kai ing kam kyih, Aw Khawsa, awi myhna koeh awm hqoeng,
kawtih thlakchekhqi ingkaw thlak thaikhqi ing amim kha ni ang sih khqi nawh; ami qaai ce kqawn uhy.
Sawhnaak awi ing nik chung khqi nawh, akawng a awm kaana ni tuk khqi hy.
Ka pyi na ka taaknaak ce thawlh puknaak na haw law na uhy, cehlai kai taw ak cykcah thlang na awm nyng.
A leek ce ak che ing thung law unawh, pyi na ka taaknaak cesawhnaak ing thung law uhy.
Anih ak oelh aham thlakche ce taak pe tloep; thawlh a pukkung ce ak tang ben awh pha seh.
Awideng na a awm awh, dawk lo seitaw, ak cykcahnaak ing dawk sak seh.
A hqinglu tawi pe seitaw; thlakchang ing hquikung dyih hun ce qawt pe tloep seh.
A cakhqi cadah na awm u seitaw a zukhqi nuhai na awm u seh.
A cakhqi ing kut dun doena van u seitaw; a imqawk awhkawng hqek na awm u seh.
Ik-oeih a capung na ak pukhqi ing a khawhthemkhqi ce lawh pe boeih u seitaw; a bibinaak phu ce khinkhqi ing muk pe bang seh.
U ingawm koeh qeen seitaw pa amak ta naasenkhqi awm koeh qeen u seh.
A cadil naa ce law boet seitaw, ak law hly kawi chawn awhkaw ming khui awhkawng qeng u seh.
Ami pakhqi thawlhnaak ce Bawipa hai awh sim loet na awm seitaw ami nu a thawlhnaak ce koeh qeng voel seh.
Cekkhqi sim loetnaak ce khawmdek awh a law boetnaak aham a mingmih a thawlhnaak ce Bawipa haiawh awm loet seh.
Ikawtih qeennaak tive poek awm ap poek qoe qoe hy, khawdeng ak voet hlauhkhqi ingkaw kawlung ak kqekkhqi ce him aham hqut hy.
Lihoei ce lungna hy – amah ak khan awh tla tloep seh; thlang a zoseennaak awh ak kaw am law hy – zoseennaak ce anih a venawh kawng ak hla na awm lawt seh.
Lihoei ce hi na bai nawh; a pum khuiawh tui amyihna kun pehy.
Ce ing angki amyihna zawl khak seitaw cawi pinnaak amyihna kumqui dy pin seh.
Kai thawlh anik puk khqi ingkaw, kai ak che na anik kqawnkhqi a venawh Bawipa ing ve ve thaphu na pe seh.
Cehlai, Aw Boeimang Khawsa, nang ing nang ming ak caming ak leek na ni sai nawh; na lungnaak ak leek ak caming ni hul lah.
Khawdeng ingkaw voethlauh thlang na awm nyng saw, kak kawk khuiawh ak lingbyi ing ngawha ai hy.
Khawmy ben awhkaw khawngkawn amyihna nung thoeih hawh nyng saw; khamkhawk amyihna tlai let let nyng.
Buh ka hyhnaak awh kam khawkhlu qawi am cak voel hy; kang sak boeih qep qep nawh a tankqat na awm hqoeng nyng.
Thawlh anik puk khqi ak kqawnseet aham awm kqoeng nyng saw; a mini huh awh ami lu hil uhy.
Aw Bawipa ka Khawsa, ni hul lah; na lungnaak ak caming ni hul cang lah.
Ve ve nang a kut ni tice sim sak nawh, Aw Bawipa, nang ing ni na sai tice sim sak lah.
Cekkhqi ing khawseet hly hlai uhy, nang ingtaw zoseen pe hyk ti; cekkhqi ing ami tuk awh chah phyi kawm uh, cehlai nang a tyihzawih taw zeel kaw.
Kai thawlh anik puk khqi taw ming seetnaak ce hi amyihna bai kawm u saw chahnaak ing angki amyihna zawl qu khoep kawm uh.
Kam kha ing Bawipa ce khawzah na zoeksang kawng nyng saw; thlang kqeng khawzah anglakawh amah kyihcah kawng nyng.
Ikawtih anik palh sak khqi a venawh kawng anih a hqingnaak ce hul peek aham anih taw ak voethlauhkhqi ak tang ben awh dyi hy.
Bawipa ing Ka Bawipa a venawh: “Na qaalkhqi ce na khaw tloengnaak na ka sai hlan dy kak tang benawh ngawi lah,” tina hy.
Bawipa ing nang a sawnghqawl thakawm ce Zion awhkawng hul law kawmsaw, na qaalkhqing lak awh nang ing uk kawp ti.
Na qalkapkhqi ing na qaal tuknaak khawnghi ce ngaih kawm uh. Ak ciim qypawmnaak ing thoeihcam qu nawh; mymcang phoen khui awhkawng ak thoeng law dam tui amyihna thak awm thym ce hu kawp ti.
Bawipa ing awi a sa hawh a dawngawh am thaw voel kaw: “Melkhizadek amyihna nang taw kumqui khawsoeih na awm hyk ti,” tihy.
Bawipa taw nak tang ben awh awm nawh; ak kaw a sonaak nyn awh sangpahrangkhqi ce tun kqai khqi boeih kaw.
Anih ing phynlum awideng kawmsaw, thlang a qawk ce a qawn kyng coengawh khawmdek pum awhkaw a lukhqi ce phep khqi kaw.
Lamkeng awhkaw lawngca tui ce aw kawmsaw, a lu ce hak zoek kaw.
Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh. Thlak dyng cunnaak ingkaw thlang kqeng cunnaak awh Bawipa ce kak kawlung boeih ing zoeksang kawng nyng.
Bawipa a ik-oeih saikhqi taw bau soeih hy; ce mihkhqi ce ak ngaih boeih ing poek hqeet uhy.
Boeimangnaak ingkaw qypawmnaak boeih ve amah a sai boeih na awm nawh, a dyngnaak awm kumqui dy cak hy.
Sim loet aham kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ce awm sak hy; Bawipa taw thlang qeenkhaw ak ngai ingkaw qeennaak kawpoek ing be hy.
Amah ak kqihkhqi venawh ai kawi pe nawh; a paipi ce sim poepa hy.
A ik-oeih sainaak ce ak thlangkhqi venawh dang sak nawh, thlakchang qam ce cekkhqi venawh pehy.
A kut sai ik-oeihkhqi ce a ypawm nawh dyng hy; awipeekkhqi awm yp a awm hy.
Ueppawmnaak dyngnaak ing a sai a dawngawh, cekkhqi taw kumqui ing kumqui dy cak poe hy,
Ak thlangkhqi ham hulnaak ce pe nawh; a paipi ce kumqui dy caksak hy – ang ming taw ciimcaih nawh kqih awm hy.
Bawipa kqihnaak taw cyihnaak a kung na awm hy; ak awipeek ak hqutkhqi boeih taw zaksimnaak leek ta uhy. Khaw kum khaw hqai kyihcahnaak taw amah a koe ni.
Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh. Bawipa kqih nawh ak awipeekkhqi awh zeelnaak ak takhqi taw ami zoseen hy.
A cakhqi qam khuiawh thlak bau na awm kawm usaw; thlakdyngkhqi a cadil taw ami zoseen kawm uh.
Boeinaak ingkaw mangnaak taw a ipkhui awh awm kawmsaw, a dyngnaak ce kumqui dy awm loet kaw.
Thlang qeenkhaw ak ngai lungnaak ak ta thlak dyngkhqi ham taw, thannaak awh zani vangnaak awm pehy.
Boecawn naak ing a zoena thlang pu nawh ak thym na khaw ak sakhqik khan awh ik-oeih leek pha law kaw.
Anih ce ityk awh awm am tat tikaw; thlak dyng taw kumqui dy u ing am hilh tikaw.
Awithang che awh kqihnaak am ta kaw; ak kaw cak nawh, Bawipa ce ypna hy.
Ak kawlung yp nawh, kqihnaak am tahy; a dytnaak awhtaw a qaalkhqi ce noengnaak ing toek kaw.
Khawdeng hahqahkhqi venawh kutdo a qek a ra a dawngawh, a dyngnaak ce kumqui dy cak hy; ak ki ce zoeksangnaak ing kyih na awm kaw.
Thlakche ing a huh awh ak kaw am zeel kaw; a ha taak kawmsaw plal a tham pahoei kaw; thlakchekhqi a ngaihnaak taw dyt hqoeng kaw.
Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh. Aw Bawipa a tyihzawihkhqi aw, kyihcah lah uh, Bawipang ming ce kyihcah lah uh.
Tuh kawng kumqui dyna Bawipang ming taw kyihcah na awm seh.
Khaw a law cyk awhkawng a nung tlak dy na, Bawipang ming taw kyihcah aham awm hy.
Bawipa taw qamtawm ak khan awh a boeimangnaak ce awm hy.
Hun sang na boei ngawihdoelh awh ak ngawi Bawipa ningnih a Khawsa amyihna u nu awm nawh,
khankhqi ingkaw khawmdek dan aham anih amyihna anuk balak law u nu ak awm?
Khawdeng thlang ce dekvai awhkawng thawh nawh ak voet hlauhkhqi ce maivyt awhkawng thawh hy;
cekkhqi ce sangpahrang a cakhqi, a mimah ak thlangkhqi a sangpahrang a cakhqi ing ngawih sak haih hy.
Ca ak qeng nu ce cakhqi ak ta ak awmhly nu na tahy. Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh.
Izip qam awhkawng Israel a law awh, qapchang amsim awi ak paukhqi a venawh kawng Jakob ipkhuikaw a law awh,
Judah ce Khawsa hun ciim na coeng nawh, Israel ce amah a ukkung na awm hy.
Tuicun ing toek nawh cen hy, Jordan tui a hu na hlat tlaih hy;
tlangkhqi ing tumcaikhqi amyihna, tlangkhqi ing tuucakhqi amyihna pet doep doep uhy.
Aw tuicun nang, kawtih cen nawh, Aw Jordan long nang, kawtih hu na nang hlat tlaih,
nangmih thlangkhqi, kawtih tumcaikhqi amyihna, nangmih tlangkhqi, kawtih tuu cakhqi amyihna naming pet doep doep?
Aw khawmdek, Bawipa haiawh, Jakob Khawsa haiawh thyn lah,
anih ing lungnu ce tui im na coeng sak nawh, lunkqil ce lawngca tui na lawng sak hy.
Kaimih a venawh kaana, Aw Bawipa, kaimih a venawh kaana, na lungnaak ingkaw na yp awmnaak awh namah ang ming a venawh boeimangnaak awm seh.
Ikawtih thlangphyn khqi ing, “A mingmih a Khawsa hana a awm?” a mi ti.
Ningmih a Khawsa taw khawk khan na awm nawh, amah ak kaw ak zeel sak boeih ce sai hy.
Cehlai a mingmih a myiqawlkhqi taw thlanghqing a kut ing sai na ak awm sui ingkaw ngun khqi mai ni.
A mim kha taw ta lawt hlai uhy, am pau thai uhy; mik awm ta lawt hlai uhy, am hu thai uhy;
haa ta lawt hlai uhy, am za thai unawh, haqawng awm ta lawt hlai uhy, a baw am za uhy;
kutkhqi ta hlai uhy, am bi thai uhy, khaw awm ta hlai uhy, am cet thai uhy; amik awiqawng ing ikaw awm ap kqawn thai uhy.
Vemih ak saikhqi taw vemyih khqi amyihna awm lawt kawm uh, vemyih ak ypnaak thlangkhqi boeih awm vemyih khqi amyihna awm lawt kawm uh.
Aw Israel ipkhuikaw, Bawipa ypna lah, anih taw cekkhqi ak hulkung ingkaw – cekkhqi a phuhqa na awm hy.
Aaron ipkhuikaw aw, Bawipa ypna lah – anih taw cekkhqi a hulkung ingkaw phuhqa na awm hy.
Amah ak kqihkhqi aw, Bawipa ypna lah, anih taw cekkhqi ak hulkung ingkaw cekkhqi a phuhqa na awm hy.
Bawipa ing ningnih ani sim khqi loet a dawngawh zoseennaak ni pe kaw: Israel ipkhuikaw ce zoseennaak pe kaw,
anih ing Bawipa ak kqihkhqi ce zoseennaak pe kaw – ak zawi awm ak bau awm.
Bawipa ing namah ingkaw na cakhqi ce pung a tai sak seh.
Khan ingkaw dek ak saikung Bawipa ing zoseennaak ni pek khqi seh.
Ak sang soeih khankhqi ce Bawipa koe na awm nawh, khawmdek ve thlanghqing a kut awh pehy.
Ak thi khqi dek khui ihnaak na anuk cet khqi ing Bawipa am kyihcah uhy;
ningnih ing ni tuhngawi awhkawng kumqui dyna Bawipa ve ni zoeksang uh. Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh.
Kak awi ang zaak a dawngawh, Bawipa lungna nyng; qeennaak thoeh doena kang kqangnaak awi za hy.
Ang haa ce kai benna ang keng law a dawngawh, ka hqing khui pyt amah ce khy vang nyng.
Thihnaak qui ing ni zen nawh, phyi khuikhanaak ce kak khan awh law hy; kyinaak ingkaw kawseetnaak ing ni noeng hy.
Cawh Bawipang ming ce khy nyng: “Aw Bawipa ni hul cang lah!” ti nyng.
Bawipa taw qeennaak ing be nawh dyng hy; ningnih a Khawsa taw lungnaak ing ak be na awm hy.
Bawipa ing thlankqawng ce chung ak dah nawh; ka ngoe awh kai ce ni hul hy.
Aw ka hqingnaak vai awh dyi tlaih bai cang lah, kawtih Bawipa taw na venawh leek hy.
Aw Bawipa, nang ing ka hqingnaak ve thihnaak awhkawng, ka mik qawi ve mikphli awhkawng, ka khaw qawi ve bahnaak awhkawng hul hawh hyk ti,
cawhtaw ak hqingkhqi qam na Bawipa haiawh cet hawh kawng nyng.
Cangna nyng; ce a dawngawh, “A boena khuikha nyng,” ti nyng.
Lylap nyng kqih doena, “Thlangkhqi boeih ve qaai ak kqawn khqi boeih ni,” ti nyng.
Ka venawh a leeknaak boeih awh vawh Bawipa ve ikawmyihna ka peek tloep lawt lah voei?
Thaawngnaak boet ve hak soeng nyng saw Bawipang ming ce khy kawng nyng.
Ak thlangkhqi boeih a haiawh Bawipa venawh awi ka sa ce soep sak vang.
Bawipa mik huh awh a phu ak tlo soeih taw ak thlang ciimkhqi thih ve ni.
Aw Bawipa, kai ve na tyihzawih tang tang ni; kai taw na tyihzawih, na tyihzawih nu a ca na awm nyng; nang ing kenqui qui ce hlam law hawh hyk ti.
Zeelnaak awi kqawn lucik bulnaak ce na venawh nawn nyng saw Bawipang ming ce khy kawng nyng.
Ak thlangkhqi boeih a haiawh Bawipa venawh awi ka sa ce soep sak vang.
Bawipa ipkhui kawngma awh – Aw Jerusalem, nang lak lung awh soep sak vang nyng. Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh.
Nangmih thlangphyn boeih aw, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah uh; nangmih thlangkhqi boeih aw, amah ce zoeksang lah uh.
Ikawtih ningnih ani lungnaak taw bau soeih nawh, Bawipa a ypawmnaak taw kumqui dy cak hy. Bawipa taw kyihcah lah uh.
Bawipa taw a leek a dawngawh, a venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn lah uh; a lungnaak awm kumqui dyna cak hy.
Israel ing, A lungnaak taw kumqui dyna cak hy,” ti seh.
Aaron ipkhuikaw ing: A lungnaak taw kumqui dy cak hy,” ti seh.
Bawipa ak kqihkhqi boeih ing, A lungnaak taw kumqui dy cak hy,” ti seh.
Ka khuikha awh Bawipa venawh khy nyng saw, amah ing hoelpoeng na awmnaak ing nim hlat hy.
Bawipa taw ka venawh a awm a dawngawh, ap kqih ti kawng. Thlanghqing ing ikaw ni tina hly nawh nu.
Bawipa taw ka venawh awm nawh, kai anik bawmkung na awm hy. Ka qaalkhqi ce noengnaak ing toek kawng.
Thlanghqing ypnaak anglakawh Bawipa awh thuk ve nep khqoet hy.
Boeikhqi ypnaak anglakawh Bawipa awh thuk ve nep khqoet hy.
Qamtawm thlang ing nik chung khoep hlai hy, Bawipang ming ing cekkhqi ce noeng boeih nyng.
Hu haina ni mam hlai uhy, Bawipang ming ing cekkhqi ce noeng boeih nyng.
Khawimi amyihna ni bawl khoep hlai uhy, a hling ak ui bang amyihna qeng bang uhy; Bawipang ming ing cekkhqi ce noeng boeih nyng.
Kang tluk hlo dyna ka hu nakawng ni buuk hlai uhy, Bawipa ing ni hul hy.
Bawipa taw kak thaawmnaak ingkaw ka laa na awm hy; anih taw anik hulkung na awm hy.
Zeelnaak ingkaw noengnaak ing khy lah uh, thlakdyngkhqi a hi imkhqi awh khy lah uh: “Bawipa ak tang ben kut ing ik-oeih ak bau soeih khqi sai hawh hy!” tinawh.
Bawipa awh tang ben kut ce pawm qu nawh: “Bawipa ak tang ben kut ing ik-oeih ak bau soeih khqi sai hawh hy!” ti uhy.
Am thi kawng nyng saw hqing hyn kawng, Bawipa a ik-oeih sai ce khypyi kawng.
Bawipa ing khawteh na ni phep hawh hlai hy, thihnaak a venna taw amni pehy.
Dyngnaak chawh ce kai aham awng law lah; kun nyng saw Bawipa a venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn lah vang.
Vetaw thlakdyngkhqi a kunnaak Bawipa ak chawh na awm hy.
Nang ing na nim hlat a dawngawh, na venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn kawng; nang taw ka hulkung na awm hyk ti.
Ip sakungkhqi ing ami qoeng lung ce a kil awhkaw lung ak khoeng soeih na awm hawh hy;
ve ve Bawipa ing sai nawh, ningnih a mik huh awh kawpoek kyi na awm hy.
Ve a khawnghi ve Bawipa ing a sai na awm nawh zeel lah u sih.
Aw Bawipa, kaimih ve ni hul khqi lah; Aw Bawipa, zoseen kam awmnaak ce ni pe lah.
Bawipang ming ing ak law taw a zoseen hy. Bawipa im awhkawng zoseennaak ni pek khqi nyng.
Bawipa Khawsa na awm nawh, ningnih awh vangnaak ce hlah law hy, lucik tloeng aham qamsa ce bawkthang ki awh qui ing khit lah uh.
Nang taw ka Khawsa na awm hyk ti, na venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn kawng nyng; Nang taw ka Khawsa na awm hyk ti, nang ce ni zoeksang kawng.
Bawipa taw a leek a dawngawh a venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn lah uh; a lungnaak taw kumqui dy cak hy.
A cehnaak lam coet amak kapkhqi ingkaw, Bawipa a cawngpyinaak amyihna ak cetkhqi taw a zoseen hy.
Ak awipeek khoem nawh kawlung boeih ing amah ak suikhqi taw a zoseen hy.
Cekkhqi ing am sai thawlh unawh; anih a lam awh ce cet uhy.
Hqut boeih aham ak awm am cukkiknaak awi ce nang ing cekkhqi ham taak pe hyk ti.
Aw nang ak awipeek khqi ce ka hqutnaak thai aham ka lamkhqi ve cak seh!
Nang ak awipeek khqi boeih ce kak poek awh chahqai na am awm ti kawng.
Nang a koe ak dyng cawngpyinaak awikhqi ka cawng amyihna kawlung dyngnaak ing namah ce nim kyihcah vang.
Nak awipeek khqi ce hqut bit kawng; koeh ni qoeng hyt cang.
Ikawmyihna taithym ing a lam ce a ciimcaih sak thainaak kaw? Nak awi amyihna khaw a saknaak amyihna a ciimcaih sak thai kaw?
Kak kawlung boeih ing nang ce ni sui nyng, nak awipeek awhkawng koeh ning pleng sak.
Nang oelh nawh am ka thawlhnaak aham kam thin kak kawk khuiawh nak awi ve thuh hawh nyng.
Aw Bawipa, nang a venawh thangleeknaak awm seh; nak awipeekkhqi ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Nam khak khui awhkawng ak cawn cawngpyinaak boeih ce ka hui ing kqawn nyng.
Bawipa awh ak zeel soeih thlang amyihna nam cuk kiknaak awipeek ka hqut awh zeel nyng.
Nak awipeek khqi ce poek typ typ nyng na lamkhqi ce poek nyng.
Nak awipeek khqi awh zeel nyng saw; nak awi ce ak poek kaana am awm nyng.
Na tyihzawih a venawh ak leek sai law cang, cawhtaw hqing kawng nyng; nak awi ce ngai kawng nyng.
Na cawngpyinaak awi awhkaw kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khqi am ka huh thainaak aham koeh thuh law.
Khawmdek awh khin na ni ka awm; nak awipeek ce kai aham koeh thuh law.
Nang ak awipeek ang ngai aih awh ka hqingnaak ve ityk awh awm am rem thai hy.
Oek qu nawh seet ak hu khqi, nak awipeek ak pleng taak thlangkhqi ce nang ing toel hyk ti.
Nak awipeek khqi ce ka hqut a dawngawh, kqawn seetnaak ingkaw huh sitnaak khqi ve khoe law lah.
Ukkungkhqi ing ngawicun unawh nik kqawn seet u seiawm, na tyihzawih ingtaw nak awipeek khqi ve ni ak poek hly tit tit hy.
Nam cuk kiknaak awipeek khqi ve ka zeelnaak na awm hy; cekkhqi ing kawpoek leeknaak ni pe uhy.
Dekvai awh helh hyt na awm nyng; nak awi amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Ka lamkhqi ce kak kqawn tlaih awh nang ing nim hlat hyk ti; namah ak awipeek khqi ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Nang ing nani cawngpyi awipeek khqi ce ning zaksim sak lah; cawhtaw nak kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khqi ce poek typ typ kawng nyng.
Ka hqingnaak ve kawseet doena ak tha hoet hy, nak awi amyihna kak tha awm law sak tlaih lah.
Qaainaak lam awh am ka cehnaak aham ni hoep lah; na cawngpyinaak awi ing nim qeen cang.
Awitak lam ce tyk hawh nyng; Na cawngpyinaak awi awh kak kawlung ling hawh nyng.
Aw Bawipa, nam cuk kiknaak awipeek ce tu qap hawh nyng, chah koeh ni phyih sak.
Nang ing kak kawlung na loet sak hawh a dawngawh, nak awipeek naak lam awh dawng nyng.
Aw Bawipa, nak awitlyhnaak ce ka hqutnaak thai aham ni cawngpyi lah; cawhtaw a dyt dyna hqut kawng nyng.
Zaksim thainaak ni pe lah, cawhtaw na cawngpyinaak awi ce khoem kawng nyng saw kak kawlung boeih ing hqut kawng nyng.
Nak awipeeknaak lam awh ni hqui ni sawi lah; ce a dawngawh ni zeelnaak ka huh.
Ak lawn ngaihnaak ben am nawh nam cuk kiknaak benna kak kawlung ve hawi law lah.
Aphu amak awm ik-oeih benna ka mik qawi ve koeh dai sak nawh; nak awi amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Kqih na na awm thainaak aham, na tyihzawih a venawh ve nak awipeek ve soep sak lah.
Kak kqih soeih ming leeknaak ve lo law valh lah, kawtih nang a cawngpyinaak awi taw nep hy.
Nak awipeek khqi ce ngai mah nyng! Na dyngnaak awh ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Aw Bawipa, amak dyt thai na lungnaak ingkaw nak awi taaknaak amyihna na hulnaak ce ka venna law seh;
nak awi ce ka ypnaak a dawngawh, kai anik kqawnsekung ce hlat kawng nyng.
Kam khak khui awhkawng nak awitak ce koeh lo law voel, kawtih nang a cawngpyinaak awi awh ni kang ngaih-unaak a awm.
Na cawngpyinaak awi ce ngai loet kawng nyng, kumqui ingkaw kumqui dyna.
Ngaihding na cet a cawn vang nyng, kawtih nak awipeek ce hu hawh nyng.
Sangpahrangkhqi haiawh nak awipeekkhqi ce kqawn kawng nyng saw, chahqai na am awm ti kawng,
nak awipeekkhqi ce ka lungnaak a dawngawh zeelnaak ta nyng.
Ka lungnaak awi peek benna ka kut ve hak phyl nyng saw nak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce poek typ typ nyng.
Na tyihzawih a venawh awi na peek ce sim loet lah, nang ing ni ngaih-unaak ce nani peek.
Ka khuikha awh kang ngaihqepnaak taw ve ni: Nak awikamnaak ing ka hqingnaak khoem law hy.
Uephnaak taak kaana ak oek qukhqi ing ni qaih na uhy, cehlai na cawngpyinaak awi ce am pleng taak nyng.
Aw Bawipa, syn awhkaw na cawngpyinaak awi khqi ce sim loet nyng saw, cekkhqi awh ngaihqepnaak hu nyng.
Thlakche khqi nang a cawngpyinaak awi ak qoeng khqi awh ngaih seetnaak ing nim tu khak hy.
Ka awm ihnaak boeih awh nang ak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ve ka laa ak leek soeih na awm hy.
Aw Bawipa, khawmthan awh nang ming ce poek nyng, na cawngpyinaak awi khqi ce khoem kawng nyng.
Nak awipeek khqi hquut ve: Ka sai khawi na awm hawh hy.
Aw Bawipa, nang taw ka taham na awm hyk ti; nak awikhqi ce hqut aham awi ta hawh nyng.
Kak kawlung boeih ing na haai ce sui hawh nyng; nak awitaak amyihna nim qeen lah.
Ka cehnaak lamkhqi ve poek nyng saw nak awipeeknaak benna khaw khan law hawh nyng.
Nak awipeek khqi ce yih kaana ang tawnna hqut hlah vang.
Thlakchekhqi ing qui ing ni pin u seiawm, nang a cawngpyinaak awi ce am hilh ti kawng.
Na cawngpyinaak awihdyngkhqi awh thanlung awh na venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn aham tho nyng.
Kai taw nang ak kqihkhqi boeih ingkaw nang ak awipeek ak hqutkhqi boeih a pyi na awm nyng.
Aw Bawipa, khawmdek ve na lungnaak ing bengen hy; nak awitlyh awipeekkhqi ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Aw Bawipa, nak awi amyihna na tyihzawih a venawh ik-oeih leek sai lah.
Cyihnaak ingkaw awideng thainaak ce ni pe lah, kawtih nak awipeekkhqi ce ni kak cangnaak.
Ka khuikha hlan awh lam pleng hlai nyng, tuh taw nak awi ngai hawh nyng.
Nang taw leek hyk ti, ik-oeih na sai awm leek hy; nak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Ak oek qukhqi ing qaai kqawn ing ni zan hlai uhy, kak kawlung boeih ing nak awipeekkhqi ce hqut nyng.
Cekkhqi ak kawlung taw qil soeih hy, cehlai kai taw nang a cawngpyinaak awi awh ni ka zeel hy.
Ka khuikha ve kai aham leek hy, cawh ni nang ak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce ka cawng hly thai.
Sui ngun thong sang anglakawh nam kha awhkaw cawngpyinaak awi ce ni kai aham a phu a tlawh khqoet hy.
Na kut qawi ing ni sai nawh ani syn ni; nak awipeekkhqi ce ka cawng thainaak aham zaksimnaak ni pe lah.
Nang anik kqihkhqi ing kai ami huh awh zeel u seh, kai ing nang ak awi awh ni ngaih-unaak ka taak.
Aw Bawipa, nang a cawngpyinaak awikhqi taw dyng nawh, na ypawmnaak ing kai ni khuikha sak hy tice sim nyng.
Na tyihzawih a venawh awi na taak amyihna, amak dyt thai na lungnaak ve kang ngaihqepnaak na awm lah seh.
Ka hqingnaak aham nam qeennaak ce ka venna law lah seh, na cawngpyinaak awi taw ka zeelnaak ni.
Akawng a awm kaana kak khan awh ik-oeih che ak sai ak oek qukhqi ce chah phyi u seh; cehlai kai ingtaw nak awipeekkhqi ce poek typ typ vang nyng.
Nang nik kqih nawh nang ak awipeek ak zasimkhqi taw kai benna mang u seh.
Chah am ka phyihnaak aham, nak awitlyhnaak awipeek benna kak kawlung ce coet a kap kaana awm seh.
Ka hqingnaak ing na hulnaak ang ngai aih awh zai hqoeng hy; cehlai nak awi awh ngaih-unaak ce ta nyng.
Ka mik qawi ing nak awikamnaak ce dan hlai hy, am huhy; “Ityk awh ngaih nani qep sak kaw?” ti nyng.
Maikhu anglakawhkaw mehvyn um amyihna awm nyng seiawm, nak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce am hilh nyng.
Na tyihzawih ing ve iqyt nu ani qeh kaw? Kai anik thekhanaak thlangkhqi ce ityk awh na toel kaw?
Nang a cawngpyinaak awi ing ak kalh na, ak oek qukhqi ing kai aham lawk-kqawng co law uhy.
Nak awipeekkhqi boeih ve a ypawm hy; ni hul lah, kawtih thlangkhqi ing akawng a awm kaana ni the ni kha na uhy.
Khawmdek awhkawng ni khoe hlo uhy, cehlai nak awipeekkhqi ce am qoeng nyng.
Na lungnaak ing ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah, cawh ni kam kha awhkaw cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce kang ngai hly.
Aw Bawipa, nak awi taw kum qui dy cak hy; khawk khan awh ak cak na dyi hy.
Na yp awmnaak ce cadil naa dyna cak hy; nang ing khawmdek ve caksak nawh, awm poe hy.
Tuh dy na cawngpyinaak awi ve cak hy, soepkep boeih ing na bi ve bi uhy.
Na cawngpyinaak awi ce ka zeelnaak na ama na awm mantaw, khuikha doena ana thi hawh kawng.
Nak awipeekkhqi ce ityk awh awm am hilh ti kawng, cekkhqi ing ni ka hqingnaak ve na khoem law.
Ni hul lah nang a koe na ni ka awm; nak awipeekkhqi ce sui nyng hu hawh nyng.
Thlakchekhqi ing kai plawci sak aham ni qeh uhy, cehlai nang am cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce ni kak poek hly.
Ik-oeih boeih a soepnaak a dawng ce hu hawh nyng; cehlai nang ak awipeekkhqi taw a dytnaak am awm hy.
Aw, na cawngpyinaak awi ce lungna mah nyng! Khawnghi zung poek typ typ khing nyng.
Ka qaal khqing lak awh nang ak awipeekkhqi ing ni cyih sak khqoet hy; kawtih cekkhqi ce ka venawh awm poe uhy.
Nam cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce kak poek typ typ a dawngawh, ka cawngpyikungkhqi boeih anglakawh poek thainaak tak khqoet nyng.
Nak awipeekkhqi ce ka hquut a dawngawh, a hqamcakhqi anglakawh poek thainaak tak khqoet nyng.
Nak awi ka hquut thainaak aham lap che saqui awh khaw am poek nyng.
Namah qoe ing nani cawngpyi hawh a dawngawh, na cawngpyinaak awi awhkawng am pleng qunyng.
Nak awikhqi ce kam tan awh awi soeih nawh, kam kha awh khawi anglakawh awi soeih mah hy!
Nak awipeekkhqi awhkawng cyihnaak hu nyng; ce a dawngawh amak thym lam boeih ce sawh na nyng.
Nak awi taw ka khaw aham maihchoei na awm nawh ka lam aham vangnaak na awm hy.
Nang a koe ak dyng cawngpyinaakkhqi ce ka hquut thainaak aham, awi sa nyng saw caksak hawh nyng.
Khuikha soeih nyng; Aw Bawipa, nak awi amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Aw Bawipa, kam kha ing ngaihnaak ing a nim kyihcah ve, do law nawh na cawngpyinaak awikhqi ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Ka hqingnaak ve ka kut awh tu qap hlai nyng, na cawngpyinaak awi ce am hilh ti kawng nyng.
Thlakchekhqi ing thang dun law hlai uhy, nak awipeeknaak awhkawng am pleng nyng.
Nam cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ve ka kumqui qo na awm nawh; kak kawlung zeelnaak na awm hy.
A dyt dyna nak awitlyh awipeekkhqi hquut aham kak kawlung qawn hawh nyng.
Kawlung pakkhih na ak ta thlang ce sawh na nyng, cehlai nani cawngsak awi ce lungna nyng.
Nang taw kang thuknaak ingkaw ka phuhqa na awm hyk ti; nak awi awh ngaih-unaak ta nyng.
Nangmih ik-oeih che ak saikhqi, ka ven awhkawng cet lah uh, ka Khawsak awipeekkhqi ngai na lah vang!
Nak awikamnaak amyihna caksak lah, cawhtaw hqing kawng nyng; kang ngaih-unaak akawng awhkawng chah koeh ni phyih sak.
Nim tu khak lah, cawhtaw hulna awm kawng; nak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce poek quiqah kawng nyng.
Nak awitlyhnaak awipeek awhkawng ak pleng khqi boeih ce nang ing qoeng hyk ti, a mingmih a qaai kqawnnaak ce a hqawng a h qap mai ni.
Khawmdek awh thlak chekhqi boeih ce nang ing thi-eek tui amyihna na hui ban awh; nam cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce lungna nyng.
Nang anik kqih aih awh ka sa ve tyn hy; na cawngpyinaak awi kqih doena dyi hqoeng nyng.
Ak thym ingkaw ak dyng ce sai hawh nyng; kai ani husit thlangkhqi kut awh koeh ni hal hyt.
Na tyihzawih leeknaak aham ak khoeng na sai law cang lah; ak oek qukhqi ing koeh ni husit khqi seh.
Nang a hulnaak ingkaw ak dyng awikamnaak ce sui vang nyng, ka mik awm hyp hqoeng hawh hy.
Na lungnaak ing na tyihzawih ve ngai cang nawh, nak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce cawngpyi cang.
Na tyihzawih na ni ka awm; nam cuk kiknaak awipeek kang zaksimnaak thai aham phekbo thainaak kawlung ni pe lah.
Aw Bawipa, tuh ve sai tym hawh ni; na cawngpyinaak awi hqe huili na awm hawh hy.
Sui anglakawh, sui tuici anglakawh nang ak awipeekkhqi ce ka lungnaak a dawngawh;
nak awipeekkhqi ce thym hy ka ti a dawngawh, amak thym lam boeih ce sawh na nyng.
Nam cuk kiknaak awikhqi ve kawpoek kyi na awm hy; ce a dawngawh hquut nyng.
Ak dai qu nak awi ing vangnaak ce ni pehy; thlang mailaikhqi venawh zaksimnaak ce pehy.
Nak awipeekkhqi ce kang ngai a dawngawh, kam kha ang nyng saw kang hqi hawp hqoeng nyng.
Nang ming ak lungnaak thlangkhqi venawh na sai khawi amyihna, kai benna hawi nawh nim qeen cang lah.
Nak awi amyihna ka khaw khamkhqi ve hawi law lah; thawlhnaak ing koeh ni uk seh.
Nak awipeekkhqi ka hquut thainaak aham, thlangkhqi a huhsitnaak ak khui awhkawng ni hul lah.
Na tyihzawih khan awh na haai vang sak nawh nak awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce ni cawngpyi lah.
Na cawngsak naak awikhqi a mami hquut a dawngawh, ka mik qawi awhkawng ka mikphli tuikhqi ve lawngca tui amyihna lawng hy.
Aw Bawipa, nang taw dyng tiksaw, na cawngpyinaak awikhqi awm thym hy.
Cuk kiknaak awipeek na taakhqi ve dyng nawh; a ypawm soeih hy.
Ka qaalkhqi ing nak awi ce ami hilh a dawngawh ka ypawmnaak ing ni hawn sak zip hawh hy.
Nak awikamnaak khqi ce ak nep cana noek a dak na awm hawh nawh, ce ce na tyihzawih ing ve lungna hy.
Ak nem na awm nyng thlang a huhsit na awm nyng seiawm, nak awipeekkhqi ce am hilh qoe nyng.
Na dyngnaak taw kumqui dyna awm nawh nak caksaknaak awikhqi ce thym hy.
Kyinaak ingkaw khuikhanaak ing ni sing bai seiawm, nak awipeekkhqi ce ka zeelnaak na awm hy.
Nam cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce kumqui dy thym hy; ka hqingnaak aham zaksimnaak ce ni pe lah.
Aw Bawipa, kak kawlung boeih ing nik khy nyng, nang ing nim hlat lah, cawhtaw nawl peeknaak awitlyhkhqi boeih ce hquut kawng nyng.
Nang ni ka nik khy; ni hul lah cawhtaw nam cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce hquut kawng.
Khaw a dai hlan awh tho nyng saw bawmnaak thoeh doena kqang nyng; nak awi awh ngaih-unaak ce ta nyng.
Na awitaak ce kak poeknaak typ typ aham, thanlung a poeng hlan dy ka mik dai phat hy.
Na lungnaak amyihna kak khynaak awi ce ngai law lah; Aw Bawipa na cawngpyinaak awi amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Ak che ik-oeih ingkaw kai anik tengkhqi zoe lawk khqoet uhy, cehlai nang a cawngpyinaak awi ingtaw hla quhy.
Cehlai, Aw Bawipa, nang taw zoe hyk ti, nak awipeekkhqi boeih awm thym hy.
Ce mihkhqi ce kumqui dyna nang ing caksak hawh hyk ti, tice nam cuk kiknaak awipeek awhkawng sim hawh nyng.
Kak khuikhanaak ve toek law nawhtaw ni hul lah, kawtih na cawngpyinaak awi ce am hilh nyng.
Kai akawng a dawngawh ni hul nawhtaw ni thaawng lah; na awikamnaak amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Hulnaak ve thlakchekhqi hamna taw hla hy, kawtih cekkhqi ing nang a awitlyhnaak awipeek ce am sui uhy.
Aw Bawipa, na lungnaak taw bau soeih hy; na cawngpyinaak awi amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Kai anik thekhanaak qaalkhqi ve kqeng soeih uhy, cehlai nang am cuk kiknaak awipeek awhkawng am pleng nyng.
Cangnaak amak ta thlangkhqi ce tyih doena toek nyng, kawtih cekkhqi ing nak awi ce am hquut uhy.
Nak awipeekkhqi izah dy ka lungnaak tive toek lah; Aw Bawipa, na lungnaak amyihna ka hqingnaak ve khoem law lah.
Nang ak awipeekkhqi boeih ve thym hy; nang a koe ak dyng cawngpyinaak awikhqi taw kumqui dy cak hy.
Akawng a awm kaana ukkungkhqi ing ni thekha na uhy, cehlai kak kawlung taw nang ak awi awh thyn hy.
Kawnthem ak hu moek thlang amyihna nak awikamnaak awh zeel nyng.
Amak thym ce sawh na nyng saw tyih nyng, cehlai na cawngpyinaak awi taw lungna nyng.
Ak thym nang a cawngpyinaak awikhqi awh hypoet awh voei khqih nang nim kyihcah nyng.
Nang a cawngpyinaak awi ak lungnaak thlangkhqi ingtaw ngaihqepnaak bau soeih ta uhy; ikaw ingawm a mingmih ce am bah sak khqi thai hy.
Aw Bawipa nang a hulnaak ce lamtoen nyng saw, nang ak awipeekkhqi ce hquut nyng.
Nang ak awipeekkhqi ce ka lungnaak a dawngawh hquut nyng.
Nang ak awipeekkhqi ingkaw cuk kiknaak awipeekkhqi ce hquut nyng, kawtih ka lam boeih ce nang ing sim hyk ti.
Aw Bawipa, kang kqangnaak awi ve na hai pha law seh; nak awi amyihna zaksimnaak ce ni pe lah.
Qeennaak ka thoeh law ve na hai pha law seh; na awikamnaak amyihna nang ing ni hul lah.
Ka hui ve kyihcahnaak ing bengen seh, kawtih namah ing namah a awitlyhnaak awipeekkhqi ce ni cawngpyi hyk ti.
Kam lai ing nak awi ce laa na sa seh, kawtih nak awipeekkhqi taw dyng hy.
Na kut ce kai bawmnaak aham a oepchoeh na awm lah seh, kawtih nang ak awipeek ce ni kak tyh hawh.
Aw Bawipa, nang a hulnaak ce ngai soeih nyng, nang a cawngpyinaak awi taw ka zeelnaak na awm hy.
Ka nim kyihcah thainaak aham, ni hqing sak lah, na cawngpyinaak awi ing ning dyihpyi lah seh.
Tuu ak qeng amyihna lam hang hqoeng hawh nyng. Na tyihzawih ve sui lah, kawtih nak awipeekkhqi ce am hilh nyng.
Ka khuikha awh Bawipa ce khy nyng saw, anih ing nim hlat law hy.
Aw Bawipa, qaai ak kqawn huikhqi ingkaw qaai kqawn na ak nget laikhqi anglakawhkawng ni hul lah.
Aw qaai kqawn na ak nget hui lai nang, nang ak khan awh anih ing ikaw a sai kaw, cekcoengawh ikaw ak awm bai?
Kaw ak awmkhqi a la sumkhqi ing nang ce ni toel kawmsaw, imnawt thing mai alh ing ni toel kaw.
Kedar awhkaw hi im anglakawh awm nawh, Meshqek awh ak awm ve kai aham khaw map mah hy!
Roepnaak ak sawhnaak thlang anglakawh ka awm ve sang soeih hawh hy.
Kai taw qoepnaak ak ngaih thlang na awm nyng; cehlai awi kak kqawn awh, qaal thawh aham ngaih lat uhy.
Hana kawng nu kai anik bawmkung a law lah kaw? Ti nyng tlang benna mik hak dai nyng –
Kai anik bawmkung taw dek ingkaw khan ak saikung, Bawipa venna kawng ni a law.
Anih ing na khaw ce am ning bah sak kawmsaw – nang anik khoemkung ce am ngam tikaw;
oeih, Israel ak khoemkung ce am ngam kawmsaw ip awm am ip kaw.
Bawipa ing nang ce ni qeh hy – Bawipa taw nak tang ben awh nang anik chungkung na awm hy;
khawnghyp awh khawmik ing amni eng kawmsaw, khawmthan awh pihla ing amni eng bai kaw.
Bawipa ing nganbawh soepkep khui awhkawng ni khoem kawmsaw – na hqingnaak ce khoem law kaw;
Bawipa ing na lawnaak ingkaw na cehnaak boeih awh tuh kawng kumqui dy ni qeh loet kaw.
Bawipa a im na cet u sih,” tinawh amik kqawn law awh zeel soeih nyng.
Aw Jerusalem, kaimih a khaw khqi ve vawng chawmkeng awh dyi hawh uhy.
Jerusalem taw khawk bau ak zoei cana ami sak amyihna sak na awm hy.
Israel a venawh cuk kiknaak awipeek peek na a awm amyihna, Bawipang ming kyihcah ham, cawh ce thlang pilnamkhqi, Bawipa a pilnam khqi hang cet uhy.
Cawh ce awidengnaak boei ngawihdoelh khqi, David ipkhui awhkaw boei ngawihdoelh khqi awm hy.
Jerusalem ngaihqepnaak aham cykcah lah uh: “Nang anik lungnaak thlangkhqi ce qalmawng na awm u seh.
Na vawng khuiawh ngaihqepnaak awm seitaw, na boei awmnaak im kqang ngaihqepnaak awm seh.”
Ka koeinaa ingkaw pyikhqi awh, “Nang ak khuiawh ngaihqepnaak awm seh,” ti kawng nyng.
Bawipa ningnih Khawsa im awh, nang a boeimangnaak ce sui kawng nyng.
Nang a venawh khan na boei ngawihdoelh ak awm nang a venawh, ka mik hak dai law nyng.
Tamnaakhqi mik ing ami boei a kut ami toek amyihna, tyihzawih nukhqi ing ami boei nu a kut ami toek amyihna, am qeennaak ce ningnih a venawh ang dang sak hlan dy, kaimih a mik ing Bawipa ningnih a Khawsa ce toek hy.
Kaimih ve nim qeen khqi cang, Aw Bawipa, kaimih ve nim qeen khqi cang, thlang a huhsitnaak yh khing hawh unyng.
Ak oek qukhqi a qaihsai zawk khing hawh unyng saw, ak oek qukhqi a huhsitnaak awm zawk khing hawh aih unyng.
Bawipa mah ningnih benna ama awm mai mantaw – Israelkhqi ing kqawn seh –
Bawipa mah ningnih benna ama awm mai mantaw, thlangkhqi ing ningnih ani tuk khqi awh,
cekkhqi ing ningnih ak khan awh amik kaw a so awh; ningnih ce a hqing na nik daih khqi hawh kaw;
tuibau ing ningnih ce ni sing malh kawmsaw, tuibak ce ningnih ak khan na tho hawh kaw,
tuibau tha ak awm ing ningnih ce ni zawn khqi hawh kaw.
Cekkhqi a ha ing ningnih am choek nawh, Bawipa venawh thangleeknaak awm seh.
Pha a ham dawng ak dunkung ak dawng awhkawng a hlawng pha amyihna ningnih taw ni awm uhy; dawnkhqui ce boet nawh, ningnih ce ni loet uhy.
Ningmih bawmnaak taw dek ingkaw khan ak saikung, Bawipang ming awh ni a awm.
Bawipa ak ypnaak thlangkhqi taw amak tyn qoe kumqui dyna ak cak Zion tlang ing myih hy.
Tlang ing Jerusalem ak chung khoep amyihna, Bawipa ing tuh kawng kumqui dyna ak thlangkhqi ce chung sih khqi hy.
Thlakche a boei sawnghqawl ing thlak dyngkhqi a qam khuiawh am awm loet thai ti kaw, cemyih mantaw thlak dyngkhqi ing ami kut ce ik-oeih che sainaak aham hawna hau kawm uh.
Aw Bawipa, thlakchekhqi, kawlung ak dyng thlangkhqi venawh ak leek ik-oeih sai lah.
Cehlai lap kawi awh ak pleng thlangkhqi cetaw amak leek ik-oeih ak saikhqi mi Bawipa ing hqek baat kaw. Israel ak khan awh ngaihqepnaak awm seh.
Qaal ing am tukhqi ce Bawipa ing Zion na a sawi law khqi tlaih awh, kaimih taw mang ak hukhqi amyihna awm unyng.
Ningmih am khakhqi taw qaihnaak ing be nawh, nim laikhqi taw zeelnaak laa khqi ing be uhy. Cawh thlangphyn khqi anglakawh, “Bawipa ing ik-oeih bau soeih cekkhqi hamna sai pehy,” tinawh kqawn uhy.
Bawipa ing ik-oeih bau soeih ningnih aham sai law hawh hy, cedawngawh ningnih taw zeelnaak ing ni be uhy.
Aw Bawipa, ni hu awhkaw zoseennaak ce ni pe tlaih lah, Negev a lawngcakhqi amyihna ak awm ce.
Mikphli ing ak sawkhqi ing zeelnaak laa sak doena aat kawm uh.
Grang doena camci saw aham ak cet khqi ing, cangvui pawm doena zeelnaak laa sak ing hlat law tlaih kawm uh.
Bawipa ing im ama sak awhtaw, ip sakungkhqi ing a hoei nani bi ami sai. Bawipa ing khawk bau ama qeh awhtaw, qaltoeng khqi ing a hoei nani ami qeh hy.
A hoei na mymcang hqit awh tho unawh buh ai thainaak aham khawmy ben than dy bi sai uhyk ti – anih ingkaw a lungnaak thlangkhqi venawh ihnaak ce pehy.
Cakpa khqi ve Bawipa venawh kaw qo nik pangkhqi ni, canaa khqi ve amah a venawh kaw kutdo peek khqi ni.
Tha awm hui awhkaw cakpa cun khqi ve qalkap kawk awm kut awhkaw la khqi ing myih hy.
A lacung ce ce mihkhqi ing ak be hyp na ak ta thlang taw a zoseen hy. Vawkchawh awh a qaalkhqi mi aming noek qu awh chah am phyi kawm uh.
Bawipa kqih nawh, a lam awh ak cet thlangkhqi boeih taw a zoseen hy.
Na bibinaak phu ak thaih ce ai kawp ti; zoseennaak ingkaw boeimangnaak ce nang aham awm kaw.
Na zu ce na ipkhui awh misur thaih ak qah soeih amyihna awm kawmsaw; na capakhqi ce beihdung kung awh olive dil amyihna awm kaw.
