Thlang thakdam ing khaw a dingawh lai a thawl ngak nawh; cedawngawh caang ah huiawh ai thoeh kawm saw, ikawawm am ta kaw.
Kawlung khuiawh cainaak taw tui amyihna dung hlai hy, simnaak ak ta thlang ing ni ik-oeih a coeng sak hy.
Thlak ypawmna kqawn qu mai kawm uh, ak ypawm tang unu ak awm?
Thlakdyng, khawkpoek khawkhan thainaak ak ta a cakhqi taw thlang zoseenkhqi ni.
Awitlyknaak awh Sangpahrang ing awi ak tlyk awh, a mik ing theem amak leek boeih ce khqaa ing zah amyihna zaap boeih hy.
“Kak kawlung ciim sak nyng, thawlhnaak awhkawng ciimcaih nyng,” tinawh uing ak kqawn thai?
Tahnaak amak thym ingkaw tehnaak amak thym boeih Bawipa ing tyih qawi haih hy.
Nasen awm a bibi ing ak thym ak thawlh dang sak hy.
Zaaknaak haa ingkaw huhnaak mik ve Bawipa ing ni a sai qawi haih.
Ih koeh lungna khawdeng kawp ti; hqak nawh meet lah awklek ainaa ta kawp ti.
Them ak thlaikung ing them ak thlaihawh “Am leek hy, am leek hy,” tinawh, ang voei huna a them thlaihawh oequ hy.
Sui awm nawh, cak phu tlo awm awm moe, cyihnaak awi ak kqawn hui taw lung phu tlo soeih ing myih hy.
Thlangchang asyng naak ham ak dyihpyi-kung ingkaw nukche ak dyihpyikung ing a hii ce hawlh seh.
Quuk buh ang hypna ai ve thlang ing tui sak hy, cehlai a huna am kha ce lungqiit ing be kaw.
Thlang doet nawh ik-oeih cainaak ta. Ak leekna cai hqeet nawh ceemqal ce tlyk.

Thailatnaak ing them huhnaak taw cingmai ingkaw thihnaak thang ak dyn ing myih hy.

Ak awi kqawn leek moe kawlung ak see thlang taw dek am ak khanawh cak tui a mim hluk ing myih hy.
Thlang theet ak nget ak thlang taw am kha ing thuh phah nawh, ak kawlung awh thailatnaak ing bee hy.
Awi leek soeih kqawn seiawm koeh cangna, tuih ak cu khqih awm hy ak kawlung khuiawh.
Ak thlang theetnaak ce thailatnaak ing thuh seiawm, ak kawpoek a seetnaak taw thlang haiawh phona awm kaw.
Vaam ak co taw amah a vaamawh tla kawm saw, lung ak hlih taw amah ak khanawh ce a lung hlih law tlaih kaw.
Qaai ak kqawn am lai ing a tloh sak thlangkhqi ce sawhnaak khqi nawh, thlang ak kyihcah phawk am kha ing seetnaak pha sak hy.
Khawngawi a ham koeh oe qu, ce khawnghii ing ikaw a thoeng law hly pyi am sim hyk ti.
Namah ingkaw namah koeh kyihcah qu nawh thlang ing mah nim kyihcah seh. Na hui am, am na sim thlang a hui ing nim kyihcah seh.
Lung taw qih soeih nawh, dizui ing qih hlai moe, ceseiawm thlakqaw ing thlak kaw a so sak ve qih bet hy.
Kawtawinaak ing phyl nawh, kawsonaak ing tlung hy; cehlai yytnaak ve uing nu ang yh noeng kaw?
Lungnaak ing thuh phah anglakawh ak dangna toeltham qu leek bet hy.
Pyi ingtaw lungnak ing ni lambai na nawh, na qaal ingtaw thailatnaak ing ni mawk kaw.
Phoet phyi ham taw khawilu awm tuih kawina awm nawh, phoet cawi ham taw ant kha awm ak aawi ni.
Thlang a im ak vantaak taw, pha ang bu ak poengtaak ing myih hy.
Bawktui ingkaw bawktui khu ing kawlung a awmhly sak amyihna, kawlung tak awhkawng ak cawn law pyi ak khawsimnaak ing kawlung nawm sak hy.
Na pyi ingkaw na pa a pyi ce koeh hlah; kyi-naak na huhawh nam cawt imna koeh ceh; na imceng taw khawlawng hla nakaw nam cawt anglakawh leek bet hy.
Ka capa, cyi nawh, kak kaw ni zeel sak lah; Anik thekhanaakkhqi kam hlat naak thai ham.
Thlakcyi ing amak leek them a huhawh thuk taak nawh, thlakqaw ingtaw pan nawh amah ing zaawk na hy.
Am sim thlang ham ingkaw khawsak amak leek nu ham dyihthingna ak dyi thlang taw a hibai mai aw, a khawhkham pynoet oet mai aw hawih seh.
Mymcang hii tho nawh, a imceng ce khaw-tehna khy nawh zoseennaak ak pe taw, quun ak khy pek ing myih kaw.
Hqo ak sai poepa zu taw khawcui awhkaw iptih ak cei ben tloei ing myih hy.
Cemyih a nu ak khoem taw khawhlii ak khoem ing myih nawh kut khanawh situi thloen ing myih hy.
Thii ing thii a hqaat sak amyihna thlang ing thlang hqaat sak hy.
Thai thing ak lingkung ing thai thaih ai kawm saw, a boei ak khuut taw kyihcahna awm kaw.
Tuiawh mikhai ang dang amyihna thlang ak kawlung thlangawh dang hy.
Ceikhui ingkaw Abaddon ing a khoek sak ama awm amyihna thlanghqing mik ing a khoek sak qoe am ta hy.
Cak am ing a caknaak dang sak nawh, mai ing a suinaak dang sak hy; Cemyih lawtna kyihcah-naak ing ak thlangnaak dang sak hy.
Thlaqaw taw supkhai ing sumawh ni deeng seiawm ak qawnaak ce am khawng ti kaw.
Na tuukhqi ce ak leekna sim ham cai nawh nak khqinkhqi ce ak leekna khoem.
Khawhkhamkhqi ve kumqui ham am nawh, boei lumyk taw na cadil ham dyna cak poepa kaw.
Saitlim aat usaw amah ing tawi tlaih tlaih nawh, tlang nakaw saitlim cun kawi uhy.
Na tuukhqi ce na suisak a ham, meekhqi ce na khawhyn phu hamna awm hy.
Na imkhui cakaw ai a ham, na tamnaa nukhqi nam cahnaak ham mee suktui ing be ngen poepa kaw.
Thlakche taw ahu am hqut u seiawm cen kaw. Thlakdyng taw samthyn amyihna am thin awm kaw.
Qam khuiawh qaal a thawhawh, ukkung khawzah awm hy, cehlai khaw ak poek thai ingkaw cyihnaak ak taa thlang ingtaw ak dingna qam uk hy.
Khawdengkhqi ak thekhanaak ukkung taw tawi an amak tawi sak qawh tui ing myih hy.
A lawngim ak cehtaakkhqi ing thlakche kyihcah unawh, cehlai a lawngim amyihna khaw ak sakhqi ingtaw oelh uhy.
Thlang amak leek ing ik-oeih ak dyng am sim thai uhy, cehlai Bawipa ak sui thlangkhqi ingtaw ak soep cana sim thai uhy.
Amak thymna khaw ak sa kuiqang lakawh caawt kawi amak awmna khawksa khawdeng leek bet hy.
A lawngim amyihna khaw ak sa thai thlang taw khaw ak poek thai capak cyihna awm hy, cehlai aawk ai ak kamva ak pyinaak capa ingtaw a pa chah pyih sak hy.
A pung khawzah lawhnaak ing boei nawh thlang hamna them khawzah ak cun thlang taw, khawdengkhqi ak qeenkung na awm hy.
U awm a lawngim benna haa amak keeng thlang taw, ak cykcahnaak awm tuih ak cu ni.
Thlakdyng, lam amak leekawh ak ceh pyi taw amah a vaam cawh nawn awh tla kaw, cehlai thlak soep coet amak kap ingtaw qo leek pang kawm uh.
Kuiqang thlang ing amah ngaih awh thlakcyi na ngai qu mai seiawm, thlak khawdeng khawkpoek thai ingtaw ak ceetna huh pe hy.
Thlakdyng ing noengnaak a huhawh kyihcahnaak ak sang soeih pe uhy; cehlai thlakche a boei awh thlangkhqi ing thuk taak uhy.
A thawlh ak thuhphah ak thlang ing qeennaak am ham kawm saw, a thawlhnaak pho sak nawh qeennaak ak thoeh ing qeennaak hu kaw.
Bawipa ak kqihcah poe taw thlang zoseen ni, am thin ak sah ak thlang taw kyinaak sawng kaw.
Khawdeng ak thekhanaak ukkung taw samthyyn ak kaawk ingkaw phawm ak tlung ing myih hy.
Khawkpoek thainaak amak ta ukkung taw thlang ak phep qeekung ni, amak thymna them huh ak sawhnaak thlang taw a hqinglung saang kaw.
A kutawh thlang thi ak lawng lawkkhqawng dungawh tla kawm saw, u ingawm koeh hul seh nyng.
U awm ak thymna khawksa taw loet sakna awm kawm saw, amak thymna khawksa taw tlu poe kaw.
A loawh bi ak bi ing aawk ai khawzah hu kaw, cehlai a nawmnaak doeng ak sui thlang taw khawdeng kaw.
Thlak ypawm ing zoseennaak hu kawm saw, cehlai boei ak ngaih aih taw a phep kaana am hlah kawm uh.
Thlang mikhai toek am leek hy, cehlai phaipi cun oet mai ing thlang ing thawlh sai thai hy.
Thlakqu ing them hu hquut nawh, ak khan-awh khawdengnaak a pha law hly am sim hy.
Awih leek ing anik kyihcahna ak saa qu thlang lakawh anik toelthamkung ing a huna kyihcahnaak hu kaw.
A nu pa a them muk nawh, “Am poei hy,” ak ti taw thlang ak plam sakkung ni.
Ak kamvaa a awmnaak awh phekbonaak awm nawh, Bawipa ak ypnaak taw thlang zoseen ni.
Ak poeknaak awh ak hanng ak thlang taw thlakqaw na awm nawh, cehlai cyihnaak awh ak cet taw thlang zoseen ni.
Khawdeng them ak pe taw am khawdeng kawm saw, ak hawimang taak taw quun khy pekna awm kaw.
Thlakche a boei awh thlak boei ing thuk taak nawh, cehlai thlakche a thih awh thlakdyngkhqi pung uhy.
Thlang ing a toelzyih coeng awhawm kaw ak ting thlang taw amak voei thai voelna plam kaw.
Thlakdyng a awm awh pilnam ak kawzeel nawh, thlakche ing a uk awh pilnam kaw vung hy.
Cyinaak ak lungnaak ing a pak kaw zeel sak nawh, a pum ak zawi nu ak ih pyi taw a khawh plam kaw.
Ak thymna ak uk sangpahrang ing khawqam cak sak nawh, cehlai ang hyp kutdo ak lungnaak ing khawqam seet sak kaw.
A imceng ak kyihcah phawk taw a khaw ham thang ak duun ni.
Thlakche taw amah thawlhnaak awh aawk nawh, thlakdyng taw awmhly nawh laa sa hy.
Thlakdyng ingtaw khawdengkhqi hamna lam ak leek poek pek khqi nawh, thlakche ingtaw ak poeknaak ham kawlung am pe hy.
Thlang ak thekhanaak ing khawkkhui awi pung sak nawh, thlakdyng ingtaw kawsonaak qeem sak hy.
Thlakcyi ing thlakqaw a oelh awhtaw qoepquinaak am awm thai hy.
Thi lawng sak ak lungnakkhqi ing thlakleek hudam unawh, thlakdyng ingtaw a hqingnaak hul ham cai hy.
Thlakqaw ing ak kawsonaak kqawn boeih nawh thlakcyi ingtaw thuh phah nawh ngawih pyi hy.
Ukkung ing qai kqawn awi ang ngaih awhtaw a tamnaakhqi boeih thlakche na awm uhy.
Khawdeng thlang ingkaw thlang ak hep qawi kutoetna khaw sa haih nih nawh, Bawipa ing a ni mik daih sak qawi haih hy.
Khawdeng cakhqi ypawm cana ak ukkung sangpahrang taw a boei ngaihnaak ce kumqui cak sakna awm poepa kaw.
Cumcik ingkaw toelzyihnaak ing nasen cyi sak nawh, hlahphlam awhtaw a nu chah pyih sak kaw.
Thlache a pung awh thawlhnaak pung nawh, cekkhqi a ming tluk thlakdyngkhqi ing hu kawm uh.
Na capa ce ak leekna toel nawh, dymnaak ni pe kawm saw kawpoek nawmnaak ni pe kaw.
Hailam khaw huh thainaak ama awm awh pilnam hlahphlam nawh, cehlai aanaa awi ak ngai thlang taw a zoseen kaw.
Tamnaa taw awi mai ing tlaihvawng thai am ni; zasim seiawm am sai kaw.
Awi ak kqawn pyn pyn ak awm aw? A nih anglakawh thlakqaw awh ngaih-uunaak awm bet hy.
A nasen awhkawng awm pyi tamnaa ing ca a qo qup pyi kaw.
Thlak kawktawi ing khqah qu coeng sak nawh, thlak kawsonaak ing thawlhnaak sai hy.
Ak oek qu thlang ak kaina awm nawh, kaw ak daw ing kyihcahnaak hu hy.
Thlakqu ak pyinaak taw amah a hqingnaak ak sawhnaak ni; qun khy awi za moe seinu ak kqawn hly kqih hy.
Thlang kqih nawh awi ak ngai hqoeh hqoeh taw a ham thang ak duun ing myih nawh, Bawipa ak ypnaak thlang taw a sa syng kaw.
Thlang khawzah ing ukkung haiawh mikhai-leek huh ham sui uhy, cehlai Bawipa ven na kawng ni thlang ing mikhaileek a huh hly thai.
Thlakdyng ing amak thym them ce tuih nawh, thlakche ing thlakdyng ce tuih lawt hy.
Jakeh a capa Agur ak awicyih taw vemyih na ni. Thlang ing Ethiel a venawh, Ethiel ingkaw Ukal a venawh vemyih na ce kqawn hy,
“Thlangkhqi anglakawh ka sim kang zak awm am awm hy.
Cyihnaak am cawng nyng saw, thlakciim kawng awm am sim nyng.
Unu khanna kai nawh ak kqum law tlaih? Unu a kutawh khawhlii ak bym thai? Unu hibai ing tui ak cun? Unu khawmdek a dytnaak ak cak sak? Unu ang ming, a capa ming nak sim aw?
Bawipa ak awikhqi boeih taw caawtbauh kawi am awm na, Amah ak cangnaakkhqi boeih ham ziingnaak ni.
Ak awikhqi ce koeh sap, cekkaataw nik coet kawm saw a qai ak kqawn thlangna awm kawp ti.
Aw Bawipa, them pakkhih ni thoeh nyng; ka thih hlanawh ni soep pe sak lah.
Amak thym ingkaw qai kqawn ka venawh koeh awm sak; khawdengnaak ingkaw boeinaak awm koen ni pe, my ngawi ai tat buh mah ni pe.
Cekkataw boei nyng saw nang nim hilh kawng nyng saw 'Bawipa taw a u nu?' ti hau kawng nyng. Amawh ka kawdeng awhawm qu kawng nyng saw na thang nim ceh hau kawng nyng.
Tamnaa ce a boei venna koeh theet, quun nik khy pe kawm saw, nak khanawh thawlhnaak tla kaw.
A pa quun khy pe nawh, a nu amak kyihcah thlang awm hy.
Amah poeknaak awh ak ciimna ak ngai qu thlang awm nawh; cehlai a thawlhnaak caihsakna am awm hy.
Khawpoek saang sak nawh hepnaak ing thlang ak toek awm hy.
A haa cimsum amyihna awm nawh, khawmdek awhkaw khawngdengkhqi ingkaw ak voetvaikhqi daih hamna cimca ing ak be thlang awm hy.
“Ni pe hlah, ni pe hlah,” tinawh ak khyy canu pakkhih ak ta litno awm hy. Amak phyi thai tlaih them pakthum awm hy, “Khoek hawh ny,” amak ti tlaih them puphli awm hy.
Phyi, ca ak qeeng phoen, tui amak phyi thai deklai ingkaw “khoek hy,” amak ti man mai awm hy.
A pa ak thekhanaak ingkaw a nuk awi ak hep mik taw lamawh ak ding vangaak ing cuk kawm saw; huu ing a sa ai pe kaw.
Kawpoek ak kyi sak ik-oeih pakthum awm nawh am kang zaaksim ik-oeih pupthli awm hy.
Khanna kaw huu ang dingnaak lam, Luk khan awhkaw khqui a cehnaak lam, tuicunli awhkaw lawng a cehnaak lam ingkaw tangpa ing nula a pannaak lam tloek ce ni.
Cemyih ceni samphaih nu a cehnaak lam taw; Ce nula ing ai nawh am kha a huih coengawh, “Them amak thum am sai nyng,” ti hy.
Ve them pakthum ak caming khawmdek thyyn nawh ve them pupthli awh yh thainaak am ta hy.
Tamnaa ce sangpahrangna coeng nawh, thlakqaw ing aawk ai ak bena ta hy.
A mi hoet nula ing vaa ta nawh tamnaa nu ing a boei nu a qo pang hy.
Khawmdek khanawh ik-oeih ak zawi soeih pupthli awm nawh, cehlai cekkhqi taw ak cyi soeih na awm uhy.
Liing ve ak tha ak zawi soeihna bi ak sai na awm moe, khawhqai awh aawk ai cun hy.
Sathel ing tha a khoehca ni a taak hlai, lungnu thelpang khuiawh a im ta hy.
Khamkhawkkhqi ing sangpahrang am ta uhy; cehlai kawoet cana cet haih thai uhy.
Satuiqai ing kuting tuuk thaina awm moe, sangpahrang imawh awmnaak hyn ta hy.
Qypawmnaak ing ak saangna khaw ak kham ik-oeih pakthum awm nawh ypawm cana ak cet ik-oeih pupthli awm hy:
Samthyn taw qamsa chunglak awh ak thamah soeih na awm nawh, ikawmyih ing awm a hu am voei sak khawi,
Ak thamah aihlyi kit, memcai sing ingkaw qalkap ing ak chungkoep sangpahrang ce ni.
Namah ingkaw namah thangsaknaak ham amak leek them na sai mai awh aw, amak leek ik-oeih poeknaak na taak mai awhtaw, nam kha cyyp sak.
Suktui hqoet khingnaak ing suktui khal sak nawh ni hmaqawng nawi khingnaak ing thi ak cawn sak amyihna kawsonaak ing hqo hqitnaak cawn sak hy.
Lemyl sangpahrang ak awicyih a nu ing a cawngpyinaak awi taw vemyihna ni;
Aw ka capa, aw ka thi ka sa awhkawng ka canaak ka capa, aw kak awikam awhkawng ka canaak ka capa, ngai lah,
Nak thamahnaak ce nu a hamna koeh pe, sangpahrang him ham ak caikhqi venawh na hqingnaak koeh pe kawp ti.
Aw Lemyl, Sangpahrangkhqi ing misurtui a mi aawk hly am ni, ukkungkhqi ing zuu ami aawk hly am ni.
A mi aawk awhtaw aanaa awi ce hilh kawm usaw, thlak khawdengkhqi khanawh amak thymna uknaak ta kawm uh.
Ak thi tawm ce zuu pe unawh, ak kawseekhqi ce misurtui pe uh.
Aw seitaw a khawdengnaak ce hilh seitaw a patangnaak ce hilh seh.
Awi amak kqawn thai thlangkhqi hamna awi kqawn pe nawh, dyihpyikung amak ta khqi ing a mi ham kawi ce ham sak khqi.
Ak thymna awi kqawn nawh awi deng lah; kawdengkhqi ingkaw ak voetvaikhqi a mi ham hly kawi ham sak khqi lah.
U nu khawsak ak leek nu ak hu? A phu taw suilung a phuk tlo lakawh a phu tlo ngai hy.
A vaa ing anih ce yp na nawh them a voetnaak am ta hy.
A vaa hamna a hqing khui them leek ing bee sak hy.
Tuumyi ingkaw hla sui nawh, a kut ing kawzeel cana sai hy.
A nih cetaw them ak zawi lawng ing myih nawh, khawkhla nakawng ai kawi law pyi hy.
Khaw a dai hlanawh tho nawh; a imkhui khaw ingkaw a tamnaa nukhqi ham ai kawi toen hy.
Khawhyn ce nainawng hqeet nawh thlai hy; a bibinaak khui awhkawng misur ce ling hy.
Thamahnaak ing ak cawi zeen nawh, a baan thamah sak hy.
Them a zawihnaak awh a phu awm nawh, khawmthan awh awm a mai im am thih man hy.
A kut ingawh bu pawm nawh a kutply ingawh tahplem qawlh hy.
A kut ce thlak khawdengkhqi benna soeng nawh, ak voetvaikhqi ven dyna pha sak hy.
Daamtui baw nawh khaw a ding canawh a imkhui khaw ce hibai ak awih ing khuk khqi nawh lynaak am ta hy.
Hiphaih leek soeih amah ham tak nawh, suisak leek ing hlawihhlam qu hy.
Khawkkhui cunnaak chawmkeng kuun nawh a hqaamcakhqi ven ang ngawih awh a vaa ce thlang ing kqihchah na hy.
Hla qui ak leek leek ing suibai tak nawh zawi hy, them ak thlaikhqi vena chawmqui ce thak khqi hy.
A suisak taw thamahnaak ingkaw qypawmnaak na awm nawh, khawnghi ak pha law hly hamna awmhly hy.
Cyihnaak ing am kha aang nawh, am khaaawh ypawmna toelthamnaak ce awm hy.
A imkhui khawsak ak leekna toek nawh thakdam a buh am ai hy.
A cakhqi ing tho unawh, thlang zoseen nu ti kawm usaw, a vaa ingawm kyihcah kaw.
“Nu khawsak ak leek khawzah awm uhy. Cehlai nang ing pyh khqi boeih hyk ti,” ti nawh.
Mikhaileek awm zoeknaak mai ni, dawnaak bai thailatnaak ni. Bawipa ak kqihchah a nu taw kyihcah tyngna awm kaw.
Ce a nu ce a bi thaphu pe unawh, khawkkhui lutnaak chawmkeng awh a bibinaak ing kyihcah lah uh.

Abraham capa David, David capa Jesu Khrih a lawnaak cadil thuihnaak cauk taw vemyihna awm hy.
Abraham ing Isaak ca na nawh; Isaak ing Jakob ca na hy; Jakob ing Judah cingnahqui ca na hy.
Judah ingkaw Tamar a ven awhkawng Perez ingkaw Zerah cana nawh; Perez ing Herezon cana hy, Herezon ing Qam cana hy.
Qam ing Amminadab ca na nawh, Aminadab ing Nahshon ca na hy; Nahshon ing Salmon ca na hy.
Salmon ingkaw Rahab a ven awhkawng Boaz ca na hy, Boaz ing Ruth a ven awhkawng Obed ca na hy; Obed ing Jesee ca na hy.
Jesee ing David sangpahrang ca na nawh; David sangpahrang ing Uria a zu ven awhkawng solomon ca na hy;
Solomon ing Rehoboam ca na hy; Rehobam ing Abijah ca na hy; Abijah ing Asa ca na hy;
Asa ing Jehoshaphat ca na hy; Jehoshaphat ing Uzziah ca na hy;
Uzziah ing Jotham ca na hy; Jotham ing Ahaz ca na hy; Ahaz ing Hezekiah ca na hy;
Hezekiah ing Manasseh ca na hy; Manasseh ing Amon ca na hy; Amon ing Josiah ca na hy;
Babylon khaw awh tamnaa na ami khyn tloek awh, Josiah ing Jekoniah ingkaw a mik cingnakhqi ca na hy;
Babylon awh tamnaa na ami khyn coengawh; Jekoniah ing shealtiel ca na hy; Shealtel ing Zerubbabel ca na hy;
Zerubbabel ing Abiud ca na hy; A biud ing Azor ca na hy;
Azor ing Zadok ca na hy; Akim ing Eliud ca na hy;
Eliud ing Eleazar ca na hy; Eleazar ing Matthan ca na hy;
Jakob ing Meri va Joseph ca na hy; cawhkawng khrih ami ti uh, Jesu ce thang hy.
Abraham awhkawng David dy khuk hlaihphli law hy; David awhkawng Babylon awh tamnaa na ami khyn dy khuk hlaihphli law hy; Babylon na ami khyn coeng awhkawng Khrih dy khuk hlaihphli law bai hy.
Jesu Khrih a thangnaak taw ve myihna awm hy: anu Meri ce Joseph ing a zu na kang nawh, kut oet na ani awm haih hlanawh, Meri ing Ciim Myihla ak caming naasen syn hawh hy.
Ava Joseph taw thlak dyng na a awm dawngawh, thlang ing a sim hlanawh, ang hyp na nawn dym aham cai hy.
Cemyihna ak poek huili awh, Bawipa ak khan ceityih ce ang mang awh dang pe nawh, a venawh, “David capa Joseph na zu Meri ce lawh aham koeh kqih: a phyihsu taw Ciim Myihla ak caming ni tina hy.
Anih ing cakpa ta kawmsaw, ak thlangkhqi ce thawlhnaak khui awhkawng hul aham a awm dawngawh, ang ming taw JESU tinawh sui kawp ti, tina hy.
Bawipa ing a tawngha hawnaak ing anak kqawn ce a soepnaak aham ve myihkhqi boeih ve ana hang awm hy.
Ngai lah, nulak cym ce phyihsu kawmsaw, cakpa ta kaw, ang ming taw Emmanuel tinawh khy kawm uh, ningnih a venawh Khawsa awm hy tinaak ni”.
Joseph ing ang hqyng law awh Bawipa a ceityih ing awi a peek amyihna, Meri ce zu na hy:
a ca a cuun hlan dy taw am heei hy; cekcoengawh a cakcyk ce cuun nawh JESU tinawh ming sui hy.
Herod ce sangpahrang na a awm awh Judah qam Bethlehem awh Jesu taw thang hy, cawh Khawlaw ben nakaw thlakcyikhqi ce Jerusalem na law uhy,
Judah thlangkhqi a sangpahrang ak thang ce hana a awm? Anih a aihchi ce khawlaw benna ka mi huh a dawngawh, anih bawk aham ka mik law ni” tina uhy.
Ce ak awi ce Herod sangpahrang ing ang zaak awh ak kawpoek kyi hy, Jerusalem awh amik awm thlangkhqi boeih awm amik kawpoek kyi hy.
Khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw ca qeekungkhqi boeih ce khy khqi nawh Khrih a thangnaak kawi hyn ce sui sak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing a venawh, “Judah qam Bethlehem khaw awh thang kaw: kawtih tawngha ing vemyihna ana qee hyt hawh hy;
Nang Bethlehem, Judah qam khuiawh Judah ukkungkhqi anglakawh ak zawi soeih na am awm hyk ti. Ikawtih nak khui awhkawng ukkung law kawmsaw, anih ing kak thlang Israelkhqi ce uk kaw, tinawh qee hy,” tina uhy.
Cekcoengawh Herod ing thlakcyikhqi ce ang hyp na khy nawh aihchi dang pehy tice ak nep caana doet hy.
Cekcoengawh cekkhqi ce Bethlehem na tyi khqi hy; “Cet unawh naasen ce ak nep na sui law uh; nami huh awhtaw ning zaak law sak uh, kai ingawm cet nyng saw anih bawk lawt vang.” tina khi hy.
Sangpahrang awi ce aming zaak coengawh cet uhy; cawh, khawlaw ben nakaw aihchi ce hu tlaih uhy, naasen a awmnaak hyn pha nawh ang dym hlan dy cekkhqi haiawh aihchi ce cet hy.
A mingmih ing aihchi ami huh awh zeel soeih uhy.
Ipkhui na lut unawh naasen ingkaw anu Meri ce ami huh awh koep unawh bawk uhy. Ami a khawhbawm ce awng unawh; sui, frankinsen bawktui ingkaw mura ce pe uhy.
Herod a venna a maming hlatnaak voel aham Khawsa ing a ming mang awh awi ak kqawn peek khqi a dawngawh ak chang lam ben nakawng voei uhy.
A mingmih ami ceh coengawh Bawipa ak khan ceityih ing Joseph ang mang awh dang pe nawh, “Tho nawhtaw, naasen ingkaw anu ce Egypt qam na cen pyi hlah, awi kak kqawn law hlan dy taw cawh ana awm uh; Herod ing naasen ce him aham sui li hawh hy” tina hy.
Cawh anih ing tho nawh naasen ingkaw anu ce thawh nawh khawmthan awh Izip qam na cen pyi hy;
Herod a thih hlan dy taw cawh awm uhy: cetaw “Izip qam awhkawng ka capa ce khy nyng,” tinawh Bawipa ing a tawngha hawnaak ing ak kqawn ce a soepnaak aham ni.
Thlakcyikhqi ing ni qaai na hawh pai moe uh, tice Herod ing a sim awhtaw, ak kaw so soeih hy, thlang tyi nawh Bethlehem khaw awh ak awm naasen boeih boeih ingkaw a khawceng awhkaw ak awm naasenkhqi boeih thlakcyikhqi a doetnaak nyn dy awhkaw kum hih awhkawng ak kai boeih ce him sak hy.
Cawh ce Jeremiah ak awih kqawn soep hy.
Qamah khawk khuiawh lungnat zaaknaak, kqahnaak ingkaw khy ang kqangnaak ce awm hy, Rachel ing a cakhqi ce kqah hy, a cakhqi ama awm voel hawh a dawngawh, ang ngaihqepnaak am awm voel hy”.
Cehlai Herod ce a thih coengawh Izip qam awh ak awm Joseph ang mang awh Bawipa ak khan ceityih ce dang pe nawh; a venawh,
Tho lah, naaca ce lo nawh Israel qam na cehpyi hlah: naaca him aham ak suikung ce thi hawh hy,” tina hy.
Tho nawh naaca ingkaw a nu ce a lawh coengawh, Israel qam na hlat pyi hy.
Cehlai Arkhelaus ing a pa Herod ang zyng na, Judah qam awh boei na awm hy tice ang zaak awh, ce benna ceh aham kqih hy, ang mang awh Khawsa ing qalqiingnaak awi ak kqawn peek amyihna, Kalili qam benna ce cet hy.
Nazareth ami ti khaw pynoet na ce cet nawh cawh ce awm hy. “Nazareth thlang tinawh khy kawm uh,” tinawh tawnghakhqi ing ami nak kqawn awi ce a soepnaak aham ce amyihna awm hy.
Ce tloek awh Baptisma ak pekung Johan ce law nawh, Judah qamkoh awh awi kqawn hy,
Zut lah uh khawk khan ram taw zoe hawh hy”, tinawh kqawn hy.
Veni tawngha Isaiah ing anak kqawn paicai hy: “Ramkoh awh ak khy awi ing, 'Bawipa lam ce qoek abah unawh, a lamkhqi ce dyng sak lah uh', tinawh anak kqawn ce.
Johan ing kala-uk myi hi ce bai nawh, ak cawi ce savyn taisawm ing zen nawh, khamkhawk ingkaw khawitui ce buh a an na ai hy.
Anih a venawh Jerusalem khawk thlangkhqi, Judah qam awhkaw thlangkhqi boeih ce cet uhy.
Ami thawlhnaakkhqi ce kqawn unawh, anih a baptisma ce hu uhy.
Cehlai, baptisma a peeknaak kung awh Farasikhqi ingkaw Sadusikhqi thlang khawzah amik law ce a huh awh, ami venawh, “Aw khqui a cadilkhqi, kawsonaak ak law hly ce centaak aham u ing nu anik kqawn peek khqi?
Zut doena qah phaat lah uh.
Ka mi pa Abaraham ta u nyng kaw, tinawh koeh poek uh; ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Khawsa ing vawhkaw lungkhqi ve Abaraham a cakhqi na coeng sak thai hy.
Thingkung boeih awh hqaica toen hyt na awm hawh nawh; ak thaih leek amak qah thingkungkhqi boeih taw hlu kawmsaw, mai awh phum kaw.
Kai ing tui ngawh zutnaak baptisma ce ni pek khqi nyng; cehlai kai a huawh ak law cetaw kai anglakawh bau khqoet hy, kai taw anih a khawmyk ak pawm peek aham za am tyng nyng; anih ingtaw Ciim Myihla ingkaw mai ing baptisma ce ni pek khqi kaw.
A kut awh cang zahnaak khqa ce pawm kawmsaw, caang ce ak caih cana zap kaw, ang tak ce tep khuiawh chan kawmsaw ang hi taw amak thi thai qoe mai awh phum kaw tina hy.
Cawh Jesu taw Kalili qam awhkawng Johan a baptisma huh aham Jordan long na law hy.
Cehlai Johan ing tha na hy, “kai ing ni nang a baptisma huh aham ka ngaih hlai, kawtih kai a venna na law lat?” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Tuh sai mai, cawh ni ningnih aham dyngnaak boeih boeih a cup hly”, tina hy.
Jesu ing Baptisma a huh coengawh, tui awhkawng cet hy. Cawh khawk khan ce anih aham awng qu nawh, Khawsa Myihla ce khqukkhqu amyihna ak khan awh ang cuk peek ce huhy.
Cawhtaw khan nakawng, “ve ve ka lungnaak ka Capa, ka ym soeih soeih ni”, tinawh awi ce law hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu taw qaai a sykzoeknaak huh aham, Myihla ing qamkoh na hqui hy.
Dai phlikip ingkaw than phlikip buh ang hyh coengawh, ak phoen ce cawi hy.
Ak sykkung ce a venna law nawh, “Nang ve Khawsa Capa na na awm awhtaw, vawhkaw lungkhqi ve phaihpi na coeng sak lah”, tina hy.
Cehlai, Jesu ing ve myihna hlat pehy, “Thlang ve phaihpi doeng ing am hqing nawh, Khawsa am khak khui awhkawng ak cawn law saqui awi ing ni a hqing hy, tinawh qee ce na awm hy”, tina hy.
Cekcoengawh qaai ing anih ce khawk bau ciim na ceh pyi nawh, bawkim iptih asaw cilin ca awh tahy.
A venawh, “Khawsa Capa na na awm awhtaw, nuk cawn lah; kawtih, vemyihna qee na awm hy; “Ak khan ceityihkhqi ce awi pe kawmsaw, na khawkhqi lung awh am nak chuknaak aham, a kut ing nang ce ni dawm kaw”, tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Na Bawipa Khawsa ce koeh noek koeh dak tinawh qee na awm bai hy”, tina hy.
Cekcoengawh, qaai ing anih ce cung ak sang soeih na van pyi nawh, khawmdek awhkaw qamkhqi boeih boeih ingkaw a mangnaak khqi boeih ce huh hy.
A venawh, “koep nawh kai ve nani beek awhtaw vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve ni pe kawng”, tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Setan ak chang na cet, Bawipa na Khawsa doeng ce beek kawm tiksaw, anih a bi doeng ce bi tinawh qee na awm hy”, tina hy.
Cekcoengawh qaai ing anih ce cehta hy, cawh khan ceityihkhqi ce law unawh anih ce khut a hlep uhy.
Johan thawngim awh thla uhy, tice Jesu ing ang zaak awh Kalili ram benna ce hlat hy.
Nazareth khaw ce cehta nawh tuili keng Zebulun ingkaw Nophtali khawqi awh ak awm Kapernaum khaw na cet nawh cawh ce awm hy.
Tawngha Isaiah ing anak khypyi oepchoeh:
Zebulun ram ingkaw Naphtali ram tuili na cehnaak lam, Jordan long caqai, Gentelkhqi a Kalili;
thannaak khuiawh ak ngawikhqi ing vangnaak ak bau soeih ce hu uhy; thihnaak hlip ak kaiawh ak ngawikhqi venawh vangnaak ce pha law hy”, tinawh anak khypyi ce a cupnaak aham ni.
Cawhkawng awh Jesu ing awi kqawn cyk hy, “Zut lah uh, kawtih khan ram taw zoe hawh hy,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Jesu ing Kalili tuili keng na a ceh awh cingna qawi thlang pakhih, Piter ami ti uh Simon ingkaw a naa Andrew, lawk ak khawng ce hu hy; cekqawi taw ngak hawikung na awm hy nih.
Cekkqawi a venawh “Ka hu awh bat lah nih, thlang ak tukung na ni sai qawi vang”, tina hy.
Cekkqawi ing lawk ce cehta nih nawh ahu awh bat hy nih.
Ce hyn awhkawng Jesu ce cet bai nawh, Zebdi a ca qawi Jacob ingkaw a naa Johan ce a nipa Zebedi mi lawng khuiawh lawk amik bu ce hu nawh khy hy.
Cekkqawi cingna ingawm ani pa ingkaw lawng ce cehta nih nawh, Jesu a hu awh ce bat pahoei hy nih.
Jesu ing Kalili ram khui boeih awh cet nawh, sinakawk awh thlangkhqi ce cawngpyi hy, ram awithang leek ce khypyi hy, sa amak dip thlangkhqi ingkaw tlohnat soepkep ak ta thlangkhqi ce qoei sak hy.
Jesu akawng ce Syria qam pum awh thang hy: tlohnatnaak soepkep ingkaw khuikhanaak soepkep ak hu thlangkhqi, sa amak dip thlangkhqi, thlakqawkhqi, ak kawk khuiawh qaai ak bekhqi, ak khawnkhqi boeih ce a venna law pyi unawh, anih ing cekkhqi ce qoei sak khqi boeih hy.
A hu awh Kalili, Dekapoli, Jerusalem, Judah qam ingkaw Jordan long caqai nakaw thlang khawzah bat uhy.
Thlang kqeng ce a huh awh, tlang na kai nawh ngawi hy, cawh a hubatkhqi ce a venna law uhy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi ce vemyihna cawngpyi khqi hy:
Kawlung ak khawdeng thlangkhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih khan qam taw a mingmih a koe ni.
Kawset ing ak kokhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih a mingngaih qep kaw.
Kaw ak dungkhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih khawmdek qo pang kawm uh.
Dyngnaak ce buh a myihna cawi nawh tui a myihna ak hoetkhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih amik phoen phyi kaw.
Thlang qeenkhaw ak ngaikhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih qeennaak ce hu lawt kawm uh.
Kawlung ak ciimkhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih Khawsa ce hu kawm uh.
Qoepnaak ak saikhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih Khawsa cakhqi tinawh khy kawm uh.
Dyngnaak awh thekhanaak ak zawkkhqi taw ami zoseen hy, kawtih khawk khan taw a mingmih a koe ni.
Thlangkhqi ing kai ak camawh ni phep khqi uhy, ni thekha nak khqi uhy, amak thym na awihche soepkep ing ani zyih khqi awh ce nami zoseen hy.
Ym u nawhtaw namik kawzeel sak uh, Ikawtih nangmih aham khawkkhan awh kutdo ak bau soeih awm hy, cemyihna ni nangmih nami awm hlan awhkaw tawnghakhqi awm a mina thekhanaak hawhy.
Nangmih taw khawmdek ci na awm u hyk ti. Cehlai ci ing a paih hawh awhtaw ikawmyihna a alnaak voel kaw? khawng nawh thlang ngawh khaw ing leh aham doeng kaataw, kawna awm phu am ta voel hy.
Nangmih taw khawmdek vangnaak na awm uhyk ti. Tlang awhkhaw ak awm taw ikaw ingawm am chungdah thai hy.
Thlang ing mai a vang awh, dawn ing am myk nawh, maihvang ami taaknaak khawi awh ni ami taak, cawh ni ipkhui awhkaw ak awmkhqi boeih ce ak coei.
Cemih lawtna, nangmih a them leek sai ce thlang ing a huh awh khawkkhan nakaw ak awm nangmih a Pa ce ami kyihcahnaak thai kaw, nami vangnaak ce thlang amik huh awh vang lah seh.
Anaa awi aw am awh tawnghakhqik awi hqe aham kai ve law hy tinawh koeh poek uh; hqe aham am law nyng ak soep sak hamna ni ka law.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, khawmdek ingkaw khan ang khum hlan dy, anaa awi awhkaw a dek pynoet ca awm, calung pynoet ca awm ik-oeih soepkep a cup hlan dy taw am qeng tikaw.
A u ingawm vawhkaw awipeek ak zawi cakhqi ak khui awhkaw pynoet ce eek nawh thlak chang awm eek lawt aham am cuuk awhtaw anih ce khawkkhan awh ak zawi soeih na awm kaw, cehlai a u ingawm vemyihkhqi boeih ve hquut nawh thlak chang awm a cawngpyi awhtaw anih ce khawk khan awh ak bau soeih na awm kaw.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nangmih ama dyngnaak ing Farasikhqi ingkaw caqeekungkhqi a dyngnaak ce ama poe voelh awhtaw khawkkhan awh am lut thai ti kawp uk ti.
“Syn awh, thlang koeh him, u awm thlang ak him taw awidengnaak kqih awm ce hu kaw,” tinawh ami nak kqawn ce za hawh u hyk ti.
Cehlai, ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a u awm a koeinaaa ak khan awh kaw ak so taw awidengnaak ce hu kaw. A u awm a koeinaa ce “Thlak zoe” ak tinaak taw Sanhedrin awh awidengna awm kaw. A u awm thlang ce, 'thlak qaw!' ak tinaak taw hell mai kqih awm ce zawk kaw.
Cedawngawh bawkthang awh ik-oeih pek aham nami law pyi awh na koeinaa ing nak khan awh ak kaw am law hy tice na sim awhtaw,
bawkthang a haiawh na themkhqi ce cehta nawh hlat cang. Na koeinaa ingqawi qoepnaak ce na sai coengawh cet nawhtaw na them ce pe kawp ti.
Awidengnaak awh taza anik cawikung na qaal ingqawi lam nani ceh haih tloek awh ang tawnnna qoepnaak sai. Cemyih am awhtaw na qaal ing nang ce awidengnaak kung na a ni khyn coengawh awidengkung ing nang ce boei a venawh ni pe patoe kaw, anih ing nang ce thawngim na nik thla kaw.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, laiba a boeih dy na sah hlan khui taw thawngim awhkawng am loet kawp ti.
“Na samphaih aham am awm hy”, tinawh amik kqawn awi ce za hawh uhyk ti.
Cehlai, ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u ingawm nu pynoet ce hyynaak mik ing a toek awhtaw, ak kawlung khuiawh cawhkaw nu ak khan awh ce samphaih hawh hy.
Nak tang mik ing a ni thawlh sak awhtaw, koeih nawh khawng; na pum boeih ing hell khuina nang tlaak anglakawh na pum awh ik-oeih pynoet na taal ce nep bet hy.
Nak tangkut ing a ni thawlh sak awhtaw tlyk boet nawh khawng. Na pum awhkaw ik-oeih pynoet na taal ce nep bet hy.
“U ingawm a zu ce a ma awhtaw, zu manaak ca ce pe seh” tinawh amik kqawn awi ce a na awm hawh hy.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a va ak khan awh a thawlh awh ti kaana, u ingawm a zu ce a ma awhtaw a zu ce samphaih sak hy, cekcoengawh u ingawm thlang a zu ma ak zu naak taw samphaih na awm hy.
Cekcoeng bai awh, 'nak awisa ce koeh hqe, Bawipa venawh nak awisa ce cup sak lah', tinawh syn awh ami nak kqawn awm za hawh u hyk ti.
Cehlai, ka nik kqawn peek khqi, awi koeh sa qoe qoe uh: khawkkhan phoei nawh awi koeh sa, kawtih khawkkhan taw Khawsa a ngawihdoelh ni;
khawmdek awm phoei unawh awi koeh sa uh, kawtih khawmdek awm a khaw a soengnaak ni; Jerusalem awm phoei unawh awi koeh sa uh, kawtih Jerusalem taw sangpahrang boei a khawk bau ni.
Nami lu phoei unawh awi koeh sa uh, kawtih na lu awhkaw na lumsam pynoet ca awm am baawk, am lee sak thai hyk ti.
Ak thym ce 'thym hy' ti unawh taw amak thym ce 'am thym hy' ti mai uh; ve ak khan awh awi ak law bai taw them amak leek hawh ni.
'Mik ang zyng awh mik, haa ang zyng awh haa', tinawh awi amik nak kqawn awm za hawh u hyk ti.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlakche ce koeh oelh uh. Nak tang ben na beeng awh thlang ing anik beih awhtaw ak chang ben na beeng ce awm dun pe.
Thlang ing na angki ce lawh aham a ngaih a dawngawh awi a ni oelh awhtaw, hi awm peek sih mai.
Thlang ing meng oet a ni qyt ngah ngah awhtaw meng hih dy awh thak.
Thlang ing ik-oeih a thoeh awhtaw pe mai, na venawh ik-oeih pu aham ak law ce koeh hawi taak.
“Na imceng ce lungna nawhtaw na qaal cetaw sawh na,” tinawh qee hyt awi ak awm ce zahawh u hyk ti.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nami qaal ce lung law na uh, nangmih awihche ing anik zyi thlangkhqi ce zoseenaak pe law uh; nangmih anik sawhnaakkhqi aham them leek sai law pe uh,
cawh ni khawk khan awh ak awm nangmih a Pa a cakhqi na nami awm hly. Anih ingtaw thlakche ingkaw thlakleek ak khan awh khaw ang myih na law sak nawh, thlakdyng ingkaw thlakthawlh ak khan awh awm khaw ang myih na aa sak hy.
Nangmih anik lungnaakkhqi doeng nami lungnaak mantaw ikaw kutdo nu nami huh kaw? Mangmu ak cawikhqi ingza cemyihce am sai lawt uhy na ti nawh nu?
Na koeinaa doeng na ym mantaw, thlak chang anglakawh na leeknaak bet ikaw a awm? Lukih thlangkhqi ingza cemyih ce am sai uhy na ti nawh nu?
Khawkkhan nakaw ak awm nangmih a Pa a soep lawt a myihna nangmih awm soep lawt lah uh.
Thlang ing a huhnaak aham, 'them leek sainaak' thlang a haiawh am nami sainaak aham ngaihta lah uh. Cemyihna nami sai mantaw, khawk khan na ak awm nangmih a Pa ven nakaw kutdo am hu kawm uk ti.
Cedawngawh ak voet ak hlauh thlangkhqi ik-oeih na dodan awh thlang am kyihcah ngaih awh qaai kqawnkhqi ing sinakawk ingkaw lam suttungkhqi awh a mi sai amyihna uut yng nawh koeh kqawn qu uh. Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, kutdo ce a mimah ing boet nawn hawh uhy.
Cehlai, nangmih ingtaw thlang ik-oeih nami dodan awh nak tangkut ing a sai ce nak cawng ben kut ing koeh sim seh,
cawh ni na kutdo ce ang hyp na a awm hly. Cawh ni ang hyp ik-oeih sai ak hukung nangmih a Pa ing samphang na kutdo ce a ni peek hly khqi hy.
Na mik cykcah awh, thlak qaai kqawnkhqi amyihna koeh cykcah uh; a mingmih ingtaw thlang ing ni huh na seh a mi ti awh, sinakawk ingkaw lam suttungkhqi awh dyi unawh, amik cykcah ce lungna uhy. Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a mimah ing kutdo ce boet nawn hawh uhy.
Cehlai, nangmih taw na mik cykcah awh nami ipkhui na lut unawh, chawh nami khaih coengawh, anghyp na ak awm nami Pa a venawh cykcah uh. Cawh ni ang hyp ik-oeih sai ak hukung nangmih a Pa ing samphang awh kutdo ce ni pek khqi kaw.
Na mik cykcah awh lawkihkhqi cykcah amyihna awi koeh nawlh tlaih tlaih uh, a mingmih ingtaw awi khawzah nik kqawn awh ni ang zaak hly tinawh poek uhy.
Cekkhqi amyihna koeh awm uh, kawtih nangmih ing nami thoeh hlanawh nami ngaih ik-oeihkhqi ce nami Pa ing sim oepchoeh hawh hy.
“Cedawngawh vemyihna cykcah uh; Khawkkhan nakaw ak awm kaimih a Pa, nang ming kqihchahnaak awm seh,
Na qam pha law seh, Khawkkhan awh nak kawngaih sai amyihna khawmdek awh nak kawngaihnaak saina awm seh.
Tuhngawi awh myngawi buh ni pek khqi lah.
Ik-oeih ak pukhqik khan awh qeenkhaw ka ming ngai amyihna, kaimih a ik-oeih pu ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngai law lah.
Sykzoeknaak awh koeh ni sawi khqi nawh, thlakchekhqi anglakawhkawng ni hul khqi lah”
Thlang ing nangmih ak khan awh ik-oeih a sai palh awh qeenkhaw na ming ngai awhtaw, khawk khan nakaw ak awm nangmih a Pa ingawm nangmih ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngai law lawt kaw.
Cehlai, thlang a thawlhnaak ak khan awh qeenkhaw amna ming ngaih awhtaw, nangmih a Pa ingawm nangmih ak khan awh qeenkhaw am ngai tikaw.
Buh nami zeih awh, thlak qaaikqawnkhqi amyihna kawset myi koeh dang sak uh, cekkhqi ingtaw thlang ing buh zeih hy tina seh, ti unawh thlang a mik huh awh ami haai ce a muqu na ta uhy. Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a mi kutdo hly ce hu boeih hawh u hyk tice.
Cehlai nangmih ingtaw buh nami zeih awh nami lusam thiik unawh, nami haai hla uh,
thlanghqing a venawh buh zeih hy tice ang dang naak aham am nawh, mik huh am awh ak awm nami Pa venawh ni buh na zeih, tice ang dang naak aham ni; cawh ni ang hyp ik-oeih sai ak hukung nami Pa ing kutdo a ni peek hly khqi.
Laihqa ingkaw thieek ing ama ainaak thai, quk-aikhqi ing muk nawh a mam quuknaak thai, ve khawmdek awh nami them koeh cun law uh.
Laihqa ingkaw thieek ing ama ainaak thai, khawk khan na nami them ce cun law lah uh.
Ikawtih nami them a awmnaak awh na mik kawlung awm awm kaw.
Mik taw pum a maivang na awm hy. Na mik a leek awhtaw, na pum ce vang boeih kaw.
Cehlai na mik ama leek mantaw, na pum boeih boeih ce than kaw. Na pum awhkaw vangnaak ce a than mai mantaw, ikawpna na pum boeih ce a thannaak kaw!
U ingawm boei pakkhih a bi ce am kqep thai hy. Pynoet ce sawh na kawmsaw pynoet taw lungna kaw, am awhtaw pynoet ce kqihchah na nawh pynoet taw husit kaw. Cemyih lawt na Khawsa ingkaw tangka bi am kqep thai hyk ti.
Cedawngawh ka nik kqawn peek khqi, kawnu ka ai nawh kawnu ka aawk kaw, tinawh nami hqingnaak aham koeh ly unawh; kawnu ka bai ka naak lah kaw, tinawh nami pum aham awm koeh ly uh. Aawk-ai anglakawh hqingnaak, suibai anglakawh pum ve awihtung bet am nu?
Khan nakaw phakhqi ce toek lah uh; quk am saw uhy, caang awm am aat unawh, teep ak khui awh awm am thla uhy, cehlai khawk khan nakaw ak awm nangmih a Pa ing cekkhqi ce hqin hy. Cekkhqi anglakawh nangmih ve nami phu am tlo khqoet nawh nu?
Nangmih ak khuiawh u ingawm a mawnnaak ak caming a hqingnaak khawnoek pynoet ca ing awm a sap bet thai?
Ikawtih nami pum dahnaak awh nami ly? Lo awhkaw lili khqaipai ce toek lah uh. Bi am bi unawh, hla awm am bi uhy.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, vawhkaw lili khqaipai amyihna, Solomon ing a boeimangnaak boeih ing thoeihcam na am awm hy.
Ceamyihna lo awhkaw khuut, tuh-ngawi awh hqing thai moe a ngawi awhtaw qeu nawh mai awh phum aham ak awm za Khawsa ing ak chungdah awhtaw, Aw cangnaak ak zawikhqi, nangmih ak khqoet taw khawzah khqoet na am nik chungdah hlyk khqi nawh nu?
Cedawngawh kawnu ka ai kaw? am awhtaw kawnu ka aawk kaw? Am awhtaw kawnu ka bai ka naak kaw? tinawh koeh ly uh.
Lawkih thlangkhqi ing ni ve myihkhqi ve a mi sui hy, vemyih ik-oeihkhqi ve ngoe u hyk ti tice khawk khan nakaw nangmih a Pa ing sim hy.
A qam ingkaw a dyngnaak ce sui lamma lah uh, cekcoengawh vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve awm ni peek sih khqi bit kaw.
Cedawngawh khawngawi awhkaw aham koeh ly uh, khawngawi ing amah aham ik-oeih ce poek lawt bit kaw. Hypoet aham hypoet awhkaw kyinaak ce khoek hy.
Thlang awi koeh deng, namah awm awideng na awm lawt kawp ti.
Kawtih thlang awi na deng myihna nang awm awi dengnaak hu lawt kawp ti, thlang nyhtahnaak ing nang awm nyhtah na awm lawt kawp ti.
Namah a mik awhkaw myn ak awm ce ak poek kaana, ikaw hamna na koeinaa a mik awhkaw myn veteh ca ak awm ce na toek?
Namah a mik awhkaw myn a awm hyn awh, ikawmyihna na koeinaa a venawh, 'na mik awhkaw myn a dik ve tehca ce lo law vang nyng', na ti naak?
Nang thlang qaai kqawn, namik awhkaw myn ce khoe cang, cawh ni na mik ce ak caih na dang nawh, na koeinaa a mik awhkaw myn tehca ce na lawh hly thai.
Ak caih ik-oeihkhqi ce ui koeh pe uh; na pale lung awm vawkkhqi haiawh koeh khawng uh. Nak khawng mantaw a khaw ing a leh coengawh namah awm ning hawi sih nawh ni cui khup phlet kaw.
Thoeh lah ni pe kaw; sui lah hu kawp ti; khoeng lah nim awng kaw.
U awm ak thoeh ingtaw hu nawh; ak khoeng taw awng peek na awm kaw.
Na ca ing phaihpi a thoeh awh lung ak pe nangmih ak khuiawh na mik awm nu?
Nga a thoeh awh khqui ak pe hly na mik awm nu?
Nangmih thlak thawlh khqi ing za nami cakhqi ik-oeih leek peek aham nami sim awhtaw, khawk khan na ak awm nangmih a Pa ing ak thoehkhqi venawh ik-oeih leek izah ak doem nu a peek khqoet kaw?
Thlang ing nak khan awh ik-oeih leek sai sak aham na ngaih lawt a myihna, thlang ak khan awh ik-oeih leek sai lawt lah, ve ing anaa awi ingkaw tawnghakhqik awi ce cun boeih hy.
Chawmkeng ak ceek ca khuiawh lut lah uh; kawtih chawmkeng kau nawh lam ak kau taw seetnaak benna ak sawikung ni, ce benna ce thlang khawzah cet uhy.
Cehlai chawmkeng ceek nawh lam ak ceek cetaw hqingnaak benna ak sawikung na awm nawh, ce ben ce thlang a khoeh ca doeng ing hu hy.
Tawngha qaaikqawnkhqi ce qalqiing uh. Ak khan awh tuvyn bai hlai uhy, ak khuina taw thailatnaak ing ak be ngentang na awm uhy.
A mingmih ce ak thaih awh hat bit kawm uk ti. U ing nu hling a thing awhkawng misur ak thaih bit khawi nawh, hling dum khui awhkawng thaih qah ak bih khawi?
Thing ak leek awh-kawng thaih leek qah nawh, thing ak che awh-kawng ak thaih che qah lawt hy.
Thing ak leek awhkawng thaih ak che am qah nawh, thing ak che awhkawng thaih leek am qah bai hy.
Thaih leek amak qah thing taw hlu unawh mai awh phum uhy.
Ce myihna ak thaih awhkawng a mingmih ce hat thai bit kawm uk ti.
Ka venawh Bawipa, Bawipa ak ti boeih ing khawk khan am pha kaw, cehlai khawk khan na ak awm ka Pa ak kawngaih ak saikhqi doeng ing ni a pha hly.
Ce a khawnyn awhtaw thlang khawzah ing ka venawh, Bawipa, Bawipa nang ming ing awi kqawn unyng saw, nang ming ing qaaikhqi hqek unyng, kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi am ka mi sai nawh nu? ti kawm uh.
Cawh kai ing cekkhqi venawh, 'Am ni sim khqi nyng. Thawlhnaak ak saikhqi, ka ven awhkawng ak chang na cet uh!' tinak khqi kawng.
Cedawngawh u ingawm vawhkaw kak awih kqawnkhqi ve za nawh a sai awhtaw anih taw lungnu awhkaw im ak sa thlakcyi ing myih hy.
Khaw tlan nawh, tuinu tho, khaw hli nawh im ce buuk seiawm; lungnu awh tung ce ang ling a dawngawh, am tlu hy.
Cehlai u ingawm vawhkaw kak awih kqawnkhqi ve za hlai hy amak sai thlang taw dizui awh im ak sa thlakhqaw ing myih hy.
Khaw aa, tuinu tho nawh khawhli ing im ce a buuk awh, tlu qup hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing ve ak awikhqi ak kqawn boeih coengawh, a cawngpyinaak awh ce thlang kqeng ing amik kawpoek kyi hy.
Caqeekung khqi a cawngpyinaak amyihna am cawngpyi nawh, saithainaak ak ta thlang ing a cawngpyi amyihna anih ingtaw cawngpyi hy.
Tlang awhkawng ak kqum awh, thlang kqeng khawzah ing a hu awh hquut uhy.
Cawh mynqaai ak tlo thlang pynoet law nawh a haiawh khuk sym doena, “Bawipa, na ngaih awhtaw ni qoei sak thai hyk ti,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a kut a zyng coengawh anih ce bi hy. “Ngaih nyng, ciimcaih hlah!” tina hy. Kawlhkalh awh a mynqaai ce qoei tlang hy.
Cawh Jesu ing a venawh, “U a venna awm koeh kqawn moe, ami simnaak aham cet nawh khawsoeih a venawh na pum ce nam huh coengawh, Mosi ak awipeeknaak a myihna ik-oeih nawnnaak ce sai,” tina hy.
Jesu ing Kapernaum khawk khui na a lut awh, qaal boei pynoet ce a venna law nawh, qeennaak thoeh hy.
Bawipa, ka tyihzawih khawn nawh im awh zaih hy, a tlawh nauh hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Law nawh qoei sak bit kawng,” tina hy.
Qaal boei ing a venawh, “Bawipa ka im awh law aham am tyng nyng. Awi doengmah kqawn nawhtaw, ka tyihzawih ce qoei bit kaw.
Kai awm uknaak ak kai awh awm lawt nyng. Cedawngawh pynoet na ce, 'Ceh,' ka tinaak awh cet nawh, thlang chang awm, 'Law,' ka tinaak awh law hy; ka tamnaa awm, 'Ve sai ka tinaak awh,' ka ti awh sai lawt hy,” tina hy.
Cek awi ce Jesu ing ang zaak awh, ak kawpoek kyi nawh, ahu awh ak bangkhqi venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Israel khqing lak awh vemyihna cangnaak ak bau am hu nyng.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, khaw law khaw tlak ben nakawng thlang khawzah law kawm usaw, Abraham, Isak, Jacob mi khawk khan awh buh poei kung awh kutoet na ngawi haih kawm uk ti.
Cehlai ram cakhqi taw kqangnaak ingkaw hatahnaak a awmnaak, a leng ben khawmthannaak awh khawng kawm uh,” tina khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing qaal boei a venawh, “Cet hlah! nak cangnaak amyihna na venawh saina awm seh,” tina hy. Ce a tym qoe awh ce a tyihzawih awm qoei tlang hy.
Piter a im na Jesu a ceh awh, Piter a senu ce a sa tlo nawh zaih hy.
Jesu ing anih ce a kut awh tu hy, cawh anih ce a satlawh ing hlah pahoei hy, tho nawh a mingmih ce do a dan hy.
Khawmy benawh ak kawk khuiawh qaai ak bekhqi ce law pyi uhy, anih ing qaaikhqi ce hqek nawh thlak tlokhqi boeih ce qoei sak hy.
Tawngha Isaiah ing: “Amah ing ningnih tha amak awmkhqi ce lo law nawh, ningnih a tlawhnatnaakkhqi ce phyi law hy,” tinawh ak kqawn ce a cupnaak aham na ni.
A ven awhkaw thlang kqeng ce Jesu ing a huh awh, tuili caqai sa benna ceh aham awi pehy.
Cawh anaa awi cawngpyikung thlang pynoet ce a venawh law nawh, “Cawngpyikung na cehnaak hoei awh bat lawt vang nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Ngentangkhqi ingawm ak khuikawk ta unawh, khan nakaw phakhqi ingawm bu ta uhy, cehlai thlanghqing Capa ingtaw a lutloengnaak awm am tahy,” tina hy.
Ahu awh ak bat thlak chang pynoet ing, “Bawipa cet nyngsaw ka pa pup cang vang nyng,” tina hy.
Cehlai Jesu ing a venawh, “Ka hu awh bat law mai, thlak thi ce thlak thi lawt ing pup mai seh,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh lawng khuina ce lut nawh a hubatkhqi awm lut pahoei lawt uhy.
Cawh poek kaana khawhli khungdeng nawh tuibak ing lawng ce kup phlet hlo hlo hy. Cehlai Jesu taw ip dut dut hy.
A hubatkhqi ing thawh unawh, “Bawipa ni hul khqi lah! Tui awh cum hawh kawng u nyng! tina uhy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Cangnaak ak zawikhqi, kawtih namik kqih?” tinak khqi hy. Cekcoengawh tho nawh khawhli ingkaw tuiphu ce zyi saw, cawhtaw khawhli ingkaw tuiphu ce dym pahoei hy.
Cekkhqi ce amik kawpoek kyi nawh, “Kawmih ak thlang hy voei nu ve? khawhli ingkaw tuiphu ingawm ak awi ngai pe uhy! ti uhy.
Tui caqai ben awh ak awm Gadarin qam ce a pha awh, ak kawk khuiawh qaai ak be thlang pak khih ce phyi awhkawng a venna law hy nih. Cekkqawi ce a ni tlung soeih a dawngawh ce a lam awh u awm am cet thai hy.
Cekkqawi ing anik khy doena, “Khawsa Capa kainih ve ikaw ni ti nak kqawi vang na ti? A tym a khoek hlanawh kainih khuikha sak aham na law nawh nu? tina hy nih.
Cekkhqi ami awmnaak hyn awhkawng a hlanaak bet awh ce vawk khawzah cah uhy.
Qaaikhqi ing a venawh, “kaimih ve nani hqek khqi awhtaw vawkkhqi ak kawk khuiawh ni ceh sak khqi mai,” tinawh qeennaak thoeh uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Cet uh!” tina hy. Cedawngawh cekkhqi ce cawn unawh vawkkhqi ak kawk khuina lut uhy, cawh vawkkhqi boeih ce tuili na hqang awhkawng cawn unawh thi boeih uhy.
Vawk ak khoem thlangkhqi ce khawk khuina dawng unawh cawhkaw ik-oeih ami huhkhqi ingkaw ak kawk khuiawh qaai ak be thlang pakkhih akawng ce thlangkhqi venna kqawn pe uhy.
Cawh khawk khui awhkaw thlangkhqi boeih ce Jesu huh aham cet uhy. Jesu ce ami huh awh, ce a qam ce cehtaak aham a venawh qeennaak thoeh uhy.
Jesu ing lawng ak khuina a lut coengawh, tui ce kat nawh amah a khaw nace cet hy.
Cawh ak khawn thlak tlo pynoet hiphaih awh kawt law uhy. Jesu ing a mingmih ak cangnaak ce a huh awh, ak khawn thlang a venawh, “Ka capa, nang ngaih qep sak, na thawlhnaakkhqi boeih ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngai na awm hawh hy, “tina hy.
Cawh anaa awi ak qeekung thlang vang ing amik kawk khuiawh, “Ve ak thlang ing Khawsa thekha na hy ve!” ti uhy.
Cekkhqi ak kawpoek ce Jesu ing sim nawh, “kawtih namik kawlung khuiawh kawpoek amak leek namik poek?
Hannu ak zoe bet: 'na thawlhnaakkhqi boeih ak khanawh qeenkhaw ngai na awm hawh hy ti,' tive nu?
Cehlai thlanghqing capa ing thawlhnaakkhqi ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngainaak tahy tice nami sim thainaak aham, tina hy.
Cawh anih ce tho nawh a im na cet hy.
Thlang kqeng ing cawhkaw ik-oeih ce ami huh awh amik kawpoek kyi nawh; thlanghqing a venawh vemyihna saithainaak ak pekung Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy.
Ce a hyn awhkawng Jesu taw cet phaat nawh, mangmu cawinaak hyn awh ak ngawi, Mathai ak mingnaak thlang pynoet ce hu hy. A venawh, “Ka hu awh bat law,” tina hy. Anih ce tho nawh ahu awh bat pahoei hy.
Mathai a im awh Jesu ing buh a ai awh, mangmu ak cawi thlangkhqi ingkaw thlak thawlhkhqi khawzah ce law unawh a venawh a hubatkhqi mi kutoet na buh veel haih uhy.
Farasikhqi ing ami huh awh, a hubatkhqi venawh, “Kawtih nangmih a cawngpyikung ing mangmu ak cawikhqi, thlak thawlhkhqi mi buh kutoet na ami ai?” tina uhy.
Ce ak awi ce Jesu ing ang zaak awh, “Sakdip ing Siboei am ngoe nawh, thlak tlo ing ni siboei a ngoe hy.
Cehlai cet unawh, bulnaak kaana qeennaak ni ka ngaih, ti awi ve cawng law lah uh. Kawtih thlak dyng khy aham am law nyng, thlak thawlh khy aham nani ka law” tina hy.
Cawh Johan a hubatkhqi ce a venawh law unawh, “Kawmyihna kaimih ingkaw Farasikhqi ingtaw buh zeih u nyngsaw, nang a hubatkhqi ingtaw buh a mami zeih?”
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Zuk lokung a awm khui awhtaw, zulawh ak ym pyikungkhqi ce amik kaw ak se hly nu? Cehlai cekkhqi ven awhkawng zuk lokung ak chang na ceh pyinaak khawnghyp ce pha law kaw, cawh ce zeih dam bit kawm uk ti.
U ingawm angki khqym ce ak thai ing am bu khawi hy, ak bunaak mai mantaw hi ak thai ing ak khqym ce dawk kawmsaw sek khqoet kaw.
Cemyih lawtna, u ingawm misur tui ak thai ce cikthlyng khqym awh am thun khawi hy. A thun mai mantaw, cikthlyng ce paawk kawmsaw misur tui ce zuut kaw, cikthlyng awm see pahoei kaw. Cedawngawh misur tui ak thai taw cikthlyng thai awh thun uhy, cawhtaw pakkhih bawk na ciimcaih hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve myihna awi ak kqawn huiawh, ukkung thlang pynoet ce a venna law nawh a haiawh khuk sym doena, “Ka canu tuhca phoeih awh thi hy. Cehlai law nawhtaw ak khan awh na kut tloeng pe cang lah, cawhtaw hqing tlaih kaw,” tina hy.
Jesu ing tho nawh anih a hu awh cet pahoei hy, a hubatkhqi awm bat lawt uhy.
Cawh ce kum hqa hlai hih a thi ak tla nu pynoet ce a hu awh law nawh Jesu a hihawi ce bi pe hy.
“A hi mah ka bi mantaw qoei ngai voei nyng,” tinawh poek hy.
Jesu ing hawi ket nawh nu ce toek hy. “Ka canu, nang ngaih qep sak hlah, nak cangnaak ing ni qoei sak hawh hy,” tina hy. Cawh nu ce qoei pahoei hy.
Ukkung a ipkhui na Jesu ing a lut awh khqung ak tumkhqi ingkaw halum habee na ak awm thlang kqeng ce hu hy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Thoeih lah uh. Nuca ve am thi hy, ak ip ni,” tina hy. Cehlai cekkhqi ing qaih na uhy.
Thlang kqeng ce a leng na a ceh sak coengawh, ak khuina lut nawh nuca ce a kut awh tu hy, cawh nu ca ce tho hy.
Cawhkaw awithang ce rampum awh thang khawnghak hy.
Ce a hyn awhkawng Jesu ce ak chang na a ceh awh, mikhyp thlang pakkhih ing, “David capa, kainih ve nim qeen lah,” tinawh khy doena a hu awh hquut hy nih.
Ipkhui na a lut awh, mikhyp qawi ce a venawh law nih nawh, Jesu ing cekqawi a venawh, “Kai ing ve ve sai thai kawng, tinawh nanik cangnaak aw?” tina hy. Cekkqawi ing, “Oeih, Bawipa,” tina hy nih.
Cawh cekqawi a mik ce bi penawh, “Na nik cangnaak a myihna na nik khan awh awm seh nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh a ni mik ce dang pe qawi pahoei hy. Jesu ing, “U a venawh awm koeh kqawn qoe qoe nih moe,” tinawh yn qawi hy.
Cehlai cekqawi ing cet nih nawh anih akawng qam pum awh kqawn khawnghak hy nih.
A khoeh a va ceh awh, ak kawk khuiawh qaai be nawh awi amak pau thai thlang pynoet ce Jesu a venna law pyi uhy.
Ak kawk khui awhkaw qaai ce Jesu ing a hqek peek coeng awhtaw, ce ak thlang ce awi pau thai tlaih hy. Cawhkaw ak awm thlang kqeng ce amik kawpoek kyi nawh, “Israel ram khuiawh ve mih ve am awm man hy,” ti uhy.
Cehlai Farasikhqi ing, “Qaaikhqi boei ak caming ni qaaikhqi a hqek hy,” tina uhy.
Khawk bau ingkaw vangcakhqi awh Jesu ing cet nawh Sinakawk awh thlangkhqi ce cawngpyi hy, ram awithang leek ce ak kqawn coengawh, tlawhnaak soepkep ingkaw sa amak dip thlangkhqi ce qoei sak hy.
Thlang kqeng ce a huh awh, khoemkung amak awm, amah a ngaih ngaih na ak plam, tha amak awm tuukhqi myihna a mi awm a dawngawh qeen khqi hy.
Cawh ve ak awi ve a hubatkhqi venawh, “Cang ah aham khawzah awm hlai hy, bibikung zawi ca hy.
Cedawngawh lo ak takung ing cang ak aat aham bibikung khawzah a lo khuiawh a tyihnaak aham thoeh lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
A venawh thlanghqa hlai hih tloek ce khy nawh qaih chekhqi hqek thainaak ingkaw tlawhnat soepkep qoei sak thainaak ce pehy.
Ceityih thlanghqa hlaihih tloek ang mingkhqi taw; Lamma cyk awh, (Piter tinawh amik khy) Simon ingkaw ana Andrew; Zebedi a caqawi Jakop ingkaw ana Johan;
Philip ingkaw Batholomu; Thomas ingkaw mangmu ak cawi Mathai; Alfai capa Jakob ingkaw Thaddai,
Zealot ami ti Simon ingkaw amah thlang a kut awh ak pekung Judah Isakariot vetloek ve khy hy.
Vawhkaw thlanghqa hlaihih tloek ve Jesu ing tyi nawh vemyihna yn khqi hy: Gentelkhqi venawh koeh cet unawh Samaria khaw khuiawh awm koeh lut uh.
Tuu ak qeeng Isarelkhqi venawh cet uh.
Nami ceh awh, khawkkhan taw zoe hawh hy, tinawh kqawn uh.
Thlak tlokhqi qoei sak uh, thlak thikhqi thawh uh, mynqaaikhqi caih sak uh. A zoe na nami huh ce, a zoe na pe lawt uh.
Sui awm tangka awm am awhtaw qawhum awm cawi zennaak awh koeh khyn uh;
Khin cehnaak aham sawngsa, angki pakkhih, khawmyk ingkaw sawnghqawl awm koeh khyn uh; kawtih bi ak bi ingtaw amah ang khuut qunaak ce huh aham tyng hy.
Khawk bau awh am awhtaw vangca awh aw nami kunnaak hoei awh, nami pahnaak aham ak tyng im ce sui unawh cawh ce pah uh, ak chang na nami ceh hlan khui awhtaw cawh ce awm poe uh.
Ipkhui pynoet oet awh nami lut awh ce, awih leek ing voem law uh.
Ce a im awh ngaihqepnaak a awm aham a tyng awhtaw ngaihqepnaak ce pe law uh; cehlai ama tyng awhtaw ngaihqepnaak ce lat tlaih uh.
U ingawm amni ym unawh namik awi awm ama ming ngai awhtaw, cawhkaw im am awhtaw ce a khaw ce nami cehtaak awh, thlak thawlh na awm unawh awidengnaak a mi huh aham awm hy tice huhsaknaak aham nami khaw awhkaw dekpli ce khqoek sih uh.
Awitak kak nik kqawn peek khqi, awidengnaak nyn awh Sodom ingkaw Gamorah khaw taw ce a khaw anglakawh ana boe bet kaw.
Ngentangkhqi anglakawh tuu myihna ni tyi khqi nyng. Cedawngawh khqui a myihna nami cyih ta unawh khqukkhqu a myihna awm moel moel uh.
Thlang awh ce naming ngaih ta uh; awidengnaak kung awh ni khyn khqi kawm usaw Sinakawk khqi awh ni vyk khqi kawm uh.
Kai a simpyikung na a mingmih ingkaw Gentelkhqi venawh ami awm naak thai aham qam ukkungkhqi ingkaw sangpahqang khqi venawh nangmih ce ni sawi khqi kaw.
Cehlai nangmih ce a mim tu khqi awh, kawk awi nu kqawn nawh ikawmyihna kak kqawnnaak kaw, tice koeh mawn uh. Namik kqawn hly kawi ce amah cawh qoe awh ni pek khqi bit kaw,
kawtih nangmih ing am kqawn kawm u tiksaw, nangmih a Pa ang Myihla ing ni nangmih awhkawng ak kqawn hly.
Koeinaa ing a koeinaa, ami pakhqi ing a cakhqi thih sak aham thlang a kut awh pe kawm uh; cakhqi ing nu a pakhqi qaal na kawm usaw thih sak aham thlang a kut awh pe kawm uh.
Kai a dawngawh thlang boeih ing ni sawh nak khqi kaw, cehlai a dytnak dy ak yh ak thlang taw hul na awm kaw.
Hun pynoet awh a ni thekhanaak khqi awhtaw ak chang na centa patoe uh. Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlanghqing Capa a law hlanawh Isarel khawk baukhqi am hqil boeih kawm uk ti.
Ak cawngkung ing cawngpyikung ak khan awh am awm hy, tyihzoeih awm a boei ak khan awh am awm hy.
Ak cawngkung ing cawngpyikung myihna, tyihzoeih ing a boei myihna a awm ce khoek hy. Im ak takung za Belzabub tinawh amik khy awhtaw, a cakawkhqi khqoet ikawmyihna amik khy paikaw!
Cedawngawh cekkhqi ve koeh kqih uh. Kawtih ikaw awm a mang dang naak aham dah khoep ingkaw ama sim naak aham thuh thai am awm kaw.
Than awh ka nik kqawn peek khqi ve dai awh kqawn lah uh; nami haakung awh ang hyp na ka nik kqawn peek khqi ve, iptih nakawng kqawn uh.
Pum taw him thai hlai uhy, Myihla amak him thai khqi ce koeh kqih uh. Cehlai Myihla ingkaw pum pakkhih na hell khuina ak qeeng sak thai ce kqih khqoet lah uh.
Hqitca pakkhih ce qawhum tangka pekhat na zawi unawh nu? Cehlai khawk khan awhkaw nangmih a Pa kawngaih am awhtaw pynoet ca awm dek na am tla hy.
Nangmih a lu awhkaw lusam awm noet boeih hy.
Cedawngawh koeh kqih uh; nangmihtaw hqitca anglakawh nami phu tlo khqoet hy.
Thlang a haiawh kai anik dyih pyi taw khawk khan na ka Pa haiawh dyih pyi lawt kawng.
Cehlai u awm thlang a haiawh anik qoeng taw, khawk khan na ka Pa haiawh qoeng lawt kawng.
Khawmdek awh qoepnaak awm sak aham kai ve law hy, tinawh koeh poek uh. Qoepnaak am haw law nyng saw, cimca ni ka haw law.
Kawtih kai a dawngawh “thlang ing a pa ce qaal nakaw, canu ing a nu ce qaal na nawh, langa ing a ci ce qaal nakaw-
a ipkhui nawn awhkaw thlang ce amah a qaal na awm sak aham nani,” ka law.
U awm kai anglakawh a pa aw a nu aw ak lungnaak ak thlang taw kai ak thlang na am kawih hy; u awm a canu aw a capa aw kai anglakawh ak lungnaak thlang taw kai ak thlang na am kawih hy;
u awm amah a thinglam kawh doena kai a hu awh amak bat ak thlang taw kai ak thlang na am kawih hy.
U awm a hqingnaak ak hul ak thlang taw a hqingnaak ce hlawng kawmsaw, u awm kai a dawngawh a hqingnaak ce ak hlawng ak thlang ingtaw hu kaw.
”Nangmih anik do thlang taw kai a nik do thlang na awm nawh, kai anik do thlang taw kai anik tyikung ak do thlang na awm hy.
U awm tawngha ce tawngha na a awm dawngawh ak do thlang taw tawngha a kutdo hu kaw. U awm thlak dyng ce thlak dyng na a awm dawngawh ak do ak thlang taw thlak dyng a kutdo ce hu lawt kaw.
U ingawm vawhkaw thlak zawicakhqi khui awhkaw thlang pynoet a venawh kai a hubat na a awm dawngawh tuihding boet oet awm a peek awhtaw, awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, kutdo ce am myh tikaw,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a hubat thlanghqa hlaihih a venawh awi ak kqawn coengawh, ce a hyn awhkawng Kalili khawkhqi awh thlang cawngpyi aham ingkaw awi kqawn aham cet hy.
Johan ing Jesu a bibinaak ce thawngim nakawng ang zaak awh, a hubatkhqi ce tyi nawh doet sak hy.
“Nang ve ak law hly kawi a ming ngaih-u thlang ce hawh nu, am awhtaw thlak chang ka mik ngaih-u hly hyn nu?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Voei unawh na ming zaak ingkaw nami huhkhqi ce Johan a venawh kqawn pe uh:
Mikhypkhqi mik dai nawh, khawk khemkhqi cet uhy, mynqaaikhqi awm ciim nawh, hakpangkhqi haa khui hy, thlak thikhqi tho unawh, hahqahkhqi ing awithang leek ce za hawh uhy.
U awm kai ak camawh amak tlu thlangkhqi taw ami zoseen hy,” tina hy.
Johan a hubatkhqi ce ami ceh coengawh, Jesu ing thlang kqeng a venawh Johan akawng ce kqawn pehy; “Ikaw huh nami ngaih awh nu qamkoh na nami ceh? Paipoeng zilh ing a zawn huh nami ngaih awh nu?
Am awhtaw, ikaw huh nami ngaih awh nu nami ceh? Suibai ak nep nep ing ak thoeihcam qu thlang huh nami ngaih awh nu? Amni, suibai ak nep nep ing ak thoeihcam qu taw sangpahrang a im awh ni a awm.
Cawhtaw ikaw huh nami ngaih awh nu nami ceh? Tawngha aw? Oeih, ka nik kqawn peek khqi, tawngha anglakawh tawngha khqoet ce ni.
Anih akawng ce ve myihna ana qee hyt hawh hy: “Nangmih a haiawh ka dyihthing laipai ce tyi law kawng nyngsaw, anih ing a haiawh lam qoek abah law kaw,” tinawh qee hyt na awm hawh hy.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi: nu ing a canaak thlang anglakawh Baptisma ak pekung Johan anglakawh ak bau khqoet thlang am awm hlan hy; cehlai khawk khan awh ak zawi khyt na ak awm ce Johan anglakawh bau khqoet hy.
Baptisma ak pekung Johan a awm awhkawng tuh dy awh, khawk khan ing thekhanaak ce ana hu hy, tha ak awm thlangkhqi ing a thama na hul uhy.
Ikawtih tawnghakhqi boeih ingkaw anaa awi ing Johan dy ni awi ami nak kqawn.
Do aham nami ngaih mai mantaw, anih cetaw ak law hly kawi Elijah hawh ni.
U awm zaaknaak haa ak ta ingtaw za seh nyng.
Vawhkaw cadilkhqi ve ikaw ing nu ka nyhtah lah voei? Ik-oeih ami zawihnaak hyn awh ak ngawi naasenkhqi ing ak chang naasenkhqi venawh:
“Kqung ka mi tum awh awm, am lam u hyk ti; kqahlung ka mik chat law awh awm, am ko am kqang u hyk ti,” tinawh amik khy ing myih hy.
Johan ce law nawh am aw am ai hlai hy, “Qaai tahy,” tina uhy.
Thlanghqing Capa law nawh nu a ai hy, cawh, aimaw aawk maw, misur tui ak sawk, mangmu ak cawikhqi ingkaw thlak thawlhkhqi a pyi, tina uhy. Cehlai cyihnaak ingtaw a sainaak awh dang sak hy, tina hy.
Cekcoengawh kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khawzah a sainaak khawkhqi ce a maming zut a dawngawh zyi khqi hy.
Korazin khaw map hyk ti! Bethesaida khaw map hyk ti! Nangnih ak khuiawh sai na ak awm kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ve Tura ingkaw Sidon khaw awh sai na a awm mantaw, maa deng awh dipche byng unawh, vyt awh ang zeet doena zut hawh voei uh.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, awidengnaak nyn awh Tura ingkaw Sidon khaw ce nangnih anglakawh ana boe bet kawm nih.
Cekcoengawh nang, Kapernuam, khawnghi dyna nak zoek qu hly tang nu? Hell na man na nung tlaak kaw. Nak khuiawh saina ak awm kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ce Sodom khaw awh saina ana awm mantaw, tuhngawi dy awh ak awm hly awm ni hlai hy voei.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, awidengnaak nyn awh Sodom khaw ce nang anglakawh ana boe bet kaw tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing, “Aw ka pa, khan ingkaw khawmdek Bawipa, nang ce nim kyihcah nyng, nang ing ik-oeihkhqi ve thlak cyikhqi ingkaw thlak thoemkhqi a ven awhkawng thuh nawh naasenkhqi venawh dang sak hyk ti.
Oeih, ka pa, ve ve nak kawngaih ik-oeih ni.
Ka pa ing ik-oeih boeih boeih ce ka venawh ni pe hawh hy. Pa am kaa taw u ingawm capa ce am sim nawh, Pa ce sim aham Capa ing ak tyh thlang am kaataw u ingawm Pa ce am sim hy.
Nangmih phyihqih ak phyikhqi ingkaw ak khuikhakhqi aw, ka venna law lah uh, dymnaak ni pek khqi vang.
Kai a phyih ve phyi unawh, ka venawh cawng law lah uh, kawdaw ingkaw kawdung thlang na ka awm dawngawh, nami lingbyi dymnaak ce hu kawm uk ti.
Ikawtih ka phyih ve nep nawh ka phyihqih ve awm zang hy,” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu taw Sabath nyn awh lo awhkawng cet hy. A hubatkhqi ing amik phoen cawi nawh caangvui ce dy unawh ai uhy.
Farasikhqi ing ami huh awh, a venawh “Toek lah, Sabath nyn awh sai aham amak ciim ce na hubatkhqi ing sai uhy,” tina uhy.
Cehlai, a mingmih a venawh, “David ing a pyikhqi mi amik phoen a cawih awhkaw ik-oeih ami sai ce namik noet khawi nu?
Anih ing Khawsa ipkhui na lut nawh, khawsoeihkhqi doeng ing ami ai khawi phaihpi ce, amah ingkaw a pyikhqi ing a mami ai hly kawi phaihpi ami ai ce?
Sabath nyn awh tempul khuiawh khawsoeihkhqi ing Sabath am zeih hlai uhy, coet akap kaana ami awm ce, anaa cabu khuiawh am nami noet khawi nawh nu?
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi bawkim anglakawh ak bau khqoet ce vawh awm hy.
Bulnaak anglakawh qeennaak ni ka ngaih,' ti ak awi ve naming zaaksim mantaw, ak awm moel moel ak thlang ce am thawlh sak hlai voei uk ti.
Kawtih thlanghqing Capa taw Sabath Bawi na awm hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ce a hyn ce cehta nawh, a mingmih a Sinakawk khuina ce cet hy,
cawh kut ak kheem thlang pynoet ce ana awm hy. Jesu ce thawlh amik puk thainaak aham, “Sabath nyn awh thlak tlo qoei sak ve ak caih nu?” tinawh doet uhy.
A mingmih venawh, “Nangmih ak khuiawh thlang pynoet ing tuu pynoet ta mai lah seh, cawhkaw a tuu ce Sabath nyn awh lawkkhqawng na ang tlaak mantaw am na mik dawk hly aw?
Cawhtaw thlanghqing ve tuu anglakawh izah nu a phu a awm khqoet! Cedawngawh Sabath nyn awh ik-oeih leek sai ve thym hy,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw thlang venawh, “Na baan ce zyng lah,” tina hy. Anih ing a baan ce a zyng awh a kut ce akut langben amyihna leek pahoei hy.
Cehlai Farasikhqi taw cawn unawh ikawmyihna nu amah ve ni him naak thai lah voei, tinawh doet qu uhy.
Jesu ing ce ce a sim dym a dawngawh, ce a hyn ce cehta hy. Thlang kqeng khawzah ing ahu awh bat uhy, anih ing cekkhqi a tlawhnaakkhqi boeih ce qoei sak hy,
anih a u nu tice a mamik kqawnnaak aham yn khqi hy.
Tawngha Isaiah ing anak kqawn awi ce a cupnaak thai aham vemyihna awm hy:
Ve ve ka tyihzoeih thlak tyh, lungna nawh ka ym soeih ni; kang Myihla ce ak khan awh ta kawng nyngsaw, anih ing thymnaak ram tawm awh kqawn kaw.
Anih taw am tlaai kawmsaw khy awm am khy kaw; lam awh anih ak awi ce u ingawm am za kaw.
Anih ing thymnaak ing a noeng hlandy, paipoeng akawng ak pleep ce ap kqai poet kawmsaw, thut awhkaw maikhu awm am thi zip kaw.
Ang ming awh qam tawm thlang ing ngaih-unaak ta kawm uh, a ti ceni.
Cawh ak kawk khuiawh qaai be nawh mik ak hyp awi awm ak myh thlang pynoet ce, a venawh law pyi uhy, Jesu ing anih ce qoei sak nawh awi awm a pau thai pahoei coengawh amik awm dang pe pahoei hy.
Cawhkaw ak awm thlang kqeng ce a ming ngaih kyi nawh, “Ve ak thlang ve David a capa hy voei nu?” ti uhy.
Cehlai Farasikhqi ing ce ak awi a ming zaak awh, “Ve ak thlang ing ve qaai boei Belzabub ak caming ni qaaikhqi a hqek,” tina uhy.
A mingmih ak kawpoek ce Jesu ing sim nawh a mingmih a venawh, “Kawmih a qam awm ak khuiawh a ming phekbo qu awhtaw am dyi thai hy.
Setan ing Setan ce a hqek mantaw, amah ingkaw amah qaal qu nawn kawm nih saw ikawpna a qam ang dyih thai kaw?
Kai ing Belzabub ak caming qaaikhqi ka hqek awhtaw, namik thlangkhqi ing u ak caming nu qaaikhqi ami hqek lawt?
Kai ing Khawsa Myihla ing qaaikhqi ce ka hqek awhtaw Khawsa qam taw nangmih ak khan awh pha hawh hy.
Ikawmyihna thlang ing ip takung thak awm soeih ce a pin hlan awh a im ce muk penawh a ik-oeihkhqi ce a lawh naak peek thai kaw? A pin coengawh man a im ce a muk peek thai kaw.
Kai ama nik bawng taw kai anik qaalnaak thlang na awm nawh, kai ama nik cawipyi taw ak thehkung na awm hy.
Cedawngawh ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thawlhnaak soepkep ingkaw Khawsa ak kqawnseet thlangkhqik khan awh qeenkhaw ngainaak awm kaw, cehlai Ciim Myihla ak kqawnseet thlang ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngainaak am awm kaw.
U awm thlanghqing Capa ak kqawnseet taw qeenkhaw ngai na awm hlai moe, Ciim Myihla ak kqawnseet taw tuh awm, ak law hly kawi a tym awh awm qeenkhaw ngainaak am awm kaw.
”Thing ak leek awhkawng thaih leek qah nawh, thing ak che awhkawng thaih che qah lawt hy, ak thaih awhkawng thing ce sim uhy.
Nangmih khqui a cadilkhqi, nangmih thlak chekhqi ing ikawmyihna ik-oeih leek namik kqawnnaak qoe kaw? Kawlung ak khui awhkaw ak awm ik-oeih ceni nim kha ingawm ak kqawn.
Thlak leek ing a ik-oeih leek ak khui awhkawng a ik-oeih leek ce hawlaw nawh, thlak che ing a ik-oeih che ak khui awhkawng ik-oeih amak leek ce hawlaw lawt hy.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlangkhqi ing awi ak poek ceet kaana amik kqawnnaak awh ce awidengnaak nyn awh kqawn caih sak tlaih na awm kaw.
Nak awi ak caming cang kawm tiksaw nak awi ak caming dawk kawp ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh Farasikhqi ingkaw anaa awi ak qeekungkhqi ing a venawh, “Cawngpyikung, nang ak kawpoek kyi ik-oeih sai huh aham,” tina uhy.
Cehlai a mingmih a venawh, “Thlak leek am ingkaw samphaih cadilkhqi ingtaw kawpoek kyi hatnaakkhqi ce thoeh uhy! Tawngha Jonah ak kawpoek kyi hatnaak am taw ak chang hatnaak peek na am awm kaw.
Kawtih Jonah taw ngak bau ak phoen khuiawh hyp thym ingkaw than thum awm hy, cemih lawtna thlanghqing Capa awm dek khuiawh awm lawt kaw.
Nenivi khaw awhkaw thlangkhqi ce vawhkaw cadilkhqi mi awidengnaak khawnyn awh dyi haih kawm usaw cekkhqi ing dawk sak kawm uh; kawtih cekkhqi taw Jonah ak awih kqawnnaak awh zut uhy, ngai lah uh, Jonah anglakawh ak bau khqoet ce vawh awm hy.
Khan ben nakaw Sangpahrang nu ce ve canukhqi mi awidengnaak nyn awh dyi haih kawm usaw anih ing vekkhqi ve dawk sak khqi kaw; kawtih anih taw Solomon a cyihnaak awi ak ngai na khawmdek a dytnaak nakawng law hy; ngai lah uh, Solomon anglakawh ak bau khqoet ce vawh awm hy.
“Thlang ak kawk khui awhkawng qaih che ce ak cawn coengawh, tui ama awmnaak hunkhqi na cet nawh dymnaak ce sui hy, cehlai am hu hy.
Cedawngawh vemyihna tihy, 'ka cehtaak im na hlat tlaih vang nyng,' ti hy. Ang hlat tlaih awh im ak caihping ak hoeng ce hu hy.
Amah anglakawh ak che khqoet qaaikhqi ce kun pyi nawh, cawh awm uhy. Cawhtaw ce ak thlang ce ak cyk awh kawng lak awh nauh khqoet hy. Cemyihna vawhkaw thlak che cadilkhqi venawh awm lawt kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing thlang kqeng a venawh awi ak kqawn huiawh a nu ingkaw a koeinaakhqi ce a venawh awi kqawn aham a leng na dyi uhy.
Thlang pynoet ing a venawh, “Na nu ingkaw na koeinaakhqi ing na venawh awi kqawn aham a leng na dyi uhy,” tina hy.
Cehlai awi ak kqawn peekkung a venawh, “Ka nu ingkaw ka koeinaakhqi ce ukhqi nu? tina hy.
A hubatkhqi ce a kut ing khi nawh, “Vekkhqi ve ka nu ingkaw ka koeinaakhqi hawh ni!
U awm khawk khan awhkaw ka Pa ak kawngaih ak sai boeih taw ka koeinaakhqi ingkaw ka nu na awm hy,” tina hy.
Ce nyn awh Jesu taw im awhkawng cet nawh tuili kengawh ngawi hy.
Cawh thlang khawzah a venawh cun uhy, cedawngawh lawng khuina cet nawh ngawi hy, thlang kqeng taw tuili kengawh dyi uhy.
A mingmih a venawh nyttahawi ing awi khawzah kqawn pek khqi hy; “Lo toenkung pynoet taw camci ak theh na cet hy.
Camci ce ak theh awh a vang taw lam awh tla nawh, phakhqi ing cung boeih uhy.
A vang taw lungpeei ak khan awh tla hy; dek a pam a dawngawh cawt pahoei hy.
Cehlai khawling a hlawk law awhtaw, ak kqa ama cak a dawngawh khawk hlawk ing a hut awh qeu pahoei hy.
A vang taw hlik plup awh tla hy, hling ce saang law nawh caang ce eek hy.
Camci a vang taw laitak awh tla nawh, vui hy - zakhat, khqukkip ingkaw thumkip dy na pung hy.
Haa ak ta ingtaw za seh,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubatkhqi venawh law unawh, “kawtih thlang kqeng a venawh nyttahawi ing awi nak kqawn peek khqi? tinawh doet uhy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Khan qam awihyp sim thainaak cyihnaak ce nangmih a venawh peek na awm hawh hy, cehlai a mingmih a ven awhtaw am pe hy.
U awm khan qam awihyp cyihnaak ak ta taw sap pe tanoel kawmsaw khawzah papa ta kaw. Cehlai u awm amak ta taw ataak chyn awm lawh pekawng.
Cawhmaw a mingmih a venawh taw nyttahawi awi ing kak kqawn peek khqi: “Hu hlai uhy, am hat uhy; za hlai uhy, am za thai unawh ang zaak na awm am zasim uhy.
A mingmih a dawngawh tawngha Isaiah ing: “Ang zaak nataw za hlai voei uk ti, am zasim kawm uk ti; hu taw hu hlai voei uk ti, am hat kawm uk ti.
Ikawtih ve ak thlangkhqi kawlung ve mawh hqoeng hy; a ming haakhqi ing za kaa hlai uhy, ami mik ce hiim uhy. Ce ap kaa mantaw ami mik ing hu kawm usaw, a ming haa ing za hau kawm uh, kawlung ing zasim kawm usaw huna a ming voei coengawh, qoei sak khqi hau kawng, tinawh anak kqawn ceni.
Cehlai nangmih a mik taw ami huh thai a dawngawh a zoseen hy.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nangmih ing nami huh ve tawngha khawzah ingkaw thlak dyng khawzah ing huh aham ana ngaih hlai uhy, naming zaak ve zaak ana ngaih hlai uhy, am za uhy.
“Cawhtaw camci theh nyttahawi ing ak kqawn ngaihnaak awi ve ngai lah uh:
U ingawm khawk khan awithang ce za hlai uhy am zasim uhy, cawh ak kawlung khuiawh theh na ak awm awithang leek ce qaai ing qawt pe valh hy. Vetaw lam awh ak tla camci ing myih hy.
Lungpeei awh ak tla camci taw, thlang ing awi ce ang zaak awh zeel doena do pahoei hy.
Cehlai ak kqa ama taak a dawngawh, kawlhkalh ca doeng awm hy. Ce ak awi dawngawh kyinaak ingkaw thekhanaakkhqi a pha law awh ce tlu pahoei hy.
Hlik plup awhkaw ak tla camci taw, awi ce za hlai hy, ve khawmdek khan hqingnaak awh mawn atang nawh qaai kqawnnaak ingkaw boei a mangnaak ing awi ce a eek a dawngawh thaih am qah thai hy.
Laitak awhkaw ak tla camci taw awi ce ang zaak awhkawng ak zasim ak thlang na awm hy; ak thaih qah nawh a vang taw a let zakhat, a vang khqukkip, a vang taw thumkip dyna pung hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing ak chang nyhtahnaak awi ce a mingmih a venawh kqawn bai hy: “Khawk khan taw thlang pynoet ing a lo awh camci a saw ing myih hy.
Cehlai a mi ih tloek awh ami qaal ce law nawh cang anglakawh beei ak ui ce theh awh cehtaak hy.
Caang ce cawt nawh a vui ak thaih law awhtaw, beei awm cawt law lawt hy.
Cawh lokung a tyihzawihkhqi ce a venawh law unawh, 'Bawipa, ak leek ni na lo awh nak theh hlai. Hanakaw beeikhqi nu ak cawt hy voei?' tina uhy.
“A mingmih a venawh, 'Qaal ing ni a sai hawh hy ce,' tina hy. A tyihzawihkhqi ing, 'cawhtaw cet unyng seitaw phu mai vang unyng aw? tina uhy.
Cehlai lokung ing, “amni, beei ce nami phuk mantaw cang awm phuk sih hau kawm uk ti.
Caang ah hlan dy taw cawt haih mai cang seh. Cang ah awhtaw cang aatkhqi venawh, 'Beeikhqi ce phu ma unawh, mai awh phum aham ak nep na tum uh, cang taw teep ak khuiawh chan uh, tina bit kawng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh a mingmih a venawh nyhtahnaak awi ak chang ce kqawn pek khqi bai hy: “Khan qam taw antlam cii ce thlang ing lo nawh a lo awh ak theh ing myih hy.
Ce antlam cii taw ak ui boeih boeih anglakawh ak zawi soeih na awm hlai hy, a cawt law awhtaw beei ak chang boeihkhqi anglakawh ak bau soeih na awm hy, khan nakaw phakhqi ce law unawh a paangkhqi awh cu uhy,” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih a venawh nyhtahnaak awi ak chang kqawn pe bai hy: “Khan qam taw nu pynoet ing hen lo nawh vaidam dawn khui thum a zamnaak boeih aham vaidam awh a phul ing myih hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve Jesu ing nyhtahnaak awi ing thlang kqeng a venawh kqawn pehy; nyhtahnaak awi kaana a mingmih a venawh ikaw pynoet awm ap kqawn pehy.
Cedawngawh tawngha ing: “Nyhtahnaak awikhqi ing, khawmdek a syn cyk awhkawng thuh na ak awmkhqi ce kqawn kawng,” tinawh anak kqawn ce cup sak hy.
Cekcoengawh thlang kqeng ce cehta nawh ipkhui na lut hy. Cawh a hubatkhqi ce a venna law unawh, “Lo awhkaw beei nyhtahnaak awi nak kqawn ce kaimih aham kqawn caih lah,” tina uhy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Camcik leek ak thehkung taw thlanghqing Capa ni.
Lo taw ve khawmdek ni, camcik leek taw a qam cakhqi ak kqawnnaak ni. Beeikhqi taw thlak thawlh a cakhqi ni,
a mingmih ak thehkung cetaw qaai ni. Cang ah cetaw khawmdek a dytnaak, cang ak aatkungkhqi cetaw khan ceityihkhqi ni.
“Beeikhqi ce phu boeih nawh mai awh amik phum amyihna khawmdek a dyt awh ce amyihna ce awm lawt kaw.
Thlanghqing Capa ing ak khan ceityihkhqi ce tyi kawmsaw, thawlhnaak ak saikhqi ingkaw ik-oeih amak leek ak saikhqi ce a qam khui awhkawng caawi kaw.
Thii a tui na ami hloeinaak mai khuiawh a mingmih ce khaawng khqi kaw, cawh ce kqangnaak ingkaw hatahnaak ce awm kaw.
Cekcoengawh thlak dyngkhqi taw a mi pa a qam awh khawmik amyihna vang hawh kawm uh. Haa ak takhqi ingtaw za seh nyng.
Khan qam taw lo awhkaw qo thuh ing myih hy. Cawhkaw qo ce thlang pynoet ing a huh awh thuh tlaih nawh, cekcoengawh zeel doena cet nawh a taak ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce zawi nawh cawhkaw lo ce thlai hy.
Cekcoeng baiawh, khan qam taw phuk tlo pale ak suikung them ak zaawi ing myih hy.
Anih ing pale lung phu ak tlo soeih ce a huh awh, cet nawh a taakkhqi boeih ce zawi nawh thlai hy.
“Cek coeng bai awh, khan qam taw tuili awh lawk khawng nawh nga soepkep ak kaawi ing myih hy.
Lawk awh nga a be awh ce peem awh chan unawh nga ak che taw khaawng uhy.
Khawmdek a dyt awhtaw ce amyihna ce awm lawt kaw. Khan ceityihkhqi law kawm usaw thlak dyngkhqi anglakawhkawng thlak thawlhkhqi ce hoep khqi kaw;
cekkhqi ce a tui hloeinaak maih khuina khaawng kaw, ce a hyn awh kqangnaak ingkaw haatahnaak ce awm kaw,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve namik zasim nu?” tinawh doet khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Oeih, Bawipa,” tina uhy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Cedawngawh khan qam akawng kqawn peek na ak awm cawng saknaak awi ak qeekungkhqi boeih taw iptakung ing a ipkhui awhkawng a khawhthem ak khqym ak thai ak chet pheng ing myih hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awikhqi ak kqawn boeih coengawh, ce a hyn ce cehta hy.
Amah a khaw na ce law nawh Sinakawk awh ce thlang cawngpyi hy, cawh a mingmih ce a ming ngaih kyi hy.” Ve ak thlang ing hana kaw vemyih cyihnaak ingkaw kawpoek kyi ik-oeih saithainaakkhqi a taak hy voei?” ti uhy.
“Anih ve thing aatkung a capa am nu? Anu awm Meri am nu ve, a koeinaakhqi Jakop, Joseph, Simon ingkaw Juda am nu ve?
A koeinukhqi awm ningnih a venawh amik awm haih lawt am nu ve? Ve ak thlang ing vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi hana kaw a huh hy voei?” ti uhy.
Ak khan awh amik kaw am zeel hy. Cehlai Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Tawngha taw amah a khaw ingkaw amah a im am awhtaw zoeksangna am awm man hy,” tina hy.
Cangnaak a mami taak a dawngawh ce a hyn awh kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khawzah am sai hy.
Cawh Herod sangpahrang ing Jesu akawng ce za hy.
Cedawngawh a tyihzoeih a venawh, “Anih ce thihnaak awhkawng ak tho tlaih Baptisma ak pekung Johan hawh ni! Cawh ni kawpoek kyi ik-oeih saithainaakkhqi anih awh a awm hy,” tihy.
Herod ing a na Philip a zu Herodi akawng awh Johan ce tu nawh ak khih coengawh thawngim na thla hy,
Johan ing “Na na a zu na zuna na lawh ce am thym hy,” a tinaak dawngawh ce myihna ce sai hy.
Thlang kqeng ing Johan ce tawngha tinawh amik poek a dawngawh, Johan ce him aham ngaih hlai uhy, thlang kqeng ce kqih hy.
Cehlai Herod a thangnaak khawnyn a pha awh, Herod a canu ce a mingmih a haiawh lam sak nawh Herod ce ak kaw zeel sak hy,
Cedawngawh cawhkaw nuca ing a ngaih saqui ce peek aham awikamnaak tahy.
Nuca ing a nu a cuih amyihna, “Baptisma ak pekung Johan a lu ce beihdung awh ni pe,” tina hy.
Cawh taw sangpahrang ce ak kaw se hy, cehlai mybuh amik veel haih khinkhqi haiawh awi ana kam hawh a dawngawh nuca ing a ngaih amyihna peek aham awi pehy,
