thlang tyi nawh thawngim khui awhkaw Johan a lu ce hlyng sak hy.
A lu ce beihdung awh hawlaw pe unawh nuca ce pe uhy.
Johan a hubatkhqi ce law unawh a qawk ce a mi khyn coengawh pup uhy. Cekcoengawh cet unawh Jesu a ven awh kqawn pe uhy.
Ce ak awi ce Jesu ing ang zaak awh, thlang a dingnaak na lawng ing cet valh hy. Thlangkhqi ing a ming zaak awh, khawk khui awhkawng khaw ing cet unawh hquut uhy.
Jesu ing kawngceng a pha awhtaw thlang kqeng ce hu hy, cawh a mingmih ce am qeen khqi soeih a dawngawh, thlak tlokhqi ce qoei sak hy.
Khaw a my law awhtaw, a hubatkhqi ce a venna law unawh, “Ve ve kqawng lak na awm nawh, khaw awm my hawh hy. Cedawngawh thlang kqeng ve ceh sak hlah, khawk khuina cet u seitaw a mimah ing buh a an awm thlai useh,” tina uhy.
Cehlai Jesu ing, “A mingmih a mi ceh am ngaih hy. Nangmih ing ai kawi pe uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing a venawh, “Phaihpi cun nga ingkaw nga lunghih doeng ni ka mi taak,” tina uhy,
Cekkhqi venawh, “Ka venna hawlaw lah uh,” tina hy.
Taaitin awh thlang kqeng ce ngawih sak aham awi pehy. Phaihpi cun nga ingkaw nga lunghih ce a lawh coengawh khan benna mang nawh, zeelnaak awi ak kqawn coengawh phaihpi ce ek hy. Cekcoengawh phaihpi ce a hubatkhqi venawh pehy, a hubatkhqi ing thlang kqeng a venawh teei patoeng uhy.
Cekkhqi ing ami ai awhtaw phyi boeih uhy, ami ai ngenkhqi ce a hubatkhqi ing ami kawih awh vawh hqa hlaihih law hy.
Cawhkaw ak aikhqi ce nu ingkaw naasen a noet kaana, pa hqoeng thawngnga law uhy.
Jesu ing thlang kqeng ce a tyih khqi huili awh, a hubatkhqi awm lawng awh luh sak khqi nawh caqai benna ana cet uh tinawh awi pek khqi hy.
Thlang kqeng ce a ceh sak coengawh, cykcah aham amah doeng tlang na kaai hy. Khaw a my law awhtaw, ce a hyn awh amah doeng awm hy,
Cehlai lawng taw caqai ing a hlanaak na tuibak ing mam khoep hy.
Than cinghy khawnoek pali awh, Jesu taw a mingmih a venna tui awh ce cet hy.
Tuili awh a ceh ce a hubatkhqi ing ami huh awh kqih uhy. “Ce ce myihla ni,” ti unawh amik kqih awh khyy uhy.
Cehlai Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh: “Koeh ly uh, kai ni, koeh kqih uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Bawipa, nang awhtaw na venna tui awh ce ni law sak lawt lah,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Law,” tina hy. Cawh Piter ce lawng awhkawng kqum nawh, tui awh Jesu a venna ce va cet hy.
Cehlai khawhli ce a huh awh kqih nawh tuih khuina ce nung tla hy, “Bawipa, ni hul lah! tinawh khy hy.
Jesu ing a kut soeng nawh tu hy, “Cangnaak ak zawi aw, kawtih upvoetnaak na taak?,” tina hy.
Lawng khuina a ni kaai coengawh, khawhli ce sit hy.
Lawng khui awhkaw ak awm thlangkhqi ing anih ce beek uhy, “Nang ve Khawsa Capa tang tang ni,” tina uhy.
Caqai benna ce cet phat unawh Gennesaret qam ce pha uhy.
Ce a hyn awhkaw ak awm thlangkhqi ing anih ce ami sim awhkawng ami qam pum awh awi ce pha sak boeih uhy.
A venawh tlawhnaak ak takhqi boeih ce hawlaw unawh a himai awm ami binaak thai aham a venawh qeennaak thoeh uhy, ak bi thlangkhqi boeih taw qoei uhy.
Cawh Jerusalem khaw awhkawng Farasi khqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikung khqi thlang vang ce Jesu a venna law unawh doet uhy,
kawtih na hubatkhqi ing a hqamcakhqik awi qoe ce ami hqe? Buh ami ai law hly awh ami kut khaw am sil uhy!, tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Cawhtaw kawtih nangmih ing na mimah ak awi qoe ingkaw Khawsa ak awipeek ce nami hqe lawt?
Khawsa ak awipeek ingtaw, na nu ingkaw na pa zoeksang lah, anu apa awih che ak hlah sih taw thih sak aham awm hy, tinawh ak kqawn ce.
Cehlai nangmih ingtaw thlang ing anu apa venawh, 'kai a ven awhkawng na ngaih ik-oeih boeih boeih ce Khawsa venawh awm hawh hy,' a tinaak mantaw,
'anih ingtaw apa ce a zoeksang aham am awm hy,' ti u hyk ti. Cemyihna na mimah ak awi qoe ingkaw Khawsak awipeek ce kawna awm ap poek uhyk ti.
Nangmih thlang qaai kqawnkhqi! Isaiah ing nangmih akawng anak kqawn hyt:
”Ve ak thlangkhqi ing a mim kha hqawng ingtaw kai ve ni zoeksang kaa hlai uhy, amik kawlungkhqi taw ak chang na ta uhy;
A hoeina ni kai ve ami ni beek hy; ami cawngpyinaak ce awm thlanghqing a cawngpyinaak mai ni, a tive thym hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing thlang kqeng ce a venna khy nawh, “Ngai unawh zasim lah uh.
Nim khak khuiawh anuk lut awk-ai ing thlang tuih am awm sak nawh, nim khak khui awhkawng ak cawn law awih che ing ni thlang tuih a awm sak,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi ce a venna law unawh doet uhy, “Farasikhqi ing ve ak awi ve aming zaak awh amik kaw am law hy, tice nak sim nu?” tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ing, “Khawk khan nakaw Pa ing a mang ling thingkungkhqi boeih taw ak kqa mah na phu kaw.
Awm taak dym uh; sawikung mikhypkhqi ni. Mikhyp ing mikhyp a sawi mantaw, lawkkhqawng na tla qen kawm nih,” tina hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kaimih a venawh kqawn caih lah,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Nangmih ingawm am nami zasim nawh nu?
Nim khak khuiawh a nuk lut boeih boeih taw phoen ak khuina cet nawh cawh kawng ce naat na cawn hy, tice am nami sim nawh nu?
Cehlai nim kha awhkawng ahak cawn law boeih taw kawlung khui awhkawng ni a law, cekkhqi ing ce thlang tyih am leh kap sak uhy.
Kawlung khui awhkawng ni kawpoek amak leekkhqi, thlang himnaak, samphaihnaak, nu pa thawlhnaak, quuknaak, amak thym dyihthing na dyihnaak, Khawsa thekhanaak khqi ce a law hy.
Ve myihkhqi ing thlang tuih am leh kap sak hy; cehlai kut silh kaana buh ainaak ing thlang tuih am leh am kap sak hy,” tina hy.
Ce hyn awhkawng Jesu taw Tura ingkaw Sidon khaw khqang ce cet hy.
Cawh, Kanaan nu pynoet taw a qam khui awhkawng law nawh, a venawh, “Bawipa, David Capa, kai ve nim qeen lah! Ka canu qaai ing tu nawh khuikha soeih hy,” tina hy.
Cehlai awi khang oet awm am hlat pehy. Cedawngawh a hubatkhqi ce a venna law unawh, “Ak chang na ceh sak hlah, ni hu awh khy khing hy,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Isarel tuu ak qengkhqi aham doeng nani ani tyih,” tina hy.
Cawh nu ce law nawh, “a haiawh khuk sym doena, “Bawipa ni bawm lah!” tina hy.
Anih ing, “Cakhqi phaihpi ce lawh pe nawh uikhqi ni peek lat ce am thym hy,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw nu ing, “Oeih, Bawipa, thym hy, cehlai ui ingawm a boeikhqi a caboei awhkaw buh baw ak tlakhqi ce lym lawt saw, tina uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing a venawh, “Nang nu nak cangnaak dung soeih hy! Na thoehnaak ce peek na awm hawh hy,” tina hy. Cawhkawng a canu ce qoei tlang hy.
Ce a hyn ce Jesu ing cehta nawh Kalili tuili benna cet hy. Cekcoengawh tlang na ce kaai nawh ngawi hy.
Cawh thlang kqeng khawzah ce a venna law uhy, khawk khem, mikhyp, awimyh, ak khawnkhqi ingkaw thlak tlokhqi ce a khawkung awh soei pe unawh; anih ing cekkhqi boeih ce qoei sak hy.
Awimyh ing pau thai nawh ak khawnkhqi ing leek hy, khaw ak khemkhqi ingawm cet thai unawh mikhypkhqi ing hu thai uhy; ce mihkhqi ce thlang boeih ing ami huh awh amik kawpoek kyi unawh, Isarel Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing a hubatkhqi ce a venna khy nawh, “Vawhkaw thlang kqeng ve qeen khqi soeih nyng, vekkhqi ve ka venawh ikaw awm a ai kaana khaw thum voei awm hawh uhy. Buh cawih doena ceh sak aham am ngaih nyng, ka ceh sak man lam lak awh lum hau kawm uh,” tina hy.
A hubatkhqi ing a venawh, “Thlang ve zah a ai tat phaihpi ce ve kqawng khuiawh hana kaw ka mi huh kaw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Phaihpi izah nu nami taak?” tinak khqi hy. A mingmih ing, “Phaihpi khqih ingkaw nga a khoeh ca taw awm hy,” tina uhy.
Thlang kqeng ce dek awh ngawih sak aham kqawn pehy.
Phaihpi khqih ingkaw nga ce lo nawh zeelnaak awi ak kqawn coengawh thek nawh a hubatkhqi ce pehy. A hubatkhqi ing thlang kqeng a venawh tei pek khqi uhy.
A mingmih ing ak phyi na ai boeih uhy. Ami ai ngenkhqi ce a hubatkhqi ing ami cawi awh vawh khqih na kawi uhy.
Cawhkaw ak aikhqi boeih taw naasenkhqi ingkaw nukhqi ak kqawn kaana thlang thawngli law uhy.
Thlang kqeng ce a ceh sak coengawh, lawng khuina lut nawh Magadan khaw benna ce cet hy.
Farasi ingkaw Sadusikhqi ce Jesu a venna law unawh, khan ben nakaw hatnaak dang sak aham noek adak uhy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Khawmy ben awh cingmai a thiim awhtaw khaw seen kaw ti uhyk ti,
mymcang ben awh, khawmai a sah awhtaw, “khaw am seen tikaw,” ti uhyk ti. Nangmih ingawm khaw taw nai a nawng thai hlai uhyk ti, a tym hatnaak taw am nainawng thai uhyk ti.
Thlak che ingkaw samphaih cadilkhqi ingtaw hatnaak sui uhy, tawngha Jonah a hatnaak doeng am kaa taw ikaw awm peekna am awm kaw,” tina hy. Cekcoengawh cekkhqi ce ak chang na cehta hy.
Tuili caqai benna ami haih kat awh a hubatkhqi ing phaihpi ami khyn hly ce hilh valh uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Farasikhqi ingkaw Sadusikhqi venawh ce nami cyih ta unawh qalqiing lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
“Phaihpi am ni taak awh va ni kaw,” ti unawh a mimah ingkaw a mimah ce doet qu uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi ak awih kqawn ce zasim nawh, “Cangnaak ak zawikhqi, kawtih phaihpi am nami taak akawng ce namik kqawn?
Am nami zasim hlan nawh nu? Thlang thawngnga ing phaihpi ingkaw nga ami ai ce namim hilh hawh nawh nu?, Vawh izah nami kawih ce?
Thlang thawngli ing phaihpi khqih a mi ai awh vawh izah nu ami kawih bai ce?
Phaihpi akawng name venawh kak kqawn am ni tice ikawtih am naming zaaksim? Farasikhqi ingkaw sadusikhqi henawh ngaihthyn uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Phaihpi awh ak awm hen akawng qalqiing aham am kqawn nawh Farasikhqi ingkaw Sadusikhqi a cawngpyinaak awh ngaihtaak aham ni ak kqawn hy tice zasim uhy.
Jesu ing kaisary Philipi peng khuina a law awh a hubatkhqi ce doet hy, “Thlangkhqi ing thlanghqing Capa ve u nu a mi ti? tina hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Thlang vang ingtaw nang ve, Baptisma pekung Johan ni, ti uhy, thlang vang ing 'Elijah' ti uhy; thlang vang bai ingtaw, 'Jeremiah' am awhtaw tawngha pynoet oet,” tina uhy.
Cawh a mingmih a venawh, “Cawhtaw nangmih ingtaw kai ve u nu nami ti?” tinak khqi hy.
Simon Piter ing, “Nang taw Khrih, ak hqing Khawsa Capa ni,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Nang Jonah capa, na zoseen hy, kawtih thlanghqing ing amni sim sak nawh khawk khan nakaw ka Pa ing ni a ni sim sak.
Na venawh ka nik kqawn peek, nang taw Piter ni, ve lungnu awh ka thlangboel dyih sak kawng; hell chawmkeng ing ce ce am noeng qoe tikaw.
Khan ram cabi ce na venawh ni pe kawng; khawmdek awh nang ing na pinkhqi boeih ce khawk khan na awm pin na awm lawt kaw, khawmdek awh nang ing na hlam boeih ce khawk khan na awm hlam na awm lawt kaw,” tina hy.
Amah ce Khrih ni tice a u venawh awm ama mik kqawn aham a hubatkhqi venawh awi pehy.
Amah cawhkawng taw Jesu ing Jerusalem na cet kawmsaw a hqamcakhqi khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ing khuikhanaak a sim sak hly khqi ingkaw him na awm kawmsaw am thum nyn awh thawh tlaih na a awm hly khqi ce a hubatkhqi venawh kqawn caih pek khqi hy.
Piter ing amah ce ak chang na cehpyi nawh kaa na hy. “Bawipa, cemih ik-oeih nang ak khan awh koeh pha qoe seh, vemyihkhqi ve nang a venawh koeh awm seh,” tina hy.
Cehlai Jesu ing Piter ce hawi sih nawh, “Setan, ka huna thoeih lah! Nang ve kang tluuknaak ahamna awm hyk ti; Khawsa a ik-oeihkhqi ve poek kaana thlanghqing a ik-oeihkhqi ce poek hyk ti,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh, “U ingawm kai a hu awh law aham a ngaih awhtaw, amah ingkaw amah ce hoet qu seitaw, amah a thinglam ak kawh doena ka hu awh bat seh.
U awm a hqingnaak ce thaawng aham ak ngaih ingtaw hlawng kaw.
Thlang ing khawmdek pum ve ham mai seiawm a hqingnaak ce a hlawng awhtaw ikaw nu phu a tak? A hqingnaak ce ikaw ing nu ang thung thai kaw?
Thlanghqing Capa ing Pa a boeimangnaak ingkaw ak khan ceityihkhqi mi law kaw, thlang boeih a venawh a mi them sainaak boeih ve myihna kutdo ce pek khqi boeih kaw.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlanghqing Capa ing a qam na a law ce a huh hlan khui awhtaw, vawhkaw thlang vang ak dyikhqi ak khuiawh thihnaak amak tan hly kawi thlang awm hy,” tina hy.
Khaw khquk nyn a awm coengawh Jesu ing Piter, Jakob ingkaw a na Johan ce khy nawh a mimah doeng tlang ak sang na ce kaai pyi hy.
Cawh ce a mingmih a haiawh a myi ce thaw pehy. A hai ce khawmik amyihna vang nawh, a hi awm khawkdai amyihna baawk hy.
Cawh cekkhqi a haiawh Mosi ingkaw Elijah ce dang pe nawh Jesu mi ce pau uhy.
Cawh Piter ing Jesu a venawh, “Bawipa, vawh awm aham nep soeih hy. Na ngaih awhtaw buk pakthum heen law vang - nang aham pynoet, Mosi aham pynoet, Elijah aham pynoet seh,” tina hy.
Awi ak kqawn huili awh, myi ak vang thlang ing a mingmih ce zawl khqi khoep nawh, myi ak khui awhkaw awi ing, “Vetaw ka lungnaak ka Capa ni; ak khan awh zeel soeih nyng; ak awi ngai pe uh!” tihy.
A hubatkhqi ing a ming zaak awh kqih soeih unawh a bukhup na koep uhy.
Cehlai Jesu ing law nawh cekkhqi ce bi hy, “Koeh kqih uh, tho hlah uh,” tina hy.
A mingmih ing ami toek awhtaw, Jesu doeng am kaana taw u awm ak chang am hu uhy.
Tlang nakawng ami nuk kqum awh, Jesu ing cekkhqi ce awi yn hy, “Thlanghqing Capa ve thihnaak awhkawng a thawh hlan dy taw, vawhkaw ik-oeih nami huh ve u a venawh awm koeh kqawn uh,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubatkhqi ing doet uhy, “kawtih anaa cawngpyikung khqi ing Elijah lamma na law kaw, a mi ti?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Elijah ve lamma na law tak kawmsaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce ak nep na sai tlaih kaw.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Elijah taw law hawh hlai hy, a mingmih ing am hat uhy, ami ngaih saqui ce ak khan awh sai pe uhy, cemih lawt na thlanghqing Capa ingawm a mingmih a kut awh khuikha kaw,” tina hy.
Baptisma ak pekung Johan akawng ni a mingmih a venawh ak kqawn peek, tice a hubatkhqi ing zasim uhy.
Thlang kqeng a venna a mi law awh, thlang pynoet ce a venawh law nawh ak khawkung awh khuk sym pehy.
“Bawipa ka capa ak khan awh qeennaak ta law cang lah, qaw nawh khuikha khing hawh hy. Mai awh tlu poepa hawh hy.
Na hubatkhqi venawh khyn hlai nyng, am qoei sak thai uhy,” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Aw cangnaak amak ta thlangkhqi ingkaw kawlung ak hqamkhqi, nangmih ve iqyt nu ka ni awm pyi khqi kaw? Iqyt nu ka ning yh pyi khqi kaw? Ka venna hawlaw lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing qaai ce zyi nawh, qaai ing cawhkaw naasen ce cehta hy, cawh anih ce qoei tlang hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi ing aha cana Jesu a venna law unawh, “kawtih kaimih ingtaw am ka mi hqek thai?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Namik cangnaak a zawi a dawngawh ni. Awtak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, antlam ak ui teh mah cangnaak nami taak mantaw, vawhkaw tlang a venawh, 'vawhkawng cena thoeih lah,' nami tinaak awh thoeih kaw. Nangmih aham amak coeng thai ikaw awm am awm kaw.
Cehlai vemih ve cykcahnaak ingkaw buh zeihnaak doeng am ingtaw am cet thai hy,” tina hy.
Kalili qam na ami law awh, Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Thlanghqing Capa ve thlangkhqi kut awh pe kawm usaw tu sak kawm uh.
Him kawm usaw, am thum nyn awh tho tlaih kaw,” tina hy. Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh a hubatkhqi taw amik kaw map hqoeng hy.
Kapernaum khaw ami pha law awh mangmu ak cawikhqi ce Piter a venna law unawh, “Nangmih a cawngpyikung ing pumim tangka am cawi nawh aw?” tinawh doet uhy.
Anih ing, “Cawi hy,” tinawh hlat hy. Imna a mi luh awh Jesu ing khai nawh, “Simon, ikawmyihna nak poek? Khawmdek sangpahrangkhqi ing u venna nu mangmu ami cawi? Ami cakhqi venna nu, thlak chang vena?” tinawh doet hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Thlak chang a venawh,” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Cawhtaw a cakhqi taw loet timaw ce.
Cehlai amik kaw a zeelnaak aham, tuili na cet nawh cikkoeih vak thla. Ngam nam tu ma ce lo nawh am kha ce phen pe, tangka hu kawp ti. Lo nawh kai ingkaw namimah hamna cawi,” tina hy.
Cawh a hubatkhqi ce Jesu a venna law unawh, “Khan qam awh u nu ak bau kaw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing naasen ca ce lo nawh a ming lak lung awh dyih sak hy.
A mingmih a venawh: “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nangmih ing namik kaw am hloet unawh naasenkhqi amyihna am nami awm awhtaw, khan qam khuiawh ityk awh awm am lut ti kawm uk ti.
Cedawngawh, u awm vawhkaw naasen amyihna thlang ak kai awh dungvoeng na ak awm taw khan qam awh ak bau soeih na awm kaw.
“U awm vemyih naasen ca ce kai ang ming ing ak do ak thlang taw kai anik do thlang na awm hy.
Cehlai u ingawm vawhkaw naasen, kai anik cangnaakkhqi ak khuiawh pynoet awm ang tluk sak awhtaw, cang neetnaak lung ak bau ce a hawng awh aawi sak nawh lidung ak khuina nik thlak man a hamna nep bet kaw.
“Thlang thawlhnaak ak sai sak ik-oeihkhqi awh khawmdek ve khaw na bin hy! Ce mih ik-oeihkhqi ce ak law hly qoe ni, cehlai thawlhnaak ak law sakkung thlang ce khaw na bin hy!
Na kut am awhtaw na khaw ing a ni thawlh sak awhtaw tlyk boet nawh khawng. Kut pakhih ingkaw khaw pakhih ak soep na kumqui mai khuina nang tlaak anglakawh, pum amak soep doena hqingnaak ak khuiawh na lut ce nep bet hy.
Na mik ing a ni thawlh sak awhtaw koeih doek nawh khawng. Mik pakhih ing hell mai khuina nang tlaak anglakawh, miklang ing hqingnaak khuina na lut ce na hamna nep bet hy.
“Vawhkaw naasenkhqi ak khuiawh pynoet awm am nami hepnaak aham qalqiing lah uh. Ikawtih ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a mingmih ak khan ceityihkhqi ing khawk khan nakaw ka Pa a haai ce hu poepa uhy.
Ak qengkhqi thaawng aham ni thlanghqing Capa ve a law.
“Ikawmyihna namik poek? Thlang pynoet ing tuu zakhat ce ta hlai hy, pynoet ce ak chang na a ceh valh mai mantaw, sawmkow pakow tloek ce tlang na cehta nawh ak chang ak qeng tuu pynoet ce am sui hly nawh nu?
Tuu ce a huh tlaih awhtaw, awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ak chang na amak cet valh tuu sawm kow pakow anglakawh cawhkaw tuu ak cet valh ce ym bet hy.
Cemyih lawtna khawk khan awh ak awm nangmih a Pa ing vawhkaw naasenkhqi ak khuiawh pynoet ca awm qeng aham am ngaih hy.
”Na koeinaa ing nak khan awh, ik-oeih a sai thawlh awhtaw cet nawh a thawlhnaak ce na mimah anglak doeng awh kqawn pe. Nak awi ce ang ngai awhtaw anih ce na noeng na awm kaw.
Cehlai a mang ngai awhtaw, thlang pakhih thum a simpyinaak awh awi ce a caknaak aham, thlang pynoet mai aw am awhtaw pakhih awh ceh pyi.
Cekkhqi ak awi awm a mang ngai bai awhtaw thlangboel a venawh kqawn uh; thlangboel ak awi awm a mang ngai awhtaw, lawkih am awhtaw mangmu ak cawikung na ngai law uh.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, khawmdek awh nami pinkhqi boeih ce khawk khan na awm pin na awm lawt kawmsaw, khawmdek awhkaw nami hlam khqi boeih ce khawk khan na awm hlam na awm lawt kaw.
“Cekcoengawh nik kqawn pek khqi tlaih nyng, khawmdek awh thlang pakhih ing kawpoek pynoet na taak doena ik-oeih a ni thoeh awhtaw khawk khan nakaw ka Pa ing nangmih aham sai pekna awm kaw.
Thlang pakhih awm pakthum awm kang ming ing a ming cunnaak awh, a mingmih a venawh kai awm nyng,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Piter ing Jesu a venna law nawh doet hy, “Bawipa, ka koeinaa ing kak khan awh ik-oeih a sai thawlh awh, iqyt dy nu qeenkhaw kang ngai kaw? Ak khqih dy nu?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ak khqih dy doeng amni, ak khqih a pyh khqihkip dy ti nyng,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh khan qam taw sangpahrang pynoet ing a tyihzawihkhqi venawh a tangka lai ak kqawn ing myih hy.
Tangka ce a soep awh tangka thonghqa ak pu peek thlang ce law pyi uhy.
Anih ing tangka ce ama peek thai voel hawh a dawngawh, a zuca ingkaw a toentaak khawhthemkhqi boeih ce zawi nawh a laiba ce sah aham awi pehy.
Cawh ce cawhkaw tyihzawih thlang ing a haiawh khuk sym nawh qeennaak thoeh hy, 'Bawipa nim qeen mai cang, ni pe boeih lawt bit kawng,' tina hy.
A boei ing anih ce qeen nawh a laiba boeih ce zoe pe sak hy.
“Cehlai cawhkaw tyihzawih thlang ce cet hy, cawh tangka denari zakhat ak pu peek a pyi tyihzawih pynoet ce hu hy. Anih ce a hawng awh tu nawh khak hy, “Tangka nak pu ce ni pe hlah,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw tyihzawih pyi ing a haiawh khuk sym doena qeennaak thoeh hy, 'Nim qeen cang, ni pe boeih lawt bit kawng,' tina hy.
Cehlai anih ing am hlah hy. A tangka pu ce a ni sam boeih hlan dy anih ce thawngim na thla hy.
Cawhkaw ik-oeih ce tyihzawih pyi ak changkhqi ing ami huh awh, amik kaw se hy, cet unawh cawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce a pa a venawh kqawn pe uhy.
Cawh a boei ing cawhkaw tyihzawih ce a venna khy hy. Nang tyihzawih thlak che, kai a venawh qeennaak na thoeh a dawngawh kai ing na laibakhqi boeih ce ni zoe pe sak nyng.
Kai ing nak khan awh qeennaak ka taak lawt amyihna nang ingawm thlang ak khan awh qeennaak na taak aham awm lawt hy,' tina hy.
Cawhkaw boei ce ak kaw so nawh laiba a sam boeih hlan dy cawhkaw tyihzawih ce phep aham thawng ak thlakungkhqi kut awh pehy.
“Nangmih ingawm nami koeinaa khqik khan awh qeenkhaw amna ming ngai awhtaw, khawk khan nakaw Pa ing nangmih ak khan awh ce amyihna sai lawt kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing vawhkaw awikhqi ak kqawn boet coengawh, Kalili qam ce cehta nawh Judah qam Jordan long caqai benna ce cet hy.
Thlang kqeng khawzah ing a hu awh hquut uhy, anih ing cekkhqi ce qoei sak khqi hy.
Amah ce noek adak ham Farasi thlang a vang ce a venna law uhy. “Thlang ing ikaw mai awh awm a zu ak thlaak aham ak thym hly nu?” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Ak cyk ca awh saikung ing pa ingkaw nu ce sai nawh,
”Ve dawngawh pa ing a pa ingkaw a nu ce cehta nawh a zu ce tawm kaw, pakhih ce pynoet na awm hawh kawm nih,” a tice am nami noet khawi nawh nu?
Cedawngawh cekqawi ce pakhih na am awm voel nawh, pynoet nani a awm hawh. Cedawngawh Khawsa ing pynoet na am khoep coeng hloeih taw thlanghqing ing koeh kqeng seh,” tina hy.
A mingmih ing, “Cawhtaw kawtih Mosi ing zu thlaaknaak ca pe nawh zu ce ceh sak aham awi a peek bai hy voei?” tina uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Na mim thin a sah soeih a dawngawh ni Mosi ing zu thlaaknaak ham anik kqawn peek khqi.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a va ak khan awh a samphaih a dawngawh ti kaana, u ingawm a zu thla nawh nuk chang a zunaak awhtaw anih ce samphaih na awm hy,” tina hy.
A hubatkhqi ing a venawh, “Zu lawh va taak naak awh ce myihna a awm mantaw, zu ama taak aham nep bet hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “U ingawm vawhkaw awih kqawn ve am do thai ti kawm uh.
Thlang pynoet taw a nu ak phoen khui awhkawng tiktleh cena thang nawh, thlang pynoet taw thlang ing tleh pehy; thlang a vang taw khan qam akawng awh zu amak ta thlang awm awm bai hy. Ak do thai saqui ing ve ve do seh,” tinak khqi hy.
Naasenkhqik khan awh kut tloeng nawh cykcah peek aham, naasenkhqi ce Jesu a venna law pyi uhy. Cawh a hubatkhqi ing ak law pyikungkhqi ce zyi hy.
Jesu ing, “Naasenkhqi ce ka venawh law sak lah uh, koeh kham pe uh, kawtih khan qam taw vemyihna ak awm khqi aham nani,” tina hy.
Cekkhqi ak khan awh kut a tloeng coengawh, cawhkawng cet phaat hy.
Cawh thlang pynoet Jesu a venna law nawh, “cawngpyikung, kumqui hqingnaak ka huhnaak aham ikaw ka sai kaw?” tinawh doet hy.
Jesu ing, “Ikaw hamna ik-oeih leek akawng ce nani doet? Ak leek pynoet doeng ni a awm. Hqingnaak ak khuiawh lut aham na ngaih awhtaw, awipeekkhqi ce sai thoeih ti,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw cadawng ing, “Ikawmih awipeekkhqi?” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Thlang koeh him, koeh samphaih, koeh qu, amak thym dyihthing na koeh awm,
Na nu ingkaw na pa zoeksang lah, na imceng ce namah na lung qunaak a myihna lungna lawt lah, a tice,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw cadawng ing, “Vekkhqi boeih taw ka naasen awhkawng sai boeih hawh nyng. Ikaw ka voet hyn bai?” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Thlak soep na awm aham na ngaih awhtaw, cet nawh na khawhthem khqi boeih na zawih coengawh hahqahkhqi ce pe law, cawhtaw khawk khan awh kawn them ta kawp ti. Cekcoengawh law nawh ka hu awh bat lah,” tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce cadawng ing ang zaak awh, khawhthem khawzah a taak dawngawh kawseet doena cen valh hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, boei ing khan qam na a lutnaak aham kyi soeih hy.
Kqawn law tlaih bai vang, boei ing Khawsa ram khuiawh a lut anglakawh, kalauk ing kqym ak khuiawh a lut zoei bet hy,” tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce a hubatkhqi ing a ming zaak awh amik kawpoek kyi nawh, “Cawhtaw u nu thaawng na ak awm hly?” tinawh doet uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih ce toek nawh, “Ve ve thlanghqing a hamna taw am coeng thai hy, Khawsa a hamna taw ik-oeih boeih boeih ve coeng thai hy,” tina hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Toek lah, kaimih ingtaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih cehta u nyngsaw na hu awh bat u nyng! Cawhtaw ikaw ka mi huh kaw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ik-oeih boeih ak thai na awm nawh, thlanghqing Capa ing a boeimang ngawihdoelh awh ang ngawih awh, nangmih awm ngawihdoelh pahqa hlaihih awh ngawi kawm u tiksaw, Isarel phyn pahqa hlaihih ce awi deng kawm uk ti.
U awm kai ang ming awh, a imkhqi, a koeinaakhqi, a pa, a nu a cakhqi ingkaw a lokhqi ce ak cehtaakkhqi taw alet zakhat hlei leeknaak ingkaw kumqui hqingnaak ce pang kawm uh.
Cehlai ak maa ce hu kawmsaw ak hu ce maa lat kaw.” tinak khqi hy.
Khan qam taw dum ak takung thlang pynoet ing a dum khuiawh bi ak bi aham thlang ak sui na mymcang hqit awh ak cet ing myih hy.
Bibikungkhqi mi hypoet kutphu denari pynoet peek aham awi ta unawh, cekkhqi ce misur dum na tyi khqi hy.
“Khawnoek pathum tluk awh cet nawh, ik-oeih ami zawihnaak hyn awh ikaw awm amak sai thlangkhqi ce hu hy.
A mingmih a venawh, nangmih awm cet unawh kai a misur dum awh bibi lah uh, a ting a tawk taw ni pek khqi bit kawng, tinak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh a mingmih ce cet uhy.” Cekcoengawh khawnoek paquk ingkaw pakow tluk awh cet tlaih bai nawh, ce amyihna tina tlaih bai hy.
Khawnoek pahqa hlaioet tluk awh cet bai nawh, ak dyi mailai thlangkhqi ce hu bai hy. A mingmih a venawh, 'kawtih ikaw awm a sai kaana vawh khawnghi zung naming dyih?' tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing a venawh, 'u ingawm kaimih ve amni ceei khqi nawh ni,' tina uhy. Anih ing cekkhqi venawh, 'Nangmih awm cet unawh kai a misur dum awh bibi law lah uh,' tinak khqi hy.
”Khaw a my awhtaw, misur dum ak takung ing, tangka ak khoemkungkhqi venawh, 'A hu dyt awhkawng ak lamma dy awh bibikungkhqi ce khy nawh amik thaphu ce pe lah uh,' tinak khqi hy.
Khawnoek hlaioet awhkawng bi ak bikhqi ce law unawh amik thaphu denari pynoet ce hu qip uhy.
Lamma na bi ak bikhqi ce law unawh ak doem bet hu kawng unyng, tina poek uhy. Cehlai cekkhqi awm denari pynoet qip ni ami huh lawt hy.
Tangka ami huh boeih coeng awhtaw, dum ak takung ak khan awh saai bi uhy.
“Ahu na na law pyikhqi ing khawnoek pynoet khui doeng ni bi ami bi hy, hypoet khui khawk hlawk anglakawh bi ka mik bi kaimih mi ang amyihna na taak paqap,” tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ing a mingmih ak khui awhkaw thlang pynoet a venawh, 'ka pyi, amak thym na nak khan awh ik-oeih am sai nyng, Denari pynoet nani awi ni taak ka ti my?
Namah a bibi phu ce lo nawhtaw cet hlah. Nang a venawh ka ni peek lawt amyihna ahu na bi ak bi thlang a venawh awm pe lawt kawng nyng.
Ka tangka ak khan awh ka ngaihnaak amyihna saithainaak am ka ta hly nawh nu? Kai ka khawboe a leek awh nang ing nani yt nawh nu? tina hy.
Cedawngawh ak hukhqi ce ma kawm usaw ak maakhqi ce hu kawm uh. Ak khy taw doem kawmsaw ak tyk taw zawi kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing Jerusalem na a hang ceh awh, a hubat thlang pahqa hlaihih ce cehpyi nawh a mingmih a venawh,
“Tuh Jerusalem na ni hang cet kawm uh, thlanghqing Capa taw khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi venawh pe kawm uh, a mingmih ing thih sak aham thawlh sak kawm uh,
qaihnaak na sai aham Gentelkhqi kut awh pe kawm uh. Am thum nyn awh tho tlaih kaw,” tina hy.
Cawh Zebedi a cakhqi a nu ing a ca qawi ce Jesu a venna law pyi nawh, khuk sym doena ak kawngaih pynoet sai sak aham qeennaak thoeh hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Ikaw na ngaih?” tina hy. Cawhkaw nu ing, “vawhkaw ka capa qawi pakhih ve na ram khuiawh pynoet ve nak tang ben awh pynoet ce nak cawng ben awh ngawih law sak lah,” tina hy.
Cehlai Jesu ing a venawh, “Na thoeh ve am sim hy nik ti. Kai ing ka aawk hly kawi khuikha huhnaak boet ve na nik aw hly thai lawt nu? Baptisma ka huh hly kawi ve na nik hu hly thai lawt nu?” tina hy.
Jesu ing cekqawi a venawh, “Kai a khuikha huhnaak boet ve aw hly thai tang tang nih nawh Baptisma ka huh hly kawi ve awm hu thai kawm nik ti, cehlai kai ak tang ben awh ngawih sak thainaak ingkaw cawng ben awh ngawih sak thainaak taw, kai a peek kawi am ni. Ka pa ing a hoep peek ce thlangkhqi venawh pe kaw,” tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce thlang pahqa tloek ing a ming zaak awh, cekqawi cingna ak khan awh amik kaw so hy.
Cehlai Jesu ing cekkhqi ce a venna khy khqi boeih nawh, “Gentelkhqi ingtaw a mimah khqik khan awh uknaak ce ta unawh, ukkungkhqi ing a mingmih ak khan awh uk thainaak ce ta uhy.
Cehlai nangmih anglakawhtaw ce myihna am awm kaw. Nangmih ak khuiawh ak bau soeih na awm ak ngaih ingtaw nangmih a bi ak bikung na awm seh,
u awm nangmih anglakawh lamma cyk na awm ak ngaih taw nangmih a tamnaa na awm seh;
Thlanghqing Capa ing thlang bibi sak aham am law nawh, thlang a bibi peek aham nani a law, thlang khawzah thaawngnaak aham a hqingnaak ak pe hamna ni a law,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ingkaw a hubatkhqi ing Jeriko khaw ce ami cehtaak awh thlang kqeng ing ahu awh hquut uhy.
Cawh mikhyp thlang pakhih ce lam keng awh ngawi hy nih, Jesu a ceh awi ce a ning zaak awh, “Bawipa, David Capa, kainih ve nim qeen qawi lah!” tinawh khy hy nih.
Thlang kqeng ing cekqawi ce a ni awmnaak dym aham zyi uhy, cehlai cekqawi ing khawteh khqoet na, “Bawipa, David Capa, kainih ve nim qeen qawi lah!” tinawh khy khqoet hy nih.
Cawh Jesu ce dyi nawh cekqawi ce khy hy. “Ikaw sai sak aham nu nani ngaih?” tinawh doet qawi hy.
Cekkqawi ing, “Bawipa, mik dai aham ngaih nih nyng,” tina hy nih.
Jesu ing cekqawi ce qeen nawh cekqawi a mik ce bi pehy. Cawh cekqawi ce ani mik dai pahoei nawh ahu awh bat pahoei hy nih.
Jerusalem pha tawm unawh Olive tlang awhkaw Bethphage khaw ami pha awh, Jesu ing a hubat thlang pakhih ce haina tyi hy,
Cekkqawi a venawh, “Nani haiawh ak awm khawk khuina cet nih nawhtaw meqang ca ingkaw a nu ami king ce hu kawm nik ti. A qui ce hlam nih nawh ka venna sawi law nih.
U ingawm anik kaanaak qawi awhtaw, Bawipa ing ngoe hy, thak law tlaih bit kaw, tina nih,” tinak qawi hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih taw tawngha ing anak kqawn hyt ce a soepnaak a hamna ni:
“Zion canu ce kqawn pe, 'Na sangpahrang kawdaw ing meqang awh, meqang noca awh ngawi kawmsaw law kaw,” a tice.
A hubat qawi ce cet nih nawh Jesu ing awi a peek qawi amyihna sai hy nih.
Cekkqawi ing meqang a nu ingkaw ak noca ce hawlaw hy nih, meqang ak khan awh hi phaih pe nih nawh, ak khan awh Jesu ce ngawih sak uhy.
Thlang kqeng khawzah ing hikhqi ce lam awh phaih pe uhy, thlang vang ing thingbupkhqi ce chawm unawh lam awh phaih pe uhy.
Haina ak cetkhqi ingkaw hu nakaw ak law thlang kqeng ing, “David capa venawh Hosanna! Bawipang ming ing ak law taw a zoseen seh!” “Sawsang soeih awh Honsanna!” tinawh khy uhy.
Jerusalem khawk khui na Jesu a lut awh, khawk bau ce tyn nawh, “Ve ak thlang ve u nu ti?” ti uhy.
Thlang kqeng ing, “Ve ak thlang taw Kalili qam Nazareth khaw awhkaw tawngha Jesu ni,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing bawkim khuina lut nawh bawkim khuiawh ik-oeih ak zawi ingkaw ak thlai thlangkhqi ce hqek hy. Tangka ak hlengkhqi a caboeikhqi awm khup phlet pek khqi hy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Ka im ve cykcahnaak im ni, ti kawm uh,” tinawh a qee hyt awm hlai hy, nangmih ingtaw quk-aikhqi awmnaak hyn na sai u hyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Mikhypkhqi ingkaw khawkhemkhqi ce a venawh bawkim na law unawh, anih ing cekkhqi ce qoei sak khqi hy.
Cehlai khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a saikhqi ingkaw naasenkhqi ing bawkim a keng awh, “David capa venawh Hosanna,” tinawh amik khy ce ami huh awh amik kaw am law hy.
”Naasenkhqi ing amik kqawn ce nak za nu?” tinawh Jesu ce doet uhy. Jesu ing, “Oeih, 'Naasenkhqi ingkaw naasenkhqi am kha awhkawng zoeksangnaak ce ta hawh hyk ti,' a tice am nami noet khawi nawh nu?” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ce a cehtaak coengawh, Bethany khaw na cet nawh, cawh ce ip hy.
A khawngawi mymcang hqit awh khawk bau na ang hlat tlaih awh ak phoen cawi hy.
Lam a keng awhkaw thai thing ce hu nawh, a hang ceh awh ahah doeng kaa taw ikaw awm am hu hy. Thai thing na ce, “Koeh qah qoe voel,” tina hy. Cawh thai thing ce khawng pahoei hy.
A hubatkhqi ing ami huh awh amik kawpoek kyi hy, “Ikawmyihna thai thing ak khawng paqap hy voei?” ti uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ypvoetnaak a taak kaana cangnaak nami taak awhtaw, thai thing awhkaw sai na ak awm doeng ve am sai thai kawm uk tik saw, vawhkaw tlang a venawh awm, 'Cet nawh tuicunli na thoeih lah,' nami tinaak awhtaw thoeih kaw.
Namik cangnaak awhtaw cykcahnaak ing nami thoeh ce hu kawm uk ti, “tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing bawkim khuina lut nawh thlang a cawngpyi huili awh, khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi a venawh law unawh doet uhy, “Hanakaw saithainaak ing vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ve na sai? Vawhkaw saithainaakkhqi ve u ing ani peek?,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Awi pynoet ni doet khqi cang vang. Nami nim hlat awhtaw, hanakaw saithainaak ing vemyih ik-oeihkhqi ka sai tice nik kqawn pek khqi kawng.
Johan a Baptisma ce hana kaw nu ce? Hana kawng a law, khawk khan nakaw nu am awhtaw thlang a ven awhkawng nu?” tinak khqi hy. Cawh a mimah ingkaw a mimah ce doet qu unawh, “Khawk khan benna kaw niti naak man, 'cawhtaw kawtih amna mik cangnaak,' niti nak khqi kaw.
Thlang a ven awhkawng ni, niti bai man thlang nik kqih koek bai, thlang kqeng ing Johan ce tawngha ni a mi ti a dawngawh,” ti uhy.
Cedawngawh, “Am sim nyng,” tina uhy. Cawh Jesu ing, “Cawhtaw hana kaw saithainaak ing vemyih ik-oeihkhqi ka sai, tice ap kqawn hly lawt nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
“Ikawmyihna nangmih ing namik poek? Cakpa pakhih ak ta ak thlang pynoet awm hy. A capa a hqam a venawh cet nawh, 'Ka capa, tuhngawi awh misur dum na cet nawh bibi lah,' tina hy.
Am cet tikawng,' tina hlai hy ahu na ak kaw hlat nawh cet tlaih hy.
Cekcoengawh a pa ce a capa ak chang a venna cet bai nawh ce amyihna tina bai hy. Anih ingtaw, 'cet bit kawng,' tina hy, cehlai am cet hy.
“Ce pakhih ak khuiawh u ing nu a pa ak kawngaih a sai?” tinak khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Lamma awhkawng,” tina uhy. Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, mangmu ak cawikungkhqi ingkaw pum ak zawikhqi ing nangmih ve Khawsa qam khuina ni cehtaak khqi kaw ve.
Ikawtih Johan ce nangmih dyngnaak lam ak huh na law hy, cehlai nangmih ing am cangna uhyk ti, mangmu ak cawikhqi ingkaw a pum ak zawikhqi ing cangna uhy. Ve ve hu hawh utik seiawm, am zut utik saw anih ce am cangna u hyk ti.
Nyhtahnaak awi ak chang pynoet ve ngai bai lah uh: Dum ak takung thlang pynoet awm nawh anih ing misur ce ling hy. Dum ce chung hqeet nawh, misur suinaak ce co nawh a qehnaak ipsang ce sa hy. Cekcoengawh loh phlo thlangkhqi ce dum awh bibi sak aham a ceei coengawh amah ce khawk hla na cet valh hy.
Misur qah bih tym a pha awh, misur qah ak bit aham a tyihzawih thlangkhqi ce dum qehkungkhqi venna tyi hy.
Dum awh bi ak bikhqi ing cawhkaw tyihzawihkhqi ce tu unawh pynoet ce vyk uhy, pynoet ce him uhy, pynoet bai ce lung ing khaawng uhy.
Cawh dum ak takung ing lamma awhkawng lak awh tyihzawih ak chang khawzah ce tyi bai hy, cehlai dum awhkaw bi ak bikhqi ing ak cyk awhkaw amyihna sai tlaih bai hy.
A hukhit nataw cekkhqi venawh amah a capa ce tyi hy. 'Ka capa taw kqihchah na bit kawm uh,' tina poek hy.
Cehlai cekkhqi ing, 'Vetaw qo ak pangkung ni ve. Law lah uh, him unawh a qo lawh pe usih,' ti uhy.
Anih ce tu unawh ami him coengawh vawng ak kep na khaawng uhy.
Cedawngawh, misur dum ak takung ce law nawh, cawhkaw dum awh bi ak bikhqi ce ikawmyihna a sai kaw? tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Cawhkaw thlak thawlhkhqi ce ak tlo soeih na him kawmsaw, cawhkaw misur dum ce a qah tym a pha awh ak thaih ak pe hly thai kawi thlak chang a venawh ceei kaw,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh: “Im ak sakungkhqi ing ami qoeng lung ce, a kil awhkaw ak khoeng soeih na awm hawh hy; ve ve Bawipa ing sai nawh, ningnih amik huh awh kawpoek kyi na awm hy, 'tinawh Awihciim awh ak awm ce am nami noet khawi nawh nu?'
Cedawngawh ka nik kqawn peek khqi, cemyih lawtna nangmih a ven awhkawng Khawsa qam ve lawh na awm kawmsaw ak thaih ak qah sakkungkhqi venawh pe kaw.
Vawhkaw lung awh ak bahkhqi taw kqek kawm usaw, lung ing ang tluuk khqi ce a dik a huina neet kaw,' tinak khqi hy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi ing Jesu a nyhtahnaak awi ce a ming zaak awh cekkhqi akawng ni ak kqawn hy tice sim uhy.
Anih a mim tunaak thai aham lam ce sui uhy, cehlai thlang kqeng ing anih ce tawngha ni, a mi ti a dawngawh thlang kqeng ce kqih uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh nyhtahnaak awi kqawn pek khqi tlaih hy:
“Khan qam taw sangpahrang pynoet ing a capa aham zulawh poeoi a sai ing myih hy.
Zulawh poei awh buh veel aham a tyihzawihkhqi ce tyi nawh thlang khy sak hlai hy, u awm law aham am ngaih uhy:
Cekcoengawh ak chang tyihzawihkhqi awm tyi tlaih bai nawh, 'ka ceei thlangkhqi venawh, buh veel aham qoek abah oepchoeh hawh nyng. Zulawh poei buh veel aham law uh tina uh, tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai kawna awm am ngai pe unawh, a mimah a ngaih ngaih na cehta uhy. Pynoet ing lo na cehta nawh, pynoet ing ak chang bibinaak na cehta hy.
Ak chang ak awm tloek ing cawhkaw tyihzawihkhqi ce tu unawh, thekhanaak ing chah phyih sak unawh him uhy.
Sangpahrang ing ce ce ang zaak awh ak kaw so hy. A qalkapkhqi ce tyi nawh thlang ak himkhqi ce a him sak coengawh, cekkhqi a khaw ce mai ing dawi sak hy.
Cekcoengawh a tyihzawihkhqi venawh, zulawh poei buh taw oepchoeh na awm hawh hy, cehlai ka ceei thlangkhqi ce buh veel aham am kawih uhy.
Cedawngawh lamkilkhqi awh cet unawh thlang nami huh saqui ce buh veel aham ceei law uh, tina hy.
Cedawngawh tyihzawihkhqi ce lam saqui awh cet unawh ami huh saqui thlangkhqi ce cawi uhy, thlak che awm thlak leek awm, zulawh poei buh ce ak behyp na veel uhy.
Cehlai sangpahrang ing khinkhqi toek aham a law awh, zulawhnaak hi amak bai thlang pynoet ce hu hy.
A venawh, 'ka pyi, ikawmyihna zulawhnaak hik kaana vawh na lut law?' tina hy. Cawh anih ce awi am pau qoe hy.
Sangpahrang ing a tyihzawihkhqi venawh, vawhkaw thlang ve a kut a khaw pin pe unawh, kqangnaak ingkaw hatahnaak a awmnaak a leng ben khawmthannaak na ce khaawng uh, tinak khqi hy.
Ikawtih khawzah khy hlai hy, ak tyh taw a khoehca ni, tina hy.
Cawh Farasikhqi ce cet unawh anih ak awih kqawnnaak awh a thawlhnaak tu peek aham doet qu uhy.
A mimah a hubatkhqi ingkaw Herod a hubatkhqi ce Jesu a venna tyi uhy. Cekkhqi ing, 'Cawngpyi kung', nang taw ak thym kqawn nawh Khawsa lam ce awitak ing cawngpyi hyk ti tice sim unyng. Thlang ak kawngaih awm am qoei tiksaw, a u a haai awm am toek hyk ti.
Ikawmyihna nak poeknaak kqawn law lah? Kaisar a venawh mangmu peek ve ak thym nu? tina u hy.
Cehlai Jesu ing a mingmih ang cainaak amak leek ce sim nawh, “Nangmih thlang qaai kqawnkhqi', kaw hamna kai a thawlhnaak tu aham nami sui?
Mangmu na nami peek tangka ce nim huh lah uh,”, tinak khqi hy. A mingmih ing denari pynoet ce khyn pe uhy,
cawh anih ing, “U ang myihlip nu ve? U ang ming nu a mi qee ve?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Kaisar,” tina uhy. Cawh anih ing, “Kaisar a them ce Kaisar a venawh pe unawh, Khawsa a them ce Khawsa venawh pe uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh, amik kawpoek kyi hy. Cedawngawh anih ce cehta unawh ak chang na cen uhy.
Ce nyn awh ce thlak thi thawh tlaihnaak am awm hy amik ti Sadusikhqi ce a venna law unawh awi doet uhy.
Cawngpyikung, thlang pynoet ing a ca ataak kaana a thih man a naa ing anih a zu ce zu na kawmsaw anih aham ca taak pekaw, tinawh Mosi ing nik kqawn pek khqi hy.
Kaimih anglakawh cingnahqui thlang khqih awm hy. Lamma cyk ing a zu lo moe ca taak kaana thih tahy, cedawngawh a zu ce a naa ing pang hy.
Cemyihna a voei hihnaak, am thumnaak ingkaw ak khqihnaak dyna awm hqui hy.
Ahu na taw cawhkaw nu ce awm thi lawt hy.
Cawhtaw thawh tlaih nyn awh cawhkaw nu ce khqih ak khuiawh a u a zu na nu a awm kaw, zu na boeih u saw? tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Khawsa a cak ciim ingkaw Khawsa a saithainaak am nami sim a dawngawh, nangmih ing poek thawlh hawh u hyk ti.
Thawh tlaihnaak nyn awh chungvanaak ingkaw zulawhnaak awm am awm voel kaw; khawk khan awhkaw khan ceityihkhqi amyihna va awm hawh kawm uh.
Thlak thikhqi thawh tlaihnaak awh, Khawsa ing nangmih a venawh ak kqawn law ce am nami noet nawh nu.
Kai taw Abraham Khawsa, Isaak Khawsa, Jakob Khawsa na awm nyng, a tice? Anih cetaw thlak thikhqi a Khawsa am nawh ak hqingkhqi a Khawsa ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Thlang kqeng ing anih ak awi ce a ming zaak awh a cawngpyinaak awh amik kawpoek kyi hy.
Jesu ing Sadusikhqi awi am pau sak khqi qoe hy, tice Farasikhqi ing a ming zaak awh, pynoet na cun uhy.
A mingmih ak khuiawh anaa awi ak thoem thlang pynoet ing anih ce noek adak nawh doet hy.
“Cawngpyikung, anaa awi ak khuiawh ikawmyih awipeek nu ak bau soeih?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Bawipa na Khawsa ce nak kawlung boeih, na hqingnaak boeih, na lingbyi boeih ing lungna kawp ti”.
Ve ve awipeek lamma cyk ingkaw ak bau soeih na awm hy.
A pakhihnaak taw vemyihna awm hy: 'Na imceng ce namah a pum amyihna lungna lawt kawp ti,' tive ni.
Anaa awi boeih ingkaw tawnghakhqi ak awi boeih vawhkaw awipeek pakhih awh cui boeih hawh hy,” tina hy.
Farasikhqi ce pynoet na a ming cun awh, Jesu ing doet khqi hy,
“Khrih akawng ve ikawmyihna namik poek?” tinak khqi hy. A mingmih ing, “David capa,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Cawhtaw ikawmyihna David ing, Myihla ak caming anih ce, “Bawipa,” a ti bai hy voei? Anih ing,
Bawipa ing ka Bawipa a venawh: Na qaalkhqi ce ka khawk kaina ka taak hlan dy, kak tang ben awh ngawi lah, a tice.
David ing anih ce 'Bawipa' tinawh ak khy awhtaw, ikawmyihna anih ce a capa na a awm hly thai hy voei? tinak khqi hy.
U ingawm anih a doetnaak ce khang oet awm am hlat pe thai uhy, ce nyn awhkawng taw u ingawm awi am doet hqa voel hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing thlang kqeng ingkaw a hubatkhqi venawh awi kqawn pehy.
“Vemyihna tina hy, “Anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi ing Mosi a ngawihdoelh awh ngawi uhy.
Cedawngawh a mingmih ing amik kqawn saqui ce ngai pe kawm utik saw sai pe kawm uk ti. Cehlai a mingmih amyihna ik-oeih koeh sai law uh, a mingmih ingtaw a mimah ing amik kqawn ce am sai uhy.
A mimah a phyihqih ak qih soeih ce thlang ak phleng awh tloeng pe uhy, cehlai a mimah ingtaw ami kutply kangnaa ingawm cawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ce thoeih aham am ngaih uhy.
Ik-oeih soepkep ami sai ce thlang a huh aham doeng ni ami sai hy: Ami talqi ingkaw ami baan awhkaw a bawm taw ak tla soeih na sai unawh ami hibai ce a vawkthawk na tlaak sak uhy;
poei buhkungkhqi awh thlang a zoeksang ngaih unawh Sinakawk khqang awh ngawihnaak ak nep nep ingkaw;
ik-oeih zawihnaak hyn awh thlang ing kqihchahnaak a peek khqi, 'Cawngpyikung' tinawh amik khykhqi ce lungna uhy.
Nangmih taw Boei pynoet doeng ni nami taak hy, nangmih taw cingnahqui na awm u hyk ti, cedawngawh nangmih ce, 'Cawngpyikung' tinawh am nik khy khqi tikaw.
Cekcoengawh khawmdek awh 'ka pa' tinawh koeh khy law uh, kawtih nangmih taw khawk khan na ak awm Pa pynoet doeng ni nami taak.
'Cawngpyikung' am ti kawm uk ti, cawngpyikung pynoet doeng ni nami taak, anih taw Khrih ni.
Nangmih ak khuiawh ak bau soeih taw nangmih a tyihzawih na awm seh.
U awm amah ingkaw amah ak zoeksang qu taw ak kaina thlaak na awm kawmsaw, u awm ak kaina ak awm taw zoeksang na awm kaw.
Nangmih qaai kqawn Farasikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikung khqi, khaw map uhyk ti! Nangmih ing thlang a haiawh khan qam ce khaih pe uhyk ti. Na mimah awm am kun uhyk ti.
Nangmih qaai kqawn anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi khaw map uhyk ti! Nuhai cakhqi imkhqi ce qawt pe unawh, thlang a huh awh ak dung soeih na cykcah uhyk ti. Cedawngawh nangmih ve khawzah khqoet thawlh kawm uk ti.
Nangmih qaai kqawn anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi khaw map uhyk ti! Thlang pynoet qung nami huhnaak thai aham tuicunli ingkaw khawmdekkhqi leh plep unawh cet uhyk ti, thlang ce nami huh awhtaw na mimah let hih hell aca na sai uhyk ti.
Nangmih sawikung mikhyp tloek, khaw map uhyk ti! U ingawm bawkim ang ming phoei nawh awi a kam awhtaw ikawna awm am coeng lawk hy; cehlai u ingawm bawkim awhkaw sui ang ming phoei nawh awi a kam awhtaw, ak awi ngaan hy, ti uhyk ti.
Nangmih mikhyp thlakhqawkhqi! Hannu ak bau khqoet: sui nu, am awhtaw sui ak ciimcaih sak bawkim nu?
Bawkthang ang ming phoei nawh awi a kam awhtaw kawna am coeng hy; cehlai ce bawkthang ak khan awhkaw zoepeek ik-oeih ang ming phoei ing awi a kam awhtaw, ak awi ce ngaan hy ti bai uhyk ti.
Nangmih mikhypkhqi! Hannu ak bau khqoet: Ak khan awhkaw zoepeek ik-oeih nu, am awhtaw ak khan awhkaw ak ciimcaih sak bawkthang ce nu?
Cedawngawh, u ingawm bawkthang ang ming phoei nawh awi a kam awhtaw bawkthang ingkaw ak khan awhkaw ak awm them pek ang ming phoei ing awi kam haih hawh hy.
U ingawm bawkim ang ming phoei nawh awi a kam awhtaw bawkim ingkaw ak khuiawh ak awm ingqawi ang ming phoei nawh awi kam haih hawh hy.
U awm khan ang ming phoei nawh awi a kam awhtaw Khawsa a ngawihdoelh ingkaw ak khan awhkaw ak ngawi ang ming phoei ing awi kam haih hawh hy.
Nangmih qaai kqawnkhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi, khaw map uhyk ti! Nangmih ing sawngsingkhqi, cynqykkhqi ingkaw paipoengkhqi dyna pahqa awh pynoet ce pe uhyk ti. Cehlai anaa awi awhkaw awihtung na ak awm - thymnaak, qeennaak ingkaw ypawmnaakkhqi ce kawna am ngai uhyk ti. Lamma awhkawk khqi ce dalqa naak kaana ahu awhkawk khqi ve awm nami sai aham awm hy.
Nangmih sawikung mikhypkhqi! Pica taw ciit hlai uhyk ti kalauk ce daih lat hawh uhyk ti.
Nangmih anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasi thlak qaai kqawnkhqi khaw map uhyk ti! Caboei ingkaw beei ce ak khan ben taw sil hawh hlai uhyk ti, ak khui ben taw qaai kqawnnaak ingkaw a pyh ngaihnaak ing be uhyk ti.
Farasi mikhypkhqi! Caboei ingkaw beei ak khui ben ce sil ma cang uh, cawhtaw ak khan ben ce awm ciimcaih kaw.
Nangmih anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasi thlak qaai kqawnkhqi khaw map uhyk ti! Phyi, ak khan awh a baawk ing thuut nawh ak khan awh ni toek awhtaw nep soeih hlai hy, ak khui awhtaw thlak thi a quh ingkaw amak caih a soep a hoei ing ak be ing myih uhyk ti.
Cemyih lawtna nangmih ve ak khan ben awhtaw thlak dyng amyihna awm hlai uhyk ti, ak khui ben awhtaw qaai kqawnnaak, thawlhnaak ing be uhyk ti.
Nangmih anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw Farasi thlak qaai kqawnkhqi khaw map uhyk ti! Tawngha khqik phyi ce sa u tiksaw thlak dyngkhqik phyi taw thawi a cam uhyk ti.
Nukdam pakdamkhqi khuk awh ana awm mai nyng seiawm, tawnghakhqi thisen lawng saknaak awh amna paa ti kawng, ti uhyk ti.
Tawnghakhqi ak himkung a cadil na nami awmnaak ce na mimah ing dyih pyi nawn hawh uhyk ti.
Nami pakdamkhqi thawlh ang lawngnaak ce be sak ngala hlah uh.
Nangmih khquikhqi! Kqui a cadilkhqi! Ikawmyihna hell khui awhkawng nami loet pai kaw?
Cedawngawh tawnghakhqi, thlak cyikhqi ingkaw cawngpyikungkhqi ce tyi law kawng. A vang ce him kawm u tiksaw thinglam awh taai kawm uk ti.
Cedawngawh nangmih ak khan awh thlak dyng Abel awhkawng bawkim ingkaw bawkthang anglakawh nami him Berekiah a capa Zekariah dyna khawmdek awh ak lawng thlak dyngkhqi boeih a thi ce nangmih ak khan awh awm kaw.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, vemyihkhqi boeih ve vawhkaw cadilkhqik khan awh law kaw.
Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, nang tawnghakhqi ak himkung ingkaw na venawh tyih na ak awmkhqi lung ing ak deepkung, aainu ing a cakhqi ang hlak khuiawh a khawl a cui amyihna, na cadil izah nu khawl a cui aham ang hlah ce, cehlai nang ingtaw am ngaih hyk ti.
Toek lah na im ve a hqawng nani cehtaak hyt na a awm hawh hy.
Ikawtih ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ‘Bawipa ming ing ak law taw a zoseen hy,’ tinawh nak kqawn hlan dy taw kai ve amni hu voel kawm uk ti,” tina hy.
Jesu ing bawkim ce cehta nawh ak chang na cet hy, cawh a hubatkhqi ing bawkim huh aham a venna law uhy.
Cekkhqi na ce, “Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve nak hu nu? Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, vawhkaw lung ak phoeng qu ve pynoet awm am awm kaw, khaawng boeh boeh kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing Olive tlang awh ang ngawih awh, a hubatkhqi ce a venna law dym uhy. “Vawhkaw ik-oeih ce ityk awh nu a awm kaw, nang na lawnaak ingkaw tym a dyt hatnaak ce kawmyihna a awm kaw, kqawn law lah,” tinawh doet uhy.
Jesu ing, “Thlang ing ama ni thainaak khqi aham nami cyih ta lah uh.
Ikawtih kai ang ming ing thlang khawzah law kawm usaw, 'Kai ni Khrih,' ti kawm uh, thlang khawzah ce thai na kawm uh.
Qaal tuknaak ingkaw cem a qaal awithang ce za hlai kawm uk ti koeh ly uh. Cemyih ik-oeihkhqi ce ak awm hly qoe ni, cehlai a dytnaak ce law hyn kaw.
Thlang phyn ingkaw thlang phyn tuk qu kawm usaw, qam ingkaw qam awm tuk qu kawm uh. Penglum awh khaw se kawmsaw lipi tlaai kaw.
Vemyihkhqi taw naa a awm hly awhkaw tlawh ak kqannaak hyn mai ni.
Thlangkhqi ing thekhanaak aham ingkaw thih sak aham thlang a kut awh ni pek khqi kawm uh, kai a dawngawh thlang phyn boeih ing nangmih ce ni sawh nak khqi kaw.
Cawh thlang khawzah ing cangnaak ce a mi cehtaak coengawh a mimah ingkaw a mimah nawn ce thak qu kawm usaw sawh qu na kawm uh,
tawngha qawl khawzah awm kawmsaw thlang khawzah ce thai na kawm uh.
Thawlhnaak a pung hqui hawh a dawngawh, lungnaak awm sit hawh kaw,
cehlai ang dyt dyna ak dyi phat khqi taw thaawng na awm kawm uh.
Ce qam awithang leek ve thlang phyn boeih a venawh simpyikung na a awmnaak thai aham, khawmdek penglum awh khypyi na awm kaw, cekcoengawh a dytnaak ce law kaw.
Cedawngawh nangmih ing hyn caih khuiawh, Daniel ing anak kqawn amyihna - ak noetkung ing zasim seh - 'qam ak sit sak tuih ak awm ik-oeih,' ce nami huh awh,
Judah qam khuiawh ak awmkhqi ce tlang na cen u seh.
Iptih na ak awmkhqi ing ik-oeih ak lo na koeh kqum voel seh.
Lo na ak awm thlang ing a hi ak lo na koeh hlat qoe voel seh.
Cawh ak phyihsukhqi ingkaw naa ak pawm nukhqi aham ikawmyih aih nanu a kyi kaw!
Cawhkaw nangmih nami cennaak hly a tym ce chikca ingkaw sabath nyn awh ama pha law naak aham cykcah uh.
Ikawtih khawmdek a awm cyk awhkawng amak awm man ingkaw ityk awh awm amak awm hly voel kyinaak ce am law kaw.
Cawhkaw khawnyn ce ama tawi sak awhtaw, u awm am syng tikaw, cehlai ak tyh thlangkhqi ak caming a khawnyn ce tawi sak kaw.
Cawh u ingawm, 'Vawh ni Khrih a awm,' am awhtaw 'cawh ni a awm,' ani tinaak khqi awhtaw koeh cangna uh.
Khrih na ak sa qukhqi ingkaw tawngha qawl khqi awm kawmsaw, ang coeng thai mantaw ak tyh thlangkhqi za thainaak aham hatnaak ak bau soeihkhqi ingkaw kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ce sai kawm uh.
Ngai lah uh, oepchoeh cana kqawn law hawh nyng ve.
“Thlang ing, 'kqawng na ni, anih a awm,' ani tinaak khqi awhtaw, koeh cawn uh; cemyih am awhtaw, 'Ipkhui awh ni anih a awm,' ami ti awh awm koeh cangna uh.
Khawlaw benna khaw a phla awh khawng tlaak dyna ni huh amyihna thlanghqing Capa a law awh ce amyihna awm lawt kaw.
Sa qaawk a awmnaak hoei awh, langtahkhqi ce awm kawm uh.
Kyinaak khawnynkhqi ce a awm coengawh, 'khawmik ce than kawmsaw khan sai thainaakkhqi ce thloek kaw'.
Cawh thlanghqing Capa a hatnaak ce khawk khan awh dang kaw, khawmdek awhkaw thlang phynkhqi boeih ce khy am kqang kawm uh. Thlanghqing Capa ing boeimang saithainaak ing khawk khan myi awhkawng a law ce hu kawm uh.
Anih ing ak khan ceityihkhqi ce uut ak awi ing tyi kawmsaw, khawk khan pynoet ben a dytnaak awhkawng pynoet ben dyna, ak tyh thlangkhqi ce khawmdek kili awhkawng caawi kaw.
Thai thing awhkawng ve ve cawng lah uh: a paang awh keh nawh a hahno ak cawn awhtaw, khawhqai tym zoe hawh hy ti sim uhyk ti.
Cemyih lawtna, nangmih ing vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve nami huh awh, anih taw zoe hawh hy, chawmkeng awh dyi hawh hy, tice sim uh.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi a awm hlan dy taw ve a khuk awhkaw thlangkhqi ve am khum kawm uh.
Khawk khan ingkaw khawmdek taw khum hlai voei, kak awi taw am khum qoe qoe tikaw.
Cawhkaw khawnyn ingkaw a tym ce u ingawm am sim hy, khawk khan nakaw khan ceityihkhqi ingawm, Capa ingawm am sim hy, Pa doeng ing ni a sim.
Noah a khuk awhkaw amyihna, thlanghqing Capa a law awh awm lawt kaw.
Tuiliu a law hlanawh thlangkhqi ing ai unawh aw uhy, chungva qu unawh zulawh poeikhqi sai uhy, Noah ing lawng khuina a lut dy ce amyihna awm uhy;
tuiliu a law hlan dy awhtaw ikaw ak law kaw, tice am sim uhy, cawh tuiliu ing a mingmih ce khyn khqi boeih hy.
Thlang pakhih lo awh awm kawm nih; pynoet ce lo kawmsaw pynoet ce cehta kaw.
Nu pakhih sum deeng kawm nih; pynoet ce lo kawmsaw pynoet ce cehta kaw.
Cedawngawh ityk awh na Bawipa a law kaw tice am nami sim a dawngawh qalqiing ing awm lah uh.
Cehlai ve ve sim lah uh: ip takung ing ityk awh quk-ai a law kaw tice a sim oet oet mantaw, ak nep na ana qeh kawmsaw a im ce am muk sak kaw.
Cedawngawh nangmih awm qalqiing na awm lah uh, nangmih ing am namik poek tym awh thlanghqing Capa ce law kaw.
Cawhtaw tyihzawih ypawm thlak cyi, a boeipa ing a ipkhui awhkaw a tyihzawihkhqi boeih ak khan awh ukkung na ta nawh a tym a khoek awh a mingmih buh a an peek aham a taak thlang ce u hy voei nu ce?
Cemyihna ik-oeih ak sai, boeipa ing ang voei awh a huh tyihzawih cetaw a zoseen kaw.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a khawhthem ik-oeihkhqi boeih ak khan awh anih ce ukkung na ta kaw.
Cehlai cawhkaw tyihzawih ce thlak che na awm nawh, 'Ka boeipa taw ak hla nani a awm,'
tinawh tyihzawih ak changkhqi ce a vyk coengawh zukhqui thlangkhqi mi zu ce aw mai lah seh.
A boeipa ce amak poek a khawnyn ingkaw ama sim a tym awh ce law plak kaw.
A boeipa ing anih ce chawm kawmsaw thlang qaai kqawnkhqi a huh hly kawi ce huh sak lawt kaw, ce a hyn awh kqangnaak ingkaw haatahnaak ce awm kaw.
Cawh khan qam taw nulak cym thlang pahqa ing zuk lokung do aham mai-im pawm unawh ak cetkhqi ing myih qu kaw.
Cekkhqi ak khuiawh pumha tloek taw qaw unawh pumha tloek taw cyi uhy.
Ak qaw tloek ingtaw mai-im ce khyn lawt hlai uhy maitui am khyn uhy.
Cehlai ak cyi tloek ingtaw maitui ingkaw a uum ce mai-im ingqawi khyn qen uhy.
Zuk lokung ama law hqet a dawngawh, a mingmih boeih ce ami mik ku nawh ip uhy.
Thanlung law awhtaw, zuk lokung law hawh hy,! Ak do na cet hlah uh! tinawh khy na awm hy.
Cawh nulak cyikhqi boeih ce tho unawh mai-im ce dawi uhy.
Nulak qaw tloek ing ak cyikhqi venna, maitui ni pe thoem lah uh, mai-im thi hawh kaw ve, tinak khqi uhy.
Ak cyi tloek ing, 'Amni, nangmih ingkaw kaimih aham am khoek tikaw. Maitui ak zawikhqi venna cet unawh nami ham thlai cang uh,' tina uhy.
Cehlai maitui ak thlai na ami ceh tloek awh, zuk lokung ce law hy. Oepchoeh na ak awm nulak cyikhqi taw zulawh poei khuina zuk lokung mi lut haih uhy. Cekcoengawh chawh ce khaai uhy.
Ahu na ak changkhqi ce law lawt uhy, 'Bawipa! Bawipa! kaimih chawh nim awng khqi lah! tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ing, 'Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, amni sim khqi nyng,' tinak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh khawnghi ingkaw a tym ce am nami sim a dawngawh qalqiing na awm lah uh.
Cek coeng bai awh khan qam taw thlang pynoet ing qam ak hla soeih na cet nawh, a tyihzawihkhqi ce ak khy coengawh cekkhqi venawh khawhthem a khoem sak ing myih hy.
A mimah a saithainaak qip amyihna, thlang pynoet a venawh tangka talen pumha pehy, thlang pynoet a venawh tangka talen pakhih pe nawh ak chang pynoet a venawh talen pynoet pehy, cekcoengawh khawlawng na cet hy.
Tangka talen pumha ak hu ing cet nawh cawhkaw tangka ing bi a binaak coengawh a meek pumha huh sih hy.
Cemyih lawtna, tangka talen pakhih ak hu ingawm a meek pakhih huh sih bai hy.
Cehlai tangka talen pynoet ak hu thlang ingtaw cet nawh, dek co nawh a boeipa a tangka ce thuh hy.
Khawnghi khawqyt a di coeng awhtaw a mingmih a boeipa ce law nawh a tangka kawng ce kqawn hy.
Cawh tangka talen pumha ak lo ing a meek pumha ce hawlaw nawh law hy. 'Bawipa talen pumha ni khoem sak hyk ti, toek lah a meek pumha huh sih nyng ve,' tina hy.
'A boeipa ing, nep hy, tyihzawih leek ingkaw ypawm! Ik-oeih a khoehca awh ypawm na na awm a dawngawh, ik-oeih khawzah ak khan awh ukkung na ni ta kawng. Na boeipa zeelnaak ak khuiawh kan lah! tina hy.
Cekcoengawh tangka talen pakhih ak hu ce awm law nawh, 'Bawipa tangka talen pakhih ni khoem sak hyk ti; toek lah, a meek pakhih huh sih nyng ve!' tina hy.
Bawipa ing, nep hy, tyihzawih leek ingkaw ypawm! Ik-oeih a khoehca awh ypawm na na awm a dawngawh, ik-oeih khawzah ak khan awh ukkung na ni ta kawng. Na boeipa zeelnaak ak khuiawh kan lah! tina hy.
Cekcoengawh tangka talen pynoet doeng ak hu thlang ce law hy. 'Bawipa, nang taw thlak cyyp na awm hyk ti, am na sawnaak awh awm aat tiksaw, camci am nak thehnaak awh awm cawi hyk ti.
Ka nik kqih dawngawh cet nyng saw nang a tangka ce dek khuina thuh nyng. Toek lah, na koe ve, tina hy.
A boeipa ing, 'Nang thlak che tyihzawih thakdam! Kai ing am ka sawnaak awh aat nawh am kak thehnaak awh ka cawi ce sim zawk hyk ti my?
Cawh man tangka ak thungkhqi kut awh ka tangka ve ta tiksaw ka law tlaih awh ka tangka ce a ca ingqawi ka huhnaak voei.
A ven awhkaw talen ce lawh pe unawh talen pahqa ak ta a venawh pe uh.
Ikawtih ak ta thlang a venawh sap pek khqoet kawmsaw khawzah ta kaw. Amak ta thlang cetaw, a taak ang cang awm lawh pe kaw.
Kawna awm amak nyt tyihzawih thlang ce a leng ben thannaak na khawng uh, cawh ce kqangnaak ingkaw hatahnaak awm kaw, tina hy.
“Thlanghqing Capa ing amah a boeimangnaak ingkaw khan ceityihkhqi boeih mi a law awh, khan boeimangnaak ngawihdoelh awh ngawi kaw.
Thlang phynkhqi boeih a haaiawh cun kawm usaw, tuukhaikung ing mee ak khui awhkawng tuukhqi a hoep amyihna anih ing thlangkhqi ce pek a qee kaw.
Tuukhqi ce ak tang benawh ta kawmsaw meekhqi ce ak cawng benawh ta kaw.
Cekcoengawh sangpahrang ing ak tang ben awhkaw thlangkhqi venawh, 'Law lah uh, nangmih ka Pa ing zoseennaak a peek thlangkhqi, khawmdek a syn cyk awhkawng nangmih aham a sai cee qam ce pang lah uh.
Kak phoen a cawih awh buh ni pe hyk ti, tui ka ngaih awh tui ni pe hyk ti, khin na ka awm awh ni pah sak hyk ti,
hi ka ngaih awh hi ni bai sak hyk ti, ka tlawh awh ni hqip ni toek hyk ti, thawngim kang tlaak awh ni hqip hyk ti, tina kaw.
Cawh thlak dyng ing a venawh, Bawipa, ityk awh nak phoen a cawih awh buh ka mi ni peek? Tui na ngaih awh tui ka mi ni peek?
Ityk awh khin na awm nawh ka mi ni pah sak? Hik kaana na awm awh hi ka mi ni peek?
Ityk awh na tlawh awh ka mi ni hqip? ti kawm uh.
Cawh sangpahrang ing a mingmih a venawh, 'Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, vawhkaw koeinaa ak zawi khytkhqi ak khuiawh pynoet a venawh ik-oeih nami saikhqi boeih ce kai a venawh nami sai hawh ni,' tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh ak cawng benawh ak awmkhqi venawh, nangmih khawsi ak hawikhqi ka ven awhkawng cet uh, qaai ingkaw ak khan ceityihkhqi aham a sai peek hyt kumqui mai khuina cet uh.
Ikawtih kak phoen a cawih awh buh amni pe uhyk ti, tui ka ngaih awh tui amni pe uhyk ti,
khin na ka awm awh am ni pah sak uhyk ti, hi ka ngaih awh hi amni pe uhyk ti, tlo nawh thawngim kang tlaak awh am ni hqip uhyk ti, tinak khqi kaw.
Cawh cekkhqi ing, 'Bawipa, ityk awh nang nak phoen a cawih, tui na ngaih, khin na na awm, hi kaana na awm, na tlawh, thawngim tla nawh am ka mi bawm thai? tina kawm uh.
Cawh anih ing, 'Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, vawhkaw ak zawi khyt koeinakhqi aham am na sai ce kai aham am na sai hawh ni,' tinak khqi kaw.
Cek coeng awhtaw a mingmih ce kumqui khuikhanaak a hyn na cet kawm usaw, thlak dyngkhqi taw kumqui hqingnaak ak khuina cet kawm uh,” tina hy.
Jesu ing ve ak awikhqi ak kqawn coengawh, a hubatkhqi venawh,
”Nami sim a myihna, Loentaak poei taw khaw hih voei doeng ni a ngaih hawh hy. Cawh thlanghqing Capa taw thinglam awh taai aham thlang a kut awh pe kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ce khawsoeih boei soeih Kaiapha a im awh cun uhy.
Jesu ce zoek nawh am tu coengawh him aham kqawn uhy.
Cehlai poei khui awhtaw koeh sai usih, thlang kqeng anglakawh awipungnaak awm hau kaw, ti uhy.
Jesu taw Bethany khaw awhkaw mynqai ak neh Simon a im na a awm awh,
a venawh nu pynoet ing alabaster um awh bawktui a phu ak tlo soeih ce hawlaw nawh, caboei awh buh a veel huili awh syp na hy.
A hubatkhqi ing a mi huh awh, amik kaw so hy. Ikaw hamna vemyihna ak plak?
A phu khawzah na zawi nawh tangka ce hahqahkhqi pe thaw voei, ti uhy.
Jesu ing ce amyihna a mi ti ce a sim awh, 'Ikaw hamna vawhkaw nu ve nami lawl plak? Anih ing them ak leek soeih ce kak khan awh sai hawh hy.
Hahqahkhqi taw nangmih a venawh awm quiqah kawm uh, cehlai kai taw nangmih a venawh am awm phat tikawng.
Vawhkaw nu ing bawktui ing ka pum a ni sypnaak vetaw ka qawk vyinaak aham a sai hawh ni.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, khawmdek pum awh vawhkaw awithang leek amik kqawnnaak hoei awh, anih ing kak khan awh a sai law ve amah simpoenaak aham kqawn kawm uh,” tina hy.
Cawh a hubat thlanghqa hlaihih ak khui awhkaw thlang pynoet - Judah Iskariot ing, khawsoeih boei soeih a venna cet nawh
doet hy, nangmih a kut awh anih ce ka ni peek khqi awhtaw ikaw nami ni peek kaw? tina hy. Cekkhqi ing tangka sawmthum peek aham awi ta uhy.
Cekcoengawh Juda ing anih ce am tunaak thai aham a tym leek ce sui hy.
Hen amak pa phaihpi poei a hyp oet naak nyn awh, a hubatkhqi ce Jesu a venna law unawh doet uhy, “Loentaak poei buh ainaak aham han awh nu sai sak aham na ngaih?” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Khawk bau khui awhkaw thlang pynoet a venawh cet nawh cawngpyikung ing: ka tym taw zoeca hawh hy. Ka hubatkhqi mi loentaak poei buh na im na veel kawng u nyng, tihy tina,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh Jesu ing ak kqawn peek amyihna a hubatkhqi ing loentaak poei ce sai pe uhy.
Khaw a my law awhtaw, a hubat thlanghqa hlaihih tloek mi buh veel uhy.
Buh a mi ai huili awh, a mingmih a venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nangmih ak khui awhkaw thlang pynoet ing kai ve thlang a kut awh ni thak kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh a mingmih ce amik kaw se nawh a venawh, “Bawipa, kai aw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Kai ingqawi beei ak zoep haih ing kai ve thlang nim tu sak kaw.
Thlanghqing Capa taw amah akawng qee hyt na a awm hawh amyihna cet kaw. Cehlai thlanghqing Capa thlang a kut awh ak thakkung ce khaw na map hy! Anih ce ama thang mantaw nep bet hlai voei,” tina hy.
Cawh amah ce thlang a kut awh ak pe hly Juda ing, “Kai aw cawngpyikung?” tina hy. Jesu ing “Oeih, nang hawh ni,” tina hy.
Buh ami vel huili awh, Jesu ing phaihpi lo nawh, zeelawi ak kqawn coengawh thek hy, a hubatkhqi venawh pe nawh, “Lo unawh, ai lah uh, ve ve ka sa ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh boet awm lo bai nawh, zeelawi ak kqawn coengawh a mingmih a venawh pehy, “Aw boeih lah uh;
Vetaw awikamnaak ka thi, thlang khawzah a thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak aham ka hawk ni.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ce nyn awh ka Pa qam awh ak thai na nangmih mi amni aawk hlan dy taw vawhkaw misur tui ve tuh awhkawng am aw voel tikawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Laa pynoet ami sak coengawh, Olive tlang na cet uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Tawh than awh kai ak camawh nangmih boeih tlu kawm uk ti, “Tuukhaikung ve vyk kawng nyngsaw, tuukhqi boeih a mi ngaih ngaih naak na kqeng kang kawm uh,” tinawh a qee hyt hawh a myihna.
Cehlai ka thawh tlaih coengawh, nangmih a haaiawh Kalili na ana cet kawng,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ing, “Nang ak camawh ak changkhqi boeih tlu u seiawm kai ingtaw am ning tluuk taak qoe qoe kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, tawh than qoe awh, ai ang khawng hlanawh thum voei nik khawng kawp ti,” tina hy.
Cehlai Piter ing, “Na thihnaak awh thih aham awm mai nyng seiawm, ityk awh awm am nik khawng qoe qoe tikawng,” tina hy. A hubatkhqi boeih ingawm ce amyihna ti lawt uhy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu taw Gethsemane a mi ti hyn na a hubatkhqi mi cet uhy; a hubatkhqi venawh, “Cena cykcah aham cet hly nyng, vawh a nang ngawi uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ingkaw Zebedi a caqawi ce ceh pyi hy, ak kaw se nawh ang ngaih kyi soeih hy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Thihnaak khqawh kawseetnaak ing ka hqingnaak ni vui malh hawh hy. Vawh awm unawh ni qeh pyi lawt lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
A hlanaak benna va cet nawh dek awh a koep coengawh cykcah hy, “Ka Pa, ang coeng thai awhtaw, vawhkaw boet ing ni qei seh nyng; cehlai kai ak kawngaih na koeh awm seitaw nang ak kawngaih myihna awm seh nyng,” tina hy.
A hubatkhqi venna a law awh a mingmih ce ip boeh boeh uhy. Piter a venawh, “Khawnoek pakhat khui kangna awm am nami qeh pyi thai nawh nu?
Syknaak ak khuiawh am naming tluuknaak thai aham qeh unawh qalqiing doena cykcah lah uh. Myihla ingtaw ngaih hlai hy, pumsa ingtaw zai hqoeng hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ahih voeinaak cet nawh cykcah bai hy, “Ka Pa, vawhkaw boet ing a ni qei ham am coeng thai voel nawh aawk aham a awm vik awhtaw namah ak cam seh,” tina hy.
A law tlaih bai awhtaw, a mingmih ce mikku ing a noeng khqi a dawngawh ana ip tlaih bai uhy.
Cedawngawh a mingmih ce cehta nawh a thum voeinaak na ak cykcah khawi amyihna cykcah bai hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi venna law nawh a mingmih a venawh, “Ip unawh dym bak bak uhyk ti my? Toek lah uh, a tym khoek hawh hy, thlanghqing Capa taw tu sak aham thlak thawlhkhqi kut pe hawh uhy,” tinak khqi hy.
“Tho uh, cet hlah usih! Kai thlang anik tu sakkung taw vawh awm hawh hy ve!” tinak khqi hy.
Awi ak kqawn hui awh, thlanghqa hlaihih ak khui awhkaw thlang pynoet, Juda ce pha law hy. Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ven awhkaw tangboek cimca ingkaw thingboeng amik pawm thlang kqeng ce law pyi hy.
Thlang a kut awh ak thakkung ing huhsimnaak ce sai pe hy: “Kai ing ka mawk thlang cetaw anih hawh ni, anih ce tu uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu a venna cet pahoei nawh, Juda ing, “Cawngpyikung na sa dip seh!” a tinaak coengawh mawk hy.
Jesu ing, “Ka pyi, nani law sihnaak ce sai,” tina hy. Cawh thlangkhqi ce haina thoeih unawh, Jesu ce tu uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing anik awm haih thlang pynoet ing ak cimca ce phlawng nawh, khawsoeih boei a tyihzawih ang haa ce zek pe hlak hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Nak cimca ce sapangkawp awh chan tlaih lah, u awm cimca ak phlawng taw cimca ing thi lawt kaw.
Khan ceityih qalkap bu pahqa hlaihih ce tuh qoe awh tyih law aham, ka Pa a venawh am thoeh thai tikaw, tinawh namik poek nawh nu?
Ce myihna a awm mantaw ikawmyihna Bible awi ing ak kqawn hyt ce a soepnaak kaw? tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Jesu ing thlang kqeng a venawh, “Nangmih ing kai ve quk-ai a myihna, cimca ingkaw thingboeng ing kai tu aham nami law nawh nu? Myngawi tempul khuiawh thlang cawngpyi nyng, cawh am nim tu uhyk ti.
Cehlai tawnghakhqi ak caqee a soepnaak aham ve ik-oeih ve a awm aham awm hy,” tinak khqi hy. Cawh a hubatkhqi boeih ing amah ce ta hyt unawh cen ta uhy.
Amah ak tukhqi ing Jesu ce anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ang cunnaak, khawsoeih boei soeih Kaiapha im na khyn uhy.
Cawh Piter ing khawsoeih boei soeih a im dyna ak hla nakawng a huhu awh qym hy. Ikawmyihna nu a mi sai law kaw tice sim a ngaih a dawngawh ak khuina ce lut nawh cawhkaw im ak qehkungkhqi venna ngawi lawt hy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw Sanhedrinkhqi ing Jesu a thawlhnaak ce tu pe nawh thih sak thainaak aham awi ce deng uhy.
Amak thym thawlh puknaakkhqi ce khawzah awm hlai hy, a thawlh ce am tu pe thai uhy.
A hukhit na taw thlang pakhih ce haina law nih nawh ve ak thlang ing, 'Kai ing Khawsa a tempul ce hqe nyngsaw khaw thum voei khuiawh sa tlaih kawng nyng tinawh kqawn hy,' tina hy nih.
Cawh khawsoeih boei soeih ce hang dyi nawh Jesu a venawh, “Am nam hlat hly nawh nu? Vekkqawi ing nang thawlh anik puk ve ikawmyihna a awm?,” tina hy.
Cehlai Jesu ing awmtaak dik dik hy. Khawsoih boei soeih ing, “Ak hqing Khawsa ming phoei doena ni doet nyng: Nang ve Khrih, Khawsa Capa tang nu?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Oeih, nak kqawn a myihna awm nyng, Nangmih boeih a venawh kqawn law nyng: Tuhkawng awh thlanghqing Capa ing boeimang soeih ak tang benawh ngawi kawmsaw khan myi awhkawng a law ce hu bit kawp ti,” tina hy.
Cawh khawsoeih boei soeih ing a hibai ce theek nawh, “Khawsa the a kha na hawh saw kaw ve! Kaw hamna simpyikung ni ngoe hly bai? Khawsa a thekhanaak awi ning za hawh saw kaw.
Ikawmyihna na mik poek? tinak khqi hy. Cawh a mingmih ing, “A thih aham awm hy,”, tina uhy.
A haiawh sawh unawh kuthlym ing thawng uhy. Thlang vang ing bei uhy.
“U nu anik bei, nang Khrih, kqawn lah?” tina uhy.
Piter ing kawngma awh ang ngawih awh tyihzawih nuca ce law nawh a venawh, “Nang awm Kalili thlang Jesu a venawh nak awm lawt ni,” tina hy.
Cehlai Piter ing cekkhqi boeih a haiawh oelh hy. “Nak kqawn ce am sim nyng,” tina hy.
Vawng chawmkeng benna a ceh awh nu pynoet ing hu bai nawh, cawhkaw ak awmkhqi venawh, Ve ak thlang ve Nazareth Jesu ingqawi awm haih lawt hy nih,” tina bai hy.
Cawh seet awi lawh doena: “Ve ak thlang ve am sim nyng,” tinak khqi bai hy.
Cawh a khoeh a awm coengawh a keng awhkaw ak dyikhqi ing, Piter a venna, “Nang awm amingmihkhqi lakawhkaw thlang lawt ni, nak awi pau awh sim hqa hawh hy,” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Ce ak thlang am sim nyng.” tinawh seet awi am saa awhkawng ai khawng pahoei hy.
Cawh, Piter ing Jesu ak awikqawn, “Ai ang khawng hlanawh nang ing thum voei nik khawng kawp ti,” a ti ak awi ce sim law hy. Cekcoengawh a lengna cet nawh kqang hlawp hlawp hy.
A khawngawi mymcang hqiit awh, khawsoeih boeikhqi boeih ingkaw a hqamcakhqi boeih ce law unawh Jesu ce him aham awi kqawn uhy.
Jesu ce ami pin coengawh sawi unawh, qam ukkung boei Pilat a venna khyn uhy.
Amah thlang a kut awh ak thakkung, Juda ing Jesu a mi thawlh sak ce a huh awh, zut nawh tangka sawmthum ce khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi venawh bal tlaih hy.
“Thawlh soeih hawh nyng, thawlhnaak amak ta a thi ce kai ing thlang a kut awh pe hau hawh nyng,” tinak khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Kaimih ingtaw kaw ka mi tinaak hly nu? Namah ak cam hawh ni,” tina uhy.
Cedawngawh Juda ing tangka ce bawkim ak khuina khawng nawh cehta hy. Cekcoengawh cet nawh kaiaawk hy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ing tangka ce lo unawh, “Ve a tangka taw thi phu na a awm a dawngawh, tangka bawm khuiawh chan aham am caih hy,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh cawhkaw tangka ing khin ak thikhqi pupnaak aham am ak sepkung a lo ce thlaih na uhy.
Cedawngawh cawhkaw lo ce tuh dyna “Thi hyn” ti uhy.
Cedawngawh tawngha Jeremiah ing anak kqawn ce soep hawh hy: “Isarel thlangkhqi ing anih a phu ak ting na amik poek tangka sawmthum ce lo unawh,
Bawipa ing awi a ni peeknaak amyihna, a mingmih ing am ak sepkung a lo ce amik thlaihnaak aham haw na uhy,” a ti ce.
Qam ukkung boei a haaina Jesu ang dyih awh, qam ukkung ing doet hy, “Nang ve Judakhqi a sangpahrang aw?” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Nak kqawn amyihna awm nyng,” tina hy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ing thawlh amik puk awh, awi khangoet awm am hlat hy.
Cawh Pilat ing a venawh, “Nangawh thawlh ami nik puk am nang za nawh aw? tina hy.
Cehlai anih ing awi khangoet awm am hlat qoe qoe hy, cedawngawh qam ukkung taw ak kawpoek kyi hy.
Poei awh thlang kqeng ing ak tyh thawk tla thlang pynoet ce qam ukkung ing a hlah peek khawi na awm hy.
Cawh ang ming ak thang thawk tla thlang pynoet, Barabbas a mi tice thawngim khuiawh awm hy.
Thlang kqeng kutoet na aming cun awh, “U nu hlah sak aham nami ni ngaih: Barabbas nu, am awhtaw Khrih a mi ti Jesu ve nu?” tinawh Pilat ing doet khqi hy.
Jesu ce ami yt a dawngawh ni a venna ami law pyi, tice a sim a dawngawh.
Pilat ce awidengnaak ngawihdoelh awh ang ngawih awh a zu ing vawhkaw awi ve a venawh pat pehy: “Cawhkaw thawlhnaak amak ta thlang ce kaw awm koeh ti law na, anih a dawngawh cimthan kang mang awh khuikha nyng,” tinawh awi cah hy.
Cehlai khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ing, Barabbas ce hlah nawh Jesu ce him sak aham thlang kqeng ce zoek khqi uhy.
Ram ukkung boei ing, “Thlang pakhih ak khuiawh u nu ka ni hlah peek khqi kaw tinawh doet hy. A mingmih ing, “Barabbas,” tina uhy.
“Cawhtaw Khrih a mi ti Jesu vetaw ikawmyihna ka tinaak kaw?” tinawh Pilat ing doet khqi hy. Cekkhqi boeih ing, “Thinglam awh taai!” tina uhy.
Pilat ing, “Kawtinawh nu? Ikaw thawlhnaak a sai a dawngawh nu?” tinawh doet khqi hy. Cehlai cekkhqi ing khawteh khqoet na, “Thinglam awh taai! Thinglam awh taai!” tinawh khy khqoet khqoet uhy.
Kawmyihna awm saithainaak am awm voel hawh nawh, thlang kqeng ing saai hlyk khqoet khqoet uhy, tice Pilat ing a huh awh, tui lo nawh thlang kqeng a haaiawh a kut ce sil hy. “Ve thlak dyng a thi awhkawng kai taw caih nyng. Na mimah a hut hawh ni, nami ngaihnaak a myihna sai uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhkaw amik awm thlangkhqi boeih ing, “Anih a thi ce ka mimah ingkaw ka mi cakhqi ing hawi mai bit kawng unyng,” tina uhy.
Cedawngawh Barabbas ce hlah pek khqi hy. Cehlai Jesu taw a vyk coengawh, thinglam awh taai aham a mingmih a kut awh pehy.
Cekcoengawh qam ukkungkhqi a qalkapkhqi ing Jesu boei a ipkhuina khyn uhy, cawh qalkapkhqi boeih boeih ce anih a venawh cun uhy.
Ahi ce suh pe unawh hik thim ce bai sak uhy,
hling ing ami tah lumyk ce a lu awh myk sak uhy. Sawnghqawl ce ak tang benawh amik pawm sak coengawh a haaiawh khuk sym pe unawh thekha na uhy. “Juda sangpahrang na hqinglung kyi seh!” tina uhy.
Cimtui ing sawh, a sawnghqawl ce lawh pe unawh a lu awh vyk uhy.
A mi thekhanaak coengawh, hi ce suh pe tlaih bai unawh amah a hi ce bai sak tlaih bai uhy. Cekcoengawh thinglam awh taai aham cehpyi uhy.
A mi ceh awh, Cyqene khaw awhkaw Simon ak mingnaak thlang pynoet ce hu unawh, thinglam ce anaa na kawh sak uhy.
Golgotha a mi ti hyn ce pha uhy (luqawng hyn tinaak ni).
Misur tui ak thui ce ik-oeih ak kha ing kqiit unawh aawk sak uhy; am tan coengawh aawk aham tha na hy.
Thinglam awh ami taai coengawh a hi ce taicung zyk unawh tei uhy. Cetaw “Ka hi ce taicung zyk unawh qek kawm uh,” tinawh tawngha ing anak kqawn hyt awi ce a soepnaak aham ni.
Ngawi unawh anih ce qeh uhy.
A luk khan awh: VE TAW JUDA SANGPAHRANG JESU NI, tinawh thawlh amik puknaak ca ce qee unawh taai pe uhy.
Quk-ai pakhih awm, pynoet ce ak tang benawh pynoet ce ak cawng benawh anih ingqawi thinglam awh taai qen uhy.
Cawhkaw ak cetkhqi ing anih ce kaa na unawh the a kha na uhy, ami lu khyp sih unawh
”Nang tempul hqe nawh khawnghi thum voei khuiawh ak sa tlaih, namah ingkaw namah ce hul qu lah thoeih ti! Khawsa Capa na na awm awhtaw thinglam awhkawng nuk kqum law lah thoeih ti!” tina uhy.
Cemyih lawtna, khawsoeih boeikhqi anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ingawm the a kha na uhy.
“Thlak chang taw hul hlai hy, amah ingkaw amah taw am hul qu thai hy! Isarel sangpahrang na awm hlai hy! Tuh thinglam awhkawng nuk kqum law lah seh, cawhtaw anih ce cangna kawng unyng.
Khawsa ce a ypnaak koenoek; Khawsa ing a ngaih awhtaw tuh hul lah seh nyng, 'Khawsa Capa na awm nyng,' a ti koenoek,” tina uhy.
Cemyih lawtna amah ingqawi thinglam awh a mi taai haih quk-ai qawi ingawm kaa na hy nih.
Khawnoek paquk awhkawng pakow dy dek awh khaw than hy.
Khawnoek pakow tluk awh Jesu ing khawteh na, “Eloi, Eloi, Lama sabachthani” tinawh khy hy. (Cetaw, “Ka Khawsa, ka Khawsa, kawtih nani cehtaak?” tinaak ni.)
Cawhkaw amik dyi thlang vangkhqi ing a ming zaak awh, “Elijah ni ak khy hy,” ti uhy.
A mingmih anglakawhkaw thlang pynoet ing tui ak dawp thai ik-oeih ce lo nawh misur tui ak thuui awh ce a nawk coengawh cungkui awh tlet nawh Jesu ce awk sak hy.
Cawhkaw amik awm thlangkhqi ing, “Amah poek awh awm na lah seh. Elijah law nawh ak hul hly nu, toek lah usih, tina uhy.
Cawh Jesu ce khawteh na khy nawh kawn zip hy.
Amah cek phoeih awh ce tempul ak khuina kaw hizan ce a saw awhkawng ak kai dy pakhih na teek qu hy. Khawmdek tlai nawh lungkhqi ce kqek hy.
Phyikhqi awng qu nawh thlak ciim ak thikhqi pum awm khawzah tho hy.
Phyi khui awhkawng tho unawh, Jesu a thawh tlaih coengawh khawk bau ciim khuina ce lut unawh thlang khawzah a venawh dang pe uhy.
Qalkap zakhat ak ukkung ingkaw a venawh ak awm phyi ak qehkhqi ing liipi ang tlaai ingkaw cawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce a mi huh awh kqih unawh, “Anih ve Khawsa Capa tang tang ni, ti uhy.
Cawh ce Kalili nakawng Jesu a hu awh bat nawh ak dodan nukhqi khawzah awm lawt uhy, khawsang nakawng anih ce qeh unawh dan uhy.
Cekkhqi taw Meri Magdalene, Jakob ingkaw Joses a nu Meri ingkaw Zebedi a cakhqi nu tloek ce awm uhy.
Khawmy ben a pha awhtaw Arimathai khaw awhkaw thlang boei pynoet, Jesu a hubat pynoet na ak awm Joseph ce law hy.
Pilat a venna cet nawh, Jesu a qawk ce thoeh hy, Pilat ing Jesu a qawk ce peek aham awi pehy.
Joseph ing Jesu a qawk ce a lawh coengawh, hi ak caihca ing zawl hy,
a phyi ak thai, thel a suk hqeet ak khuiawh ce ta hy. Phyi chawmkeng ce lung ak bau soeih ing tleng nawh cehta hy.
Meri Magdalene ingkaw ak chang Meri ce phyi a haai benawh ngawi hy nih.
A khawngawi, coek qoeknaak khawnghi a boeih coeng, awh khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi kutoet na Pilat a venna cet uhy.
”Bawipa amah a hqing tloek awh, thlang qaai kqawnkhqi ing, 'Am thum nyn awh tho tlaih kawng,' a ti amik kqawn ce za u nyng.
Cedawngawh am thum nyn dy awh phyi ce ak leek na a mi qehnaak aham awi pe lah. Cemih am awhtaw, cimthan awh a hubatkhqi law unawh a qawk ce a mim quuk coengawh, thlangkhqi venna anih taw thihnaak awhkawng tho tlaih hawh hy, tinawh kqawn kawm uh. Cawhtaw ahu nakaw thainaak awi ce ak cyk awhkawng lak awh nauh khqoet kaw,” tina uhy.
Pilat ing, “Ak qeh hly kawi qalkapkhqi ta u tiksaw kaw. Cet unawh phyi ce nami saithainaak khuiawh ak khoeng na qeh law sak khqi uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ce cet unawh lung awh hatnaak a mi deeng coengawh, phyi ce ak khoeng na qalkapkhqi qeh sak uhy.
Sabath nyn boeih nawh, khaw khqih nyn ak khuiawh lamma cyk khaw a dai tawm ca awh, Meri Magdalene ingkaw ak chang Meri ce phyi ak toek na cet hy nih.
Cawh liipi khawteh na tlaai nawh, Bawipa khan ceityih pynoet ce khawk khan nakawng kqum law nawh, phyi na ce cet hy, lung ce thoeng nawh ak khan awh ce ngawi hy.
A myi taw khawkphlamyihna awm nawh, a hi taw vyl amyihna baawk hy.
Phyi ak qehkhqi ing a mik kqih aih awh thyn unawh thlak thi amyihna awm hqoeng uhy.
Khan ceityih ing nu qawi a venawh, “Koeh kqih nih, thinglam awhkaw ami taai, Jesu sui hy nihk ti tice sim nyng.
Vawh am awm voel hy; ak kqawn amyihna tho hawh hy. Law nih nawh ang zaihnaak a hyn ce toek lah nih.
Ang tawnna cet nih nawh a hubatkhqi venawh kqawn pe nih: 'thihnaak awhkawng anih taw tho hawh nawh nangmih a haaiawh Kalili na cet hawh hy. Cawh anih ce hu kawm uk ti,' tina nih. Nik kqawn pek kqawi hawh nyng,” tina qawi hy.
Cawhkaw nu qawi ing anik kqih doena zeelnaak ing a hubatkhqi venawh kqawn peek aham dawng hy nih.
Cawh Jesu ing cekqawi ce hqum qawi pahoei hy. “Nani sa dip seh,” tina qawi hy. A venna cet nih nawh, a khaw awh a ni kaawp coengawh bawk hy nih.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing cekqawi a venawh, “Koeh kqih nih, ka koeinaakhqi ce Kalili awh ceh aham kqawn law pe nih; cawh ce kai ni hu kawm uh,” tina qawi hy.
Cawhkaw nu qawi ce a ni ceh hui tloek awh, phyi amik qeh thlang vang tloek ce khawk bau khuina cet unawh khawsoeih boeikhqi venawh cawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ce kqawn pe uhy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ing a hqamcakhqi mi kutoet na ngawi unawh doet qu uhy, cekcoengawh qalkapkhqi ce tangka khawzah pe uhy,
““A hubatkhqi cimthan awh law unawh ka mi ih tloek awh a nam qu uhy, tinawh kqawn uh.
Ve ak awi ve qam ukkung ing ang zaak hau awhtaw, kaimih ing hloep kawng unyng saw nangmih ce loet bit kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi uhy.
Cedawngawh qalkapkhqi ing tangka ce do unawh cekkhqi ak awi yn amyihna kqawn uhy. Ce ak awi ce tuhdy awh Juda khqing lak awh kqawn uhy.
Cekcoengawh hubat thlanghqa hlaioet tloek ce Kalili qam awhkaw, Jesu ing ak kqawn peek khqi tlang na ce cet uhy.
Amah ce hu unawh bawk uhy; cehlai thlang vang ingtaw upvoet uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venna cet nawh, “Khawk khan ingkaw khawmdek awh saithainaak boeih boeih ce ka venawh peek na awm hawh hy.
Cedawngawh cet unawh thlang phyn boeih ce ka hubat na sai law unawh, Pa, Capa ingkaw Ciim Myihla ang ming awh Baptisma pe law uh.
Kai ing awi ka ni peek khqi boeih ve a mi hquutnaak aham cawng law pyi uh. Ngai lah uh, khawmdek a dyt dyna, nangmih a venawh awm loet kawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Khawsa Capa, Jesu Khrih awithang leek ak kqannaak taw ve myihna awm hy.
Tawngha Isaiah ing: “Ka ceityih ce na haiawh tyi law kawng nyngsaw, anih ing na lam ce qoek abah law kaw.
Ramkoh awh ak khy awi ing, 'Bawipa a lam ce qoek abah unawh, a lamkhqi ce dyng sak lah uh, a tice.
Johan ce law nawh thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak aham zutnaak baptisma akawng ce kqawn nawh qamkoh awh baptisma ce pehy.
Judah qam awhkaw thlangkhqi boeih ingkaw Jerusalem awhkaw thlangkhqi boeih ce anih a venna cet uhy. Ami thawlhnaakkhqi ce kqawn unawh, cekkhqi ce Johan ing Jordan long awh baptisma pek khqi hy.
Johan ing kalauk myi hina bai nawh, ak cawi ce savyn ing zeen hy, khamkhawk ingkaw khawitui ce buh a an na ai hy.
Anih ing vemyihna kqawn hy: “Kai ahu na kai anglakawh ak bau khqoet thlang law hyn kaw, kai taw koep doena anih a khawmyk qui ak hlam peek aham awm am kawih nyng.
Kai ing nangmih ve tui ing baptisma ni pek khqi nyng, cehlai anih ingtaw Ciim Myihla ing baptisma ni pek khqi kaw,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cawh Jesu taw Kalili qam Nazareth khaw awhkawng law nawh Johan ing Jordan tui awh baptisma pehy.
Jesu tui awhkawng a hang law awh, khan ce awng qu nawh Myihla ce ak khan awh kqukkqu amyihna ak khan awh cuuk pehy.
”Khan nakaw ing: “Nang taw ka ni lungnaak ka Capa ni, nak khan awh zeel soeih nyng,” tinawh awi ce law hy.
A khoeh phoeih awh Myihla ing anih ce qamkoh na tyi pahoei hy.
