Cehlai Khawsa ing a venawh, ‘Nang thlakqaw pa, tawh than qoe awh na hqinglu ce ni lawh pe kaw; tuhawhkaw na khawhthemkhqi boeih ve u ing nu a pang kaw?’ tina hy.
U awm amah ham doeng khawh cun nawh Khawsa benawh ak khawdeng taw, vemyihna awm uhy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh: “Cedawngawh ka nik kqawn peek khqi, 'Ikaw ka ai kaw?' 'Ikaw ka bai ka naak kaw?' tinawh nami hqingnaak awh koeh ngaisa uh.
Awk ai anglakawh hqingnaak ce awipyi bet hy, suibai anglakawh pum ve awipyi bet hy.
Vangaakkhqi ce poek lah uh: quk am saw uhy, cang awm am aat uhy, khai awm am ta unawh tep awm am ta hlai uhy; cehlai Khawsa ing a mingmih ce cah khqi hy. Nangmih taw pha khqing lakawh nami phu tlo khqoet saw kaw!
U ing nu a ngaisaknaak ak caming a hqingnaak khawnoek pynoet kangna awm a cawng thai?
Vemih ik-oeih ak zawica zani am nami sai thai awh, ikaw ham ak changkhqi awh ce naming ngaisak?
Lili khqai ve ikawmyihna a taainaak tice poek lah uh. Bi am bi unawh hla awm am bi uhy. Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Solomon ing zani a boeimangnaak boeih ing ang thoei cam qu awh vawhkaw lili khqai pynoet ca kangna awm am pha hy.
Khawsa ing lo awhkaw lili khqai, tuhngawi awh awm hlai hy a khawngawi awh mai awh phum a aham ak awm zani cemyih dyna a thawi a cam awhtaw, Aw cangnaak ak zawikhqi, nangmih ak khqoet taw ikawmyih dyna nu ani thawi ani cam khqi kaw!
Awk ai awh namik kawlung koeh ta law uh; ve a dawngawh koeh ngaisa uh.
Ikawtih Khawsa amak sim lukihkhqi ing ni vemyih ik-oeih amik poek hy, vemyihkhqi ngoe uhyk ti tice nami Pa ing sim hy.
A qam ce sui cang uh, vemyihkhqi boeih awm ni sap law sih khqi bit kaw.
Tuu a khoehca khqi aw, koeh kqih uh, kawtih nami Pa ing nangmih a venawh qam peek aham ngaih hy.
Nami khawhthemkhqi ce zawi unawh taw hahqahkhqi venawh pe lah uh. Quk-ai ama ceh thainaak ingkaw laihqa ing ama hqawk thainaak, amak boeih thai khawh a awmnaak khawk khan awh, khawh ce nami mah aham cun lah uh.
Ikawtih nami khawh a awmnaak awh, namik kawlung awm awm lawt kaw.
A coekqoek na thoeih ang cam qu unawh taw nami mai-imkhqi ce a oepchoeh cana dawi uh,
zu lawh poei nakawng ak voei law hly Bawipa ce a na qeh unawh chawh ak khoek law awh a mim awng peek aham ami qeh amyihna qeh lah uh.
Ami Bawipa a law awh ih kaa na amik qeh tyihzawihkhqi ham nep kaw. Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, anih ing thoeii ang cam qu kawmsaw, cekkhqi ce caboei awh buh a veel sak khqi coengawh, a mingmih ce qeh kaw.
Khawmthan khawnoek pakkhih awh nu pakthum awh nu, a Bawipa a law awh oepchoeh na ak awm tyihzawihkhqi aham nep kaw.
Cehlai ve ve sim uh: imkung ing ityk awh nu quk-ai a law kaw, tice a sim mantaw, ityk awh awm quk-ai ce a ipkhui na am luh sak kaw.
Cemyih lawtna nangmih awm a ngaihtaak ing awm uh, am namik poeknaak a tym awh thlanghqing Capa ce law kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ing, “Bawipa, vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kaimih aham nu nak kqawn, thlakchang aham nu nak kqawn peek?” tina hy.
Bawipa ing, “Khawh ak khoemkung ypawm, ak cyi, a boei ing a tym a khoeh awh buh an ak qekna imkhui awh ukkungna ak tyh hly ce a u nu?
A pa ang voei tlaih awh cemyihna bi ak bi tyihzawih aham nep kaw.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, cemyih ak thlang ce a khawhthem boeih ak khan awh ak khawng kungna ta kaw.
Cehlai cawhkaw thlang ing, ‘ka Bawipa ve am law tang,’ tinawh tyihzawih Pa ingkaw nukhqi ce a vyk ak pai coengawh zuk qui ing awm mai lah seh.
Amak poek a khawnghi ingkaw ama sim a khawnghi awh a Bawipa ce pha law plak kaw. Anih ce ak tlyh poet poet coengawh, amak cangnaak thlangkhqi ang dyih hun ce anih ing pang lawt kaw.
A Bawipa ak kawngaih ce sim hlai hy a hylthyl na amak awm, am awhtaw a Bawipa ing sai sak aham a ngaih ce amak sai tyihzawih cetaw vyk plak cal kaw.
Cehlai ama sim dawngawh ik-oeih amak sai ingkaw coet kawi na ik-oeih ak sai cetaw a vyk boe bet kaw. Khawzah a peek thlang a venawh, khawzah ngoe kawmsaw khawzah a khoem sak thlang a venawh khawzah thoeh lawt kaw.
Khawmdek awh ve mai ni ka haw law hy, tuh awm ui hlah mai thaw voei!
Cehlai baptisma ka huh hly kawi ce awm hyn hy, ce a soep hlan dy taw khuikha mah nyng!
Khawmdek awh qoepnaak awm sak aham law hy, tinawh namik poek nawh nu? Amni, ka nik kqawn peek khqi, pek ang bonaak ni ka haw law hy.
Tuh kawng kai a dawngawh, ipkhuikaw pynoet awh hlang pumha a awm mai mantaw, pek qu kawn usaw pakthum ingkaw pakkhih ce qaal qu kawm uh, pakkhih ingkaw pakthum ce awm qaal qu kawm uh.
Pa ingkaw Capa, Capa ingkaw a pa pek qu kawm uh, a nu ingkaw a canu, a canu ingkaw a nu pek qu kawm uh, a cii ingkaw a langa, a langa ingkaw a cii pek qu kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoeng thlang kqeng a venawh, “Khaw tlaaknaak benna myi ang zam law awhtaw, ‘khaw aa kaw,’ ti uhyk ti, khaw awm aa tangak hy.
Thlung benna kaw zilh a law awhtaw, ‘khaw ling kaw,’ ti uhyk ti, khaw ling tangak hy.
Thlak thaikhqi! Khaw ingkaw khawmdek taw hat thai zawk hlai uhyk ti ce. Ikawmyihna tuh awhkaw a tym vetaw am nami hat thai?
“Ikawtih ik-oeih ak thym ce am nami hqimhqa thai?
Na qaal mi awidengnaak hyn na lam awh nani ceh hui awh, qoepnaak ce sai uh, cemyih am awhtaw na qaal ing awidengkung a venna ni sawi kaw, cekcoengawh awidengkung ing boei a venna ni khyn kaw, boei ing nang ce thawngim khui na nik thla kaw.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, laiba na ki hlan dy taw am loet kawp ti,” tina hy.
Cawh, ce nyn awh thlang vang law unawh, cekkhqi ing Galili qam thlang, Pilat ing thi, ami Khawsa bawknaak awh khqin himnaak awh a pa sak khqi awithang ce Jesu theen uhy.
Jesu ing, “Cawhkaw Kalili thlangkhqi ce ak chang Kalili thlang khqi anglakawh ami thawlh bet dawngawh ni cemyihna ami zawk hy, tinawh namik poek nawh nu?
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, cekkhqi ce am thawlh bet uhy! Cehlai nangmih awm am naming zut awhtaw, plawci lawt kawm uk ti.
Am awhtaw, Siloam ip sang ang tluk awh thlang hlaihkqet a kyih qen ce, Jerusalem awhkaw thlang khqing lak awh ami thawlh bet dawngawh vani hy voei tinawh namik poek nawh nu?
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, cekkhqi ce am thawlh bet uhy! Cehlai nangmih awm am naming zut awhtaw plawci lawt kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kqawn pehy: “Thlang pynoet ing a misur dum khuiawh thai thing ce ling hy. Hypoet awhtaw thai ak thaih ce bit aham cet moe seinu, ak thaih pynoet ca awm am hu hy.
Cedawngawh misur dum ak qehkung a venawh cet nawh, ‘kup thum khuiawh thai qah bih aham law hawh hlai nyng ak thaih pynoet awm am hu nyng. Hlu mai hlah! Dek ak kang qung,’ tina hy.
Misur dum ak qehkung ing, “Bawipa, kum oet taw ta mai cang, a kengsamkhqi cawh pe nyng seitaw, dek ak leek ing vyih cang vang nyng.
Cawhkawng a kum voel awh a qah awhtaw nep bit kaw! Cehlai ama qah bai vik awhtaw hlu dam bit kawp ti,’ tina hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Sabbath nyn hypoet awh Jesu ing sinakawk pynoet ak khuiawh thlang cawngpyi hy,
cawh kum hlaihkhqet ak khawn nu pynoet ce cawh awm hy. Am ting khun qapsat nawh am dyng na am dyi thai hy.
Jesu ing cawhkaw nu ce a huh awh, hai na khy nawh, “Nang nu, thawlhnaak awhkawng loet hawh hyk ti,” tina hy.
Ak khan awh a kut tloeng pehy, cawh cawhkaw nu ce am dyng na dyi pahoei nawh Khawsa ce kyihcah hy.
Sabbath nyn awh Jesu ing thlak tlo a qoei sak dawngawh, sinakawk ukkung ce kawso doena thlang kqeng a venawh, “Bibinaak aham khaw kquk nyn awm hy. Cawh law unawh taw nami tlawhnaakkhqi ce qoei sak uh, Sabbath nyn awhtaw koeh qoei sak uh,” tina hy.
Bawipa ing cawhkaw sinakawk ukkung a venawh, “Nangmih thlak thaikhqi! Nangmih ing Sabbath nyn awh nami vaitaw mai aw, am awhtaw meqang mai aw a qui hlam pe unawh tui am nami awk sak nawh nu?
Cawhtaw vawhkaw nu, Abraham a canu pynoet na ak awm, qaai ing khaw kum hqa hlaihkhqet khuiawh a pin ce Sabbath nyn awh amni hlam pe hly unawh nu? tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn awh, a qaalkhqi boeih taw chak uhy, cehlai anih a ik-oeih sainaak awh ce thlangkhqi taw zeel uhy.
Jesu ing vemyihna doet hy, “Khawsa qam ve ikaw ing nu a ning myih hy voei? Ikawng nu ka nyhtah lah voei?
Khawsa qam taw thlang ing antlam cii lo nawh dum khuiawh ak theh ing myih hy. Cawhkaw antlam cii ce cawt nawh a thing na dyi law hy, khan nakaw phakhqi law unawh a pang awh ce ngawi uhy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh vemyihna doet tlaih bai hy, “Ikawng nu Khawsa qam ve ka nyhtah lah voei?
Khawsa qam taw nu ing vaidam dawn khuih thum ak khuiawh hen a zamnaak boeih aham a phul ing myih hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing Jerusalem na a ceh awh khawk bau ingkaw vangcakhqi awh ce thlang cawngpyi noe noe hy.
Thlang pynoet ing “Bawipa, thlang a khoehca doeng ing nu thawngnaak a huh kaw?” tinawh doet hy.
Cekkhqi venawh, “Chawmkeng ak ceek khuiawh kun ngah ngah lah uh, kawtih thlang khawzah ing kun aham tha lo hly hlai uhy am kun thai kawm uh.
Imkung ing tho nawh chawh ce a khaih coengawh taw, a leng na dyi kawm utik saw chawh ce khoek kawm uk ti, ‘Bawipa chawh awng law lah,’ tina kawm uk ti. “Cehlai anih ing, ‘Amni sim khqi nyng, hana kawng nu nami law hy,’ ni tinak khqi kaw.
Cawh nangmih ing, “Nang ing buh a an ni aw ni ai haih saw kaw, lam awh awm ni cawngpyi tik saw kaw,” tina kawm uk ti.
Cehlai anih ing, ‘Amni sim khqi nyng, hana kawng nu nami law hy. Nangmih thawlhnaak ak saikhqi, ak chang na cet uh!’ ni tinak khqi kaw.
Abraham, Isaak, Jakob ingkaw tawnghakhqi boeih Khawsa qam khuiawh ami awm ce nami huh awh, nangmih taw a leng na kqangnaak ingkaw hatahnaak a hun awh awm kawm uk ti.
Khaw law khawtlak, a sip a hawt benna kawng thlangkhqi law kawm usaw, Khawsa qam khuiawh buh veelnaak kung awh ngawi kawm uh.
Hu ak khyngkhqi ce ma kawm usaw, ak makhqi ce hu khyng lat kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Farasi thlang a vangkhqi ce Jesu a venna law unawh a venawh, “Ve a hun ve cehta nawh ak chang na cet hlah. Herod ing nang him aham ngaih hy,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Cet unawh taw ak thai ngentang ce kqawn pe uh, “Tuhngawi awh awm khawngawi awh awm qaaikhqi hqek kawng nyng saw thlak tlokhqi qoei sak kawng, am thum nyn awh kang cainaak ce coeng kawg nyng’ tihy tina uh.
Kawmih awh awm, tuhngawi, khawngawi ingkaw tiktuh dy ka ceh qoe qoe aham awm hy, tawngha ikawmyih awm Jerusalem khawceng awh am thi thai hy!
Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem, tawnghakhqi ak himkung ingkaw na venawh a tyih lawkhqi lung ing ak khawngkung, ai nu ing a cakhqi ang hlak khui awh ang koep sih amyihna, na cakhqi izah nu hqui sawi aham, ka ngaih ce, nang ingtaw am ngaih hyk ti!
Toek lah, na im ve a sit qak nani ami cehtaak hyt hawh hy. Ka nik kqawn peek, ‘Bawipa ming ing ak law taw a zoseen hy,’ tinawh nak kqawn hlan dy taw kai ve amni hu qoe voel kawp ti,” tina hy.
Sabbath nyn hypoet awh, Jesu taw Farasi a hqamca thlang pynoet a im awh buh ai na cet hy, cawh Jesu ce ngaihtaak doena doen uhy.
Ce a hun awh a haiawh ak phoen tawng nawh ak hling thlang pynoet ce awm hy.
Jesu ing Farasikhqi ingkaw anaa awi ak sim thlangkhqi ce doet khqi hy, “Sabbath nyn awh thlak tlo qoei sak ve ak ciim nu, amak ciim nu?” tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai cekkhqi ing ikaw awm ap kqawn pe uhy. Cedawngawh Jesu ing cawhkaw thlak tlo ce tu nawh a qoei sak coengawh tyi hy.
Cekcoengawh cekkhqi venawh, “Nangmih ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet oet a ca aw, vaitaw mai aw Sabbath nyn awh lawk-kqawng khuina ang tlaak mantaw, am namik dawk hly nawh nu?” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh ikaw awm ap kqawn uhy.
Buh veelnaak kungawh thlangkhqi ing ngawihdoelh ak sang sang amik tyk ce a huh awh, vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kqawn pehy:
Thlang ing buh ai na anik khy khqi awh, ngawihdoelh sang ce koeh tyk uh, nangmih anglakawh thlang qypawm ngai ce buh ai na khy hly mai hy.
Cemyihna a awm mai mantaw, imkung na venawh, ‘Nang ngawihnaak awh ve ak thlang ve ngawih sak’ ni tina kaw. Cawhtaw chah doena ngawihnaak ak nem awh ngawi zawk ka kawp ti.
Cedawngawh thlang ing buh ai na anik khy awh, ngawihnaak ak nem soeih awh ngawi mai, cawh ni imkung ce a law awh na venawh, “Ka pyi ngawihnaak ak leek awh ngawi,” a haiawh kqihchahnaak ce na huh hly. Cawh buh ai na ak lawkhqi boeih a haiawh kqihchahnaak ce na huh hly.
U awm amah ingkaw amah ak zoeksang qu taw ak kaina nung tla kaw, cehlai ak kaina ak awmkhqi ing zoeksangnaak ce hu kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing imkung a venawh, “Khawnghyp awh aw, am awhtaw khawmy ben awh aw thlang buh ai na nak khy awhtaw, na pyikhqi, na naakhqi ingkaw na cakaw paqengkhqi koeh khy; nak khy mantaw, cekkhqi ingawm buh ai na nik khy lawt kawm usaw ni thung hlyk tlang uhy.
Cedawngawh thlang buh ai na nak khy awh, hahqahkhqi, khawk khem khqi, khawkzui khqi ingkaw mikhypkhqi ce khy kawp ti,
cawhtaw zoseennak hu kawm uk ti. A mingmih ing amni thung lawk khqi qoe seiawm, thlakdyngkhqi thawh tlaihnaak khawnghi awh ni thung law tlaih kaw,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw awi ce amah cawh amah ing anik ngawi haih thlang pynoet ing ang zaak awh Jesu a venawh, “Khawsa qam khuiawh poei buh veelnaak kung awh ak pa kawi thlang taw a zoseen hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Thlang pynoet ing poei ak bau soeih sai nawh buh ak ai na thlang khawzah ce khy hy.
buh ainaak tym a pha awh imkung ing buh ai na ak khy thlangkhqi venawh a tyihzawih thlang ce tyi nawh khy sak hy, ‘law lah uh, ik-oeihkhqi coeng boeih hawh hy,’ tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai cekkhqi boeih ing ami peelnaak lam ce sui boeih uhy. Lamma cyk thlang ing, ‘lo thlai thai nyng saw, toek lah vang nyng. Ni hlah mai cang,’ tina hy.
Ak chang pynoet bai ing, ‘Vaitaw bawh nga thlai nyng saw, noek a dak lah vang nyng. Ni hlah mai cang,’ tina bai hy.
Pynoet bai ing, ‘kai zu lo thai nyng saw, am law hly thai nyng,’ tina hy.
A tyihzawih ce law nawh a boeipa a venawh ce mihkhqi boeih ce kqawn pehy. Cawh imkung ce ak kaw so nawh a tyihzawih a venawh ‘Khawmdek khuina kaw lampyi ingkaw lamkel awh ang tawnna cet nawhtaw khawdeng hahqahkhqi, khawk khemkhqi, mikhyp khqi ingkaw khawkzui khqi ce law pyi,’ tina hy.
A tyihzawih ing, ‘Bawipa, awi nani peek amyihna sai hawh hlai nyng, a hun hoeng toeng toeng hyn hy,’ tina hy.
Cawh Bawipa ing a tyihzawih a venawh, ‘lampyi ak bau ingkaw lam ak cawng ak kekhqi na ce cet nawhtaw na huh a saqui ce lawpyi kawp ti, cawh ni ka im awh a be hly hy.
Ka nik kqawn peek, kak thlang ceikhqi ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet ca ingawm ka poei buh ve am tan kaw,’ tina hy.
Thlang khawzah Jesu a hu awh bat unawh khin na cet haih uhy, cekkhqi venawh Jesu ing:
U awm ka venawh law nawh a nu ingkaw a Pa, a zucakhqi, a koeinu koeinaakhqi boeih, amah a hqingnaak ha awm – a mak sawhnaak thlang taw kai a hubat na am awm thai kaw.
U awm amah a thinglam ce kawt nawh kai a hu awh amak bat taw kai a hubat na am coeng thai hy.
Nangmih ak khuiawh thlang pynoet ing ip sang sak aham ngaih lah seh. Anih ing ngawi lamma cang nawh a saknaak khoek tangka a taak ingkaw ama taak am nym am nai hly ma nawh nu?
Ak poek ma kaana tung ce ling sawhqat bai seiawm im ce amak coeng lawk awhtaw, ak hu saqui ing qaih na kawm uh,
‘Ve ak thlang ing im taw sa mylyk lawt nawh, ak coeng na awm ap coeng lak law hy,’ tina kawm uh.
Kqawnnaak mai awh sangpahrang pynoet taw a qaal sangpahrang ing tuk qu aham cai lah seh. Ngawi lamma cang nawh, a qaal ben awhkaw thlang thongkul amah ben awhkaw thlang thonghqa ing a tuk thai hly ingkaw ama tuk thai hly ce poek lamma kaana awm kawm nu?
Ama tuk thai hly mantaw, a qaalkhqi lam na ami law hui awh, dyihthing tyi nawh qoepnaak ce sai kaw.
Cemyih lawtna, u awm ik-oeih soepkep amak cehtaak thai taw kai a hubat na am kawih hy.
Ci taw leek hy, cehlai alnaak ce a paih mantaw ikawmyihna nu a alnaak thai tlaih kaw?
Dek leek na awm am awm nawh, vaitaw pana a ek anglakawh za am leek kaw; khawng aham doeng na ni a awm hawh hy. U awm zaaknaak haa ak ta ingtaw za seh,” tinak khqi hy.
Mangmu ak cawikungkhqi ingkaw thlakthawlhkhqi ing ak awi ak ngaina a venawh law uhy.
Cehlai Farasikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi taw sai bi uhy, Ve ak thlang ing thlak thawlhkhqi ym nawh buh ai pyi khqi haih hy, ti uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kqawn pek khqi hy:
nangmih ak khuiawh thlang pynoet ing tuu zakhat a taak ak khuiawh pynoet ce qeng lah seh, sawmkow pakow ce a cehtaak coengawh ak qeng pynoet ce a huh hlan dy taw am sui kawm nu?
A huh tlaih awhtaw, ak phleng awh kawt nawh,
im na ceh pyi hy. A imcengkhqi ingkaw a pyikhqi ce ak khy coengawh, Ni zeel pyi lawt lah uh; tuu ak qeng ce hu tlaih hawh nyng,’ tinak khqi hy.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, cemyih lawtna zut aham amak ngoe thlakdyng sawmkow pakow anglakawh thlakthawlh pynoet ang zutnaak awh ce khawk khan awh zeelnaak doem khqoet kaw.
Nu pynoet ing tangka phoeksa pahqa ta hlai hy pynoet ce qeng sak valh hy. Mai vang nawh, im ce ak leek na a nawt coengawh a huh hlan dy taw phoeksa ak qeeng ce am sui kawm nu?
A huh tlaih awhtaw, a pyikhqi ingkaw a imceng locengkhqi ce khy nawh, Ni zeel pyi khqi hy.
Cemyih lawtna, ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlakthawlh pynoet ang zutnaak awh Khawsa ak khan ceityihkhqi haiawh zeelnaak ce awm kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing nyhtahnaak awi kqawn pe tlaih bai hy: Thlang pynoet ing cakpa pakkhih tahy.
A capa ang no ing a pa venawh, ka pa ka huh hly kawi qo ce ni pe hlah,’ tina hy. Cedawngawh a pa ing qo ce bo pehy.
Cekcoengawh taw, a capa ang no ing amah a ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce lo nawh khawk hla soeih na cet hy, ce a qam awh a khawhthemkhqi ce plak boeh boeh hy.
A khawhthemkhqi ce ak plak boeih coengawh, cawhkaw a awmnaak qam awh ce khawseet khawkhanaak pha law hy, cawh anih ce voet a hlauh law hy.
Cedawngawh ce a qam awhkaw thlang pynoet a bi ce bi pehy, cawhkaw thlang ing anih ce lo awh vawk ak cah aham na tyi hy.
Ak phoen cawi aih nawh vawk ing a ai lyian kawikhqi ce ai aham nai hy, cehlai u ingawm ai aham ikaw awm am pehy.
Cawh poek qu nawh, ‘Ka pa ak thlangvatkhqi ing zani awk lek ai naa na awk ai ta hlai uhy, kai taw vawh lum tawm hawh nyng!
Tho nawh ka pa venna hlat tlaih mai vang nyng, a venawh: Ka pa, khan ingkaw nang a haiawh thawlh hawh nyng.
Na ca na awm khy aham am kawih voel nyng; nak thlangvat pynoet na awm ni ta lawt mai, tina vang nyng,’ tihy.
Cedawngawh tho nawh a pa venna cet hy. Ak hla na a law awh, a pa ing hu hqoet nawh qeen hy; a capa venna dawng nawh kawp hqoet nawh mawk hy.
A capa ing a pa venawh, ‘Ka pa, khan ingkaw nang a haiawh thawlh hawh nyng. Na ca na khy aham am kawih voel nyng,’ tina hy.
Cehlai a pa ing a tyihzawihkhqi venawh, ‘Ang tawnna! Angki ak leek soeih ce haw law unawh taw bai sak uh. A kut awh kutcabyn byn sak unawh, a khaw awh khawmyk myk law sak uh.
Vaitaw ak tha soeih ce haw law unawh taw him uh. Awmhly zeelnaak ing buh veelnaak sai lah u sih.
Vawhkaw ka capa ve thi hawh hlai hy hqing tlaih hawh hy, qeng hawh hlai hy hu tlaih hawh nyng,’ tinak khqi hy. Cedawngawh buh veelnaak ce sai uhy.
Cedawngawh a capa a hqam taw lo na awm hy. Im a pha law tawm awh ce, laa sak awi ingkaw lamnaak awi ce zahy.
Cedawngawh tyihzawih pynoet ce khy nawh doet hy.
Anih ing, ‘Na naa ce hlat law tlaih nawh, sadip cana im a pha law tlaih dawngawh, na pa ing vaitaw ak tha soeih ce him pehy,’ tina hy.
Cedawngawh a hqamca ce ak kaw so nawh ipkhui na a kun ham awm am ngaih voel hy. Cedawngawh a pa ce cet nawh a capa a hqam ce hloep hy.
Cehlai anih ing a pa venawh, ‘Toek lah! Kum veqyt nang a tamnaa na awm nyng saw nak awi awm am eek khawi nyng. Cehlai ka pyikhqi mi zeelnaak aham me ca pynoet kangna awm am ni pe hyk ti.
Vawhkaw na capa, a pum ak zawikhqi mi ik-oeih ak poeih ak lak thlang ce a law awh, vaitaw ak tha soeih him pe hyk ti!’ tina hy.
A pa ing a venawh, ‘Ka capa, nang taw ka venawh awm poepa hyk ti, kai ing ka taak boeih boeih ve nang a koe nani a awm hy.
Buh veelnaak ni sai nawh ni zeel aham awm hy, vawhkaw na naa ve thi hawh hlai hy, hqing law tlaih hawh hy; anih taw qeng hawh hlai hy ni hu tlaih hawh hy,’ tina hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh: “Thlang boei pynoet awm nawh anih a tangka ak khoemkung ing tangka poeih pe kang hy tinawh amik kqawn ce zahy.
Cedawngawh a boei ing khy nawh doet hy, ‘Na kawng kang zaak ve ikawmyihna a awmnaak? Tangka na khoem ce nim huh lah, ka tangka ak koemkung na am awm hly voel hyk ti,’ tina hy.
Cedawngawh tangka ak khoemkung ing ‘ikawmyihna nu ka ti lah kaw? Ka boeipa ing ka bibi awm ni qoek hly sak hawh hy. Dek deng aham awm kak tha am awm koek, thlang a venawh kut dun aham awm chak koek bai nyng.
Ka sai hly taw sim hawh nyng, cawh ni bibi ani phawh awhtaw thlangkhqi ing kai ve ami im awh ami ni do hly hy,’ tihy.
Cedawngawh a boeipa a ik-oeih ak pukhqi ce khy hy. Lamma cyk awhkaw thlang ce khy nawh, ‘Ka boeipa a koe ik-oeih izah nu nak pu peek? tina hy.
Anih ing, ‘Olive situi boet zaqeet,’ tina hy. Law lah, ang tawnna ngawi nawhtaw zali na sai mai,’ tina hy.
Cekcoengawh a pak khihnaak awhkaw thlang ce doet tlaih bai hy, ‘Nang law izah nak pu? tina hy. “Anih ing, ‘Canghum sum thongkhat,’ tina hy. Tangka ak pukung ing, ‘Nak punaak cahawn ce lo nawhtaw sum zaqeet na sai mai,’ tina hy.
Amak thym na bi ak bi tangka ak khoemkung ing cyihnaak ing bi a bi dawngawh a boeipa ing kyih am cah hy. Ve khawmdek thlangkhqi ing a mimah a ik-oeih ami sai awhtaw vangnaak khuiawh ak awmkhqi anglakawh awm cyi ngai uhy.
Nangmih a venawh ka nik kqawn peek khqi, pyi sainaak aham khawmdek boeinaak ce hawna lah uh, cawh ni ce mihkhqi boeih a boeih coengawh, a mingmih ing kumqui awmnaak hun awh nangmih ce ani do hly khqi hy.
U awm ik-oeih a khoehca awh ypawm na ak awm taw ik-oeih khawzah awh awm ypawm na awm hy, cehlai ik-oeih a khoehca awh ypawm na amak awm taw ik-oeih khawzah awh awm upvoet na awm hy.
Khawmdek boeinaak awh zani ama ypawm awhtaw, u ing nu boeimangnaak tang tang ce ani khoem sak kaw?
Thlang a ik-oeih awh ypvoet na na awm coengawh taw, u ing nu nang ce ik-oeih a ni peek kaw?
Tyihzoeih thlang pynoet ing boei pakkhih a bi pakkhih am bawk thai hy. Pynoet ce sawh na kawmsaw pynoet ce lungna kaw, am awhtaw pynoet ce ypna kawmsaw pynoet taw hep kaw. Khawsa bi ingkaw tangka bi am bawk hly thai qen hyk ti,’ tinak khqi hy.
Tangka amik thintlawhnaak Farasikhqi ing ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh Jesu ce qaih na uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Thlang amik huh awh nangmih ing thlakdyng na sa qu uhyk ti, cehlai Khawsa ing nangmih ak kawlung ce sim hy. Thlang ing a phu ak tlo soeih na a taak ce Khawsa mik huh awhtaw tyih cu hy.
Johan a khuk dy ni anaa awi ingkaw tangkakhqi ca qee ce amik khypyi hy. Cekcoengawh kawng Khawsa ram awithang ce khypyi hawh uhy, thlang boeih ing ce ak khuiawh kun aham tha lo uhy.
Anaa awi awhkaw a dek zet ce ang qeng anglakawhtaw khawk khan ingkaw khawmdek ang qeng zoei bet kaw.
U ingawm a zu thla nawh nuk chang a lawh awhtaw samphaih hy, thlang a zuk thlak ak zunaak awm samphaih toeng toeng hy.
Kuiqang thlang pynoet awm nawh hik thim ingkaw hi ak leek leek ing myngawi ang thoeihcam qu coengawh awm hly poepa hy.
Ak chawmkeng a keng awh Lazaru ak mingnaak kut ak dun thlang pynoet ce awm hy, a pum boeih na phoei ing bawm nawh,
kuiqang a caboei awhkaw ak tla awkdik aidik ce ai aham ngaih hy. Uikhqi ing ak phoei ce leek pe uhy.
Cawhkaw kut ak dun thlang ce thi nawh khan ceityihkhqi ing Abraham a venna khyn uhy. Kuiqang thlang awm thi lawt nawh pup uhy.
Hell khuina khuikha a sim cilh cilh awh ak hla nakawng Abraham ingkaw a venawh Lazaru ak awm ce hu hy.
Ak khy doe na, ‘Ka pa Abraham, qeennaak ing Lazaru ce tyi nawhtaw tui awh a kutply pui seitaw kam lai ve ci law sak lah seh, vawhkaw mai awh ve khuikha cip cip hawh nyng ve,’ tina hy.
Cehlai Abraham ing, ‘Ka capa, na hqing khui pyt awh ik-oeih ak leek leek hu tiksaw, Lazaru taw ik-oeih che a huh ce poek lah, cehlai tuh awhtaw anih ing ngaihdingnaak hu nawh nang taw khuikha hyk ti.
Vekkhqi boeih coengawh, nang ingkaw kaimih anglakawh lawk-kqawng ak dung soeih awm hy, cedawngawh vawhkawng nang a venna u awm am cet thai hy, nang a venna kawng vena u awm am law thai bai hy,’ tina hy.
Cawh anih ing, ‘cawhtaw ka pa Abraham, qeennaak thoeh law nyng, Lazaru ce Ka pa im na tyi cang lah,
Ka naa thlang pumha awm hyn hy. Vawhkaw khuikha simnaak a hun awh a mami lawnaak thai aham anih ing kqawn law pe cang lah seh nyng,’ tina hy.
Abraham ing, ‘Mosi ingkaw tawnghakhqi ta hawh usaw ti a; cekkhqi ak awi ce ngai mai u seh,’ tina hy.
Anih ing, ‘Amni, ka pa Abraham, thlak thi ak khuiawh kawng thlang pynoet oet a mingmih a venna a ceh mantaw thawlh zut kawm uh,’ tina hy.
Abraham ing a venawh, ‘Mosi ingkaw tawnghakhqi ak awi ce a maming ngai awhtaw, thihnaak ak khuiawh kawng thlang tho nawh kqawn pe bai seiawm am ngai hly uhy,’ tina hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh: “Thlang ak thawlh sak ik-oeih taw awm hly ngai ngai hy, cehlai thawlhnaak aham ce a ik-oeih ak awm sakkungkhqi ce khaw na map uhy.
Vawhkaw naasenkhqi thawlh sak anglakawhtaw cawhkaw thlang ce a hawng awh cang neetnaak lung awi sak nawh tuilik khuina nik khawng man anih aham leek hly bet hy.
Cedawngawh ak leek na qalqing uh. Na koeinaa a thawlh awhtaw, anih ce toel lah, ang zut awhtaw, ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngai law.
Nak khan awh khaw hypoet awh ak khqih dy awh thawlh nawh, ak khqih dy bai lawt na venawh, ‘Zut nyng’ a ti awhtaw qeenkhaw ngai law pe,” tinak khqi hy.
Ceityihkhqi ing Bawipa venawh, “Kaimih ak cangnaak ve taai law sak lah! tina uhy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Antlam ak ui teh mah cangnaak nami taak mantaw, vawhkaw thaithing a venawh, ‘Nak kqa mah na phu qu nawhtaw tuicunli na khawng qu lah,’ nami tinaak awh ce, nami tinaak amyihna namik awi ce ngai law kaw.
Nangmih ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet ing, laikawk ak nawk, am awhtaw tuu ak khai tyihzawih pynoet ta mai lah seh. Cawhkaw tyihzawih ce laikawk nakaw a pha law kqoeng awh,
Buh lo hlah, leng qu nawhtaw buh ka ai boeih hlan dy ni qeh; cekcoengawh aw a ai bit kawp ti,’ am namik tinaak hly nu?
A sai hly kawi ik-oeih ce a sai dawngawh a tyihzawih ak khan awh zeelnaak awi ak kqawn hly re aw?
Cemyih lawtna nangmih awm nami sai hly kawi ik-oeih boeih nami sai coengawh, ‘Amak kawihka tyihzawih na ni ka mi awm hy; ka sai hly kawi qoe ni ka mi sai hy,’ ti uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Jerusalem khaw benna, Samari ingkaw Kalili khawqi benna kawng cet hy.
Vangca pynoet ak khuiawh, a kun awh, mynqaai ak neh thlang thlanghqa ing pan law uhy. Ak hla nakawng dyi unawh,
khawteh na, Bawipa Jesu, kaimih ve nim qeen khqi lah! tinawh qeennaak thoeh uhy.
Cekkhqi ce a huh awh, “Cet unawh taw, khawsoeih a venawh nami pum ce huh uh,” tinak khqi hy. A ming voei awh ce a mingmih ce qoei boeih uhy.
A mingmih ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet ing, mynqaai a qoei ce a huh awh, hlat law tlaih nawh, khawteh na khy nawh Khawsa ce kyihcah hy.
Jesu a khawkung awh ce ang tluk doena zeelnaak awi kqawn hy; anih taw Samari thlang na awm hy.
Jesu ing, Thlanghqa na qoei boeih uhyk ti my? Thlang kow tloek taw hana nu ami awm?
Vawhkaw khaw lawk thlang ti kaa taw ak chang tloek ak khuiawh Khawsa kyihcah aham ak voei law pynoet ca awm am awm nawh nu? tinawh doet law pynoet ca awm am awm nawh nu? tinawh doet khqi hy.
Ce ak thlang a venawh, “Tho nawhtaw cet hlah, nak cangnaak ing ni qoei sak hawh hy,” tina hy.
Hypoet taw, Khawsa qam a lawnaak hly akawng ce Farasikhqi ing doet uhy. Jesu ing, “Khawsa qam taw nangmih a mikhuh awh am law hy,
'Vawh ni a awm,’ am awhtaw, ‘Cawh ni a awm,’ tinawh u ing awm ap kqawn thai hy. Khawsa ram taw nangmih ak khuiawh ni a awm,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi venawh, “Thlanghqing Capa a khawnghi hypoet ca awm huh aham nami ngaihnaak a khawnghi ce law kaw, cehlai am hu kawm uk ti.
thlangkhqi ing, ‘cawh ni a awm hy ce!’ am awhtaw, ‘Vawh ni a awm hy ve!’ ni tinak khqi kaw. Cekkhqi hu awh koeh cet uh.
Thlanghqing Capa a khawnghi taw khaw phla balh balh nawh khan ak kqannaak awhkawng a dytnaak dyna ak coei amyihna awm kaw.
Cehlai anih ing khuikhanaak ce hu ma kaw, ve a khuk awhkaw thlangkhqi ing hoet kawm uh.
Novah khuk awhkaw myihna, Thlanghqing Capa a khawnghi ce awm lawt kaw.
Novah ing lawng khuina a kun dy, thlangkhqi ing ai uhy, aw uhy, zu lo unawh vaa ta uhy. Cehlai tuiliu ce law nawh a mingmih ce liu khqi boeih hy.
Lot a khuk awh awm cemyihna ce awm hy. Cawhkaw thlangkhqi ing ai uhy, aw uhy, ik-oeih zawi uhy, thlai uhy, ik-oeih ling uhy, imkhqi sa uhy.
Cehlai Lot ing Sodom khaw a cehtaaknaak a khawnghi awhtaw, khan nakawng kat mai tla law nawh a mingmih boeih ce ui hy.
Thlanghqing Capa a lawnaak khawnghi ce cemyihna awm lawt kaw.
Ce a khawnghi a pha awh u awm iptih na ak awm ing, ipkhui nakaw ik-oeih ak lo na koeh nuk kqum voel seh. Lo na ak awm ing ik-oeih ak lo na im na koeh hlat tlaih voel seh.
Lot a zu ce poek uh!
U awm a hqingnaak thawng aham ak ngaih ing a hqingnaak ce hlawng kawmsaw, u awm a hqingnaak ak hlawng ingtaw hu lat kaw.
Ce am than awh, ihkhun awh thlang pakkhih ip kaw; pynoet ce lo kawnsaw, pynoet ce cehta kaw.
Nu pakkhih ing sum su kaw; pynoet ce lo kawmsaw, pynoet ce cehta kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh, “Lo awh thlang pakkhih awm kaw; pynoet ce lawh na awm kawmsaw pynoet cetaw cehtaak na awm kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ing, Bawipa, ce han awh a awm kaw? tinawh doet uhy. Anih ing, “Meh qawk a awmnaak awh, langtahkhqi awm kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Kawboet kaana cykcah poepa aham awm hy tice ami simnaak aham Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh nyhtahnaak awi pynoet kqawn peek khqi hy.
A mingmih a venawh: “Khaw pynoet awh Khawsa awm amak kqih, thlanghqing awm kawna amak ngai awidengkung thlang pynoet ce awm hy.
Ce a khawk khuiawh nuhai pynoet awm nawh, cawhkaw awidengkung a venawh, ‘Ka qaal ingkaw kai anglakawhkaw awi ve am dyng na kqawn law lah,’ tinawh cet poepa nawh qeennaak thoeh hy.
Iqyt num taw am ngai am loek na hy. Cehlai a hu na taw poek quhy, ‘Khawsa awm ap kqih nyng saw thlanghqing awm kawna am ngai pai hlai nyng,
vawhkaw nuhai ing ni ngeu ni lawn khing kaw ve, awihdyng kqawn pe hlah mai vang nyng, cawh ni am law qoe voel kawmsaw a mani ngeu ama ni lawn hly hy,’ tihy” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh Bawipa ing, “Amak thym awidengkung ak awi ve ngai lah uh.
A venawh khawmthan khawdai ko ang kqang doena ak cykcah, amah ing ak tyh thlangkhqi aham Khawsa ing am dyng na awi am deng kawm nu? A mingmih ce awm hly taak dym nawh nu?
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, anih ing awi ang tawnna deng kaw. Cehlai thlanghqing Capa a law awh, khawmdek awh cangnaak ak hu hly hyn hy voei nu? tihy.
Amah am dyngnaak ypna nawh thlang ak husitkhqi venawh, vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kqawn pehy:
Thlang pakkhih taw cykcah aham bawkim na cet hy nih. Pynoet taw Farasi thlang na awm nawh pynoet taw mangmu ak cawikung na awm hy.
Farasi thlang taw dyi nawh vemyihna cykcah hy: “Khawsa, kai taw quk-aikhqi, thawlhnaak ak saikhqi, samphaihkhqi ingkaw vawhkaw mangmu ak cawikung amyihna awm am ka awm a dawngawh, na venawh zeel nyng.
Khaw khqih nyn khuiawh buh hih voei ka zeih coengawh ka huh boeih ak khuiawh pahqa pynoet ak thym cana pe nyng,’ tihy.
Cehlai mangmu ak cawikung taw ak hla na dyi hoer nawh, khan benna awm am mang hqa hy, ak kqang pung nawh, ‘Bawipa, kai thlakthawlh ve nim qeen lah,’ tinawh cykcah hy.
Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, cawhkaw thlang ing Khawsa haiawh dyngnaak ce hu nawh im na voei hy. U awm amah ingkaw amah ak zoeksang qu taw ak kaina nung tla kaw, cehlai ak kaina ak awm ing ce zoeksangnaak hu kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Thlangkhqi ing naasenkhqi ce Jesu ing a bi aham a venawh law pyi uhy. A hubatkhqi ing ami huh awh, thlangkhqi ce zyi uhy.
Cehlai Jesu ing naasenkhqi ce a venna ak khy coengawh, “Naasenkhqi, ka venna law sak uh, koeh hqek u, kawtih Khawsa qam taw vemyih ak thlangkhqi ham ni.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u ingawm Khawsa qam ce naasen amyihna amak do taw ak khuiawh am kun thai kaw,’ tinak khqi hy.
Ukkung thlang pynoet ing, “Cawngpuikung leek, kumqui hqingnaak ka pangnaak thai aham ikaw ka sai hly.” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Ikawtih leek hy nani tinaak? Khawsa doeng am taw u awm am leek hy.
Awipeekkhqi sim tiksaw kaw: ‘Koeh samphaih, thlang koeh him, koeh qu, amak thym dyihthing na koeh dyi, na nu ingkaw na pa zoeksang lah,’ a tice ti,” tina hy.
Anih ing, “Vemihkhqi boeih ve ka naasen awhkawng ni ka sai hawh,” tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce Jesu ing ang zaak awh, a venawh, “Pynoet voet hun hyk ti. Na taakkhqi boeih ce zawi nawhtaw hahqahkhqi venawh pe, cawhtaw khawk khan awh them ta kawp ti. Cekcoengawh ka hu awh bat law,” tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce ang zaak awh, anih ce boei thlang na a awm dawng awh, ak kaw a boe na se hy.
Jesu ing anih ce toek nawh, “Boei thlangkhqi ing Khawsa qam khuiawh a kunnaak aham ikawmyih aih na a kyinaak ve!
Boei thlang ing Khawsa qam khuiawh a kunnaak anglakawhtaw kalauk ing kqym ak khuiawh a kun mantaw zoei bet kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Ce ak awi ak zakhqi ing, “U ing nu thawngnaak a huh hly lawk hy voei?” ti uhy.
Jesu ing, “Thlanghqing aham amak coeng thai ce Khawsa ham taw coeng thai hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Kaimih ingtaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih cehta unyng saw na hu awh bat unyng ve!” tina hy.
Jesu ing a mingmih na ce, “Awitaak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u ingawm Khawsa qam dawngawh a im aw, a zu aw, a koeinaa aw, a cakhqi aw ama cehtaak awhtaw
Ve a khuk qoe awh khawzah na a hlawng coengawh, ak law hly kawi a khuk awhkaw kumqui hqingnaak awm hlawng bai kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing a hubat Thlanghqa hlaihih ce ak chang na cehpyi nawh, “Tawngha khqi ing, Thlanghqing Capa akawng ami na qeekhqi boeih ce a soepnaak aham, ningnih ve Jerusalem na ni cet kawm uh.
Anih ce Gentelkhqi kut awh pe kawm uh. Raih na kawm uh, the a kha na kawm uh, sawh a phih kawm uh, vyk kawm usaw him kawm uh.
Cehlai am thum nyn awh tho tlaih kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Vawhkaw awi ak kqawnkhqi ve a hubatkhqi ing pynoet ca awm am zasim uhy. Ak kqawn ngaihnaak ce a thuh hyn dawngawh, ikawk awi aw ak kqawn hy voei, ti awm am sim uhy.
Jeriko khaw ce Jesu ing a pha tawm awh, mikhyp thlang pynoet taw lam a keng awh ngawi nawh kut dun hy.
Thlangkhqi a ceh tyn awi ce ang zaak awh, thlangkhqi ce doet hy.
Thlangkhqi ing, Nazareth khaw awhkaw Jesu law hy, tina hy.
Cawh anih ing, “David Capa, Jesu, kai ve nim qeen lah,” tinawh khy hy.
Lam ak khul kungkhqi ing awm dym aham kaa na uhy, cehlai, David Capa, kai ve nim qeen lah, tinawh khy khqoet hy.
Cawh Jesu ing dyi cat nawh, cawhkaw thlang ce a venna sawi aham kqawn pehy. Jesu a ven a pha awh,
“Kaw sai sak aham nu na ni ngaih? tina hy. Anih ing, “Bawipa, ka mik a dai aham ngaih nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Na mik dang hlah seh, nak cangnaak ing ni qoei sak hawh hy,” tina hy.
Cawh a mik ce dai pe pahoei hy, Jesu a hu awh bat nawh Khawsa ce kyihcah hy. Thlangkhqi ing ami huh awh, Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy.
Jesu taw Jeriko khaw awh lut nawh cawhkawng cet phaat hy.
Ce a khawk khuiawh Zakea ak mingnaak thlang pynoet awm hy; anih taw mangmu ak cawikhqi ak ukkung na awm nawh boei hy.
Jesu ve ikawmyih ak thlang hy voei nu tice huh aham ngaih hy; cehlai thlak nem na a awm dawngawh, thlang kqeng anglakawh Jesu ce am hu thai hy.
Cedawngawh Jesu a lawnaak kawi lam a hai benna a nang dawng nawh Jesu huh aham thai thing a saw na kaai hy.
Jesu ing ce a hun ce a pha awh, hang mang nawh toek hy, “Zakea, nuk kqum law hlah, tuhngawi na im awh pah hly nyng,” tina hy.
Zakea ing angtawn na nuk kqum nawh zeel doena Jesu ce a im awh pah sak hy.
Thlang boeih ing ami huh awh sai bi uhy, Thlakthawlh im awh pah vang a ti, ti uhy.
Cehlai Zakea ing dyi nawh Bawipa venawh, “Bawipa, toek lah! Tuh ka khawhthem ik-oeih ak kengvang ce hahqahkhqi pe vang nyng, thlang thai na nawh ik-oeih ka lawh peek awhtaw, a pyh pupthli na sah tlaih vang nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Tuhngawi awh ve a ipkhui awh thaawngnaak pha law hawh hy, ve ak thlang awm Abraham a capa lawt ni.
Ak qeengkhqi thaawng aham ni Thlanghqing Capa ve a law,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ve a ming ngai hui awh, Jerusalem khaw ce zoe hawh nawh, thlangkhqi ing Khawsa qam ce dang hly pahoei hawh hy tinawh amik poek dawngawh, cekkhqi venawh nyhtahnaak awi pynoet kqawn pek khqi hy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Boei na ak awm thlang pynoet taw Sangpahrang na awm nawh ak voei law tlaih na khawk hla soeih na ce cet hy.
Cedawngawh a tyihzawih thlang pahqa tloek ce khy nawh tangka mina pahqa ce pehy. Ka law tlaih hlan dy vawhkaw tangka ing bi ana bi uh,’ tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai anih amak ngaih thlangkhqi ing anih a huawh thlang tyi unawh, ‘Ve ak thlang ve kaimih a Sangpahrang na awm aham am ngaih unyng,” tinawh awi pat uhy.
Cehlai anih ce Sanpahrang na a awm coengawh taw a im na ce voei hy. Cawhkaw tangka ing ikawmyihna a meek ami huh hy voei, tice sim a ngaih dawngawh a tyihzawihkhqi ce khy nawh tangka a peek thlangkhqi venna tyi hy.
Lamma cyk thlang ce law nawh a venawh, ‘Bawipa, nang a tangka mina ce a pyh pahqa na meek hy,’ tina hy.
Cawh a boei ing, ‘Ka tyihzawih thlak leek, lah hyk ti. Ik-oeih ak zawica awh awm ypawm na awm hyk ti, khawk bau pahqa ce uk lah,’ tina hy.
A tyihzawih pakkhihnaak thlang ce law bai nawh, ‘Bawipa, na tangka mina a pyh pumha na meek hy,’ tina bai hy.
A boeipa ing, ‘Khawk bau pumha ce uk lah,’ tina hy.
Cekcoengawh tyihzawih thlak chang pynoet bai ce law nawh, ‘Bawipa na mina ve; hikche ing cun nawh pup nyng.
Nang taw thlak ciit ngat na awm tiksaw, nik kqih nyng. Amna taaknaak hun awh lo tiksaw, amna sawnaak awh at hyk ti,’ tina hy.
Cawh a boeipa ing, ‘Nang tyihzawih thlakche, namah ak awi kqawn amyihna awi ni deng kawng! Kai ve thlak ciit ngat na awm nyng, am ka taaknaak awh lo nyng saw am ka sawnaak awh ka ah ce sim zawk hyk ti my?
Cawh man ni ka tangka ce tangka ak thungkhqi kut awh pe tiksaw, ka law tlaih awh, a ca ing ka huhnaak bawk voei?’ tina hy.
Cekcoengawh cawhkaw ak dyi thlangkhqi venawh, ‘A venawh kaw tangka mina pynoet ce lawh pe unawh taw tangka mina pahqa ak ta venawh pe uh,’ tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, ‘Bawipa, tangka mina pahqa ta hawh saw kaw! tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ing ak ta ak thlang a venawh sap pek khqoet kawmsaw, amak ta ak thlang ce taw, a taak ang cang awm lawh pe kaw.
Cehlai kai a qaalkhqi, a mingmih ak khan awh Sangpahrang na kai ama nik ngaih thlangkhqi ce vawh haw law unawh taw ka haiawh him lah uh,’ tinak khqi hy” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing ve ak awi ak kqawn coengawh, Jerusalem khaw benna cet oepchoeh hy.
Bethphage ingkaw Bethani khaw ce pha tawm nawh Olive ami ti Tlang ce a pha awh, a hubat thlang pakkhih ce haina tyi nawh cekqawi a venawh,
Nani hai awhkaw khaw na ce cet nih nawhtaw, khawk khuina nani kun awh, u ingawm amang ngawihnaak khawi meqang ca amik pai ce hu kawm nik ti. Sut nih nawhtaw vena haw law nih.
U ingawm, ikaw ham nani suh? a ti awhtaw ‘Bawipa ing ngoe hy,’ ti nanih,” tina qawi hy.
A tyih qawi ce cet nih nawh anih ing ak kqawn peek amyihna hu hy nih.
Mirang ca ce a ni suh li awh, ak takung ing, ‘Ikaw ham meqang ca ce nani suh? tina qawi hy.
Cekkqawi ing, Bawipa ing ngoe hy, tina hy nih.
Jesu a venna ani haw law coengawh, meqang ca ak khan awh hi phaih pe unawh Jesu ce ngawih sak uhy.
Anih a cehnaak lam awh ce thlangkhqi ing hi phaih pe uhy.
Olive Tlang awhkawng lam a nuk kqumnaak hun ce a pha tawm awh, a hu awh ak bat thlang kqeng ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ce ami huh awh zeelmang doena khy uhy:
Bawipa ming ing ak law taw zoseennaak awm seh!” “Khawk khan awh qoepnaak awm seitaw sawsang khyt awh boeimang seh!” tinawh Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy.
Thlang kqeng anglakawhkaw Farasi thlang thlang vang ing Jesu a venawh, “Cawngpyikung, na hubatkhqi ce kaa na lah,” tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ing, “Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, a mingmih ama mik khy awhtaw, lungkhqi awm khy kaw,’ tinak khqi hy.
Jerusalem pha tawm nawh khawk bau ce a huh awh, kqah hy,
“Nang, nang ing tuh tloek awh nang aham ngaihqepnaak ak haw lawkung ve na sim mantaw – cehlai tuh awhtaw namik ni thuh pe hawh hy.
Na qaalkhqi ing nik chung khoep kawm usaw hu hai nakawng ani teeknaak khawnghi ce pha law kaw.
Na vawng khuiawh namah ingkaw na canaakhqi dek khawng law na kawm uh. Na venawh Khawsa a lawnaak tym ce am na hat dawngawh, vawhkaw lung ak poeng qu ve pynoet ca awm am hang kawm uh,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh bawkim vawng khuina ce kun nawh ik-oeih ak zawikhqi ce hqek hy.
A mingmih na ce, “Ka im ve cykcahnaak im na awm kaw,’ tinawh qee na awm hy; cehlai nangmih ingtaw, quk-aikhqi awmnaak a hun,’ na sai uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Myngawi bawkim awh thlang cawngpyi hy. Cehlai khawsoeih boeikhqi, anaa awi cawngpyi kungkhqi ingkaw thlang kqeng ak sawikungkhqi ingtaw anih ce him aham ngaih uhy.
Cehlai ak awi kqawn ce thlang boeih ing a ming ngai peek dawngawh a tym leek ce am hu thai uhy.
Hypoet taw bawkim awh thlang cawngpyi nawh awithang leek ak khypyi li awh, khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ce a hqamcakhqi mi a venawh law uhy.
Hana kaw saithainaak ing nu vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ve na sai? Anik pekung u aw? kqawn lah,” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Cawhtaw awi pynoet awh ni doet khqi lah vang nyng; kqawn law lah uh,
Johan a baptisma ve khan ben na kaw nu, am awhtaw thlanghqing ben awhkaw nu?” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh a mimah ce doet qu uhy, Khan benna kaw,” ni ti man, ‘cawhtaw kawtih amna mik cangnaak,’ tina hlyk khqi vik.
Thlanghqing benna kaw ni,’ ni tinaak bai mantaw, Johan ve tawngha ni tinawh thlangkhqi ing ami sim hawh dawngawh, lung ing nik khawng khqi kaw,” ti uhy.
Cedawngawh a mingmih ing, “Han benna kaw hy voei nu, am sim unyng,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Cawhtaw hana kaw saithainaak ing vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ka sai tice ap kqawn hly lawt nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve thlangkhqi venawh kqawn pek khqi poehoei hy. “Thlang pynoet ing misur dum tahy, a dum ce bibikung thlangkhqi venawh vat nawh amah taw khawk hla na cet valh hy.
Misur bit tym a pha law awhtaw a tyihzawih thlang pynoet ce misur thaih bit aham dum bibikungkhqi venna tyi hy. Cehlai dum bibikungkhqi ing anih ce vyk unawh kut hqawng na tyi uhy.
Cekcoengawh tyihzawih ak chang ce tyi bai hy, anih ce awm vyk bai unawh, chahqai phyihkawt na ami thekhanaak coengawh kut hqawng na tyi bai uhy.
A tyizoeih a pakthumnaak ce tyi bai hy, anih ce awm a leem kqoengna khawng bai uhy.
Cawh misur dum ak ta kung ing, ‘Kaw ka sai lah voei? Kalung naak ka capa man ka tyih hawh kaw; anih taw kqihchah na kawm uh,’ ti hy.
Cehlai dum bibikungkhqi ing ami huh awh, a mimah ingkaw a mimah ce kqawn uhy. ‘Anih ve qo ak pang hly kawi ni; him unawh taw a qo ce ningnih aham awm seh nyng,’ ti uhy.
Cedawngawh anih ce misur dum a ceng na sawi unawh him uhy. Cawhtaw misur dum ak takung ing a mingmih ce ikawmyihna a saikhqi kaw?
Dum bibikungkhqi boeih ce a him coengawh misur dum ce thlak chang a kut awh pe kaw,” tinak khqi hy. Ve ak awi ve thlangkhqi ing a ming zaak awh, “Ve myihna koeh awm seh,” ti uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih ce toek khqi nawh, “Cawhtaw vawhkaw kqawn hyt awi: “Ip sakungkhqi ing ami hoet lung ce a kil awh lung ak leek soeih a khoengna awm hy,’ a tive kaw ak kqawn ngaihnaak hy voei aw?
U awm ce alung awh ak tlu taw kqek kawm saw, a namkhqi khqoet taw a dik a huina coeng kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve a mingmih ni ak kqawn sih hy tice ami sim dawngawh, anaa awi cawngpyikung khqi ingkaw khawsoeih boeikhqi ing anih ce tu pahoei aham a lam ce sui uhy. Cehlai thlang kqeeng ce kqih uhy.
Ak zoei cana qym nawh a thawlhnaak tu peek thainaak aham, thlak leek na ak sa qu, qymkungkhqi ce a venawh tyi uhy. Jesu ak awi kqawnnaak awh a thawlhnaak tu pe nawh saithainaak ak ta qam ukkung a venawh peek thainaak aham teng uhy.
Cedawngawh amah ak qymkungkhqi ing doet uhy: “Cawngpyikung, ak thym kqawn nawh thlang cawngpyi hyk ti, u a hai awm a toek kaana awitak ing Khawsa a lam cawngpyi hyk ti tice sim unyng.
Kaisar a venawh mangmu peek ve ak thym nu, amak thym nu?” tina uhy.
A mingmih a thainaak ce a sim oel oel a dawngawh,
Ami venawh, “Tangka denari ce nim huh lah uh; uang myihlip ingkaw ming nu ak awm?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, Karsar, tina uhy. Cekkhqi venawh, “Cawhtaw Kaisar a koe ce Kaisar a venawh pe unawh taw, Khawsa a koe ce Khawsa venawh pe uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Thlang kqeng a haiawh awi ak kqawnnaak awh a thawlhnaak am tu pe thai uhy. Cekkhqi awi am hlatnaak awh ce amik kawpoek kyi nawh, awm hqoeng uhy.
Thawhtlaihnaak am awm hy amik ti Sadusi thlang vang tloek ing Jesu doet aham law uhy.
A venawh, “Cawngpyi kung, Mosi ing taw ve myihna ca qee hy, 'thlang ing cataak kaana a zu ce a thih taak mai mantaw ana ing anih ce lo kawmsaw ak taai aham ca taak pe kaw,' tihy.
Cingnahqui thlang khqih awm uhy. Lamma cyk ing zu lo hlai hy, ca a taak kaana thih tahy.
A pakkhihnaak ing zuna tlaih nawh,
cekcoengawh a pakthumnaak ing zuna tlaih bai hy; ca pynoet awm a taak kaana ak khqihna ce thi boeih uhy.
A hukhit nataw cawhkaw nu awm thi lawt hy.
Cawhtaw, thawh tlaihnaak khawnghi awh cawhkaw nu ce a u mih a zuna nu a awm kaw, khqih ing zuna boeih u saw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Ve khawmdek thlangkhqi ing zu lo va ta uhy;
Cehlai ce a hun awh ak awm kawikhqi taw thlak thi thawh tlaihnaak khawnghi awh zu loh va taak, chungvaa am awm voel hawh kaw,
thi awm am thi voel kawm uh; khan ceityihkhqi amyihna awm kawm usaw; ak tho tlaih cakhqi na ami awm hawh dawngawh Khawsa cakhqi na awm hawh kawm uh.
Thlak thi thawhtlaihna a awmnaak hly Mosi ingawm, thingbup akawng lamawh ce, Bawipa ce, 'Abraham a Khawsa, Isak a Khawsa, Jakob a Khawsa,’ a tinaak awh dang sak hy.
Anih taw thlak thi Khawsa na am awm nawh, thlak hqing a Khawsa nani a awm, amah awh thlang boeih ce hqing hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Anaa awi cawngpyikung thlang vang ing, “Cawngpyikung, nak kqawn ce thym hy,” tina uhy.
Cekcoengawh kawng taw u ingawm awi am doet voel uhy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Ikawmyihna a mingmih ing Khrih ve David Capa tinawh amik kqawn hy voei?
David amah ingtaw Saam cabu awh: Bawipa ing ka Bawipa a venawh:
Na qaalkhqi ce na khawtloeng na ka sai hlan dy taw, kak tang benawh ngawi lah,” tinawh kqawn hy.
David ing anih ce ‘Bawipa,’ tinawh khy hy. Cawhtaw ikawmyihna a capa na a awm hly thai?” tinak khqi hy.
Thlangkhqi ing ak awih kqawn ce a ming ngai huiawh, Jesu ing a hubatkhqi venawh,
Anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi awh ce ngaihtaak lah uh; A mingmih ingtaw hik dung bai unawh khawlakawh aming van lungna uhy, thlang ing ik-oeih a zawihnaak hun awh kqihchahnaak peekkhqi lungna unawh sinakawk awh ngawihnaak ak leek leek ingkaw buh veelnaak kung awh a qyp ak awm ngawihnaakkhqi ce lungna uhy.
Hahqahkhqi im ce hul pe unawh thlang amik huh awh ak dung soeih na cykcah uhy. Vemih ak thlangkhqi ing ve zawk khqoet khqoet kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
A hak toek awh ce, thlang boeikhqi ing bawkim tangka channaak bawm ak khuiawh tangka ak chankhqi ce hu hy.
Cawh nuhai khawdeng pynoet ing qawhum tangka pia pakkhih ak chan ce awm hu bai hy.
Cekkhqi venawh, “Awitak ak nik kqawn peek khqi, vawhkaw nuhai khawdeng ing thlangkhqi boeih anglakawh khawzah khqoet chan hawh hy.
Ak changkhqi boeih ingtaw ami khawhthem khawzah ak khuiawh kawng ni ami peek hy; cehlai anih ingtaw a hahqahnaak ak khuiawh kawng a hqingnaak aham a taak chyn ce pe hloep hawh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubat ak khui awhkaw thlang vang ing lung ak leek leek ingkaw Khawsa venawh ik-oeih peek ingkaw bawkim thoeihcam na a awmnaak akawng ce kqawn uhy. Cehlai Jesu ing cekkhqi na ce,
Vawhkaw nami huhkhqi boeih ve, “Pynoet ca awm am hang kaana, amik khawngnaak boeh boeh a khawnghi ce pha law kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, Cawngpyikung, cawhkaw ik-oeih ce ityk awh a awm kaw? Ce mihkhqi a awm tawm awh ce i ikawmyih hatnaakkhqi nu a awm kaw?” tinawh doet uhy.
Anih ing, “Thlang ing a mani thainaak khqi aham ngaihta uh. Kai ang ming ing thlang khawzah law kawm usaw, ‘Anih ce kai hawh ni, A tym zoe hawh hy,’ tinawh khy hly pyi uhy. Cekkhqi hu awh ce koeh bat uh.
Qaal tuknaak ingkaw qaaltuk awithang na ming zaak awh koeh kqih uh. Vemyihkhqi ve lamma na ak awm hly qoe ni, cehlai a tym a dytnaak nyn taw pha law hlyk tlang hlan hy,’ tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh a mingmih a venawh: “Nam ingkaw nam tuk qu kawm nih saw, qam ingkaw qam tuk qu kawm uh.
Hun boeih awh Lipi khawteh na tlai kaw, khawse khawkha ingkaw tlawhnaakkhqi ce awm kaw, khan sang na kqih ak awm ik-oeihkhqi ingkaw kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ce awm kaw.
Cehlai vemyihkhqi a awm hlanawh nangmih ve nim tuk khqi kawm usaw ni the ni kha nak khqi kaw, Kai ang ming awh sinakawk ingkaw thawngimkhqi, Sangpahrang ingkaw qam ukkung boeikhqi venna ni khyn khqi kawm uh.
Nangmih ing a mingmih a venawh simpyikung na nami awmnaak thai aham ce a ik-oeih ce awm kaw.
Cehlai ikawmyihna awi kak kqawnnaak kaw, tice am namik poek oepchoehnaak aham namim thin caksak uh.
Nami qaal ikawmyih ingawm nangmih ak awi ce ama oelh thainaak aham ingkaw ama ni kalhnaak thai aham awi ingkaw cyihnaak ce kai ing ni pek khqi bit kawng nyng.
Nangmih ce nami nu nami pa, nami koeinaa, nami cakaw paqeng ingkaw nami pyi nawnkhqi ingawm thlang a kut awh ni thak khqi kawm uh, thlang vang ce him kawm uh.
Kai a dawngawh thlangkhqi ing nangmih ce ni sawh na kawm uh.
Cehlai nami lu awhkaw nami lusam pynoet ca awm am tla kaw.
Ak cak na naming dyihnaak ak caming hqingnaak ce hu kawm uk ti.
Qaalkhqi ing Jerusalem ami veel khoep ce nami huh awh, a sitrak na a awmnaak tym ce zoe hawh hy tice sim kawm uk ti.
Cawh Judah qam awh ak awmkhqi ing tlang na cen u seh, khawk bau khuiawh ak awmkhqi ing co u seitaw, kqawng na kaw ak awmkhqi ing khawk bau khuina koeh kun u seh.
Ce a khawnghi ce qee hyt na ak awmkhqi boeih boeih a soepnaak toelnaak a tym na awm kaw.
Ce a khawnghi awh ce nu ak phyihsukhqi ingkaw naa ak pawmkhqi aham ikawmyih aih na nu a kyinaak hly ce! Cawh kawpoek kyinaak ak bau soeih ce qam awh awm kawmsaw ve ak thlangkhqi khan awh kawsonaak ce pha kaw.
Zawzi ing tlyk kawm usaw qam tawm awh tamnaa na khyn na awm kawm uh. Gentelkhqi ing leh kawm uh.
Khawmik, pihla ingkaw aihchi awh ce kawpoek kyi mik hatnaakkhqi ce awm kaw. Tuicunli awhkaw tuibak ak awi awh khawmdek awhkaw penglum thlangkhqi kawpoek kyi kawseet ngai hang ing awm kawm uh.
Khawmdek awh ak law hly kawi ik-oeih kqih awm ce ami sim awh, amik tha na hoet hqoeng kaw, khan khawnghi ce tlai kaw.
Cawh Thlanghqing Capa ing boeimang thaawmnaak ak bau soeih ing myi awhkawng a law ce hu kawm uh.
Vemih ik-oeihkhqi a awm awh nangmih a thaawmnaak ce a zoe hawh dawngawh, dyi unawh taw toeqoek lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kqawn pek khqi hy: “Thai thing ingkaw thing boeih boeih ce toek lah uh.
A hah thai ak cawn awhtaw, khawhqai tym zoe hawh hy tice sim uhyk ti.
Cemyih lawtna, cemyih ik-oeihkhqi a awm ce nami huh awh, Khawsa qam taw zoe hawh hy tice sim uh.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ve a ik-oeihkhqi boeih a soep hlan dy taw vawhkaw cadilkhqi ve am khum qoe qoe kawm uh.
Khan ingkaw khawmdek taw khum hly hlai hy, kak awi taw am khum qoe qoe kaw.
Ak leek na ngaihta uh, cemyih am mantaw awmhlynaak, zuu awknaak ingkaw khawsaknaak awh ce nim thin hlyp hlyp a tinaak ing namik kawlung be law sak hau kawmsaw thang awh ak awk amyihna am namik poek a tym awh ce a khawnghi ce pha law plak hau kaw.
Ce a ik-oeih ce khawmdek khan awh ak awm thlangkhqi boeih ak khan awh pha law kaw.
Cedawngawh vawhkaw ak awm hly kawi ik-oeih awhkawng loet kawm u tik saw Thlanghqing Capa haiawh na ming dyihnaak thai aham ngaihtaak doena qeh unawh cykcah lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Khawnghi hoei awh Jesu ing bawkim awh thlangkhqi ce cawngpyi hy, khawmy ben qoek awh Olive Tlang na than oet pyt awm aham cet hy.
Mymcang hqit awh thlangkhqi ce ak awi ak ngai na bawkim na cet uhy.
Loentaak poei ami ti uh, hen amak boei phaihpi poei taw zoe ca hawh hy,
Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ing thlang kqeng ce amik kqih dawngawh Jesu ce him thainaak aham a lam ce sui uhy.
Cawh thlanghqa hlaihih ak khuiawh kaw Iskariot ami ti Judah ak kawk khuiawh Setan ce kun hy.
Judah ce khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw bawkim ak ukkung boeikhqi venna cet nawh ikawmyihna Jesu ce a mingmih a venawh ka zawihnaak lah voei, tice doet qu uhy.
Cekkhqi ce amik kaw zeel nawh tangka peek aham awi ta uhy.
Cekkhqi venawh awi ce ta nawh thlang kqeng ama awm awh Jesu ce a mingmih a venawh peek thainaak aham a tym leek ce sui hy.
Cehtaak poei Tuuca hyih phumnaak hen amak boei phaihpi khawnghi ce pha law hy.
Jesu ing Piter ingkaw Johan ce tyi nawh, “Cet nih nawhtaw Cehtaak poei buh ainaak aham qoek a bah nih,” tina qawi hy.
Cekkqawi ing, Han awh nu sai sak aham na ngaih? tina hy nih.
Cekkqawi na ce, “Khawk bau khuina nani lut kqoeng awh, tui pumawh tui ak doeng thlang pynoet ing ning hqum qawi kaw. Anih a cehnaak im na ce cet nih nawh,
imkung a venawh, ‘Cawngpyikung ing: ka hubatkhqi mi cehtaak poei buh ka mi veelnaak aham a hun ce han nawh nu a awm?’ tihy, tina nih.
Cawh anih ing ipkhui ak kau soeih a ciimcaih ce nim huh qawi bit kaw. Amah cawh ce qoek a bah law nih moe,” tina qawi hy.
Cekkqawi ce cet nih nawh Jesu ing ak kqawn peek qawi myihna hu hy nih. Amah cawh ce cehtaak poei buh ce qoek a bah hy nih.
A tym a khoeh awh, Jesu ingkaw a hubatkhqi ce buh ak vel na caboei awh ngawi uhy.
Cawh a mingmih a venawh, “Khuikhanaak ka huh hlan awh vawhkaw cehtaak poei buh ve nangmih mi vel haih aham ngaih nyng.
Kawtih ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Khawsa ram awh a soepnaak a awm hlan dy awhtaw, ve a buh ve am ai voel kawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Phaihpi ce lo nawh, zeelawi ak kqawn coengnawh, “Ve ve lo unawh pe qu lah uh.
Khawsa ram a pha hlan dy taw misur tui ve am aw voel qoe kawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh phaihpi ce lo nawh zeelnaak awi ak kqawn coengawh thek nawh, a mingmih ce pek khqi hy, “Ve ve ka sa, nangmih aham peekna ak awm hly ce ni; nami ni simnaak poe aham sai law uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cemih lawtna boet ce lo nawh zeelnaak awi ak kqawn coengawh, “Ve ak boet taw nangmih aham ka hawk ka thi awhkaw awikam thai ni.
Cehlai kai anik zawi hlykung a kut taw kai a kut ingqawi ve caboei awh awm haih hy.
Thlanghqing Capa taw awitaak ce amyihna cet kaw, cehlai anih ak zawikung cetaw a haikhaw map hy,” tinak khqi hy.
U ing nu cemih ik-oeih ce a sai kaw, tinawh a mimah ce doet qu uhy.
A mimah tloek ak khuiawh u nu ak bau soeih tice oelh qu bai uhy.
Jesu ing, “Gentelkhqi a Sangpahrangkhqi ing ni thlangkhqi ak khan awh uknaak ce ami taak uh; cemyihna thlang ak khan awh uknaak ak takungkhqi ce ik-oeih leek ak sai peekkungkhqi na ngai uhy.
Cehlai nangmih taw cemyihna am awm kawm uk ti. Nangmih anglakawh ak bau khyt ing ce ak zawi khyt myihna a awm aham awm hy, ukkung ing bibikung myihna a awm ham awm hy.
U nu ak bau bet, buh ai aham caboei awh ak ngawi nu, am awhtaw, buh ak lokung nu? Cehlai kai taw nangmih anglakawh bibikung na awm nyng.
Nangmih taw sykzoeknaak ka huh awh ka venawh awm poe uhyk ti.
Ka pa ing qam ce ka venawh ani peek amyihna, nangmih a venawh ni pek khqi lawt nyng,
nangmih ing ka ram awh buh a an aw a ai unawh Israel thlang hlaihih ce awi nami dengnaak thai aham ngawihdoelh awh ce ngawi kawm uk ti.
Simon, Simon, Setan ing nang ce cang vam amyihna vam aham ni ngaih hy.
Cehlai, Simon, nak cangnaak amang tluknaak aham nang aham cykcah hawh nyng. Na hu na nang voei tlaih awh ce na koeinaakhqi tha awm sak lah,” tina hy.
Cehlai anih ing, “Bawipa, nang ing thawng tlak haih ham ingkaw thih haih aham awm oepchoeh na awm nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Piter, ka nik kqawn peek, tuhngawi ai ang khawng hlan awh, thum voei nik khawng kawp ti,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Kai ing tangka bawm, sawngsa ingkaw khawmyk kaana ka ni tyih khqi awh nami voet hlauhnaak ak awm nu? tinak khqi hy. A mingmih ing, “Am awm hy,” tina uhy.
Cekkhqi na ce, “Cehlai tuh awhtaw tangka bawm nami taak awhtaw khyn uh, sawngsa awm, zawzi am nami taak awhtaw nami angki ce zawi unawh thlai uh.
Anih ce thlak thawlhkhqi mi noet sih haih uhy, tinawh qee sut ce awm hy: ka nik kqawn peek khqi ve ak awi ve kai awh a soep aham awm hy. Oeih, kai akawng qee ce na ak awm ce soep tawm ca hawh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubat khqi ing, Toek lah, Bawipa, vawh zawzi pakkhih awm hy ve, tina uhy. Anih ing, “Ce zah mah, khoek hawh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
A ceh khawi amyihna Jesu taw Olive tlang na ce cet hy, a hubatkhqi ing a hu awh hquut uhy.
Ami pha awh, cekkhqi venawh, “Syknaak ak khuiawh am naming tluknaak aham cykcah lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Amah taw lung nik khawng choet a hlanaak na cet nawh, khuk sym doena cykcah hy.
“Ka pa nak kawngaih awhtaw vawhkaw boet ve khoe law mai lah; cehlai kai ak kawngaih am seitaw, nang ak kawngaihnaak myihna awm hawn seh,” tina hy.
Cawh khan ceityih ce a venawh dang pe nawh anih ce tha pehy.
Kawpoek kyi ingkaw khawsi ak dung soeih ing cykcah hy, am hlan tui ce thi amyihna dek na dyh cawp cawp hy.
A cykcah boet coengawh tho nawh a hubatkhqi venna cet hy, cekkhqi taw amik kaw a set aih awh qoei unawh ami ih ce hu hy.
“Ikawtih nami ih hqoeng? Sykzoeknaak khuiawh am naming tluknaak aham cykcah lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Awi ak kqawn hui awh thlang kqeng ce law hy, thlanghqa hlaihih ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet, Judah ami ti ing cekkhqi ce lawpyi khqi hy. Jesu ce mawk aham a venna law hy,
cehlai Jesu ing, “Judah, nang ing Thlanghqing Capa ve mawknaak ing na zawi nawh nu? tina hy.
Cawhkaw ik-oeih ce Jesu a hubatkhqi ing ami huh awh, Zawzi ing ka mik boeng hly mai nu? tina uhy.
Thlang pynoet ing khawsoeih boei a tyihzawih ce boeng hy, ang haa ce sek pe hlak hy.
Jesu ing, “Ce tloek mah,” tina hy. Cawhkaw thlang ang haa ce bi pe nawh qoei sak tlaih hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ing khawsoeih boeikhqi, bawkim ak ukkungkhqi, a hqamcakhqi ingkaw a venawh ak law thlangkhqi boeih a venawh, “Kai ve quk-ai na ka awm awh nu, zawzi ingkaw thingboeng ing nami ni law sih?
Myngawi tempul kawngma awh nangmih ing ni awm haih awh, am nim tu uhyk ti. Cehlai ve ve nangmih a tym ni, thannaak ing a uk hui awh ve,” tinak khqi hy.
Anih ce tu unawh, khawsoeih boei khyt a im na khyn uhy. Cawh Piter ing ak hla nakawng qym hy.
Cehlai im kawngma ang lung awh ce kutoet na ngawi unawh mai ami awm awh, Piter awm cekkhqi anglakawh ce ngawi lawt hy.
Maikung awh ang ngawih ce nu tyihzoeih pynoet ing uhy. Toek ceet nawh, Ve ak thlang awm anih ingqawi awm haih lawt hy,” tina hy.
Cehlai oelh hy Nang nu, anih ce am sim nyng, tina hy.
A khoeh a awm coengawh thlak chang pynoet ing hu bai nawh a venawh, Nang awm a mingmih ak khuiawh kaw thlang lawt ni, tina hy. Cawh Piter ing, Kai amni,” tina hy.
Khawnoek pynoet tluk a dii coengawh thlang pynoet bai ing, Ve ak thlang awm anih ingqawi awm haih meqee hy nih, Kalili thlang na awm awm bai hy, tina hy.
Piter ing, Nak kqawn ce a sim na am sim qoe nyng!” tina bai hy. Ce myihna awi ak kqawn coeng kqoeng awh ai khawng poehoei hy.
Bawipa ing hawi nawh Piter ce toek hy. Bawipa ing awi ak kqawn peek ce Piter ing: “Tuhngawi awh ai ang khawng hlan awh, thum voei nik khawng kawp ti,” a tinaak awi ce poek hqoet hy.
Cekcoengawh a leng benna cet nawh khawteh na kqang hy.
Jesu ak sawikung qalkapkhqi ing the a kha na unawh vyk uhy.
A mik ce zen pe khoep unawh doet uhy, U ing nu a ni vyk ce kqawn lah?” tina uhy.
Thekhanaak awi khawzah ing tlai am tlek uhy.
A khawngawi khaw a dai awh ce thlang kqeng a hqamcakhqi, khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi ce kutoet na hu qu uhy, cawh Jesu ce sawi law pe uhy.
Nang ve Khrih aw, kqawn lah? tina uhy. Jesu ing, “Kqawn law bai nyng seiawm, am nik cangna hly uhyk ti,
ni doet khqi nyng seiawm am nim hlat kawm uk ti.
Cehlai tuh awhkawng, Thlanghqing Capa ing Khawsa thak awm tang benawh ngawi bit kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh cekkhqi boeih ing, Cawhtaw nang ve Khawsa capa aw?” tina uhy. Anih ing, “Namik kqawn a myihna kai zawk ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh cekkhqi ing, Ikaw ham simpyikung ni kyk qee hly bai? Amah am kha awhkawng ak awi ning za qi hawh saw kaw ve,” ti uhy.
Cekcoengawh cawh ak awm thlang kqeng ce tho unawh Jesu ce Pilat a venna cehpyi uhy.
Amah ce thawlh puk uhy, “Ve ak thlang ing pilnam hqeh sak nawh, Kaisar a venawh mangmu ama peek aham kqawn nawh amah ingkaw amah Khrih Sangpahrang tinawh kqawn qu hy,” tina uhy.
Cedawngawh Pilat ing Jesu ce doet hy, “Nang ve Judakhqi a Sangpahrang aw? tina hy. Jesu ing, “Nak kqawn amyihna awm nyng,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Pilat ing khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw thlang kqeng a venawh, “Ve ak thlang a thawlhnaak am hu nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai cekkhqi ing, “Galilee awhkawng kqan nawh, ve hun dy, Judah khaw boeih awh cawngpyinawh thlang kqeng sak boeih hy,” tina uhy.
Ce ak awi ce ang zaak awh, Pilat ing anih ce Kalili thlang na a awm ama awm doet hy.
Jesu ce Herod uknaak khuiawh kaw thlang ni tice a sim awh, anih ce Herod a venna tyi hy, Herod awm Jerusalem khaw awh awm hy.
Herod ing Jesu ce a huh awh, zeel soeih hy, anih ce huh aham lamtoen khing hawh hy. Anih akawng ang zaaknaak awh, kawpoek kyi them a sai ce huh aham ngaih hy.
Anih ing awi khawzah doet hy, cehlai Jesu ing khangoet awm am hlat hy.
Khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw anaa awi qeekungkhqi cawh dyi unawh, thawlh buk uhy.
Cawh Herod ingkaw a qalkapkhqi ing Jesu ce the a kha na unawh qaih am qin na uhy. Hi ak leek soeih soeih bai sak unawh Pilat a venna tyi tlaih uhy.
Ce a nyn awhtaw Herod ingkaw Pilat ce qoep hy nih, ce hlan awhtaw cekqawi ce qaal na awm hy nih.
Pilat ing khawsoeih boeikhqi, ukkungkhqi ingkaw pilnam boeih ce khy nawh,
Ve ak thlang ing 'Pilnam hqeh sak hy,' ti unawh ka venna law pyi uhyk ti. Nami haiawh awi deng hawh hlai nyng. Nangmih ing thawlh namik puk amyihna kawmyih a thawlhnaak awm am hu nyng;
Herod ingawm a thawlhnaak am hu hy; cedawngawh venna tyi law tlaih hy, nangmih ing nami huh amyihna, thihnaak dy awh ikawmyih a thawlhnaak awm am sai hy.
Cedawngawh vyk nyng seitaw hlah mai vang nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Poei ak khuiawh cekkhqi aham thlang pynoet oet hlah pek aham awm hy.
Cawh, Ve ak thlang ve him! Barabbas ce hlah law! Tinawh khy uhy.
(Barabbas taw khawk bau awh qaal na tho nawh thlang a him dawngawh thawngim awh thla uhy.)
Pilat ing Jesu ce hlah aham a ngaih awh cekkhqi venna awi kqawn tlaih hy.
Cehlai a mingmih ing, “Thinglam awh tai, thinglam awh tai,” tinawh khy uhy.
Am thumnaak awh a mingmih ce: “Ikawtih ikaw thawlhnaak nu ve ak thlang ing a sai? A thih ham kawi ikaw thawlhnaak ak khan awh am hu nyng. Cedawngawh vyk nyng seitaw hlah mai vang nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai anih ce thinglam awh tai aham khawteh khqoet na khy unawh, amik khy awi ing amingmih ce khuk malh hy.
Cedawngawh Pilat ing ami thoehnaak ce qawi pekkhqi hy.
A mingmih ing hlah aham ami thoeh, qaal na tho nawh thlang a him dawngawh thawngim awh a mik thlak Barabbas ce hlah pek khqi nawh, Jesu cetaw a mimah ak kawngaih na sai aham a mingmih a venawh pekkhqi hy.
Anih ce cehpyi uhy, lamlak awh kqawng nakaw ak law Cyqene khaw awhkaw Simon ce tu unawh Jesu a hu awh thinglam tung ce kawh sak uhy.
Thlang khawzah ing a hu awh hquut uhy, ak kqung ak kqap nukhqi awm bat lawt uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a ven benna mang nawh, “Jerusalem canukhqi, kai aham koeh kqang uh, na mimah ingkaw nami cakhqi ham kqang law uh.
Nangmih ing, ‘Nu cak kaa khqi, pumqih amak sim khawikhqi ingkaw a suk naaca amak awk sak khawi nukhqi taw a mi zoseen hy! Nami tinaak a khawnghi ce pha law kaw.
Cawh, A mingmih ing tlangkhqi venawh, 'Kaimih ve nik et khqi lah!' ti kawm usaw, cungkhqi venawh, 'Kaimih ve ni hlip khqi lah!” tina kawm uh.’
Thlang ing thinghqing za vemyih na ami sai awhtaw thingkoh ak khqoet taw ikawmyihna nu ami sai kaw?” tinak khqi hy.
Ak chang thlak thawlh qawi pakkhih awm thinglam awh tai aham anih ing kutoet na cehpyi uhy.
Luquh ami ti hun ce ami pha awh, anih ce thinglam awh tai uhy, thlakthawlh qawi awm – pynoet ce tang benawh, pynoet ce cawngben awh tai uhy.
Jesu ing, “Kapa, a mingmih ak khan awh qeenkhaw ngai lah, ikaw kami sai ti am sim unawh ni,” tina hy. A hi ce taicung zyk unawh tei uhy.
Thlangkhqi ing dyi unawh toek uhy, cawh ukkungkhqi ing qaih na uhy. “Thlakchang taw a hul bai, Khawsa ak tyh Khrih na a awm awhtaw amah ingkaw amah hul qu lah seh,” tina uhy.
Qalkapkhqi awm law unawh the a kha na uhy. Misur tui ak thui ce pe uhy,
“Juda Sangpahrang na awm awhtaw namah ingkaw namah hul qu lah thaw voeih ti,” tina uhy.
“VETAW JUDA KHRIH SANGPAHRANG NI,” tinawh a sawawh ca tai pe uhy.
Cawhkaw ami tai thlak thawlh pynoet ingawm anih ce kaa na hy, “Nang ve Khrih am aw? Namah ingkaw namah hul qu nawhtaw kainih awm ni hul qawi lah thoeih ti,” tina hy.
Cehlai thlak thawlh pynoet ingtaw anih ce hlat nawh, “Khawsa awm am nak kqih nawh nu? Nang ing anih ingqawi ang amyihna awidengnaak na huh ve?
Ningnih taw awideng kawina nik awm qoe ni; ni sai phu ni zawk qoe ni; cehlai ve ak thlang ingtaw ikawmyih a thawlhnaak awm am sai hy,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh anih ing, “Jesu, na qam na pha awh kai koeh nim hilh law moe,” tina hy.
Jesu ing avenawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek, tuhngawi awh paradise awh kavenawh awm lawt kawp ti,” tina hy.
Khawnoek kquk tluk a law awh, khawmdek pum boeih thannaak ing ziing khoep nawh khawnoek ko dy khawthan khoep hy.
khawkdai qeng nawh; cawh Bawkim awhkaw hizan ce pakkhih na teek hy.
Cawh Jesu ing khawteh na, “Kapa, na kut awh kang Myihla ni pe nyng,” tina hy. Ceamyihna ak kqawn coeng kqoeng awh ang hqi qu zip hy.
Qalkap zakhat ak ukkung ing cawhkaw a kawnglam ce a huh awh, Khawsa ce kyihcah nawh, “Ve ak thlang ve thlakdyng pai ni,” tihy.
Cawhkaw ik-oeih ak toekna ak cun law thlangkhqi ing ce a kawnglam ce ami huh awh amik kqang pung unawh voei uhy.
Cehlai amah ak simkhqi boeih ingkaw, Kalili awhkawng a hu awh a mik bat law nukhqi ing ak hla na dyi unawh, cawhkaw ce dan uhy.
Awi tlykkung pynoet, Joseph ak mingnaak thlak leek ingkaw thlak dyng pynoet ce awm hy.
A mingmih ak awitlyhnaak ingkaw them ami sainaak awh anih taw ang haa am tla qoe hy. Judah qam Arimathea khaw awhkawng ak law na awm nawh Khawsa qam ak lamtoenkung na awm hy.
Pilat a venna cet nawh, Jesu a qawk ce thoeh hy,
Cekcoengawh qawk ce lo nawh, hi ing a zawl coengawh u awm amak pupnaak hlan phyilung ak khuiawh ce soei hy.
Ce nyn taw Coekqoek Nyn na awm nawh, Sabbath kqan tawmca hawh uhy.
Jesu ing Kalili awhkawng amik law haih nukhqi ce Joseph a hu awh bat unawh phyi ingkaw qawk ce ikawmyihna ami soei tice hu uhy.
Cekcoengawh im na cet unawh bawktui ce qoek a bah uhy. Cehlai anaa awi peek amyihna Sabbath nyn awhtaw dym uhy.
Khaw khqih nyn ak khuiawh kaw khawnghi lamma cyk, mymcang hqit awh, nukhqi ing bawktui ce khyn unawh phyi na cet uhy.
Phyi awhkaw lung ak chang na ang thoeih qu ce hu uhy,
ak khuina ami lut awh, Bawipa Jesu a qaawk ce am hu uhy.
Ngaih kyi doena ami awm awh, a hi khawkphlamyihna ak vang thlang pakkhih ce cekkhqi venawh dyih pehy.
Amik kqih aih awh, nukhqi ce dek awh koep uhy, cehlai cawhkaw thlang qawi ing, “Ikaw hamna thlak thi anglakawh ak hqing ce nami sui?
Anih ce vawh am awm voel hy, tho hawh hy! Kalili awh nami awm awh awi ak nik kqawn peek khqi ce poek lah uh:
'Thlanghqing Capa taw thlak thawlhkhqi kut awh pe kawm usaw, thinglam awh ami tai coengawh, am thum nyn awh tho tlaih kaw,’ a tice,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh awi ak kqawn peek khqi ce sim tlaih uhy.
Phyi awhkawng a ming hlat tlaih awh, cawhkaw a kawnglamkhqi boeih ce thlanghqa hlaioet ingkaw ak changkhqi boeih a venawh kqawn pe uhy.
Cawhkaw nukhqi cetaw Meri Magadalene, Joanna, Jakob a nu Meri ingkaw cawhkaw ak awm nukhqi ing ceityihkhqi venawh kqawn pe uhy.
Cehlai nukhqik awi ce a hqawng na poek unawh, cekkhqi ing ap cangna uhy.
Cehlai Piter taw tho nawh, hlanna dawng hy. Hlan ce kuunawh toek hy, cehlai a zawlnaak hi doeng ce a huh awh kawpoek a kyi doena voei tlaih hy.
Ce nyn awh ce a mingmih awhkaw thlang pakkhih taw Jerusalem awhkawng meng khqih ak hla Emmau ami ti khaw na cet hy nih.
Lam awh ani ceh hui awh cawhkaw ik-oeih a kawnglamkhqi ce kqawn hy nih.
Ceamyihna cawhkaw a kawnglamkhqi ce anik kqawn hui awh, Jesu amah qoe qoe ce law nawh cekqawi mi cet haih uhy;
cehlai cekqawi ing ama ni hatnaak aham cekqawi a mik ce bym pe qawi hy.
Cekqawi a venawh, “Ikaw nu ti nani ceh doena na nik kqawn?” tina qawi hy. Cekkqawi taw ak byi na dyi khak hy nih.
Thlang pynoet, Kleopa ak mingnaak ing, “Jerusalem na ak cetkhqi ak khuiawh, tuhtloek awhkaw ik-oeih amak sim na nang doeng va ni hy voei?” tina hy nih.
Anih ing, “Ikaw nanik kqawn? tina qawi hy. Cekqawi ing, “Nazareth Jesu akawng ti. Anih taw tawngha a haiawh thaawmnaak ing awi kqawn nawh ik-oeih sai hy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw kaimih anik ukkungkhqi ing anih ce thih sak aham thlang a kut awh pe unawh, thinglam awh tai uhy;
cehlai kaimih ingtaw anih ce Israelkhqi ak hulkung aham a nang ngaih-u unyng. Ceamyihna a awmnaak ce, tuhngawi ve am thum nyn hawh ni.
Cekcoeng bai awh, kaimih ak khuiawh kaw nu thlang vang tloek ing ka ming ngaih ni kyi sak khqi bai hy. Cik mymcang hqit awh phyi na cet hlai uhy,
a qawk ce am hu voel uhy. Cekkhqi ce kami venna law unawh, anih ce hqing tlaih hawh hy, tinawh ak kqawn peekkung khan ceityihkhqi hu unyng, tinawh kqawn law uhy.
Kaming lak awhkaw thlang vang tloek ce phyi na cet bai hlai uhy, nukhqi ing amik kqawn peek amyihna hu uhy, cehlai amah ce am hu uhy,” tina hy nih.
Cekkqawi a venawh, “Ikawmyih aih na nu nami qaw nawh, tawnghakhqi ing ami nak kqawn hyt ce awm am namik cangnaak hy voei!
Khrih ing vemyih kyinaakkhqi a huh coengawh a boeimangnaak khuiawh am lut hly nawh nu?” tina hy.
Mosi awhkawng kqan nawh tawnghakhqi boeih ing, cauk ciimkhqi boeih awh amah akawng ak kqawnkhqi ce kqawn caih pe qawi hy.
A ni cehnaak hly khaw ce a ni pha tawm awh, Jesu taw loen phat hamna cai hy.
Cehlai cekqawi ing, “Kani venawh awm mai, khaw awm my hawh nawh khaw tla tawm hawh hy,” ti nih nawh hlawh hy nih. Cedawngawh cekqawi a venawh awm aham cet hy.
Cekqawi ing mybuh ai aham ang ngawih awh, phaihpi ce lo nawh zeel awi ak kqawn coengawh thek nawh pe qawi hy.
Cawhkawng ani mik dai nawh anih ce hat hy nih, cehlai qeng pe qawi valh hy.
“Lam awh ni pau unawh, cauk ciim ak kqawn caih law awh ce nik kawlung mai amyihna kqawng saw kaw my?” ti hy nih.
Tho nih nawh Jerusalem na hlat tlaih hy nih. Cawh Thlanghqa hlaioet ingkaw ak changkhqi kutoet na aming cun ce hu hy nih.
Cekkhqi ing, “Bawipa taw tho tang tang hy, Simon a venna awm dang qu hy,” ti uhy.
A ningnih ingawm lam awh ik-oeih ani huhkhqi, Jesu ing phaihpi ak eh awh ani hat qunaakkhqi ce kqawn pek khqi hy nih.
Ce akawng ce amik kqawn hui awh, Jesu ing, “Naming khanawh ngaihdingnaak awm seh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cemoeseinu, a mingmih ing ly unawh kqih uhy, myihla ak huna ngai qu uhy.
Anih ing cekkhqi venawh, “Ikawtih naming ngaih a kyi? Ikawtih namik kawlung awh upvoetnaak nami taak?
Ka kut ingkaw ka khaw khqi ve toek lah uh. Kai kamah qoe qoe ni! Ni bi unawh, toek lah uh; myihla ingtaw quh ingkaw sa am tahy, cehlai kai taw ta nyng,”,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn coengawh, a kut ingkaw a khaw ce huh khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing zeelmang ingkaw ngaih kyi doena am cangna bak bak uhy tice a huh awh, cekkhqi venawh, “Ai kawi namik ta aw?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing nga a ming sai ce pe uhy.
Nga ce lo nawh cekkhqi amik huh awh ai pek khqi hy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Ve maw nangmih a venawh ka awm awh kanik kqawn peek khqi hy: Mosi a cawngpyinaak cauk, Tawngha cauk ingkaw Saam cauk awhkaw kai akawng qee na ak awmkhqi boeih ce a soepnaak aham ni, ka tice,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh cauk awi ce aming zaksimnaak aham cekkhqi ak kawlung ce awng pek khqi hy.
A mingmih a venawh, “Vemyihna qee hyt ce awm hy: Khrih ing khuikhanaak zaawk kawmsaw, am thum nyn awh thlakthi anglak awhkawng tho tlaih kaw,
Jerusalem awhkawng kqan kawmsaw, penglum boeih venawh ang ming awh zutnaak ingkaw thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak ce khypyi kawm uh.
Ve a kawnglam boeih ak simpyikung na awm uhyk ti.
Ka pa ak awikam ce nangmih aham tyi law kawng nyng; cehlai khan benna kawng thaawmnaak ing thoeicam na nami awm hlan dy taw ve khawk bau khuiawh ana awm kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ce Bethani khaw benna cehpyi khqi nawh, a kut soeng nawh zosennaak ce pek khqi hy.
A mingmih ce zosennaak a peek khqi coengawh khan benna pawm quna ce awm hy.
Cawh amah ce bawk unawh zeelmang doena Jerusalem na ce hlat tlaih uhy.
Bawkim awh ce awm poe unawh, Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy.
Ak cykca awh awi ce awm hy, Awi ce Khawsa ing awm haih hy nih, ce awi taw Khawsa ni.
Anih ce ak cykca awh Khawsa ing awm haih hy nih.
Anih ak caming ik-oeih boeih boeih ve sai na awm nawh; anih kaana taw ik-oeih sai pynoet ca awm am awm hy.
Anih ak khuiawh hqingnaak ce awm nawh, cawhkaw hqingnaak cetaw thlanghqing aham vangnaak na awm hy.
Cawhkaw vangnaak ce than ak khuiawh vang hy, cehlai thannaak ing anih ce am sim hy.
Khawsa venawh kawng a tyih law thlang pynoet ce awm hy; anih taw Johan mingna hy.
Anih ak caming thlang boeih ing amik cangnaak thai aham anih taw cawhkaw vangnaak ak sim sakkung simpyinaak na awm hy.
Amah taw vangnaak amni; cehlai cawhkaw vangnaak ak dyih pyi simpyinaak na awm hy.
Thlang boeih ak coeikung vangnaak tang tang ce khawmdek awh law hy.
Anih taw khawmdek awh awm hawh hy; amah ing khawmdek ve sai hlai hy, khawmdek ing amah ce am hat hy.
Ak thlangkhqi venna law hlai hy, ak thlangkhqi ing anih ce am do uhy.
Cehlai amah ce ak dokhqi boeih, ang ming ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih a venawh, Khawsa cakhqi na awm thainaak ce pehy.
Pumsa ben kaana, ‘Khawsa a ngaihnaak amyihna ak thang thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Awi ce pumsa na coeng nawh, ningnih a venawh awm hy. Pynoet ingkaw taak chyn na ak awm a boeimangnaak, qeennaak ingkaw awitak ing ak be, Pa a venna kawng ak law, amah a boeimangnaak ce ni hu hawh uhy.
Johan ing anih akawng ce thlang a venawh sim sak hy. “Anih akawng maw kak kqawn mah, ‘Anih taw kai anglakawh lamma na a awm hawh dawngawh, kai a hu awh ak law cetaw kai anglakawh bau khqoet hy,’ ka tice,” tihy.
Am qeennaak ak be pyr awhkawng ningnih ing zoseennaak pynoet coeng pynoet ni hu boeih uhy.
Mosi a venawh kawng anaa awi ce a na pe nawh, qeennaak ingkaw awitak taw Jesu Khrih awhkawng law hy.
U ingawm Khawsa ce am hu khawi hlai hy, pynoet doek khoeih a taak chyn na ak awm Khawsa, Pa a venawh ak awm ing anih ce dang law sak hawh hy.
Jerusalem awhkaw Judakhqi ing anih ce doet aham khawsoeihkhqi ingkaw Levikhqi ce a venna a tyih khqi awh Johan ing a simpyinaak taw vemyihna awm hy.
Anih ce simpyi kaana am awm hy, “Kai ve Khrih amni,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cekkhqi ing, Cawhtaw nang ve a u nu? Nang ve Elijah aw?” tinawh doet uhy. Anih ing, “Amni,” tinak khqi hy. “Nang ve Tawngha aw?” tina bai uhy. Anih ing, “Amni, tinak khqi bai hy.
A hukhit na taw cekkhqi ing, Nang ve a u nu? Kaimih anik tyikhqi venawh ka mik kqawnnaak aham nang ve a u nu tice kqawn lah. Namah ingkaw namah ce ikawmyihna nak kqawnnaak?” tina uhy.
Johan ing tawngha Isaiah ak awi ing hlat pek khqi hy, Kai taw, ‘Bawipa aham lam ce dyng sak lah uh,’ tinawh qamkoh awh ak khypyi ce ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh ami tyihkhqi Farasi thlang vang tloek ing,
doet uhy, Khrih na awm am awm hyk ti, Elijah na awm am awm nawh tawngha na awm am awm loei tiksaw, ikaw ham nu baptisam nani peek khqi bai?” tina uhy.
Johan ing, “Kai ing tui ing baptisma ni pek khqi nyng, cehlai naming lakawh am nami sim thlang pynoet dyi hy.
Anih cetaw kai a hu awhkaw ak law ce ni, anih a khawmyk qui ak suh peek aham awm kai taw am kawih nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih taw Johan ing baptisma a peeknaak Jordan tui caqai Bethani khaw awh ak awm na awm hy.
A khawngawi nyn awh Jesu a venna a law ce Johan ing a huh awh, “Khawmdek thawlhnaak ak phyikung, Khawsa a tuuca, toek lah uh!
Anih ni, ‘Kai a hu awh ak law taw kai anglakawh bau khqoet hy, kawtih anih taw kai ka awm hlanawh awm hawh hy,’ ka ti ce.
Kai kamah ingawm anih ce am sim nyng, cehlai kai ing tui ing baptisma ka ni peeknaak khqi vetaw, anih ce Israel thlangkhqi venawh ang dangnaak aham ni,” tihy.
Cekcoengawh Johan ing vemyihna sim pyi hy: “Khan nakawng Myihla kqukkqu amyihna kqum law nawh ak khanawh ang cuk ce hu nyng.
Ak khanawh Myihla kqum nawh ak cu thlang ing Ciim Myihla ing baptisma ni pe khqi kaw,’ tinawh tui ing baptisma peek aham anik tyikung ing amak kqawn law man kai ingawm amna sim kawng.
Kai ing ka huh hawh dawngawh anih ve Khawsa Capa ni, tice sim pyi nyng,” tihy.
A khawngawi nyn awh Johan taw a hubat thlang pakkhih ingqawi ce a hun awh awm tlaih bai uhy.
Jesu a ceh ce a huh awh, “Khawsa a tuuca ce, toek lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhkaw awi ce a hubat thlang pakkhih ing a ning zaak awh, Jesu a hu awh ce bat hy nih.
Cekqawi ing a hu awh ani hquut ce Jesu ing a huh awh, hawi nawh, “Ikaw na ni ngaih? tina qawi hy. Cekqawi ing, “Cawngpyi kung, hanawh na awm?” tina hy nih.
Anih ing, “Vena law nih, hu bit kawm nik ti,” tina qawi hy. Cedawngawh cekqawi ce cet nih nawh anih a awmnaak ce hu hy nih, ce a nyn awh ce anih a venawh awm pyt hy nih. Ce a tym taw khawnoek pahqa tluk law hy.
Simon Piter a na Andru taw, cekqawi ak khuiawh Johan ak awi za nawh Jesu a hu awh ak bat thlang pynoet na awm hy.
Lamma cyk na Andru ing a sai taw ak tai Simon ce sui nawh, Mesiah (Khrih, tinaak) hu hawh nyng, tinawh kqawn peek aham sui hy.
Cekcoengawh ak tai ce Jesu a venna law pyi hy. Jesu ing anih ce toek nawh, “Nang taw Johan a capa Simon ni, Cepha (ve ve Piter tinaak ni) ming na hawh kawp ti,” tina hy.
A khawngawi nyn awh Jesu taw Kalili na ceh aham cai hy. Philip ce hu nawh, “Ka hu awh bat lah,” tina hy.
Andru ingkaw Piter amyihna Philip awm Bethsaida khaw awhkaw thlang na awm hy.
Philip ing Nathanel ce hu nawh kqawn pehy, “Mosi a anaa awi awh qee nawh tawnghakhqi ingawm ami na qee – Nazareth Jesu, Joseph a capa ce, hu hawh nyng,” tina hy.
Nathanel ing, Nazareth e! Cawhkawng ik-oeih leek law hly thai nawh nu ti?” tinawh doet hy. Philip ing, “Law nawh taw toek mah toek cang lah,” tina hy.
Nathanel a law ce Jesu ing a huh awh, “Coet amak kap, Israel thlang tang tang vawh awm hy ve,” tina hy.
Nathanel ing, “Ikawmyihna nani simnaak?” tina hy. Jeush ing, “Philip ing anik khy hlanawh thaikung awh nang ngawih awh ni hu hawh nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh Nathanel ing, “Cawngpyikung, nang ve Khawsa Capa; Israel Sangphrang na awm hyk ti,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Thaikung awh na awm awh ni hu nyng, ka ni tinaak dawngawh nik cangna hyk ti. Ce anglakawh ik-oeih ak bau khqoet hu hyn kawp ti,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khawk khan ak awng qu ce hu kawm tiksaw, Thlang Capa ak camawh, Khawsa ak khan ceityihkhqi a hak kai ingkaw a nuk kqum ce hu kawp ti,” tina hy.
Am thum nyn awh Kalili qam Kana khaw awh zulawh poei ce awm hy. Jesu a nu awm cawh ce awm lawt hy.
Jesu ingkaw a hubatkhqi ce zulawh poei pan aham khy lawt uhy.
Misur tui a boeih dawngawh, Jesu a nu ing a venawh, “Misur tui am ta voel uhy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Aw nang nu, ikaw ham nu kai awh ce na nang qawlh qu qee? Ka tym pha hlan hy,” tina hy.
A nu ing tyihzawihkhqi venawh, “Ak kqawn amyihna sai pe uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Judakhqi phung silhciimnaak awhkaw ham, tui kalan a thong awhkawng thumkip ak lut qip, lung cikthlyng kquk ce hawih uhy.
Jesu ing tyihzawihkhqi venawh, “Cikthlyng khuiawh tui hloen lah uh,” tinak khqi hy; a mingmih ing tui ce hloen uhy.
Cekcoengawh a mingmih a venawh, “Tui ce dyk unawh taw poei a hqamcakhqi venawh khyn pe uh” tinak khqi hy. A ti amyihna ce sai pe uhy.
Poei awhkaw a hqamca ing misur tui na ak coeng tui ce am tan awh hana kaw hy voei nu tice am sim hlai hy, tui amik than tyihzawihkhqi ingtaw sim uhy. Cekcoengawhawh zuk lokung ce a venna khy nawh
a venawh, Thlang ing misur tui ak kqym ce lamma na toen nawh thlang ing a awk khyk coengawh ni misur tui ak du ce ami toen hlai; nang ingtaw ak kqym ta bak bak hyn hyk ti ve,” tina hy.
Ve kawpoek kyi ik-oeih ve, Kalili qam Kanan khaw awh Jesu ing a sainaak cyk na awm hy. Vemyihna amah a boeimangnaak ce dang sak nawh, a hubatkhqi ing amah awh ce cangnaak ta uhy.
Cekcoengawh a nu, a koeinaakhqi, a hubatkhqi mi Kapernaum khaw na nu cet uhy, cawh ce khawnghi a khoehca awm uhy.
Judakhqi a cehtaak poei a pha tawmca awh, Jesu taw Jerusalem na cet hy.
Bawkim kawt awh ce vaitaw, tuu ingkaw kqukkqu ami zawih khqi, thlang vang ing caboei awh tangka ak thung qukhqi ce hu hy.
Cedawngawh quiboeng pawm nawh, cawhkaw ak awm thlangkhqi ce bawkim awhkawng hqek khqi hy, vaitawkhqi ingkaw tuukhqi awm hquut pek khqi hy; tangka ak thung qukhqi a tangkakhqi awm hawk pek khqi nawh caboeikhqi ce khup phlet pehy.
Kqukkqu ak zawikhqi venawh, “Vemyihkhqi ve ak chang na khyn uh! Ikaw hamna ka Pa im ve nangmih ing ik-oeih zawihnaak im na naming coeng sak!” tinak khqi hy.
Na im aham kak thahlynaak ing ni ai hawh kaw ve, tinawh ca qee ak awm ce a hubatkhqi ing sim hqoet uhy.
Cawh Judakhqi ing a venawh, “Vemyihna ik-oeihkhqi na sai ve hana kaw saithainaak ing nu na sai tice simnaak aham i ikawmyih kawpoek kyi ik-oeih nu nang dang sak thai?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Vawhkaw bawkim ve hqe lah uh, khaw thumvoei khuiawh kai ing thawh tlaih kawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Judakhqi ing vawhkaw bawkim ve kum phlikip coeng kum kquk khuiawh sa uhy, nang ing khaw thumvoei khuiawh nam thawh hly tang nawh nu? tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ingtaw amah a pum bawkim ce ni ak kqawn ngaihnaak hy.
Thihnaak khuiawh kawng a thawh coengawh a hubatkhqi ing anih ak awi kqawn ce sim tlaih uhy. Cedawngawh Cakciim awi ingkaw Jesu ing ak kqawn awi ce cangna uhy.
