Jerusalem khaw awh Cehtaak poei nyn awh a awm awh, thlang khawzah ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a saikhqi ce hu unawh ang ming ce cang na uhy.
Cehlai thlang boeih ce Jesu ing a sim dawngawh, Jesu ing cekkhqi ce ap cang na hy.
Thlanghqing ak kawk khuiawh ikaw a awm tice amah ing a sim dawngawh, thlanghqing akawng ce sim pyi aham thlanghqing ce anih ing am ngoe qee hy.
Juda ukkungkhqi ak khuiawh kaw Nikodemu ak mingnaak Farasi thlang pynoet awm hy.
Anih ce khawmthan awh Jesu a venna law nawh, “Cawngpyikung, nang ve Khawsa venna kawng ak law cawngpyikung ni tice ni sim nyng. Nang ing na sai kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ve Khawsa ing ama awm pyi mantaw u ingawm am sai thai ti kaw,” tina hy.
Jesu ing anih ak awi ce hlat pe nawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek, u awm ama thang tlaih awhtaw Khawsa ram ce am hu thai tikaw,” tina hy.
Nikodemu ing, “Ikawmyihna thlang ing a pacawng a hu na a thang tlaihnaak thai kaw? A nu pukkhui na a hih voeinaak na am lut hly thai saw!” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek, u awm tui ingkaw Myihla ing ama thang tlaih awhtaw Khawsa qam khuiawh am lut thai kaw.
Pumsa awh ak thang taw pumsa na awm hy, cehlai Myihla awh ak thang taw Myihla na awm hy.
'Na thang tlaih aham awm hy,’ ka ti dawngawh nang ngaih a kyi aham am awm hy.
Khaw ing a ngaihnaak na hli hy. Khaw hli awi taw za uhyk ti, 'hana kawng law nawh hana a ceh, tice am sim uhyk ti. Cemyihna ni Myihla awh ak thangkhqi ce a awm hy,” tina hy.
Nikodemu ing, “Ve ve ikawmyihna nu ang coengnaak hly thai?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Nang ve Israelkhqi cawngpyi kung pynoet na awm hlai hyk ti, vemyihkhqi ve am nang zasim nawh nu?
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek, ni sim ve ni nik kqawn nawh, ni huh ceni ni sim pyi, cehlai nangmih ingtaw kaimih a simpyinaak ve am do uhyk ti.
Khawmdek them akawng kak kqawn zani am zasim thai utik saw; ikawmyihna khan benna kaw themkhqi ce naming zaksim naak pai kaw?
Khan benna kawng ak law Thlanghqing Capa ti kaana taw, u awm khawk khan na am kai hy.
Mosi ing kqawng na khqui a tai myihna, Thlanghqing Capa awm tai na awm lawt kaw,
amah ce ak cangnaak thlang boeih ing kumqui hqingnaak ce ami taaknaak thai aham.
U awm amah ak cangnaak boeih am qeeng kawmsaw kumqui hqingnaak a taaknaak thai aham, Khawsa ing khawmdek a lungnaak awh a Capa a taak dyyn ce pehy.
Khawmdek thawlh sak aham Khawsa ing a Capa ce am tyi law nawh, anih ak caming khawmdek thaawngna a awmnaak aham ni a tyih law hy.
U awm anih ce ak cangnaak thlang boeih taw thawlh awideng na am awm kaw, cehlai amak cangnaak thlang boeih taw Khawsa Capa a taak dyyn ang ming ce ama mik cangnaak dawngawh thawlh awideng na awm kaw.
Ve ve thawlh awidengnaak na awm hy: Vangnaak ce khawmdek awh law hawh hy, cehlai thlang ing a ik-oeih saikhqi a set dawngawh, vangnaak anglakawh thannaak ce lungna uhy.
U awm them che ak sai boeih ingtaw vangnaak ce sawh na uhy, ami them saikhqi ce dang hau kaw ti unawh vangnaak ak khuiawh lut aham am ngaih uhy.
Cehlai awitak ing ak hqingkhqi boeih taw vangnaak ak khuiawh ce law uhy, ami them saikhqi ce Khawsa ak caming ni a sai tice ang dangnaak thai aham,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Jesu ingkaw a hubatkhqi ce Judah qam na cet uhy, ce a hun awh cekkhqi ce awm pyi nawh, baptisma ce pehy.
Cawh Johan ingawm Salim a venawh kaw Aenon awh baptisma pe lawt hy, cawh tui khawzah a awm dawngawh, thlangkhqi ce baptisma huh aham a venawh law uhy.
Ve ve Johan thawngim na ang tlaak hlan awhkaw hawh ni.
Cawh tui ing silhnaak awh Johan a hubatkhqi ingkaw Juda thlang pynoet mi oelh qu uhy.
Cawh Johan a venna law unawh, “Cawngpyikung, Jordan tui caqai awh nang ing nanik awm haih thlang nang dyih pyi ce, anih ing baptisma pek khqi nawh thlangkhqi a venna cet uhy,” tina uhy.
Joahan ing cekkhqi venawh, “Khawk khan nakawng a peek doeng ce ni thlang ing a huh hy.
Kai ve Khrih amni, anih a haiawh a tyih thlang na ni ka awm hy,’ ka tice nangmih ingawm ni sim pyi thai uhyk ti.
Nula be cee na ak awm taw anih ak bekung cadawng a koe hawh ni. Zuk lokung cadawng a pyi ing anih ce qeh nawh ak awi ce ngai pehy, Zuk lokung ak awi ce ang zaak awh zeel soeih hy. Cawhkaw zeelnaak ce kai a zeelnaak ni, tuh awhtaw ce ce soep hawh hy.
Anih cetaw hang bau hlyk khqoet khqoet hy, cehlai kai taw zawi hly hqui khqoet khqoet nyng.
U awm khan benna kawng ak law taw khan ben thlang na awm nawh; khawmdek benna kawng ak law cetaw khawmdek a koe na awm hy. Khawmdek awhkawng ak law cetaw ik-oeih boeih ak khanawh awm hy.
Anih ing a huh ingkaw ang zaak ce dyihpyi hy, cehlai u ingawm ak awih kqawn ce am do pehy.
Ak do ingtaw, “Khawsa taw ak thyym ni,” tice dyihpyi hy.
Khawsa ing awi ce kqawn hy, kawtih Khawsa ing a qi a mawng a awm kaana Myihla ce pehy.
Pa ing Capa ce lungna nawh a kut awh ik-oeih soepkep ce pehy.
U awm Capa ak cangnaak thlang ingtaw kumqui hqingnaak ce ta hy, cehlai u awm Capa ak oelh ingtaw hqingnaak ce am hu nawh, Khawsa ak kawsonaak ce ak khanawh awm loet hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing Johan anglakawh hubat khawzah khqoet hu nawh baptisma awm khawzah pehy tice Farasikhqi ing za uhy,
Jesu amah ingtaw baptisma ce am pehy, a hubatkhqi ing ni ami peek hy.
Bawipa ing ce ce a sim awh, Judah ce cehta nawh Kalili na cet tlaih hy.
Cawh Samari qam awhkawng ceh aham ce awm hy.
Cedawngawh Jakob ing a capa Joseph a venawh a peek lo a venawh ak awm, Sikar ak mingnaak Samari khaw ce pha hy.
Cawh Jakob ing tui ak cawh tuikuk awm hy, lam a cehnaak awh ce hoet nawh, Jesu taw cawhkaw tuikuk a venawh ce ngawi hy. Khawnoek kquk tluk law hawh hy.
Cawh Samari nu pynoet ce tui ak than na law hy, Jesu ing a venawh, “Tui awk ahamni pe lah,” tina hy.
A hubatkhqi taw buh ak thlai aham khawk khuina cet hawh uhy.
Samari nu ing a venawh, “Nang taw Juda thlang, kai ve Samari nu ni. Ikawmyihna tui awk aham kai a venna na thoeh law?” tina hy. (Judakhqi ing Samarikhqi ve am pawlneng qu khawi uhy.)
Jesu ing a venawh, “Khawsa a kutdo ce sim nawh na venawh tui ak thoeh lawkung ve na sim mantaw, nang ing thoeh kawm tiksaw anih ing hqingnaak tui ce ni pe hlai voei,” tina hy.
Cawh cawhkaw nu ing, “Bawipa, cawhtaw tui awm na than aham am ngoe voel hy, tuikuk awm dung soeih hy. Cawhkaw hqingnaak tui ce hana kaw nu na huh thai kaw?
Nang ve kaimih a pa Jocob anglakawh na bau khqoet nawh nu? Anih ing vawhkaw tuikuk ve kaimih a venawh ni ceh pe taak khqi hy, amah ingawm ve a tui ve a na aw hy, a canaakhqi ingkaw ak khqin a taakkhqi ingawm a na aw uhy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “U awm vawhkaw tui ak awkhqi boeih taw tui ngaih tlaih kaw,
cehlai u awm kai ing ka peek tui ak aw taw tui am ngaih voel kaw. Kai ing ka peek tui ce ak kawk khuiawh tuibym a myihna kumqui hqingnaak dyna lawng poepa hy,” tina hy.
Nu ing a venawh, “Bawipa, tui am ka ngaihnaak voel aham cawhkaw tui ce ni pe lah, vawhkaw tui awm am ka thannaak voel aham,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Cet nawh na vaa ce vak khy nawhtaw voei law tlaih,” tina hy.
Anih ing, “Vaa am ta nyng,” tina hy. Jesu ing a venawh, “Vaa am ta nyng, na ti ce thym hy.
Cehlai vaa pumha ta hawh hyk ti, tuhkaw pa na taak ce awm na vaa amni. Tuhkaw nak kqawn ce thym hy,” tina hy.
Nu ing, “Bawipa, nang ve tawngha ni tice ni sim nyng.
Ka pakhqi ing ve a tlang awh Khawsa ana beek uhy, cehlai nangmih Judakhqi ingtaw Jerusalem awh ni Khawsa beek aham a awm hy, ti uhyk ti,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Nang nu, nik cangna lah, ve tlang ingkaw Jerusalem kqawn kaana, Pa bawknaak a tym ce law hawh kaw.
Nangmih Samari thlangkhqi ing am nami sim ce bawk uhyk ti; cehlai thaawngnaak ce Judakhqi venawh kawng a law dawngawh, kaimih ingtaw ka mi sim ce bawk unyng.
Cehlai Khawsa ak bawkkhqi ing Pa ce Myihla ingkaw awitak ing bawknaak a tym ce law kaw, tuh awm law hawh hy, cemyihna Khawsa ak bawk thlangkhqi ce Pa ing sui hy.
Khawsa taw Myihla na a awm dawngawh amah ak beek thlangkhqi ing Myihla ingkaw awitak ing a beek aham awm hy,” tina hy.
Nu ing, “Messiah law kaw tice sim nyng. Anih a law awh, ik-oeih boeih boeih ce kqawn caih law kaw,” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Nang a venawh awi ak kqawn kai ve anih hawh ni,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi ce voei law tlaih uhy, nu ing awi anik kqawn ce ami huh awh amik kawpoek kyi hy. Cehlai u ingawm “Kaw na ngaih? Ikawtih aw nu ingqawi awi na nik kqawn?” tinawh am doet uhy.
Cawhkaw nu ing a tuium ce cehta nawh khawk khuina ang dawng coengawh thlangkhqi venawh,
“Law unawh taw, ka them sai boeih boeih ak kqawn lawkung thlang ce toek law lah uh. Khrih hy leek nu?” tinak khqi hy.
Thlangkhqi ce khawk khui awhkawng law unawh anih ce ak toek na cet uhy.
Cawh a hubatkhqi ing, “Cawngpyikung, buh ai cang thoeih ti,” tina uhy.
Cehlai a mingmih a venawh, “Nangmih ing am nami sim ai kawi buh ta nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubatkhqi ing, “Thlang pynoet oet ing ai kawi haw law pe nawh hy voei nu?” ti uhy.
Jesu ing, “Anik tyikung ak kawngaih sai aham ingkaw a bibi coeng peek aham ve ka buh ni.
Hlak phli coeng awhtaw caang ah khoek hawh kaw, ti uhyk ti ka ti my? Ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nami mik dai unawh lokhqi ce toek lah uh! Caang hin nawh ah aham khoek hawh hy.
Tuh za caang ak aatkung ing thaphu hu hawh hy, caang ak sawkung ingkaw caang ak aatkung ce ani zeelnaak thai aham, kumqui hqingnaak aham caang ce tuh aat hawh hy.
Thlang pynoet ing saw nawh, pynoet ing aat hy,’ tinaak awi ve thym hy.
Nangmih ing am nami bi lo khuiawh cang ah ahamni tyi khqi nyng. Thlak chang ing bibi ak kyi ce ana bi hawh uhy, nangmih ing a mingmih a bibinaak ce aat uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhkaw nu ing, “Ka ik-oeih sai boeih kqawn law hy,” tinawh a simpyinaak awh ce a khawk khui awhkaw Samari thlang khawzah ing cangna uhy.
Samari thlangkhqi ce a ven ami pha law awh, a mingmih a venawh awm aham thoeh uhy, cedawngawh khaw hih voei a mingmih ce awm pyi hy.
Ak awih kqawn awh thlang khawzah ngai ing cangna uhy.
Cekkhqi ing cawhkaw nu a venawh, “Nang ing nak kqawn awh ap cangna unyng saw; ka mimah qoe qoe ing za unawh ve ak thlang ve khawmdek thaawngkung ni tice ka sim dawgawh, cangna hawh unyng,” tina uhy.
Khaw hihvoei a awm coengawh Kalili na cet hy.
Tawngha a u awm amah a ram awh zoeksang na am awm khawi hy, tinawh Jesu amah qoe ing ak kqawn hawh dawngawh.
Kalili ce a pha awh, Kalili thlangkhqi ing do uhy. Jerusalem khaw awh cehtaak poei awhkaw a them saikhqi boeih ce ami huh dawngawh, cawh cekkhqi ce cawh awm lawt uhy.
Cekcoengawh tui misur na ang coeng saknaak Kalili ram awhkaw Kana khaw na cet tlaih hy. Cawh Kapernaum khaw awh a capa ak tlo qalboei pynoet ce cawh awm hy.
Cawhkaw boei ing Judah ram awhkawng Kalili ram na Jesu law hy tice ang zaak awh, a venna law nawh ak thi tawm a capa ce qoei sak aham qeennaak thoeh hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Nangmih ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeih ingkaw hatnaakkhqi am nami huh awhtaw ityk awh awm ap cangna hly uhyk ti,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw boei ing, “Bawipa, ka capa a thih hlanawh law cang lah,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Cet hlah, na capa ce qoei hawh hy,” tina hy. Jesu ak awi ce cangna nawh cet hy.
Lam awh a ceh awh, a tyihzawihkhqi ing a capa ce leek tlaih hawh hy ti awithang leek ing ana do law uhy.
Han a tym awh nu a capa a leek tlaih tice a doet awh, a venawh, “Zan awh khawnoek khqih awh a tlawhnaak ing hlah law hy,” tina uhy.
Ce a tym ce Jesu ing a venawh, “Na capa ce qoei hawh hy,” a tinak a tym na awm hy tice a pa ing sim hy. Cedawngawh amah ingkaw a ipkhuikaw boeih ing cangna uhy.
Vawhkaw kawpoek kyi hatnaak ik-oeih ve Jesu ing Judah qam awhkawng Kalili qam na a law coengawh a sai hih voeinaak na awm hy.
Khawnghi iqyt awm a dii hlanawh, Judakhqi poei bul aham Jesu taw Jerusalem na cet hy.
Jerusalem khaw awhkaw Tuu chawmkeng a venawh tuili pynoet awm hy, Aqamaic awi na Bethesdatina khy uhy, ce tuili ce tung pumha ing chung unawh tih uhy.
Cawh ak tlo ak naa thlang khawzah zaih uhy, mikhyp, khawkhem, khawk zuikhqi ce awm uhy, cekkhqi ing tui ak phyl ce qeh uhy.
A tym tym awh Bawipa ak khan ceityih ce nu law hoeih hoeih nawh tui ce phyl sak hy. A u awm lamma cyk na tui a phyl huili awh ak cawn taw ikawmyih a tlawhnaak awm qoei hy.
Amah cawh kum thumkip kumkhqet ak zaih hawh thlaktlo pynoet awm hy.
Jesu ing cawhkaw thlaktlo kum khawqyt cawh awm hawh hy tice a sim dawngawh, doet hy, “Roei nak ngaih aw?” tina hy.
Cawhkaw thlaktlo ing, “Bawipa, tui a phyl awh tui na anik khawng hly thlang am awm hy. Tho lawt hlai nyng, nik khai boeih uhy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Tho nawh na hiphaih ce lo nawh cet hlah!” tina hy.
Cawh cawhkaw thlang ce qoei pahoei hy; a hiphaih ce lo nawh cet hy. Ce nyn taw Sabbath nyn na awm hy.
Cedawngawh Judakhqi ing cawhkaw ak qoei thlang a venawh, “Tuhngawi ve Sabbath nyn ni; anaa awi ing hiphaih doeng aham kham hy,” tina uhy.
Cehlai anih ing, “Kai anik qoei sak thlang ing, ‘Na hiphaih ce lo nawh cet hlah,’ ni tina hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Na hiphaih doeng nawh ceh aham anik kqawn peekkung ce a u nu?” tinawh doet uhy.
Cawh ak awm thlang kqeng khuina a lut taak valh hawh a dawngawh, cawhkaw ak qoei thlang ing a u hy voei nu tice am sim hy.
A huna Jesu ing anih ce bawkim khuiawh hu nawh a venawh, “Toek lah, na sa dip hawh hy. Thawlhnaak koeh sai voel, cemyih am awhtaw nak khanawh ik-oeih amak leek khqoet pha law kaw,” tina hy.
Ce ak thlang ce cet nawh anih ak qoei sakkung taw Jesu ni, tice Judakhqi venawh kqawn pehy.
Ceamyihna Sabbath nyn awh Jesu ing vemyih ik-oeihkhqi a sai dawngawh, Judakhqi ing the a kha na uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Ka pa ing a poepa na tuhngawi dy awh bibi hy, cedawngawh kai ingawm bibi nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Sabbath nyn ama zeih doeng am nawh, Khawsa awm Ka pa tinawh khy hy, Khawsa ingkaw amah ce ang myihna a taak ak caming, Judakhqi ing anih ce him aham cai khqoet uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi ce vemyihna awi hlat hy: “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi. Capa ing amah poek awh ikaw awm am sai thai hy, a Pa ing a sai boeih boeih ce Capa ingawm sai lawt hy.
Pa ing Capa a lungnaak dawngawh a ik-oeih sai boeih boeih ce huh hy. Oeih, nangmih naming ngaih a kyinaak aham ve anglakawh ik-oeih ak bau khqoet ce nim huh khqi hyn bai kaw.
Pa ing thlakthikhqi thawh nawh hqingnaak a peek amyihna, Capa ingawm amah ing a ngaih thlangkhqi venawh hqingnaak ce pehy.
Cekcoengawh, Pa ing u awm awi am deng hy, cehlai awi deng thainaak ce Capa a venawh pe boeih hy,
Pa ce amik kqihchah a myihna Capa ce thlang boeih ing ak kqihchahnaak thai aham cemyihna pehy. U awm Capa ce amak kqihchahnaak taw, Capa ak tyikung Pa awm anih ing ap kqihchah hy.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u awm kak awi ce za nawh ak tyikung ce ak cangnaak thlang taw kumqui hqingnaak ce ta hawh hy, anih ce thawlh sak na am awm voel kaw: thihnaak awhkawng hqingnaak ak khuiawh lut hawh hy.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlakthikhqi ing Thlanghqing Capa ak awi aming zaaknaak tym ce law kaw, tuh awm law hawh hy, ak zakhqi boeih ce hqing kawm uh.
Pa ing amah awh hqingnaak a taak amyihna, Capa ingawm amah awh hqingnaak a taaknaak lawt aham pe hawh hy.
Anih ce Thlanghqing Capa na a awm dawngawh awideng thainaak ce pehy.
Ve ak camawh naming ngaih koeh kyi sak uh, phyi ak khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih ing anih ak awi aming zaaknaak tym ce law kaw,
them leek ak saikhqi taw hqingnaak pang aham tho kawm usaw, them che ak saikhqi awm awidengnaak pang aham tho lawt kawm uh.
Kamah ak caming ikaw awm am sai thai nyng; kang zaak amyihna awi deng nyng, kamah ak kawngaih ce am sui nyng saw, kai anik tyikung Pa ak kawngaih ce ka sui dawngawh, kak awidengnaak awm dyng hy.
Kamah akawng ve kamah ha ing dyihthing na kang dyih pyi mantaw, dyihthing na kang dyihpyinaak ve am thym kaw.
Cehlai kai dyihthing na anik dyih pyikung thlang pynoet awm hy, anih ing kai a ning dyihpyinaak ce thym hy.
Nangmih ing Johan a venna thlang tyi u tiksaw anih ing awitak dyihthing ce dyihpyi hy.
Thlanghqing a simpyinaak ce am do nyng; thaawngnaak nami huh thainaak ahamni kak kqawn hy.
Johan taw vangnaak ak pekung mai-im na awm hy, nangmih ing anih a vangnaak khuiawh zeel aham kawlhkalh awhtaw tyk uhyk ti.
Kai a simpyinaak ve Johan a simpyinaak anglakawh bau khqoet hy. Kai ing kak coeng aham Pa ing ka venawh ani peek bibi, tuhkaw ka bibi ing, Pa ing kai ni tyi hy, tice dyih pyi hy.
Kai anik tyikung Pa ing kai awh ce simpyinaak tahy. Nanngmih ing anih ak awi ce am za khawi uhyk ti, a myi awm am hu khawi uhyk ti,
anih ing a tyih ak thlang ce nangmih ing am namik cangnaak dawngawh, ak awi ce nangmih ak khuiawh awm am awm hy.
Cabu Ciim ak caming kumqui hqingnaak ak ta thlang na namik poek dawngawh, Cakciim taw ak leek cana toek uhyk ti. Vawhkaw Cakciim ing kai ve ning dyihpyi hlai ti maw,
kumqui hqingnaak huh aham ka venawh law aham taw am ngaih lak law bai uhyk ti.
Thlanghqing am kyihcahnaak awi ce am do nyng,
cehlai nangmih ce ni sim khqi nyng. Nangmih ing Khawsa a lungnaak namik kawlung khuiawh am ta uhyk ti, tice sim nyng.
Kapa ang ming ing kai taw law nyng, cehlai nangmih ing amni do uhyk ti; thlakchang a u awm amah ang ming ing a law mantaw, do hlai voei uk ti.
Khawsa a ven doeng awhkawng ak law kyihcahnaak ce huh aham a sui kaana, pynoet ingkaw pynoet am kyihcahnaak ak suikhqi ing ikawmyihna namik cangnaak pai kaw?
Cehlai kai ing Pa a haiawh thawlh nik puk kaw, tinawh koeh poek uh. Nangmih thawlh anik pukkhqikung taw nangmih ing naming ngaih-u Mosi ce ni.
Mosi ce namik cangnaak mantaw, anih ing kai akawng ce ana qee dawngawh, kai awm nik cangna hlai voei uk ti.
Cehlai anih a qee ce am namik cangnaak hawh awhtaw, ikawmyihna nu ak awi ve namik cangnaak pai kaw?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh, Jesu ing Kalili tuili caqai ben (Tiberia tuili ami ti) na ce cet hy.
Thlaktlo ak khanawh kawpoek kyi hatnaak a sai ce ami huh awh thlang kqeng ing a hu awh hquut uhy.
Cawh Jesu taw tlang na van nawh a hubatkhqi mi ngawi uhy.
Judahkhqi a cehtaak Poei taw zoe hawh hy.
Thlang kqeng a venna ak law ce Jesu ing a huh awh, Philip a venawh, “Vawhkaw thlang kqeng ing ami ai aham hana kaw phaihpi nu nik thlaih peek lah voei?” tina hy.
A sai hly kawi ce sim hawh hlai hy, a noek a daknaak na ve ak awi ve doet hy.
Philip ing, “Hlak kqeet thaphu ing ve thlangkhqi aham phaihpi nik thlai seiawm khangoet qip awh ami ai aham za am khoek ti kaw!” tina hy.
A hubat thlakchang pynoet, Simon Piter a naa Andru ing vemyihna kqawn pehy.
“Vawh ve phaihpi cun nga ingkaw nga pakkhih ak ta naasen pynoet taw awm hlai hy, thlang ve zah aham taw vemyihkhqi ce kaw na am coeng hly hy?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Thlangkhqi ce ngawih sak khqi,” tina hy. Ce a hun awh ce taitin awm nawh, ce ak khanawh thlang thongnga ce ngawi uhy.
Jesu ing phaihpi ce lo nawh zeelnaak awi ak kqawn coengawh, cawhkaw ak ngawikhqi venawh ami phyi khyk na pe uhy. Ceamyihna nga awm ami phyi naak dy tei bai uhy.
Thlang boeih ing ak phyi na ami ai coengawh, a hubatkhqi venawh, “Ami ai ngenkhqi ce cawi lah uh. Koeh baw koeh hqe sak uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Phaihpi ce ak phyi na ai unawh, ami ai ngen ce ami kawih awh vawh hqa hlaihih awh be hy.
Cawhkaw kawpoek kyi hatnaak Jesu ing a sai ce thlangkhqi ing ami huh awh, “Ve ak thlang ve khawmdek awh ak law hly kawi tawngha tang tang ni,” ti uhy.
A mingmih ing law unawh amah ce Sangpahrang na sai ngah ngah kawm uh, tice Jesu ing a sim awh, tlang na amah doeng ceh taak khqi valh hy.
Khaw a my law awhtaw, a hubat khqi ce tuili na nu cet uhy,
Lawng awh ngawi unawh Kapernaum khaw na ce cet uhy. Khaw than hawh hlai hy, Jesu taw a mingmih a venna cet hlan hy.
Cawh khaw hli khungdeng nawh tuilet tho hy.
Meng thum am awhtaw meng thum hlai tluk lawng ce ami kaih coengawh, a mingmih a lawng a awmnaak benna tui awh a khaw ing cet nawh ak law Jesu ce hu uhy; cawh a mingmih ing kqih uhy.
Cehlai a mingmih a venawh, “Kai ni; koeh kqih uh,” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ing lawng khuina lut sak uhy, amah cawh aming cainaak hun ce pha uhy.
A khawngawi awhtaw vang ben long caqai awh thlang kqeng ak dyikhqi ing, lawng pynoet doeng tikaa taw lawng ak chang am awm nawh, Jesu taw a hubatkhqi mi kutoet na lawng awh am cet haih unawh, a hubatkhqi amimah doeng ni ami ceh tice sim uhy.
Cekcoengawh Tiberia ben awhkaw lawng a vang ce Bawipa ing zeelnaak awi ak kqawn coengawh thlang kqeng ing phaihpi ami ainaak hun awh ce dym uhy.
Jesu ingkaw a hubatkhqi cawh am awm voel uhy tice thlang kqeng ing ami sim awh, lawng khuina lut unawh Kapernaum benna ce Jesu ak sui na cet uhy.
Tuili vang benna amah ce ami huh awh, doet uhy, “Cawngpyikung, ityk awh vena na pha?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, nangmih ing kai ni sui uhyk ti, kawpoek kyi hatnaakkhqi nami huh awh amni, phaihpi ak phyi na nami ai awh ni.
Thlanghqing Capa ing ani peek hly khqi kumqui hqingnaak buh huh aham bibi lah uh. Anih awh ce Pa Khawsa ing noeknaak deeng hawh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Khawsa ing a ngoe ikaw bi nu ka mi bi kaw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Khawsa bibi taw veni: amah ing a tyih cangnaak ce,” tinak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh doet uhy, Hu unawh kamik cangnaak aham i ikawmyih ak kawpoek kyi hatnaak nu na nim huh khqi kaw? Ikaw na sai kaw?
Pakdamkhqi ing mana ce qamkoh awh ana ai uhy, ‘A mingmih ing ami ai aham khan nakawng phaihpi ce pek khqi hy,’ tinawh a qee amyihna, tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, khawk khan nakaw phaihpi nangmih anik pe khqikung ce Mosi amni, Ka pa ing ni khawk khan nakaw phaihpi tang tang ce nangmih ani peek khqi.
Khawsa a phaihpi taw khawmdek a venawh hqingnaak ak pekung khawk khan nakawng anuk law thlang ce ni,” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ing, “Bawipa, tuhkawng vawhkaw phaihpi ce ni pek khqi lah,” tina uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Kai taw hqingnaak phaihpi na awm nyng. U awm ka venna ak law taw ak phoen am cawi kaw, kai anik cangnaak thlang taw ityk awm tui am ngaih voel kaw.
Cehlai ka nik kqawn peek khqi hawh amyihna, kai ve ni hu hawh hlai uhyk ti, amnik cangna hlan bak bak uhyk ti.
Ka pa ing ani peekkhqi boeih boeih taw ka venna law kaw, u awm kai a venawh ak lawkhqi boeih taw am maa kawng nyng.
Kamah ak kawngaih bi aham am nawh kai anik tyikung ak kawngaih bi ahamni khawk khan nakawng ka law hy.
Amah ing ani peek khqi boeih boeih ce pynoet ca awm ang qeng sak kaana, khawnghi a dyt awh ka thawh sak tlaih ham ce kai anik tyikung ak kawngaih na awm hy.
Kapa ak kawngaih taw, u awm Capa ce ak toekkhqi boeih ing cangna unawh kumqui hqingnaak a taaknaak ham ingkaw, khawnghi a dyt awh kai ing ka thawh sak tlaih ham ce ni,” tinak khqi hy.
“Kai taw khawk khan nakawng ak law phaihpi na awm nyng,” a ti dawngawh Judahkhqi ce sai bi uhy.
A mingmih ing, “Ve ve Joseph a capa Jesu am nu ve?” A pa ingkaw a nu awm ni sim u saw kaw. Ikawmyihna, “Khawk khan nakaw ka nuk law,” a ti hy voei,” ti uhy.
Jesu ing, “Koeh sai bi voel uh.
Kai anik tyikung Pa ing ama ceh sak awhtaw u awm kai a venna am law thai kaw, anih ce khawnghi a dyt awh kai ing thawh tlaih kawng nyng.
Tawnghakhqi cauk awh, ‘A mingmih boeih ce Khawsa ing cawngpyi kaw, tinawh awm hy. A u awm Pa ak awi ce ngai nawh anih a venawh ak cawng taw kai a venawh law hy.
Khawsa venawh kawng ak law doeng am kaa ingtaw u ingawm Pa ce hu hlan hy; anih doeng ing ni Pa ce a huh hy.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u awm ak cangnaak ingtaw kumqui hqingnaak ce ta hawh hy.
Kai taw hqingnaak phaihpi na awm nyng.
Nami pakhqi ing qamkoh awh mana ce ai uhy, cehlai thi uhy.
Cehlai khawk khan nakawng anuk law phaihpi ce vawh awm hy; ce ce u ingawm a ai awhtaw am thi kaw.
Kai taw khawk khan nakawng anuk law hqingnaak phaihpi na awm nyng. U ingawm vawhkaw phaihpi ve a ai awhtaw, kumqui dyna hqing kaw. Cawhkaw phaihpi cetaw, khawmdek ing hqingnaak a taaknaak aham ka peek hly kawi ka sa veni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Judahkhqi taw amimah ingkaw amimah khqi ce oelh qu unawh,” Ikawmyihna ve ak thlang ing amah a sa ce ai aham ani peek naak khqi kaw?” ti uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, thlanghqing Capa a sa ce am ai unawh a thi ce am nami awk awhtaw hqingnaak am ta kawm uk ti.
Ka sa ce ai nawh ka thi ce ak aw ingtaw kumqui hqingnaak ce tahy, khawnghi a dyt awh ce anih ce kai ing thawh kawng nyng.
Ka sa ve buh tang tang na awm nawh ka thi ve awk ham tang tang na awm hy.
U awm ka sa ai nawh ka thi ak aw taw kai awh awm poe kawm saw, kai awm anih awh awm poe kawng nyng.
Ak hqing Pa ing kai ani tyih amyihna Pa ak caming kai awm hqing nyng, cemyih lawt na kai anik ai taw kai ak caming hqing lawt kaw.
Ve ve khawk khan nakaw ak law hqingnaak phaihpi ni. Nami pakhqi ing mana ana ai unawh thi uhy, cehlai vawhkaw phaihpi ak ai taw ang loet na hqing kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ve Kapernawum khaw awhkaw sinakawk awh a cawngpyi awh kqawn pekhy.
Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh a hubat thlang khawzah ing, Vawhkaw cawngpyinaak ve kyi aih hy. U ing nu a do thai kaw?” ti uhy.
Ce ak awi awh a hubatkhqi sai bi uhy tice a sim awh, “Ve ak awi awh namik kaw am law nawh nu?
Thlanghqing Capa ing a awmnaak kqym na a kai ce nami huh mantaw ikaw nu nami ti voei!
Myihla ing hqingnaak ce pehy; pumsa taw kawna am coeng hy. Nangmih a venawh awi kak kqawn lawkhqi ve Myihla awi na a awm a dawngawh hqingnaak na awm hy.
Cehlai nangmih anglakawh amak cangnaak thlang vang awm uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy. Jesu ing ak cykca awhkawng amak cangnaak thlangkhqi ce sim nawh amah thlang a kut awh ak zawi hly awm sim hawh hy.
Cekcoengawh a mingmih a venawh, “Cawh mah maw, Ka pa ing ama tyih law taw u awm ka venna am law thai kaw, ka ti hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhkawng taw a hubat thlang khawzah ing voei taak unawh a hu awh am bat voel uhy.
Thlanghqa hlaihih a venawh, “Nangmih taw voei aham am nami ngaih lawt nawh aw?” ti nak khqi hy.
Simon Piter ing, “Bawipa a u venna nu ka mi ceh kaw? Nang awh ni kumqui hqingnaak a awm hy.
Nang ve Khawsa ak Thlang Ciim ni tice cang na unawh sim unyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Nangmih thlanghqa hlaihih ve kai ing ni ka nik tyh khqi my? Cehlai nangmih ak khuiawh qaai pynoet awm hy,” tinak khqi hy.
(Simon a capa Judah Iskariot ce ak kqawn ngaihnaak, anih ce thlanghqa hlaihih ak khuiawh kaw thlang na awm hlai hy, a hu na taw amah ce thlang a kut awh akzawikungna awm hy.)
Cekcoengawh, Jesu taw Kalili qam kqang cet nawh, Judahkhqi ing him aham ami teng adawngawh Judah qam ce cehta hy.
Cehlai Judahkhqi a hi im poei ce a zoe law awhtaw,
Jesu a koeinaakhqi ing a venawh, “Ve a hun awhkawng Judah qam na na ceh kawp ti, na hubatkhqi ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeih na saikhqi ce ami huh naak aham.
U awm thlang kqeng a huh awh dang aham ak ngaih taw ik-oeih ang hyp na am sai khawi hy. Vemyih ik-oeihkhqi na sai hawh dawngawh namah ingkaw namah ce khawmdek thlangkhqi venawh huh qu sak,” tina uhy.
A koeinaa nawnkhqi ingawm amah ce ap cangna uhy.
cedawngawh Jesu ing, “Kai aham a tym pha law hlan hy; nangmih aham taw a tym ve awm poepa hy.
Khawmdek ing nangmih ce amni sawh nak khqi thai hy, cehlai ami them sai amak leekkhqi ce kak kqawn peek khqi camawh kai ni sawh na uhy.
Nangmih mah poeikung na cet uh. Cehlai ka tym a pha hlan dawngawh kai taw ce a poei na cet hly hlan nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Ce ak awi ak kqawn boeih coengawh Kalili awh ce awm hy.
Cehlai a koeinaakhqi poei na ami ceh boeih coengawh, anih cet lawt hy, cehlai thlang a sim na am cet nawh ang hyp na cet hy.
Poei khuiawh Judahkhqi ing doen unawh sui uhy, “Hana nu ce ak thlang ce a awm hy voei?” ti uhy.
Thlang kqeng ak khuiawh anih akawng ce kqawn sap sap uhy. Thlang vang ing, “Thlak leek ni ka ti koe noek,” ti uhy. Ak chang tloek bai ingtaw, “Amni, thlang ni a thainaak hy,” ti uhy.
Cehlai Judahkhqi ce amik kqih awh u ingawm ang dang qoeng na anih akawng ce ap kqawn uhy.
Poei a awm hui awh, Jesu ing bawkim na cet nawh thlang cawngpyi hy.
Juda thlangkhqi aming ngaih kyi nawh, “Ve ak thlang ing ca am cawng loei nawh, hana kaw vemyih saithainaakkhqi a huh hy voei?” ti uhy.
Jesu ing, “Ka cawngpyinaak ve kamah a koe amni. Kai anik tyikung a venawh kaw ni.
U ingawm Khawsa ak kawngaih ce sai aham ak tyh awhtaw, ka cawngpyinaak ve Khawsa a venawh kaw nu, am awhtaw kamah a cawngpyinaak mai nu, tice sim kaw.
Amah poek awh awi ak kqawn taw amah zoeksang qunaak ahamni ak kqawn hy, cehlai anih ak tyikung zoeksangnaak aham bi ak bikung taw awitak ak thlang ni; amah awh ce amak thym ikaw awm am awm hy.
Mosi ing anaa awi am ni pek khqi nawh nu? Cehlai nangmih ak khuiawh pynoet kangna ingawm am hquut uhyk ti. Ikawtih kai him aham nami ni sui?” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh thlang kqeng ing, “Nang ve qaai ta hyk ti ve. U ing nu nang him aham ani sui?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Kai ing kawpoek kyi them pynoet sai nyng, cawh nangmih naming ngaih na kyi hy.
Cehlai Mosi ing chahhui qeetnaak ani peek khqi dawngawh (Mosi ing am pe nawh pakdamkhqi ing ni ami na peek hlai hy), Sabbath nyn awh nangmih ing naasen chahhui qeetnaak sai uhyk ti.
Naasen ce Sabbath nyn awh chahhui qeet pe hlai uhyk ti, Mosi a anaa awi ce eek na ama awm awhtaw, kawtih kai ing Sabbath nyn awh thlaktlo ka qoei sak awh nangmih namik kaw a so?
Ak khan toek nawh awi koeh tlyk uh, ak thym na awi tlyk uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Jerusalem khaw awhkaw thlang vang tloek ing, “Him aham ami sui ak thlang ce anih am nu ve?
Toek lah uh, ang dang qoengna awi ak kqawn awh, u ingawm a venawh ikaw am kqawn hqa uhy. Ukkungkhqi ing anih ve Khrih ni tinawh amik poek tang hy voei nu aw?
Cehlai ningnih ingtaw anih ve hana kaw thlang nu tice ni sim uhy, Khrih a law awhtaw hana kawng nu a law tice u ingawm am sim hly hlai hy,” ti uhy.
Cawh, Jesu ing bawkim awh a cawngpyi doena khy nawh, “Oeih, kai ve ni sim uhyk ti, kai ve hana kaw nu tice ni sim uhyk ti. Kai kamah poek ing vawh am law nyng, cehlai kai anik tyikung ce thym hy. Anih ce nangmih ing am sim uhyk ti,
cehlai anih ing ni tyi nawh, anih a venawh kawng ka law dawngawh kai ingtaw sim nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh anih ce tu pahoei aham ngaih uhy, cehlai anih a tym ce a pha hlan dawngawh, u ingawm am tuhy.
Cehlai, thlang khawzah ing anih awh ce cangnaak ta uhy. Cekkhqi ing, “Khrih a law awh, ve ak thlang anglakawh anih ing kawpoek kyi them khawzah ngai ak sai hly nu?” ti uhy.
Thlangkhqi ing anih akawng cemyihna amik kqawn sap sap ce Farasikhqi ing za uhy. Cawh khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi ing anih ce tu aham bawkim ukkungkhqi ce tyi uhy.
Jesu ing, “Nangmih a venawh a khoehca ni ka awm hly, cekcoengawh taw kai anik tyikung a venna cet hly hawh nyng.
Nangmih ing kai ce ni sui kawm uk ti, cehlai amni hu kawm uk ti; kai ka awmnaak awh nangmih am law thai kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Judahkhqi ing, “Amni huh thainaak aham hana nu cet valh vang a ti hy voei? Nimah thlangkhqi ing poeng unawh aming kqeng aming tainaak Greekkhqi anglak na cet nawh Greekkhqi cawngpyi khqi vang, tinawh hy voei aw?
‘Nangmih ing ni sui hly hlai uhyk ti, amni hu kawm uk ti, kai ka awmnaak awh nangmih am law thai kawm uk ti,’ a ti hy voei?” ti uhy.
Poei a dytnaak ingkaw a pui khyt a khawnghi awh, Jesu ing dyi nawh kawteh na, “U awm tui ak ngaih taw ka venna law seitaw, tui aw seh.
U awm kai anik cangnaak thlang taw, cak ciim ing ak kqawn amyihna, ak kawk khui nakawng hqingnaak tui ce lawng kaw,” tinawh khy hy.
Ce ak awi ak kqawn ngaihnaak taw, amah ce ak cangnaak thlang boeih ing a hu na ami huh hly Myihla ce ak kqawn ngaihnaak ni. Jesu ce zoeksang na a awm hlan dawngawh, ce a nyn dy awhtaw Myihla ce pe hlan hyn hy.
Ak awi ce aming zaak awh, thlang vang ing, “Ve ak thlang ve tawngha tang ni,” ti uhy.
Thlang vang bai ingtaw, “Ve ak thlang ve Khrih ni,” ti uhy. Thlak changkhqi bai ing taw, “Ikawmyihna Khrih ce Kalili awhkawng a law thai kaw?
Cakciim ing, 'Khrih taw David ipkhui awhkawng law kaw, David a awmnaak khaw Bethlehem awhkawng law kaw,' tihy ka ti koe noek?” ti uhy.
Jesu ak camawh thlang kqeng ce pek ang bo qu uhy.
Thlang vang ing anih ce tu aham ngaih uhy, cehlai u ingawm am tuhy.
A huna taw bawkim temkungkhqi ce khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi venna hlat tlaih uhy, cekkhqi ing, “Ikawtih anih ce am nami law pyi? tina uhy.
Bawkim teemkungkhqi ing, “U ingawm anih amyihna awi ap kqawn khawi hlan hy, tina uhy.
Farasikhqi ing, “Nangmih awm ni thai nak khqi hawh lawt hy my ce?
Ukkung am awhtaw Farasi pynoet oet ing anih ak awi ce cangna hawh nawh leek nu?
Amni! Vawhkaw thlang kqeng ing anaa awi ikaw awm am sim uhy, a mingmih ak khanawh awihkha awm hawh hy,” ti uhy.
A mingmih anglakawh pynoet na awm nawh ak cyk awh Jesu a venna ak cet Nekodemu ing,
“Ningmih anaa awi ing thlang a ik-oeih sai lamma na ang zaak hlanawh thawlh sak paqap qap nawh nu? tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ing, “Nang awm Kalili ben awhkaw thlang lawt aw? Sui nawh toek lah thaw voeih ti, Kalili awhkawng tawngha ap cawn khawi hy,” tina uhy.
Cekcoengawh, im na voei boeih uhy.
Cehlai Jesu taw Olive tlang na ce kai hy.
A khawngawi khaw a dai awh bawkim lut hy. Cawh thlang boeih a venna cun law bai usaw, ngawi nawh cekkhqi ce cawngpyi khqi hy.
Cawh caqeekungkhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi ing nu pynoet a samphaih huiawh tu unawh law pyi uhy. Thlangkhqi haiawh nu ce dyih sak unawh,
Jesu a venawh, “Cawngpyikung, vawhkaw nu ve a samphaih huiawh tu unyng.
Mosi a anaa awi ingtaw vemyih a nu ve lung ing thlak mat aham ni a awm hy. Nang ingtaw ikawmyihna nak poek?” tina uhy.
Ce awidoetnaak ve amah thawlh amik puknaak thai aham cainaak ta unawh a mi doet ni. Cehlai Jesu ing koep nawh a kut ply ing dek awh ca qee hy.
Cekkhqi ing ami doet khing awh tho nawh a mingmih a venawh, “Nangmih ak khuiawh amak thawlh khawi qoe ing vawhkaw nu ve lung ing thlak ma seh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh nung koep tlaih nawh dek awh ca qee tlaih bai hy.
Ce ak awi ce aming zaak awh a hqamca awhkawng kqan nawh pynoet coeng pynoet cen bet bet uhy, a huna taw Jesu ingkaw cawh ak dyi nu doeng ce taang hy nih.
Jesu ing dyi nawh nu a venawh, “Nu, hana nu ami ceh boeih? U ingawm amni thawlh sak nawh nu?” tina hy.
Nu ing, “Bawipa, u ingawm amni thawlh sak hy,” tina hy. Cawh Jesu ing, “Cawhtaw kai ingawm amni thawlh sak lawt nyng. Cet nawhtaw thawlhnaak koeh sai voel moe,” tina hy.
Thlangkhqi venawh Jesu ing awi kqawn pek tlaih hy, “Kai taw khawmdek vangnaak na awm nyng. U awm ka hu awh ak law taw ityk awh awm thannaak ak khuiawh am cet kaw, cehlai hqingnaak ce ta kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Farasikhqi ing, “Nang ing namah ingkaw namah ni dyihthing na na awm hy; nang dyihpyinaak ve am thym hy,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing cekkhqi ak awi ce vemyihna hlat khqi hy, “Kamah ingkaw kamah dyih qu pyi nyng seiawm, kang dyih qu pyinaak ve thym hy; kai taw hana kawng ka law nawh hana ka ceh hly tice sim nyng; cehlai nangmih ingtaw ka lawnaak ingkaw ka cehnaak hly am sim uhy ti.
Nangmih ing thlanghqing pumsa ing awideng uhyk ti; cehlai kai ingtaw u awm awi am deng nyng.
Awideng bai nyng seiawm, kamah doengna am ka awm awh kak awi tlypnaak ve thym hy. Kai anik tyikung Pa ingqawi kai taw dyi haih nyng.
Na mimah a anaa awi awh thlang pakhih ing a sim pyi awhtaw cawhkaw a simpyinaak ce thym hy tina awm hy.
Kai ing kamah ce dyih qu pyi nyng; kai anik tyikung ak chang simpyikung taw Pa ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh cekkhqi ing doet uhy, “Na pa ce hana nu a awm?” tina uhy. Jesu ing, “Nangmih ing kai amni sim u tiksaw ka Pa awm am sim utyk ti. Kai mah nami ni sim mantaw, ka Pa awm sim hly hlai uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Bawkim awh tangka amik channaak bawm a venawh a cawngpyi khqi awh ve ak awi ve kqawn pek khqi hy. A tym a pha hlan dawngawh u ingawm am tu hy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh awi kqawn pek khqi tlaih bai hy, “Kai taw cet hly hawh nyng, nangmih ing kai ce ni sui kawm uk ti, cehlai nami thawlhnaak awh ce thi kawm uk ti. Kai ka cehnaak awh nangmih am law thai kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh Judahkhqi ce doet qu uhy, “Amah ingkaw amah him qu vang tinawh hy voei aw? Cawh aw, ‘Kai ka cehnaak awh nangmih am law thai kawm uk ti,’ a ti hy voei?” ti uhy.
Cehlai anih ing, “Ningmih taw ak kai nakawng ni nami law hy, kai taw khan benna kawng law nyng. Nangmih taw ve khawmdek a koena awm uhyk ti; kai taw ve khawmdek a koe na am awm nyng.
Nami thawhlhnaak awh nangmih taw thi kawm uk ti, tice nik kqawn pek khqi hawh nyng; kai ve anih hawh ni, tinawh kak khypyi ve am namik cangnaak awhtaw nami thawlhnaak awh ce thi tang tang kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Nang ve a u nu?” tina uhy. Jesu ing, “Nik kqawn pek khqi khing hawh nyng kaw.
Nangmih awi ka ni dengnaak khqi awh ve awi khawzah kqawn ham ta nyng. Cehlai kai anik tyikung taw ypawm hy, anih a ven awhkaw, kang zaak ce ni khawmdek a venawh kak kqawm,” tinak khqi hy.
A Pa akawng ak kqawn peekkhqi ce a mingmih ing am zasim uhy.
Cedawngawh Jesu ing, “Nangmih ing Thlanghqing Capa ce nami tai awh, kai ve anih hawh ni, tice sim kawm u tiksaw, kamah poek awh ik-oeih am sai nyng saw Pa ing ani cawngpyi amyihna ni awi kak kqawn, tice sim kawm uk ti.
Kai a nik tyikung ce kai ak khuiawh awm hy; kamah doeng amni cehta hy, anih ak kawngaih ce ni kai ing ka sai poepa,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awikhqi ak kqawn awh thlang khawzah ing ak khanawh cangnaak ta uhy.
Amah ak cangnaak Judahkhqi venawh Jesu ing, “Ka cawngpyinaak ve namim tu awhtaw, nangmih taw kai a hubat tang tang na awm uhyk ti.
Cawhtaw awitak ce sim kawm uk ti, Awitak ing nangmih ce ni loet sak khqi kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
A mingmih ing, “Kaimih ve Abraham a cadil na awm unyng saw, u a tamnaa na awm am awm khawi unyng. Ikawmyihna nang ing loet kawm uk ti, na ti?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u awm thawlhnaak ak sai taw thawlhnaak a tamnaa na awm hy.
Tamnaa ing ipkhui awh am awm poe thai hy, cehlai capa taw ang qui na ipkhui awh awm hy.
Cedawngawh Capa ing nangmih ce ani loet sak khqi awhtaw, loet tang tang kawm uk ti.
Nangmih Abraham a cadil na awm uhyk ti tice sim nyng. Cehlai nangmih ak khuiawh kak awi ama awm dawngawh, nangmih ing kai ce him aham ni ngaih uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Kai ing ka Pa haiawh ka huh ce nangmih a venawh kqawn law nyng, nangmih ingawm nami pa a venawh kaw naming zaak ce ni nami sai lawt hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Abraham taw kaimih a Pa ni,” tina uhy. Jesu ing, “Abraham a ca khqi na nami awm awhtaw, Abraham ing a sai ce nami sai aham awm hlai ti maw.
Kai ing Khawsa venawh kaw kang zaak awitak ce nangmih a venawh kqawn law hlai nyng, nangmih ingtaw kai ve him ahamni teng uhyk ti. Abraham ingtaw cemyih ik-oeih ce am sai hy.
Nangmih ingtaw nami pakhqi ing ami sai ceni nami sai hy,” tinak khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Kaimih ve caquk caqaikhqi amni. Pynoet doeng kami taak cetaw Khawsa amah ni,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Khawsa ce nangmih a Pa na a awm mantaw, kai ve ni lungna hly hlai uhyk ti, kai taw Khawsa venna kawng law nyng saw tuh vawh awm nyng. Kai kamah poek awh am law nyng; anih ing ni ani tyih hy.
Ikawtih kak awi ve nangmih a venawh ama caih hy voei? Kak kqawn ve am naming zaak thai dawngawh ni.
Nangmih ve nami pa qaai ak thlangkhqi ni. Cedawngawh nami pa ak kawngaih ce sai aham ngaih uhyk ti. Anih ce ak cykca awhkawng thlang ak him na awm nawh amah awh awitak ce ama awm dawngawh awitak ce am tuhy. Qaai awi ak kqawn awh, amah ingkaw amah ni ak kqawn qu kqoeng hy, qaai awi ak kqawn thlang na awm nawh qaai awi ak kqawn thlangkhqi a pa na awm lawt hy.
Cehlai awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi dawngawh, nangmih ing amnik cangna uhyk ti!
Nangmih ak khuiawh u ing nu kai a thawlhnaak am tu law thai? Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi taw, Ikawtih am nami nik cangnaak?
U awm Khawsa ak thlang ingtaw Khawsa ak awi ce za hy. Khawsa koe na am nami awm dawngawh ni ak awi awm am naming zaak thai hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Judahkhqi ing, “Nang ve Samari thlang qaai ak ta ni, ka mi tive thym hy my?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Qaai am ta nyng, kai ing ka Pa ni ka zoeksang, cehlai nangmih ing amni zoeksang uhyk ti.
Kamah a zoeksangnaak am sui nyng; ce ak sui thlang pynoet awm hy, anih cetaw awi ak dengkung na awm hy.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, u ingawm kak awi ve a khoem awhtaw, ityk awh awm anih ce am thi voel kaw,” tina hy.
Cawh Judahkhqi ing, “Tuh qaai ta hyk ti tice ni sim hawh unyng! Abraham ce thi hawh hy, cemyih lawt na tawnghakhqi awm thi hawh uhy, cehlai nang ingtaw, 'U awm kai ak awi ak khoem taw thihnaak am tan kaw,' ti hyk ti.
Nang ve kaimih a Pa Abraham anglakawh na bau khqoet nawh nu? Anih ce thi hawh hy, cemyih lawt na tawnghakhqi awm thi hawh uhy. Namah ingkaw namah ve ikaw na nu nang ngaih qu?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Kamah ingkaw kamah ka zoeksang qu awhtaw, ka zoeksang qunaak ve kawna awm am awm kaw. Ka pa, nangmih ing nami Khawsa na nami taak ce, anih ing ni kai ve ani zoeksang hy.
Nangmih ing anih ce am sim hlai uhyk ti, kai ingtaw sim nyng. Am sim nyng ka ti mantaw kai awm nangmih amyihna a qaai ak kqawn na awm nyng, cehlai anih ce kai ing sim nyng saw, ak awi ce khoem nyng.
Nangmih a pa Abraham ing kai a khawnghi ve huh aham anak poek nawh ana zeel hy; hu nawh ak kaw zeel hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Judahkhqi ing, “Kum hakip za na law hlanawh, Abraham hu nyng e!” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Abraham a thang hlanawh kai awm hawh nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh, a mingmih ing khawng aham lung cung uhy, cehlai Jesu ing thuk taak khqi hy, bawkim kawngma awhkawng cekkhqi ce ak changna cehtaak khqi hy.
A va ceh awh, a thang thai awhkawng a mik ak hyp thlang pynoet ce hu hy.
A hubatkhqi ing, “Cawngpyikung, a u a thawlhnaak nu, amah nu, am awhtaw a nu a pa a thawlhnaak camawh nu, ve ak thlang ve mikhyp na a thang?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Amah a thawlhnaak awh am nawh a nu a pa a thawlhnaak camawh awm amni, Khawsa a bibinaak ce ve ak thlang a hqingnaak awh ang dangnaak aham ni.
Khaw a dai tloek awh ve, kai anik tyikung a bi ve bi aham awm hy. U ingawm bi ama binaak thai khawmthan ce law kaw.
Khawmdek awh ka awm tloek awh, kai taw khawmdek vangnaak na awm nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn boeih coengawh, dek awh cimtui ce sa hy, am cimtui ing dekvai ce cawh nawh, Cekcoengawh mikhyp amik awh ce thut pehy.
“Cet nawhtaw Siloam Tuili awh sil,” tina hy. (Siloan taw “Tyi” tinaak ni) Ce ak thlang ing cet nawh amik ce sil hy, cawh amik ce dai pahoei hy.
A imceng lovaikhqi ingkaw amah ak hukhqi ing anih ve kut ak dun thlang ni, tice ami sim awh, “Anih ve ngawi nawh kut ak dun thlang am nu ve?” ti uhy.
Thlang vang tloek ing, “Anih ni,” ti uhy. Thlang vang tloek bai ing, “Am ni, amah ak myih pyi ni,” ti uhy. Cehlai amah ing, “Ce ak thlang ce kai ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Cawhtaw ikawmyihna nu na mik ang dangnaak?” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Jesu ami ti thlang ing dekvai sai nawh, ka mik awh thut law hy. ‘siloam na cet nawhtaw sil,’ ni tina hy. Cet nawh ka va silh awh, ka mik dai pahoei hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Ce ak thlang ce hana nu a awm?” tina uhy. Anih ing, “Am sim nyng” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhkaw mikhyp thlang ce Farasi thlangkhqi venna khyn uhy.
Jesu ing dekvai ing amik thut pe nawh a qoei saknaak a khawnghi ce Sabbath nyn na awm hy.
Cedawngawh Farasikhqi ingawm ikawmyihna nu amik ang dainaak, tice doet uhy. Anih ing, “Ka mik awh dekvai thut law nawh, sil nyng saw dang pahoei hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Farasi thlang pynoet ing, “Sabbath nyn ama zeih dawngawh, ve ak thlang ve Khawsa a venawh kaw thlang amni,” ti uhy. Cehlai thlak chang tloek bai ingtaw, “Ikawmyihna thlak thawlh ing vemyih them a sai thai kaw?” ti uhy. Cedawngawh, pakkhih na pek qu uhy.
A hukhit na mikhyp a venawh, “Namik ak dang sakkung thlang ce, ikawmyihna aw nak poek?” tina uhy. Ce ak thlang ing, “Anih ce tawngha ni,” tinak khqi hy.
A nu ingkaw a pa a mik khy hlan dy taw ce ak thlang ce ni hu awh amik hyp hlai hy, tuhtaw amik dang tlaih hy, tice Judahkhqi ing ap cangna uhy.
Anih ve nangmih a capa aw? Anih ve aw a thang thai awhkawng a mik ak hyp, na ti ce? Ikawmyihna aw tuh amik ang dangnaak?” tina a nu ingkaw a pa ce doet uhy.
A nu ingkaw a pa ing, Anih ve kai nih a capa ni, a thang thai awhkawng a mik hyp hy.
Cehlai ikawmyihna aw a mik a dainaak, u ing aw amik a qoei sak, am sim nih nyng, amah doet thaw voei uk ti, a kum hqam hawh saw. Amah akawng ce amah ing kqawn hly ti maw,” tinak khqi hy nih.
A nu ingkaw a pa ing Judahkhqi ce kqih nih nawh cemyihna ce kqawn hy nih, Judahkhqi ing u awm Jesu Khrih ni, tinawh ak dyihpyi taw sinakawk khuiawh kawng hqek u sih,” tinawh anak kqawn paicai hawh uhy.
Cedawngawh a nu ingkaw a pa ing, “A kum hqam hawh saw, amah doet thaw voei uk ti,” tinak khqi hy nih.
Cekcoengawh a hih voei naak na cawhkaw mikhyp ce khy tlaih unawh a venawh, “Khawsa ce kyihcah uh, ve ak thlang ve thlak thawlh ni tice sim unyng,” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Anih ce thlak thawlh aw, thlak thawlh am aw, am sim nyng. Ik-oeih pynoet taw sim nyng. Ni hu awhtaw ka mik ve hyp hlai hy, tuhtaw kamik ve dang hawh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh a mingmih ing, “Nak khanawh ikaw a sai law? Ikawmyihna aw na mik a dai law sak?” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Nik kqawn pek khqi hawh hlai nyng, am ngai uhyk ti. Kaw ham aw naming zaak tlaih tlaih nami ngaih? Nangmih awm anih a hubat na coeng aham nami ngaih lawt nawh aw?” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhtaw anih ce zyi unawh, “Nang ve anih a hubat na awm hyk ti ve! Kaimih taw Mosi a hubat na ni kami awm hy!
Khawsa ing Mosi a venawh awi kqawn hy, tice sim unyng. Cehlai ve ak thlang ve hana kawng a law ti awm am sim unyng,” tina uhy.
Ce ak thlang ing, Amah ce qoe ni kawpoek kyi ham ak awm ti ce, hana kaw a law ti am sim thai kana kamik a dai sak ce.
Khawsa ing thlak thawlh ak awi am ngai pehy tice ni sim uhy; cehlai u awm Khawsa lungna nawh a ngaihkawi a sai awhtaw Khawsa ing anih ak awi ce ngai pe hy.
Mik hyp na ak thang amik dai tlaih hy tive khawsyn awhkawng am ning khawi hy.
Ve ak thlang ve Khawsa venawh kaw am mantaw, ikaw awm am sai hly thai hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh cekkhqi ing, “Thawlh doena na thang awh vam hu nu; nang ing awi kqawn law qee lawt hyk ti!” tina uhy. Anih ce ak chang na hqek uhy.
Anih hqek uhy, tice Jesu ing ang zaak awh anih ce sui nawh a huh awh, “Thlanghqing Capa ve nak cangnaak aw? tina hy.
Ce ak thlang ing, “Anih ce a u nu, Bawipa? Anih ce kak cangnaak aham kqawn law lah,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Tu awh amah ce hu hawh hyk ti; nang a venawh awi ak kqawn ve anih hawh ni,” tina hy.
Cawh ce ak thlang ing, “Bawipa, cangna nyng,” tina nawh bawk hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Awideng aham khawmdek awh law nyng, mikhypkhqi mikdai sak ham ingkaw mikdaikhqi mikhyp sak hamna,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh amik awm Farasi thlang pynoet ing ce ak awi ce aming zaak awh, “Ikaw? Kaimih awm kami mik hyp lawt nawh aw?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Nami mik a hyp mantaw thawlhnaak am ta hly hlai uhyk ti, cehlai ka mi mik dai hy namiti adawngawh nami thawlhnaak ce awm hun hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing, “Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, tuu chawmkeng awh lut kaana, ak chang benna kawng ak kai thlang taw, quk-ai ingkaw damiah na awm hy.
Tuu chawmkeng khuiawh kawng ak lut thlang taw tuukhaikung na awm hy.
Vawng chawmkeng ak qehkung ing anih aham chawh ce awng pehy, tuukhqi ingawm ak awi ce ngai pe uhy. A tuukhqi ce aming ming ing khy khqi qip nawh ceh pyi hy.
A tuukhqi boeih ce a ceh pyi coengawh, ami hai na maa pek khqi hy, a tuukhqi ing ak awi ce hat unawh a hu awh hqut uhy.
Thlakchang a hu awh ityk awh awm am bat hly uhy; ak awi ce a mami hat dawngawh, cen taak lat kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu ing vawhkaw nyhtahnaak awi ve kqawn pe hlai hy, ak kqawn peek khqi awi ce am zasim thai uhy.
Cedawngawh Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Awitak kanik kqawn peek khqi, kai taw tuu chawmkeng na awm nyng.
Kai hlanawh ak lawkhqi boeih taw quk-ai ingkaw damiah na awm uhy, cekkhqi ak awi ce tuukhqi ing am ngai pe uhy.
Kai taw chawmkeng na awm nyng; a u awm kai awh ak lut taw thaawngnaak hu kaw. Lut nawh cawn kaw, qam saihim awm hu kaw.
Quk-ai ingtaw quuk aham, him aham ingkaw hqe aham doeng nani a law hy; kai taw a mingmih ing hqingnaak ami taaknaak aham, khawzah na ami taaknaak aham law nyng.
Kai taw tuukhaileek na awm nyng. Tuukhaileek ing a tuukhqi aham a hqingnaak ce pehy.
Thlangvat taw tuu ak takung amni. Cedawngawh ngentang a law awh, tuukhqi ce hlah hyt nawh cen taak khqi hy. Ngentang ing tuukhqi ce cui nawh a thek a zak na tahy.
Thlangvat taw thlangvat na a awm dawngawh tuukhqi ce centa hy, tuukhqi ce ak leek na am khai hy.
Kai taw tuukhai leek na awm nyng; ka tuukhqi ce sim nyng saw ka tuukhqi ingawm kai ce ni sim uhy –
Pa ing kai ni sim nawh kai ingawm Pa ce ka sim lawt amyihna, kai ing ka tuukhqi aham ka hqingnaak ce pe nyng.
Vawhkaw tuu ak khuiawh amak pa tuu ak chang awm ta hyn nyng. Cekkhqi awm haw law haih kawng. Cekkhqi ingawm kak awi ce ngai kawm usaw, tuu qui oet, tuukhaikung pynoet doeng awm kaw.
Ka hqingnaak ka peek ak camawh ka Pa ing kai ni lungna hy, lawh tlaih hamna ka hqingnaak ka pek hly ak camawh.
U ingawm am ni qawt thai kaw, kamah a ngaih awh ni ka hqingnaak ce ka peek. Peek thainaak ce ta nyng saw lawh thainaak awm ta bai nyng. Vawhkaw awipeek ve Ka pa venawh kawng ni ka huh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi awh ve Judahkhqi ce pek qu tlaih bai uhy.
Thlang khawzah ing, “qaai ta nawh qaw hawh saw na huh. Ikaw ham ak awi naming ngai peek?” ti uhy.
Cehlai thlakchangkhqi bai ingtaw, “Ve ak awikhqi ve qaai ak ta ak awi amni. Qaai ing thlang a mik dai hly sak nawh nu?” ti uhy.
Jerusalem khaw awh Pumpeek Poei khawnghi ce pha nawh cetaw chikca tym na awm hy.
Jesu ce bawkim awh, Solomon a im hlip awh thoek ang qoe hy.
Cawh Judahkhqi ing a venna cun unawh, “Kaimih ve iqyt dy nu ngaihang tumna na ni taak khqi kaw? Khrih na na awm awhtaw ak leek na nik kqawn pek khqi,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Nik kqawn pek khqi nyng, cehlai ap cangna uhyk ti. Ka Pa ming ing kawpoek them ka saikhqi ing ka kawnglam ni sim sak khqi hawh hy.
Cehlai ka tuu na am awm unawh, ap cangna uhyk ti.
Ka tuukhqi ingtaw kak awi ce ngai uhy; cekkhqi ce sim nyng saw, ka hu awh bat uhy.
Kumqui hqingnaak ce a mingmih a venawh pe nyng, ityk awhawm am qeeng kawm uh; ka kut awh kawng u ingawm amni qawt kaw.
Cekkhqi ce ka kut awh anik pekung ka Pa taw, ik-oeih boeih boeih anglakawh bau ngai hy; ka Pa a kut khuiawh kawng cekkhqi ce u ingawm am ni qawt kaw.
Kai ingkaw ka Pa taw pynoet ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Judahkhqi ing amik khawngnaak ham lung ce cung tlaih uhy.
Cehlai Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Pa a venawh kawng kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khawzah dang sak hawh nyng. Cek khui awhkaw ikawmyih khawboe ing nu nik khawng ham naming cai?” tinak khqi hy.
Cawhkaw kawpoek kyi them na sai ak camawh nik khawng usih am ti unyng, cehlai Khawsa na thekhanaak camawh ni, thlanghqingna na awm loei awh Khawsa-na nang saa qu camawh,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Na mimah a anaa awi ak khuiawh, ‘Nangmih ve khawsakhqi na awm uhyk ti,’ ti nawh am qee qu nawh aw?
Cekkhqi ce ‘Khawsakhqi’ tinawh ak khy awhtaw, a u a venawh aw Khawsa awi ce a law, Cakciim awi ce hqe aham ama awm dawngawh,
Pa ing amah aham qoe qoe na hoep nawh khawmdek awh a tyih law ce ikawmyihna aw namik poek? Cawhtaw Ikawtih kai ing, ‘Kai Khawsa Capa ni,’ ka ti awh Khawsa ak kqawnseet ni nami ti?
Ka Pa a bi ce am ka bi awhtaw koeh nik cangna uh.
Cehlai Ka Pa a bi ce ka bi awhtaw, nangmih ing amnik cangna u tik seiawm Pa ak khuiawh kai awm nyng saw, kai ak khuiawh Pa awm hy, tice naming zaksim thainaak aham, kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi vetaw cangna lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh amah ce tu aham cai uhy, cehlai cekkhqi a kut khui awhkawng loet hy.
Cekcoengawh Johan ing maa na baptisma a peeknaak Jordan tui caqai na Jesu taw cet tliah hy. Ce a hun awh ce awm nawh
a venawh thlang khawzah cun law uhy. Cekkhqi ing, “Johan ing kawpoek kyi them am sai man hlai hy, Johan ing anih akawng anak kqawnkhqi boeih ve thym hy,” ti uhy.
Ce a hun awh thlang khawzah ing Jesu ce cangna uhy.
Lazaru ak mingnaak thlang pynoet taw tlo hy. Anih taw Meri ingkaw a naa Martha a awmnaak Bethani khaw awhkaw thlang na awm hy.
Vawhkaw Meri vetaw ak tlo Lazaru a nanu, bawktui ing Bawipa ce syp nawh a Lusam ing a khaw ak thut peekkung ce ni.
Cedawngawh cekqawi cingna ing Jesu ce awi cah hy nih, “Bawipa, nang ing na lungnaak thlang ce tlo hy,” tina hy nih.
Ce ak awi ce Jesu ing ang zaak awh, “Vawhkaw tlawhnaak ve thihnaak hly kawi am ni. Ve a tlohnaak ak caming Khawsa Capa taw kyihcahna awm kaw,” tina qawi hy.
Jesu ing Martha cingna ingkaw a napa ce lungna hy.
Cehlai Lazaru ce tlo hy ti ang zaak awh, ce a hun awh khaw hih voei awmtaak hun hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubatkhqi venawh, “Jerusalem na cet tlaih hlah u sih nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Ikawmyihna cawngpyikung, tihhin ca awh ni Judahkhqi ing lung ing khawng aham ami ni teng ka ti, ceh ham nang cai bai nawh nu?” tina uhy.
Jesu ing, “Khawnghi hypoet awh khawnoek pahqa hlaihih awm hy ka ti my? Ve khawmdek vang na ce awm nawh khaw a huh thai dawngawh, khawdai awh ak cet thlang taw am bah kaw.
Khaw amang dang dawngawh, khawmthan awh ni thlang ang bah hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn boeih coengawh cekkhqi venawh, “Ni pyi Lazaru taw ip hawh hy; cehlai cet nyngsaw thawh tlaih kawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubatkhqi ing, “Bawipa, anih ce a ih awhtaw leek lawt bit kaw,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing a thihnaak akawng ni ak kqawn hlai hy, a hubatkhqi ing taw ih mailai ni ak kqawn namih hy, tina poek uhy.
Cedawngawh cekkhqi venawh ak zoei cana kqawn pek khqi tlaih hy, “Lazaru taw thi hawh hy.
Cawh am ka awm nangmih aham zeel nyng, cawh ni nangmih ing namik cangnaak hly,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Thomas ing hubat ak changkhqi venawh, “Anih ing thih haih aham, ningnih awm cet lawt u sih cet uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Ami pha awhtaw, Lazaru ce phyi khuiawh khaw phlinyn awm hawh hy, tice Jesu ing sim hy.
Bethani khaw taw Jerusalem khaw awhkawng meng hih am hla hy.
A napa a thih dawngawh Meri ingkaw Martha ce hloep aham thlang khawzah law uhy.
Jesu law hy tice Martha ing ang zaak awh, ak do na ce cet hy, Meri taw im awh awm hy.
Martha ing Jesu a venawh, “Bawipa, nang mah na awm mantaw, ka napa am thi voei.
Cehlai tuh awm Khawsa avenawh na thoeh a saqui ce ni pe kaw, tice sim nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Na napa ce tho tlaih kaw,” tina hy.
Martha ing, khawnghi dyt nawh thawh tlaihnaak tym a pha awhtaw, tho tlaih kaw, tice sim nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a venawh, “Kai taw thawhtlaihnaak ingkaw hqingnaak na awm nyng. Kai anik cangnaak thlang taw thi seiawm hqing kaw.
U awm hqing nawh kai anik cangnaak taw ityk awm am thi voel kaw. Ve ve nak cangnaak aw?” tina hy.
Anih ing, “Oeih, Bawipa, nang taw Khrih, khawmdek awh ak law hly kawi Khawsa Capa ni, tice nik cangna nyng,” tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce ak kqawn coengawh, cet nawh a naa Meri ce a venna khy hy. “Cawngpyikung law hawh hy, nang nik thoem hy,” tina hy.
Meri ing ce ak awi ce ang zaak awh, ang tawnna tho nawh a venna cet hy.
Cawh Jesu ce khawk khuina lut hlan hy, Martha ing ang hqumnaak a hun awh ni a awm hyn hy.
Im awh Meri amik hloep Judakhqi ing, tho hqoet nawh a ceh ce ami huh awh hquut uhy, phyi na ak kqah na cet vang, tina mih hy tina poek uhy.
Meri ing Jesu a awmnaak hun ce pha nawh anih ce a huh awh, a khawkung awh koep nawh, “Bawipa, nang na awm mantaw ka napa amak thi hly,” tina hy.
Anih ang kqang ingkaw anih mi amik law haih Judahkhqi ang kqang ce a huh awh, ak khuina kqang nawh kawsee hy.
“Hana nami soei?” tinak khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Bawipa, law nawhtaw toek lah,” tina uhy.
Jesu kqang hy.
Judahkhqi ing, “Toek lah uh, i ikawmyih aih na nu a lungnaak ce!” ti uhy.
Cehlai thlang vang ing, “Mikhyp ak qoei sakkung ve ak thlang ing anih ve ama thihnaak aham am sai hly thai nawh hy voei nu?” ti uhy.
Jesu taw ak kawkhuiawh ak kawseet doena phyi ce pha hy. Ce a phyi taw luk kawk na awm nawh lungpei ing tleng uhy.
“Lungpei ce thoeng uh, tinak khqi hy. Cehlai thlak thi a nanu Martha ing, “Bawipa, tuhtaw a baw khqim hawh hy voei, phlinyn di hawh nawh,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Nak cangnaak awhtaw Khawsa a boeimangnaak hu kawp tinawh am ka ti nawh aw?” tina hy.
Cedawngawh lungpei ce thoeng pe uhy. Cawh Jesu ing hak toek nawh, “Ka Pa, kak awi ning ngaih pe tik saw zeel nyng.
Kak awi ning ngai pe poepa hyk ti tice sim nyng. Nang ing kai ni tyi hyk ti tice vawhkaw ak dyi thlangkhqi ing amik cangnaak thai aham ve ak awi ve kqawn nyng,” tina hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn boet coengawh, Jesu ing khawteh na, “Lazaru cawn law hlah,” tina hy.
Cawh thlak thi taw a kut a khaw hi ing a zeen doena cawn law nawh, a haai awm hi ing a zeen khoep na awm saw, Jesu ing, “Hi ce hlam pe unawh ceh sak uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Meri ak hqip law Juda thlang khawzah ing, Jesu a them sai ce ami huh awh, ak khanawh cangnaak ce ta uhy.
Cehlai thlang vang tloek ce Farasikhqi venna cet unawh Jesu ing them a sai ce kqawn pe uhy.
Cawh khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi ing Sanhedrin ngawihcunnaak ce sai uhy. “Ikaw ni sai lah voei uh? Ve ak thlang ing kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khawzah sai hawh hy.
Vemyihna ni hlah mantaw, thlang boeih ing cangna hawh kawm uh, cawh Rom thlangkhqi law kawm usaw ni tui ni khaw ve lo law hawh kawm uh,” ti uhy.
Cawh, a mingmih anglakawh Kaiapha ak mingnaak thlang pynoet, ce a kum awh khawsoeih boei khyt na ak awm ing, “Ikaw awm am sim uhyk ti!
Rampum thlang a plawci naak anglakawhtaw thlang pynoet a thih nep bet hy tice am sim uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ve amah poek awh ap kqawn hy, ce a kum awh khawsoeih boei khyt na a awm amyihna Juda thlangkhqi ham Jesu thi kaw tice lamnaa na ak kqawn hawh ni,
ce a qam doeng ham am nawh ak plam Khawsa cakhqi ce cawi boeih nawh pynoet na a taaknaak ahamni.
Cedawngawh ce a nyn awhkawng him aham teng hawh uhy.
Cedawngawh Jesu taw Juda thlang kqeng anglakawh ang dang qoeng na am cet voel hy. Qamkoh a venawh kaw ak awm Ephraim khaw a venawh cet nawh, cawh ce a hubatkhqi mi awm uhy.
Judahkhqi a Loentak Poei a pha tawm awhtaw cehtaak Poei hlanawh silh qu aham thlang khawzah ing khaw a qam awhkawng Jerusalem na ce cet uhy.
Cawh Jesu ce sui unawh, bawkim khuiawh dyih unawh doet qu uhy, “Ikawmyihna nak poek? Poei awh am law hly nawh nu?” ti uhy.
Cehlai khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi ing, u ingawm Jesu ce a huh awhtaw, a mingmih a venawh kqawn pe nawh, tu aham awi pe hyt uhy.
Loentak Poei a phanaak aham khaw kquk nyn a ngaih awh, Lazaru a thihnaak awhkawng a thawhnaak khaw Bethani ce pha hy.
Ce a khaw awh Jesu zoeksangnaak aham buh veelnaak sai pe uhy. Martha ce plawng a tho nawh, Lazaru taw caboei kung awh anih ing ngawi haih lawt hy.
Cawh Meri ing a phu ak tlo soeih nard bawktui boet oet lo nawh Jesu a khaw ce a hloen coengawh a lusam ing thuut pehy. Cawh ce bawktui baw ing ipkhui ce zing khoep hy.
Cehlai hubat ak khuiawh kaw Juda Iskariot ak mingnaak thlang pynoet, Jesu zawih ham ak cai ing, am ngaih nawh,
“Ikawtih vawhkaw bawktui ve zawi nawh khawdeng hahqahkhqi ama peek? Kumoet thaphu zah qoe law moe,” tihy.
(Anih ing hahqahkhqi poek tang tang nawh ak kqawn awm amni, amah ce quk-ai na a awm dawngawh ni; tangka ak khoemkung na awm nawh amah aham cawhkaw tangka ce haw na poepa hy.)
Jesu ing, “Kai a qawk vyih naak hly khawnghi simnaak hamna sai mai seh.
Hahqahkhqi taw nangmih a venawh awm poepa kaw, cehlai kai taw nangmih a venawh am awm poepa kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu cawh awm hy tice Judahkhqi ing aming zaak awh law unawh, Jesu doeng huh ngaih awh am nawh, thihnaak awhkawng ak tho Lazaru awm huh si ngaih unawh law uhy.
Cedawngawh khawsoeih boeikhqi ing Lazaru awm him hamna teng uhy;
Judah thlang khawzah ing a nih ce cangna unawh Jesu venna a mi ceh ak camawh.
A khawngawi nyn awh Poei awh ak law thlang kqeng ing Jesu taw Jerusalem na law hy tice za uhy.
Samtoe khyn unawh ak do na cet uhy. “Hosanna!” “Bawipa ming ing ak law taw zoseennaak awm seh!” “Israel Sangpahrang taw a zoseen seh!” tinawh khy uhy.
Jesu ing meqang ca ce hunawh ak khanawh ce ngawi hy,
“Aw Zion canu, koeh kqih; toek lah, na Sangpahrang ce meqang awh ngawi kawmsaw law kaw,” tinawh qee ce amyihna.
Ak cyk awhtaw a hubatkhqi ing vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ve am zasim thai uhy. Jesu ce zoeksang na a awm coengawh ni, anih awh ce vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ve qee hyt na awm nawh ve a ik-oeihkhqi ve ami na sai peek hy, tice a ming zaksim hyn hy.
Lazaru ce phyi khuiawh kawng khy nawh thihnaak awhkawng am thawh awh cawhkaw amik awm thlang kqeng ing awi ce anak khypyi poe uhy.
Thlang khawzah ing, cawhkaw kawpoek kyi ik-oeih a sai ce aming zaak awh anih ce huh aham cet uhy.
Cedawngawh Farasikhqi ing, “Ikaw amni ti thai voel hawh hy ve, toek lah uh, khawmdek ing amah a hu kquut hawh hy ve!” ti uhy.
Poei awh Khawsa bawk aham ak cetkhqi anglakawh Greek thlangkhqi awm awm lawt uhy.
Cekkhqi ce Kalili qam Bethsaida khaw awhkaw Philip a venawh law unawh, qeennaak thoeh uhy. “Jesu huh aham ngaih hlai unyng,” tina uhy.
Philip ing Andru a venna cet nawh kqawn pehy, Cekcoengawh Andru ingkaw Philip ing Jesu a venawh kqawn pehy nih.
Jesu ing, “Thlanghqing Capa zoeksang na a awmnaak tym taw pha hawh hy.
Awitak kanik kqawn peek khqi, camci ce dek awh tla nawh ama thih awhtaw, ak khawi khawina kawm saw; a thih mantaw khawzah na vui thaih hy.
U awm amah a hqingnaak ak lungnaak taw plam kaw, ve khawmdek awh a hqingnaak ce ak sawhnaak ingtaw kumqui hqingnaak ce khoem kaw.
U awm ka bi ak bi ingtaw ka hu awh a ni hquut aham awm hy; kai ka awmnaak awh ka tyihzawih ce awm lawt kaw.
Tuh kak kawlung khuikha hy, kaw kak kqawn lah voei? ‘Ka Pa, ve atym khuiawh kawng ni hul lah? Amni, ve a dawngawh ni ve atym awh ve ka law hy.
Ka Pa, nang ming ce zoeksang lah,” tina hy. Cawh khan benna kaw awi ing, “Zoeksang hawh nyng, zoeksang tlaih bai kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Cawhkaw amik awm thlang kqeng ing aming zaak awh khawhum awi ni, ti uhy; thlang vang ingtaw khan ceityih ing awi kqawn pehy, ti uhy.
Jesu ing, “Vawhkaw awi ve nangmih a leeknaak ahamni, kai aham amni.
Tuhtaw khawmdek ve awideng aham awm hawh hy; Khawmdek boei ve hqek na awm hawh kaw.
Cehlai Khawmdek awhkawng kai ve tai na ka awm awh, thlang boeih ce ka venna dawk kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Vemyihna ak kqawnnaak taw amah a thihnaak hly ceni ak kqawn ngaihnaak hy.
Cawh thlang kqeng ing, “Anaa awi awhtaw Khrih taw a poepa na awm kaw, tinawh za unyng, ikawmyihna nang ingtaw, ‘Thlanghqing Capa taw tai na awm kaw,’ na ti bai? Thlanghqing Capa ve a u nu?” tina uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing cekkhqi venawh, “Nangmih ing vangnaak ve kawlhkalh ca ni nami taak hly hy. Thannaak ing a ni pha khqi hlanawh, vangnaak ak khuiawh cet lah uh. Thannaak ak khuiawh ak cet ing hana nu ka ceh tice am sim hy.
Vangnaak a cakhqi na nami awmnaak thai aham, vangnaak nami taak tloek awh ce vangnaak ce ypna lah uh,” tinak khqi hy. Awi ak kqawn coengawh, Jesu ing cehta nawh, cekkhqi ce thuk tak khqi hy.
Vawhkaw kawpoek kyi themkhqi boeih ve a mingmih amik huh awh a sai peek coengawh awm a mingmih ing ap cangna bak bak hyn uhy.
Vetaw tawngha Isaiah ing a nak kqawn ce a soepnaak hly hawh ni: “Bawipa, kaimih ak awi ve u ing ak cangnaak, u a venawh nu Bawipa a kut ce ang dang?” a ti ce.
Ve a dawngawh cekkhqi ing am cangna thai hy, tawngha Isaiah ing:
Ami mik ce hyp sak nawh ami kawlung ce hqam sak hy, Cedawgawh ami mik ing am hu thai unawh, Amik kawlung ingawm am zasim thai uhy, Ang voei na awm am voei thai uhy, Cemyih am mantaw kai ing qoei sak khqi kawng,” tinawh ana qee hawh hy.
Isaiah ing Jesu a boeimangnaak ce ana huh dawngawh vemyihna anak kqawn hawh hy.
Cawh thlang khawzah ingkaw sawikungkhqi ingawm cangna uhy. Cehlai Farasikhqi ce kqih unawh, sinakawk khuiawh kawng ni hqek hau kaw, ami ti dawngawh amik cangnaak ce ap kqawn uhy;
Khawsa am kyihnaak anglakawh thlanghqing am kyihnaak ce ngaih bet uhy.
Cawh Jesu ing khy doena, “Thlang ing kai anik cangnaak awh, kai doeng amnik cangna nawh, kai anik tyikung ce awm cangna hy.
Kai ce ani toek awh kai anik tyikung ce hu hy.
U awm kai anik cangnaak thlang ce than khuiawh ama awmnaak aham, kai taw khawmdek vangnaak aham law nyng.
U awm kak awi za nawh am haana mai seiawm awi am deng nyng. Khawmdek awideng aham am law nyng, ak hul ahamni ka law hy.
Kai ni oelh nawh kak awi amak do ak thlang awi ak dengkung ce awm hy; kak kqawn awi ing anih ce khawnghi a dyt awh thawlh sak kaw.
Kamah poek awh awi ap kqawn nyng, cehlai kai anik tyikung ing kak kqawn hly kawi ce nik kqawn sak hy.
Ak awipeek ing kumqui hqingnaak benna sawi hy tice sim nyng. Cedawngawh Pa ing anik kqawn sak khqi boeih boeih ve dyng hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Loentak Poei a pha tawm ca awh, ve khawmdek cehta nawh Pa a venna cehnaak atym ing pha law hawh hy, tice Jesu ing sim hy. Ve khawmdek awh ak awm amah ak thlangkhqi a boetnaak dy lung naak khqi hy.
Mybuh ami veel huili awh, Jesu ce thlang a kut awh tusak aham, Simon a capa Juda Iskariot ak kawk khuiawh Setan ing bibi pe hy.
Jesu ing, Pa ing a kutawh ik-oeih boeih a peek ingkaw Khawsa venna voei tlaih aham awm hawh hy tice sim hy;
cedawngawh buh ainaak awhkawng tho nawh, a hi bai ce suut hy. Cekcoengawh thuutqunaak hi ce lo nawh ak cawi ce zeen hy.
Cekcoengawh beihthuk awh tui hloen nawh a hubatkhqi khaw ce silh pek khqi hy, ak cawi a zeennaak hi ing ce thuut pek khqi hy.
Simon Piter a ven a pha awh, anih ing, “Bawipa, ka khaw sil vang nati nawh nu?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Ka sai ve tuh zasim hlan hyk ti, cehlai tuh kawng zasim bit kawp ti,” tina hy.
Piter ing, “Amni, ka khaw ve ityk awh awm am sil kawp ti” tina hy. Cawh Jesu ing, “Am ka silh awhtaw kai ingqawi tuqunaak am awm voel kaw,” tina hy.
Simon Piter ing, “Cawhtaw, Bawipa, ka khaw doeng kaana ka kut ingkaw ka lu awm sil law taw thoeih ti! tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Tui ak hlu ce ingtaw khaw doeng ni silh a ngoe hy; a pum boeih ce caih hawh hy; nangmih taw caih uhyk ti - nami cu boeih na taw am caih uhyk ti,” tina hy.
(Amah ak zawi hly a sim awh, 'Nami cu boeih am caih uhyk ti,” tina hy.)
A mingmih a khaw ce a silh peek boeih coengawh, hi ce lo nawh ang ngawihnaak na cet tlaih hy. Cekkhqi venawh, “Ka sai law ce namik zasim hawh nu?
Nangmih ing kai ve, ‘Cawngpyikung,’ ingkaw ‘Bawipa’ ni tina uhyk ti, namik kqawn amyihna thym hy, cemyihna awm nyng.
Tuh nami Bawipa ingkaw cawngpyikung ing nangmih a khaw ce ni silh law pek khqi nyng, nangmih ingawm pynoet ingkaw pynoet a khaw ce nami silh aham awm lawt hy.
Nangmih a venawh ka sai law hawh amyihna nangmih ing nami sai aham lam ce nim huh khqi hawh nyng.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, boei anglakawh tyihzawih am bau hy, ak tyikung anglakawh ceityih awm am bau hy.
Tuh vemyihkhqi ve sim hawh uhyk ti, sai lah uh zoseennaak hu kawm uk ti.
Ve ve nangmih boeih kak kqawn amni; kak tyh thlangkhqi ce kamah ing sim nyng. Ve ak awi ve a soep aham awm hy: ‘Ka buh anik ai pyi ing kak khan awh a khaw thlek law hawh hy,’ a tice.
Vemyihkhqi a pha law hlan awh nik kqawn law pek khqi oepchoeh nyng, cawh ni vemyihkhqi a awm awh kai ve anih ni, tice na mik cangnaak hly.
Awitak kanik kqawn peek khqi, kai ing ka tyih thlang ak do taw kai anik do na awm nawh; kai anik do thlang taw kai anik tyikung ce ak do na awm hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn boeih coengawh, Jesu ing ngaih kyi doena, “Awitak kanik kqawn peek khqi, nangmih ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet ing kai ve thlang nim tu sak kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
A hubatkhqi ing, a u nu ak kqawn ngaihnaak hy voei, ti unawh pynoet ingkaw pynoet toek qu uhy.
A mingmih ak khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet, Jesu ing a lungnaak ce, a venawh caboei awh koep hy.
Simon Piter ing cawhkaw ak koep hubat a venawh, “Kaw nu ak kqawn ngaihnaak, doet lah,” tina hy.
Jesu a venawh ak koep ing, “Bawipa, a u nu?” tinawh doet hy.
Jesu ing, “Kai ing phaihpi beei awh chum nawh ka peek ak thlang ce,” tina hy. Cekcoengawh phaihpi ce beei awh chum nawh, Simon a capa Juda Iskariot ce pehy.
Juda ing phaihpi ce a do awh ak kaw khuiawh Setan ce kun hy. Cawh Jesu ing, “Na sai hly kawi ce angtawn na sai,” tina hy.
Buh ainaak awh ak ngawikhqi u pynoet ingawm, kawtih Jesu ing cemyihna a tinaak hy voei, tice am sim uhy.
Judah ce tangka ak khoemkung na a awm dawngawh, Poei awhkaw aham ik-oeih pynoet oet thlaih aham kqawn pe namih hy, am awhtaw hahqahkhqi venawh ik-oeih peek aham kqawn pe namih hy, tinawh a vang ingtaw poek uhy.
Judah ing phaihpi ce a lawh coengawh, cawn pahoei hy. Cawh khaw than hawh hy.
Anih ce a ceh coengawh, Jesu ing, “Tuh thlanghqing Capa taw zoeksang na awm hawh hy, Khawsa awm anih awh zoeksang na awm hy.
Khawsa ce anih awh zoeksang na a awm awhtaw, ‘Khawsa ing Capa ce amah awh zoeksang lawt kaw, anih ce zoeksang pahoei kaw.
Ka cakhqi, nangmih a venawh khawqyt am awm voel hawh kawng nyng. Nangmih ing ni sui kawm uk ti, cehlai Judahkhqi venawh kak kqawn peek hawh amyihna, tuh nangmih a venawh nik kqawn pek khqi nyng: Kai ka cehnaak awh nangmih am law thai kawm uk ti.
Awipeek thai nangmih a venawh ni pek khqi nyng: Nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet lung qu na lah uh.
Nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet naming lung qunaak awh ni, thlang boeih ing kai a hubat tinawh a ni sim hly khqi hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Simon Piter, “Bawipa, hana nu na ceh kaw?” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Kai ka cehnaak awh am law hly thai hyk ti, cehlai a hu na law kawp ti,” tina hy.
Piter ing, “Bawipa, Ikawtih tuh am ka law thai kaw? Nang aham ka hqingnaak awm pe nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Kai aham na hqingnaak nak pe hly tang nu? Awitak kanik kqawn peek, ai ang khawng hlan awh thum voei nik khaawng kawp ti,” tina hy.
“Naming ngaih koeh kyi sak uh, Khawsa ypna unawh taw kai awm ni ypna uh.
Ka Pa awh awmnaak hun khawzah awm hy; ama awm mantaw nik kqawn hly pek khqi hawh nyng. Nangmih aham hun ak sai na cet hly nyng.
Nangmih aham hun ka sai coengawh ka awmnaak awh nangmih awm nami awmnaak thai ham, nangmih ak lo na voei law tlaih kawng nyng.
Ka cehnaak hly hun ce sim uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Thomas ing a venawh, “Bawipa, hana nu na ceh hly, tice am sim unyng, ikawmyihna lam ce kami simnaak kaw?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Kai taw lam ingkaw awitak ingkaw hqingnaak na awm nyng. Kai am kaataw u awm Pa aven am cet thai kaw.
Kai nami ni sim mantaw, ka Pa awm sim voei uk ti. Tuhawh amah ce sim unawh, hu hawh uhyk ti,” tina hy.
Philip ing, “Bawipa, Pa ce nim huh khqi lah, cawhtaw kaimih aham khoek bit kaw,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Philip, khawqyt ka ni awm pyi khqi coengawh awm, kai ve nani sim hlan nawh nu? U awm kai anik hu taw Pa ce hu hawh hy. Ikawmyihna, ‘Pa ce nim huh lah,’ na ti?
Pa ak khuiawh kai awm nyng saw, kai ak khuiawh Pa awm hy, tice am na sim nawh nu? Nangmih a venawh awi kak kqawn law ve kamah poek ing ap kqawn nyng. Kai ak khuiawh ak awm Pa, ing ni vemyihkhqi ve a sai hy.
Pa ak khuiawh kai awm nyng saw kai ak khuiawh Pa awm hy ka tive cangna lah uh; am awhtaw kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi kangna awm cangna lah uh.
Awitak kanik kqawn peek khqi, u awm kaiawh cangnaak ak ta taw kai ing ik-oeih ka saikhqi ve sai lawt kaw. Pa venna kai ka ceh aham a awm hawh dawngawh, vemyihkhqi anglakawh ak bau ngaikhqi awm sai thai kawm uh.
Capa ing zoeksangnaak ce Pa a venna a khynnaak thai ham, kang ming ing nami thoeh law saqui ce ni pek khqi kawng.
Kang ming ing ikaw awm nami thoeh law awhtaw, sai law kawng nyng.
Kai nami ni lungnaak awhtaw, kak awipeek ve ngai kawm uk ti.
Kai ing Pa doet kawng nyng saw, anih ing nangmih a venawh a poepa na ak awm hly ngaihqep sakkung-
awitak Myihla ce ni pek khqi kaw. Khawmdek ingtaw anih ce am do thai hy, am hu nawh sim awm am sim hy. Cehlai nangmih ingtaw anih ce sim uhyk ti, nangmih a venawh anih ce awm nawh, nangmih ak khui awh awm awm kaw.
Nangmih ce cadahkhqi amyihna amni cehtaak khqi hyt kawng, nangmih a venawh kai law kawng nyng.
Iqyt a awm hlanawh, khawmdek ing kai ve amni hu voel qoe kaw, cehlai nangmih ingtaw kai ce ni hu kawm uk ti. Kai ka hqing ak caming nangmih awm hqing lawt kawm uk ti.
Ce nyn awhtaw ka Pa ak khuiawh kai awm nyng saw, kai ak khuiawh nangmih awm u hyk ti, nangmih ak khuiawh kai awm nyng, tice sim kawm uk ti.
U ingawm kak awipeek ce khoem nawh ang ngai awhtaw, anih cetaw kai anik lungnaak thlang ni. Kai anik lungnaak thlang cetaw ka Pa ingawm lungna lawt kaw, kai ingawm anih ce lungna kawng nyng saw a venawh dang pe kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh Juda (Iskariot amni) ing, “Bawipa kawtih kaimih a venawh dang nawh khawmdek a venna taw am nang dang kaw,?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “U ingawm kai ani lungnaak awhtaw, ka cawngpyinaak ve ngai kaw. Ka Pa ing anih ce lungna kaw, law kawng nih nyng saw anih ce awmnaak im na hawna kawng nih nyng.
U awm kai ama nik lungnaak ingtaw, ka cawngpyinaak ve am ngai ti kaw. Vawhkaw awi nangmih ing naming zaak ve kamah a koe amni, kai anik tyikung Pa ak awi ni.
Nangmih mi ka awm hui awh vawh ve awi kqawn law nyng.
Cehlai ka Pa ing kai ang ming ing a tyih law hly kawi ngaihqep sakkung, Ciim Myihla ing nangmih ce ik-oeih boeih ni cawngpyi khqi kaw, nangmih a venawh kak kqawn lawkhqi boeih ce ni sim sak khqi tlaih kaw.
Ngaihqepnaak nami venawh ceh ta nyng, kamah a ngaihqepnaak ni pek khqi nyng; khawmdek ing ani peek khqi amyihna amni pek khqi nyng. Namik kawlung koeh ly uh, kqih awm koeh kqih uh.
'Cet nyng saw nami venna voei law tlaih kawng' ka tice za hawh uhyk ti. Kai nami ni lungnaak awhtaw, Ka Pa a venna ka ceh hly ve nami ym ham awm hy, Pa taw kai anglakawh bau khqoet hy.
Ce ik-oeih a law hlanawh lammaa na nik kqawn pek khqi nyng, cawh ni a law awh namik cangnaak hly.
Nangmih a venawh awi khawzah ap kqawn hly voel nyng, kawtih ve khawmdek boei ve law hawh kaw. Anih ing kai ikawpna awm amni tina thai ti kaw.
Cehlai kai ing Pa lungna nyng saw ka Pa ing awi ani peek amyihna ni ik-oeih ka sai tice khawmdek ing a sim ham awm hy. “Law uh, cet hlah u sih,” tinak khqi hy.
Kai taw misur kung tang tang na awm nyng saw, ka Pa taw dum ak takung na awm hy.
Kai awh ak thaih amak qah a baaikhqi boeih ce hlek hy, kai awh ak thaih ak qahkhqi boeih cetaw, a qahnaak khqoet aham, a baai ak changkhqi ce hlyn pehy.
Nami venawh kak kqawn awi ak caming nangmih taw ciim hawh uhyk ti.
Kai awh awm poe lah uh, nangmih awh awm poe lawt kawng nyng. A baai ce a kungawh ama awm awhtaw amah awh amang qah thai amyihna, nangmih awm kai awh amna mi awm awhtaw am qah thai kawm uk ti.
Kai taw misur kung na awm nyng; nangmih taw a baaikhqi na awm uhyk ti. U awm kai awh awm poe nawh anih awh kai awm ka awm awhtaw, ak thaih khawzah qah kaw; kai am kaa taw na mimah poek awh ikawm am sai thai kawm uk ti.
Uawm kaiawh ama awm awhtaw, anih cetaw a baai amyihna khawngna awm kawmsaw, koh kawmsaw, maiawh phum kawm usaw mai ing ui kaw.
Kaiawh awm unawh kak awikhqi ve nangmih awh a awm awhtaw, nami ngaihkhqi boeih ce thoeh lah uh, nami ham sei peekna awm kaw.
Ak thaih khawzah qah unawh ka hubatna nami awmnaak ak caming Pa ce zoeksangnaakna awm hy.
Pa ing kai ani lungnaak amyihna, nangmih ce ni lungnak khqi lawt nyng. Kai a lungnaak awh awm poe lah uh.
Kak awipeekkhqi ve naming ngai awhtaw, kai ing Pa ak awipeekkhqi ngai nyng saw a lungnaak awh ka awm poe lawt amyihna, kai a lungnaak awh awm poe lawt kawm uk ti.
Nangmih awh ka zeelnaak ce awm nawh nangmih a zeelnaak ce a soepnaak aham, ve ve ka nik kqawn peek khqi.
Kai ak awipeek taw ve ni: kai ing ka ni lungnaak khqi amyihna nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet lungqu na lah uh.
Thlang ing a pyikhqi hamna a hqingnaak dy a peek lungnaak anglakawh ak bau lungnaak am awm voel hy.
Kak awipeek ve nami sai awhtaw, nangmih taw kai a pyikhqi na awm uhyk ti.
Tyihzoeihkhqi amni tinak khqi voel qoe kawng, tyihzawih ingtaw a boeipa a bibi ce am sim hy. Cedawngawh kai ing ka pyikhqi ni tinak khqi hawh nyng, kawtih ka Pa a venawh dang law sak hawh nyng.
Nangmih ing kai amnik tyk uhyk ti, kai ing ni nangmih ka nik tyk khqi, cet u tiksaw – a poepana ak cak ak thaih nami qahnaak ahamni caksak khqi nyng. Cawh nangmih ing kai ang ming ing nami thoeh saqui ce Pa ing ni pek khqi bit kaw.
Ve ve kai ak awipek ni: pynoet ingkaw pynoet lung qu na lah uh.
Khawmdek ing nangmih ce ani sawhnaak khqi awhtaw, kai ni lammana ani sawhnaak tice na mik kawk khuiawh sim uh.
Khawmdek a koe na nami awm mantaw, a koe na nami awm a dawngawh, ni lungnak khqi kaw. Cehlai khawmdek a koe na am awm uhyk ti, khawmdek awhkawng ka nik tyh khqi na awm utik saw khawmdek ing nangmih ce ni sawhnaak khqi hy.
Nangmih a venawh kak kqawn law awi ce sim uh; ‘A boei anglakawh tyihzawih am bau hy,’ a ti ce. Cekkhqi ing kai a mini thenaak awhtaw, nangmih awm ni thekhanak khqi kaw. Kai a cawngpyinaak ami hquut awhtaw, nangmih a cawngpyi naak awm hquut lawt kawm uh.
Kai ang ming awh cemyihna nangmih ce ni thekha nak khqi kaw, kawtih a mingmih ing kai anik tyikung ce am sim uhy.
Cekkhqi venna am cet nyng saw ve ak awi ve am kak kqawn peek mai mantaw, am thawlh hlai voei uh. Cehlai, tuh taw a thawlhnaak awh loet na am awm voel hy.
Kai anik sawhnaak thlang taw, ka Pa awm ak sawhnaak thlang na awm hy.
U ingawm ama sai khawi ce kai ingawm am ka sai mai mantaw, am thawlh hlai voei uh. Cehlai kawpoek kyi ik-oeih ak saikhqi ce ami huh awh awm, kai ingkaw ka Pa ve ni sawh na uhy.
Cehlai ningnih a anaa awi awh a qee amyihna, ‘Ikaw kawng am mai awh kai ni sawh na uhy,’ tice a soepnaak ham ni.
Pa a venawh kawng nangmih a venawh ka tyih hly kawi, ngaihqep sakkung, Pa a venawh kawng ak cawn law awitak Myihla ce a law awh, anih ing kai akawng ce ni sim sak khqi kaw.
Nangmih awm ak cyk ca awhkawng kai a venawh nami awm poe a dawngawh, kai akawng ce thlang sim sak lawt kawm uk ti.
Am namik thaseetnaak aham, ve ak awi ve kqawn law nyng.
Sinakawk khuiawh kawng nangmih ce ni hqek khqi kaw; Khawsa bibinaak aham nani nangmih ve ka ni him khqi, tinawh ak poek thlangkhqi a tym pa law kaw.
Pa ingkaw kai ce a mami sim ak camawh cemyihna ce sai kawm uh.
Ce a tym a pha lawawh nangmih ing, kai ing nik kqawn law pekkhqi hawh hy, tice nami simnaak aham kqawn nyng. Nami venawh ka awm hyn a dawngawh, ak cykca awh vek awi ve amnik kqawn pek khqi nyng.
Tuh taw kai anik tyikung a venna cet hly hawh nyng, u ingawm, ‘Hana na ceh kaw?’ amni tina uhyk ti.
Vemyihkhqi kak kqawn ak camawh namik kaw seet sak mat uhyk ti.
Cehlai awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi: nangmih nami leeknaak ahamni kai ka ceh hly. Kai am ka ceh mai mantaw ngaihqep sakkung ce nangmih a venna am law ti kaw; cehlai kai ka ceh mantaw anih ce nangmih a venna tyi law kawng nyng.
Anih a law awh, anih ing ve khawmdek thawlhnaak, dyngnaak ing awiceknaak ce ni sim sak khqi kaw:
thawlhnaak awh, thlangkhqi ing kai ve amnik cangsui uhy;
dyngnaak benawh, Pa a venna ka ceh aham awm hy; cawh nangmih ing kai ve amni hu voel qoe kawm uk ti;
awidengnaak benawh, ve khawmdek boei taw tuh awm bo sak na awm hawh hy.
Nami venawh awi kqawn kawi khawzah ta hyng, cehlai tuhawh noeng hly thai hlan utik saw khawzah ap kqawn nyng.
Cehlai anih, Myihla awitak, ce a law awh, awitak boeih boeih ak khuina nangmih ce ni sawi khqi kaw. Anih ing amah poek awh awi ap kqawn ti kaw; ang zaak doeng ce ni ak kqawn law hly, ak law hly kawi ce awm kqawn law kaw.
Anih ing kai ni zoeksang kaw; ka hamna thlang lo kawm saw, nangmih ce ni sim sak khqi kaw.
Pa ing a taakkhqi boeih boeih taw kai a koe hawh ni. Ceni, 'Ka hamna thlang lo kawm saw, nangmih ce ni sim sak khqi kaw,' ti nawh kak kqawn hy.
Kawlhkalh a awm coeng awhtaw amni hu qoe voel kawm uk ti, cehlai kawlhkalh a awm coengawh ni hu tlaih kawm uk ti,” tina hy.
A hubat ak khui awhkaw thlang a vang ing, “Ikaw ham nu, ‘kawlhkalh a awm coengawh amni hu qoe voel kawm uk ti, cehlai kawlhkalh a awm coengawh ni hu tlaih kawm uk ti, Pa a venna ka ceh aham a awm a dawngawh,’ a ti hy voei?
“Kawlhkalh,” a tice ikaw a ti ngaihnaak hy voei nu? Ak kqawn ve am zasim unyng,” ti uhy.
Ve ak awi ve sim aham ngaih uhy tice Jesu ing a sim awh, cekkhqi venawh, “Kawlhkalh a awm coengawh amni hu voel kawm uk ti, cehlai kawlhkalh a awm coengawh ni hu tlaih kawm uk ti,’ ti nawh kak kqawn ce namimah doet qu uhyk ti my?
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, khawmdek ve a zeel awh, nangmih taw qung ang kqap kawm u tiksaw khy ang kqang kawm uk ti. Namik kaw se kaw, cehlai nangmih ak kawseetnaak ce zeelnaak na thoeng kaw.
Nu ing ca a taak awh, a tym ing a pha ak camawh tlawh pehy, cehlai naaca a awm coengawh taw, khawmdek awh naasen pynoet a thang hawh a dawngawh a zeel aih awh a khuikhanaakkhqi ce hilh boeih hy.
Ceamyihna nangmih awm lawt kawm uk ti: tuh nangmih namik kaw se hy, cehlai nangmih ce ni huk khqi tlaih bit kawng, cawh zeel kawm uk ti, nangmih a zeelnaak ce u ingawm am ni qawt khqi kaw.
Cawh ka venawh ikaw awm am thoeh law qoe voel kawm uk ti. Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi, kang ming ing nami thoeh saqui ce ka Pa ing ni pek khqi kaw.
Tuh dy kai ang ming ing ikaw awm thoeh hlan uhyk ti. Thoeh lah uh, hu kawm uk ti, nami zeelnaak ce soep kaw.
Nyhtahnaak ing awi kqawn law hlai nyng, vemyih ak awi hawnaak voel kaana zaksim zoei na Pa akawng kqawnnaak a tym ce pha law hawh hy.
Cawh nangmih ing kai ang ming ing ik-oeih thoeh kawm uk ti. Nangmih ang zyng na Pa a venna thoeh law kawng nyng, ti kqawn ngaihnaak amni.
Cemyih amni, kai ni lungna unawh, kai ve Khawsa venawh kawng law hy tinawh nami nik cangnaak ak camawh Pa amah qoe ing, nangmih ce ni lungnak khqi hy.
Kai taw Pa a venawh kawng ve khawmdek awh law nyng; tuh khawmdek ve cehta kawng nyng saw Pa a venna voei tlaih kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu a hubatkhqi ing, “Nyhtahnaak a paa kaana awi ak caih kqawn law hawh hyk ti.
