Nang ing Ik-oeih boeih boeih sim hyk ti, u ingawm awi doet aham am ngoe voel ti kaw, tice sim hawh unyng. Ve ak caming Khawsa venna kawng law hy, tice nik cang sak khqi hawh hy,” tina uhy.
Jesu ing hlat khqi nawh, “Tuhtaw cangna hawh uhyk ti my?
Ngai lah uh, a tym pha law kaw, tuh pha law hui hly, ce hyn a pha lawawh taw nami im imna cet boeih kawm uk ti saw, kamah doeng ni hlah kawm uk ti; cehlai Pa ka venawh a awm ak camawh kamah doeng am awm nyng.
Kai awh ngaihqepnaak nami taaknaak thai aham, vekkhqi ve nik kqawn pekkhqi hawh nyng. Ve khawmdek awh kyinaak hu kawm uk ti. Cehlai na mim thin caksak uh! Kai ing khawmdek noeng hawh nyng,” tina hy.
Jesu ing ve ak awi ak kqawn coengawh, khan benna mang nawh cykcah hy: “Ka Pa, a tym ing pha law hawh hy. Na Capa zoeksang lah, Capa ing nang ani zoeksangnaak a ham.
Ceamyihna thlang boeih boeih ak khanawh saithainaak na peek ce, a venawh na peek thlang boeih kumqui hqingnaak a peek naak thai ham.
Ve ve kumqui hqingnaak ni: nang Khawsa doeng ingkaw na tyih Jesu Khrih sim ve.
Nang ing sai ham nani peek bi bi ce kak coengnaak ak caming khawmdek awh nang ming ce zoeksang hawh nyng.
Aw ka Pa, khawmdek a syn hlanawh na venawh zoeksangnaakna ka awm ce, tuhawh namah qoe ing ni zoeksang lah.
Nang ing khawmdek khui awhkawng ak cawn nani peek khqi venawh nang ming dangsak hawh nyng; amingmih taw na koe na awm unawh, nang ing nani peekkhqi na awm uhy; amingmih ing nak awipek ngaih uhy.
Ik-oeih nani peekkhqi boeih ce nang a venawh kaw ni tice tuh sim hawh uhy.
Nang ing nani peek awikhqi ce cekkhqi venawh pe nyng saw a mingmih ing do uhy. Kai ve nang a venawh kawng ni a law, tice ak ceet cana sim hawh uhy, nang ing ni a tyih ti awm cangna hawh uhy.
A mingmih aham cykcah nyng. Khawmdek aham am cykcah nyng, cehlai nang ing nani peek thlangkhqi hamna ni kak cykcah, na koena awm unawh.
Kai ing ka taakkhqi boeih ce nang a koe ni, nang ing na taakkhqi boeih awm nang a koe ni. A mingmih awh zoeksangnaak ce ka venawh awm hy.
Khawmdek awh khawqyt am awm voel kawng, cehlai a mingmih taw khawmdek awh awm hyn kawm uh, kai taw nang a venna law hawh kawng nyng. Ka Pa Ciimcaih, nang ming saithainaak ing a mingmih ce chungdah khqi lah – ningnih pynoet na ni awm amyihna a mingmih awm pynoet na ami awmnaak thai aham.
Vekkhqi mi ka awm awh, nang ing nani peek ming ing a mingmih ce chung ak dah khqi nyng saw a nep cana khoem nyng. Cak Ciim a soepnaak aham, ak qeng thlang pynoet ti kaa taw, pynoet awm am qeng ti kawm uh.
Tuh nang a venna law hly hawh nyng, cehlai ve khawmdek awh ka awm hyn awh, kai a zeelnaak ce a mingmih ak khuiawh ak be na ami taaknaak thai aham, vekhqi ve kqawn nyng.
Nak awi ce a mingmih a venawh pe hawh nyng, kai khawmdek a koena am ka awm amyihna, a mingmih awm khawmdek a koena a mami awm a dawngawh, khawmdek ing a mingmih ce sawh nak khqi hawh hy.
Khawmdek awhkawng ak chang na a mingmih ce khyn valh aham am cykcah nyng, cehlai them che ak khuiawh kawng a mingmih ce chungdah ahamni kak cykcah.
Kai khawmdek a koena am ka awm lawt amyihna, a mingmih awm khawmdek a koena am awm uhy.
Awitak ing a mingmih ce ciimcaih sak lah; nak awi taw awitak ni.
Khawmdek na nang ing nani tyih amyihna, kai ingawm a mingmih ce khawmdek awh tyi khqi nyng.
A mingmih aham kamah ingkaw kamah ciim qunyng, a mingmih awm ami ciim lawt ham awm hy.
A mingmih aham doeng am cykcah nyng. A mingmih ing awi amik khypyi ak camawh ak cangnaak hly kawi thlangkhqi ham awm cykcah nyng.
Ka Pa, kai ak khuiawh nang awm tiksaw, nang ak khuiawh kai ka awm amyihna, a mingmih pynoet na ami awmnaak thai aham cykcah nyng. Nang ing kai ni tyi hyk ti tice khawmdek ing cangna thai nawh ningnih ak khuiawh a mingmih ami awmnaak thai aham cykcah nyng.
Nyngnih pynoet na ni awm amyihna a mingmih awm pynoet na ami awmnaak aham, nang ing nani peek zoeksangnaak ce a mingmih a venawh pe khqi nyng.
A mingmih ak khuiawh kai awm nyng kai ak khuiawh nang awm hyk ti. Nang ing kai ni tyi nawh kai nani lungnaak amyihna a mingmih awm lungna hyk ti tice khawmdek sim sak aham a mingmih ce pynoet na coeng sak lah.
Ka Pa, nang ing nani peekkhqi ve, nang ing khawmdek a syn hlanawh ni lungna nawh nani peek kai a boeimangnaak ce huh sak aham, kamah ka awmnaak awh awm sak lawt aham ngaih nyng.
Ak dyng ka Pa, khawmdek ing nang ce amni sim seiawm, kai ing nang ce ni sim nyng, nang ing ni tyi hyk ti tice a mingmih ing sim hawh uhy.
A mingmih a venawh nang ming ce khypyi hawh nyng, nang ing kai nani lungnaak ce a mingmih a venawh awm nawh kamah qoe ce a mingmih a venawh ka awm thainaak aham, nang ming ce khypyi hyn kawng nyng,” tinawh cykcah hy.
Jesu ing ak cykcah boet coengawh, a hubatkhqi mi Kidron zawi vang benna cet uhy. Zawi vang benna olive dum awm nawh, ce ak khuina a hubatkhqi mi lut uhy.
Ce a hun awh Jesu ing a hubatkhqi mi ami ceh khawi a dawngawh, amah thlang a kut awh ak peekung Juda ing a hun ce sim hy.
Cedawngawh Juda ing khawsoeih boeikhqi ingkaw Farasikhqi venawh kawng qalkapkhqi ingkaw ukkung thlang vang ce dum khuina law pyi khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing maihchoei, mai-im ingkaw caikhqi ce pawm unawh law uhy.
A venna ak pha law hly kawi them khqi ce a sim a dawngawh, Jesu ing cet nawh cekkhqi ce doet hy, “U aw nami sui?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Nazareth Jesu” tina uhy. Jesu ing, “Kai ni,” tinak khqi hy. (Cawh thlang a kut awh amah ak peekung Juda awm cawh dyi hy.
Jesu ing, “Kai ni,” a tinaak khqi awh ami hu na thoeih unawh dek na khoep uhy.
Cekcoengawh, “U aw nami sui?” tinak khqi tlaih bai hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Nazareth Jesu,” tina bai uhy.
Jesu ing, “Kai ni ni tinak khqi hawh nyng. Kai nami ni sui awhtaw vekkhqi ve ceh sak khqi,” tinak khqi hy.
Nang ing nani peekkhqi pynoet awm am qeng sak nyng,” tinawh ak kqawn awi ce a soepnaak aham vemyihna tina hy.
Cawh Simon Piter ing, ak cimca ce lo nawh, khawsoeih boei soeih a tyihzawih ang haa ce zek pe hlak hy. (Ce a tyihzawih thlang ang ming taw Malka ming na hy.
Jesu ing Piter nace, “Nak cimca ce sapang khuiawh chan; Ka Pa ing ani peek boet ce am ka aw hly nawh nu,” tina hy.
Cawh qalkapkhqi, qalkap boeikhqi ingkaw Juda ukkungkhqi a tyihzawihkhqi ing Jesu ce tu uhy. Ami pin coengawh,
Anna venna ceh pyi lamma uhy, anih cetaw ce a kum awh khawsoeih boei khyt na ak awm, Kaiapha a se na awm hy.
Kaiapha cetaw, thlang khawzah thih anglakawh thlang pynoet a thih nep bet hy, tinawh Judakhqi venawh ak kqawn peekkung ceni.
Simon Piter ingkaw ak chang hubat pynoet ing Jesu ce a hu awh hquut hy nih. Cawhkaw hubat cetaw khawsoeih boei khyt ing sim qu hy nih, cedawngawh anih cetaw Jesu ing khawsoeih boei khyt a ipkhui kawngmana lut hy nih.
Cehlai Piter cetaw vawng chawmkeng awh awm hyt hy. Ak chang hubat, khawsoeih boei khyt ing anik sim qu ce hlat law tlaih nawh, vawng chawmkeng ak qehkung nuca ing ce voem qu hy nih, cawh Piter awm vawng khuina lut lawt hy.
Chawmkeng qehkung nuca ing Piter nace, “Nang awm a mingmih a venawh paa lawt hyk ti?” tina hy. Anih ing, “Kai amni,” tina hy.
Khaw a ding a dawngawh, ukkungkhqi a tyihzawihkhqi ing mai tih unawh mai ce aawm uhy.
Cawh khawsoeih boei khyt ing Jesu ce a hubatkhqi mi a cawngpyinaak akawngkhqi ce doet hy.
Jesu ing awi hlat pe nawh, “Kai ing khawmdek a venawh a samphang na awi kqawn nyng. Judahkhqi ang cunnaak sinakawk ingkaw bawkim awh cawngpyi poepa nyng. Ang hyp na ikawk awi awm ap kqawn nyng.
Ikaw hamna nani doet? Kai ak awih kqawn ak zakhqi ce doet thaw. Kak awikqawn ce cekkhqi ing sim u hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Ceamyihna awi ak kqawn awh, cawhkaw ukkung thlang pynoet ing Jesu a haai awh beei hy. “Vemyihna aw khawsoeih boei khyt ak awi nam hlat peek? tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Kak kqawn ve ama thym awhtaw, ama thymnaak ce kqawn law. Cehlai ak thym kak kqawn awhawm kawtih nanik beih? tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Anna ing, a pin doena, khawsoeih boei khyt Kaiapha venna tyi hy.
Simon Piter ce mai a aawm huili awh doet uhy, “Nang awm anih a hubat pynoet lawt ni my?” tina uhy. Cekkhqi venawh, “Amni”, tinak khqi hy.
Khawsoih boei khyt a tyihzawih thlang pynoet, Piter ing ang haa a zeek peek a tyihzawih a cakaw na ak awm ing, “Nang ve olive dum ak khuiawh ni hu zawh nyng?” tina hy.
Cehlai Piter ing oelh tlaih bai hy, cawh aai khawng pahoei hy.
Cekcoengawh Judakhqi ing Kaiapha a im awhkawng Rom ukkung Pilat a im na Jesu ce ceh pyi uhy. Mymcang hiina awm nawh boei imna am lut uhy. A mi lut awhtaw am ciimcaih nawh Loentaak poei buh am ai thai kawm uh.
Ce a dawngawh Pilat ce a mingmih a venna cet nawh doet hy, “Ikaw thawlhnaak awh nu ve ak thlang ve nami law pyi? tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Ve ak thlang ve thawlhnaak ama taak man nang a venawh am law hly pyi unyng,” tina uhy.
Pilat ing, “Khyn unawh na mimah a cawngpyinaak awi amyihna awi cek uh,” tinak khqi hy. Cehlai Judakhqi ing, “Thlang him thainaak am ta unyng,” tina uhy.
Vemyihna a awmnaak vetaw, Jesu ing ikawmyih thihnaak kawi ing a thih kaw, tinawh ak kqawn ce a soepnaak ahamni.
Cawh Pilat ce ipkhui na cet tlaih nawh, Jesu ce ak khy coengawh doet hy, “Nang ve Judahkhqi a sangpahrang nu? tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Namah ak poek aw nak kqawn, am awhtaw thlang ing nu kai akawng na venawh ak kqawn law?” tina hy.
Pilat ing, “Kai ve Juda pa na ti nawh nu? Nak thlangkhqi ingkaw na khawsoeih boeikhqi ing ni nang ve kai a venna ami haw law ka ti. Ikaw na sai hy voei? tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Kai a qam taw ve khawmdek amni. Ve khawmdek qam mantaw, Judakhqi ing kai ama mim tunaak thai aham ka tyihzawihkhqi ing tu hawh kawm uh. Cehlai kai a qam taw ak chang nakaw ni,” tina hy.
“Cawhtaw nang ve sangpahrang vam haw?” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Kai ve sangpahrang na tice thym hy. Ve a ham nani awitak ak kqawn aham thang law nyng saw, khawmdek awh ka law. Uawm awitak benna ak awm ingtaw kak awi ngai hy,” tina hy.
Cawh Pilat ing, “Awitak ce ikaw nu? tina hy. Ce ak awi a doet coengawh Judakhqi venna cet tlaih nawh, “Ve ak thlang a thawlhnaak am hu nyng.
Cehlai cehtaak khawnghi awh nangmih ing thawngtla pynoet oet ni hlah sak uhyk ti. ‘Juda sangpahrang’ venu ka hlah law hly?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Amni, anih amni! Banabas ce hlah law,” tina uhy. Banabas cetaw quk-ai thlang pynoet na awm hy.
Cawh Pilat ing Jesu ce khyn nawh vyk hy.
Qalkapkhqi ing hling ce lumyk na sai unawh a lu awh myk sak unawh hik thim ce bai sak uhy;
cekcoengawh, a venna pan unawh, “Juda sangpahrang na zoseen seh!” tina uhy. A haiawh beei uhy.
Pilat ing Judakhqi venna cet nawh, “Toek lah uh, a thawlhnaak am hu nyng, tice nami simnaak aham nangmih a venawh law pyi tlaih nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Jesu taw hling lumyk myk nawh hik thim a bai doena cawn law hy. Pilat ing, “Anih ve toek lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw ukkungkhqi ing ami huh awh, “Thinglam awh tai! Thinglam awh tai!” tinawh khy uhy. Cehlai Pilat ing, “Khyn unawh, tai uh. Kai ingtaw a thawlhnaak am hu nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Judakhqi ing, “Ka mimah a cawngpyinaak awipeek pynoet awm hy. Cek awipeek amyihna Khawsa Capa na ak kqawn qu ak cawmawh a thih aham awm hy,” ti uhy.
Ce ak awi ce Pilat ing ang zaak awh kqih khqoet nawh,
ipkhui na cet tlaih hy. “Hana kawng na law?” tinawh Jesu ce doet hy, cehlai Jesu ing awi khangoet awm am hlat pehy.
Pilat ing, “Kai a venawh awikqawn aham amna ngaih nawh nu? Nang loet sak thainaak ingkaw thinglam awh tai thainaak ta nyng ti amna sim nawh nu?” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Khan benna kawng ama ni peek awhtaw kak khanawh saithainaak am ta kawp ti. Cedawngawh nangmih a venna kai anik peekung a thawlhnaak ve bau khqoet hy,” tina hy.
Cawh Pilat ing Jesu ce hlah aham ngaih hy, cehlai Judakhqi ing, “Ve ak thlang ve na loet sak awhtaw, nang taw Kaisarar a pyi am voel hawh ni. U awm amah ing sangpahrang na ak sai qu taw Kaisarar ak oelh ak thlang ni,” tina uhy.
Ce ak awi ce Pilat ing ang zaak awh, Jesu ce law pyi nawh awidengnaak Lung Ngawihdoelh (Aqamaic awi na Gabbatha) awh ngawi sak hy.
Cenyn taw loentaak khawnghi coekqoek nyn na awm hy, khawnoek kquk tluk pha hawh hy. Pilat ing Judakhqi venawh, “Nami sangpahrang ve toek lah uh!” tinak khqi hy.
Cehlai cekkhqi ing, “Anih ce him! Anih ce him! Thinglam awh tai” tinawh khy uhy. Pilat ing, “Nangmih a sangpahrang ve thinglam awh kak tai hly nu?” tinak khqi hy. Cawh khawsoeih boeikhqi ing, “Kaisarar am awhtaw sangpahrang am ta unyng,” tina uhy.
A hukhit na taw thinglam awh tai aham Jesu ce a mingmih a kut awh Pilat ing pek khqi hy. Cedawngawh qalkapkhqi ing Jesu ce ceh pyi uhy.
Amah a thinglam ce kawt nawh luqawk hun (Aqamaic awi na Golgotha ti uhy) na ce cet hy.
Ce hun awh anih ce thlang pakkhih mi thinglam awh tai haih uhy – tang ben cawng benawh cekqawi ce tai unawh cekqawi anglak lung awh Jesu ce tai uhy.
Pilat ing, ‘Nazareth Jesu Judahkhqi sangpahrang,’ tinawh ami qee coengawh thinglam awh taih pe uhy.
Thinglam awh Jesu ami tainaak hun ce khawk bau awhkawng zoe hy, cawhkaw caa ce Aqamaic, Latin ingkaw Greek awina a qee a dawngawh, Juda thlang khawzah ing qeel uhy.
Juda khawsoeih boeikhqi ing Pilat a venawh, ‘Juda sangpahrang’ tinawh koeh qee, ve ak thlang ing Juda sangpahrang na awm nyng, ti hy, tinawh qee,” tina uhy.
Pilat ing, ka qee cetaw, ka qee nani a awm hawh,” tina hy.
Qalkapkhqi ing Jesu ce thinglam awh ami tai coengawh, a hi ce lawh pe unawh, thlang pynoet qip aham, pupthli na paa qu uhy. A angki awm lo uhy. Ce angki taw ak khqui kaana awm nawh, a haawng awhkawng a pum dy ang tah qu ni.
Ceamyihna awm saw amingmih ing, “Vawhkaw hi vetaw koeh teek u sih. U ing nu a huh kaw, taicung na zyk u sih,” ti uhy. “Ka hi ve teei unawh ka angki ce taicung zyk sih kawm uh,” tinawh qee hyt na ak awm ce a soepnaak aham vemyihkhqi ve ak awm ni. Ceamyihna qalkapkhqi ing sai uhy.
Jesu a thinglam a kingawh a nu, a nu a naa, Klopa a zu Meri ingkaw Meri Magdalene mi ce awm uhy.
Jesu ing cawh ak awm a nu ingkaw, amah ing a lungnaak hubat thlang pynoet cawh ak dyi ce a huh awh, a nu a venawh, “Nu, na capa ve toek lah,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh a hubat thlang a venawh, “Na nu ve toek lah,” tina bai hy. Cawh kawng awhtaw cawhkaw a hubat ing a nu ce im na ceh pyi hy.
Cak Ciim awi a soepnaak aham ik-oeih boeih coeng hawh hy tice a sim awh, Jesu ing, “Tui ngaih nyng,” tihy.
Cawh misur tui ak thui ce am awh hawih uhy, cawhkaw misur tui ak thui ce hlapawt ing hluk unawh, cawhkaw hlapawt ce hyssop thing awh ami tlet coengawh Jesu a hui awh tuh uhy.
Misur tui ak thui ce ami hluk coengawh, Jesu ing, “Coeng Hawh hy,” tihy. Cekcoengawh a hawng tlep nawh a mal pat pahoei hy.
Ce nyn taw coekqoek nyn na awm nawh, a khawngawi taw Sabbath nyn na awm hy. Sabbath nyn awh thinglam awh thlang a qawk a bat ce Judakhqi ing a mami ngaih a dawngawh, Pilat a venna cet unawh thinglam awhkaw ami tai thlangkhqi khaw ce hqem pe nawh thinglam awhkawng qawk ce lawh aham thoeh uhy.
Cedawngawh qalkapkhqi ce law unawh Jesu ingqawi thinglam awh ami tai haih thlang pynoet a khaw ce hqem pe uhy, cekcoengawh ak chang pynoet a khaw ce awm hqem pe bai uhy.
Cehlai Jesu a ven a mi pha awh anih cetaw a qaawk na hu uhy, cedawngawh a khaw ce am hqem pe voel uhy.
Qalkap pynoet ing Jesu ce cai ing a vei awh sun hy, cawh thi ingkaw tui ce lawng law pahoei hy.
Ak hukung ing ni sim sak hawh hy, (a ni sim sak awi ce thym hy; ak kqawn thym hy ti sim qu hy,) nangmih ingawm namik cangnaak lawt hamna.
Cakciim awiawh ak awm, “A quh pynoet awm am ek tikaw,” ti ce a soepnaak ahamna vekkhqi ve ak awm law ni.
Cawh Cakciim ak chang bai awhawm, “A mingmih ing cai ing ami sun ce toek kawm uh,” tinawh awm bai hy.
A hu na, Arimathea khaw awhkaw Joseph ing Pilat a venawh Jesu a qawk ce thoeh hy. Joseph taw Jesu a hubat pynoet na awm lawt hy. Judakhqi ak kqih a dawngawh ang hyp na awm hy. Pilat ak caming, cet nawh Jesu a qawk ce lo hy.
Khawmthan awh Jesu a venna ak cet Nekodemu ing anih ce pyi hy. Nikodemu ing myrrh ing ak kqit bawktui, khqihkip pawngnga tluk ce haw law hy.
Jesu a pum lo nih nawh bawktui ing ani hluk coengawh hi ing zawl hy nih. Judakhqi a singyoe amyihna cemyihna sai hy nih.
Jesu thinglam ami tainaak awh dum pynoet awm hy, ce a dum khuiawh phyi ak thai pynoet awm hy, ce a phyi khuiawh a u awm vui hlan uhy.
Ce nyn ce Judakhqi coekqoek nyn na awm nawh phyi a zoe a dawngawh Jesu ce pup hy nih.
Khaw khqih nyn khui awhkaw khawnghi lamma cyk mymcang hqit awh, Meri Magdalene ce, khaw than hun saw phyi na cet hy, cawh phyi chawmkeng awhkaw lung ak thoeng qu ce hu hy.
Cedawngawh Simon Piter ingkaw Jesu ing a lungnaak ak chang hubat thlang a venna dawng nawh, “Phyi khui awhkawng Bawipa ce hana nu ta valh hawh uhy, hana nu ami taak hy voei am sim nyng,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh Piter ingkaw ak chang hubat thlang ce phyi na cet hy nih.
Dawng haih hy nih, cehlai ak chang hubat ing Piter ce dawng ta nawh phyi ce lamma na pha hy.
Anih ce nung koep nawh phyi ce a toek awh hi doeng a awm ce hu hy, cehlai amah taw am nu lut hy.
Cawh a hu na a cehtaak Piter ce law nawh, phyi khuina ce nu lut hy,
cekcoengawh Jesu a lu zennaak thlakthi hi awm hu bai hy. Cawhkaw hi ce amah doeng ak chang cana tum qu nawh awm hy.
Phyi ak pha ma hubat ak chang ce awm a hu na taw phyi khuina nu lut lawt hy. Anih ing ce ce hu nawh cangna hy.
(Ca Ciim awhkawng thihnaak awhkawng Jesu a thawh tlaihnaak akawng ce am zasim hlan bak bak uhy.)
Cekcoengawh a hubat qawi ce im na voei hy nih,
cehlai Meri cetaw phyi a venawh dyi nawh kqang hy. Ang kqang doena koep nawh phyi ce toek hy.
Ak baawk phung khan ceityih pakkhih ce Jesu a qawk ami soeinaak awh, pynoet ce a lu benawh pynoet ce a kaw benawh ngawi hy nih.
Cek kqawi ing, “Nu kawtih nang kqang?” tina hy nih. Anih ing, “Hana nu ka Bawipa khyn valh hawh uhy, hana nu ami taak hy voei am sim nyng,” tina qawi hy.
Cawh, hu benna ang hawi awh ce, cawhkaw ak dyi Jesu ce hy hqoet hy, cehlai Jesu ni tina am hat hy.
Anih ing, “Nu kawtih nang kqang? Unu na sui?” tina hy. Dum ak qeh thlang amyih ni tina poek nawh, a venna, “Nang ing na khyn awhtaw na taaknaak hun nik kqawn pe lah, law na vang nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu ing a venawh, “Meri,” tina hy. Anih ce hawi qu nawh Aqamaic awi na, “Rabboni,” (“Cawngpyikung,” tinak ni) tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Pa a venna kang voei hlan a dawngawh, kai ve koeh nim tu voel moe. Ka koeinaakhqi venna mah cet nawhtaw, ‘Ka Pa ingkaw nangmih a Pa, ka Khawsa ingkaw nangmih a Khawsa venna voei hly tlaih hawh nyng, tihy,’ tinawh kqawn law pek khqi,” tina hy.
Meri Magdalene ing a hubatkhqi venna cet nawh ve ak awithang ce kqawn pek khqi hy: “Bawipa taw hu hawh nyng!” tinak khqi hy. Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ve anih ing a venawh kqawn pehy tice cekkhqi venawh kqawn pehy.
Ce a khawnghi, khqih nyn khui awhkaw lamma cyk khawnghi khawmy benawh, hubatkhqi ce pynoet na cun unawh awm uhy, Judakhqi amik kqih a dawngawh chawh kalh khoep uhy, cawh Jesu ce law nawh cekkhqi anglak lung awh dyih pek khqi hy, “Nami venawh ngaihdingnaak awm seh!” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn coengawh, a kut ingkaw a veei ce huh khqi hy. Bawipa ce ami huh awh zeel uhy.
Jesu ing, “Nami venawh ngaihdingnaak awm seh! Boei ing kai ani tyih amyihna, kai ing nangmih ce ni tyi khqi nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Ce ak awi ak kqawn coengawh ang hqi chan nawh ami venawh, “Ciim Myihla hu lah uh.
U a thawlhnaak awm namim qeen boeih taw qeenna awm kawm saw, u a thawlhnaak awm am namim qeen cetaw qeenna am awm kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Thlanghqa hlaihih ak khui awhkaw thlang pynoet, (Didymas ami ti) Thomas ce, Jesu a law awh hubatkhqi anglakawh am awm hy.
Cedawngawh hubat ak changkhqi ing, “Bawipa hu unyng,” tina uhy. Cehlai cekkhqi venawh, “A kut awhkaw thicung ngaw ingkaw thicung ing ami hennaak a ngaw ce ka kut ing am kak pui nawh a vei ce ka kut ing am ka zam awhtaw ap cangna kawng nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Khaw khqih nyn a awm coengawh, hubatkhqi taw ipkhui awh cun tlaih bai uhy, cawhtaw Thomas awm awm lawt hy. Chawh ce kalh hlai uhy, Jesu ce law nawh, cekkhqi anglak lung awh dyih pek khqi hy, “Nami venawh ngaihdingnaak awm seh,” tinak khqi hy,
Cekcoengawh Thomas a venawh, “Na kut ing zam nawh, ka kut qawi ve toek lah. Na kut lo nawhtaw ka veei ve zam lah. Koeh upvoet voel nawhtaw cangna hlah,” tina hy.
Thomas ing, “Ka Bawipa ingkaw ka Khawsa na awm hyk ti!” tina hy.
Cawh Jesu ing, “Nang ing nani huh deng awh nik cangna hyk ti, a huh kaana ak cangnaak thlangkhqi taw ami zoseen hy,” tina hy.
Jesu ing a hubatkhqi mik huh awh a sai peek, ve cauk khuiawh qee na amak awm ak chang kawpoek kyi ik-oeih khawzah awm hun hy.
Cehlai nangmih ing Jesu taw Khrih, Khawsa Capa ni, tice cangna unawh ang ming awh hqingnaak ce nami taaknaak thai aham ve ak ca ve qee na awm hy.
Jesu ing, Tiberia Tuili awh a hubatkhqi venawh dang pe tlaih bai hy. Cawh vemyihna awm hy.
Simon Piter, (Didymas tinawh amik khy) Thomas, Kalili qam Kanan khaw awhkaw Nathanael, Zebedee a ca qawi hubat thlang pakkhih ce awm uhy.
Simon Piter ing cekkhqi venawh, “Ngak tuna cet hly nyng,” tina khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Kaimih awm law hly lawt unyng,” tina uhy. Cedawngawh cekkhqi awm cet unawh, lawng awh ngawi uhy, cehlai than oet khuiawh ikaw ca awm am tu uhy.
Mymcang hqit awh Jesu taw tui keng awh dyi hy, cehlai a hubatkhqi ing Jesu na am sim uhy.
Anih ing, “Ka pyikhqi, nga amna mim tu nawh aw?” tinak khqi hy. Cekkhqi ing, “Am tu unyng,” tina uhy.
Anih ing, “Lawng keeng tang benawh lawk ce khawng lah uh, nga tu bit kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy. Lawk ce amik khawng awhtaw, nga khawzah tu unawh, lawk ce naa tloei uhy.
Cawh Jesu a lungnaak hubat ing, Piter a venawh, “Anih ve Bawipa ni,” tina hy. Anih ing, “Anih ve Bawipa ni,” a tice Simon Piter ing ang zaak awh, a hi ing ven qu nawh tui na cawn hy.
Hubat ak chang khqi taw a hu awh lawng ing hqut uhy, lawk awh ak be nga ce kawngceng na dawk uhy, (kawngceng awhkawng dawng hakip tluk ni a hla hy.)
Kawngceng ami pha awhtaw, mai tih unawh nga ang sai qu ce hu uhy, phaihpi awm cawh awm hy.
Jesu ing a mingmih a venawh, “Nga namim tu ce avang haw law lah uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Simon Piter ce lawng awh kai nawh lawk ce kawngceng na dawk hy. Nga ak bau hqoeng zakhat sawmnga pathum law hy, nga ce zah law hlai hy lawk ce am se qoe hy.
Jesu ing, “Law lah uh, mymcang buh ai hlah u sih,” tinak khqi hy. Bawipa ni tice ami sim a dawngawh, a hubat ak khuiawh kaw u ingawm, “Nang ve a u nu?” am tina qoe uhy.
Jesu ce law nawh, phaihpi ce lo nawh cekkhqi ce pehy, nga awm lo nawh pek khqi bai hy.
Ve ve thihnaak awhkawng a thawh coengawh a hubatkhqi venawh ang dangnaak thum voei naak na awm hy.
Buh ami ai coengawh, Jesu ing Simon Piter a venawh, “Johan capa Simon, vekkhqi boeih anglakawh nanik lungnaak tang tang aw?” tina hy. Piter ing, “Oeih, Bawipa, ni lungna nyng tice nang ing sim hyk ti,” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Ka tuukhqi ce cawmcah khqi,” tina hy.
Jesu ing, “Johan a capa Simon, na nik lungnaak tang tang aw?” tina bai hy. Anih ing, “Oeih, Bawipa, ni lungna nyng tice sim hyk ti,” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Ka tuukhqi ce khoem a doen khqi,” tina hy.
Am thumnaak awh, “Johan capa Simon, na nik lungnaak aw?” tina bai hy. Jesu ing Piter a venawh thum voei dy, “Nanik lungnaak aw?” a tinaak awh Piter taw ak kaw se nawh a venawh, “Bawipa nang ing ik-oeih boeih boeih sim tik saw, ka ni lungnaak awm sim hyk ti,” tina hy. Jesu ing, “Ka tuukhqi cawmcah khqi.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek, na naasen awhtaw namah poek awh nak cawi khit nawh namah a ngaihnaak na cet hyk ti, cehlai na pacawng law awhtaw na kut zyng kawm tiksaw, thlang ing ni pin kawm saw am na ngaihnaak benna ni sawi kawm uh,” tina hy.
Thihnaak ikawmyih ing nu Piter ing Khawsa a zoeksang kaw, tice sim sak ham Jesu ing ak kqawn ni. Cekcoengawh a venawh, “Ka hu awh bat lah,” tina hy.
Piter ing hawi qu nawh a toek awh, Jesu ing a lungnaak hubat thlang ing a mingmih a hu awh ang bat ce huhy. Vawhkaw thlang vetaw mybuh ami veel awh Jesu a venawh koep nawh, “Bawipa u ing nu nang ce thlang a kut awh ani zawih kaw?” tinawh ak doetkung ceni.
Piter ing anih ce a huh awh, “Bawipa anih ce ikawmyihna nu a awm kaw?” tinawh doet hy.
Jesu ing, “Kang voei law tlaih hlan dyy anih ve ak hqing na ta mai nyng seiawm ikawnu tina vang nati? Ka hu awh mah bat law,” tina hy.
Ve a dawngawh, koeinaakhqi khuiawh, 'cawhkaw hubat ce am thi kaw,' tinawh poek uhy. Cehlai, “Kang voei law tlaih hlan dyy anih ve a hqing na ta mai nyng seiawm ikaw tina vang na tinawh nu?” a tinaak hlai ni.
Cawhkaw hubat taw vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ak kqawnkung ingkaw ak qeekung veni. Vawhkaw simpyinaak ve thym hy tice sim uh.
Jesu ing ak chang them khawzah sai hy. Cemyihkhqi ce qee boeih sih ni ti mai mantaw, khawmdek pum awh cawhkaw caukkhqi ce am khoek qoe qoe kaw, tinawh poek nyng.
Theophila, maa nakaw cauk lamma awh, Jesu a them saikhqi ingkaw a cawngpyinaak,
amah ing ak tyh ceityihkhqi venawh Ciim Myihla ak caming awi yyn nawh, khawk khana kaaina a awm hlan dy awhkaw awi ak kqawn peek khqi ce qee law hawh nyng.
Khuikhanaak a huh coengawh, vawhkaw thlangkhqi venawh hatnaak khawzah ing amah taw hqing hy tice dang sak hy. Khawnghi phlikip khuiawh dang pe nawh a mingmih a venawh Khawsa qam akawng ce kqawn pehy.
Hypboet taw a mingmih mi buh ami ai haih awh vawhkaw awi ve pehy: “Kai ing kak kqawn law za uhyk ti, Pa ak awikam ce qeh unawh taw Jerusalem ve koeh cehtaak kawm uk ti.
Ikawtih Johan ingtaw tui ing baptisma ce pehy, cehlai khawnghi iqyt a dii hlanawh nangmih ing Cii Myihla ing baptisma ce hu kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh kutoet na ami awm awh doet uhy, “Bawipa, Israel qam ce tuh nang dyih hly sak hawh nawh nu?” tina uhy.
Cekkhqi venawh: “Pa ing amah ak caming a taak atym ingkaw khawnghi ce nangmih nami sim am ngaih hy.
Cehlai Ciim Myihla ce nangmih ak khanawh a pha law awhtaw thaawmnaak ta kawm uk ti; cawh nangmih taw Jerusalem, Judah qam boeih ingkaw Samari qam khawmdek a dytnaak dyna kai a dyihthing na awm kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn coengawh, a mingmih a mik huh awh khawk khan na zoek nace awm nawh, a mami huh thainaak dyna myi ing khyn zip hy.
Ceamyihna zoehna a awm ce a mi toek huiawh thlang pakkhih, hik baawk bai ing, ami venawh dyi law hy.
Cekkqawi ing, “Klili thlangkhqi, ikawtih khanna mang unawh naming dyih khing? Khanna a kaai nami huh amyihna amah qoe a hu voei law tlaih kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh, Olive tlang ami ti awhkawng Jerusalem khawna voei uhy; ce tlang taw Jerusalem khaw kengawh awm nawh, Sabbath nynawh khin cehnaak khoek ni a hla hy.
Ami pha awh, ami awmnaak khawi ipkhan na ce kaai uhy. Cawhkaw ak awmkhqi taw, Piter, Johan, Jakob ingkaw Mathai, Alpheaus a capa Jakob ingkaw Zealot tinawh amik khy Simon, Jakob a capa Juda, vetloek ve awm uhy.
Cekkhqi ingkaw nukhqi, Jesu a nu Meri ingkaw a naakhqi mi kawlung kutoetna thahlynaak ing cykcah unawh kutoetna awm uhy.
Ce nyn awh ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ak khuiawh Piter taw dyi nawh, (ami cu boeihna siim ingkaw a thong law uhy),
“Koeinaakhqi, thlang a kut awh Jesu ak peekung Juda akawng awh, syn awh Ciim Myihla ing David am khaawh anak kqawn Cakciim awi ce a soep aham awm hy-
anih ce ningnih anglakawh paa lawt nawh ve a bibi awm ana bi lawt hy,” tinak khqi hy.
(Cek thlang ing a khawboe seet phu a huh ing lo hun ce thlai hy; cawh ce ak chut tling na tla nawh, ak phoen ce pawk nawh ak khqikhqi awm a lengna cawn boeih hy.
Jerusalem awh ak awmkhqi boeih ing ce awithang ce za unawh, ce a lo hun ce a mimah ak awi na, 'Akeldama,' ti unawh, cetaw, 'Thi khawhun, tinaak ni.)
Saam cauk awh vemyihna qeena awm hy, ‘Anih a awmnaak ce thlang ing cehta seitaw ak khuiawh uawm koeh awm seh nyng,’ ti ingkaw, ‘Sawikung anihnaak thlang chang ing ham seh nyng,' ti ce.
Cedawngawh Bawipa Jesu ning lakawh a ceh a awm khuiawh,
Johan a baptisma ak kqannaak awhkawng Jesu khawk khan na a kaai dy nangmih anglakawh ak awm poepa ak khui awhkaw a thawhtlaihnaak anik sim pyi khqi hamna thlang pynoet a awm ngaih hy,’ tihy.
Cedawngawh thlang pakkhih: Joseph ami ti Barsabbas (Justa tinawh awm khy bai uhy) ingkaw Matthia, ce hoep uhy.
Cekcoengawh, “Bawipa, nang, thlak kawlung boeih ak simkung, ve ak thlang pakkhih ak khuiawh nang ing nak tyh ce nim huh khqi lah,
Juda ing a cehtaak vawhkaw ceityih bibi ak bi hamna,” tinawh cykcah uhy.
Cekcoengawh cekqawi ing taicung ce zyk nih saw Matthia ak khanawh tla hy; cedawngawh anih ce ceityih thlanghqa hlaioet ak noet sih uhy.
Pentecost nyn a pha awh hun pynoet awh kutoet na awm boeih uhy.
Kawlhkalh awh khawhli awi amyihna khan nakawng awi ce law nawh a mingmih ang ngawihnaak ipkhui ce be khyp hy.
Cawh thlang pynoet qip ak khanawh lai amyihna ak awm mai ce hu uhy.
Cekkhqi boeih ce Ciim Myihla ing be unawh Myihla ing a pau sak amyihna awihchang na pau uhy.
Cawh khawnghi ak kai awh ak awm Khawsa ak kqih Juda thlangkhqi boeih boeih ce Jerusalem awh awm uhy.
Cek awi ce a ming zaak awh thlang khawzah cun law unawh, thlang boeih ing ce amik awi pau ce amimah ak awina aming zaak awh amik kawpoekna kyi hy.
Thlang boeih ing kawpoek kyi ngaihang doena, “Toek lah uh, vawhkaw awikhqi ve Galili awi boeih am nu?
Ikawtinawh ni thangpyi awi amyihna ning zaak hy voei?
Thlang vang Parthia khaw, Media ingkaw Elam khaw awhkaw ak awmkhqi; thlang vang taw Mesopotamia, Judah ingkaw Kapadocia, Pontus ingkaw Asia qamawh ak awmkhqi,
Thlang vang bai taw Phrygia ingkaw Pamphylia, Izip ingkaw Libya qam Cyqene khaw keng awhkaw thlangkhqi, Rom khawawh ak awmkhqi ingkaw
(Judakhqi ingkaw Juda phung ak hqutkhqi); Crete ingkaw Arab thlangkhqi na ni awm hlai uhy – Khawsa ak kawpoek kyi ik-oeih sai ve nimah ak awi na ning za boeih thai ve!” ti uhy.
Thlang boeih amik kawpoek kyi ing, a kawnglam am zasim thai unawh, “Veve ikawmyih hly hy voei nu? ti unawh doet qu uhy.
Cawh thlang vang ingtaw qaihnakkhqi unawh, “Misur zuk thai ak quikhqi ni,” ti uhy.
Cehlai Piter taw thlanghqa hlaioet khqi mi dyi unawh, anih ing khawteh na ak awi y nawh awi kqawn hy, “Nangmih Juda khawkthlangkhqi ingkaw Jerusalem awh ak awm thlangkhqi boeih aw, ve ve sim unawh kak kqawn ve ngai lah uh.
Vekkhqi ve nangmih ing namik poek amyihna, zu am qui uhy. Tuhawh mymcang khawnoek kow ni a law hun hy!
Vetaw tawngha Joel ing anak kqawn ceni:
“Khawnghi a dyt tym awh ce, Khawsa ing, thlang boeih ce kang Myihla ing syp kawng nyng saw, nami capakhqi ingkaw nami canukhqi ing awi khypyi kawm uh. Cadawngkhqi ing hatnaak hu kawm usaw, pacawngkhqi ing mang han kawm uh.
Ka tamnaa pakhqi ingkaw ka tamnaa nukhqi ak khan awhawm kang Myihla syp kawng nyng saw, ka awi kqawn kawm uh.
Khawhii awh kawpoek kyi themkhqi ingkaw, deklai kaiawh hatnaakkhqi ce nim huh kawng nyng; Thi, mai ingkaw maikhu ing dang sak kawng nyng.
Bawipa a khawnghi bau ingkaw boeimangnaak ce a pha hlanawh, Khawmik ce than kawmsaw, pihla ce thi na thoeng kaw.
Cawh u awm Bawipang ming ak khy boeih taw hulna awm kaw,’ a tice ni.
“Nangmih Israel thlangkhqi aw, ve ve ngai lah uh: Nazareth Jesu ce Khawsa ing dyihpyi nawh nangmih a venawh kawpoek kyi them ing hatnaakkhqi ce sai law sak hy, namimah ingawm sim uhyk ti.
Anih ce Khawsa ing khaw khan oepchoeh nawh a sim oepchoeh hawh amyihna, nangmih a kut awh peek nace awm hy; cawh nangmih ing thlakchekhqi ak bawngnaak ing anih ce thinglam awh khing nawh him uhyk ti.
Cehlai anih ce Khawsa ing thihnaak awhkawng thawh sak tlaih nawh, thihnaak ingkaw khy am kqangnaak ak khuiawh kawng loet sak hawh hy, kawtih thihnaak ing anih ce am tu khak thai hy.
David ing ak awi kqawn nawh, “Ka haiawh Bawipa ce hu poepa nyng. Ka ngai ama hangnaak aham kak tang benawh awm hy.
Cedawngawh kak kawlung ve zeel nawh kam lai ve ak kaw zeel hy; Ka pum awm ngaih-unaak ing hqing kaw,
Ikawtih nang ing phyi khuiawh am nik khawng hyt kawm tiksaw, Nak thlang ciim ce thuh zip aham am ngaih kawp ti.
Nang ing hqingnaak lam ce nani sim sak hawh a dawngawh; Na haiawh zeelnaak ing ni be sak kawp ti,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Koeinaakhqi, pakdam David a kawng ve ak kqih kanaa nami venawh kqawn law nyng; anih ce thi nawh, phyi khui byihna awm hawh hy, ak phyi awm tuhdy ni venawh awm poe hy.
Anih taw tawngha na awm nawh, Khawsa ing a venawh awikam nawh amah a ngawihdoelh awh a cadil thlang pynoet ngawih sak kaw tinawh awi a taak ce sim hy.
Ni hai benawh ak awm law hly kawi ik-oeih ce a sim oepchoeh a dawngawh, anih ce phyi khuiawh am khawng hyt kawmsaw, a pum awm am thu kaw, tinawh Khrih a thawh tlaihnaak akawng ce anak kqawn oepchoeh hawh hy.
Cawhkaw Jesu ce Khawsa ing thawh sak tlaih nawh, cawhkaw ik-oeih ak simpyikung dyihthing na kaimih ve awm unyng.
Pa ak tang benawh zoeksangna awm nawh, Pa ing awi ataak Ciim Myihla ce hu hawh hy, nami huh naming zaak ve ing syypna awm nawh ni.
David ce khawk khan na am kaai hy, anih qoe ing, “Bawipa ing ka Bawipa venawh: 'Kak tang benawh ngawi lah.
Na qaalkhqi ce na khawtloeng na ka taak hlan dy,” tinawh anak kqawn hy.
Cedawngawh Israel thlangkhqi boeih ing ve ve sim lah uh: Nangmih ing thinglam awh nami taai Jesu ce Khawsa ing Boei ingkaw Khrih na sai hawh hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Thlangkhqi ing ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh, amik kawlung awh sun amyihna za unawh, Piter ingkaw ceityihkhqi venawh, “Koeinaakhqi ikawmyihna nu ka mi ti kaw?” tinawh doet uhy.
Piter ing, “Thawlh zut unawh taw, thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak aham, Jesu Khrih ang ming awh baptisma hu boeih uh. Cawhtaw Ciim Myihla themzoe peek ce hu kawm uk ti.
Vawhkaw awikamnaak vetaw na mimah aham, nami cakhqi ham ingkaw ak hla nakaw ak awm thlangkhqi boeih – Bawipa nangmih a Khawsa ing ak khy thlangkhqi boeih aham ni,” tinak khqi hy.
Awih chang khawzah ing a mingmih a venawh ngaihtaaknaak awi kqawn pek khqi hy; a mingmih a venawh, “Vawhkaw ak plam cadilkhiq anglak awhkawng na mimah ingkaw na mimah ce hul qu lah uh,” tinawh kqawncaih pek khqi hy.
Anih ak awih kqawn ak dokhqi boeih ing baptisma ce hu uhy, ce a nyn awh ce thlang thong thum ing sap khqi hy.
Ceityihkhqi a cawngpyinaak awi ce ngai unawh pawlnengnaak ce ta uhy, phaihpi thek unawh cykcah uhy.
Thlang boeih kqihnaak ing be unawh ceityihkhqi ing kawpoek kyi hatnaakkhqi ce sai uhy.
Ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih ing them pynoet na cuut uhy.
Ami khawhthemkhqi ce zawi unawh, ak voethlauh thlangkhqi ce pe uhy.
Myngawi na bawkim awh cun poepa uhy. Im awh phaihpi ce teei unawh kawlung kutoet cana zeelnaak ing ai haih uhy,
Khawsa ce a mim kyihcah coengawh thlang boeih ak kawngaih na khaw sa uhy. Hulnaak ak hukhqi ing Bawipa ing a mingmih ce myngawi na sap khqi hy.
Khaw hypoet awhtaw Piter ingkaw Johan taw khawmy ben khawnoek pakthum, cykcah tym a pha awh bawkim na cet hy nih.
Cawh a nu ak phoen khui awhkawng ak kheemna ak thang thlang pynoet ce bawkim na kawt unawh ak leek soeih chawmkeng a keng awh ta uhy, anih ing ce myngawi bawkim khuina ak cetkhqi venawh kut dun poepa hy.
Anih ing Piter ingkaw Johan bawkim khui ani lut tawm awh ce hu qawi nawh, cekqawi a venna tangka thoeh hy.
Piter ingkaw Johan ing anih ce toek ceet nih nawh Piter ing, “Kainih ve ni toek qawi lah!” tina hy.
Ce ak thlang ing ik-oeih ani pek hly ngaih-uu doena hak toek hy.
Cehlai Piter ing, “Sui ingkaw tangka am ta nyng, cehlai ka taak dyn ve ni pe vang nyng: Nazareth Jesu ang ming ing na khaw ing cet,” tina hy.
Cawh ak tang ben kutawh tu nawh thawh saw a khaw ingkaw am khuk ce nep pahoei hy.
A khaw ing pet nawh cet pahoei hy. Cekqawi mi bawkim khuina ang pet doena Khawsa ce kyihcah nawh lut pahoei hy.
A ceh doena Khawsa am kyihcah ce thlang boeih ing ami huh awh,
ak leek chawmkeng a kengawh ngawi nawh kut ak dun thlang ni, tice sim unawh, ak khan awh them ak pha law ce ami huh awh kawpoek kyi sak unawh aming ngaihna aa sak uhy.
Cawhkaw kut ak dun thlang ing Piter ingkaw Johan ce am tu huili awh, thlang boeih amik kawpoek kyi nawh, Solomon Imhloeih benna kawng dawng law uhy.
Cekkhqi ce Piter ing a huh awh, a mingmih a venawh, “Israel thlangkhqi aw, kawtih naming ngaih a kyi hy voei? Kainih ing ka nimah a saithainaak, am awhtaw, Khawsak thlang na kani awm a dawngawh, vawhkaw thlang ve ak ceh sak thai amyihna nami ni toek uh?
Abraham, Isaak, Jakob ingkaw pakdamkhqi a Khawsa ing a tyihzawih Jesu ce zoeksang hawh hy. Nangmih ing anih ce him aham nami peek, Pilat ing anih ce hlah aham ngaih hlai hy, nangmih ing anih a haiawh maa uhyk ti.
Thlak ciim ingkaw thlak dyng ce qoeng unawh, thlang ak him ce hlah aham thoeh lat uhyk ti.
Hqingnaak kung ce him hlai uhyk ti, Khawsa ing anih ce thihnaak khui awhkawng thawh tlaih hawh hy. Kaimih ve dyihthing na awm unyng.
Ang ming cangnaak ak caming, vawhkaw thlang nangmih ing nami huh nawh nami sim ve qoei hawh hy. Jesu ang ming ing amah a venawh kawng ak law cangnaak ak caming ing ve ak thlang ve, nangmih boeih ing nami huh amyihna, qoei hawh hy.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih anik hquikungkhqi ing am sim unawh ami sai amyihna, nangmih ingawm a sim kaana sai uhyk ti, tice sim nyng.
Cehlai Khawsa ing a tawnghakhqi boeih a venawh anak kqawn hyt, Khrih ing khuikhanaak hu kaw, tice vemyihna soep sak hy.
Cedawngawh nami thawlhnaak a ciimnaak a hamna zut unawh taw, Khawsa benna hlat lah uh, cawh ni Khawsa ven nakaw simqunaak ce pha law thai kawm saw,
Jesu Khrih, nangmih aham a hoep ce awm a tyih law hly thai hy.
Syn awh a tawngha ciimkhqi venawh awi ataak ce hawh amyihna, Khawsa ing ik-oeihkhqi boeih a sai pangnaak a tym a pha hlan dy taw, anih ce khawk khan awh awm hyn kaw.
Ikawtih Mosi ing, ‘Bawipa nangmih a Khawsa ing nangmih aham kai amyihna ak awm tawngha pynoet ce nangmih anglak awhkawng awm law sak kaw; anih ing ak kqawn law boeih ce ngai pe kawm uk ti.
U awm anih ak awm amak ngai ak thlang taw ak thlangkhqi ak khui awhkawng qoeng bat kaw,’ tinawh anak kqawn hy.
Oeih, Samuel awhkawng kqan nawh tawnghakhqi boeih ing, ami nak kqawn hawh amyihna, tuh tloek awhkaw ik-oeih ve anak kqawn oepchoeh hawh uhy.
Nangmih ve Khawsa ing tawnghakhqi ingkaw nami pakdamkhqi mi ami na sai awikamnaak qo ak pangkungkhqi na awm uhyk ti. Abraham a venawh, ‘Nang a cadilkhqi ak caming khawmdek thlang boeih ing zoseennaak hu kawm uh,’ ana tina hy.
Khawsa ing a bibikung ce am thawh tlaih awh, thawlh lam awhkawng nangmih ce ning hlat sak khqi nawh zoseennaak peek aham lamma cyk na nangmih a venawh tyi law hy,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ingkaw Johan ing thlangkhqi venawh awi anik kqawn hui awh, khawsoeihkhqi, bawkim temkungkhqi ingkaw Sadusikhqi ce law uhy.
Thihnaak awhkawng ak tho tlaih Jesu ak caming ceityih qawi ing thlang cawngpyi nih nawh awi anik khypyi ce am ngaih uhy.
Cedawngawh Piter ingkaw Johan ce tu unawh, khaw a my hawh adawngawh a khawngawi mymcang dy thawngim khuina thla qawi uhy.
Cehlai awi amak ngai thlang khawzah ak khuiawh ak kuum ngai ing cangna unawh; thlang mi na thongnga tluk pung uhy.
A khawngawi awh ukkungkhqi, a hqamcakhqi ingkaw anaa awi qeekungkhqi ce Jerusalem awh cun uhy.
Khawsoih boei khyt Ana, Kaiapha, Johan, Alexander ingkaw khawsoeih boei khyt a cakaw paqeng thlak changkhqi awm cawh awm lawt uhy.
Piter ingkaw Johan ce khy sak unawh doet uhy: “Hana kaw saithainaak, a u ang ming ing nu ve a themkhqi ve na ni sai?” tina uhy.
Cawh Piter taw Ciim Myihla ing be nawh: “Ukkungkhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi!
Tuhngawi awh khawkkhem a venawh qeennaak sainaak awh ikawmyihna a qoeinaak tice kqawn aham nami nik khy awhtaw,
nangmih ingkaw Israel thlangkhqi boeih ing sim lah uh: Nangmih ing thinglam awh tai hlai uhyk ti, Khawsa ing thihnaak awhkawng am thawh tlaih, Nazareth Jesu Khrih ang ming ing, nangmih a hai awhkaw ak dyi ve qoei hy.
Anih taw, nangmih im ak sakungkhqi ing nami qoeng lung ce, a kil awhkaw lung khoeng a phu tlo soeihna coeng hy,” a ti ceni.
“Hulnaak ve hana awm am awm qoe qoe hy, khawnghi ak kaiawh nangmih hul thainaak aham thlanghqing anglakawh ming qoe qoe am awm hy,” tina hy.
Piter ingkaw Johan a qaal leeknaak ce ami huh awh, ca amanik sim, thlang mailai ni, tice ami sim awh amik kawpoekna kyi hy, cehlai cekqawi ce Jesu venawh anik awm ni, tice sim uhy.
Cehlai khawkkhem ak qoei thlang cawh ak dyi ce ami huh awh ikaw awi awm ap kqawn uhy.
Cekqawi ce Sunhedrin ak khui awhkawng ami ceh sak coengawh, a mimah ce doet qu uhy.
“Vekqawi ve ikawmyihna nu ni sai lah voei? Jerusalem khawk khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih ing vawhkaw kawpoek kyi them ani sai ve sim hawh uhy, ningnih ingawm amni oelh thai hy.
Cehlai ve ak awi a thang khawnghak hlanawh, ve ang ming ing awi ama nik kqawnnaak voel aham kham pe u sih,” ti uhy.
Cekcoengawh cekqawi ce khy tlaih unawh, Jesu ang ming ing awi kqawn nawh thlang ama cawngpyi voel aham kqawn pe uhy.
Cehlai Piter ingkaw Johan ing, “Khawsak awi ngai anglakawh nangmih ak awi ngai ve nu Khawsa haiawh a thym bet kaw, nangmih ing poek lah uh.
Kainih ingtaw ka ni huh ingkaw ka ning zaakkhqi ve ak kqawn kaana am awm thai ti kawng nih nyng,” tina hy nih.
Cekkqawi ce kqih am hqin unawh hlah uhy. Ce akawnglam ak camawh thlang boeih ing Khawsa ce a mim kyihcah dawngawh, cekqawi ce ikawm a tina qawi uhy.
Cawhkaw khawkkhem ak qoei thlang ce kum phlikip hlai law hawh hy.
Cekqawi ce ami hlah coengawh, Piter ingkaw Johan taw ani pyikhqi venna cet tlaih nih nawh Khawsoih boeikhqi ingkaw a hqamcakhqi ing amik kqawn peek ce zaak sak khqi hy nih.
Cekkhqi ing a ming zaak awh awi pynoet na y unawh Khawsa venawh cykah uhy. “Sawsang soeih Bawipa, nang ing khawk khan, khawmdek, tuicunli ingkaw ak khuiawh ak awmkhqi boeih ve sai hyk ti.
Namah a tyihzawih, kaimih a pa David am kha awhkawng, Ciim Myihla ing nang ingawh: ‘Ikawtih thlangphyn ahoei amik kaw so nawh, phu amak awmna khaw ami khan hy voei?
Khawmdek sangpahrang khqi ingkaw ukkungkhqi ing kutoet na Bawipa ingkaw Khrih ce kalh uhy,’ tinawh awi kqawn hyk ti.
Herod ingkaw Pontia Pilat ing Gentelkhqi, Israel thlangkhqi mi kutoet na nang a tyihzawih thlak ciim Jesu, nang ing situi na syp ce him aham ve khawk bau khuiawh hqum unawh teng uhy.
Ak awm hly kawi nang a sai thainaak ingkaw ngaihnaak ak awm oepchoeh ce cekkhqi ing sai uhy.
Tuh Bawipa, a mingmih am kqih am hqinnaakkhqi ce poek nawhtaw, qaal leek doena nak awi ka mik kqawnnaak thai aham na tyihzawihkhqi ve bawng lah.
Namah a tyihzawih thlak ciim Jesu ing thlaktlo qoei sak thainaak, kawpoek kyi ik-oeihkhqi ingkaw hatnaakkhqi saithainaak aham na kut ce zyng law lah,” tinawh cykcah uhy.
Ceamyihna ami cykcah coengawh, a mingmih a awmnaak hun ce tlai lyk lyk hy. Ciim Myihla ing be unawh, Khawsa ak awi ce qaal leeknaak ing kqawn uhy.
Ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ing kawlung pynoet na ta uhy. U ingawm a taak them ce amah doeng a koena am poek voel unawh ami taakkhqi boeih ce pynoet na qup uhy.
Thaawmnaak ak bau soeih ing ceityihkhqi ing Bawipa Jesu a thawhnaak akawng ce kqawn uhy, qeennaak khawzah ce a mingmih ak khan awh awm hy.
A mingmih anglakawh ak voet ak hlauh thlang am awm hy. Im a lo ak takhqi ing zawi unawh, a phu tangka ce ami haw law coengawh,
ceityihkhqi a khawk kaiawh tloeng uhy. Cawhkaw themkhqi ce a ngoe ngaihnaak amyihna thlang a venawh tei ang paa uhy.
Kupra qam awhkaw Levi thlang Joseph, ceityihkhqi ing Barnaba tinawh amik khy (ak kqawn ngaihnaak taw Thapeek capa, tinaak) ing,
lo a taak ce zawi nawh a huh tangka ce ceityihkhqi a khawkung awh haw law hy.
Ananias ak mingnaak thlang pynoet ing a zu Sapphira ingqawi khawhun ani taak ce zawi hy nih.
A zu a simpyinaak ing tangka a vang ce amah aham a taak coengawh, a vang ce ceityihkhqi a khawkung awh tloeng hy nih.
Piter ing, “Ananias, kawtih setan nak kawlung khuiawh be sak nawh Ciim Myihla ce na thai na latnaak? Khawhun phu tangka a vang ce namah aham ta hyk ti.
Na zawih hlanawh awm namah a koena ni a awm ka ti koenoek? Na zawih coeng bai awh awm tangka ce namah a ngaihnaak amyihna hawna thai tik saw kaw? Ikaw ing nu vemyihna nak kawlung awh bi a bi? Thlang am thaina tiksaw Khawsa ni na thainaak hy,” tina hy.
Ananias ing ce ak awi ce ang zaak awh, tlu nawh thi hy. Ce akawng ak zakhqi boeih ing kqih uhy.
Cawh cadawngkhqi law unawh, a qawk ce ami lawh coengawh, kawt unawh pup uhy.
Khawnoek pathum tluk a awm coengawh a zu cawhkaw akawng ce am sim kana lut lawt hy.
Piter ing, “Nim then lah, khawhun ce tangka ve zah doeng na nu nani zawih tang?” tina hy. Anih ing, “Oeih, ve zah doeng ni,” tina hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Ikawmyihna Bawipa ang Myihla noek adak aham naning zaak qu? Toek lah ce! na va amik pukkhqi a khaw ce chawmkeng awh ni a awm hyn ce, nang awm nik kawt pahoei lawt kawm uh,” tina hy.
Cawh Piter a khawkung awh tlu nawh thi pahoei hy. Cadawngkhqi law unawh, a qawk ce ami huh awh kawt unawh a va ak phyi keng awh pup uhy.
Ce akawng ce thlangboel ingkaw ak zakhqi boeih ing kqih uhy.
Ceityihkhqi ing kawpoek kyi themkhqi ingkaw hatnaakkhqi sai uhy. Ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih ce Solomon Imhloeih awh cun hoeih hoeih uhy.
Thlangkhqi ing a mingmih ce kyih am cah khqi hlai uhy, bawng aham taw kqih laklaw uhy.
Cehlai, pa ingkaw nu thlang khawzah ing Bawipa ce cang nak khqoet khqoet unawh thlang pung a tai khqoet khqoet hy.
Piter a ceh awh ang myihlip ing dah na seh ti unawh, thlaktlokhqi ce lam na law pyi unawh hiphaih ingkaw phakkhqi awh zaih sak uhy.
Jerusalem khaw a kengsam awhkaw khawkhqi awhkawng thlang kqeng law unawh thlaktlokhqi ingkaw qaai ing am tukhqi ce law pyi uhy, cekkhqi boeih ing qoeinaak hu uhy.
Cawh khawsoeih boei ak hqam soeih ingkaw a pyikhqi, Sadusi anglakawhkaw thlangkhqi ce tlai se uhy.
Ceityihkhqi ce tu unawh thawngim khuina thlak khqi uhy.
Cehlai khawmthan awh Bawipa ak khan ceityih ing thawngim chawmkeng ce awng nawh a mingmih ce a leng na sawi khqi hy.
“Cet unawh taw bawkim awh dyi unawh thlang boeih venawh ve hqingnaak awi ve vak kqawn uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Khaw a dai law awhtaw bawkim ak khuina lut tlaih unawh, khan ceityih ing ak kqawn peek amyihna, thlangkhqi ce cawngpyi uhy. Khawsoih boei ak hqam soeih ingkaw a pyikhqi ce ami pha awhtaw Israel a hqamcakhqi ngawih cunnaak – Sanhedrin ce khy unawh thawngim khuiawh kaw ceityihkhqi ce lawh sak khqi ham thlang tyi uhy.
Cehlai thawngim ce ami pha awh, thawnguk boei ing cekkhqi ce am hu voel hy. Hlat tlaih unawh,
“Thawngim awm ak nep na khai qu nawh, thawngim ak qehkhqi awm chawmkeng awh ak nep cana awm uhy; cehlai chawh ka mim awng law awhtaw ak khuiawh u awm am awm voel hy,” tina uhy.
Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh, bawkim ak temkung qaal boei ingkaw khawsoeih boeikhqi ce a mingngaih na kyi hy, “Ikawmyihna a awmnaak hy voei?” ti uhy.
Cawh thlang pynoet ce law nawh, “Toek lah uh! Nangmih ing thawng namik thlak ce bawkim awh dyi unawh thlang cawngpyi uhy,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh qaal boei ce a bibikungkhqi mi cet unawh ceityihkhqi ce lawpyi uhy. Thlangkhqi ing lung ing nik khawng khqi hau kaw ti unawh awih zoei cana lawpyi dym uhy.
Ceityihkhqi ce ami lawpyi coengawh, khawsoeih boei ak hqam soeih ing a doet ham Sanhedrin haiawh khy uhy.
“Ve ang ming ing am nami cawngpyi aham ni yn khqi ceet ceet hawh unyng. Cehlai ve cawngpyinaak ing Jerusalem nami be sak coengawh ve ak thlang a thi awh kaimih ve thawlh puk aham cai uhyk ti,” tina uhy.
Piter ingkaw ak chang ceityihkhqi ing: “Thlanghqing ak awi anglakawh Khawsak awi ni ka ming ngai hly bet hy!
Nangmih a pa a Khawsa ing, nangmih ing thing awh tai unawh nami him Jesu ce, thihnaak awhkawng thawh tlaih hawh hy.
Zutnaak ing thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak ce Israelkhqi venawh a peeknaak thai aham Khawsa ing anih ce ak tang benawh boei ingkaw hulkung na zoeksang hawh hy.
Ve a kawnglam awh ve kaimih taw simpyikung na awm unyng, amah ak awi ak ngaikhqi venawh Khawsa ing a peek Ciim Myihla awm simpyikung na awm hy,” tinak khqi uhy.
Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh, amik kaw so nawh cekkhqi ce him aham ngaih uhy.
Cehlai Gamaliel ak mingnaak Farasi thlang pynoet, anaa awi cawngpyikung, thlang boeih ing ak kqihchah, ce Sanhedrin anglakawh dyi nawh cawhkaw ceityihkhqi ce a leng na ceh sak aham awi pehy.
Cekcoengawh cekkhqi venawh: “Israel thlangkhqi aw, ve ak thlangkhqik khan awh sai aham naming cai ve ak nep na poek lah uh.
Ma awh Theuda ak mingnaak thlang pynoet ing, thlang mailai am amyihna kqawn qu nawh, thlang zali ing hquut uhy. Cehlai anih ce ami him coengawh taw a hubatkhqi awm plal a tham unawh, ikaw na awm am awm cawh uhy.
Anih a awm coeng bai awh, Juda ak mingnaak Kalili phyn thlang pynoet ce thlangmi noetnaak a awm tloek awh awm bai nawh thlang pynoet ce qaal na thawh sak hy. Anih awm him bai unawh a hubatkhqi ce plam boeh boeh uhy.
Cedawngawh, ve a kawnglam awh ve awi kqawn law lah vang nyng: Ve ak thlangkhqi ve ta dym mai uh! Ceh sak khqi mai uh! A mingmih ang cainaak ingkaw ami bibinaak ve thlanghqing a sai na a awm awhtaw plal bit kaw.
Cehlai Khawsa a sai na a awm awhtaw, am hqee thai kawm uk ti; Khawsa ak oelh na ni awm kqoeng hau kawm uh,” tinak khqi hy.
Anih ak awih kqawn ing cekkhqi ce noeng khqi hy. Cekcoengawh ceityihkhqi ce ak khuina khy khqi tlaih unawh vyk khqi uhy. Jesu ang ming ing awi ama mik kqawn voel aham awi amik kqawn peek coengawh hlah khqi tlaih uhy.
Sanhedrin ce ceityihkhqi ing cehta unawh, ce ang ming awh khuikha kyinaak ami huh aham tyng qoe na a awm a dawngawh zeel uhy.
Khawnghi hypoet coengawh hypoet, bawkim awh, im pynoet coeng pynoet awh ang dym kaana thlang cawngpyi unawh Jesu taw Khrih ni ti awithang leek ce khypyi uhy.
Ce tloek awh hubat a pung a tai hqui voe voe awh, them aming paa awh nuhaikhqi ami hlah phlam adawngawh Greek awi na amik pau Judakhqi ing Hebrai awi na ak pau Judakhqi ak khan awh sai bi uhy.
Cedawngawh thlanghqa hlaihih tloek ing hubatkhqi boeih ce khy unawh, “Khawsa ak awikqawn plal nawh aawk ai cabawi awh bi ni bi awhtaw am thym kaw.
Ceamyihna awmsaw, koeinaakhqi aw, na mimah ak khui awhkaw Myihla ingkaw cyihnaak ing ak be thlang khqih awh tyk uh. Vawhkaw bibi ve cekkhqi venawh pe u sih,
cawh ni cykcahnaak ingkaw awikqawn bibinaak benawh ni ngaih hqytnaak hly thai uhy,” tinak khqi uhy.
Ce ak awi aming zaak awh thlangkhqi amik kaw zeel hy. Cedawngawh cangnaak ingkaw Ciim Myihla ing ak be Stephen, cekcoengawh Philip, Pqokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas ingkaw Antiok khaw awhkaw Juda phung na ak hawi qu Nikola ce tyk uhy.
Ce ak thlangkhqi ce ceityihkhqi venna khyn uhy, ceityihkhqi ing ami lu ak khan awh kut tloeng unawh cykcah pek khqi uhy.
Ceamyihna Khawsak awi ce pung a tai hqui nawh Jerusalem khaw awh hubat thlang thlangmi awm pung hqui khqoet khqoet inawh, khawsoeihkhqi ingawm cangnaak awi ce ngai uhy.
Khawsa qeennaak saithainaak ing ak be Stephen ing, thlangkhqi anglakawh kawpoek kyi themkhqi ingkaw hatnaakkhqi ce sai hy.
Cehlai, anih amak ngaih thlangkhqi Tamnaa Loetkhqi, Cyqene ingkaw Alexandria khaw awhkaw khqi, Kilikia ingkaw Asia qam awhkaw Juda thlangkhqi ing Stephen ce oelh uhy.
Cehlai cekkhqi ing a cyihnaak ingkaw awi ak kqawn sakkung Myihla cetaw am oelh thai uhy.
Cedawngawh thlang pynoet venawh, “Stephen ing Mosi ingkaw Khawsa a kqawn seetnaak awi za unyng,” tinawh kqawn aham ang hypna awi yn uhy.
Ceamyihna thlang kqeng ingkaw a hqamcakhqi, anaa awi qeekungkhqi venawh kqawn pe uhy. Stephen ce tu unawh Sanhedrin a haina sawi uhy.
Simpyikung amak thym ta unawh, cekkhqi ing, “Ve ak thlang ing vawhkaw hun ciim ingkaw anaa awi ce ak che che na kqawn hy.
Vawhkaw Nazareth Jesu ing ve im ve hqe kawmsaw Mosi ing a cehtaak phung alamkhqi awm hqe kaw, tinawh ve ak thlang ing ak kqawn awh za unyng,” tina uhy.
Sanhedrin awh ak ngawikhqi boeih ing Stephen ce toek ceet uhy, cawh khan ceityih a haai amyihna a haai ce hu uhy.
Cawh khawsoeih boei ak hqam soeih ing doet hy, “A mingmih a thawlh puknaak ve ak thym aw? tina hy.
Cawh Stephen ing, “Koeinaakhqi ingkaw pakhqi aw, kak awi ve ngai lah uh! Ningmih a pa Abraham ce Haran awh a awm hlan Mesopotemia awh a awm awh, a venawh boeimang Khawsa ce dang pehy.
Khawsa ing, ‘Na qam ingkaw nak thlangkhqi ce cehta nawhtaw kai ing ka ni pek hly qam na ce cet lah,’ tina hy.
Cedawngawh anih ing Khaldea qam ce cehta nawh Haran awh ce awm hy. Apa a thih coengawh, tuh nami awmnaak qam awh ve Khawsa ing tyi hy.
Khawsa ing anih ce qo amna pehy, khawlehnaak tat zani am pehy. Cawh Abraham ing ca kangna zani ta hlan hlai hy, amah ingkaw a cadilkhqi ing qam ve pang kawm uh, tinawh Khawsa ing awi tahy.
Khawsa ing vemyihna awi kqawn pehy: ‘Na cadilkhqi ing thlang a qam awh plam kawm usaw, thlang ing tamnaa na kum zali khuiawh hawna kaw.
Cehlai a mingmih tamnaa na ak hawnaak qam ce kai ing toel kawng nyng saw, ce a qam khuiawh kawng ami loet coengawh ve a hun awh kai ve ni bawk kawm uh,’ tihy.
Cekcoengawh Abraham ce chahhui qeetnaak paipi awikamnaak ce ana sai pyi hy. Abraham ing a ca Isaak ta nawh a thang coeng ak kqeet nyn awh chahhui qeet pehy. Cekcoengawh Isaak ing Jakob tahy, Jakob ing ca pahqa hlaihih tloek ce ana tahy.
Pakdamkhqi ing Joseph ce ana yt unawh, Izip qam na tamnaa na ana zawi uhy. Cehlai Khawsa ce anih a venawh awm nawh,
a kyinaak soepkep ak khuiawh kawng hul hy. Joseph a venawh cyihnaak pe nawh Izip sangpahrang Pharaoh a lungnaak ce huh sak hy; cedawngawh Pharaoh ing Izip qam ingkaw a ipkhui boeih ak khan awh ukkung na tahy.
Cawh Izip qam pum ingkaw Kanaan qam pum awh khawseet khawkhanaak ce pha hy, kyinaak ak bau soeih a pha dawngawh, ni pakhqi ing ai am hu uhy.
Izip qam awhtaw cang awm hy tice Jakob ing ang zaak awh, ni pakhqi ce Izip qam na lamma cyk awh tyi hy.
A hih voeinaak ami ceh awh, Joseph ing a koeinaakhqi venawh amah ce u nu, tice kqawn pek khqi hy, cawhkawng Pharaoh ing Joseph ipkhui kaw ce sim hy.
Cekcoengawh, Joseph ing a pa Jakob ingkaw a cakaw paqengkhqi boeih ce lawh sak nawh, thlang khqihkip coengawh pumha law uhy.
Cedawngawh Jakob ce Izip qam na cet nawh cawh anih ingkaw ni pakhqi ce thi uhy.
Ami qawkkhqi ce Shqekem awh Hamor cakhqi venawh tangka ing ak thlaih phyi awh ce pup uhy.
Khawsa ing Abraham a venawh awi a taaknaak tym ce a soep law tawm awhtaw, Izip qam awh nik thlangkhqi ce ana pung ana tai uhy.
Cawh Joseph akawng amak sim thlang ce sangpahrang na awm nawh, anih ing Izip qam ce uk hy.
Anih ing nik thlangkhqi ce a ngaih ngaih na ana haw nak khqi nawh, naasen khqi ce ami thihnaak aham ni pakhqi ce khawng sak khqi ngah ngah uhy.
Ce tloek awh Mosi ce thang hy, anih taw naasen mailai na am awm hy. Hla thum doeng ni a pa a im awh ami khuut hy.
Anih ce a leng na ami taaknaak kungawh, Pharaoh a canu ing lo nawh amah a capa na hqin hy.
Mosi ce Izipkhqi a cyihnaak boeih ce a cawng sak a dawngawh, awikqawn thai nawh saithainaak awm ta hy.
Mosi kum phlikip a law awh, amah a pyi Israelkhqi hqip aham cai hy.
Thlang pynoet ce Izip thlang ing a the a khanaak ce a huh awh, ce ak thlang ce hul nawh Izip thlang ce him pehy.
Khawsa ing anih hawna nawh cekkhqi hul hy tice ak thlangkhqi ing sim kaw tinawh Mosi ing poek hy, cehlai cekkhqi ing am sim uhy.
A khawngawi nyn awh Israel phyn qawi thlang pakkhih anik kqak qu ce hu hy. Cekqawi ce qoep qu sak aham a ngaih a dawngawh, ‘Nangnih ve koei a naa nani nani awm hy; kawtih nanik kqah qu?’ tina qawi hy.
Cehlai a pyi ak khan awh a khawboe ak se ing Mosi ce buk nawh, ‘U ing nu kainih ak khan awh ukkung ingkaw awidengkung na ani taak?
Zan awh Izip phyn na him amyihna kai awm ni him vang nati nawh aw? tina hy.
Ce ak awi ce Mosi ing ang zaak awh, Midian qam na cen hy, cawh khin na awm khing nawh cakpa pakkhih tahy.
Kum phlikip a loet coengawh, Sinai Tlang a venawh kaw kqawng awh thingbup mai na ak kqawng awhkawng khan ceityih ing Mosi a venawh dang pehy.
Mosi ing a huh awh, ce a huh ce ang ngaihna kyi hy. Ak zoe awhkawng toek vang, tinawh a pan awh, Bawipa ak awi ce zahy;
‘Kai taw na pakhqi a Khawsa, Abraham Khawsa, Isaak Khawsa ingkaw Jakob Khawsa na awm nyng,’ tina hy. Mosi ing kqih nawh am toek voel hy.
Cekcoengawh Bawipa ing a venawh, 'Na khawmyk ce suut; nang dyihnaak a hun ce hun ciim ni.
Izip qam awh kak thlangkhqi ing khuikha ami huh ce hu hawh nyng. A mingmih ang ko ang kqangnaak awi ce za nyng saw a mingmih loet sak aham law nyng. Law lah, Izip qam na ni tyi tlaih vang nyng,' tina hy.
Vawhkaw Mosi zani cekkhqi ing, ‘U ing nu nang ukkung ingkaw awidengkung na ani taak?' tina unawh ana oelh uhy. Cehlai anih ce thingbup awh ak dang peek khan ceityih hawnaak ing Khawsa amah qoe ing a mingmih ukkung ingkaw hulkung aham tyi hy.
Anih ing Izip qamawh, Tuili Sen ingkaw qamkoh awh kum phlikip khui kawpoekkyi them sainaak ingkaw hatnaakkhqi ce huh sak khqi nawh amingmih ce sawikhqi hy.
Vawhkaw Mosi ing Israelkhqi venawh, 'Nangmih ak khui awhkawng kai amyihna ak awm tawngha ce Khawsa ing tyi law kaw,' ana tina hy.
Anih ce qamkoh awh thlang kqeng anglakawh, Sinai Tlang awh a venna awi ak kqawn peekkung khan ceityih ingqawi awm haih hy nih, ni pakhqi mi awm haih uhy; ningnih a venawh kqawn peek patoe aham awih hqing ce anih ing hu hy.
Cehlai ni pakhqi ing ak awi ce am ngai pe uhy. Anih ce oelh lat unawh amik kawlungkhqi ce Izip benna hawi sak uhy.
Aaron a venawh, ningnih a haiawh ak cet aham khawsakhqi sai law. Izip qam awhkawng ningnih anik sawikung Mosi ve – ikawmyihna a awm hy voei amni sim voel hy! tina uhy.
Cawh vaitaw ca myihlip ce ana sai uhy. A mimah a kut sai a venawh bulnaak sai unawh awmhlynaak ce sai uhy.
Cedawngawh Khawsa ing a mingmih ce hawi taak khqi nawh, khawnghi nakaw ik-oeihkhqi bawk aham cekkhqi ce pehy. Tawnghakhqi a cauk awh: “Aw Israelkhqi aw, kum phlikip khui qamkoh awh kai a venawh bulnaak ingkaw them peek aham nami haw law nawh nu?
Nangmih ing bawk aham nami sai, Molek a bawkthang ingkaw na mimah a khawsa Rephah a aihchi ceni nami zoeksang hy. Cedawngawh Babilon a voel benna tamnaa na ni tyi khqi kawng nyng, tinawh ana qee ingqawi cah qu boek hy.
Ni pakhqi ing qamkoh awh a mimah anglak lawawh simpyinaak hi im ce ana ta uhy. Cawhkaw hi im taw Mosi a venawh Khawsa ing huh nawh am huh amyihna sa uhy.
Khawsa ing Josua sawinaak ak caming a haiawh kaw qam khuiawh ak awmkhqi ce ahqek peek coengawh, hi im ce ni pakhqi ing khyn uhy. David khuk dyna ce hi im ce awm hyn hy.
Ce David taw Khawsak a huhlynaak hunawh Jakob Khawsa a awmnaak hun sak peek aham ana thoeh hy.
Cehlai Solomon ing ni im ce a sak peek hy.
Cehlai sawsang soeihawh ak awm Khawsa ce thlanghqing a kut sai im awh am awm hy.
Khawk khan ce ka ngawihdoelh na awm nawh, khawmdek ve ka khaw tloengnaak na awm hy. Ikawmyih im nu nang ing na sak law kaw? tinawh Bawipa ing' tihy. Am awhtaw kang dymnaak hun ce han awh nu a awm kaw?
Kai a kut ing ni vemyihkhqi boeih ve a sai ka ti my? tinawh tawngha ing ak kqawn amyihna.
Nangmih thinsah, kawktal hakpangkhqi! Nami pakhqi amyihna awm boek uhyk ti: Ciim Myihla ce oelh quiqah uhyk ti!
Nami pakhqi ing a mami thekhanaak tawngha u nu a awm? Thlakdyng ak law hly anak kqawn oepchoehkhqi ce awm ana him uhy. Nangmih ing anih ce thlang a kut awh thak unawh him uhyk ti.
Khan ceityihkhqi ak caming anaa awi ce hu toengloeng hlai uhyk ti, am ngai sai laklaw uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh amik kaw so nawh Stephen ce ami ha tah sih uhy.
Cehlai Stephen ce Ciim Myihla ing be nawh, khan ben ang mangawh Khawsa a boeimangnaak ingkaw Khawsa ak tang benawh ak dyi Jesu ce hu hy.
Stephen ing, “Toek lah, khawk khan awng qu nawh, Khawsa ak tang benawh ak dyi Thlanghqing Capa ce hu nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh a mingha ce byp unawh, khawteh na amik khy coengawh, a venna ce dawng uhy.
Khaw voel na sawi unawh lung ing thlak uhy. Cawh dyihthing na ak awmkhqi ing cadawng Saul a khawkung awh a hibai khqi ce taak pe uhy.
Anih ce lung ing amik thlak awh, “Bawipa Jesu, kang myihla ve do lah,” tinawh cykcah hy.
Cekcoengawh koep nawh, “Bawipa vekkhqi a thawlhnaak ve koeh thung kawp ti,” tinawh khy hy. Ve ak awi ak kqawn coengawh ip pahoei hy.
Saul awm cawh awm nawh, anih a thihnaak ce tyng hy ti pyi khqi lawt hy. Ce tloek awh Jerusalem khaw awhkaw thlangboel ce ami the ami khanaak a dawngawh, ceityihkhqi kqawn kaana thlang boeih ce Juda qam ingkaw Samaria qam na poeng boeih uhy.
Khawsak thlangkhqi ing Stephen ce pup unawh amik kaw se hy.
Cehlai Saul ingtaw thlangboel ce hqe hy. Im pynoet coeng pynoet awh cet nawh, pa ingkaw nukhqi ce am tu coengawh thawngim na thlak khqi hy.
Ak cenkhqi ing ami phanaak a hoei awh awi ce khypyi uhy.
Philip ing Samaria khaw pynoet awh cet nawh Khrih akawng ce kqawn hy.
Thlang kqeng ing Philip ak awi ce za unawh kawpoek kyi them a sai ce ami huh awh, anih ak awih kqawn ce ak nep cana ngai pe uhy.
Khy doena qaaichekhqi ce thlang ak kawk khuiawh kawng cawn uhy, ak khawnkhqi ingkaw khaw ak khemkhqi ing qoei uhy.
Ce a dawngawh ce a khawk khuiawh kaw thlangkhqi ce zeel soeih uhy.
Ce a khawk khuiawh Simon ak mingnaak thlang pynoet ing miklet sai nawh Samaria thlangkhqi ce amik kawpoek ana kyi sak lawt hy. Amah ingkaw amah ce thlang mailai am amyihna kqawn qu hy,
cedawngawh thlang boeih, thlak nem thlang sang ing ak awi ce ngai pe unawh, “Ve ak thlang ve khawsa a saithainaak Bau ami ti, ceni ve,” ti uhy.
Anih ing miklet ing cekkhqi ce a ming ngaih a kyi sak hawh a dawngawh cekkhqi ing a hu awh hqut uhy.
Cehlai Philip ing Khawsa qam ingkaw Jesu Khrih ang ming ak khypyi ce a ming zaak awh cangna unawh nu na pa na baptisma ce hu uhy.
Simon amah ingawm cangna nawh baptisma ce hu lawt hy. Cedawngawh Philip a cehnaak a hoei awh ce bat nawh kawpoek kyi them a saikhqi a huh awh ak kawpoek kyi soeih hy.
Jerusalem awh amik awm ceityihkhqi ing Samari awhkaw thlangkhqi ingawm Khawsak awi ce cangna hawh lawt uhy tice a ming zaak awh Piter ingkaw Johan ce tyi uhy.
Cekqawi ce ani pha awh,
Ciim Myihla ce a mingmih ak khan awh pha hlan hy; Bawipa Jesu ang ming awh baptisma doeng ni ami huh hyn hy.
Piter ingkaw Johan ing cekkhqik khan awh kut tloeng pe nih nawh, cekkhqi ing Ciim Myihla ce hu uhy.
Ceityihkhqi a kut tloengnaak ak caming Ciim Myihla ami huh ce Simon ing a huh awh, cekqawi a venawh tangka pe nawh,
Kai ing kut ka tloeng peek thlang ing Ciim Myihla a huhnaak lawt aham, cawhkaw saithainaak ce kai a venawh ni pe lawt lah nih,” tina qawi hy.
Piter ing, “Khawsa a kutdo ce tangka ing thlaih aham nak poek a dawngawh, na tangka ingqawi plam bawk nih!
Khawsa haiawh nak kawlung ama thym a dawngawh, ve a bibinaak awh ve nang a sai kawi ikaw awm am awm hy.
Vawhkaw them amak leek nak poeknaak ve zut nawhtaw Bawipa venawh cykcah lah. Ceamyihna nak kawlung nak poeknaak ce Bawipa ing qeenkhaw ang ngai law khoem awh hoeih doeng.
Nainaak kawlung ing be tiksaw thawlhnaak ing nim tu hawh hy tice hu nyng,” tina hy.
Cawh Simon ing, “Nak kqawnkhqi ce kak khanawh a mang tlaaknaak aham, Bawipa venawh cykcahnaak ta law lah,” tina hy.
Bawipak awi ce thlang a venawh sim sak nih nawh anik khypyi coengawh, Samari khaw khawzah awh awithang leek ce anik khypyi doena Piter ingkaw Johan ce Jerusalem na hlat hy nih.
Bawipa ak khan ceityih ing Philip a venawh, “Khan ben lam na ce cet lah - cetaw qamkoh lam na awm nawh – Jerusalem awhkawng Geza na cehnaak lam na awm hy,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh anih ce cet hy, lam awh Ethiopia khawpa boei ingqawi hqum hy nih, anih taw Ethiopia sangpahrang nu Kandaki a khawhthem ak khoemkung na awm hy. Anih ce Jerusalem na Khawsa ak bawk aham cet hy,
im na ang hlat awh meqang awh ngawi nawh tawngha Isaiah cauk ce noet hy.
Myihla ing Philip a venawh, “Cawhkaw meqang a venna cet nawhtaw a venawh awm pe lah,” tina hy.
Philip ce meqang leng a venna dawng hy, cawh ce ak thlang ing tawngha Isaiah ak cauk a noet ce za hy. “Na noet ce nak zasim nu? tinawh Philip ing doet hy.
Anih ing, “U ing amak kqawn caih law ce ikawmyihna kang zaak simnaak thai kaw?” tina hy. Cedawngawh Philip ce khy nawh kutoet na ngawi haih hy nih.
Cakciim a noet taw: “Him aham ak awm tuu amyihna sawi unawh, a myi ak vok peekkung a haiawh ak awm dym tuucamyihna, anih ing am kha am ang hy.
Chahqai na amak thym na awideng uhy. U ing nu a cadilkhqi kawng ce ak kqawn thai kaw? Khawmdek awhkawng a hqingnaak ce ami lawh peek a dawngawh,” a tive noet hy.
Ce boei ing Philip ce doet hy, “Qeennaak ing kqawn law lah, tawngha ing ve u akawng nu ak kqawn, thlang akawng nu ak kqawn?” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh Philip ing cawhkaw cak ciim awi ing Jesu ak awithang leek ce kqawn pehy.
Lam ani ceh haih awh ce, tui a awmnaak hun pha nih nawh ce a boei ing, “Toek lah tui vawh awm hy ve. Baptisma am ka hu hly thai nawh nu?” tina hy.
Philip ing, “Nak kawlung boeih ing nak cangnaak awhtaw hu hly thai hyk ti,” tina hy. Cawh boei ing, “Jesu Khrih taw Khawsa Capa ni ti cangna nyng,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh meqang ce dym sak hy. Cekcoengawh Philip ingkaw boei ce tui a awmnaak na cet nih nawh Philip ing baptisma ce pehy.
Tui a awmnaak awhkawng a ni hang law tlaih awh ce, Bawipa Myihla ing Philip ce ak chang na khyn valh hy, cedawngawh ce a boei ing anih ce am hu voel hy, cehlai zeel doena a khaw benna ce cet poe hy.
Philip ce Azota khaw awh dang tlaih nawh Si a khaw a pha hlan dy lam awhkaw khaw a hoei awh ce awithang leek khypyi hy.
Ce tloek awh, Saul ing Bawipa a hubatkhqi ce him aham teng poepa hy. Khawsoih boei khyt a venna cet nawh,
Damaska khaw awhkaw sinakawk na ceh thainaak ak ca ce thoeh hy, cawh lam awhkaw thlangkhqi ce a huh awhtaw, nu awm pa awm tu nawh Jerusalem thawngim na khyn aham cai hy.
Damaska khaw a pha tawm lam awh, khawk khan nakaw vangnaak ak bau soeih ing anih ce coei qawngtheng hy.
Dek na tlu nawh awi ing, “Saul, Saul ikaw tinawh nu kai nani thekhanaak?” tina hy.
Saul ing, Nang u nu, Bawipa? tina hy. Awi ing, “Na thekhanaak Jesu kai ni.
Tuh tho nawhtaw khawk khuina cet lah, cawh na sai hly kawi ce kqawn law bit kaw,” tina hy.
Saul mi amik cet haih thlangkhqi ce awimyh na dyi hqoeng uhy; awi taw za lawt hlai uhy, thlang taw am hu uhy.
Dek awhkawng Saul ce tho hy, cehlai a mik dai saw ikaw awm am hu thai hy. Cedawngawh anih ce a kut awh tu unawh Damaska khawk khuina sawi uhy.
Khaw thum voei a mik hyp nawh buh awm am ai hy.
Damaska khaw khuiawh Ananias ak mingnaak hubat thlang pynoet awm hy. Bawipa ing anih ce huh saknaak ing, “Ananias” tinawh khy hy.
Bawipa ing, “Lam dyng awh ak awm Juda a im na ce cet nawhtaw, Tarsu khaw awhkaw Saul ak mingnaak thlang ce doet lah, anih ce tuh cykcah hui hy.
Anih ing huh saknaak awh Ananias ak mingnaak thlang ing a mik ang dangnaak thai aham ak khan awh kut tloeng peek aham a law ce hu hawh hy,” tina hy.
Ananias ing, “Bawipa, ve ak thlang ing Jerusalem khaw khui awhkaw nak thlak ciimkhqi a thekhanaak akawng a mik kqawn khawzah za nyng.
Khawsoih boeikhqi venawh kawng saithainaak ce lo nawh nang ming ak kqawnkhqi boeih ce tu aham vena law hy,” tina hy.
Cehlai Bawipa ing Ananias a venawh, “Cet! ve ak thlang ve Gentelkhqi ingkaw a sangpahrangkhqi ingkaw Israel thlangkhqi haiawh kang ming ak khypyi aham tyk hawh nyng.
Kang ming ak camawh khuikhanaak iqyt nu a huh kaw, tice kai ing huh bit kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh taw Ananias ce im na cet nawh ipkhui na lut hy. Saul ak khan awh a kut tloeng pe nawh, “Ka na Saul, vena na law awh lam na na venawh ak dang Bawipa Jesu ing – na mik ang dangnaak tlaih aham ingkaw Ciim Myihla ing na benaak aham kai ve ni tyi hy,” tina hy.
Cawh Saul a mik awhkawng a khel amyihna tla nawh, a mik ce dang tlaih hy. Tho nawh baptisma hu pahoei hy.
Buh a ai coengawh, ak tha awm tlaih hy. Hubatkhqi mi Saul ce Damaska khaw khuiawh khawqyt awm hy.
Jesu ve Khawsa Capa ni tinawh sinakawkkhqi awh kqawn pahoei hy.
Anih ak awi a mik zakhqi boeih ce a mik kawpoek kyi nawh, “Anih ve Jerusalsem khaw khuiawh ve Jesu ang ming ak kqawnkhqi boeih ak thekhanaak thlang amyihna awm hlai hy ti? Cekkhqi ni khawsoeih boeikhqi venawh thawng awh thlaak aham ni vena a law?” ti uhy.
Cehlai Saul taw ak tha awm hqui khqoet khqoet hy, Jesu taw Khrih ni tice dyihpyi nawh, Damaska khaw awh ak awm Judakhqi ce noeng khqi hy.
Khawnghi khawqyt ca a awm coengawh, Judakhqi ing him aham teng uhy,
cehlai cekkhqi ang cainaak ce Saul ing sim hy. Khawmthan khawdai anih him thainaak aham vawng chawmkengkhqi awh mah uhy.
Cehlai a hubatkhqi ing khawmthan awh ceh pyi unawh, vawng ak khan nakawng vaihqang awh nuk thla dym uhy.
Jerusalem a pha awh, hubatkhqi mi huh qu aham sui hy, cehlai cekhqi ing kqih uhy, hubat am tang vani hy voei tinawh poek uhy.
Cehlai Barnaba ing ceh pyi nawh ceityihkhqi venna khyn hy. Saul ing lam awh Bawipa a huhnaak ingkaw Bawipa ing a venawh awi ak kqawn peek akawng ingkaw Damaska khaw awh kqihnaak a taak kaana Bawipang ming ing awi ak kqawn akawng khqi ce kqawn pek khqi hy.
Cedawngawh Saul taw cekkhqi venawh awm nawh Jerusalem khaw khuiawh ngaihding na thoek hy, Bawipang ming ing qaalleeknaak ing awi ce kqawn hy.
Greek awi na amik pau Judakhqi mi oelh qu unawh awi ce kqawn pek khqi hy, cehlai cekkhqi ing anih ce him aham ngaih uhy.
Koeinaakhqi ing ce akawng ce ami sim awh, anih ce Kaiserea khaw na nu ceh pyi uhy, cekcoengawh Tarsu khaw na tyi uhy.
Cekcoengawh taw Juda qam, Kalili qam ingkaw Samari qam awh amik awm thlangboelkhqi ce ngaihding na awm uhy. Ciim Myihla ing a mingmih ce thaawm sak hy; tha pe nawh pung a tai khqoet khqoet uhy, Bawipa kqihnaak ing khaw sa uhy.
Piter ce khaw lawngkhqi na cet nawh, Lydda khaw awhkaw thlak ciimkhqi hqip aham cet hy.
Cawh ce Ainea ak mingnaak thlang pynoet, khaw kup kqeet amak tho thai khawkkhem ce hu hy.
Piter ing a venawh, “Ainea, Jesu Khrih ing ni qoei sak hawh hy. Tho nawhtaw na hi ce khyn hlah,” tina hy. Cawh Ainea ce tho pahoei hy.
Lydda ingkaw Shaqon awh ak awm thlangkhqi boeih ing ami huh awh Bawipa benna hawi uhy.
Joppa khaw awh Tabitha ak mingnaak hubat thlang pynoet awm hy (ve ve Dorka tinawh leh uhy); anih taw ik-oeih leek ak sai ingkaw khawdeng khuikhakhqi ak dawm ak hlaikung na awm hy.
Ce tloek awh anih ce tlo nawh thi hy, a pum ce ami silh coengawh ip khanna ta uhy.
Lydda khaw taw Joppa khaw awhkawng zoe ca hy; hubatkhqi ing Lydda khaw awh Piter awm hy ti a ming zaak awh, thlang pakkhih tyi unawh, “Ang tawnna law cang lah!” tinawh qeennaak thoeh sak uhy.
Cekkqawi a hu ce Piter ing hqut nawh, a pha awhtaw anih ce ak khan ipkhui na ceh pyi uhy. Nuhaikhqi boeih ing anak chung unawh kqang uhy, Dorka ing cekkhqi mi ami awm haih awh a mingmih aham a sai peek quikhqi ingkaw hikhqi ce huh uhy.
Piter ing cekhqi boeih ce ipkhui awhkawng ceh sak khqi hy; cekcoengawh khuk sym nawh cykcah hy. Nu ak thi benna ce mang nawh, “Tabitha tho hlah,” tina hy. Cawhkaw nu ing a mik ce dai law hy, Piter ce ahuh awh tho nawh ngawi hy.
Piter ing a kut awh tu nawh thawh hy. Cekcoengawh ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ingkaw nuhaikhqi ce khy nawh cekkhqi a venawh ak hqing na pek khqi tlaih hy.
Ce ak awi ce Joppa khaw khuiawh thang khawnghak nawh thlang khawzah ing Bawipa ce cangna uhy.
Joppa khaw awh Piter taw mehvyn ak khqui Simon a im awh khawnghi iqyt nu awm hy.
Kaiserea khaw awhkaw thlang pynoet, Kornelia ak mingnaak ce awm nawh, anih taw Italy qalkap zakhat ak ukkung na awm hy.
Anih taw a ipkhui kaw boeih ing Khawsa kqih unawh amik bawk thlangkhqi na awm uhy; ak voet ak hlauh thlangkhqi ce bawm khqi nawh Khawsa venawh ak cykcah poepa thlang na awm hy.
Hypoet awhtaw khawngkeng khawnoek pakthum a pha awh hatnaak ik-oeih hu hy. Khawsa ak khan ceityih ce law nawh a venawh, “Konelia!” tina hy.
Konelia ing ak kqih doena toek ceet hy. “Bawipa ikaw?” tinawh doet hy. Khan ceityih ing, “Nak cykcahnaak ingkaw khawdeng hahqahkhqi na do na dannaak ce Khawsa haiawh simpoenaak ham pha hawh hy.
Piter tinawh amik khy Simon ce khy tlaih aham tuh Joppa khaw na thlang tyi lah.
Anih ce mehvyn ak khquikung Simon a im awh awm hy, anih a im taw tuicunli a keng awh awm hy, tina hy.
A venawh awi ak kqawnkung khan ceityih ce a ceh coengawh Konelia ing a tyihzawih thlang pakkhih ingkaw a tyihzawih awi ak ngai qalkap pynoet ce khy hy.
Ik-oeih a huh ingkaw ang zaak khqi boeih ce ak kqawn peek coengawh Joppa khaw na cekkhqi ce tyi hy.
A khawngawi nyn awh cet unawh khawk bau ami pha tawm khawnghyp awh lam na ce, Piter taw iptih na cykcah aham kai hy.
Cawh ak phoen cawi nawh ai kawi pynoet oet ai aham ngaih hy, buh ami lawh peek li awh, huh saknaak ik-oeih ce hu hy.
Khan ak awng qu ce hu nawh hi a kil pupthli awh khan nakawng ik-oeih anuk thlaak law peek ce hu hy.
Ce ak khuiawh ce khaw pupthli ak law qamsa soepkep ce awm nawh, dek awh ak cawlh ak tat ingkaw khan nakaw ak ding phakhqi awm awm hy.
Cawh awi ing a venawh, “Piter tho, him nawhtaw ai,” tina hy.
Piter ing, “Am ai hly nyng, Bawipa! Amak ciimcaih ingkaw tuih ak cu ikawm am ai khawi nyng,” tina hy.
Awi ing a hih voeinaak awh, “Khawsa ing a ciim sak ce nang ing am ciim hy koeh ti,” tina hy.
Vemyihna thum voei dy a awm coengawh, hi ce khawk khan na dawh pe hy.
Piter ing cawhkaw ik-oeih a huh ce ikaw hy voei nu, tinawh ak poek huiawh, Konelia ak thlang tyihkhqi ing Simon a im ce hu unawh vawng chawmkeng awh ce dyi uhy.
Piter tinawh amik khy, Simon ce im awh ak awm nu tinawh doet uhy.
Piter ing a them huh ce anak poek huiawh, Myihla ing a venawh, “Simon, thlang pakthum ing nang ni sui uhy.
Cedawngawh tho nawhtaw ipkai na nuk kqum lah. Cekkhqi hu awh bat aham koeh tawngaa, kai ing ni cekkhqi ce ka tyih law hy,” tina hy.
Piter ce nuk kqum nawh cekkhqi venawh, “Nangmih ing nami sui ce kai ni. Ikaw cainaak ing nami aw?” tinak khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ing, “Kaimih ve qalkap zakhat ukkung Kornelia a im awhkawng law unyng. Anih taw thlakdyng ingkaw Khawsa ak kqih thlang na awm hy, cedawngawh Juda thlangkhqi boeih ing anih ve kqihchah uhy. Nang ak awihkqawn ngai aham khan ceityih ciim pynoet ing nang khy aham kqawn pehy,” tina uhy.
Cawh Piter ing cekkhqi ce ipkhui na khy nawh pah sak hy. Cedawngawh a khawngawi nyn awh tho nawh cekkhqi mi cet haih uhy, Joppa khaw awhkaw koeinaakhqi awm cet lawt uhy.
A khawngawi nyn awh Kaiserea khaw ce pha uhy. Kornelia ing anih ce a na lamtoen nawh a cakaw paqengkhqi ingkaw a pyipawkhqi boeih ce kutoet na khy khqi hy.
Piter ce ipkhui na a lut awh, Kornelia ing do nawh a khawkung awh kqihchahnaak ing khuksym pehy.
Cehlai Piter ing thawh sak tlaih nawh “Kai awm thlanghqing lawt ni,” tina hy.
Awi anik kqawn coengawh Piter ce ipkhui na lut nawh cawh ipkhui na thlang khawzah ak awm ce hu hy.
Cekkhqi venawh: “Juda thlang ingkaw Gentel thlang awm haih aham am ciim hy tice sim uhyk ti; cehlai u awm ciimcaih hy, am ciimcaih hy, niti kawi am ni tice Khawsa ing ni sim sak hy.
Ce a dawngawh thlang na minik khy law sak awhkawng a oelh kana law nyng. Cehlai ni doet khqi nyng, ikaw ham nanu nami nik khy?” tinak khqi hy.
Cawh Korelia ing, “Ni hu hitphli awh ce, ve atym khawngkeng khawnoek pakthum awh ka mah a im awh cykcah nyng. Cawh hi ak vang soeih ak bai thlang pynoet ce ka haiawh dyi nawh,
ka venawh, “Kornelia, nak cyhcahnaak ce sim peekna awm nawh, thlang venawh na them peek awm Khawsa ing sim hawh hy.
Ceamyihna awmsaw Joppa khaw na thlang tyi nawhtaw Piter ak mingnaak Simon ce khy sak. Anih ce tuicunli a kengawh ak awm, mehvyn ak khquikung, Simon a im awh khin na awm hy,” ni tina hy.
Cedawngawh thlang tyi lawk tlang nyng, law tiksaw leek soeih hy. Tuh Bawipa ing kaimih a venawh anik kqawn sak khqi boeih ce ngai aham Khawsa haiawh cun law boeih unyng,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh taw Piter ing awih kqawnnaak ce kqan hy, “Khawsa ing u a hai awm am toek hy tice tuh sim hawh nyng,
amah ak kqih ingkaw ak thymna bi ak sai qampum awhkaw thlang boeih ce do hy.
Israel thlangkhqi venawh Khawsa ing awi pehy, thlang boeih a boei, Jesu Khrih ak caming ngaihqepnaak awithang leek ak kqawn peek ce nangmih ing sim uhyk ti.
Johan ing baptisma ak khypyi coengawh, Kalili qam awhkawng kqan nawh Judah qam pum awhkaw ik-oeih ak awm ce –
Khawsa ing Ciim Myihla thaawmnaak ing Nazareth Jesu a sypnaak akawng ingkaw Khawsa ingqawi a awm haih a dawngawh, qaaiche ak thaawmnaak ak kaiawh ak awmkhqi ce qoei sak nawh them leek a saikhqi ce sim uhyk ti.
Judakhqi qam ingkaw Jerusalem khaw khuiawh a sai ik-oeihkhqi boeih ak simpyikung dyihthing na kaimih ve awm unyng. Anih ce thing awh tai unawh him uhy,
cehlai Khawsa ing anih ce thihnaak awhkawng am thum nyn awh thawh sak tlaih nawh thlang a huh awh dang sak hy.
Thlang boeih ing anih ce am hu hy, cehlai Khawsa amah ing ak tyh oepchoeh dyihthing na ak awm, thihnaak awhkawng a thawh coengawh amah ingqawi buh a an ak ai haih kaimih ing hu unyng.
Thlak hqing ingkaw thlak thi awideng aham anih doeng ni Khawsa ing a caksak hy, tice khypyi aham ingkaw sim sak aham kaimih ve awi ni pek khqi hy.
U awm amah ce ak cangnaak thlang boeih ing amah ang ming ak caming thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak hu kaw, tice tawnghakhqi boeih ing anak kqawn hawh uhy,” tinak khqi hy.
Piter ing ve ak awikhqi ve ak kqawn li awh, awi ak zakhqi boeih ak khan awh Ciim Myihla ce law hy.
Gentelkhqik khan awh awm Ciim Myihla kutdo ce syp sihna a awm awh Piter ingkaw amik law haih chahhui ak qeet ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ce amik kawpoek kyi hy.
Cekkhqi ing amsim awi na pau unawh, Khawsa a mim kyihcah ce a ming zaak awh a mingngaihna kyi hy. Cekcoengawh Piter ing,
“U ing nu vekkhqi ve tui ing baptisma ama peek aham a kham peek thai kaw? Kaimih ing ka mi huh lawt amyihna a mingmih ingawm Ciim Myihla ve hu hawh lawt uhy,” tina hy.
Cekcoengawh cekkhqi ce Jesu Khrih ang ming ing baptisma huh aham awi pehy. Cekkhqi ce khawnghi iqyt nu awm pyi cang aham Piter a venawh thoeh uhy.
Ceityihkhqi ingkaw Juda qam pum awh ak awm koeinaakhqi ing Gentelkhqi ingawm Khawsak awi do hawh lawt uhy tice za uhy.
Cedawngawh Piter ce Jerusalem na a ceh awh, chahhui qeet ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ing coet uhy,
“Chahhui amak qeet thlangkhqi venna cet nawh a awk a ai,” tina uhy.
Piter ing cawhkaw ik-oeih akawng ce cekkhqi venawh ak ceet cana kqawncaih pek khqi hy.
Joppa khaw awh awm nyng saw kak cykcah huiawh, huhsaknaak ce hu nyng. Hi ak bau soeih amyihna ak awm a kil pupthli ak law ik-oeih pynoet ce, kai ka awmnaak hun awh khan nakawng tla law hy.
Ce ak khui ce ka toek awh dek awhkaw a khaw pupthli ak awm qamsa soepkep ingkaw ak cawlh ak tat qamsakhqi khan nakaw phakhqi ce hu nyng.
Cawh awi ing ka venawh, ‘Piter, tho lah. Him nawhtaw ai,’ ni tina hy.
Kai ing, “Am ai hly nyng! Amak ciim caih ingkaw tuih ak cu ikawm kam khak khuiawh am lut man hy,” tina nyng.
Khawk khan nakaw awi ing a hih voeinaak awh, ‘Khawsa ing a ciim sak ce, ce nang ing am ciim hy koeh ti,’ ni tina hy.
Cemyihna thum voei dy a awm coengawh, cawhkaw ik-oeih ce khan na lo law tlaih hy.
Cawhce Kaiserea khaw awhkawng a tyih law thlang pakthum ce ka awmnaak im awhkaw vawng chawmkeng awh dyi uhy.
Ciim Myihla ing kawhaa a taak kaana cekkhqi hu awh bat aham kqawn hy. Vawhkaw koeinaakhqi thlang kquk awm law lawt uhy. Cekcoengawh amik khy law sakkung thlang a im awh ce lut unyng.
Ce ak thlang a im awh khan ceityih dang pe nawh, ‘Joppa khaw awh Piter tinawh amik khy Simon ce khy sak.
Anih ing namah ingkaw na ipkhuikaw boeih thlang na na awmnaak hly kawi awithang ce haw law bit kaw’ a tinaak awi ce kaimih a venawh kqawn law hy.
Cawh, awi kak kqawn cyk awhkawng, Ciim Myihla nik khanawh a pha law cyk awhkaw amyihna amik khanawh pha law hy.
Cawh Bawipa ing, ‘Johan ing tui ing baptisma ce ni pek khqi hlai hy, nangmih ingtaw Ciim Myihla baptisma hu kawm uk ti,’ a tice poek lawt nyng.
Bawipa ing ningnih ani peek khqi lawt amyihna Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak cangnaak cekkhqi a venawh awm cawhkaw kutdo ce a peek awhtaw, kai ve a u na nu ka awm nawh Khawsa ce oelh aham kak poek kaw? tinak khqi hy.
Ce ak awi ce a ming zaak awh coetnaak taak voel kaana Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy, “Cawhtaw Khawsa ing Gentelkhqi awm hqingnaak huh aham zut sak khqi hawh lawt hy ce,” ti uhy.
Stephen thekhanaak awhkawng amik pek qukhqi ce Phonicia, Kupra ingkaw Antiok khawkhqi na cet unawh Juda thlangkhqi ven doeng awh awithang leek ce kqawn pe uhy.
Cehlai a mingmih anglakawhkaw Kupra ingkaw Cyqene khaw awhkawng ak law thlang vang tloek ce Antiok khaw na cet unawh Greek thlangkhqi venawh awm Bawipa Jesu ak awithang ce kqawn pe uhy.
Bawipa a kut ce a mingmih a venawh a awm dawngawh, thlang khawzah ing cangna unawh Bawipa benna hawi uhy.
Amingmih ak awithang ce Jerusalem awh ak awm thlangboelkhqi ang haa awh awithang na za uhy. Cedawngawh Barnaba ce Antiok khaw dy na tyi uhy.
Anih ce pha nawh Khawsam qeennaak ce a huh awh, kawlung boeih ing ak cak cana Bawipa awh awm poe aham zeel doena cekkhqi ce tha pek khqi hy.
Barnaba taw thlak leek na awm nawh, Ciim Myihla ingkaw cangnaak ing ak be thlang na awm hy. Cedawngawh thlang khawzah ce Bawipa venna sawi khqi hy.
Cekcoengawh Saul sui aham Barnaba ce Tarsu khaw na cet hy,
anih ce a huh awh, Antiok khaw na ce law pyi hy. Cedawngawh kum oet khui Barnaba ingkaw Saul ing thlangboel khuiawh thlang khawzah ce cawngpyi hy nih. Hubatkhqi ce Antiok khawawh lammacyk na “Khrihcakhqi” tinawh khy uhy.
Ce tloek awh tawngha thlang u tloek nu Jerusalem awhkawng Antiok khawna cet uhy.
Cekkhqik khuiawh kaw Agaba ak mingnaak thlang pynoet ce dyi nawh Myihla simsaknaak ing Rom uknaak qam boeih awh khawkhanaak pha law kaw, tinawh khypyi hy. (Cawhkaw khawkhanaak ce Klaudia a boei vengawh pha hy.)
Hubatkhqi ing a mimah a mina khoek awh Judah awh ak awm koeinaakhqi ce pyi khqi aham kqawn uhy.
Cawhkaw pyinaak kutdo ce a hqamcakhqi ing Barnaba ingkaw Saul a kut awh pat pe uhy.
Ce tloek awh kut thlak aham a ngaih dawngawh, Herod sangpahrang ing thlangboel khuiawh kaw thlang pynoet ce tuhy.
Anih ing Johan a na Jokop ce cimca ing him hy.
