Cedawngawh koeinaakhqi namik kaw caksak uh, Khawsa awh cangnaak ka taak dawngawh ak kqawn law amyihna awm ngai ngai bit kaw.
Han a tuilak cung awh num taw ni taai lawk khqi ngai ngai bit kaw,” tinak khqi hy.
Khawnghi hqanyn awh ak phlinaak khawmthan awh Adriatic Tuicunli awh khawhli ing ani zawn khqi hui awh, thanlung awh lawng ak mawngkungkhqi ing hanawh kaw ceng nu zoe law voe voe hawh hy tinawh sim uhy.
Tui tahnaak ing tui ce ami tah awh dawng kqetkip dung hy. A khoeh a awm awh ami tah tlaih awh dawng khqukkip dung bai hy.
lawng ing lungnu su hau kaw ami ti dawngawh, a kingnaak thi koeiloen pupthli ce thla unawh khawkdai ce cykcahnaak ing qeh unyng.
Lawng awhkawng loet aham ami ngaih dawngawh, lawng ak mawngkhqi ing lawng ce tui awh nuk thla uhy, lawng ami kingnaak thi koeiloen amik nuk thlak amyihna sa qu unawh nuk kqum uhy.
Cawh Paul ing qalkap zakhat ukkung ingkaw qalkapkhqi venawh, “Ve ak thlangkhqi ve lawng awh ama mi awm mai mantaw, am loet hly tang uhyk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh qalkapkhqi ing lawng ami kingnaak qui ce tlyk boet unawh lawng ce tui awh hlah hqoeng uhy.
Khaw a dai law tawm awhtaw Paul ing cekkhqi boeih ce buh ai aham kqawn pehy. “Ni hu khawnghi pahqa hlaihphli khuiawh, buh a ai kaana ngaihkyi kawboet ing awm uhyk ti.
Tuh awhtaw buh ai hlah uh. Buh nami ai awh ni khawnghi nami khah hly. Nangmih ak khuiawh u ingawm nami lu awhkaw lusam pin pynoet zani am hqui kawm uk ti,” tinak khqi hy.
Cemyihna awi ak kqawn peek khqi coengawh, phaihpi ce lo nawh a mingmih boeih a haina Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn hy. Cekcoengawh phaihpi ce thek nawh ai uhy.
Cawh aming ngaih ding boeih nawh thlang vang ing buh ce ai uhy.
Lawng awh ak ngawikhqi boeih taw thlang 276 law unyng.
Buh ak phyi na ami ai coeng awhtaw, lawng ce a zangnaak bet aham cang ce tui awh khawng uhy.
Khaw a dai law awhtaw, han a hun awhkaw dek hy voei nu tice am sim hlai uhy, dizui ce hu uhy. Cedawngawh ang coeng thai awhtaw cawhkaw ceng awh lawng ce dym sak aham cai uhy.
A kingnaak quikhqi tlyk unawh tuicunli awh cehta hyt uhy, Cekcoengawh lawng ami kaihnaak quikhqi awm hlam boeh boeh uhy. Zilh a law hawi unawh lawng ce ceng benna zawn sak uhy.
Cehlai lawng ing ceng awhkaw dizui ce su hy. Lawng a lu ing dizui ce a suk a dawngawh am tat thai voel hy, cehlai lawng a huben taw tuih tha a awm aih dawngawh ek boeh boeh hy.
Thawng ak tlakhqi boeih ce tui awh zo unawh cen kanglak kawm uh, ami ti dawngawh qalkapkhqi ing him boeh boeh aham cai uhy.
Cehlai qalkap zakhat ak ukkung ing Paul ce hlyn aham a ngaih dawngawh cekkhqi ing aming cainaak ce kham pek khqi hy. Cedawngawh u awm tui ak zo thai taw lawng awhkawng ceng na tui awh ami zo aham awi pek khqi hy.
Thlang vang tloek bai taw a vang thingpen ak khan ingkaw lawng ak keek awh awm aham awi pehy. Ceamyihna sai unawh thlang boeih ing ak soep cana ceng ce pha uhy.
Ceng ami pha boeih awhtaw, cawhkaw tuilak cung ce Malta tuilak cung ti uhy, tice sim unyng.
Ce a tuilak awh ak awmkhqi boeih ing kaimih ce ni toek ni teng khqi uhy. Kaimih aham mai tih law unawh aawm unyng, khaw a nawh khaw ding hy.
Paul ing thikkohkhqi ce boem nawh mai awh a tih awh ak chy ak ngan khqui ce maih hlawk ang zaak awh ce cawn law hy, Paul ce a kut awh cuk nawh bat hy.
Ce a tuilak cung awh ak awmkhqi ing Paul a kut awhkaw khqui ak bat ce ami huh awh, “Ve ak thlang ve thlang ak him vani hy voei, tui awhkawng taw loet hawh hlai hy, amak thym phu suinaak ing a hqing am ngaih nawh ni ve,” ti uhy.
Cehlai Paul ing khqui ce mai awh phum nawh a tlawh am za qoe hy.
Thlangkhqi ingtaw a kut ce hling kaw, tlu law kawmsaw thik tlang kaw tinawh poek uhy, cehlai ami qeh khing awh awm Paul taw ikawmyihna awm am awm hy, cawhtaw amik kaw ce thaw unawh anih ve khawsa va ni hy voei tinawh poek uhy.
Ce a tuilak cung awh boei na ak awm Publiu a dum ce ce a venawh awm hy. Anih ing kaimih ce nik khy khqi nawh a im awh khaw thum voei ani awm sak khqi awh ak leek cana ni toek ni teng khqi hy.
A pa ce tlo nawh zaih hy, a sa tlo nawh tumthe awm tlo hy. Paul ing anih a venna cet hy, cykcahnaak taak pe nawh ak khan awh a kut a tloeng peek awh qoei hy.
Cawhkaw ik-oeih ce ami huh awh, ce tuilak cung awh amik awm thlak chang boeih awm law unawh qoeinaak hu uhy.
A mingmih ing kaimih ce nim kyihcah khqi uhy, cet hlah u sih ka mi ti awh kaimih a ngoengaihnaakkhqi boeih ce toen law uhy.
Hla thum a di coeng awhtaw, ang ming phir, Alexandria khaw awhkaw lawng, chikca awhkawng tuilak cungawh ak awm hawh, ce a lawng ing cet unyng.
Sirakuse khaw na thoeng unyng saw, cawh ce khaw thum voei awm unyng.
Ce a khaw awhkawng cet tlaih bai unyng saw Rhegium khaw pha bai unyng. A khawngawi nyn awh kham benna kaw khaw ce hli law nawh cawhkaw a khawngawi nyn bai awh Puteoli khaw ce pha unyng.
Ce a khaw awh koeinaakhqi thlang vang ce awm uhy, a mingmih ing khaw khqih nyn awm pyi aham kaimih ce nik khy khqi uhy. Cawhkawng ce Rom khaw na cet unyng.
Cawhkaw amik awm koeinaakhqi ing kaimih law hy ti aming zaak cawh, Appia hun awhkaw ik-oeih zawihnaak ingkaw savang im pakthum a awmnaak hun dyna kaimih ce ni do khqi uhy. Cawhkaw thlangkhqi ce Paul ing a huh awh Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn nawh ang ngaih qep hy.
Rom khaw ka mi pha awh, Paul taw qalkap pynoet ing doen nawh amah poek awh awm thainaak ce pe uhy.
Khaw thum voei a awm coengawh Paul ing Juda thlang sawikungkhqi ce khy hy. Cekkhqi boeih ce ami law awh, Paul ing cekkhqi venawh: “Koeinaakhqi, nik thlangkhqi ing ami nu pa a phung ak kalh na ikaw awm am sai hlai nyng, Jerusalem khaw awh nim tu unawh Romkhqi kut awh ni pe uhy.
Cekkhqi ing awi a mini deng awh thihnaak khoek na thawlhnaak ikaw am ka sai dawngawh hlah aham ni ngaih uhy.
Cehlai Judakhqi ing am ngaih unawh, Kaisara a ven pha aham kai ing thoeh nyng. Kak thlangkhqi ak khan awh thawlh puk aham amni.
Vawh nangmih mi hu qu unawh awi kqawn aham nik khy khqi nyng. Israelkhqi ang ngaih-unaak awh ni kai ve thiqui ing khih na ka awm,” tina hy.
Cekkhqi ing, Nang akawng awh ce Judah nakawng capat am hu unyng, cekcoengawh ce nakawng amik law koeinaa u ingawm nang a seetnaak ikaw ap kqawn hlan uhy.
Cehlai nang a huhnaak ikawmyihna a awmnaak tice zaak aham ngaih unyng, a hun hoei awhkaw thlangkhqi ingtaw vawhkaw thlangboel ak thai na ak awm ve ak che ngai na kqawn uhy,” tina uhy.
Khaw hypoet awh Paul ing hqum aham awi amik kqawn awh, Paul a awmnaak im awh thlang khawzah ce law uhy. Mymcang awhkawng khawmy dy na cekkhqi venawh Khawsa qam awithang leek ce ak kqawn peek awh Mosi a anaa awi ingkaw tawnghakhqi ak cauk awhkawng Jesu akawng ce aming zaksimnaak aham kqawn pek khqi hy.
Ak awihkqawn awhkawng thlang a vang ingtaw am cang na uhy.
A mimah ce oelh qu unawh, a hukhit na Paul ing vawhkaw awi ve ak kqawn awhtaw voei uhy: “Ciim Myihla ing nami pakdamkhqi venawh Isaiah hawnaak ing awitak ce vemyihna anak kqawn hy:
Ve thlangkhqi venawh cet nawhtaw, Za hlai voei uk ti am zasim kawm uk ti; hu hlai voei uk ti, am hat kawm uk ti.
ikawtih vekkhqi ak kaw ve qep aih nawh; aming hakhqi ingawm am za thai uhy, ami mik ce him uhy. Cemyih am mantaw hu kawm usaw, za kawm uh, kawlung ing zasim kawm usaw hlat kawm uh, cawh kai ing qoei sak khqi hy kawng,’ tihy.
Cedawngawh Gentelkhqi venawh Khawsa a hulnaak ce pha hawh nawh, a mingmih ing ngai kawm uh, tice nami sim aham ngaih nyng,” tinak khqi hy.
Ve ak awi ak kqawn awh, Judakhqi ce a mimah ingkaw a mimah aming oelh qu doena cet uhy.
Khaw kum hih khui cawh ce Paul ing im vat nawh awm hy. A venna ak law thlangkhqi boeih ce ak nep cana do hy.
Qaal leeknaak ing ak kangkung a awm kaana Khawsa qam a kawng ce ak kqawn awh Jesu Khrih akawng ce cawngpyi hy.
Paul, Jesu Khrih a tyihzawih, tyihzawih hamna ak khy, Khawsa Awithang leek kqawn hamna ak khy ing,
cawhkaw awithang leek taw Cakciim awh amah a tawnghakhqi hawnaak ing ak cyk ca awhkawng a taak hyt awi ceni,
pumsa ben awhtaw David a cadil na ak awm, amah a capa akawng ce,
thihnaak awhkawng a thawhnaak ak caming, ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih taw Khawsa capa ni tinawh thaawmnaak ing ciimcaihnaak Myihla ing kqawn hy.
Anih ak caming ang ming awh, cangnaak ak caming ak awingainaak ak khuiawh thlangkhqi ing a mi kun thainaak aham Gentel thlangkhqi khy aham am qeennaak ing ceityih bibi ve ni hu uhy.
Nangmih awm Jesu Khrih thlang na awm lawt aham ak khy khqi anglakawh paa lawt uhyk ti.
Khawsa ing lungna nawh thlak ciimcaih na awm hamna ak khy Rom khaw awhkaw thlangkhqi boeih a venawh: Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih a venawh kaw ngaihdingnaak ingkaw am qeennaak nangmih Rom khawawh ak awmkhqi boeih a venawh awm seh.
Lamma cyk awh, nangmih ak cangnaak akawng ce khawmdek pum awh amik kqawn dawngawh, nangmih boeih awh ce Jesu Khrih ak caming Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn nyng.
Kak kawlung boeih ing a Capa ak awithang leek khypyi nyng saw a bi ka bi peekkung, Khawsa ing cykcahnaak ka taaknaak a hoei awh nangmih am nim hilh khqi qoe qoe nyng tice sim nyng,
a hukhit awh nangmih a venna ka lawnaak thai aham Khawsa ing chawh am awng lawnaak aham cykcah nyng.
Myihla kutdo a vang a phal awm ni pek khqi nawh namik tha a awmnaak thai aham nami huh aham ngaih soeih nyng;
pynoet ingkaw pynoet cangnaak benawh thaawmnaak ni taaknaak aham ngaih nyng.
Gentel thlangkhqi venawh ak thaih kak bih hawh amyihna, nangmih anglakawh awm kak bihnaak thai aham, law aham cai khing hawh hlai nyng (tuhdy anik kangkung awm khak hy) tice, koeinaakhqi, a sim kaana awm ham am ni ngaih khqi nyng.
Greek thlangkhqi ingkaw Greek thlangkhqi am a venawh awm, thlakcyikhqi ingkaw thlakqawkhqi venawh awm sai hly kawi ta khak nyng.
Cedawngawh maw Rom khaw awh amik awm nangmih a venawh awm awithang leek kqawn aham ka ngaih khak lawt mah hy.
Awithang leek awh chahnaak am ta nyng, ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih hulnaak a hamna Khawsa ak thaawmnaak na a awm dawngawh: lammacyk awh Judakhqi ahamna awm nawh cekcoengawh Gentelkhqi ahamna awm hy.
Awithang leek awh Khawsa venawh kawng ak dyng pynoet ce dang hawh hy, “Thlakdyng taw cangnaak ing hqing kaw,” tinawh qee ce amyihna, ak cyk ca awhkawng a dytnaak dyna cangnaak ing dyngnaak ce awm hawh hy.
Khawsa amak simkhqi ingkaw khawboe seetnaak ing thlang ak thekhanaak thlakche khqik khanawh khan benna kawng Khawsa ak kawsonaak ce dang noe noe hawh hy,
Khawsa ing ak zoei cana a sai peek khqi dawngawh, a mingmih ing Khawsa a mi sim thainaak aham zoei cahy.
Ikawtih khawmdek a syn cyk ca awhkawng sim thai na amak awm Khawsa a saithainaak, kumqui thaawmnaak ingkaw a Khawsa nihnaak ce, ak ceet cana dang hawh hy, a them saikhqi awh zaaksim thainaak awm hawh nawh, thlanghqing ing oelh thainaak a lam am awm hy.
Khawsa ce sim hlai uhy, Khawsa amyihna am kyihcah unawh zeelnaak awi awm ap kqawn uhy, themche poeknaak ing amik kawlung be nawh, amik kawmikna hyp hy.
Thlakcyi na ngai qu hlai uhy, thlakqaw na awm uhy,
amak see thai Khawsa a boeimangnaak ce ak see thai thlanghqing, phakhqi, qamsakhqi ingkaw ak cawlhthaikhqi a myi amyihna sai uhy.
Cedawngawh Khawsa ing a mimah thawlh ngaihnaak amyihna pynoet ingkaw pynoet a pum ce chahqai na a awmnaak aham nu pa thawlh sainaak amak ciimcaih benna pehy.
Khawsa awitak ce a hqawng ah qapna coeng sak unawh, ak saikung anglakawh a sai them ce bawk unawh a bi ce bi pe uhy. Ak Saikung taw ang loetna kyihcah tyng ni. Amen.
Cedawngawh Khawsa ce chahpyih hamna hyyngaihnaak ing mang taak nawh; nukhqi ingawm ami thangpyi khawsaknaak ce amak leek khawsaknaak benna hawi pyi uhy;
cemyih lawtna pakhqi ingawm nukhqi mi ih a awmnaak ce nawn unawh, pa ingkaw pa zaak amak leekna ip a awm unawh ami thawlh phu zaawk kawi ce amimah ing zaawk uhy.
Khawsa simnaak ve ikawna awm ama ming ngai dawngawh, a mimah ak kawlung seetnaak ing sai hly am kawi sainaak benna Khawsa ing a mingmih ce pek khqi hy.
Cekkhqi ce thawlhnaak a soep a hoei, khawboe seetnaak, kamvaanaak ingkaw seetnaak ing be unawh; ytnaak, thlang himnaak, hqonaak, thailatnaak, sawhnaak ing be uhy; thlang theetnaak,
kawsonaak, Khawsa sawhnaak, thlang kawna am huhnaak, thinsahnaak ingkaw oek qunaak ing be uhy; themche sainaak, nu pa ak awi am ngainaak;
kaw amak awmkhqi, cangnaak amak takhqi, lungnaak amak takhqi, qeemmaal amak takhqi na awm uhy.
Cemyih a them che ak saikhqi taw ami thih ham awm hy ti Khawsak awipeek ak awm ce sim hlai uhyk ti, a mimah ing a mi sai doeng am khoek nawh, thlang chang ak saikhqi ce ym pyi uhy.
Cedawngawh, nangmih, thlang awi ak dengkhqi, na mimah awm ap cang lawk uhyk ti, thlang awi nami dengnaak ahoei awh, namah ni na thawlh khqoeng hy, thlang awi ak deng nang ingawm cemyih ni na sai lawt hy.
Cemyih them ak saikhqi ak khanawh Khawsa ak awidengnaak taw awitak awh ni ang dyih hy tice ni sim uhy.
Cedawngawh, nang thlanghqing, namah ing cemyih ik-oeih ce na sai lawt dawngawh thlang awi na deng awh, Khawsa ak awidengnaak khui awhkawng loet tloe kawng nyng, tinawh nak poek nawh nu?
Am awhtaw Khawsam qeennaak ing zutnaak benna ni sawi hy tice a sim kaana, am qeennaak, qeenkhaw ang ngainaak ingkaw ang yh thainaakkhqi ce kawna a huh kaana na awm nawh nu?
Cehlai namik kawlung a hqamnaak ingkaw am nang zutnaakkhqi boeih ce, amah ak awidengnaak ak dyng khawnghi a pha awh, namah aham Khawsa ak kawsonaak ak cun nani na awm khqoeng hy.
Khawsa ing thlang boeih ing ami them sainaak amyihna a phu ce pe kaw.
Them leek sainaak a qoeng kaana boeimangnaak, kqihchah naak ingkaw amak see thai ik-oeih ak suikhqi venawh Khawsa ing kumqui hqingnaak ce pe kaw.
Cehlai amah ak kawngaih doeng sui nawh awitak ak oelhkhqi ingkaw them che ak sai thlangkhqi ham kawsonaak ce awm kaw:
Ik-oeih che ak sai thlangkhqi ham kawseetnaak ingkaw khuikhanaak awm kaw: Judakhqi aham awm maa kawmsaw cekcoengawh Gentelkhqi aham awm kaw;
Cehlai boeimangnaak, kqihchahnaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak ce ik-oeih leek ak saikhqi ham awm kaw: Judakhqi ham awm maa kawmsaw cekcoengawh Gentelkhqi ham awm kaw.
Ikawtih Khawsa ing u a haai awm am toek hy.
Anaa awi kaana thawlhnaak ak saikhqi boeih taw anaa awi kaana plawci lawt kawm uh, anaa awi ak khuiawh thawlhnaak ak saikhqi boeih awm anaa awi ing awi deng lawt kaw.
Ikawtih anaa awi ak zakhqi taw Khawsa haiawh thlak dyng na am awm hy, cehlai anaa awi haiawh thlak dyng na am ta pai hlai uhy,
(Gentelkhqi ing Anaa awi ce am ta pai hlai uhy, a mimah poek awh anaa awi ing a ngoekhqi ce sai uhy, anaa awi am ta hlai uhy, cekkhqi aham anaa awi na awm hawh hy,
anaa awi ing a ngoekhqi ce amik kawlung khuiawh qee hyt na awm hawh hy, a mimah a sim naak ingawm dyih pyi hy, amik poeknaak khqi ing thawlh puk unawh ang dyih na awm dyih pyi bai uhy.)
Khawsa ing Jesu Khrih ak caming kai ing awithang leek kak khypyinaak amyihna thlanghqing awhkaw ang hyp kawpoekkhqi ce awi a deng awh ve ve awm bit kaw.
Tuh nangmih ing, Juda thlang na awm unyng ti uhyk ti; anaa awi awh hang unawh Khawsa mi tuqunaak awh nang oek qu awhtaw;
amah ak kawngaih ce sim u tiksaw anaa awi ing a ni cawngpyi amyihna ak leek khqoet ik-oeih ce nami sim awhtaw;
mik hyp ak sawikung, thannaak ak khuiawh ak awmkhqi ham vangnaak na nami awm awhtaw;
thlakqawkhqi lam ak huhkung, naasenkhqi ak cawngpyikung na ngai qu u tiksaw, anaa awi awhkawng cyihnaak ingkaw awitak ce ta hawh uhyk ti.
Cawhtaw, nangmih, thlak chang ak cawngpyikungkhqi, namah ingkaw namah taw am nang cawng qu pyi nawh nu? Amamim quuknaak aham ak cawngpyikungkhqi ing namim qu nawh nu?
Thlang ing a samphaih aham am awm hy tinawh ak kqawnkung ing, na sam na phaih nawh nu? Myiqawl bawknaak ak tyih nang ing, myiqawl bawknaak bawkimkhqi ce na muk nawh nu?
Anaa awi ak oek qu pyikhqi ing, anaa awi eeknaak ing Khawsa ce nak thekhanaak nu?
Nangmih awh Gentelkhqi anglakawh Khawsa'ng ming kqawn seet na awm hawh hy,” tinawh a qee amyihna.
Anaa awi nami hquut awhtaw chahhui qeet ve phu tahy, cehlai anaa awi ce nami eek awhtaw, chahhui amak qeet thlang amih nani nami awm hy.
Chahhui amak qeet thlangkhqi ing anaa awi ing a ngoe ce a mi hquut awhtaw, chahhui ak qeet thlang amyihna am nik poek kawm nu?
Pumsa awh chahhui am qeet hlai hy anaa awi ak hquut ing nangmih ce ni thawlh sak khqi kaw, ca ing a qee anaa awi ta unawh chahhui ak qeet thlang na awm hlai uhyk ti, anaa awi ak eekkung na awm uhyk ti.
Ak khanben doeng ak dang ingkaw ak khan benawh pumsa chahhui ak qeet doek ak thlang ce Juda thlang amni.
Ak khui benawh ak awm; Myihla ingkaw lingbyi kawlung chahui ak qeet ak thlang, ca doeng ing qee doek na amak awm ak thlang ce ni Juda thlang na a awm hy. Cemyih ak thlang ce thlanghqing ing am kyih pai hlai hy Khawsa ing kyih hy.
Cawhtaw Juda thlang na awmnaak ing ikaw hawihkhangnaak a awm, am awhtaw chahhui qeetnaak awh a phu ikaw a awm?
Ik-oeih soepkep awh a leeknaak awm hy! Lamma cyk awh a leeknaak taw, Khawsa awi qoe qoe ce a mingmih a venawh khoem sak hy.
Thlang a vang ing cangnaak a ma taak mai mantaw ikawmyihna a awm kaw? A mingmih ak cangnaak a zawi dawngawh Khawsa a ypawmnaak ce hqee thai nawh nu?
Am hqee qoe qoe hy! Thlanghqing ing a qaai kqawn seiawm Khawsa taw am qaai hy; “Nak awih kqawn ing cangnaak ni pe nawh awi na deng awh noeng hyk ti,” tinawh qee hyt amyihna.
Cehlai ningnih am ni dyngnaak ing Khawsa a dyngnaak ce ak caih khqoet na ang dang sak mantaw ikaw nik kqawn kaw? Khawsa ing thlang a phep man Khawsa ve amak dyngna awm hly nawh nu? (A thlanghqing kqawn amyihna ni kak kqawn hy.)
Cemyih amni! Cemyihna a awm mai mantaw, ikawmyihna nu Khawsa ing khawmdek ve awi a dengnaak kaw?
U ingawm, Kai a thawlhnaak ing Khawsa a thymnaak ce ang dang sak khqoet awhtaw amah a boeimangnaak na awm khqoet kaw, kawtih thawlh dawk sak na ka awm bai kaw?” ti mai kaw.
Ikawtih thlangkhqi ing kaimih ve nik kqawn seet unawh – “Ik-oeih leek a lawnaak aham ik-oeih che sai u sih,” tinawh am ka mik kqawn ce a mi nik kqawn sak uh? Cemyihna ak kqawnkhqi taw a mi dawk aham tyng qoe hy.
Cawhtaw ikaw ing ni dyt sak kaw? Ningmih ve nik leek bet uh nu? Am ni leek qoe qoe hy! Juda awm Gentel awm thawlhnaak ak khuiawh ni awm boeih uhy tice nik kqawn caih law pek khqi hawh nyng.
U awm thlak dyng am awm hy, pynoet ca awm am awm hy;
ak zasim thlang pynoet awm am awm hy, Khawsa ak sui thlang pynoet awm am awm hy.
Thlang boeih lam hang unawh, hawnaak amak tlaak thlang na awm hawh uhy; them leek ak sai u pynoet awm am awm hy, pynoet ca awm am awm hy.
A mik awiqawng ce phyi amyihna awng qu nawh; a mim lai ing thlang thai na uhy. A mi hui awh khqui ak chy ce awm hy.
A mim kha ce awi che ingkaw awi kha ing be uhy.
Thlang a thi lawng sak ham a mi khawkham ce ly sak uhy;
seetnaak ingkaw khuikhanaak ce a mingmih a cehnaak lam awh awm nawh,
ngaihdingnaak lam ce am sim uhy.
A mi mik awh Khawsa kqihnaak qoe qoe am awm hy,” tinawh qeena a awm amyihna.
Kha boeih ing cyyp nawh khawmdek pum ve Khawsa ak awidengnaak khuiawh a awm thainaak aham, anaa awi ing ak kqawnkhqi boeih ce, anaa awi ak kaiawh ak awmkhqi ham ni ak kqawn hy, tice ni sim uhy.
Cedawngawh u awm anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming a mik huh awh thlakdyng na awm hy; anaa awi ing ni thawlhnaak ce ni sim sak khqi hy.
Cehlai tuawh anaa awi ingkaw tawnghaakhqi a sim sak amyihna anaa awi kana Khawsa dyngnaak ce dang sak na awm hawh hy.
Jesu Khrih awh cangnaak ak caming ak cangnaak thlang boeih a venawh dyngnaak ce Khawsa venna kawng law hy. A lawhanaak pynoet awm am awm hy,
thlang boeih ing thawlh nawh Khawsa a boeimangnaak am pang thai voel uhy,
Cehlai Jesu Khrih a thaawngnaak qeennaak ak caming a zoena dyng sak hy.
Khawsa ing a thi cangnaak ak caming anih ce hulnaak aham bulnaak na pehy. Ak dung na kawlung taaknaak ak caming ak cyk awhkaw thawlhnaak awh a toel kaana am hlynnaak awh amah a dyngnaak ce dang sak aham vemyihna sai hy;
tuh ve amah a dyngnaak ce dang sak hy, amah taw thlak dyng na awm nawh Jesu awh cangnaak ak takhqi ce awm dyng sak hy.
Cawhtaw oek qunaak ce hana nu a awm? Am awm voel hawh hy. I kawk caming nu oek qunaak ce a awm? Anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming ing nu? Am ni, cangnaak ak caming ni.
Thlang ing anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming am nawh cangnaak ak caming ni dyngnaak a huh tice nim tu khak hy.
Khawsa ve Judakhqi doeng a Khawsa nu? Gentelkhqi a Khawsa na awm am awm nawh nu? Oeih Gentelkhqi a Khawsa na awm awm hy,
Khawsa pynoet doeng a awm dawngawh, Anih ing chahhui ak qeet awm amak qeet awm cawhkaw cangnaak caming dyng sak qawi haih hy.
Cawhtaw ve cangnaak ak caming anaa awi ce nik hqe nu? Am ni hqe hy! Anaa awi ce ni ni caksak hy.
Cemyih, pakdam Abraham akawng ce ikawmyihna nik kqawn lah voei?
Abraham ing bibinaak ak caming dyngnaak a na huh mantaw, ang oek qu aham awm hy; cehlai Khawsa haiawh taw am awm hy.
Cabu awi ing ikaw ak kqawn? “Abraham ing Khawsa cangna nawh, cawhkaw cangnaak ce dyngnaak na taak pehy,” tihy.
Thlang ing bibi nawh, a bibi phu a huh ce kutdo am ming na hy, a huh hly kawi ni a huh hy.
Bi am bi hlai hy, thlak che ak dyng sak Khawsa ak ypnaak thlang cetaw, ak cangnaak ak caming thlak dyng na awm hy.
Bibinaak a awm kaana Khawsa ing thlak dyng na a taak thlang a zoseennaak ce David ingawm a nak kqawn hy.
A khawboe seetnaak ak khanawh qeenkhaw ngai na ak awmkhqi, a thawlhnaak hlip na ak awmkhqi taw a mi zoseen hy.
Bawipa ing a thawlhnaak kawna amak sui peek thlangkhqi taw a mi zoseen hy, tinawh,
vawhkaw zoseennaak ve chahhui ak qeetkhqi doeng aham awm ak awm nu? “Abraham ak cangnaak ce am dyngnaak na taak pe hy,” ni ti hawh hy.
Ikawmyihna a awm awh nu cemyihna a taak peek hy voei? Chahhui a qeet coengawh nu, a qeet hlanawh nu? A hu na am ni, lamma na hu hawh hy!
Chahhui a qeet hlanawh ni cangnaak ak caming thlak dyng na awmnaak hatnaak, chahhui qeet naak ce hu hawh hy. Cedawngawh, chahhui qeet kaana awm hlai u hy ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih ing dyngnaak ce a huhnaak thai aham anih ce cekkhqi a pa na awm hy.
Cekcoengawh chahhui qeet doeng kqawn kaana chahhui qeet hlanawh ni pa Abraham ing a taak cangnaak khawleh ak tut chahhui a mik qeet thlangkhqi a pa na awm awm bai hy.
Khawmdek qona a awm thainaak aham awikam ce Abraham ingkaw a cakhqi ing anaa ak caming am hu uhy, cangnaak ak caming ak law dyngnaak ing ni a mi huh hy.
Anaa awi ak caming ak hqingkhqi ing qo ce ami huh mantaw, cangnaak ce a phu am awm kawmsaw awikamnaak awm a hqawng nani a awm hly hawh,
anaa awi ingtaw kawsonaak ni a haw law hy. Anaa awi a ma awmnaak awhtaw awi eeknaak awm am awm hy.
Cedawngawh, qeennaak ak caming Abraham a cadilkhqi boeih a venawh awi a na kam hy – anaa awi ing ak awmkhqi doeng kaana Abraham ak cangnaak ak takhqi boeih a venawh awm awi taaknaak taw cangnaak ing ni a law hy. Anih taw ningnih boeih a pa na awm hy.
”Thlangphyn boeih a pa na ni sai hawh nyng,” tinawh a qee myihna. Anih ing ak cangnaak Khawsa mik huh awh anih taw ningnih a pa na awm hy, thlak thikhqi venawh hqingnaak ak pekung ingkaw amak awm ik-oeihkhqi ak awm sakkung taw Khawsa ni.
Ngaih-u aham a ma awm awh awm Abraham ingtaw cangnaak ing ang ngaih-u dawngawh thlangphun boeih a pa na awm hy, “Na cadil ce zah law kaw,” tinawh a venawh kqawn pehy.
Cangnaak awh tha seet kaana awm nawh, a pum ce ak thi hqoeng a myihna awm hawh hlai hy – cawh a kum zakhat tluk law hawh hy – Sarah awm cak kaa bai hy.
Cehlai Khawsa ak awikam awh upvoetnaak a khoeh ca awm am tahy, cangnaak awh tha awm sak nawh Khawsa venawh thangleeknaak ce pehy,
Khawsa ing ak awikamnaak awh a hoei sai thai hy tice caangna khak hy.
Cedawngawh, “Anih ce thlak dyng na tahy.”
Cehlai, “thlak dyng na tahy,” tive anih aham doeng na am qee hy,
Bawipa Jesu thihnaak awhkawng ak thawhkung ce ak cangnaak ningnih boeih a hamna awm awm lawt hy.
Jesu taw ningnih a thawlhnaak awh thihnaak yh nawh nim dyngnaak a hamna thoh sak tlaihna awm hawh hy.
Cedawngawh, cangnaak ak caming thlak dyng na ni awm hawh dawngawh, Jesu Khrih ak caming Khawsa ingqawi qoepnaak ce ni ta hawh uhy,
cangnaak ak caming anih awh vawhkaw qeennaak dyih hun awh ve ning dyi uhy. Cedawngawh Khawsa a boeimang ngaih-unaak awh zeelnaak ce ni ta uhy.
Cedoeng awm amni, kyinaak ni huhnaak awh awm ni zeel uhy, kyinaak ing yhnaak awm sak hy tice ni sim uhy;
yhnaak ing qaalleeknaak awm sak hy, qaalleeknaak ing ngaih-unaak awm sak hy.
Ngaih-unaak ing thaseetnaak amni pe voel hy, Khawsa ing ningnih a venawh a ni peek Ciim Myihla ak caming ningnih a kawlung ce lungnaak ing syyp law hy.
Ningmih tha amak awm na ni awm unawh a tym a khoek kqoeng awh, Khawsa amak sim thlangkhqi ham Khrih ce thi hy.
Thlak leek aham taw thlang ak thi aham awm hly mai hlai hy, thlak dyng aham thlang pynoet thih aham kyi soeih kaw.
Cehlai Khawsa ingtaw ve a ik-oeih awh ve a lungnaak ce dang law sak hy: Ningmih thlak thawlh na ni awm huiawh, Khrih ce ningnih aham thi hy.
A thi ing ningnih ce a ni dyng sak khqi hawh dawngawh, Anih ak caming Khawsa ak kawsonaak awhkawng iqyt nu a ni hul hly khqoet bai hy!
Ikawtih Khawsa a qaal na ni awm huiawh zani, a Capa a thihnaak ak caming tuqunaak a sai law tlaih awhtaw, ningnih tuqunaak ak awm cee ak khqoet taw, Anih a hqingnaak ak caming iqyt dy nu hulna ni awm hly khqoet hy!
Vedoeng am ni, ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak caming Khawsa awh zeelnaak ni ta unawh, Anih ak caming Khawsa ingqawi tuqunaak ce ningnih ing ni ta uhy.
Cedawngawh, thlang pynoet ak caming khawmdek awh thawlhnaak lut nawh, thawlhnaak ak caming thihnaak ce awm hy, thlang boeih a thawlh dawngawh thihnaak ing thlang boeih siing hy;
anaa awi peek na a awm hlanawh, thawlhnaak ce ve khawmdek awh awm hawh hy. Cehlai anaa awi ama awm a dawngawh thawlhnaak ce thawlhnaak amyihna am dang hy.
Cehlai, Adam awhkawng Mosi dyna thihnaak ing bibi hy, Adam amyihna anaa awi a eek adawngawh amak thawlh thlangkhqi a venawh awm, Adam taw ak law hly kawi huhsaknaak na awm hy.
Cehlai kutdo ik-oeih taw thawlh sainaak amyihna am awm hy. Thlang pynoet a thawlh sainaak ak caming zani thlang khawzah a thih awhtaw, Khawsa qeennaak ing thlang pynoet, Jesu Khrih am qeennaak awhkawng ak ngen hlai na ak lawng kutdo ce iqyt dy nu thlang khawzah ak khanawh a awm kaw!
Khawsa a zoe peek kutdo ik-oeih taw thlang pynoet a thawlhnaak ing am myih qu hy: thlang pynoet a thawlhnaak awh awidengnaak awm nawh dawknaak ce awm hy, Cehlai zoe peek kutdo ik-oeih ingtaw thawlhnaak awhkawng dyngnaak ce haw law hy.
Thlang pynoet a thawlh sainaak ak caming thihnaak ing bi a bi awhtaw, thlang pynoet Jesu Khrih ak caming Khawsa am qeennaak ak doem soeih dyngnaak themzoe pek ing iqyt dy nu bi a bi khqoet kaw.
Thlang pynoet a thawlh sainaak awh thlang boeih ing thawlhnaak a huh amyihna, thlang pynoet ing dyngnaak a sainaak ak camawh hqingnaak na sawi lawt kaw.
Thlang pynoet awi a mang ngainaak ak caming thlang boeih thlak thawlh na a awm amyihna, thlang pynoet ak awi ngainaak ak caming thlang boeih thlak dyng na awm lawt kaw.
Thawlh ang dangnaak khqoet aham anaa awi ce awm law nawh, cehlai thawlh a pungnaak awh, qeennaak awm pung khqoet hy.
Thawlhnaak ing thihnaak dy bi a bi amyihna, ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak caming kumqui hqingnaak a awmnaak aham qeennaak ing dyngnaak dy bibi hy.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna ni ti lah voei? Qeennaak a pungnaak aham thawlhnaak ni sai hlyk khqoet khqoet nawh nu?
Am ni! Ningnih thawlh awh nik thi hawh thawlh awh ikawmyihna ni hqing hly bak bak nu?
Jesu Khrih awh baptisma ak hu ningnih boeih taw a thihnaak awh baptisma ni hu hawh uhy, tice am nami sim nawh nu?
Cedawngawh baptisma huhnaak ak caming amah ingqawi pup haih na ni awm uhy, ningnih awm hqingnaak ak thai ing ni hqingnaak thai aham, Pa boeimangnaak ing Khrih ce thihnaak awhkawng thawh sak tlaih hy.
Vemyihna a thihnaak awh amah ing ni tuqu awhtaw, a thawhtlaihnaak awhawm amah ingqawi tuqu na ni awm lawt kawm uh.
Thawlh tamnaana amni awm voel unawh, thawlh pumsa a qeeng thainaak aham, nik thlang khqym ce thinglam awh heen na awm hawh hy, tice ni sim uhy.
Ikawtih uawm ak thi ak thlang taw thawlhnaak awhkawng loet hawh hy.
Khrih ingqawi ni thih haih hawh awhtaw, amah ing ni hqing tlaih lawt kaw, tice nik cangna uhy.
Khrih taw thihnaak awhkawng thawh na a awm hawh dawngawh, Anih ce am thi thai voel hy; thihnaak ing ak khanawh boei na am awm thai voel hy, tice ni sim uhy.
Thihnaak awh a thihnaak cetaw, thlang boeih aham hypboet na a thihnaak na awm hy; Cehlai hqingnaak awh a hqingnaak ce bai taw Khawsa benna ni a hqing hy.
Cemyih lawt na, thawlhnaak awh ak thi hawhna ngai qu nawh Khawsa ben awhtaw Jesu Khrih awh ak hqingna ngai qu uh.
Pumsa ngaihnaak amak leek ce am nami hquut aham ak thi thai na pum ce thawlhnaak ing koeh uk seh.
Nami pum i ikawmyih awm thawlh amak leek sainaak aham koeh pe law uh, cehlai thihnaak awhkawng nami hqing tlaih hawh amyihna nami pum ce Khawsa venawh pe uh; dyngnaak sainaak aham nami pum ce pe law uh.
Anaa ak kaiawh am awm u tiksaw qeennaak ak kaiawh nami awm hawh dawngawh, thawlhnaak ce nangmih a boeina am awm voel kaw.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna a awmnaak hy voei? Anaa ak kaiawh amni awm voel hawh nawh qeennaak ak kaiawh ni awm hawh dawngawh thawlhnaak nik sai hly uh nu? Am ni!
Tamnamyihna thlang ak awi ngai aham na pum ce thlang a venawh na peek awh, thihnaak na anik zawikung thawlh a tamnaana na awm awhawm, dyngnaak na anik sawikung awingainaak awh na awm awh awm awi nang ngai peek thlang a tamnaana awm hyk ti tice am na sim nawh nu?
Thawlh tamnaa na awm hlai uhyk ti, nangmih a venawh khoem sak na ak awm anaa awi ce kawlung tang tang ing nami pawm awh, Khawsa venawh zeelnaak ta nyng.
Nangmih taw thawlhnaak awhkawng loet u tiksaw dyngnaak a tamnaa nani nami awm hawh hy.
Thaawmnaak am nami taak dawngawh thlanghqing awih kqawn nani kak kqawn law hy. Nangmih ing nami pum ak keek ce amak ciimcaih ing thawlh amak leek sainaak benawh nami peek khawi amyihna, tuh ciimcaihnaak benna ak sawikung dyngnaak benna nami pum ak keek ce pe law lah uh.
Thawlh a tamnaa na nami awm awh, dyngnaak pinzen ak khui awhkawng ngaihding uhyk ti.
Chahqai phyihkawt na ak awm cee awhkaw ik-oeih nami saikhqi ce hawihkhangnaak ak thaih ikaw a awm? Cawhkaw ak thaih taw thihnaak doeng ni!
Cehlai tuh awhtaw thawlh ak khuiawh kawng loet hawh u tiksaw Khawsa a tamna nani nami awm hawh, ce a hawihkhangnaak taw dyngnaak na awm nawh, ak thaih taw kumqui hqingnaak na awm hy.
Ikawtih thawlh phu taw thihnaak na awm hy, cehlai Khawsa a themzo pek taw ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih awh kumqui hqingnaak ni.
Koeinaakhqi, anaa awi ak simkhqi venawh ni awi ve kak kqawn hy, anaa awi ing thlang ce a hqing khui doeng ni a uk hy, tice am nami sim nawh nu?
Kqawnnaak mai awh, anaa awi ing vaa ak ta nu pynoet ce a vaa a hqing khui pin na awm hy, cehlai a vaa ce a thih awhtaw, chungvaanaak anaa awi awhkawng anih ce loet hawh hy.
A vaa a hqing hyn awh thlak chang a vaanaak mantaw, Anih ce samphaih na awm hy. Cehlai a vaa ce a thih awhtaw, cawhkaw anaa awi awhkawng a loet hawh dawngawh, thlak chang vaa na mai seiawm anih ce sampaih am ming na voel hy.
Cedawngawh, koeinaakhqi, Khrih a pum ak caming nangmih awm anaa awi benawh thi hawh uhyk ti, Khawsa ham ak thaih ni qah thainaak aham thihnaak awhkawng ak tho tlaih a koe na ni awm uhy.
Thawlhnaak ing ningnih ce a ni pinzen khqi awh, thihnaak ak thaih ce ni qahnaak aham ningnih a pum awh pumsa ngaih thawlhnaakkhqi ing anaa ak caming bi bi hy.
Cehlai tuhawhtaw, ningnih a nik pinzen lak awhkawng ni thi hawh nawh, anaa awi awhkawng ni loet hawh hy; cak khqym awi amyihna am ni, Myihlak thai awh bi ni bi thainaak ahamna ni.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna nu ni ti lah voei? Anaa awi ve thawlhnaak nu? Am ni! Cehlai anaa awi awhkawng simsakna ama awm man thawlh am sim voei nyng; Anaa awi ing, “Koeh nai,” ama ti man nai ve am sim hly hlai hynyng.
Cehlai thawlhnaak ing, awi peek awh a tym leek lo nawh nainaak soepkep khawzah ce kak khanawh awm sak hy. Anaa awi ama awm awhtaw, thawlhnaak taw thi hy.
Anaa awi kaana khaw ana sa hlai nyng; awipeek a awm lawhtaw, thawlhnaak ce hqing law nawh, kai taw thi nyng.
Hqingnaak aham awipeek ce thihnaak hawna awm hy, tice sim nyng.
Ikawtih thawlhnaak ing awipeek awh tha lo nawh kai ce ni thai na nawh, anaa awi ing ni him hy.
Cedawngawh, anaa awi taw ciimcaih hy, dyng nawh leek hy.
Cawhtaw them leek ce kai ham thihnaak na awm nawh nu? Amni! Thawlh ce thawlh na ang dang thainaak ham, awipeek ak caming thawlh ce thlawlh ing a be thainaak aham, them leek ing kai awh thihnaak ce awm sak hy.
Anaa awi taw Myihla ben them ni ti, ni sim uhy; cehlai kai taw pumsak thlangna awm nyng, thawlh tamnaa na zawihna kak awm ni.
Ikawmyih them nu ka sai ti, am sim nyng; ka sai them boeih ve, ka ngaih kawi am ni, ka sawhnaak soeih ni ka sai hy,
Sai aham am ka ngaih them ce ka sai awhtaw, anaa awi taw leek hy tinawh kang dyih pyi na awm hy.
Cehlai tuh awhkaw them ak sai ve kai am ni, kai ak khuiawh ak awm thawlh ing ni a sai hy.
Ka pumsa thawlh awh ve themleek am awm hy tice sim nyng. Themleek sai aham ngaih hlai nyng, am sai thai nyng.
Ikawtih themleek sai ka ngaih ve a sai kaana; thawlhnaak sai am ka ngaih ce sai khaak nyng.
Cedawngawh sai ham am ka ngaih ce ka sai awhtaw, kai ing am sai nyng saw kai ak khuiawh ak awm thawlhnaak ing ni a sai hy.
Themleek sai ham ka ngaih awh, themche ce ka venawh awm hy, tice anaa awi ak caming sim nyng.
Kak kawlung taw Khawsa a anaa awi awh zeel hlai hy;
ka pumsa awh anaa awi ak chang ing bibi hy, ce ing ka pum awh bi ak bi thawlh anaa thawngim khuiawh ce nik thla hy.
Thlang khuikha soeihna awm nyng! Ve thihnaak pumsa ak khuiawh kawng u ing a ni hul lah voei?
Jesu Khrih ningnih a Bawipa ak caming, Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awm seh! Cedawngawh, kamah awm kak kawlung khuiawh taw Khawsa anaa awi a tamnaa na awm hlai nyng, pumsa benawh taw thawlh tamnaa na awm nyng.
Cedawngawh, Jesu Khrih awh ak awmkhqi boeih ham tuh dawknaak qoe qoe am awm voel hawh hy,
hqingnaak Myihla anaa awi ing thawlh ingkaw thihnaak anaa awi awhkawng, Jesu Khrih ak caming kai ce ni loet sak hawh hy.
Pumsa thawlhnaak awh anaa awi ce ak tha am awm nawh ama sai thai awh, Khawsa ing thlak thawlh amyihna amah a Capa ce thawlh hyih phymnaak aham tyi law hy. Thlak thawlh awh thawlhnaak ce dawk sak hy,
Pumsa ngaih thawlhnaak amyihna khaw amak sa nawh Myihla ngaihnaak amyihna khaw ak sa ningnih awh ce dyngnaak ing a ngoe anaa awi ce a soepnaak thai aham thawlh anaa ce dawk sak hy.
Pumsa ngaih thawlhnaak amyihna khaw ak sakhqi ing pumsa ngaihnaak awh a mik kawlung ce ta uhy; cehlai Myihla ngaihnaak amyihna khaw ak sakhqi ingtaw Myihla ngaihnaak awh a mik kawlung ce ta lawt uhy.
Thlakthawlh ak kawlung taw thihnaak na awm nawh, Myihla ing a sawi kawlung taw hqingnaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak na awm hy;
thawlhnaak kawlung taw Khawsa ingqawi thunkha qu hy nih. Khawsa anaa awi awh am pe qu nawh, ang peek na awm am pe qu thai qoe hy.
Pumsa ngaih thawlhnaak ing ak awmkhqi ing Khawsa ce am zeel sak thai uhy.
Cehlai, nangmih taw, pumsa ngaihnaak awh am awm uhyk ti, nangmih ak khuiawh Khawsa ang Myihla a awm awhtaw, nangmih taw Myihla awh ni nami awm hy. U awm Khrih ang Myihla ama taak awhtaw, anih taw Khrih a koe na am awm hy.
Cehlai nangmih ak khuiawh Khrih a awm awhtaw, thawlhnaak awh nangmih a pum ce thi mai seiawm dyngnaak awh nangmih ang Myihla taw hqing hy.
Thihnaak awhkawng Jesu ak thawhkung ang Myihla ce nangmih ak khuiawh a awm awhtaw, thihnaak awhkawng Khrih ak thawhkung nangmih ak khuiawh ak awm awh hqingnaak ce ni pek khqi lawt kaw.
Cedawngawh, koeinaakhqi ni sai hly kawi ni ta uhy. Cehlai pumsa thawlhnaak benawh hqing khawsaknaak awh amni.
Pumsa ngaih thawlhnaak benawh khaw nami sak mantaw, thi kawm uk ti; cehlai Myihla ak caming pumsa sai thawlhnaakkhqi ce nami him awhtaw hqing kawm uk ti,
kawtih Khawsa ang Myihla ing a sawi thlangkhqi boeih taw Khawsa cakhqi na awm uhy.
Kqih awm tamnaa na awm tlaihnaak Myihla ce am hu u tiksaw, ca na coengnaak Myihla ni nami huh hy. Ce ak caming, “Abba, ka Pa,” tinawh nik khy thai uhy.
Myihla amah qoe ing ningnih ang Myihla ing ningnih taw Khawsa cakhqi na ni awm uhy tice dyih pyi hy.
A cakhqi na ni awm awhtaw, ningnih taw qo ak pangkung na ni awm uhy – a boeimangnaak ing pang pyi thainaak aham ang yhnaak ce ning yh pyi tang tang awhtaw, Khrih ingkaw Khawsa qo ak pang haih na ni awm uhy.
Tuh tloek awhkaw khuikha ni huhnaakkhqi ve ningnih awh ak awm law hly kawi boeimangnaak ingqawi ka nyhtah awh kawna awm am awm hy tinawh poek nyng.
A ik-oeih saikhqi ing Khawsa cakhqi ang dangnaak tym ce ngaih-u soeih doena lamtoen uhy.
Them saikhqi boeih boeih ing phu amak ta na ak awm sak ak awi awina awm uhy; a mimah ing a mi ngaih dawngawh am nawh, cekkhqi ak awm sakkung a awm sakkhqi amyihna ak awm khqi ni, ngaih-uunaak doe ing,
them saikhqi boeihboeih awm seetnaak tamnaa awhkawng loet sakna awm kawm saw, Khawsa cakhqi a boeimang ngaihdingnaak ak khuiawh lut lawt kaw.
Them sai boeih boeih ing tuhdy naa ak awm tawm tlawhnaak amyihna khy am kqang uhy tice ni sim uhy.
A mingmih doeng amni, ningnih Myihla thaihcyk na ak awmkhqi awm cana ni awmnaak loetnaak ingkaw pum thaawngnaak khawnghi ce lamtoen doena am cei na taw ning ko ning kqang uhy.
Ikawtih vawhkaw ngaih-unaak awh ni thaawng na ni awm uh. Cehlai mik huh nawn ngaih-unaak taw ngaih-unaak tang tang amni. U ing nu a taak ce ce ang ngaih-u khawi?
Ni taak hlan ik-oeih ce ning ngaih-u awhtaw, khawdungnaak ing qeh uhy.
Cemyih lawtna, nik tha ama awmnaak awh Myihla ing ningnih ce ni bawmkhqi hy. Cykcah hly kawi ce ningnih ingtaw amni sim uhy, cehlai Myihla ing awi ing kqawn noeng kaana ko doena ningnih aham thoeh law hy.
Ningmih kawlung ak suikung ing Myihla kawlung ce sim hy, kawtih Khawsa kawngaihnaak amyihna thlak ciimkhqi aham Myihla ing thoeh pehy.
Amah ak lungnaakkhqi ingkaw, amah ing ang cainaak amyihna ak khykhqi aham, ik-oeih boeih boeih Khawsa ing ak leek na sai pehy, tice ni sim uhy.
Ikawtih anih ce koeinaa khawzah anglakawh cakcyk na a awm thainaak aham Khawsa ing a sim ceekhqi ce amah a Capa a myi ing a ning myih aham hoep cee hawh hy.
Amah ing a hoep ceekhqi ce khy nawh; ak khykhqi ce dyng sak hy; am dyng sakkhqi ce zoeksang khqi hy.
Cawhtaw ve ak camawh ikawmyihna nu ni ti lah voei? Ningmih benna Khawsa ce a awm awhtaw, u ing nu a ni tuk thai kaw?
Amah a Capa awm am hlyn kaana, ningnih aham ak pe boeih ing, them boeih boeih ce a peek kaana awm hly nawh nu?
Khawsa ing ak tyh thlangkhqi ce u ing nu thawlh ak puk thai kaw? Khawsa ing dyng sak hawh hy.
U ing a bo sak ce? Jesu Khrih, thihnaak awhkawng ak tho tlaih ing Khawsa ak tang benawh ngawi nawh ningnih aham thoeh law poepa hy.
Khrih a lungnaak awhkawng u ing nu a ni khqeng thai kaw? Kyinaak, khuikhanaak, thekhanaak, khawseet khawkhaanaak, ak pum a zalna awmnaak, kqihawmnaak ingkaw zawzi ing nu?
Nangmih ak camawh khawnghi qui himna awm nyng; him aham ak awm tuu amyihna ni ta uhy,” tinawh a qee hyt amyihna.
Amni, ve a ik-oeih boeih awh ningnih anik lungnaak khqikung ak caming ningnih taw noengkung na ni awm uhy.
Ikawtih kai taw thihnaak, hqingnaak, khan ceityihkhqi ingkaw qaaikhqi, tuh awm ni hai benawh awm, ikawmyih thaawmnaak ingawm,
sangnaak ingkaw nemnaak ing, ik-oeih sai boeih ak khuiawh ikawmyih ca ingawm ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih awh ak awm Khawsa lungnaak awhkawng amnik khqeng thai hy, tice sim nyng.
Khrih awh awitak tang ni kak kqawn, ka qaai ap kqawn nyng, Ciim Myihla awh ka simnaak ingawm dyih pyi hy –
kawseetnaak ak bau soeih ing kawlung tlawhnaak tak khqoet khqoet nyng.
Ka koeinaa, ka pilnamkhqi aham ka mah ve awihkha zawk nawh Khrih ingqawi kqeng qu ham dyna poek nyng.
A mingmih taw Israel thlangkhqi ni, cakhqi na coengnaak, boeimangnaak, awikamnaak, sainaak, anaa awi huhnaak, bawkim bawknaak ingkaw awikamnaak ak hu thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Pakdamkhqi awm a mingmih a koe ni, cekkhqi ak khuiawh kawng ni pumsa benawh taw Khrih ce a law hy, anih taw ik-oeih boeih ak khanawh Khawsa na awm nawh, kumqui kyihcah aham awm hy! Amen.
Khawsak awi ce hqawng hawh hy ni ti man tinaak. Israel awhkawng ak lawkhqi boeih ce Israel na am awm boeih uhy.
Anih a cadilkhqi ce Abraham a cakhqi na am awm boeih bai hy. “Isaak awhkawng ni cadil qui ce noet na a awm hly,” tinawh ni a awm hy.
Pumsa benawh kaw cakhqi ve Khawsa cakhqi na am awm hy, awikamnaak awh ak paakhqi ceni Abraham cakhqi na a mik awm.
Awikamnaak cetaw; a tym a khoek awh law tlaih kawng nyng saw, Sarah ing cak pa ta kaw,” tinawh awm hy.
Ce doeng amni, Rebekah a cakhqi ingawm pa pynoet doeng ni a mi taak hy, ningnih a pa Isaak ce.
Cehlai, cakphei ta hlan nawh, ak che ak leek a sim hlanawh – Khawsa ang cainaak tyknaak ce ang dyih thainaak aham:
bibinaak ak caming am nawh anih ak khykung ing – “A hqam ing ang no a bi bi pe kaw,” tina hy.
Jakob lungna nyng saw Esau sawh na nyng,” tinawh qee hyt na awm hawh hy.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna nu ni ti lah voei? Khawsa ve am thym hy nik ti hly nu? Amni ti qoe qoe kaw!
Mosi a venawh, “Qeennaak ka taak thlang ak khanawh qeennaak ta kawng nyng saw, lungnaak ka taak ak thlang ak khanawh lungnaak ta kawng nyng,” tinawh kqawn pe hawh hy.
Cedawngawh, ak ngaihkung ak camawh am nawh, ak thawngkung ak camawh am bai ni, ak qeenkung Khawsa ak camawh ni.
Cakciim ing Pharaoh a venawh: Kang ming ce khawmdek pum awh khyipyi na a awm nawh, nang ak khanawh ka boeimangnaak kang dang sak aham kang cainaak ik-oeih awh ve nang taw ka ni tlung sak qoe ni,” tina hy.
Cedawngawh Khawsa amah ing a ngaih thlang ak khanawh qeennaak ta nawh, a ngaih ak thlang ce am thin hqam sak hy.
Nangmih ak khuiawh kawng u ingawm: “Cawhtaw kawtih Khawsa ing thlang thawlh ak puk bai? Anih ak kawngaih ak oelh thai u nu ak awm?” ti kawm uk ti.
Cehlai, Aw thlanghqing, Khawsak awi ak oelh thai nang ce a u nu? “A sai ik-oeih ing ak saikung a venawh, ‘Ikawtih vemyihna nani sai?’ tina kawm nu?”
Am ak sepkung ing tamlai boengoet awhkawng a vang ce ak nep soeih na, a vang bai taw hawnaak mailai na saithainaak am ta nawh nu?
Khawsa ing kawsonaak ce tyk nawh a saithainaak ce dang sak ham a ngaih mantaw, cehlai plawci aham ak awm am ak khanawh yhnaak ak dung soeih ing ang yh awhtaw, ikawmyihna?
Boeimang aham a qoek a bah cekhqi, qeennaak a taak thlangkhqi venawh boeimangnaak ap kqawn noeng ce a sai peek awhtaw –
Judakhqi ven doeng awhkawng am nawh Gentelkhqi ven awhkawng awm ak khy ningnih vetaw ikawmyihna ni awmnaak kaw?
Hosea awh vemyihna kqan hawh hy: “Kak thlang na amak awmkhqi ce ‘kak thlangkhqi” tinawh khy kawng nyng saw; am ka lungnaak nu ce ‘ka lungnaak,’ tina kawng nyng”
nangmih kai ak thlangkhqi amni,’ tinawh ak khynaak hun qoe qoe awh, a mingmih ce ‘Ak hqing Khawsa cakhqi,’ tinawh khy kawm uh,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Isaiah ingawm Israelkhqi awh vemyihna anak kqawn bai hy: “Israel thlangkhqi ve tuicunli a keng awhkaw dizui zah law u seiawm, ak syng tloek doeng ni a hul hly.
Ikawtih Bawipa ing khawmdek khanawh awideng kawmsaw ang tawnna a dytnaak ce pha sak kaw,” tihy.
Isaiah ing lamma na vemyihna kqawn bai hy: “Bawipa ing cadilkhqi ve a ma hlyn mantaw, ningnih ve Sodom khaw amyihna ni awm kawm usaw, Gomora khaw amyihna ni ni awm hly hawh uhy,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna ni ti lah voei? Dyngnaak amak hquut Gentelkhqi ing cangnaak ak caming dyngnaak ce hu uhy,
cehlai dyngnaak ham anaa ak hquut Israelkhqi ingtaw am hu uhy.
Ikawtih a mami huh? Cangnaak ing a hquut kaana bibinaak ing ami hquut a dawngawh “Bahnaak lung,” awh bah uhy.
Toek lah, bahnaak aham ingkaw tluuknaak aham Zion awh lung ta nyng, u awm ce ak ypnaak thlang taw ityk awh awm chah am phyi kaw,” tinawh qee hyt awm hawh hy.
Koeinaakhqi, kak kawlung ngaihnaak ing Israel thlangkhqi ham kak cykcahnaak taw a mingmih hul na ami awm thainaak aham ni.
Khawsa benawh kawlung pe uhy tice sim nyng, cehlai ami peeknaak ce cyihnaak awh am hang uhy.
Khawsa ven awhkawng ak law dyngnaak ce a sim kaana a mimah a dyngnaak doeng ce sai aham cai uhy, Khawsa dyngnaak awh am pe qu uhy.
Khrih taw anaa awi a dytnaak na awm nawh ak cangnaak thlang boeih aham dyngnaak ce awm hy.
Anaa awi ak caming dyngnaak ce Mosi ing: Ve a ik-oeihkhqi ak sai thlang taw vekkhqi ak caming hqing kaw,” tinawh a na qee hy.
Cehlai cangnaak ak caming dyngnaak ingtaw vemyihna kqawn hy: “Nak kawk khuiawh, ‘U nu khawk khan na a kaai hly?’ Cetaw Khrih ak kqum law tinaak ni.
Am awhtaw, ‘U nu ceeikhuina ak kqum hly? Cetaw thihnaak awhkawng Khrih a thawh law hly tinaak ni) koeh ti uh,’ tihy.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna a ti? “Awi taw na venawh awm hy; nam kha ingkaw nak kawlung khuiawh awm hy,” ti nawh kqawn hy; cetaw cangnaak awi ningnih ing nik khypyi ve ni:
“Jesu taw Boei ni, tinawh nam kha ing dyih pyi nawh, thihnaak awhkawng anih ce Khawsa ing thawh tlaih hy, tinawh nak kawlung ing nak cangnaak awhtaw hul na awm kawp ti,” ti ve.
Ikawtih kawlung ing nak cangnaak dawngawh a ni dyng sak na awm nawh, nam kha ing na pho a dawngawh a ni hul na awm hy.
U awm anih ce ak ypnaak thlang taw ityk awh awm chahqai na am awm kaw,” tinawh Cakciim ing kqawn hy.
Juda ingkaw Gentel haanaak am awm voel hy – cawhkaw Bawipa ce thlang boeih a Bawipa na awm nawh amah ak khykhqi boeih a venawh zoseennaak khawzah pehy –
kawtih, U awm Bawipa ang ming ak khykhqi boeih taw hulnaak hu kaw”
Cawhtaw, amak cangnaak ing ikawmyihna ak khynaak thai kaw? Ikawmyihna a mang zaak awhtaw anih ce ak cangnaak kaw? A mingmih a venawh u ing amak kqawn peek awhtaw ikawmyihna ang zaak naak kaw?
Thlang amni tyih awhtaw ikawmyihna khypyi na a awm thai kaw? “Awithang leek ak haw lawkung khqi a khaw taw leek soeih soeih mah hy!” tinawh qee hyt na awm hawh hy.
Cehlai Israelkhqi boeih ing awithang leek ce am do uhy. Isaiah ing, “Bawipa, kaimih ak awih kqawn ve u ing nu ak cangnaak?” a na ti amyihna.
Cangnaak taw awi zaaknaak awhkawng ni a law, awi taw Khrih ak awi zaaknaak awhkawng awm hy.
Cehlai doet lah vang: Am za unawh nu? Za uhy: A mingmih ak awi ce khawmdek penglum pha nawh, ak awikhqi ce khawmdek a dytnaak dy pha hy.”
Doet tlaih lah vang nyng: Israelkhqi ing am zasim unawh nu? Lamma cyk awh Mosi ing, “Qam na amak dyi thlangkhqi ce ni yt sak kawng nyng saw; zaksimnaak amak ta qam ingqawi nak kaw ni so sak kawng,” a na tihy.
Isaiah ing qaal leeknaak ing, Kai a manik sui thlangkhqi ing ni hu unawh; kai a manik sui thlangkhqi venawh dang pe nyng,” tinawh anak kqawn hy.
Cehlai Israelkhqi awh ce, awi amak ngai thlangkhqi ingkaw kai anik oelhkhqi aham khawnghi zuung ka baan phyl nyng,” tinawh kqawn bai hy.
Cawhtaw kai ing doet nyng: Khawsa ing ak thlangkhqi ce ak hoet nu? Am hoet qoe qoe hy! Kai kamah awm Israel thlang, Abraham a cadil, Benjamin na awm nyng.
Khawsa ing a sim cee hawh ak thlangkhqi ce am qoeng hy. Elijah ing Israelkhqi ama ngaih a dawngawh Khawsa venawh a cykcahnaak awi Cakciim awh ak awm ce am nami sim nawh nu?
Bawipa na tawnghakhqi awm him unawh nang a bawkthangkhqi awm hqe hawh uhy; kai doeng ni ka awm hy, cehlai tuh kai awm him aham ni sui uhy,” a ti ce.
Khawsa ing ikawmyihna awi am hlat peek ce? “Baal a haiawh khuk amak sym kamah aham thlang thong khqih hoep hun nyng,” tina hy.
Camih lawtna, tuhawm am qeennaak ing thlang ak tyh ce awm hun hy.
Qeennaak ing ak tyk mantaw, bibinaak ak caming am voel hawh ni; bibinaak ak caming mantaw, qeennaak ce qeennaak na am awm voel kaw.
Cawhtaw ikawmyihna a awmnaak? Israelkhqi ing ngaihtaak doena sui hlai uhy am hu uhy, ak tyhkhqi ingtaw hu uhy. Ak changkhqi taw kawlung hqam sak hy.
Mik ta hlai uhy a mami huh thainaak aham, haa ta hlai uhy a maming zaak thainaak aham, tuhngawi dy awh, Khawsa ing a mingmih ce ngai qepnaak kawlung pek khqi hy,” tinawh qee hyt awm hawh hy.
David ingawm: A mingmih a caboei ce dawng ingkaw thang na awm seitaw, a mingmih ang bahnaak ingkaw a mi khawboe phu zawknaak na awm seh.
Khaw a mami huh thainaak aham a mi mikkhqi hyp seitaw, a mim tingkhqi ce khun seh,” ana tihy.
Doet tlaih lah vang nyng: ama mi thawh thainaak voel dyna tlu unawh nu? Amni! A mingmih a sai thawlhnaak awhkawng, Israelkhqi ing ami ytnaak aham, hulnaak ce Gentelkhqi venawh law hy.
Cehlai a mingmih a sai thawlhnaak ce khawmdek boeinaak na awm nawh, a mingmih ing ami hlawng ce Gentelkhqi boeinaak na a awm awhtaw, a mingmih a soepnaak ing iqyt dy nu boeinaak ce a awm sak khqoet kaw!
Nangmih Gentelkhqi venawh ni ka nik kqawn peek khqi. Gentelkhqi ham ceityih na ka awm khui taw, bi ve khawzah bi nyng,
ikawmyihna awm kak thlangkhqi ing ytnaak ta unawh thlang vang awm hul na a mi awm thainaak aham bi bi nyng.
Ikawtih a mingmih ing a mi qoeng a dawngawh khawmdek ing tuqunaak na ang coeng awhtaw, a mingmih ing a mi do ak khqoet man thihnaak awhkawng hqingnaak na am awm kawm nu?
Phaihpi ak cyk ce pe nawh a ciimcaih sak hawh awhtaw, phaihpi a cuu boeih na ciimcaih hy; thingkung ce a ciim awhtaw, a baaikhqi awm ciimcaih hy.
A baai a vang ce a ek awhtaw, nangmih, olive chap, olive thing a baai awh cawng na awm tiksaw ak kqa awhkawng ak pli ce hang taai na hyk ti,
cedawngawh a baai chang ak khanawh koeh oek qu. Nang oek qu awhtaw, ve ve poek: nang ing ak kqa ce tha am pe hyk ti, ak kqa ing ni nang ce tha a ni peek.
Cedawngawh, Kai ve cawng na ka awmnaak thai aham a baaikhqi ek hy,” na ti aham awm hy.
Thym hy, a mingmih ing a ma mik cangnaak awh ni a mi ek hy, nangmih awm cangnaak awh ni naming dyih hy. Cedawngawh koeh hoel qu nawh taw, kqih lah.
Khawsa ing a baai tang tang zani a mam hlyn awhtaw, nangmih awm am nim hlyn khqi kaw.
Cedawngawh Khawsa am qeennaak ingkaw a tlungthangnaak ce poek lah uh. Ak tlukhqi hamna taw ak khawngkhqi camawh ni; nang ahamna taw leek hy, a leeknaak awh na awm poe awhtaw; cekkaataw nang awm tluk sakna awm lawt kawp ti.
Cangnaak kaana a mami awm poe awhtaw, a mingmih ce cawng khqi tlaih kaw.
Nangmih olive thik chap awhkawng chawm na awm u tiksaw olive thing tang awh cawng na nami awm awhtaw, vawhkaw olive thing tangkhqi ak khqoet taw olive thing awh cawng hly thai khqoet saw!
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih ing am naming oekqunaak aham vawhkaw awihyp ve sim kaana nami awm aham am ngaih nyng: Gentelkhqi ami soepnaak nyn a pha hlan dy taw, Israelkhqi amik kawlung hqam kaw.
Cehlai Israelkhqi boeih hul na awm kaw; “Hulkung ce Zion awhkawng law kawmsaw; Jakob a venawh kawng Khawsa ama simnaak ce khawng kaw.
Ve ve a mingmih mi awikamnaak ka sai ni, a mingmih a thawlhnaak ce lawh pe kawng,” tinawh qee hyt hawh amyihna.
Awithang leek awi awhtaw, a mingmih ce nangmih a qaal na awm hlai uhy, tyknaak benawh taw, pakdamkhqi ak caming lungnaak hu uhy,
Ikawtih Khawsa a zopeek kutdo ingkaw khynaak vetaw hqe thai na am awm hy.
Nangmih awm maa nataw Khawsak awi am ngai hlai uhyk ti a mingmih ing awi a mami ngainaak ak caming tuh awhtaw qeennaak ce hu hawh uhyk ti,
cemyih lawtna a mingmih awm Khawsa ing nangmih a venawh qeennaak a taak lawt amyihna qeennaak ami huh thainaak aham tuh awi am ngai uhy.
Thlang boeih ak khanawh qeennaak a taak thainaak aham, Khawsa ing thlang boeih ce awi amak ngai na tahy.
Aw Khawsa a cyihnaak ingkaw thoemnaak boeinaak” ak dung soeih soeih ve! Ak awi dengnaak sim thai noeng am ingkaw, hquut thainaak a ceng benna ak awm lam aih ve!
U ing nu Bawipa ak kawlung ce a sim hawh? U ing nu anih ce khaw ak poek pyi?
Khawsa ing a sam tlaihnaak aham, u ing nu ik-oeih a peek hawh?
Ikawtih amah a ven awhkawng amah ak caming amah a venawh ik-oeih boeih ve awm hy. Amah a venawh thangleeknaak a poepa na awm seh! Amen.
Cedawngawh, koeinaa khqi, Khawsa qeennaak awh, ak hqing bulnaak, ak ciimcaih ingkaw Khawsa a ym kawi na nami pum ce pek aham ni thoeh khqi nyng; ve ve nami bawknaak awh ak awm hly qoe ni.
Ve khawmdek phung amyihna koeh awm unawh; Khawsa a ngaih kawi, ak leek, ym kawi ingkaw leeknaak ak soep ce ak ceetna zaaksimnaak nami taaknaak ham, namik kawlung ak thaina awmnaak ing chawt qu lah uh.
Kai a venawh a ni peek am qeennaak ak caming nangmih boeih a venawh kanik kqawn peek khqi: Na mimah ingkaw na mimah ce ak sang soeih na koeh ngai qu uh, Khawsa ing a ni peek cangnaak ing a ting a tawk na na mimah ingkaw na mimah ce ngai qu uh.
Ningmih ing ni pum awh a baai khawzah ni ta uhy, cehlai a mi bibinaak ce am myih boeih hy,
cemyih lawtna ningnih awm Khrih awh a baai khawzah na ak awm pum pynoet na ni awm uhy, a baaikhqi boeih ce pynoet ingkaw pynoet a koena awm qu qip boeih hy.
Qeennaak a peeknaak amyihna kutdo ak chang chang ni ta unawh, awikqawnkungna ak awm ing cangnaak a taak khoek amyihna kqawn seh;
bibikung ing thahly doena bi bi seh, cawngpyikung ing ypawmna cawngpyi seh,
ak sawikung ing ypawmna sawi seh; them ak pekung ing a hai kaana pe seh, awitlykkung ing ak leekna awitlyk seh, thlang ak qeenkung ing zeel doena qeen seh nyng.
Lungnaak taw kawlung tang tang ing a awm aham awm hy. Seetnaak ce sawhna unawh, leeknaak ce ak cakna tu uh.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet cingnahqui lungnaak ing lung qu na uh.
Thaseetnaak qoe qoe koeh ta law uh, tha lo law unawh, Bawipa bi ce bi law uh.
Ngaih-unaak awh ce zeel uh, kyinaak nami huh awh kawdungnaak ing yh law unawh, cykcahnaak awh cak lah uh.
Thlakciimkhqi a voetnaak dawm unawh, khinkhqi ce ak nep na toek law uh.
Nangmih anik thekhanaak thlangkhqi ce zoseennaak pe law uh; zoseennaak pe unawh awih che ing koeh zyi uh.
Ak zeelkhqi ce zeel pyi unawh; kaw ak sekhqi ce kawseet pyi uh.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet qoep ang qui cana awm uh. Koeh oek qu uh, thlang ak kaina ak awmkhqi mi pyi qu uh. Namah ingkaw namah koeh zoeksang qu.
Thawlhnaak ce thawlhnaak ing koeh thung uh. Thlang boeih amik huh awh ak thym ce ngaihtaaknaak ing sai law uh.
Ang coeng thai awhtaw nangmih ben awhkawng ang coengnaak thai khuina thlang mi qoep ang qui cana awm law uh.
Ka pyikhqi, nami phu koeh sui law uh; Khawsa ak kawsonaak ce ken law uh, “Kut thungnaak taw kai a koe ni, kai ing thung kawng nyng,” tinawh Bawipa ing tihy.
Ce anglakawh: Na qaal ce ak phoen a cawih awhtaw, buh pe; Tui a ngaih awhtaw, awk kawi ce pe. Vemyihna na sai awhtaw a lu awh maieh na tloeng peek ing myih kaw.”
Seetnaak ing koeh ni noeng seitaw, leeknaak ing seetnaak ce noeng lah.
Thlang boeih ukkung ak kaiawh awm seh. Khawsa ing a mak tyh ukkung am awm hy. Ukkungna ak awmkhqi boeih ve Khawsa ing ak tyh khqi ni.
Cedawngawh, u awm ukkungkhqi ak oelh thlang taw Khawsa ing a taak ce ak oelh thlang nani a awm, cemyihna amik sai thlangkhqi ingtaw amah ingkaw amah ak khanawh awidengnaak ce hu kaw.
Ik-oeih ak thym ak saikhqi aham ukkung kqih ham am awm hy, cehlai ik-oeih amak thym ak saikhqi ham ni kqih a awm. Uknaak ak takhqi ce amak kqih ham nak ngaih nu? Them leek mah sai lah, cawhtaw nim kyih bit kaw.
Ikawtih nang ing them leek na sainaak aham anih ce Khawsa a tyihzawih na awm hy. Cehlai ik-oeih amak leek na sai awhtaw kqih lah, anih ing zawzi ce a zoena am tahy. Ik-oeih ak sai thawlhkhqi ak khanawh kawsonaak ak takung, Khawsa a tyihzawih na awm hy.
Cedawngawh toelnaak nak kqih doeng kaana namah a simnaak qoe qoe ingawm ukkung ak kaina na awm aham awm hy.
Cawhni mangmu awm nami peek hy, ukkung taw Khawsa a tyihzawih na a awm dawngawh, a mingmih ing ve a ik-oeih awh ve bibi uhy.
Na peek tyng ce pe boeih: Mangmu peek aham a awm awhtaw pe mai; them phu peek ham a awm awhtaw pe; kqihchahnaak peek ham a awm awhtaw kqihchahnaak pe; zoeksangnaak peek ham a awm awhtaw zoeksangnaak ce pe.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet lungnaak am kaa taw, ik-oeih laiba koeh ta law uh, u awm thlakchang ak lungnaak ingtaw anaa awi ce soep sak hawh hy.
Koeh samphaih; thlang koeh him; koeh qu; koeh nai,” tinaak awipeek ingkaw ikawmyih ak chang awipeek awm vawhkaw: “Namah a pum amyihna na imceng lung law na,” tinaak awi awh cui boeih hy.
Lungnaak ing a kengsam thlang a seetnaak am sai hy. Cedawngawh lungnaak taw anaa awi a soepnaak na awm hy.
Tuh tloek awhkaw a tym ve sim doena, ve ve sai lah, nik cangnaak thai awhkawng lak awh hulnaak a tym ce a zoe law voe voe hawh dawngawh, ihnaak awhkawng na hang hqyng lawnaak a tym ce pha hawh hy.
Khawmthan boeih tawm ca hawh nawh; khaw dai tawm ca hawh hy. Cedawngawh than awhkaw ik-oeih saikhqi ce qoeng hlah unawh khawkdai a suisak ing thoeihcam qu hlah u sih.
Khawkdai awhkaw amyihna khawboe leek sai unawh, oelh qunaak ingkaw tlaiseetnaakkhqi ce koeh ta u sih nyng.
Vemyihkhqi anglakawh Jesu Khrih ing thoeihcam qu unawh, pumsa ngaih thawlhnaak a soepnaak aham koeh poek law uh.
Cangnaak awh tha amak awm thlang ce a theenaak kaana do law uh.
Thlang pynoet ingtaw, cangnaak ak caming ik-oeih boeih boeih ai hly thai mai hlai hy, cangnaak benawh tha amak awm thlang ingtaw, anhah doeng ni a ai hly.
Ik-oeih boeih boeih ak ai ing anhah doeng ak ai ce koeh the na seh, anhah doeng ak ai ingawm ik-oeih boeih ak ai ce koeh cawt seh, kawtih anih ce Khawsa ing do hawh hy.
Thlakchang a tyihzawih awi ak deng nang ce a u nu? A Bawipa aham ni ang dyih nawh ang tluk hy. Anih ce dyi kaw, Bawipa ing anih ce dyih sak thai hy.
Thlang pynoet ing khawnghi ak chang boeih anglakawh khawnghi pynoet ce ak ciimcaih na poek hy; thlang pynoet bai ingtaw khawnghi boeih ce ang myih na poek hy. Thlang boeih ing amah ak poeknaak amyihna awm seh.
Khawnghi ak zeih ing Bawipa a boeimangnaak hamna ni a zeih, ik-oeih ak ai ing Khawsa venna zeelawi kqawn nawh a ai ak caming Khawsa kyihcahnaakna ai hy; a mak ai ingawm Khawsa venna zeelawi ak kqawn ak caming Khawsa kyihcahnaak na am ai hy.
U awm ni mah doeng aham amni hqing nawh ni mah doeng aham am ni thi hy.
Ni hqing awhtaw Bawipa ham ni hqing unawh, ni thih awh awm Bawipa ham ni, ni thih uh hy. Cedawngawh ni hqing awh awm, ni thih awh awm ningnih taw Bawipa koena ni awm uhy.
Ve a dawngawh ni thlak thi ingkaw thlak hqing a Bawipa na a awmnaak thai aham, Khrih taw thi nawh hqing tlaih hy.
Cawhtaw, ikaw ham na nu nang ing na koeinaa ce awi na deng? Ikaw ham nu na koeinaa ce na thenaak? Ningmih boeih ve Khawsa awidengnaak ngawihdoelh a haiawh ning dyi boeih kawm uh.
”Kai ka hqing a dawngawh, khawkhlu boeih ing ka haiawh khuk sym kawm uh, lai boeih ing khawsa haiawh thawlh phawng kawm uh,” tinawh qee hyt awm hawh hy. “Kai ka hqing a dawngawh, khawkhlu boeih ing ka haiawh khuk sym kawm uh, lai boeih ing khawsa haiawh thawlh pho kawm uh,” tinawh qee hyt awm hawh hy.
Cedawngawh ningnih boeih ing nimah akawng ce Khawsa haiawh nik pho kawm uh.
Cedawngawh pynoet ingkaw pynoet awi koeh deng qu voel u sih. Ce anglakawh, u ingawm koeinaa ang tluknaak ham ingkaw ang bahnaak hly kawi ce koeh sai voel u sih.
Bawipa Jesu awh ka awm hawh amyihna, ikawmyih a buh a an awm amah poek awh am ciimcaih hy tice am awm hy. Cehlai u ingawm ik-oeih pynoet oet ce amak ciimcaih na ak poek awhtaw, anih aham am ciim hy.
Nang a awk ai awh ce na koeinaa ing ak kaw ama law awhtaw, lungnaak ing them am sai voel hyk ti. Anih aham Khrih ce a thih hawh dawngawh na awk na ai ing na koeinaa ce koeh hqe.
Nangmih ing nep hy tinawh namik poek ce thlang ing ak che na koeh kqawn seh.
Ikawtih Khawsa qam taw awk ai awh am awm hy, Khawsa qam taw dyngnaak, qoep ang quinaak, Ciim Myihla awh zeelnaak ni,
u awm vemyihna Khrih a bi ak bi ing Khawsa zeel sak nawh thlang ing kyih am cah hy.
Cedawngawh qoep ang quinaak ben ingkaw pynoet ingkaw pynoet hawihkhangnaak kawi ben ce sai u sih.
Buh a an a dawngawh Khawsa bibi ce koeh hqe u sih. Buh a an boeih ve ciim hy, cehlai thlang ang bahnaak aham ikawmyih awm ni awk ni ai ve am thym hy.
“Na koeinaa ang tluknaak hly kawi na a awm awhtaw, meh a ma ai ham aw, misurtui ama awk ham aw, am awhtaw kaw awm a ma ai aham nep hy.
Ve a ik-oeih awh ve nang ing nak cangnaak ce namah ingkaw Khawsa anglakawh ta dym. U awm amah ing a sai ik-oeih awh dawk amak pe qu taw a zo ak seen thlang ni.
Cehlai u awm upvoetnaak kawlung ing ak ai taw thawlh hawh hy, cangnaak ing ama ai a dawngawh; cangnaak awhkawng amak law ik-oeih boeih taw thawlhnaak na awm hy.
Ningmih tha ak awmkhqi ing tha amak awmkhqi a voetnaak ce ning zaksim peek aham awm hy, nimah ak kawzeelnaak doeng poek aham am awm hy.
Ningmih boeih ing ni ven awhkaw thlang a leeknaak aham ingkaw a hawihkhangnaak aham ak kawzeelnaak ce sai peek aham awm hy.
Khrih ing zani amah ak kawzeelnaak ce am sai hy, “Nang anik zyikungkhqi a zyihnaak ce kak khanawh tla hawh hy,” tinawh qee na a awm amyihna.
yhnaak ingkaw Cakciim ak thapeeknaak ak caming ngaih-unaak ni taaknaak thai aham, ak kqym awh a mi na qeekhqi boeih taw ningnih cang saknaak aham ni a mina qee hy.
yhnaak ingkaw thaawmnaak ak pekung Khawsa ing Jesu Khrih a hu ak hquut na nami awm dawngawh nangmih kawlung pynoet na taaknaak ce ni pek khqi seh,
ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih a Pa Khawsa ce nami zoeksangnaak thai aham namik kawlung ingkaw nami hui na mim lai pynoet na ta lah uh.
Khawsa zoeksang na a awmnaak thai aham, Khrih ing nangmih a ni do khqi lawt amyihna nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet do qu lah uh.
Ikawtih ka nik kqawn peek khqi taw Khawsa ak awitak ang zyngna Khrih ce Judakhqi a tyihzawih na coeng hy, pakdamkhqi venawh awi a taak ce caksak aham, tive ni,
am qeennaak awh Gentelkhqi ing Khawsa ce a mi zoeksangnaak thai aham na ni. “Cedawngawh Gentelkhqing lak awh nang ce ni zoeksang kawng nyng saw; nang ming kyihcahnaak laa ce sa kawng nyng.”
Aw Gentel thlangkhqi, ak thlangkhqi mi zeel lah uh,” tinawh qee hyt amyihna.
Cekcoengawh, “Gentelkhqi boeih aw, Bawipa ce kyihcah lah uh, thlangkhqi boeih aw, a venawh thangleeknaak laa sa lah uh,” ti bai hy.
Cekcoengawh Isaiah ingawm, “Phynlum thlang uk aham, Jesse ak kqa ce cawn kaw; Gentelkhqi ing anih awh ce ngaih-unaak ta kawm uh,” tinawh kqawn bai hy.
Ciim Myihla thaawmnaak ingkaw ngaih-unaak ing nami be hlai thainaak aham, amah ce nami ypnaak amyihna, ngaih-unaak Khawsa ing awmhly zeelnaak boeih ing nangmih ce ni be sak khqi seh.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih taw leeknaak ing be uhyk ti, cyihnaak ing soep u tiksaw pynoet ingkaw pynoet yn a tawn qu uhyk ti, tice sim nyng.
Khawsam qeennaak ka venawh a ni peek amyihna, ityk nin taw qaal nepnaak ing ca ni qee law pek khqi kawng nyng,
Gentelkhqi venawh Jesu Khrih a bibikung na ka awm amyihna, Ciim Myihla a ciim saknaak ak caming Khawsa a do kawi ik-oeih peek na a mi awm thainaak aham khawsoeih bibinaak ing Khawsa ak awithang leek khypyi nyng.
Cedawngawh Jesu Khrih awh Khawsa bi ka binaak awh ve kyih qunyng.
Kai ing kai ak caming a soep sak Khawsa awingainaak aham Gentelkhqi sawinaak am awhtaw, ce ce kqawn nawh sai hawh nyng, ikaw awm ap kqawn sawhqat kawng –
Myihla thaawmnaak ing kawpoek kyi saithainaakkhqi ce sai hawh nyng. Jerusalem awhkawng Illiricum kengsam dyna, Khrih ak awithang ce khypyi hawh nyng.
Thlang ing Khrih a ma simnaak a hun awh awithang leek kypyi ve kai ang cainaak na awm poepa hy, cawh ni thlang ak tungling ak khanawh im am ka sak hly.
”Thlang ing amak kqawn peek thlangkhqi ing za kawm usaw, amak zakhqi ing zasim kawm uh,” tinawh qee hyt awm hawh hy.
Ve a dawngawh nangmih a venna am ka law thainaak na awm hoeih hoeih hy
Cehlai tuh awhtaw ve a qam tloek awh bibinaak aham a hun am awm voel hy, nangmih a myi awm ka huh aham ka ngaih hawh adawngawh,
Spain qam na ka ceh awh law aham cai nyng. Ka ceh awh cawhkawng law kawng nyng saw nangmih awm ni hqip lawk khqi kawng nyng, nangmih mi a khoeh ni awm coengawh, lam awh nangmih ing nim leng bet kawm uk ti tinawh ngaih-unyng.
Cehlai, tuh awhtaw, Jerusalem awh a mik awm thlakciimkhqi bibipyi aham cet hun nyng.
Makedonia ingkaw Akhaia awhkaw thlangkhqi ingtaw awmhly doena Jerusalem awh ak awm thlak ciim khawdengkhqi ik-oeih do a dan uhy.
Cemyihna do dan aham ce ngaih uhy, cekkhqi venawh cemyihna a mi sai ham qoe na awm awm hy. Gentelkhqi ing Judakhqi ang Myihla zoseennaak ce a pang pyi awhtaw, pumsa ik-oeih zoseen naak ce Judakhqi venawh a ming qek a ming qaa thoem aham awm lawt hy.
Vawhkaw bibi kak coengawh vawhkaw ak thaih ve a mingmih ing a mi huh coeng awhtaw, Spain qam na cet kawng nyng, nangmih awm ni hqip lawk khqi pahoei kawng.
Nangmih a venna ka law awh, Khrih a zoseennaak ing ak be na law kawng nyng tice sim nyng.
Koeinaakhqi, kyinaak ka huhnaak awh ve kai aham Khawsa venawh nami nik cykcah pyi aham, ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih ingkaw Myihla lungnaak ak caming thoeh law nyng.
Judah awhkaw amak cangnaak thlangkhqi a kut khuiawh kawng loet nawh Jerusalem awh amik awm thlak ciimkhqi ing ka bibi ve a mi donaak thai aham cykcah lah uh,
Khawsa ngaihnaak amyihna, zeelnaak ing nangmih nami kqaknaak aham nangmih a venawh ka law thainaak aham cai nyng.
Khawsa a ngaihdingnaak nangmih boeih a venawh awm seh. Amen.
Kenkhrea khaw thlangboel a tyihzawih na ak awm nangmih ingkaw kaimih a ci nu Fobi ce ym law lah uh.
Anih ce Bawipa awh thlakciimkhqi amyihna do law unawh, nangmih a venawh kawng ang syt bawmnaak ce pe law uh, anih ing thlang khawzah ce bawm hy, kai awm ni bawm hy.
Jesu Khrih awh a bibi pyi Priscilla ingkaw Aquila ce kut tlaih law uh.
Kai aham a ni hqingnaak dy dun hy nih. Kai doeng am nawh Gentel thlangboel boeih ing cekqawi ak khanawh zeelnaak ta uhy.
Cekkqawi a im awh a mik cun thlangboelkhqi awm kut tlaih law uh. Ka pyi Epenetus ce kut tlaih law uh, anih ce Asia qam khuiawh lama cyk na Khrih ak cangnaak na awm hy.
Nangmih aham thatlawh doena bi ak bi Meri ce kut tlaih law uh.
Thawngim kang tlaak pyi haih ka cakaw qawi Andqonikas ingkaw Junias ce kut tlaih law uh. Cekkqawi taw ceityihkhqi anglakawh thlang ing sim nawh, kai hlanawh Khrih awh awm hawh hy nih.
Bawipa awh ka lungnaak Ampliatas ce kut tlaih law uh.
Khrih awh bibi pyikung Urbanas ingkaw ka pyi Staki ce kut tlaih law uh.
Noek a dak na awm hlai hy ak cek khak, Apelles ce kut tlaih law uh.
Ka cakaw na ak awm, Herodion ce kut tlaih law uh. Bawipa awh a mik awm Narkisa ipkhui ce kut tlaih law uh.
Bawipa awh bibi ak cak nu qawi, Trufena ingkaw Trufosa ce kut tlaih law uh. Bawipa awh bibi ak cak, ka pyi nu Persi ce kut tlaih law uh.
Bawipa awh tyk na ak awm Rufa ingkaw a nu, kai a nu na awm awm lawt hy, anih ce kut tlaih law uh.
Asunkhqita, Flekon, Herme, Patqoba, Herma ingkaw koeinaakhqi ce kut tlaih law uh.
Filloka, Julia, Neria ingkaw a koeinu, Olimpas ingkaw cawh ak awm thlak ciimkhqi boeih ce kut tlaih law uh.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet ak ciim mawknaak ing mawk qu lah uh. Khrih thlangboel boeih ing nangmih kut ni tlaih khqi uhy.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih anglak li awh phek a bonaak sai nawh nami cawng ing ak kalh na nangmih lam anik kangkhqi awh ce nami ngaihtaak aham ni ngaih khqi nyng. Cemyih ak thlangkhqi ce qei uh.
Cemyih ak thlangkhqi ing ningnih a Boei Khrih a bi ce am bi uhy, a mimah ak phoen phyinaak aham ni bi a mi bi. A mi pauthainaak ing thlang kyih am cah unawh kaw amak cak thlangkhqi ce thai na uhy.
Thlang boeih ing nangmih ak awingainaak ce za hawh uhy, cedawngawh nangmih ak khanawh zeel soeih nyng; cehlai them leek awh cyih nami taak aham ingkaw them amak leek awh ce ikaw amak sim amyihna nami awm aham ngaih nyng.
Roepnaak Khawsa ing Setan ce nami khaw ing ni neet sak khqi bit kaw. Ningmih a Bawipa Jesu am qeennaak ce nangmih a venawh awm seh.
Ka bibi pyi, Timote ing nangmih ce kut ni tlaih khqi uhy, ka cakawkhqi Lukia, Jason ingkaw Sosipater mi ingawm kut ni tlaih khqi uhy.
Ve ca ak qeekung kai, Tertia ingawm Bawipa awh kut ni tlaih khqi nyng.
Kai ingkaw vawh ak awm thlangboel toek nawh ak khuut ak hlepkung Gaia ing kut ni tlaih khqi uhy. Khawk bau khuiawh kaw qangpui bibinaak ak hquikung Erasta ingkaw kaimih a naa Kuarta ing kut ni tlaih khqi uhy.
Ningmih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih am qeennaak nangmih a venawh awm seh. Amen.
Kai ing kak kqawn law awithang leek ingkaw Jesu Khrih akawng kak kqawn lawnaak ak caming nangmih anik dyih sak khqi thaikung ing, ni hu ben kum khawqyt khuiawh thuh na ak awm awi hyp ce,
tuh awhtaw kumqui Khawsa ak awipeeknaak amyihna tawnghakhqi ak cauk awh dang sak hawh hy, qam boeih thlang ing cangna unawh anih ak awi ce a ming ngainaak aham –
ce Khawsa ak cyi doeng a venawh Jesu Khrih ak caming kumqui dy thangleeknaak awm seh! Amen.
Khawsa a ngaihnaak amyihna Jesu Khrih a ceityih na ak awm Paul ingkaw ni koeinaa Sosthenas ing,
Korin khaw awh ak awm Khawsa a thlangboel ingkaw, Jesu Khrih awh ciimcaih sak na awm nawh ak ciimcaih na awm aham ak khy thlangkhqi, hun hoei awh a mingmih ingkaw ningnih a Boei – ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang ming ak khy thlangkhqi boeih a venawh:
Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih a ven awhkaw qeennaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak awm seh.
Jesu Khrih ak caming nangmih a venawh a ni peek khqi am qeennaak awh nangmih aham Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn poepa nyng.
Amah awh ce nangmih taw ik-oeih soepkep awh boei uhyk ti – awi kqawnnaak boeih ingkaw cyihnaak soepkep awh –
kaimih ing Khrih akawng ka mik kqawn law ce nangmih awh ce cak hawh hy.
Cedawngawh nangmih ing ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang dangnaak nyn ce naming lamtoen awh myihla zoepeek kutdo ik-oeih voet hlauhnaak qoe qoe am ta voel uhyk ti.
Ningmih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih a kawnyn awh nangmih taw coet ak kap na am nami awmnaak aham, amah ing a dyt dyna thaawmnaak ni pek khqi bit kaw.
Khawsa capa, ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih khawsaknaak haih a nik khy khqi taw ypawm hy.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih anglakawh phekbonaak ama awmnaak aham pynoet ingkaw pynoet kawpoek kutoet na ta unawh kawlung pynoet poeknaak pynoet ing nami cuui aham ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang ming ing qeennaak ni thoeh lawk khqi nyng.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih anglakawh oelh qunaak awm hy, tinawh Khalo ipkhui khaw awhkaw thlangkhqi ing kqawn law uhy.
Kak kqawn ngaihnaak taw veni: Nangmih anglakawh thlangvang ing, “Kai taw Paul a bawng ni,” ti uhyk ti, thlangvang bai ing, “Kai taw Apollo a bawng ni,” ti uhyk ti, ak chang khqi bai ing, “Kai taw Cepha a bawng ni,” ti uhyk ti, a chang bai ing, “Kai taw Khrih a bawng ni,” ti uhyk ti.
Khrih ve phek ang bo qunawh nu? Paul aw nangmih aham thinglam awh a mi tai? Paul ang ming awh aw baptisma nami huh?
Krispa ingkaw Gaia doeng am taw u awm baptisma am ka ni peek khqi a dawngawh zeel nyng.
Cedawngawh kai ang ming awh baptisma ak hu u awm am awm hy.
(Oeih, Stefen ipkhui khaw ce baptisma pe bai nyng; cekcoengawh, thlak chang baptisma ka peek ak awm hy voei nu, am sim nyng.)
Ikawtih Khrih ing baptisma peek aham amni tyi hy, awithang leek ak khypyi aham ni a ni tyih – thlanghqing a cyihnaak awi ing amni, cawh mantaw Khrih thinglam sai thainaak ce a hqawng na awm hawh kaw.
Thinglam awithang taw ak qeeng huikhqi aham qawnaak na awm nawh, hulna ak awm hui ningnihkhqi aham taw Khawsa thaawmnaak na awm hy.
“Thlakcyikhqi a cyihnaak ce hqe kawng nyng saw; kawpoek ak cyikhqi ak poeknaak ce hoet kawng nyng,” tinawh qee hyt awm hawh hy.
Thlakcyi hana nu? Cak qeekung hana nu? Ve khawmdek awh ak oelhkung ce hana nu? Khawsa ing khawmdek cyihnaak ce qawnaak tinawh am dang sak nawh nu?
Khawsa a cyihnaak ve khawmdek cyihnaak ing ama pha dawngawh amah ce am sim thai hy, qawnaak awi khypyinaak ak caming ak cangnaak thlangkhqi hul na a awmnaak awh Khawsa taw ak kaw zeel hy.
Judakhqi ing kawpoek kyi hatnaak ce ngaih uhy, Greekkhqi ing cyihnaak,
cehlai ningnih ingtaw Khrih thinglam awi ce nik khypyi uhy: ve ak awi ve Judakhqi ang bahnaak na awm nawh Gentelkhqi a qawnaak na awm hy,
cehlai Khawsa ing ak khykhqi aham taw, Juda awm Greek awm, Khrih taw Khawsa ak thaawmnaak na a awm dawngawh, Khawsa a cyihnaak na awm hy.
Ikawtih Khawsa a qawnaak taw thlanghqing a cyihnaak anglakawh cyi bet nawh, Khawsa ak tha ama awmnaak taw thlanghqing ak tha awmnaak anglakawh ak tha awm bet hy.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih khy na nami awm awh ikawmyihna nami awm tice poek lah uh. Thlanghqing a huh awhtaw nangmih ak khuiawh thlakcyi khawzah am awm uhyk ti; thlang ak khanawh ak awm khawzah am awm uhyk ti; qypawm ipkhui awh ak awm thlang khawzah am awm bai uhyk ti.
Cehlai thlakcyi chah sak aham Khawsa ing khawmdek awh ak qawkhqi ce tyk nawh; tha ak awmkhqi chah sak aham khawmdek awh tha amak awmkhqi ce tyk hy.
Ve khawmdek awh ak kaina ak awmkhqi ingkaw thlang ing a thenaak khqi – ik-oeih ak awmkhqi ce hqe aham –
u awm a haiawh amang oek qu aham amak awm ik-oeihkhqi ce tyk hy.
Anih ak caming nangmih taw Jesu Khrih ak khuiawh awm uhyk ti, anih ce ningnih aham Khawsa ven awhkaw cyihnaak na awm hy – cetaw ningnih aham dyngnaak, ciimnaak ingkaw hulnaak na awm hy.
Cedawngawh, U awm ak oek qu ingtaw Bawipa awh oek qu seh,” tinawh a qee awm hawh hy.
Nangmih a venna ka law awh, Koeinaakhqi, pau thainaak, cyihnaak ak sang soeih ing Khawsak awi nangmih a venawh ap khy law pyi nyng.
Nangmih a venawh ka awm awh ce Jesu Khrih ingkaw a thinglam awi am awhtaw ikawm sim aham am poek nyng.
Nangmih a venna ka law awh tha a awm kaana kqih doe ingkaw thyn doena ni ka law.
Kak awih kqawn ingkaw awi ka nik kqawn law peek khqi awm cyihnaak ingkaw thlanghqing ak kawtlaak na ap kqawn nyng, Myihla thaawmnaak ing ni kak kqawn law,
nangmih ak cangnaak taw thlanghqing a cyihnaak awh am hang nawh, Khawsa ak thaawmnaak awh ni ang hang hy.
Hqamcakhqi venna taw cyihnaak awi ce kqawn nyng, cehlai khawmdek cyihnaak awi amni, ve khawmdek ukkung ak qeeng hly khqi ak awicyih awm am ni;
Khawsa ak awicyih awihyp, thuh na ak awm, ni boeimangnaak a hamna Khawsa ing khawmdek a syn hlan awhkawng a hoep cee hawh awi ni.
Cece u khawmdek ukkung pynoet ca ingawm ce a cyihnaak ce am sim uhy, ami sim mantaw boeimangnaak Bawipa ce thinglam awh am tai voei uh.
Cehlai, Mik ing ama huh khawi, haa ing amang zaak khawi ingkaw, kawlung ing amak poek khawi ce amah ing a lungnaak thlangkhqi ham Khawsa ing qoek a bah pe hawh hy.” tinawh qeena awm hy.
Khawsa ing ningnih a venawh amah ang Myihla ak caming dang law sak hawh hy. Myihla ing ik-oeih boeih ce sui hy, Khawsa a koe ak dung soeih awm sui hy.
Ak khuiawh thlanghqing myihla awm kaana thlanghqing ak kawpoek ak sim u nu ak awm? Cemyih lawtna Khawsang Myihla kaana u ingawm Khawsa ak poeknaak ce am sim hy.
Ningmih ing ve khawmdek myihla amni hu unawh Khawsa ing a zoena a ni peek ce ning zaksimnaak thai aham Khawsa ven awhkaw Myihla ni ni huh uh hy.
Ve ni ka mik kqawn hy, thlanghqing a cyih thoemnaak ing a ni cawngpyi am nawh, myihla awitak ce myihla ak awi ing myihla a cawngpyinaak amyihna kqawn unyng.
Myihla amak ta thlang ing Khawsang Myihla a venawh kawng ak law ce am do thai hy, anih aham taw cekkhqi ce qawnaak na awm hy, Myihla ben nakaw na a awm adawngawh, ang zaak na awm am zasim thai hy.
Myihla thlang ingtaw a soep hoei sim hy, cehlai anih ce u ingawm am sim thai uhy.
U ing nu Khawsak kawlung ce sim nawh anih ce awi ak kqawn peek thai? Cehlai kaimih ingtaw Khrih ak kawlung ta unyng.
Koeinaakhqi, myihlak thlangkhqi venawh awikqawn amyihna nami venawh ap kqawn nyng, cehlai pumsak thlangkhqi venawh kqawn amyih nani kak kqawn hy, Khrih-awh nasen thlangkhqi venna kqawn amyih na.
Buh am nawh, suktui ing ni ka ni cawm khqi hun, buh nami ai thai hlan adawngawh; tuhawm am ai thai hlan uhyk ti.
Pumsak thlangna awm hun uhyk ti. Naming lakawh yytnaak ingkaw oelh qunaak a awm adawngawh pumsak thlangna awm unawh khawmdek thlangna am nami awm nawh nu?
Pynoet ing, “Kai taw Paul a bawng ni,” pynoet bai ing, “Kai taw Apollo a bawng ni,” nami ti khui pumsak thlangna am nami awm nawh nu?
Apollo ce a u nu? Paul taw a u bai nu? Nangmih ing namik cangnaak thai aham Bawipa ing bibi a peek qip tyihzawihkhqi boeih ni.
Kai ing saw nyng, Apollo ing tui syp hy, cehlai ak tai sakkung taw Khawsa ni.
Cedawngawh ak sawkung ingkaw ak sypkung ce ikawna am awm hy, Khawsa doeng ing ni, a cawt sak.
Ak sawkung ingkaw ak sypkung ang cainaak taw pynoet ni, a ni bibinaak amyihna cekqawi ing zoepeek kutdo ce hu bit kawm nih.
Ikawtih kaimih taw Khawsa bibi pyikung na awm unyng saw; nangmih taw Khawsa lo na, Khawsa im na awm uhyk ti.
Khawsam qeennaak ka venawh a ni peeknaak amyihna, im ak sa thai amyihna kai ing lung im khoeng nyng, thlak chang ing ce lungkhoeng awh im sa hy. Cehlai im ak sakung ing ikawmyihna im a sak tice ngaihta seh.
Ikawtih thlang pynoet ing lung a khoeng coeng awhtaw thlak chang ing ce ak khanawh lung ak chang am khoeng thai voel hy, cawhkaw lungkhoeng cetaw Jesu Khrih ni.
Ce lungkhoeng ak khanawh u ingawm sui, ngun, lung a phuktlo, thing, cangzing ing im a sak awhtaw,
thlang boeih a bibi ce dang kaw. Khawnghi ing dang law sak kaw. Maina dang law sak nawh; ce a mai ing thlang boeih a bibi ce ikawmyih bibi aw tice dang law sak kaw.
U myih awm cawhkaw a im sak ce ang dyih poe awhtaw, zoepeek kutdo ce hu kaw.
Cehlai im ce a uih boeih awhtaw hlawng boeih kaw, amah taw loet hly hlai hy, mai kqawng anglakawhkawng ak loet amyihna awm kaw.
Khawsang Myihla nangmih ak khuiawh a awm adawngawh, nangmih taw Khawsa a bawkim na awm uhyk ti, tice am nami sim nawh nu?
U ingawm Khawsa a bawkim ce a hqe awhtaw, Khawsa ing anih ce hqe lawt kaw; kawtih Khawsa a bawkim taw ciimcaih hy, cawhkaw bawkim taw nangmih ni.
Na mimah ingkaw na mimah koeh thai qu na uh. Nangmih anglakawh u ingawm tuh tloek awhkaw cyihnaak awh amah ingkaw amah ce thlakcyi na ang ngai qu awhtaw, thlakcyi na a awmnaak aham “thlakqaw” na awm seh.
Ikawtih ve khawmdek cyihnaak ve Khawsa mik huh awhtaw qawnaak nani a awm. “Thlakcyikhqi ce a mimah a thainaak awh aawk sak khqi hy,” tinawh qee amyihna,
cekcoengawh, Bawipa ing thlakcyikhqi ak poeknaak ve a hqawng a h qap nani a awm hy tice sim hy,” tinawh awm bai hy.
Cedawngawh, thlanghqing awh ve ikaw awm oek qu aham am awm hy! Ik-oeih boeih ve nangmih aham ni,
Paul awm Apollo awm am awhtaw Cepha awm, khawmdek awm hqingnaak awm thihnaak awm tuh kawkkhqi awm haiben awhkawk khqi awm – nangmih boeih aham ni,
nangmih awm Khrih a koena awm u tiksaw Khrih taw Khawsa koena awm hy.
Cedawngawh ningnih ve Khrih a tyihzawih ingkaw Khawsa ak awihyp ak khoem thlang na thlang ing ning ngai khqi seh.
Ik-oeih ak khoemkung taw ypawmna a awm ham ngaih hy.
Nangmih am awhtaw thlanghqing awidengnaak ing awi nami ni deng mai mantaw ikaw na awm am poek nyng; kamah ingkaw kamah zani awi am deng qunyng.
Kak kawpoek ve caih hlai hy, coet a kap kaana am awm nyng. Bawipa ing ni kai ve awi a ni deng hy.
Cedawngawh a tym a pha hlanawh u awm awi koeh deng; Bawipa a law dy qeh uh. Anih ing khawmthan khuiawh thuh na ak awmkhqi ce vangnaak awh dang sak kawmsaw thlanghqing ak kawlung awm dang sak bit kaw. Cawh thlang boeih ing Khawsa am kyihnaak ce hu boeih bit kawm uh.
Tuh koeinaakhqi, “Cawh qee na ak awm ak kep na koeh cet uh,” tinaak awi ce kainih a venawh kawng nami cawngnaak thai aham nangmih nami hawihkhangnaak aham ve a ik-oeihkhqi ve kai ingkaw Apollo ing haw na nih nyng. Cawhtaw thlang pynoet ing pynoet ak khanawh am oek qu kaw.
U ing nu nangmih ak lawha bet na a ni sai khqi? Am nami huh ak kaa awh ikaw nami taak? Nami huh awhtaw kawtih amak hu amyihna nami zoeksang qu?
Nami ngaih ce ta hawh uhyk ti! Nangmih taw boei hawh uhyk ti! Kaimih kaana – sangpahrangkhqi na coeng hawh uhyk ti! Nangmih mi sangpahrang na awm haih aham, sangpahrang na nami awm tang tang ce ni ngaih pyi khqi soeih soeih nyng!
Kai ingtaw, thih aham ami toen thlangkhqi amyihna, Khawsa ing kaimih ceityihkhqi ve a dytnaak benawh ni dang sak namih hy, tinawh poek nyng. Khawk khan ingkaw khawmdek boeih a haiawh, khan ceityihkhqi ingkaw thlangkhqi haiawh dan aham kaimih ve ni sai khqi hy.
Khrih aham thlakqaw na awm unyng, cehlai nangmih taw Khrih awh cyi uhyk ti! Kaimih taw ka mik tha am awm hy, cehlai nangmih taw namik tha awm hy!
Tuh qoe qoe awh ve kaimih taw buh cawi unawh tui ngaih unyng, ak pum a zal na awm unyng, thlang a kut hqitnaak na awm unyng saw im a lo taal unyng.
Ka mimah a kut ing bi bi unyng. Thlang ing a ni thekhanaak khqi awh, yh ngah ngah unyng;
amak thym na ami nik kqawn awh, kawdungnaak ing hlat pe unyng. Tuh dy na khawmdek bi bawi amyihna awm unyng saw, khawmdek ing ama ngaih na awm unyng.
Nangmih namik chahnaak aham ve ak ca ve ka qee law amni, ka lungnaak ka cakhqi amyihna ni nami ngaihtaaknaak aham ve ak ca ve qee law nyng.
Khrih awh nangmih a nik khoemkungkhqi thlang thonghqa awm ta hlai uhyk ti, pa khawzah am ta uhyk ti, Ikawtih Jesu Khrih awh awithang leek ak caming kai ve nangmih a pa na coeng nyng.
Cedawngawh kai ve nami ni oet aham ni ngaih khqi nyng.
Ve adawngawh ka lungnaak, ka capa ingkaw thlang ypawm, Timote ce nangmih a venawh tyi law nyng, anih ing Jesu Khrih awh ka khawsak ce khaw a hoei awhkaw Thlangboel a venawh ka cawngpyinaak a amyih ce ni sim sak khqi bit kaw.
Kai, nangmih a ven am kak law hly voel amyihna thlangvang ing oek qu uhy.
Cehlai, Bawipa ing tyng hy a ti awhtaw, nangmih a venna law nai kawng nyng, cawh cawhkaw ak oek qukhqi ak awi doeng kaana, a mi bibikhqi ce sim bit kawng.
Ikawtih Khawsa qam taw pauthainaak awh am awm nawh thaawmnaak awh ni a awm.
Han nu nami ngaih bet? Vyknaak cung ing nu ka law kaw, am awhtaw lungnaak ingkaw kawdungnaak ing nu ka law kaw?
Nangmih anglakawh nupa thawlhnaak, lukihkhqi venawh za amak awm, a pa a zu ak zunaak awithang za nyng.
Nangmih ing kawseet doena cemyihna ak awm thlang ce ak chang na nami hqek aham awm hlai hy, cehlai nangmih ing oek qu na lat uhyk ti?
Nangmih a venawh pumsa ingtaw am awm hlai nyng, myihla ingtaw nangmih a venawh awm nyng. Kamah kak awm a mih qoe qoe na, kai ingtaw cemyihna ak awm ak thlang ce awi deng hawh nyng.
Bawipa Jesu ang ming ing nangmih kutoet na naming cun awh kai awm myihla ingtaw awm lawt nyng, ningnih a Bawipa Jesu ak thaawnnaak awm cawh awm hy,
