Nangmih aham phyihqih na am ka awm ak kqawn kaana thlangboel ak changkhqi anglakawh nangmih ikaw nemnaak nami taak aih? Amak thymnaak awh nim qeen kawm uk ti.
Tuh a thumvoeinaak na nangmih hqip ahamna cai nyng, cehlai nangmih aham phyihqih na am awm kawng nyng, nangmih a them ce am ngaih nyng saw na mimah qoe qoe ni ka ni ngaih khqi hy. Cakhqi ing ami nu ami pa aham them am cun pe khawi uhy ami nu ami pakhqi ing ni cakhqi aham amim cun peek.
Cedawngawh ka taak themkhqi boeih ce nangmih aham zeel doena haw na kawng nyng saw kamah aham awm haw na kawng nyng. Nangmih ve ka ni lungnaak khqi khqoet mantaw, nangmih a lungnaak ce ak zawi hly lat nu?
Cemyihna awm mai seiawm, nangmih a phyihqih na am awm nyng. Cehlai, ak thai ak thlang, ni thai naak khqi nyng saw nangmih ce nim tuk khqi nyng!
Nangmih a venawh ka tyih law thlang u awm haw na nyng saw nangmih ka ni ai khqi nawh nu?
Tita ce ceei nyng saw nangmih a venawh koeinaa thlang pynoet ingqawi tyi law haih nyng. Tita ing nangmih amni ai khqi hy, anik ai khqi nu? Cawhkaw kawlung ing am sai nih nyng saw ce a lam ce am ka ni hqut bawk nawh nu?
Nangmih a venawh kaimih ing ka mimah ak cangnaak ni kami hul hy, tinawh namik poek nawh nu? Khrih awh ak awm na kami awm dawngawh Khawsa mik huh awh ni awi ka nik kqawn law peek khqi hy; ka pyikhqi, bi ka sai lawkhqi boeih awm, nangmih namik tha a awmnaak aham nani.
Ikawtih kai ka law awh ka ngaihnaak amyihna amni huk khqi hau kawng nyng saw nangmih ingawm huh nami ni ngaih amyihna kai ve amni hu hau kawm uk ti, tice kqih nyng. Hqonaak, tlaiseetnaak, kawsonaak, oelh qunaak, kqawnseetnaak, ang hyp na theet qunaak, oek qunaak ingkaw khawboe seetnaakkhqi awm hau kaw tice kqih nyng.
Nangmih a venna ka law tlaih awh ka Khawsa ing nangmih a haiawh chah ni lawh sak hau kawmsaw, maa na kaw ak thawlh thlangkhqi ingkaw ama ciimcaihnaak benawh amak zut ak thlangkhqi, nu ingkaw pa thawlh sainaak ingkaw pumsa ngaihnaak ak saikhqi ak khanawh kak kaw se bai kaw, tice kqih nyng.
Ve ve a thum voeinaak nangmih ka ni hqipnaak khqi na awm kaw. Ikawmyih a kawng awhawm thlang pakkhih pakthum simpyikung simpyinaak ing nami caksak aham awm hy.
Nangmih a venawh ka awm awh a hih voeinaak na ngaihtaaknaak awi nik kqawn pek khqi hawh nyng. Tuh kamah am ka awm awh nik kqawn law pek khqi tlaih bai nyng: Kang hlat law tlaih awh ak thawlhkhqi ingkaw them chang ak saikhqi ce am hlyn kawng nyng,
kai awhkawng Khrih ing awi ak kqawn tang hy voei nu tice nangmih ing kyk uhyk ti. Nangmih ing tuqunaak awh anih ce tha amak awm thlang na am awm hy, nangmih anglakawh ak tha awm hy.
Tha ama awm doena thinglam awh tai hlai uhy, Khawsa thaawmnaak ing hqing hy. Cemyih lawtna, kaimih taw amah awh tha amak awm na awm hlai unyng, nangmih a bibi aham amah awh Khawsa thaawmnaak ing awm kawng unyng.
Cangnaak ak khuiawh nami awm ingkaw am nami awm ce, na mimah ingkaw na mimah noek dak qu lah uh. Am awhtaw, nangmih awh Jesu Khrih awm hy ti namimah ing am naming sim qu thai nawh nu? Amak ngaih thlangna am nami awm awhtaw.
Kaimih taw a ngaih kana am awm unyng tih namik simna ning ngai khqi nyng.
Amak thym na bi am nami binaak aham Khawsa venawh cykcah unyng. Noek a daknaak awh amni bo hy tice thlang ing a huhnaak ham am nawh, amni sai namih hy tinawh anik poek awh awm ak thym ik-oeih ce ni sainaak aham ni.
Awitak ing ak kalh na ikawm amni sai thai hy, awitak aham ni ikawm ni sai uh hy.
Kaimih taw kamik tha ama awm awh zeel unyng, cehlai nangmih taw namik tha awm hy; kaimih ing nangmih nami soepnaak aham cykcah unyng.
Cedawngawh ni kamah am ka awm awh ve ak ca ve ka qee law hy, ka law awh ka sai thainaak haw na nawh am ka tlungnaak aham – cawhkaw saithainaak taw nangmih hqenaak aham am nawh dyih sak aham ni.
A hukhit na taw koeinaakhqi kut nim tuk khqi nyng. Soepnaak ben ce cai na unawh taw, qeennaak ka thoeh law ve ngai lah uh, kawlung kutoet na ta unawh taw, qoepnaak ing awm lah uh. Cawhtaw lungnaak ingkaw qoepnaak Khawsa ce nangmih a venawh awm kaw.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet ak ciimcaih mawknaak ing mawk qu lah uh.
Thlakciimkhqi boeih ing kut nim tuk khqi uhy.
Thlanghqing a venawh kawng thlang ing am tyi nawh, Jesu Khrih ingkaw amah ce thihnaak awhkawng ak thawhkung Pa Khawsa ing a tyih kai ceityih Paul –
ingkaw ka venawh ak awm koeinaakhqi boeih ing, Galatia qam awhkaw thlangboel khqi venawh:
Ningmih a Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih a ven awhkaw qeennaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak nangmih a venawh awm seh,
ni Pa Khawsa ak kawngaihnaak amyihna, tuh khuk awhkaw khawnghi amak leek khuiawh kawng ningnih ce hul aham amah ingkaw amah ce pe qu hy,
amah a venawh thangleeknaak kumqui dyna awm seh. Amen!
Khrih qeennaak ak caming nangmih anik khykung ce hlah plak unawh awithang leek ak chang benna na ming hawitaak a dawngawh kak kawpoek na kyi hy;
cawhkaw awithang leek ce awithang leek tang amni; nangmih ce nik plamkhqi nawh Khrih ak awithang leek ce melh voek aham a mik tha lo uhy.
Cehlai kaimih ing ka mik khy law pyi awithang leek anglakawh ak chang awithang leek ce kaimih ing aw am awhtaw khan ceityihkhqi ing aw khy law pyi bai qoe u seiawm, ce ak awithang ak khypyi ce kumqui dyna tamdeng na awm seh nyng!
Kak kqawn law hawh amyihna, tuh kqawn law tlaih bai vang nyng: Nangmih ing nami do ce awithang leek anglakawh ak chang awithang leek ce thlang ing ak khypyi awhtaw, anih ce kumqui dyna thlakche na awm seh nyng!
Kai ing thlang ak kawngaih nu ka sai, am awhtaw Khawsak ak kawngaih nu? Thlanghqing ak kawzeelnaak nu kai ing ka sai? Thlanghqing ak kawngaihnaak ka sai awhtaw, Khrih a tyihzawih na am awm kawng nyng.
Kai ing kak khypyi awithang leek ve thlang ing a sai mai mai amni, tice koeinaakhqi, nangmih sim sak aham ngaih nyng.
Ve awithang leek ve thlang a ven awhkaw ka huh am nawh, thlang ingawm amni cawngpyi hy; Jesu Khrih ak a phonaak awhkawng ni ka huh hy.
Ak khqym awh Juda phung na ka awm awhkaw ka khawboe ce za hawh uhyk ti, ikawmyih dyna nu Khawsa a thlangboel the a kha na nawh cekkhqi hqe aham tha ka lawhnaak tice sim uhyk ti.
Juda bawknaak benawh Juda thlangkhqi ingkaw ka mi thawn pyi khawzah anglakawh poe khqoet nyng saw ka pakhqi ak awipek awh cak nyng.
Cehlai ka thangthai ca awhkawng anik hoep nawh am qeennaak ing anik khykung Khawsa ing,
Gentelkhqi venawh amah akawng kak khypyi thainaak aham kai awh a Capa ang dang sak naak awhkawng kai ing u awm am doet nyng,
kai hlan awh ceityih na ak awmkhqi huh aham Jerusalem na awm am cet nyng, Arab qam na cet pahoei nyng, cekcoengawh a hu na Damaska khaw na hlat tlaih nyng.
Cawhkawng kum thum a di coengawh, Piter ingqawi ka ning haiben qunaak aham Jerusalem na hang cet nyng saw a venawh hqa nyn hlaihaa awm nyng.
Cawh ceityih ak chang u awm am hu nyng, Bawipa a na Jakob doeng ni ka huh.
Nangmih a venawh ka qee law ve ka qaai amni tice Khawsa haiawh ak cak na nik kqawn law pek khqi nyng.
Cekcoengawh Siria ingkaw Kilikia na cet nyng.
Pumsa benawh taw Judah qam khui awhkaw Khrih awh a mik awm thlangboelkhqi mi am sim qu unyng.
“Maa na ningnih a nik thekhanaak thlang ce tuh awhtaw amah ing hqe aham tha a lawh sih cangnaak ceni ak khypyi hawh lawt hy,” tinawh amik kqawn awithang ce ni a ming zaak hy.
Cekkhqi ing kai ak camawh Khawsa ce kyihcah uhy.
Kumhqa hlaihphli a di coengawh Jerusalem na cet tlaih bai nyng, cawhtaw Barnaba ingqawi cet haih nih nyng. Tita awm ceh pyi haih nyng.
Awiphawng ka huhnaak amyihna Gentelkhqi venawh awithangleek kak khypyi ce kqawn peek aham cet nyng. Cehlai dawng taaqunaak awh a hqawng na dawng hau kawng nyng, tice kak kqih a dawngawh, ve ve sawikung na ak awmkhqi venawh ang hyp na sai nyng.
Ka venawh ak awm Tita, Greek thlang zani chahhui am qeet sak ngah ngah nyng.
Amak thym koeinaakhqi ing kaimih ang dyih hun ce vyt unawh Khrih awh ngaihding na ka mi awmnaak ve tamnaa na sai tlaih aham awi thoeng sak uhy.
Awithang leek awitak ce nangmih awh a cak poenaak aham, cekkhqi venawh kawlhkalh awm am pe unyng.
Awihtung na amik awm thlangkhqi awm, ikawmyih ak thlang awm kai aham a lawhanaak ikaw am awm hy; Khawsa ing ak khan awhkaw ang dangnaak amyihna awi am tlyk ni, cemyih thlangkhqi ing kai ak awih kqawn ve am sap qoe uhy.
Piter ve Juda thlangkhqi venawh awithang leek kqawn aham peek na a awm lawt amyihna, kai awm Gentelkhqi venawh awithang leek kqawn aham ni pehy tice, hu uhy.
Judahkhqi venawh ceityih na ak awm Piter a bibinaak awh Khawsa ing bi a bi amyihna, Gentelkhqi venawh bi ak bi kai a venawh awm bibi lawt hy.
Tungling na ak awm Jakob, Piter ingkaw Johan ing, kai a venawh am qeennaak ce ni pe lawt hy tice a mi sim awh kai ingkaw Barnaba ce tangkut ing ni do uhy. Kainih ve Gentelkhqi venawh ceh aham ingkaw a mimah taw Judahkhqi venawh ceh aham ti unyng.
A mingmih ing khawdeng hahqahkhqi ce poek quiqah aham awi ni yn uhy, ce ni kai ingawm sai aham ka ngaih qoe hy.
Piter ce Antiok khaw na a law awh, a thawlhnaak a awm dawngawh, a haai qoe qoe awh oelh nyng.
Jakob a ven awhkawng thlang vang a mi law hlan awhtaw, Gentelkhqi mi buh ai haih uhy. Cehlai cekkhqi ce ami pha law awhtaw, chahhui ak qeet thlangkhqi ce ak kqih a dawngawh, a huna thoeih nawh Gentelkhqi ven awhkawng amah poek awh ak changna awm hy.
Cawh Judah thlakchangkhqi ingawm sa qu unawh pyi lawt uhy, cekkhqi ing a ming sa qu dawngawh Barnaba awm pleng lawt hy.
Awithang leek ing ang qoep na bi am bi uhy tice ka huh awh, cekkhqi boeih a haiawh, “Nang Juda thlang ing zani, Juda thlang amyihna a awm kaana Gentel thlang amyihna awm hyk ti. Ikawmyihna Gentel thlangkhqi ce Juda phung ngai sai sak aham na buk ngah ngah?
Ningmih Juda thlang na ak thang nawh “thlakthawlhkhqi” amyihna a ma mik awmkhqi ing,
anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming dyngnaak amni hu unawh, Jesu Khrih cangnaak ak caming ni dyngnaak ni huh uh hy, tice ni sim uhy. Cedawngawh, ningnih ingawm, anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming u awm dyngnaak ce a ma huh thai dawngawh anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming am nawh Khrih cangnaak ak caming thlakdyng nani awmnaak thai aham Khrih awh cangnaak ce ni ta uhy.
Khrih awh dyngnaak ce ni sui uh awhtaw, ningnih awm thlakthawlh na ni awm lawt uhy, tice caih hy. Cawhtaw Khrih ing thawlhnaak ce tha pehy tinaak nu? Am pe qoe qoe hy!
Ka hqe ce ce kang dyih sak tlaih bai mantaw, kai taw cawngpyinaak awi ak hqekung nani ka awm.
Khawsa ham ka hqingnaak thai aham, cawngpyinaak awi ak caming cawngpyinaak awi awh thi hawh nyng.
Khrih ing thinglam awh heen haihna ka awm hawh dawngawh kamah ve am hqing voel nyng saw, Khrih ni kai awh ak hqing hawh. Ve a pum awh ka hqingnaak vetaw, kai ni lungna nawh a hqingnaak a nik pekung, Khawsa Capa cangnaak ing ni ka hqing hawh.
Khawsa am qeennaak ce am hoet nyng, dyngnaak ce anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming huh thai na a awm mantaw, Khrih a thihnaak taw a hqawng a hqap nani a awm hly hy!” tina nyng.
Nangmih Galatia thlakqaw khqi! U ing a nim tuui khqi vik hy voei? Na mik huh qoe qoe awh Khrih thinglam awh henna ak awm ce ak caihna dang hy.
Nangmih a ven awhkaw them pynoet ca doeng ni cawng aham ka ngaih hy: Anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming nu Myihla ce nami huh uh, am awhtaw na ming zaak ce na mik cangnaak camawh nu?
Cemyih aihna nami qaw nawh nu? Myihla ing kqawn na a awm coengawh, tuh thlanghqing a saithainaak ing nang cainaak ce huh aham tha nami lo nawh nu?
Kawna amak coeng them aham na mik khuikha nawh nu – ikawna awm a mang coeng tang tang awhtaw?
Anaa awi na ming ngaih ak camawh nu Khawsa ing amah ang Myihla ce ni pek khqi nawh kawpoek kyi them ce nami sai, am awhtaw na ming zaak ce na mik cangnaak dawngawh nu?
Abraham ce poek lah uh: Anih ing Khawsa ce ak cangnaak camawh, anih ce thlakdyng na tahy.”
Cawhtaw, zasim lah uh, ak cangnaak thlangkhqi taw Abraham a cadil na awm uhy.
Khawsa ing Gentelkhqi ce cangnaak ak caming dyng sak kaw, tice Bible ing a na hu oepchoeh hawh hy, cedawngawh Abraham a venawh awithang leek ce anak khypyi oepchoeh: “Nang ak caming qampum thlang ing zoseennaak hu kawm uh,” a na tina hy.
Cedawngawh cangnaak ak ta thlangkhqi taw, cangnaak ing ak awm Abraham ingqawi zoseennaak hu haih uhy.
Anaa awi hquutnaak awh ak hangkhqi boeih taw awihkha zawknaak ak kai awh awm uhy: “Anaa Cakciim ak khuiawh qee na a awm amyihna amak ngaih ak thlangkhqi boeih taw awihkha ak zawkkhqi na awm uhy,” tinawh qee na awm hy.
U awm anaa awi hquutnaak ak caming Khawsa haiawh thlakdyng na am awm qoe qoe hy, ikawtih, “Thlakdyng taw cangnaak ing hqing kaw,” tinawh awm hy.
Anaa awi taw cangnaak awh am dyi hy, “Vawhkaw them ak sai thlangkhqi taw ami sai ak caming hqing lawt kawm uh,” tinawh ni a awm hy.
Ningmih aham awihkha na ak thoeng anaa awihkha ak khui awhkawng Khrih ing ningnih ce ni hul khqi hy: “U awm thing awh a tai thlang taw awihkha ak zawk thlang na awm hy,” tinawh qee amyihna.
Cangnaak ak caming Myihla awitaak ce ni huh thainaak aham ingkaw, Abraham a venawh a peek zoseennaak ce Jesu Khrih ak caming Gentelkhqi ham a awm thainaak aham anih ing ningnih ce ni hul khqi hy.
Koeinaakhqi, myngawi awhkaw khawsak naak awhkawng nyhtahnaak pynoet awh kqawn law lah vang nyng. U ingawm awikamnaak a sai ce ce am qoeng thai nawh a ma sap thai voel amyihna ni ve a ik-oeih awm a awm lawt hy.
Awikamnaak ve Abraham ingkaw a cadil aham ni ak kqawn peek hy. Cakciim ing, “A cadilkhqi,” am tihy, cetaw thlang khawzah ak kqawn ngaihnaak ni, Cehlai, “Na cadil a venawh,” tinawh kqawn hy, cetaw thlang pynoet Jesu Khrih ni.
Kak kqawn ngaihnaak taw veni: Anaa awi, kum 430 a dii coengawh a peek ing, Khawsa ing lamma na awikamnaak a sai ce am qoeng nawh awikam ce awm am hqe hy.
Ikawtih qo pangnaak ce anaa awi awh ang hang qu mai mantaw, awikamnaak awh am hang qu voel hawh hy; Cehlai Khawsa ing am qeennaak ing awikamnaak ce Abraham a venawh pehy.
Cawhtaw anaa awi ve ikaw ham hy voei nu? Ve bai taw awikamnaak ing ak khi Cadil a law hlan dy, thawlhnaak awh a sap sih naak ni. Anaa awi ce khan ceityih ak caming dyihthing pynoet ing caksak hy.
Cawhkaw dyihthing pynoet ing thlang hloep oet doeng am hut nahy; cehlai Khawsa taw pynoet ni.
Cedawngawh, anaa awi ing Khawsa awikamnaak ce ak oelh nu? Am oelh qoe qoe hy! Hqingnaak ak pe thai anaa awi ce peek na a awm awhtaw, dyngnaak awm anaa awi ak caming law hawh kaw.
Cehlai Cakciim ingtaw khawmdek pum ve thawlh ing khuk hy tihy, cedawngawh cawhkaw awikamnaak ce, ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ing a mi huhnaak thai ham, Jesu Khrih cangnaak ak caming peek na awm hawh hy.
Vawhkaw cangnaak a law hlanawh, anaa awi ing ningnih ce thawngim khuina nik kqoep khqi hy, cangnaak ang dang hlan dy awh ni khawh khqi hy.
Cedawngawh anaa awi taw cangnaak ak caming thlak dyng na ni awm thainaak aham Khrih a venna ningnih a nik sawikung na awm hy.
Cawhtaw tuh cangnaak ce law hawh hy, cedawngawh anaa awi doencangnaak ak kaiawh ningnih taw amni awm voel uhy.
Jesu Khrih cangnaak ak caming nangmih boeih taw Khawsa cakhqi na awm uhyk ti,
Ikawtih Khrih awh baptisma ak hukhqi boeih taw Khrih ing thoeih ang cam qu boeih hawh uhyk ti.
Juda ingkaw Greek am awm nawh tamnaa ingkaw thlak loeih am awm hy. Nu ingkaw pa ti awm am awm hy. Ikawtih Khrih awh pynoet na awm boeih uhyk ti.
Khrih a koena nami awm awhtaw, Abraham a cadil na awm hawh uhyk ti, awikamnaak amyihna qo ak pangkungkhqi na awm hawh uhyk ti.
Qo ak pangkung ce naasen na a awm khuiawh taw, qampum ce ta mai seiawm tamnaa ingqawi a lawhanaak am awm hy.
A pa ing a tym a taak naak a pha hlan dy amah ak khoemkungkhqi ingkaw ak khuut ak hlepkungkhqi kut awh ni a awm hy.
Cemyih lawtna, ningnih ve naasen na ni awm awh, khawmdek awhkaw phung ak kai awh tamnaa na ni awm uhy.
Cehlai a tym a pha awhkawng taw, Khawsa ing a Capa ce tyi law hy, nu ing ta nawh, anaa ak kaiawh thang law hy,
anaa ak kaiawh ak awm thlangkhqi ce hul aham, ningnih ing cakhqi na coeng thainaak ce ak soep na ni huh thainaak aham ni.
Nangmih taw cakhqi na nami awm dawngawh, Khawsa ing amah a Capa ang Myihla ce ningnih ak kawlung khuiawh tyi law hy, cawhkaw Myihla ing, “Abba, Ka pa,” tinawh nik khy sak hy.
Cedawngawh nang taw tamnaa na am awm voel hyk ti, ca nani na awm hawh; ca na na awm hawh dawngawh, Khawsa ing qo ak pangkung na ni ta hawh hy.
Khawsa nami sim hlanawh Khawsa na amak awm thlangkhqi a tamnaa na awm uhyk ti.
Cehlai tuh taw Khawsa ce sim hawh uhyk ti – am awhtaw Khawsa amah ing ni sim khqi hawh hy – cawhtaw ikawmyihna cawhkaw tha amak awmkhqi mi ikawna awm amak awm benna na ming hlat tlaih uh? Cemyihkhqi a tamnaa na awm tlaih aham nami ngaih nawh nu?
Khawnghikhqi hlakhqi ingkaw kumkhqi ce zeih uhyk ti!
Nangmih aham phu amak awmna kak tha plak kawng nyng, tice kqih nyng.
Kai amyihna nami awm lawt aham, koeinaakhqi, nangmih a venawh qeennaak thoeh law nyng, kai awm nangmih amyihna awm lawt nyng. Kak khanawh ikawmyih a thawlhnaak am sai uhyk ti.
Nami sim amyihna, ka tlawh a dawngawh nangmih a venawh lamma cyk na awithang leek khy law pyi nyng.
Ka tlawhnaak ce nangmih aham noek a daknaak na awm mai seiawm, nangmih ing am ni the na unawh am nim tyih uhyk ti, Khawsa ak khan ceityih amyihna, Khrih amah qoe qoe amyihna ni do uhyk ti.
Nami zeelnaakkhqi boeih ce ikawmyihna nu a awm hy? Nami sai thai mantaw nami mik zani koeih unawh ni pe kawm uk ti, ti nyng.
Awitak ka nik kqawn peek khqi dawngawh nangmih a qaal na ka awm nawh nu?
Nangmih noeng aham ak ngaih soeih khqi ce, a leeknaak aham amni. A mingmih a ngaihnaak taw nangmih ingkaw kaimih pek ang bo qunaak aham ni, cawh ni a mingmih ce nangmih ing nami ngaih hly thai hy.
Thlang ing a ni ngaih ve leek hy, cai ang hlahnaak ni taak awm nep hy, ka awm doeng awh am nawh cemyihna awm poepa lah uh.
Ka lungnaak ka cakhqi, nangmih ak khuiawh Khrih a awm hlan khuiawh naaca ak awm tawm awhkaw amyihna awm nyng,
tuh nangmih a venawh awm lah nyng saw kak awi thaw lah voei nyng, nangmih akawng kang ngaih na kyi soeih saw!
Anaa ak kaiawh awm aham ak ngaihkhqi, kqawn law lah uh, anaa awi ing ak kqawn ce am nami sim nawh nu?
Abraham ing cakpa pakkhih tahy, pynoet taw a tamnaa nu a capa na awm nawh pynoet taw tamnaa nu am a capa na awm hy.
A tamnaa nu ingqawi a ni taak a capa cetaw ca taak mailai na awm hy; cehlai tamnaa nu am ingqawi a ni taak a capa taw awikamnaak amyihna a taak na awm hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeih ve nyhtahnaak na ta lah sih, cawhkaw nuqawi ce awikam pakkhih sainaak ing myih hy. Awikamnaak pynoet taw Sinai tlang awhkaw awikamnaak na awm nawh tamnaa na ak awm hly kawi canaakhqi ce tahy: vetaw Hagar ni.
Hagar taw Arabia qam awhkaw Sinai Tlang na awm hy, a cakhqi mi tamnaa na a mi awm dawngawh, tuh khawk bau na ak awm Jerusalem ing myih hy.
Cehlai khan benna ak awm Jerusalem taw tamnaa nu am na awm nawh, anih taw ningnih a nu na awm hy.
Cak kaa nang nu, zeel lah; tlawhnaak amak sim nang, khawteh na khy lah; Ikawtih a hqek nu ing vaa ak taak anglakawh khawzah khqoet ca tahy,” tinawh qee hyt ce awm hawh hy.
Nangmih koeinaa, Isaak amyihna ak awmkhqi taw awikamnaak cakhqi na awm uhyk ti.
Cawh ca taak mailai ing Myihla saithainaak ing ak thang capa ce the a kha nahy. Cemyihna ni tuh awm a awm hy.
Cehlai Cakciim ing ikawmyihna nu ak kqawn? “Tamnaa nu ingkaw a capa ce hqek lah uh, kawtih tamnaa nu a capa ing ityk awh awm tamnaa nu am a capa a qo ce a pang pyi thai kaw,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cedawngawh, koeinaakhqi, ningnih ve tamnaa nu a cakhqi na amni awm uhy, tamnaa nu am a cakhqi nani ni awm uh hy.
Tamnaa na koeh awm aham Khrih ing ningnih ce ni loet sak khqi hawh hy. Cedawngawh, ak cak na dyi unawh taw, tamnaa a phyihqih ce koeh phyi voel uh.
Kak awi ve khoem lah uh! Kai, Paul ing ka nik kqawn peek khqi, chahhui qeetnaak benna nami awm tlaih awhtaw, Khrih taw nangmih aham a phu am awm voel hy.
Anaa awi boeih hquutnaak aham chahhui qeet aham awm hy tinawh ak poekkhqi venawh kqawn law tlaih bai nyng.
Nangmih anaa awi ing dyngnaak huh aham tha ak lokhqi Khrih ing pek qu hawh uhyk ti; qeennaak ce tluuk taak hawh uhyk ti.
Cehlai ningnih ingtaw cangnaak ing ning ngaih-u dyngnaak ce Myihla ak caming ning ngaih-u uhy.
Ikawtih Khrih awh chahhui qeet ingkaw a ma qeet ikaw awm a phu am tahy. A phu ak ta taw lungnaak ing ak dang cangnaak doeng ni.
Dawng taanaak awh tha lo unawh dawng uhyk ti. U ing nu nangmih ce nik khai khqi nawh awitak awi am naming ngainaak aham a nim tu khqi khaak?
Cemyih sykzoeknaak ve nangmih anik khykhqikung a venawh kawng am law hy.
Hen vetehca ing phaihpi hlym zam boeih hy.
Ak chang poeknaak am ta uhyk ti tice Bawipa awh yp qu na nyng. Nangmih, a u na awm awm seh, kawlung ak kyi sakkungkhqi ing lai nami sah aham awm hy.
Koeinaakhqi, chahhui qeetnaak akawng kak khypyi bak bak mantaw, ikaw hamna nu kyinaak ka huh bak bak kaw? Cemyihna a awm mantaw Khrih thinglam ak oelhkhqi awm am awm voel kaw.
Kyinaak ak saikhqi ce, a mimah ingkaw a mimah a mi sainaak hoei awh a mik tha a seet aham awm hy!
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih taw tamnaana amak awm aham ni a nik khy khqi, cehlai tamnaana am nami awmnaak ve pumsa ham lehcainaakna koeh lo unawh, pynoet ingkaw pynoet lungnaak ing bibi qu law pe uh.
Anaa awi boeih ve awipeek pynoet: “Na ven awhkaw thlang ce namah a pum amyihna lungna lawt lah,” a tinaak awh cuui boeih uhy.
Cehlai nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet cui qu unawh na mik kqah qu awhtaw, am naming qeengnaak ham ngaihta kawm uk ti.
Cedawngawh ka nik kqawn peek khqi, Myihla awh ce hqing lah uh, cawhtaw khawmdek thawlh ngaihnaak ce am sai kawm uk ti.
Pumsa ngaihnaak ing Myihla lam noeng thai nawh, Myihla ngaihnaak ingawm pumsa ve noeng thai ny; them sai ham naming cai am nami sai naak thai ham pumsa ingkaw Myihla ve kalh qu hy nih.
Cehlai Myihla ing a ni hqui awhtaw, nangmih cawngpyinaak ak kaiawh am awm voel uhyk ti.
Khawmdek pumsa thawlh ngaihnaakkhqi taw dang hy: nu ingkaw pa thawlhnaak, a ma ciimcaihnaak ingkaw khawboe seetnaak;
myiqawl bawknaak ingkaw thlang tuuinaak; thlang sawhnaak, kawpoek ak changna taaknaak, tlaiseetnaak, kawsonaak, mah doeng aham poeknaak, pek ang bonaak, pynoet ingkaw pynoet qaal qunaak,
thlang ytnaak, zu aawknaak, zusuk poeiawh nawmnaakkhqi, vemyihkhqi ve; vemyih akawnglam awh maana, “Cemyih them ak saikhqi t aw Khawsa qam am pang kaw,” tinawh ka nik kqawn peekkhqi hawh nyng.
Cehlai Myihla ak thaih taw lungnaak, zeelnaak, ngaihding naak, yh thainaak, qeennaak, leeknaak, ypawmnaak,
kawdungnaak ingkaw nimah ingkaw nimah kymsym qu thainaak veni. Ve ing anik kalh qu anaa awi am awm hy.
Khrih awh ak awmkhqi ingtaw ve khawmdek pumsa ce, thawlh poeknaakkhqi ingkaw ngaihnaakkhqi ce thinglam awh heen sit boeih hawh hy.
Myihla ing ak hqingna ni awm awhtaw Myihla awh ce awm poe u sih nyng.
Koeh oek qu unawh taw, pynoet ingkaw pynoet kawsonaak ingkaw ytnaak koeh ta u sih.
Koeinaakhqi, thlang pynoet mai awm a thawlh vik awhtaw, nangmih Myihla ben thlangkhqi ing kawdungnaak ing nami tlaih nami vawng aham awm hy. Cehlai na mimah ingkaw na mimah awm na ming ngaih ta uh, cemyih am awhtaw sykzoeknaak ak khuiawh tla lawt kawm uk ti.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet phyih qih leng qu lah uh, vemyihna ni Khrih anaa awi ce nami soep sak hly thai hy.
U ingawm amah ingkaw amah ce ikaw na awm a ma awm loei awh ak sang soeih na ak poek qu awhtaw, amah ingkaw amah ni ang thai qunaak hy.
Thlang a hoei ing a bibinaak ce a noek a dak aham awm hy. Cawhtaw thlang ing ang nyhtah qu qee kaana, oek awm oek qu seh,
kawtih thlang boeih ing a mimah a phyihqih ce phyih boeih aham awm hy.
Toelnaak awi ak za ingtaw anih ak toelkung ing ik-oeih leek boeih ce a ning qek aham awm hy.
U ingawm koeh ni thai nak khqi seh nyng: Khawsa ve u ingawm qaih am qinna am sai thai hy. Thlang ing a saw ni a ah hly tlaih hy.
Pumsa ngaih thawlhnaak ak saw ing, pumsa ben seetnaak ce aat lawt kaw; Myihla kawngaih ak saw ingtaw, Myihla awh kumqui hqingnaak ce aat lawt kaw.
Them leek sainaak benawh tha koeh seet sak u sih, a qoeng kaana ni sai awhtaw a tym a khoek awh caang ce ni aat lawt bit kawm uh.
Cedawngawh a tym leek ni taak tloek awh, thlang boeih a venawh them leek sai u sih, ak cangnaak ipkhui kaw thlangkhqi aham na sai khqoet u sih.
Toek lah ka kut qoe qoe ing calung ak bau soeih na ka ni qee law peek khqi ve!
A chang benawh leeknaak sai aham ak ngaihkhqi ing nangmih ce chahhui qeet sak ngah ngah aham ngaih uhy. Vemyihna sai ham a mi ngaihnaak taw Khrih thinglam awh a khuikha ce a mik kqih a dawngawh ni.
Chahhui ak qeetkhqi ing zani anaa awi a mami hquut thai awh, nangmih a pumsa awh oek qu aham a mi ngaih awh nangmih ce chahhui qeet sak aham ngaih uhy.
Bawipa Jesu Khrih thinglam am awhtaw am oek qu qoe kawng nyng, anih awh khawmdek ve kai aham thinglam awh taai qu hawh hy, kai awm khawmdek aham thinglam awh tai qu hawh hy, kai awm khawmdek aham tai qu nyng.
Saithainaak tikaa taw chahhui qeet ve ikawna am awm nawh, chahhui am qeet awm ikawna am awm hy.
Vawhkaw hquisawinaak ak hquut Khawsa koe Israel thlangkhqi venawh, ngaihdingnaak ingkaw qeennaak awm seh.
A hukhit awhtaw, Jesu hatnaak ce ka pum awh ka taak hawh dawngawh, u ingawm kyinaak koeh ni pe voel seh nyng.
Koeinaakhqi, Bawipa Jesu Khrih am qeennaak ce nangmih ang Myihla awh awm seh nyng. Amen.
Khawsa ngaihnaak amyihna Jesu Khrih a ceityih pynoet na ak awm, Paul ing, Ephesa khaw awhkaw thlakciim, Khrih awh ypawm na ak awm thlangkhqi venawh.
Ni Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih a venna kaw qeennaak awm seh nyng.
Ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih Khawsa ingkaw Pa venawh kyihcahnaak awm seh, khawk khan awh ningnih ce amah ing zoseennaak ni pek khqi nawh Khrih awh Myihla ben zoseennaak soepkep ce ni pek khqi hawh hy.
Ak ciimcaih coet a kap kaana a haiawh awm aham khawmdek a syn hlan awhkawng ningnih ce nik tyk khqi hawh hy. Lungnaak awh
amah ing ningnih ve a cana taak aham Jesu Khrih awh a oepchoeh na ni hoep khqi hawh hy, amah a zeelnaak ingkaw ngaihnaak amyihna –
a boeimang qeennaak kyihcahnaak ingkaw, amah ing a lungnaak thlang awh ningnih ce a zoe na ni pek khqi hawh hy.
A thi ak caming thawngnaak ce ni hu uhy, thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak, ak dung soeih soeih Khawsam qeennaak amyihna,
ningnih ak khanawh cyihnaak ingkaw zaksimnaak ce a hai kaana ni vyih sih khqi hy.
Amah a koe ak leek zeelnaak, Khrih awh ang cainaak a awm hawh amyihna, amah awhkaw ang hyp ngaihnaak ce ningnih a venawh dang sak hawh hy,
a tym a khoek awh khan ing khawmdek awhkaw ik-oeih boeih boeih a lu na ak awm Khrih ak kaina taak peek boeih aham ak kawngaih na awm hawh hy.
Amah awh ningnih awm tyk na ni awm uhy, amah a ngaihnaak amyihna ik-oeih boeih ak poekkung ing ang cainaak amyihna ni hoep oepchoeh khqi hawh hy.
A boeimangnaak ak kyihcahkung na ni awmnaak thai aham, ningnih taw Khrih awh ngaih-unaak ak ta cyk na ni awm uhy.
Nangmih awm awitak, ni loetnaak awithang leek ce naming zaak awh, Khrih awh awm hawh lawt uhyk ti. Namik cangnaak hawh a dawngawh, nangmih a pum awh hatnaak, Ciim Myihla awikamnaak ce awm hawh hy.
Khawsa koena ak awm amah a boeimangnaak kyihcah aham ak awmkhqi a thaawngnaak a pha hlan dy ningnih a qo pangnaak hly awh anih ce hawih na awm hy.
Vawh, nangmih ing Bawipa Jesu awh cangnaak ing thlakciimkhqi boeih nami lungnaak ce kang zaak awh,
a boet kaana zeelnaak awi kqawn nyng, kak cykcahnaak awh nangmih ce ni sim khqi poepa nyng.
Ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih a Khawsa, qeennaak ing ak be Pa ing cyihnaak Myihla ing amah ce ak leek bet na nami sim thainaak aham ingkaw huh saknaak ce a ni peek thainaak khqi aham thoeh poepa nyng.
Amah ing anik khynaak ngaih-unaak, thlakciimkhqi ing boeimangnaak qo pang hly kawi ce nami sim thainaak aham nangmih ak kawlung mik a dai sak naak aham cykcah bai nyng.
Ak cangnaak ningnih boeih aham thaawmnaak ak bau soeih ce awm hy. Cawhkaw thaawmnaak cetaw ak thaawmnaak ak bau soeih ing bibi amyihna awm hy.
Khrih ce thawh tlaih nawh Khawk khan hun awh Pa tang benawh ang ngawihsaknaak thaawmnaak ce haw nahy,
uknaak ingkaw saithainaak, thaawmnaak ingkaw temnaak, peek thai na ak awm ming boeih boeih, tuh a khuk awh am nawh ak law hly a khuk ak khanawh Khrih taw awm hy.
Ik-oeih boeih boeih a khawk kaiawh Khawsa ing taak pe nawh thlangboel aham ik-oeih boeih boeih a lu na anih ce tahy.
Cawhkaw thlangboel cetaw a pumsa ni, ik-oeih soepkep awh ak be soep saknaak ce.
Nangmih taw, awi eeknaak ingkaw thawlhnaak awh thi hawh uhyk ti.
Ve khawmdek a phung na nami awm awh ce zilh ak ukkung boei, tuh awm awi amak ngaikhqi venawh bi ak bi myihla a phungna awm uhyk ti.
Ak kqym awh ningnih boeih awm cekkhqing lakawh khaw ni sa lawt uhy. Thawlh a ngaih sainaak ingkaw thawlh ngaihnaak a huawh ce ning bat lawt uhy. Thlak changkhqi amyihna, ningnih awm kawsonaak ak zawkkhqi na ni awm uhy.
Cehlai ningnih a ni lungnaak khqi soeih a dawngawh, qeennaak ing ak be, Khawsa ing,
awi eeknaak awh ni thih huiawh awm Khrih ing ningnih ce ni hqing sak khqi haih tlaih hawh hy – qeennaak awh ni nangmih hulna ni awm uh.
Khawsa ing ningnih ve Khrih ing ni thawh sak khqi haih nawh, Khrih awh khan hun na amah ing ning ngawih sak khqi haih hy.
Ak law hly khuk a awm awh am qeennaak amni nyhtah thai noeng ce ang dang saknaak aham ingkaw Jesu Khrih awh ningnih ani lungnaak khqi ce ang dang saknaak ahamni.
Caangnaak caming qeenaak awh thaawngna namik awm ni; namimah a bibi camawh am nawh, Khawsa a them pek ni;
bibinaak ak caming amni, cemyih am kaa taw thlang ing cawng a cah qu kawm uh.
Them leek sai ahamna Isu Khrih awh saina ni awm nawh amak a kut sai qoena nik awm ni; ce them leek sai ce ni khawsak hly qoena Khawsa ing a syn qoe ni.
Cedawngawh, maana ningnih pumsa awh Gentel, pumsa awh kut ing sai “Chahhui qeet” ami tikhqi ingkaw “Chahhui amak qeet” ami tikhqi aw,
ce tloek awhce, Khrih kana, Israelkhqi a tui khaw ingqaw lak hla ing, khawmdek awh ve ngaih-uunaak amak ta ingkaw Khawsa kana awm ing, awikam awhkawng khinna nami awm ce sim poe kawm uk ti.
Cehlai tuh awhtaw Jesu Khrih awh, nangmih maana ak hla soeihna namik awmkhqi ce Khrih a thi ing zoei sak awm uhyk ti.
Amah qoe qoe ce ningnih aham qoepnaak na awm hawh hy, anih ing pakkhih ce pynoet na sai nawh qaal anglak pheknaak vawng ak awm ce hqe hawh hy,
a pumsa ing anaa ak awipeek sai aham ak awmkhqi boeih ce hqe hawh hy. Amah awh thlang pakkhih ak khuiawh kawng thlak thai pynoet sai aham cai hy, cemyihna qoepnaak ce sai hy.
Vawhkaw pum pynoet awhkawng thinglam ak caming Khawsa ingkaw cekqawi anglak law awh tuqunaak ce sai hy, thinglam awh a thihnaak ak caming qaal qunaak ce boet sak hy.
Nangmih ak hla nakaw ak awmkhqi ingkaw ak zoe awh ak awmkhqi venna law nawh qoepnaak awi ce kqawn hy.
Cedawngawh amah ak caming ningnih boeih ing Pa a venawh Ciim Myihla pynoet ak caming tuqunaak ce ni ta uhy.
Cedawngawh, nangmih taw khawlawng thlang ingkaw thlang lang na am awm voel uhyk ti, Khawsa ak thlangkhqi ingkaw Khawsa ipkhui cakaw na awm hawh uhyk ti.
Ceityihkhqi ingkaw tawnghakhqi awh sak na awm u tiksaw, Khrih amah qoe qoe ce a kil awhkaw lungkhoeng na awm hy.
Anih awh im ce tuqu boeih nawh Bawipa a bawkim na dyi hy.
Nangmih awm amah awhce Myihla-awh, Khawsa awmnaak a ham sakna namik awm ni.
Cedawngawh kai Paul, nangmih Gentelkhqi ak camawh Jesu Khrih awh thawng ak tla, ing –
nangmih aham kai a venawh peek na ak awm Khawsa am qeennaak bibi ka taak ce za hawh uhyk ti;
cemyihna awihyp ce ak tawi cana ka qee law hawh amyihna kai a venawh awiphawngnaak ing ni sim sak hy.
Ce ak awi ce nami noet awh, Khrih ak awihyp ka huhnaak akawng ce zasim thai kawm uk ti,
cawhkaw awihyp ce tuh Myihla ing Khawsa a ceityih ciimkhqi ingkaw tawnghakhqi venawh ang dang sak amyihna ak chang cadil khqi anglaklung awh simsak na am awm hy.
Cetaw veni, Awithang leek ak caming Jesu Khrih-awh Gentelkhqi qo a pangpyikhqi, pumsa a ke a baipyikhqi, awikam dopyikhqi na awm uhy.
Amah a saithainaak bibinaak ak caming ka venawh peek na ak awm Khawsam qeennaak awh kai taw ve awithang leek a tamnaa na awm nyng.
Khawsak thlangkhqi boeih ak khuiawh ak zawi soeihkhqi anglakawh zawi khqoet hlai nyng vawhkaw am qeennaak ve ka venawh ni pehy: Gentelkhqi venawh am sui thai noengna ak awm Khrih a boeinaak ce kqawn peek aham ingkaw,
maa awh, ik-oeih boeih ak synkung Khawsa awh thuh na ak awm, ve awihyp a bibinaak ve thlang boeih a venawh sim sak aham ni.
Anih angcainaak taw, thlangboel ak caming, Khawsa a cyihnaak ak dung soeih ce khawk khan hun awhkaw ukkungkhqi ingkaw saithainaak ak takhqi venawh simsak aham ni,
amah a kumqui angcainaak ce ningnih Bawipa Jesu Khrih awh soep sak hawh hy.
Amah awh cangnaak ak caming ngaihdingnaak ingkaw ypnaak taak doena Khawsa venawh ni zoe thai hawh uhy.
Cedawngawh, nangmih boeimangnaak aham kai ing ka khuikhanaak awh ve namik tha koeh set sak uh.
Ve ak camawh Pa a haiawh khuk sym ing koep nyng,
anih a venawh kawng khawk khan ingkaw khawmdek awh ak awm a cakaw khqi ing a mimah ang ming ce hu uhy.
A boeimangnaak ingkaw ang Myihlaa ak caming nangmih ak kawlung khuiawh thaawmnaak ani peeknaak khqi thai aham cykcah lah uh,
nangmih ak kawlung khuiawh cangnaak ak caming Khrih a awm thainaak aham. Lungnaak awh namik kqa thla unawh nami caknaak aham cykcah nyng.
Thlakcimkhqi mi kutoetna a kaunaak, a saunaak, a saangnaak ingkaw a dungnaak khqi ce simcaihthainaak ingkaw,
Khrih a lungnaak am sim noeng simthainaak ce ta thai kawm uk ti.
Cawhce, ningnih awh ak bi themsaithainaak amyihna, ni thoehnaak ingkaw nik poeknaak boeih anglakawh ak saang soeihna them ak saithaikung venawh,
kumqui dy, kumqui dy na, thlangboelkhqi ingkaw Khrih Jesu awh boeimangnaak awm poe seh nyng. Amen.
Nangmih ing khynaak nami huh amyihna khynaak ing ang qoep na khaw nami sak aham Bawipa awh thawng ak tla kai ing ni yyn khqi nyng.
Namik kaw dung sak unawh taw awm moel moel uh; yhnaak ta law unawh taw pynoet ingkaw pynoet kawdung doena lungnaak ing awm law uh.
Qoepnaak ing pinzen qu unawh Myihla ak kawdawnaak ce nami hamnaak thai ham tha lo lah uh.
Pum pynoet doeng awm nawh Myihla awm pynoet ni a awm – nangmih anik khy khqi awh ngaih-unaak pynoet doeng ing a nik khy khqi amyihna –
Bawipa pynoet, cangnaak pynoet, baptisma pynoet;
ik-oeih soepkep ak khan ingkaw ik-oeih soepkep awh ak awm Pa Khawsa pynoet doeng ni a awm.
Cehlai ningnih boeih a venawh Khrih ing a hoep lawnaak amyihna am qeennaak ce peek na awm hawh hy.
Cedawngawh: “Khan na a hang kaiawh tamnaakhqi ce sawi khqi nawh, thlanghqingkhqi venawh awm kutdo ce pe hy,” tinawh anak kqawn hy.
(Amah ce khawmdek ak kaina, khawmdek awh nuk kqum hy ti am awhtaw “hang kaai hy” tive ikaw ak kqawn ngaihnaak hy voei?
A nuk kqum ce khawk khan boeih ak khanna a hak kaai ceni, khawmdek ingkaw khawnghi boeih anih ing a khuk thainaak aham cemyihna ce awm hy.)
Anih ing thlangvang ce ceityih na, thlang vang ce tawngha na, thlangvang ce awithang leek ak kqawnkung na, thlangvang ce tuuk khai ingkaw cawngpyikung na tahy,
Khawsa ak thlangkhqi ing bibi thai unawh, Khrih a pum ce a ming dyih naak sak thai aham,
cangnaak awh pynoet na bawngqu unawh Khawsa Capa simnaak awh kawcyihnaak taak dyna ni awmnaak aham ingkaw, Khrih awh ni beenaak thai aham cemyihna ce tahy.
Cawhtaw naasen na amni awm voel kawm uh, tuinu ing hu na hai na amni khyn voel kawmsaw, cawngpyinaak ingkaw thlang a thainaak soepkep ing hu na hai na amni zawn voel kaw.
Lungnaak ingkaw awitak ce nik kqawn kawm usaw, lu na ak awm Khrih awh ik-oeih soepkep awh ning taai hawh kawm uh.
Amah a venawh kawng pum boeih ce tuqu nawh tha pe qu uhy, lungnaak ing taai unawh, amah a bi ce bi qip uhy.
Cedawngawh ve ve ka nik kqawn peek khqi, ve a dawngawh Bawipa awh awm unawh, kawna amak nyt Gentelkhqi ak poeknaak amyihna nami awm aham am awm voel hy.
A mingmih ang zaksimnaak taw khaw amyihna than nawh, simnaak a taak kaana kawlung ami qil sak adawngawh Khawsa hqingnaak ingqawi phek qu uhy.
Ak che ak leek simnaak a taak voel kaa qoena, pumsa ngaih amak ciimcaih soepkep benawh a mimah ingkaw a mimah ce pe qu uhy, hyy ngaihnaak benawh cet khqoet khqoet uhy.
Cehlai, nangmih taw, cemyihna Khrih ce am sim uhyk ti.
Anih akawng ce naming zaaknaak amyihna Jesu Khrih awh ak awm awitak ce nangmih a venawh cawngpyi na awm hawh hy.
Maa nakaw nami khawsaknaak thlanghqing khym, thailatnaak ing ak bee ce khawng unawh,
namik kawlung ce myihla awhce ak thaaina awm unawh;
thlanghqing ak thaai, awitak dyngnaak ingkaw cimcaihnaak awh Khawsamyihna saina ak awm ing ce thoeihcam qu kawm uk ti.
Cedawngawh nangmih boeih ing amak thym ik-oeih ce suut unawh na kengsam awhkaw thlang a venawh awih thym ce namik kqawn aham awm hy, ningnih ve pum pynoet a ke a baikhqi na ni awm uhy.
Kawso unawh, thawlh mah koeh sai uh; namik kawsonaak ce khaw ing koeh tlaak pyi seh;
setan ce ang dyih hun koeh pe law uh.
Ak qu khawi ing koeh qu voel seh, bibi seitaw, ak voet ak hlauh thlangkhqi ce a do a dan thainaak aham amah a kut qoe ing amah aham a hawihkhangnaak hly bi ce sai seh.
Nam khak khuiawh kawng awihche koeh cawn sak, cehlai a ngoengaihnaak amyihna themleek ak sai ham awileek a hoei cawn seh, ak ngai zaakhqi ham lungnaakna a awmnaak a hamna.
Khawsa a Ciim Myihla ce koeh kawseet sak uh, hulnaak nyn aham anih awhce hatnaak deng sihna namik awm ni.
Awihkhaakhqi, kawsonaakkhqi, kawtawinaakkhqi, qawnaakkhqi, awihche kqawnnaakkhqi boeih boeih ingkaw thawlhnaak boeih boeih khqi ce centaak kawm uk ti.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet ak khanawh qeennaak ta law unawh, Khrih awh Khawsa ing nangmih qeenkhaw a ning ngai pekkhqi amyihna, nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet qeenkhaw ngai qu lah uh.
A lungnaak a cakhqi na nami awm amyihna, Khawsa a khawboe ak oetkung na awm law lah uh,
Khrih ing ningnih ni lung nak khqi nawh ningnih aham Khawsa venawh bawktui bulnaak na ang peek qu amyihna, nangmih awm lungnaak ing khaw sa lah uh.
Nangmih anglakawh nu ingkaw pa thawlhnaak, kamvaanaak ingkaw amak ciimcaih ikawmyih awm a awm qoe qoe aham am awm hy, vemyihkhqi ve Khawsa thlangkhqi ing am kawih na uhy.
Chahnaak ben awihkqawn khqi, qawnaak awihkqawnkhqi ingkaw amak coeng poeloem halang awihkqawnkhqi ve a awm voel kaana zeelawi mah kqawn kawm uk ti.
Vekkhqi ve sim kawm uk ti: khawboe amak leek, amak caih ik-oeih ingkaw ak kamvaa ak thlang cemyih ak thlang taw myihlip ak bawk ak thlang ni – cemyih ak thlang ing Khrih ingkaw Khawsa qam ce am pang thai kaw.
Thlang ing awihqawng ing koeh ni thai nak khqi seh, kawtih cemyihna awi amak ngai thlangkhqi ak khanawh Khawsa ak kawsonaak ce pha kaw.
Cemyih ak thlangkhqi mi koeh awm law haih uh.
Thannaak ak khuiawh ni nami awm hlai, tuh taw Bawipa awh vangnaak ak khuiawh awm hawh uhyk ti. Cedawngawh vangnaak cakhqi amyihna awm lah uh,
(Ikawtih vangnaak ak thaih taw themleek, dyngnaak ingkaw awitak awh awm nawh),
Khawsa ngaihnaak ce hu uhy.
Ak thaih amak awm than a bibiaak awh koeh thum unawh taw, cemyih ik-oeih sainaakkhqi ce dang sak lat uh.
Awingai kaana thannaak ak khui awhkaw ik-oeih sai ve kqawn aham awm chah awm hy.
Cehlai vangnaak ing ak coei ik-oeih boeih taw huh thai na awm hy,
vangnaak ing ik-oeih boeih ce huh thai aham coei hy, cedawngawh, “Aw ak ip nang, hqyng nawhtaw, thihnaak ak khuiawh kawng tho hlah cawhtaw Khrih a vangnaak ing nik coei kaw,” tinawh anak kqawn hawh hy.
Cedawngawh nami khawsak naak awh ce ak nep na naming ngaih ta lah uh, a cyih amak awm amyihna koeh awm unawh thlakcyi amyihna awm lah uh,
khawnghikhqi ve ama leekvoel hawh adawngawh, a tym leek boeih boeih ce thlai lah uh.
Cedawngawh thlakqaw amyihna koeh awm unawh taw, Bawipa ak kawngaih ve ikawnu tice sim law lah uh.
Zuu koeh qui uh, ce ing khawboe amak leek ce awm sak hy. Ce anglak awh Myihla ing be lah uh.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet Saam awi kqawn unawh, kyihcahnaak laa ingkaw Myihla ben laa ce sa lah uh. Namik kawk khuiawh Bawipa venawh kyihcahnaak laa ce sa lah uh,
a soep hoeiawh Pa Khawsa venawh ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang ming ing zeelawi kqawn poepa lah uh.
Khrih kqihchahnaak ing pynoet ingkaw pynoet pe qu lah uh.
Zukhqi, Bawipa venawh naming peek qu amyihna nami vaakhqi venawh pe qu lah uh.
Khrih taw amah a pumna ak awm, amah ing a thaawng thlangboel a lu na a awm amyihna, vaa taw zu a lu na awm hy.
Thlangboel ing Khrih a venawh ang peek qu amyihna, zukhqi ingawm ik-oeih soepkep awh vaakhqi venawh ang peek qu aham awm hy.
Vaakhqi, Khrih ing a thlangboel lungna nawh a hqingnaak a peek amyihna, nami zukhqi ce lung law na uh.
Khrih ing thlangboel ce ciimcaih sak hy, awi ak caming tui ing sil nawh,
amah a venawh ak vang thlangboel, myn a maa amak kap qoe, ak ciimcaih ingkaw coet amak kap na a peek amyihna nami zuukhqi ce lung law na lah uh.
Cemyih lawtna, vaakhqi ing ami zuukhqi ce a mimah a pum ami lungnaak lawt amyihna ami lungnaak aham awm hy. A zu ak lungnaak thlang taw amah a pum ak lungnaak thlang ni.
U ingawm amah a pum ce am sawh na khawi hy, Khrih ing thlangboel a hquisawi amyihna, hqin amcah nawh hqui a sawi hy –
ningnih taw amah a pum awhkaw a ke a baikhqi na nik awm ni.
Ve ak camawh pa ing a nu ingkaw a pa cehta nawh a zu ce tawm kawm saw, pakkhih ce pumoet na coeng hawh kawm nih.
Ve ve awihdung awihyp na awm hy; cehlai kai ing kak kqawn taw Khrih ingkaw thlangboel akawng ni kak kqawn hy.
Cehlai, nangmih boeih ing nami mah a pum nami lungnaak amyihna nami zukhqi ce nami lungnaak aham awm hy, zukhqi ingawm a mi vaakhqi ce a mik kqihchah aham awm hy.
Naasenkhqi, Bawipa awh nami nu ingkaw nami pakhqi ak awi ce ngai uh; vetaw ak dyng na awm hy.
“Nanu ingkaw napa kqihchah lah,” tinaak awi ve awipeek lammacyk ni.
“Naham na leek nawh khawmdek awh na hqinglu sang kaw,” tinaak awitaak ak awm ni.
Pakhqi, nami cakhqi kawsonaak hly kawi koeh sai law pe uh; ce anglakawhtaw Bawipa awh yyn a tawnnaak ingkaw cuk am kiknaak ing taai law sak lah uh.
Tamnaakhqi, Khrih ak awi naming ngai peek amyihna, khawmdek awhkaw nami boeikhqi ak awi ce kawlung ciimnaak ing ngaih law pe unawh taw kqihnaak ing kqihchah lah uh.
Thlanghqing kawzeelnaak hamna mik huh doengawh bi a sai kana, Khrih a tamnaa na nami awm amyihna, namik kawlung khuiawh kawng Khawsa ak kawngaih ce sai law uh.
Thlanghqing a bi ak bi amyihna ak poek kaana, Bawipa bi ak bi amyihna, namik kawlung tang tang ing bibi law pe uh,
kawtih tamnaa awm tamnaa am awm, thlang boeih ing bibi leek ami bi amyihna, Bawipa ing kutdo ce pe kaw, tice sim uhyk ti.
Boeikhqi, nangmih ingawm nami tamnaakhqi ce cemyihna sai law lawt uh. Cekkhqi ingkaw nami Bawipa taw khawk khan na awm hy tice sim doena, tamnaakhqi ce koeh the koeh kha na uh, kawtih Khawsa ing u a haai awm am toek hy.
A hukhit awh, Bawipa a saithai thaawmnaak awh namik tha awm law sak lah uh.
Setan ang cainaak ce nami khamnaak thai aham Khawsa a phuqhaa ing thoeihcam qu lah uh.
Ikawtih ningnih taw pumsa thisa qaal mi amning tuk qu unawh, ukkungkhqi, saithainaak ak takhqi, ve khawmdek than thaawmnaakkhqi ingkaw khan nakaw Setan myihla thaawmnaakkhqi mi ni ning tuk qu uh.
Cedawngawh Khawsa ang thoeihcamnaak Phuqhaa ing thoeihcam qu lah uh, cawh ni khawnghi amak nep a pha law awh, ak cakna dyi thai kawm u tiksaw, ik-oeih boeih nami sai coeng dyna naming dyih hly thai hy.
Cedawngawh awitak cawi zeennaak ing zeen qu unawh, dyngnaak kqangdan ing dah qu doena,
qoepnaak awithang leek khawmyk ce myk doena a oepchoeh na awm lah uh.
Vemyihkhqi boeih boeih coengawh, cangnaak phuhqa ce pawm lah uh, ve ing ni setan a la ak alh hlap hlap ce namim thih hly thai hy.
Hulnaak thi lumyk ce myk unawh, Khawsa a zawzi Myihlak zawzi ce pawm lah uh.
A soep hoeiawh cykcahnaak thoehnaak soepkep ing Myihla awh cykcah lah uh. Ve ve nak kawk khuiawh taak doena, thlakciimkhqi boeih aham cykcah poe lah uh.
Ityk awhawm kam kha ka awng hoeiawh awithang leek awihyp ve ak kqih kaana kak kqawnnaak thai aham, kai aham awm cykcah law lah uh,
ve a dawngawh dyihthing na awm nyng saw thiqui ing khihna awm nyng. Kqihnaak a taak kaana kak kqawnnaak thai aham, cykcah law uh.
Ka lungnaak ka naa, Bawipa a ypawm tyihzawih, Tukika ing ik-oeih soepkep ce nik kqawn law pek khqi bit kaw, cawhkaw iamyihna ka awm nawh ikaw ka sai tice sim kawm uk ti.
Ikawmyihna ka mi awm tice sim unawh anih ing tha ani peeknaakkhqi thai aham anih ce tyi law kawng.
Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih a ven awhkaw lungnaak ingkaw cangnaak ce koeinaakhqi venawh awm seh nyng.
Amak thi thai lungnaak ing ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak lungnaak khqi ak khanawh am qeennaak awm seh nyng.
Jesu Khrih a tyihzawih na ak awm, Paul ingkaw Timote ing, Filipi awh ak awm thlakciimkhqi boeih ingkaw thlangboel ak sawikungkhqi ingkaw bibikung khqi venawh:
Bawipa Jesu Khrih ingkaw ni Pa Khawsa am qeennaak ingkaw ngaihqepnaak awm seh.
Nangmih ka nik poek khqi a hoeiawh Khawsa venawh zeelawi kqawn nyng.
Nangmih boeih aham kak cykcah hoeiawh, awmhly doena cykcah poepa nyng,
khawnghin ak cyk awhkawng tuh dy awithang leek kqawnnaak awh nami paa thai a dawngawh,
Nangmih a venawh ak leek bibi ak tylkung ing Jesu Khrih nyn a pha dy ak soep cana bibi kaw, tice upvoetnaak am awm hy.
Nangmih akawng kai ing vemyihna kak poek ve kai aham thym hy, kak kawlung khuiawh ka nik poek khqi poepa a dawngawh; thiqui ing khihna awm nyng awithang leek ve dyih pyi nyng caksak nyng awm, nangmih taw kai ingkaw Khawsa qeennaak ak pang haihna ni awm u hyk.
Nangmih ve Jesu Khrih a lungnaak ing i ikawmyih tluk ka ni kyngnaak khqi tice Khawsa ing sim hy.
Kak cykcahnaak taw: nangmih a lungnaak ce cyihnaak simnaak ing a be naak khqoet khqoet aham na ni,
cawh ni ak leek soeih ce ngaih thai unawh Khrih a khawnghi a pha hlan dy coet amak kap cimcaihnaak ing nami awm hly thai,
Khrih awhkaw ak law dyngnaak ak thaih ing be kawm u tiksaw - Khawsa a boeimang zoeksangnaak na a awm hly.
Kak khanawh ik-oeih ak awm ing awithang leek haina maa sak hy, tice koeinaakhqi, sim sak ham ngaih nyng.
Ahu nataw boei a im ak qehkhqi ingkaw thlang boeih a venawh Khrih aham ni thiqui ing khih na ka awm tice ak ciim na dang hy.
Thiqui ing khih na ka awmnaak a dawngawh, Khrih awh koeinaa thlang ak kuum bet ing Khawsak awi ce qal leeknaak ing kqih kaana khypyi ham thaawmnaak hu uhy.
Thlang a vang ingtaw Khrih ce ytnaak ingkaw kqawnseetnaak doena kqawn pai uhy, cehlai thlangvang bai ingtaw kawlung ak leek soeih taak doena kqawn uhy.
cekkhqi ing Awithang leek ak kqawn hamna Khawsa ing ve bibi ani pek niti sim unawh lungnaak ak camawh ak kqawn khqi na awm uhy.
Thlangvang ingtaw a tangtang na am bi unawh, nang aw kai aw tinaak kawlung ing suibai ami bai a kawnglamawh awipungnaak ak awm kawina amik sai ni.
Cehlai ikawmyihna a awm? A hqawng na mai awm, atak na mai awm Khrih ce khypyina ak awm ni, cedawngawh kak kaw zeel hy. Oeih, zeel poe kawng nyng.
Cetaw nangmih ak cykcahnaak ing Jesu Khrih Myihla ak pyinaak ak caming, ka venawh ik-oeih ak awm ve ka loetnaak na coeng kaw tice sim nyng.
Am chak qoe ti kawng, tuh awhkawng a poepa na ka pum awh Khrih ve thihnaak ing am awhtaw hqingnaak ing aw zoeksang na awm kaw, tice qehdam doena ngaih-uu nyng.
Kai aham ka hqingnaak ve Khrih ni, ka thih awh awm ka hoeihkhangnaak ni.
Cehlai ka pum awh ve ka hqing poe awhtaw, ka bibinaak ak thaih qah kaw tinaak ni, Cehlai ikaw kak tyk lah voei? Am sim nyng!
Ik-oeih pakkhih anglak lawawh awm hqoeng nyng: kamah ingtaw cet nawh Khrih ing awm haih ngaih bet hawh nyng, ce ce nep bet hy;
cehlai pum awh ka awm ve nangmih aham ngoe hyn hy.
Awm hyn kawng tice sim nyng, nangmih cangnaak awh nimi taainaak aham nami venawh awm poe kawng nyng ti sim nyng.
Cawh ni nangmih mi ni awm haihnaak ak caming Jesu Khrih awh nami zeelnaak ce kai ak camawh a ngen hly hy.
Oeih ikawmyihna awm seiawm, nangmih a khawboe qamlang ce Khrih ak awithang leek ing ang qoep na awm sak uh. Cawhtaw, kai law nyng ka ni huh khqi awh awm, am law nyng nami kawng kang zaak awh awm, kawlung pynoet ing dyi kawm u tiksaw, thlang pynoet amyihna awithang leek cangnaak awh naming dyih hly thai hy,
nangmih anik oelh thlangkhqi ce am kqih voel ti kawm uk ti. A mingmih aming tluk naak aham simnaak taw ve ni, cehlai nangmih taw hul na awm kawm uk ti - Khawsa ing ni hul khqi kaw.
Amah ce cangnaak aham doeng kaana, anih aham kyinaak huh ham awm Khrih ang zyng na nangmih a venawh peek na awm hawh hy,
tuh kai ing ka huh kyinaak huh lawt aham nangmih awm awm u hyk ti.
Khrih ingqawi tuqunaak ak caming thaawmnaak, a lungnaak caming ngaihqepnaak, Myihla ingkaw pawlnengnaak, thlang qeenkhaw ngaainaak, nami taak awhtaw,
kawlung pynoet na ta unawh ka awmhlynaak ve soep sak lah uh, cawhkaw lungnaak ce ta unawh, kawlung pynoet ing cainaak ce ta lah uh.
Mah doeng ngaihnaak ing mai aw oekqunaak ing mai aw ik-oeih koeh sai law uh, cehlai kawdungnaak ing na mimah anglakawh thlak chang ce ak leek bet na poek law uh.
Na mimah a ngaihnaak doeng ce koeh toek law uh, thlakchang a ngaihnaak awm toek law pe uh.
Ve poeknaak, Jesu Khrih ak poeknaak amyihna awm seh nyng.
Anih cetaw ang coengnaak awh Khawsa na awm hlai hy, Khawsa ing ang myih na a awmnaak ik-oeih ce tu aham ap poek hy,
amah ingkaw amah ce ikawna awm ang ngaiqu kaana, tyihzawih ang dyih hun ce a hul coengawh, thlanghqing amyihna ce sa qu hy,
thlanghqing pynoet amyihna awm lawt nawh, dungvoeng na ce awm hy, thih dy na awi ngai nawh - thinglam khan awh thi hy.
Cedawngawh Khawsa ing, anih ce ak sang soeih awh ta nawh, ming boeih boeih ak khanawh, ak awm ming ce pehy.
Jesu ang ming awh, khan ingkaw dek ingkaw khawmdek kai awhkaw, khawkhlu boeih ing khuksym nawh,
Khawsa boeimang naak aham, lai boeih ing Jesu Khrih taw Boei ni tice ak kqawnnaak aham ni.
Cedawngawh ka pyikhqi, awi naming ngai khawi amyihna - kai ka awm awh awm, tuh am ka awm ak khqoet awh - kqih ingkaw thyn doena nangmih thaawngnaak ce bi poe lah uh,
ngaihnaak ham ingkaw ak leek soeih amah ang cainaak sainaak aham nangmih ak khuiawh bi ak bikung taw Khawsa ni.
A soep hoei ve hqo ang hqitnaak taak kaana sai law uh,
Khawsa a ca coet amak kapna nami awmnaak aham awipungnaak ingkaw hqo ang hqitnaak amak awmna a soep hoei ve sai law uh, cedawngawh nangmih taw khan nakaw aihchi amyihna vang uhyk ti.
Hqingnaak awi ce ak cakna namim tu awhtaw a hoeina am dawng nawh ka bibinaak ve a hoei na a awm kaana Khrih nyn awh ka zoeksang qu hly thai.
Hyih phumnaak awh aawk hly kawi ik-oeih peek amyihna ni hawk unawh nangmih ak cangnaak awhkawng ak law bibinaak na awm mai nyng awm, nangmih awh zeel nyng.
Cemyih koepna nangmih awm kai amyihna namik kaw zeel nawh nami awmhly aham awm hy.
Nangmih a venawh Timote tyi law hly nai nyng tinawh Bawipa Jesu ak caming ngaih-uu nyng, cawh ni nangmih ak awithang kang zaak awh kai awm kang ngai a qep hly.
Nami leeknaak ahamna kawlung tak ing ak pequ, anih a myih thlakchang u awm am ta nyng.
Ikawtih, thlang boeih ing amimah a leeknaak doeng ce sui uhy, Jesu Khrih ak kawngaih am sui uhy.
Timote ingtaw amah ingkaw amah ce huqu hy, kawtih pa ingkaw capamyihna awithang leek awh bi ni bi pyi hy.
Cedawngawh, ka bi sai ve ka nai ka nawng coengawh anih ce tyi law nai bit kawng tinawh ngaih-uu nyng.
Kamah awm law nai ngai kawng nyng tinawh Bawipak caming ngaih-uu nyng.
Ka napa, ka bibipyi haih ingkaw ka qalkap pyi Apaphrodita ve nangmih a venawh ka tyih law tlaih ham ngoe hy tinawh poek nyng, anih nangmih a dyihthing na awm nawh kai anik bawmkung na nami tyih law na awm, awm bai hy.
Nangmih ni kyng nak khqi boeih hy, tlo hy tinawh naming zaak a dawngawh ak kaw se hy.
Thih tawm dyna tlo taw tlo hy. Cehlai, Khawsa ing qeen hy, anih doeng a qeen kaana kawsetnaak ce kawsetnaak ing ama sap voel aham kai awm ni qeen hy.
Cedawngawh anih ce ka tyih law ham ngaih nyng, cawh ni anih ce nami huh awh zeel kawm u tiksaw kai awm am ka mawn am ka tang hly bet hy.
Zeel doena anih ce Bawipa awh ym law uh, anih amyihna ak awm thlangkhqi awm kqihchah law uh,
A thih tawm dyna Khrih bi ce bi hy, nangmih ing am nami peek thai dawmhlainaak ce peek aham a hqingnaak dy awh kyinaak hu hy.
Ahu khit nataw, koeinaakhqi, Bawipa awh zeel lah uh! Caa ka qee tlaih tlaih ham am ngak nyng. Nangmih aham loetnaak na ni a awm.
Them che ak sai, pumsa awh chahhui ak qeet uikhqi awh ngaihta uh.
Ikawtih, ningnih ve chahhui ak qeetkhqi, Khawsa Myihla ing Khawsa ak bawk, Khrih awh zoeksang na ak awm, pumsa awh ypnaak amak ta na ni awm uhy.
Vemyihkhqi awh kai ingawm ypnaak ta nyng. U ingawm pumsa awh ypnaak taak aham ak poek awhtaw, kai tak khqoet nyng;
Ak kqeet nyn awh chahhui ak qeet, Juda thlang, Benjamin ak kaw, Hebrai khuiawh Hebrai na awm nyng; anaa awi ben awh, Farasi na awm nyng;
thahlynaak ben awh, thlang ak thekhanaak kung na awm nyng; dyngnaak benawh coet amak kap na awm nyng.
Cehlai ka hawihkhangnaak boeih boeih ce tuh awhtaw Khrih awh hlaawng boeih hawh nyng.
Ce anglakawh ik-oeih ka hlaawngkhqi boeih ce ka Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang ming ing ka nyhtah awh bau khqoet hy, anih awh ik-oeih boeih boeih ce hlaawng kang hawh nyng. Cemyih khqi ce boei nani kak poek, Khrih ce hu nyng.
Amah awh huh na ka awm naak thai aham ni, anaa awi awhkawng ak law kamah a dyngnaak am ta nyng, Khrih ak cangnaak ak caming ing ni dyngnaak ce ka taak - Khawsa ven nakaw ak law dyngnaak ingkaw cangnaak ak caming ni.
Khrih ingkaw a thawhtlaihnaak thaawmnaak ingkaw a khuikhanaak khqi awh yh pyinaak, a thihnaak awh amah amyihna coengnaak,
Ikawp na awm thihnaak awhkawng thawhtlaihnaak ce huh aham ngaih nyng.
Ak hu hawhna am ngai qu nyng, ak soep hawhna awm am ngai qu nyng; “Khrih a nim tunaak ing ang cainaak ce ka huh thai khoem awhtaw,” tinawh a hquutna hquut nyng.
Koeinaakhqi, ak hu hawhna am ngai qu nyng. Cehlai ve them pynoet ve sai nyng – hu ben nakaw ik-oeih ak awmkhqi ce hilh nawh, malam nakaw ik-oeih ak awmkhqi ce pan ing,
Khrih Jesu Khawsa khan ben nakaw ak khynaak kutdo huh ahamna awikam benna ce dawng poepa nyng.
Ningmih thlak hqamkhqi boeih ingtaw cemyih ik-oeih ce nik poek ham awm hy. Ikawmyih a kawnglam awhawm kawlung ak chang ak toenna nami awm awhawm, Khawsa ing ni sim law sak khqi kaw.
Ikawmyihna awmseiawm, ni phanaak hun awhkawng malam pan usih.
Koeinaakhqi, ka khawsak ak ooet na awm lah uh, nami ooet kawi kaimih awm unyng, cemyihna khawksakhqi ce toek khqi kawm uk ti.
Thlang khawzah cet uhy, cehlai cekkhqi taw Khrih thinglam a qaalna awm uhy tinawh ami kawnglam ce nik kqawn pek khqi hawh nyng.
A mingmih a dytnaak taw qawknaak na awm nawh, ami Khawsa awm a mimah ak phoen ce ni, ami zoeksangnaak awm chahqai phyihnaak ni. Amik kawlungkhqi ce khawmdek them awh ta uhy.
Cehlai, ningnih taw khan ben thlang nani ni awm uh. Ningmih ing cawhkaw hulkung ce ning ngaih-u uhy, Bawipa Jesu Khrih ce,
amah a sai thainaak ak caming ik-oeih boeih ak takung ing ak kaina nik awm ningnih a pumkhqi ve amah a boeimangnaak pum na coeng sak kaw.
Cedawngawh, ka koeinaa, lungna nawh kang ngaikhqi, ka zeelnaak ingkaw ka boei lumyk na ak awmkhqi, ka pyikhqi, cemyihna ce Khrih awh ak cak cana na ming dyih ham awm hy!
Bawipa awh qoepqui cana nami awm naak aham, Euodia ingkaw Suntuki avenawh awm qeennaak thoeh law nyng.
Oeih, ka bibipyi, ni thoeh law nyng; Awithang leek awh a nik dyihpyi, Kalemen ingkaw ka bibipyi chang hqingnaak cauk khuiawh ming ak awmkhqi ingkaw nukhqi ce pyih khqi.
Bawipa awh zeel poepa lah uh: kqawn tlaih bai nyng, zeel lah uh.
Nangmih ak kawdungnaak ce thlang boeih ing sim seh. Bawipa taw zoe hawh hy.
Ikaw awhawm mawnnaak koeh ta law uh; a soep hoeiawh cykcahnaak ing thoeh unawh, zeelawi kqawn doena, naming sytnaak boeih ce Khawsa venna zaaksak na awm seh nyng.
Cawhtaw, Khawsa ngaihqep naak, kawlung ing ama pha thai ing namik kawlung ingkaw namik kawpoek ce Khrih Jesu awhce ni khoemdoen pek khqi kaw.
Ahu dyt na taw, koeinaakhqi, ak thym boeih, kqihchah kawi boeih, ak dyng boeih, ak ciimcaih boeih, lungnaak ak kap boeih, nai ak cu boeih - ikaw awm leek nawh kyihcah ham ak tyng boeih - cemyih ce poek law uh.
Kai a ven awhkawng nami cawngkhqi nami huhkhqi ingkaw naming zaakkhqi ce sai lawt uh. Ngaihqepnaak Khawsa ing ni awmpyi khqi kaw.
Ahu dyt na kai awh kawlung ak thaai na nami taak a dawngawh Bawipa awh zeel soeih nyng.
Ka voet ka hlauh a dawngawh vemyihna ka ti amni, ikawmyih dyih hunawh awm nyng awm, ka awm thainaak aham cawng nyng.
Ak voetna khawsak sim nyng, boeina khawsak awm sim nyng; ikawmyih dyih hun buh cawih ingkaw ak phyi khawsak, boei ingkaw khawdeng khawsak awihhyp ce sim boeih nyng.
Thamahnaak anik pekung ak caming a soep boeih sai thai nyng.
Cehlai ka kyinaak ce nangmih ing ni bawm u tiksaw leek uhyk ti.
Ce anglak bai awh nangmih Filipi thlangkhqi ing nami sim amyihna, awithang leek naming zaak cyk tloek awh, Makedonia ben nakawng ka law awh thlangboel pynoet ingawm peeknaak ingkaw donaak am ta uhy, nangmih doeng ing ni nami taak hy;
Thesalonika khaw awh ka awm awh awm, ka ngoe ngaihnaakkhqi pat law tlaih tlaih uhyk ti.
Kai ing laksawng am ngaih-uu nyng, cehlai nangmih aham ikaw hawihkhangnaak a awm kaw ti ni kak poek.
Thaphu hu nyng khawzah hu pateng nyng, tuh Epaphrodita a ven nakawng nangmih a kutdo pat awm hu bai nyng. Ce a kutdo cetaw bawktui kutdo na awm hy, do ham ak tyng hyihphumnaak, Khawsa ak zeel sakna awm hy.
Khawsa ing Jesu Khrih awh a boeimangnaak amyihna nangmih a ngoe ngaihnaak boeih ce ni soep pe sak khqi kaw.
Ni Khawsa ingkaw Pa a venawh zoeksangnaak kumqui dy awm seh nyng. Amen!
Khrih awh thlakciimkhqi boeih ce kut tlaih law uh. Ka venawh ak awm koeinaakhqi mi kut ni tlaih khqi uhy.
Thlakciimkhqi boeih ing kut ni tlaih khqi uhy. Awipui na Kaisar ipkhui kaw ing ni tlaih uhy.
Jesu Khrih a lungqeennaak ce nangmih ang Myihlak khan awh awm seh nyng. Amen.
Khawsa ngaihnaak amyihna Jesu Khrih a ceityih na ak awm Paul ingkaw nangmih a naa Timote ing,
Kolosa khaw awhkaw Khrih awh ypawm na ak awm koeinaa thlakciimkhqi venawh: Nangmih Pa Khawsa awhkaw qeennaak ingkaw ngaihqepnaak awm seh nyng.
Nangmih Bawipa Jesu Khrih a Pa Khawsa venawh, nangmih aham ka mik cykcah awh, zeelnaak awi kqawn poepa unyng,
Jesu Khrih awh nangmih ak cangnaak ingkaw thlakciimkhqi nami lungnaak ce ka ming zaak ak camawh,
ngaih-unaak awhkawng ak thoeng law cangnaak ingkaw lungnaak ce khawk khan na nangmih aham cun ce na awm hawh hy, ve akawng ve awitak awhkawng nangmih ing za hawh uhyk ti, awithang leek ce nangmih a venna law hawh hy.
Ce ak awi ce nangmih ing za u tiksaw Khawsam qeennaak ingkaw awitak ce naming zaksim coengawh kawng nangmih anglakawh bi a bi lawt amyihna khawmdek pum awh ve awithang leek ve ak thaih qah nawh hqam hqui hy.
Ve akawng ve tyihzawih pyi, kaimih ang zyng awh ypawm na Khrih bi ak bi Epaphra a ven awhkawng sim uhyk ti,
anih ing Myihla awh nangmih ing lungnaak nami taak awm ka mi venna kqawn law hy.
Vawh, nangmih a thang ka ming zaak cyk awhkawng, nangmih aham cykcahnaak a boet kaana ta unyng. Amah ak kawngaih saithainaak ingkaw myihla ben cyihnaak boeih boeih ingkaw zaksimnaak boeih boeih ing nami benaak thai aham Khawsa venawh thoeh law nyng.
Bawipa ak kawngaih na hqing unawh ik-oeih soepkep awh amah ak kawzeelnaak nami sainaak aham cykcah nyng: ik-oeih soepkep awh ak thaih leek nami qah coengawh Khawsa simnaak benawh nami hqamnaak thai aham,
yh thainaak ingkaw kawdungnaak nami taaknaak thai aham, amah boeimang thaawmnaak boeih ing tha awm sak na awm uhyk ti, zeel doena
Pa a venawh zeel awi namik kqawnnaak thai aham, anih ing thlakciimkhqi ingkaw vangnaak qam khuiawh qo pang haih aham nangmih ce ni sai khqi hawh hy,
kawtih amah than uknaak khui awhkawng ni hul khqi nawh a lungnaak a Capa qam khuina ni khyn khqi hawh hy,
anih awh ce nangmih ing hulnaak, thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak ce ni ta uhy.
Anih taw huh thai na amak awm Khawsa myi, ik-oeih sai boeih boeih ak khanawh ak thang cyk na awm hy.
Anih ak caming ik-oeih boeih boeih ve syn na awm hy: khan ing dek awhkaw ik-oeihkhqi boeih, huh thai ingkaw am huh thai boeih, ngawihdoelh sang ingkaw thaawmnaakkhqi, uknaakkhqi ingkaw saithainaakkhqi; a soep ik-oeih boeih ve amah ing amah aham sai hy.
Ik-oeih boeih a awm hlanawh anih taw awm hawh hy, anih awh ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce cun boeih hy.
Amah taw pum, thlangboel a lu na awm hy; ik-oeih soepkep a baunaak ak sang soeih na a awm thainaak aham, a kung ak kqannaak ingkaw thlakthi anglakawhkawng ak thang lamma na awm hy.
Anih awh a soepnaak ce Khawsa ak kaw zeelnaak na awm hy,
amah ak caming a soep hoei, khawmdek khanawh ak awm ingkaw khanna ak awm boeih ce, thinglam awhkawng ak lawng law a thi ingkaw qoepnaak a sainaak ak caming qoepqui sak na ce awm hy.
Khawsa ing pek qu hawh u tiksaw nami khawboe a seet a dawngawh kawlung awh qaal na awm hawh uhyk ti.
Cehlai tuh taw a haiawh a ma amak awm coet amak kap thlakciim na ani peek naak khqi thai ham, Khrih a pum a thihnaak ak caming nangmih ing tuqunaak ce sai hawh hy -
cangnaak awh nami awm poe awhtaw, ak cak cana dyi unawh, awithang leek awhkaw ngaih-unaak ce koeh thoeih taak uh. Ve awithang leek ve nangmih ing za u tiksaw khawnghi ak kaiawh ak awm a sai ik-oeih boeih a venawh khypyi na awm hy, ve a dawngawh ni kai Paul awm tyihzawih na ka awm.
Tuh nangmih aham ka khuikhanaak awh ve zeel nyng, Khrih a khuikhanaak tika nataw ka pumsa awh ve be sak nyng; vetaw amah a pumna ak awm thlangboel aham nani.
Khawsa ing ani tyihnaak amyihna nangmih a venawh Khawsak awi ak soepna khypyi aham kai taw tyihzawih na awm nyng –
cawhkaw awihyp kum khawqyt ingkaw cadil ceqyt thuh na ak awm ce, tuh awhtaw thlakciimkhqi venawh dang hawh hy.
Cekkhqi venawh Khawsa ing vawhkaw a boeimang awihyp ve Gentelkhqi venawh kqawn aham tyi hawh hy, ce ik-oeih cetaw boeimangnaak ngaih-u na ak awm nangmih ak khui awhkaw khqi ceni.
Kaimih ing anih akawng ce khypyi unyng, toel unyng thlang boeih ce Khrih awh a soepnaak thai aham cyihnaak boeih ing cawngpyi unyng.
Ce ak bi hamna Khrih ak thamahnaak hawnaak ing bibi poepa nyng, cawhkaw thaawmnaak ing kai awh bibi hy.
Nangmih ingkaw Laodicea khaw awh ak awmkhqi, pumsa awh kai ama nik hu khawi thlangkhqi boeih aham iqyt ka khuikha ti nami sim aham ngaih nyng.
Kawlung ngaihqepnaak ta unawh lungnaak ing naming tuqu aham ngaih nyng; cawh ni zaksimnaak ta unawh, Khawsak awihyp, Khrih ce ami sim hly thai,
anih awh cyihnaak ingkaw simnaak boeih ce thuh na awm hy.
Thlang ing pauthainaak ing nangmih a mani thainaak khqi aham ve ve nik kqawn pek khqi nyng.
Nangmih a venawh pumsa na am awm hlai nyng, kang myihla taw nangmih a venawh awm nawh nangmih ing a cypmyih na Khrih awh cangnaak cak ing nami awm ce huh aham ngaih nyng.
Cawhtaw, Jesu Khrih ce Boei na namik kqoeh hawh a dawngawh, anih awh awm poe lah uh,
Amah awh namik kqa thla u nawhtaw dyi lah uh, cawngpyinaak nami huh hawh amyihna cangnaak awh namik tha awm sak unawh, zeelnaak ing be ngen lah uh.
U ingawm awihqawng khawmdek cyihnaak ing koeh ni thai nak khqi seh, cemyihkhqi ce thlanghqing a phung ing Khrih awh amak koemkhqi khawmdek them nani ami awm.
Khrih awh Khawsa soepnaak boeih boeih pum ce awm hy,
saithainaak boeih a lu na ak awm, Khrih awh soepnaak ce nangmih a venawh peek na awm hawh hy.
Anih awh, khawmdek thawlh hlamnaak chahhuiqeet na awm hawh uhyk ti, thlanghqing a kut sai chahhuiqeet na am awm nawh Khrih a sai chahhuiqeetnaak ni,
baptisma awh amah ing pup haih na awm u tiksaw, amah ce thihnaak awhkawng anik hulkung Khawsa ak thaawm cangnaak ak caming ak tho haih na awm bai uhyk ti.
Thawlhnaak awh thih na awm u tiksaw, khawmdek thawlhnaak awh chahhuiqeet kaana nami awm awh, Khawsa ing Khrih ing ni hqing sak khqi haih hawh hy. Ningmih a thawlhnaak boeih awh qeenkhaw ning ngai pek khqi hawh hy.
Cauk awh qee na ak awm, cawngpyinaak awi, ningnih a qaal na ak awm ce lo nawh, thinglam awh heen boeih hawh hy.
Saithainaak thaawmnaak khqi ce tha boeih sak nawh, thinglam ing cekkhqi ce a noeng coengawh thlang kqeng amik huh awh dang sak hy.
Cedawngawh u ingawm nangmih a awk a ai awh, bawknaak benawh kaw poei khawnghi awh, hlak thai awh Sabbath awh awi koeh ni deng khqi seh.
Vemyihkhqi taw ak law hly kawi ik-oeih ang myihlip na awm nawh; a tak taw Khrih awh ni hu hy.
Amak thym ak kaina awmnaak a lungnaakkhqi ingkaw khan ceityih ak bawkkhqi ing kutdo na huh hly kawi awh koeh ni lawlh koeh ni maih u seh. Cemyih ak thlang ingtaw a huh ik-oeih ce ak dung na poek nawh; myihla amak awm kawlung ce thangaknaak ing oek qu sak hy.
Lu ing tuqunaak lam hang hy, lu awhkawng ni pum boeih tha pe nawh quhqawng ingkaw thaqui thakqaa khqi boeih ak thamah sak nawh, Khawsa a ngaih kawi amyihna taai khawi hy.
Ve khawmdek a kung kqannaak awh Khrih nami thih haih hawh a dawngawh, kawtih khawmdek a koe na ak awm amyihna:
Koeh tu! Koeh teng! Koeh bi!” ti uknaak ak khuiawh nami awm paqap kaw?
Vekkhqi boeih taw thlanghqing ak awipeek ingkaw cawngpyinaak awi na a awmawh a hawnnaak hly kawi nani a awm boeih hy.
Vemyih cawngpyinaak awi, nimah a ngaih poeknaak, bawknaak, amak thym na ak kaina awmnaak ingkaw nimah a pum ak tlo soeih na khuikha peeknaakkhqi ve ak khan awhtaw ak cyi amyihna dang hlai hy, pumsa a ngaih soepnaak aham a hawihkhangnaak am awm hy.
Khrih awh thawhtlaih na nami awm hawh awhtaw, Khawsa a tang ben awh ak ngawi Khrih a awmnaak, khan benna kaw them awh namik kawlung ce ta lah uh.
Khawmdek them awh kawlung taak kaana, khan ben nakaw ak awm them awh namik kawlung ce ta lah uh.
Thi u tiksaw, nangmih a hqingnaak ce Khrih ingkaw Khawsa awh thuh na awm hawh hy.
Nami hqingnaak Khrih ce ang dang law awh boeimang ak thlang na dang kawm uk ti.
Cedawngawh, khawmdek themkhqi ikawmyih awm thih sak boeh boeh uh: nupa thawlhnaak, amni ciimnaak, hyy ngaihnaak, themche ngaihnaak ingkaw ak pyh ngaihnaak, vemyihkhqi ve myi bawknaak na awm hy.
Vemyihkhqi awh ve, Khawsa ak kawsonaak pha law kaw.
Vemih ik-oeih awh nangmih awm u tiksaw cet khawi uhyk ti.
Cehlai tuh taw vemyih ik-oeihkhqi boeih ve nami qoeng aham awm hy: kawsonaak, kawtawknaak, thlang sawhnaak, thlang theetnaak ingkaw tyih ak awm awi qoe qoe ce nam kha awhkawng koeh cawn seh.
Nami thlanghqing kqym a bibinaak ce nami qoeng hawh a dawngawh, pynoet ingkaw pynoet a venawh nami qaai koeh kqawn uh.
Saikung a myi ingkaw anik lo qu cyihnaak awh thaai sak na ak awm thlanghqing thaai ing thoeihcam qu lah uh.
Vawh Greek ingkaw Juda am awm nawh, chahhuiqeet ingkaw ama qeet awm am awm hy, thlak kqym, Skuthia, tamnaa ingkaw ak loet awm am awm hy, Khrih taw ik-oeih soepkep awh soepkep na awm hy.
Cedawngawh, Khawsak thlang tyk, thlakciim ingkaw am thintlohnaak thlangkhqi na nami awm amyihna pynoet ingkaw pynoet qeennaak, kawdungnaak, ak kaina awmnaak, yhnaak ing thoeihcam qu lah uh.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet yhthainaak ta law unawh, pynoet ingkaw pynoet ak khanawh kawseet naak na sai thawlh awhtaw qeenkhaw ngai law uh. Bawipa ing qeenkhaw ang ngai amyihna qeenkhaw ngai law uh.
Vemyih ik-oeihkhqi boeih coengawh lungnaak ing thoeihcam qu uh, ce ing ce zen qu unawh pynoet na cuut qu law uh.
Nangmih ak kawlung ce Khrih a ngaihqepnaak ing uk seh, pum pynoet a ke a bai na nami awm amyihna qoepnaak ing awm aham nani nangmih ce anik khy khqi. Zeelnaak awi kqawn uh.
Pynoet ingkaw pynoet cyihnaak boeih ing cuk am kik qu unawh naming toel qu awh nangmih ak khuiawh Khrih ak awi khawzah awm law sak uh, Saam laa sa unawh, laa saknaak ing Myihla ben laakhqi nami sak awh nak kawlung ing Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn doena sai law uh.
Ikaw boeih awm nami sai awh, nak awih kqawnnaak ingkaw na them sainaak awh Bawipa Jesu ang ming ing sai law uh, Pa Khawsa venawh anih ak caming zeelnaak awi kqawn law uh.
Zukhqi, Bawipa a awm amyihna, nami vaakhqi venawh pe qu lah uh.
Vaakhqi, nami zu ce lung law na unawh ak tlo aih na koeh zyi law uh.
Cakhqi, ik-oeih soepkep awh na nu ingkaw na pa ak awi ce ngai lah, kawtih vetaw Bawipa a ngaih ni.
Pakhqi, na cakhqi ak kawsonaak koeh sai law pe uh, amik kaw boet kaw.
Tamnaakhqi, ik-oeih soepkep awh khawmdek awhkaw nami boei awi ngai uh, thlang ak kawzeelnaak ham doengna thlang amik huh doengawh bi koeh bi unawh, Bawipa kqihchah doena sai law uh.
Ikawm nami sai taw, thlang a bi ak bi amyihna koeh poek unawh Bawipa bi ak bi amyihna na mik kawlung boeih ing sai law uh.
Bawipa venawh kaw kutdo qo pang hly kawi ce sim hawh uhyk ti. Boeikhqi bi ni nangmih ing nami bi uh.
U awm ik-oeih ak sai thawlh thlang taw a sai thawlh phu ce thung tlaih kaw, mikhaai toeknaak am awm kaw.
Boeikhqi, nami tamnaakhqi ak khanawh ak thym ingkaw ak dyng ik-oeih ce sai law pe uh, kawtih nangmih awm khawk khan na Boei ta uhyk ti, ti sim uhyk ti.
Cykcah poepa unawh, zeelawi kqawn doena ngaihta uh.
Kaimih ak khypyi awi awh Khawsa ing chawh awng nawh, Khrih ak awihyp ce ka mik khypyi thainaak aham, kaimih aham awm cykcah law lawt uh, cedawngawh ni quihqet ing khih na ka awm.
Ak caih phan na kak khypyi hly kawi ce kak khypyi thainaak aham cykcah uh.
A leng benna kaw thlangkhqi venawh ik-oeih nami sai awh ngaihta uh; a typ leek nami huh awh phu ak awm doeng ce sai law uh.
Awihkqawnnaak a hoeiawh qeennaak ing be poepa seh, ikawmyihna awi ka thungnaak thai kaw ti nami simnaak thai aham cii amyihna al law uh.
Tukhika ing kai ak awithang boeih ce kqawn law boeih bit kaw. Anih ce ka lungnaak ka naa, bibikung ypawm ing Bawipa awh tyihzawih pyi haih na awm hy.
Kaimih ang dyih hun ingkaw ka ming cainaak ce sim unawh kawlung thaawmnaak nami taak thainaak aham anih ce nangmih a venna tyi law kawng.
Anih ce kaimih a ypawm ka lungnaak ka naa Onesima ing law haih kawm nih, anih ce nangmih a venawh kaw ni. Vawhkaw ik-oeih akawngkhqi boeih ce cekqawi ing kqawn law bit kawm nih.
Thawng kang tlak pyi haih Aristarka ing kut ni tlaih khqi hy, Barnaba a naa benna ak awm Marka ingawm kut ni tlaih khqi hy. (Anih am cukkiknaak awi ce do hawh uhyk ti; anih ce a law awhtaw ak nep na do uh).
Jasta ak mingnaak Jesu ingawm kut ni tlaih khqi boeih hy. Vemyihkhqi boeih ve Khawsa qam bi ak bi pyikungkhqi khuiawh Juda thlangkhqi na awm uhy, cekkhqi ing kang ngaih qep sak uhy.
Jesu Khrih a tyihzawih pynoet na ak awm Epaphara ing kut ni tlaih khqi hy. Khawsa a ngaihnaak boeih awh ak cak na naming dyih phat coengawh, hqam khyk unawh a tang na nami awmnaak thai aham, nangmih aham anih ve cykcah poepa hy.
Nangmih aham Loadicea khaw ingkaw Hiqepolis khaw awhkaw ak awm thlangkhqi ham bibi soeih hy ti kai ing sim pyi nyng.
Siboei na ak awm ka mi lungnaak Luka ingkaw Dema ing kut ni tlaih khqi hy.
Laodicea khaw awh ak awm koeinaakhqi ingkaw Nympha ingqawi a im awh ak cun thlangboel ce kut tlaih law uh.
Vawhkaw kak capat ve nami qeel coengawh, Laodicea awhkaw thlangboel awm qeel sak lawt uh, cekcoengawh cekkhqi ak ca awm nangmih ing qeel pe lawt bai uh.
Arkhipa a venawh, “Bawipa awh na huh bibi ce a boet dyna nak coeng aham ngaihta lah,” tinawh kqawn law pe uh.
Kai, Paul ing ve kut tlaihnaak ve kamah kut qoe ing qee nyng. Ka quihqet ve sim law poe uh. Am qeennaak nangmih a venawh awm poe seh nyng.
Paul, Sila ingkaw Timote, Pa Khawsa ingkaw Jesu Khrih awh ak awm Thesalonika khaw awhkaw thlangboelkhqi venawh; Am qeenaak ingkaw ngaihqepnaak nangmih a venawh awm seh.
Nangmih boeih aham ka mik cykcahnaak awh Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn poepa unyng.
Cangnaak ak caming bibinaak, lungnaak ing tha na ynaak ningnih Bawipa Jesu Khrih awh ngaih-unaak ak caming yh thainaak nami taak naak awh ningnih Pa Khawsa haiawh boet kaana ni sim khqi poepa nyng.
Khawsa ing a lungnaak koeinaakhqi, Khawsa ing nangmih nik tyk khqi hy tice sim unyng.
Ikawtih, nangmih a venawh awithang leek ce awi sawhqat ing am law hy, cehlai thaawmnaak, Ciim Myihla ing ak dungna simnaak ing ni a law. Nangmih a venawh ikawp na kami awm tice ni sim uhyk ti.
Cawh nangmih taw kaimih ing Bawipa a khawboe ak oet na awm uhyk ti, kyinaak khawzah hu hlai uhyk ti, Ciim Myihla ing ani peek zeelnaak ing awithang ce do uhyk ti.
Cedawngawh nangmih taw Makedonia ingkaw Akhaia qam pum awh ak awm, ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih a toek kawina awm uhyk ti.
Nangmih a ven awhkawng Bawipa ak awithang ce Makedonia ingkaw Akhaia qam doeng awh am thang hy - nangmih ak cangnaak ce awm thlang boeih ing sim uhy. Cedawngawh ikaw kqawn aham awm am ngoe voel hawh hy, kaimih ikawpna nami do nami dan uh tice a mimah ing kqawn hawh uhy.
Myihlip bawknaak ce qoeng unawh ak hqing ingkaw ak thym Khawsa bibi ham ingkaw,
amah ing thihnaak awhkawng am thawh - ak law hly kawi kawsonaak awhkawng ningnih anik loet sakkung, khan nakawng ak law hly kawi amah a Capa Jesu qeh uhyk ti tice kqawn law uhy.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih a venawh ka mi law ce a hoeina am awm hy tice sim uhyk ti.
Nami sim hawh amyihna, lamma na Filipi khaw awh ni the ni kha na unawh kyinaak hu unyng, cehlai Khawsa ak pyinaak caming nangmih a venawh awithang leek kqawn law thai unyng.
Nangmih a venawh qeennaak ka mi thoeh law ce amak thym kawpoek amak ciim ing am sai law unyng, ka ni thainaak khqi aham ka mi ngaih a dawngawh awm amni.
Khawsa ing awithang leek khoem sak nawh ak dyihpyi thlangkhqi nani ka mi awm. Thlanghqing zeelnaak am sui unyng saw, kawlung ak qymkung Khawsa ak kawngaih sai aham ni ka mingcai hy.
Ityk awh awm oekqu doena awi ap kqawn khawi unyng, ak pyh ngaihnaak dah aham awm ap kqawn unyng - Khawsa ing ni sim khqi hy.
Thlanghqingkhqi am kyihcahnaak am sui unyng, nangmih am kyihcahnaak awm am sui unyng, u a kyihcahnaak awm am sui unyng. Khrih a ceityih na ka mi awm a dawngawh nangmih aham phyihqihna awm, awm thai hlai unyng,
anu ing a cakhqi a cuun amyihna nangmih a venawh kawdung thlang na awm unyng.
Nangmih ka ni lung naak khqi soeih a dawngawh Khawsak awithang leek zeel doena ka mik kqawn doeng kaana ka mi hqingnaak awm ni pek khqi unyng, ka ni thin tlawhnaak khqi a dawngawh,
Koeinaakhqi kaimih a kyinaak ingkaw khuikhanaak ning zaak sim pyi uhyk ti, nangmih a venawh Khawsak awithang leek ka mik kqawn huili awh u awm phyihqih peek aham am kami ngaih a dawngawh than dai bibi unyng.
Nangmih amik cangnaak thlangkhqi venawh ak ciim ingkaw ak dyng caana ka mi awm ce nangmih ing ni sim u tiksaw Khawsa ingawm sim hy.
Pa ing a cakhqi a hloep amyihna nangmih kani hloep khqi ce sim uhyk ti,
tha ni pek khqi nyng, ngaihqepnaak awi kqawn law unyng, a qam ingkaw a boeimangnaak ak khuiawh nangmih anik khykung Khawsa mik cuuk hatlaak na khawsak aham awi kqawn law unyng.
Kaimih a ven awhkawng na ming zaak Khawsak awi ce nami do awh, thlang ak awi zap amyihna am do u tiksaw Khawsak awi qoe qoe na, nangmih amik cangnaak khqi a venawh bi a binaak amyihna nami do a dawngawh Khawsa venawh a boet kaana zeelawi kqawn unyng.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih taw Khrih awh ak awm, Judah qam awhkaw thlangboel ak oet na awm uhyk ti: cekkhqi ing a mimah Juda pyi a thekhanaak ami huh amyihna nangmih awm na mik thlang nawn a thekhanaak ce hu uhyk ti.
Judahkhqi ing Bawipa Jesu ingkaw tawnghakhqi ce him unawh kaimih awm ni hqek khqi hy, Khawsak kaw am nawm sak unawh thlang boeih a qaal na awm uhy.
Gentelkhqi venawh awithang leek ap kqawn pe thai unyng saw, thaawng na a mami awm naak aham tha lo uhy.
Vemyihna a mimah a thawlhnaak ce a boet dyna cun uhy, cedawngawh Khawsa ak kawsonaak ce a dytnaak nataw a mingmih ak khanawh tlaak pek khqi hy.
Nangmih a venawh law aham ngaih unyng - kai, Paul ve law aham cai bai cai bai nyng - cehlai, setan ing ni kang hy.
Kaimih ang ngaih-unaak, zeelnaak, ni Bawipa Jesu a law awh a haaiawh kaimih a boeimangnaak lumyk ce ikaw? Nangmih am aw?
Nangmih ve kaimih a boeimangnaak ingkaw zeelnaak na awm uhyk ti.
Ce a dawngawh am kami yh thai voel awhtaw, Atheni khaw awh awm aham nep hly soeih hy ti unyng.
Khrih awithang leek khynaak benawh Khawsa bi anik bi pyikung, ka mi naa Timote ce cangnaak benawh nangmih tha ak pe aham ingkaw ngaihqepnaak awi ak kqawn na tyi law unyng,
cawh ni u ingawm vemyih khuikhanaak ingkaw ngaihkyinaak a mami peek hly. Vemyihkhqi awh ni kaimih kami law tice ak leek cana sim uhyk ti.
Nangmih a venawh ka mi awm awh thekhanaak hu kawng unyng tice nik kqawn pek khqi hawh unyng, ka mik kqawn amyihna awm tang saw nangmih ing sim uhyk ti.
Vawh am ka yh thai voel awh nangmih ak cangnaak ce sim aham thlang tyi law nyng. Ikawp na nu sykzoekkung ing nangmih ce ni syk khqi nawh kaimih a bibinaak ve a hoeina a awm kaw ti kqih nyng.
Tuh, Timote ve nangmih a ven awhkawng law thai nawh nangmih ak cangnaak ingkaw lungnaak awithang leek ce law pyi hy. Kaimih amni hilh khqi nawh kaimih ing nangmih huh aham kami ngaih amyihna nangmih ingawm kaimih huh aham ngaih uhyk ti tice anih ing kqawn law hy.
Cedawngawh, koeinaakhqi, kyinaak ingkaw thekhanaak ami huh awh awm cangnaak nami taak a dawngawh ka ming ngaih qep hy.
Bawipa awh ak cak na naming dyih hawh a dawngawh, tuh awhtaw ningnih ni hqing tang tang hawh uhy.
Nangmih ak camawh ni Khawsa haiawh zeelnaak ka mi taak boeih a dawngawh ikawmyihna nu Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi ka mik kqawn tloep lawt lah voei?
Nangmih ni huk khqi tlaih unyng saw nangmih ak cangnaak ak voet ce dawm a hlai thainaak aham khawmthan khawdai cykcah poepa unyng.
Amah ningnih a Pa Khawsa ingkaw ningnih a Bawipa Jesu ing nangmih a venna ka mi law thainaak aham lam qoek abah law seh.
Bawipa ing nangmih ak cangnaak ce pung a tai sak seitaw nangmih boeih aham ingkaw thlak changkhqi ham awm nangmih aham ka mi sai lawt amyihna be ngen sak seh nyng.
Ni Bawipa Jesu ce ak thlakciimkhqi mi a law awh ni Pa Khawsa haiawh coet a kap kaana awm thainaak aham nangmih ak kawlung ce tha awm sak seh.
A hukhit awh, koeinaakhqi, Khawsa ngaih na khaw nami sak thainaak aham ni yn khqi nyng. Vemyihna nami awm thainaak khqoet khqoet aham Bawipa Jesu awh ni yn khqi nawh nik kqawn law pek khqi nyng.
Bawipa Jesu ak caming ikawmyihna ka mim cukkik khqi tice sim uhyk ti.
Khawsa ngaihnaak taw ak ciimcaih na nami awmnaak veni: nu ingkaw pa thawlh sainaak koeh sai kawm uk ti;
ak ciim ingkaw zoeksang kawi na nangmih boeih ing nami pum ce nami hawnaak aham awm hy,
Khawsa amak sim lukihkhqi amyihna nami pumsa hy ngaihnaak ce koeh hquut kawm uk ti;
ve a ik-oeih awh u ingawm a koeinaa ak khanawh amak thym na koeh awm seitaw a tym leek koeh sui seh. Cemyih thawlhnaak ak sai taw Khawsa ing toel kaw, cedawngawh nik kqawn law pek khqi nyng saw awi ni yn khqi hawh nyng.
Khawsa ing ningnih ve amak ciim aham amnik khy khqi nawh, ak ciim na khaw sak aham ni anik khy khqi.
Cedawngawh, vawhkaw cuk am kiknaak ak hoet ak thlang taw thlanghqing am hoet nawh Ciim Myihla ak pekung Khawsa ak hoetkung nani a awm.
Koeinaa lungnaak akawng awh ve ca ka pat law aham am ngoe voel hy, pynoet ingkaw pynoet lung qu aham Khawsa ing ni cawngpyi khqi hawh hy.
Nangmih ing Makedonia qam pum awhkaw koeinaakhqi ce lungna uhyk ti. Cehlai, koeinaakhqi lung qu nak khqoet khqoet lah uh.
A khylh a syk cana awm doena khaw sa law unawh, na mimah a bibi doeng ce poek uh, kak kqawn law hawh amyihna kut ing bibi doeng ce qeet law na uh,
cawh ni nangmih a myngawi khawsaknaak ce thlang ing kqihchah na nawh thlang a pum awh amna ming hang hly.
Koeinaakhqi, ak ipkhqi akawng ce a sim kaana nami awm aham amni ngaih khqi nyng, ngaih-unaak amak ta thlangkhqi amyihna kawseet ing awm aham amni ngaih khqi nyng.
Jesu taw thi nawh tho tlaih hy tice nik cangna uhy, cedawngawh Khawsa ing Jesu awh ak ipkhqi ce amah ing khyn law haih kaw, tice nik cangna uhy.
Bawipa ing amah ak awi amyihna, ningnih ak hqingkhqi Bawipa a law dy ak awm hyn khqi ing ak ipkhqi ce amnik khai thai kawm uh.
Ikawtih Bawipa amah qoe ce, khawteh na khynaak awipeek ing khan ceityih ak bau soeih ak awi ingkaw Khawsa uut ak awi ing khawk khan nakawng law kaw, cawh Khrih awh ak thikhqi ce lamma na tho kawm uh.
Cekcoengawh, ningnih ak hqingkhqi ingkaw amik awm hunkhqi ce khawk khan na Bawipa hqum aham cekkhqi mi myi awh ce pawm na ni awm kawm uh. Cawhtaw Bawipa ing a poepa na ni awm hawh kawm uh.
Cedawngawh ve ak awi ing pynoet ingkaw pynoet tha pe qu lah uh.
Tuh koeinaakhqi, a tym ingkaw khawnghi akawng ce nangmih a venawh qee aham am ngoe hy,
khawmthan awh quk-ai a law amyihna Bawipa a khawnghi ce law kaw, tice ak nep cana sim uhyk ti.
Thlangkhqi ing Ngaihdingnaak ingkaw syng ypnaak,” tinawh amik kqawn awh, cekkhqi ak khanawh seetnaak ce pha pahoei kaw, nu pumqih ing ca a taak tawm awhkaw a tlawh tara amyihna, cekkhqi ce am loet kawm uh.
Cehlai koeinaakhqi tuh tloek awh quk-ai ing nangmih naming ngaih a kyi sak amyihna, thannaak ak khuiawh am awm uhyk ti.
Nangmih taw vangnaak khawkdai a ca na awm boeih uhyk ti. Ningmih taw thannaak ingkaw khawmthan thlang na amni awm uhy.
Cedawngawh ak ip ak thlangkhqi amyihna koeh awm u sih, hqak unawh ngaihtaak u sih.
Ikawtih ak ip ak thlang taw than awh ni a ih, zu ak qui awm than awh ni am qui hy.
Cehlai ningnih taw khawkdai thlang na ni awm a dawngawh, ngaihtaak doena awm u sih, cangnaak ingkaw lungnaak ce kqangdan amyihna dam unawh, ngaih-unaak hulnaak ce thi lumyk amyihna myk u sih.
Ikawtih Khawsa ing ningnih ve ak kawsonaak zawk aham amni tak khqi nawh ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak caming hulnaak huh ahamni ani taak khqi.
Ni hqak awh awm ni ih awh awm, amah ing hqing haih aham, anih ce thi hy.
Cedawngawh nami sai khawi hawh amyihna, pynoet ingkaw pynoet tha pe qu unawh dyl ang hqoeng qu uh.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih anglakawh bi ak tlo soeih na ak bikhqi, Bawipa awh nangmih ak khanawh ak awmkhqi ingkaw nangmih anik cukkikkhqi ce kqihchah lawna lah uh.
A mingmih a bibinaak awh ce ak sang soeih na pawm law unawh lung law na lah uh. Pynoet ingkaw pynoet qoep ang qui cana awm law uh.
