Koeinaa tha ak damkhqi ce toel law uh, tha ak zawikhqi ce tha pe law uh, tha amak awmkhqi ce bawm law u nawhtaw, pynoet ingkaw pynoet kawdungnaak ing awm law uh.
Thawlhnaak ce thawlhnaak ing am nami thungnaak aham ngaihta unawh, pynoet ingkaw pynoet ak khanawh thlang boeih ak khanawh qeennaak ta law uh.
Zeel poepa unawh:
a boet kaana cykcah uh;
ik-oeih soepkep awh zeelnaak awi kqawn lah uh, kawtih ve ve Jesu Khrih awh nangmih aham Khawsa a ngaihnaak na awm hy.
Myihla maihchoei ce koeh thih law uh;
awiphawngnaak ve koeh hep uh.
Ik-oeih soepkep noek a dak law uh. Ak leek ik-oeih ce tu qap uh.
Ik-oeih amak leek boeih boeih ce re law uh.
Ngaihqepnaak Khawsa amah qoe ing nangmih ce ni ciim sak khqi seh. Naming myihla, hqingnaak ingkaw nami pum boeih ce nami a Bawipa Jesu Khrih a law awh coet a kap kaana awm law sak seh.
Nangmih anik khykung ce ypawm thlang na a awm dawngawh anih ing awm law sak bit kaw.
Koeinaakhqi kaimih aham cykcah lah uh.
Koeinaakhqi boeih ce ak ciim mawknaak ing kut tlaih law uh.
Vawhkaw capat ve koeinaakhqi boeih a venawh nami noet peek aham Bawipa a haiawh awi ni pek khqi nyng.
Bawipa Jesu Khrih am qeennaak nangmih boeih ak khanawh awm seh.
Paul, Sila ingkaw Timote ing Ningmih a Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih awh ak awm Thesalonika khaw awhkaw thlangboel a venawh:
Pa Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih a venawh kaw qeennaak ingkaw ngaihqepnaak awm seh.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih ak cangnaak ing taai hqui khqoet khqoet nawh, nangmih pynoet ingkaw pynoet naming lungqunaak awm a taai hqui a dawngawh nangmih awh ce Khawsa venawh zeelawi ka mik kqawn poepa aham awm nawh, kqawn aham awm tyng qoe hy.
Cedawngawh, nangmih ang yhnaak, kyinaak ingkaw sykzoeknaak soepkep anglakawh cangnaak nami taak ce Khawsa thlangboel khqi anglakawh ning cawngcah pyi khqi unyng.
Vemyihkhqi boeih awh ve Khawsa ak awitlyknaak taw thym hy tive dang hy. Cedawngawh nangmih taw Khawsa qam thlangkhqi na noet sih na awm kawm uk ti, ce aham ni nangmih ing nami khuikha hy.
Khawsa taw dyng hy: Nangmih kyinaak anik pe thlangkhqi ce anih ing kyinaak pe tlaih kawmsaw,
nangmih kyinaak ak hukhqi venawh hawihkhangnaak ce pe kaw, kaimih awm ni pek khqi lawt kaw. Bawipa Jesu Khrih ce khawk khan nakawng maikqawng ing khan ceityih thaawmnaak ing ang dang law awh vemyihkhqi ve awm kaw.
Khawsa amak simkhqi ingkaw ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak awithang leek awi amak ngai thlangkhqi ce anih ing phep kaw.
Kumqui seetnaak ing a mingmih ce phep kawmsaw Bawipa amah ing amah a boeimang thaawmnaak a hai awhkawng hawi taak na awm kaw.
Ak thlangciim khqing lakawh zoeksangnaak ingkaw ak cangnaak thlangkhqi boeih aham kawpoek kyi awmhlynaak khawnghi ce awm kaw. Nangmih a venawh kak kqawn law awi ce namik cangnaak a dawngawh, nangmih awm ce ak khuiawh thum lawt kawm uk ti.
Ve ak awi ve kawlung khuiawh taak doena, Khawsa ing nangmih anik khynaak khqi ing ak tyng na nami awmnaak thai aham ingkaw nangmih ing naming cainaak ak nep soeih ce a soep sak thainaak aham ik-oeih nami sainaak hoei awh cangnaak ing nami saithainaak aham cykcah poepa unyng.
Nangmih a Khawsa ingkaw Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang ming ce nangmih awh zoeksang na a awmnaak ham ingkaw nangmih awm amah awh ce zoeksang na nami awmnaak thai aham cykcah unyng.
Ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih a lawnaak ingkaw amah awh ningnih ning cun awh ce, koeinaakhqi,
thlang pynoet ak awiphawngnaak aw, awikqawnnaak aw, capat mai aw kaimih a venawh kaw ak law amyihna, Bawipa a khawnghi pha law hawh hy tinawh kqawnnaak awi a awm awhtaw am nami lynaak aham kqawn law nyng.
U ingawm nangmih koeh ni thai nak khqi seh, qaal na ak tho thlang ingkaw seetnaak ahamna ak awm lap hang na bi ak bi ak thlang ang dang law hlan dy taw, ce a khawnghi ce am pha law kaw.
Khawsa tinawh khy aham ingkaw amah ce bawk aham, Khawsa a bawkim awh amah ingkaw amah ce hawih qu nawh Khawsa na amah ingkaw amah ak kqawn qu thlang ce qaal na tho kawmsaw zoeksang kawm uh.
Nangmih a venawh ka awm awh vemyih ik-oeih akawng ka nik kqawn law peek khqi am nami sim nawh nu?
A tym a khoek awh ang dang naak aham, anih a hu na tu na awm hyn hy tice sim uhyk ti.
Tuh anaa amak ta thlangkhqi ing ang hyp na bibi hawh uhy; cawhkaw bi ak bikung ce khoe valh na a awm hlan dy bibi hun kaw.
Cawhtaw anaa amak takhqi ce dang hawh kawm uh, cemyih thlangkhqi ce Bawipa Jesu ing boeimang soeih na a law awh am kha awhkaw hqi ing hqe boeih kaw.
Anaa amak ta ing setan a bibinaak amyihna amak thym kawpoek kyi ik-oeih, hatnaak ingkaw ngaih kyinaak boeih ce haw na kawmsaw bibi kaw.
Them amak leek soepkep ingkaw ak qeeng kawi thlangkhqi ce thai na kawm uh. Cemyih ak thlangkhqi ing awitak ce lungna nawh hulnaak huh aham amik thanaak a dawngawh qeeng kawm uh.
Cedawngawh a mingmih ing qaai awi ce amik cangnaak aham Khawsa ing thlakthai ce tyih pehy.
Awitak ce cangnaak kaana themche sainaak awh ak zeel thlangkhqi boeih thawlh sak na a awm thainaak aham cemyihna awm kaw.
Bawipa ing a lungnaak koeinaakhqi, Myihla ciimsaknaak ingkaw awitak cangnaak ak caming hul aham ak cyk ca awhkawng Khawsa ing anik tyk khqi hawh a dawngawh, nangmih aham Khawsa venawh zeelawi ka mik kqawn poepa aham awm hy.
Ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih a boeimangnaak awh nami paa naak thai aham kaimih ak awithang leek kqawnnaak ing nangmih ce nik khy khqi hy.
Cedawngawh koeinaakhqi, ak cak na dyi unawh kaimih ing awi ing aw hui am lai ing aw ca ing aw ka mik kqawn law patoe ce ak cakna tu lah uh.
Ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih amah qoe ing ningnih ani lungnaak khqi nawh am qeennaak ing kumqui thaawmnaak ingkaw ngaih-uunaak leek anik pekung Pa Khawsa ing,
namik kawlung ce tha pe seitaw bi sainaak ingkaw awih kqawnnaak boeih awh tha ni awm sak khqi seh.
A hukhit awhtaw koeinaakhqi, nangmih a venawh ka mik kqawn amyihna, Bawipa ak awithang ve kqihchahnaak ing ang tawnna a thangnaak aham kaimih aham cykcah lah uh.
Thlang boeih cangnaak ama taak a dawngawh, thlakthawlh ingkaw thlakche a kut khuiawh kawng ka mi loetnaak aham cykcah lah uh.
Cehlai Bawipa taw ypawm nawh anih ing nangmih ce tha ni awm sak khqi kawmsaw thlang amak leek a kut khui awhkawng ni loet sak khqi bit kaw.
Kaimih ing ka mik kqawn law ce nami sai hawh amyihna sai poe kawm uk ti, tinawh Bawipa ak caming ka ming ngaih yp hy.
Bawipa ing nangmih ak kawlung ce Khawsa lungnaak ingkaw Khrih ang yh thainaak benna sawi law seh.
Koeinaakhqi, kaimih ing ka ni cawngpyi khqi amyihna am awm nawh tha ak dam thlangkhqi ce nami qei aham Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang ming ing awi ni pek khqi nyng.
Ikawmyihna kaimih a awm a ih nami oet hly tice na mimah ing sim hawh uhyk ti. Nangmih a venawh ka mi awm awh ka mik tha am dam qoe qoe hy,
a phu a peek kaana u a mih a buh awm a zoe na am ai unyng. U awm phyihqih am ka mi peeknaak aham khawmthan khawdai ak tlo tlo na bibi unyng.
Saithainaak am kami taak awh am nawh nangmih a oet kawi na ka mi awmnaak aham cemyihna bi ce bi unyng.
Nangmih a venawh ka mi awm awh vawhkaw awi ve ni pek khqi nyng: “Bi amak bi taw, a ai na awm koeh ai seh,” a tive.
Nangmih ak khuiawh thlang vang taw amik tha dam hy ti za nyng. Bibi kaana; Bi ak bi na ak sa qukhqi awm awm hy tinawh za nyng.
Cemyih thlangkhqi ce bibi unawh a mimah ak phoen ami khuut aham Bawipa Jesu Khrih ak caming awi pe nyng.
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih ingtaw ak thym bi sai ve koeh ngak law qoe qoe uh.
Vawhkaw ca ing ka ni yyn law khqi awi ve amak ngai ak thlang a awm awhtaw, anih ce hat law uh. Ak chahnaak aham koeh pawlneng law uh.
Cehlai qaal a myih aih na taw koeh poek law uh, koeinaa amyihna anih ce cuk am kik law uh.
Ngaihqepnaak ak pekung Bawipa amah qoe qoe ing nangmih ce a hun a hoei awh ityk awh awm ngaihqepnaak ni pek khqi seh. Nangmih boeih a venawh Bawipa taw awm seh.
Kai, Paul ing ve kut tlaihnaak ca ve kamah a kut qoe qoe ing qee law nyng, ca ka pat khqi boeih ak khuiawh ve ve a lawhanaak na awm hy. Vemyihna ca ni qee law pek khqi nyng.
Nami Bawipa Jesu Khrih am qeennaak nangmih boeih ak khanawh awm seh.
Paul, hulkung Khawsa ingkaw ning ngaih-uu Jesu Khrih ak awipeeknaak amyihna Jesu Khrih a ceityih na ak awm ing:
Cangnaak awh ka Capa tang tang Timote a venawh: Pa Khawsa a ven ingkaw ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih a venawh kaw am qeennaak, lungnaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak awm seh.
Makedonia khaw na ka ceh awh awi a ni yyn hawh amyihna tuhawm Ephesa khawawh awm cang ahamna ni thoeh nyng. Cawh thlang a vang ing cawngpyinaak amak thym ce cawngpyi uhy, amami cawngpyinaak voel ham tinak khqi.
Syn awi mai ingkaw amak dyt thai khui thoepnaak mai ce koeh sai voel u seh. Cemyih ing Khawsa awh nik cangnaak a taai sak nawh oelh taihnaak ni ak cawn sak hy.
Vawhkaw awipeek ang cainaak taw kawlung ciimcaihnaak, ak che ak leek hqimhqanaak ingkaw cangnaak ak thym awhkawng ak cawn law lungnaak taaknaak thai hamna ni.
Thlang vang ingtaw ve ve cehta unawh, a lawng a lam amak awm awipungnaak benawh cet uhy.
Anaa awi cawngpyikungkhqi na ami awm ngaih hlai uhy, a mimah ak awih kqawn haha zani a mamik sim thlangkhqi ingkaw ikaw amim tu ti awm amak sim thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Ak thym na thlang ing a hawnaak awhtaw anaa awi ve leek hy tice ni sim uhy.
Thlak dyng aham anaa awi ve sai na am awm nawh anaa awi ak hqekhqi ingkaw qaal na ak thokhqi, Khawsa amak simkhqi ingkaw thlakthawlhkhqi, thlakciim am khqi ingkaw Khawsa amak bawkkhqi ami nu ingkaw ami pa amik him thlangkhqi,
ak samphaihkhqi ingkaw thlak leek am khqi, tamnaa ak zawikhqi ingkaw a qaai ak kqawnkhqi ak thym ik-oeih ami sim loei loei awh amak thym na ak kqawnkhqi – ak thym cangnaak ak kalh boeih boeih hamna ni a awm hy.
Boeimang khawsa ing a ni zoeksang lawt amyihna ce awithang leek ce kai ni khoem sak hy.
Tha anik pekung, Jesu Khrih, ni Bawipa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn nyng.
Ma na Khawsa ak thekhanaak ingkaw thlangboel ak thekhanaak thlangna awm nawh thlakche na awm hlai nyng, a sim kaa ingkaw ak cangnaak kaana ka awm dawngawh ka venawh qeennaak ce dang law sak hy.
Jesu Khrih awh ak awm cangnaak, lungnaak ingkaw Bawipa am qeennaak ce khawzahzah na kak khanawh ni hawk sih hy.
“Khrih Jesu thlakthawlhkhqi thaawng hamna khawmdek awh law hy,” tive ypawm soeih nawh ak pawm tyyng soeih hy; aming lakawh thlakthawlh soeih na awm nyng.
Cehlai ve ak camawh ni, Jesu Khrih ing thlakthawlh soeih kaiawh ve ak kawdung kawneemnaak boeih boeih ce a phonaak thai hamna; kumqui hqingnaak ak pang hamna amah ak cangnaak hly khqi huh saknaak hamna am qeennaak ka huh hy.
Kumqui Sangpahrang, amak thi thai qoe, huh thai na amak awm, Khawsa doeng a venawh, thangleeknaak ingkaw kqihchahnaak kumqui dy awm seh. Amen.
Ka ca, Timote, nang awh awiphawng kak kqawn lawkhqi ce hquut nawh qaalleeknaak ing qaal na tuknaak thai ham awi ni pe nyng;
cangnaak ingkaw ak che ak leek hqimhqanaak thai ce ak cakna tu lah. Thlang a vang ingtaw cece hlahphlam unawh cangnaak benawh lawng ak see amyihna see boeih uhy.
Cekkhqi ak khuiawh Hymenias ingkaw Alexander awm paa hy nih, Khawsa thekhanaak kaana cukkik na ani awmnaak aham cekqawi ce Setan a kut awh pe hawh nyng.
Lamma cyk awh, qeen thoehnaak, cykcahnaak, thlaktlo aham cykcahnaak ingkaw thlang boeih aham zeelawi kqawnnaak ce,
ningnih ing qoep ang quinaak ing ngaihqep caana Khawsa kqihnaak ing ak ciim cana ni awmnaak thai ham, sangpahrangkhqi ingkaw saithainaak ak takhqi ham nami taak peek aham thoeh law nyng.
Cetaw anik thaawngkung Khawsa poeknaak awh leek soeih nawh, ym ham tyyng soeih hy.
Anih ing thlang boeih hulna a awm thainaak ham ingkaw awitak cyihnaak benna law aham ngaih hy.
Ikawtih Khawsa pynoet awm nawh Khawsa ingkaw thlanghqing anglakawh dyihthing pynoet doeng awm nawh, cetaw thlanghqing, Jesu Khrih,
thlang boeih boeih hulnaak hamna ak pee qu ing: cece amah a tym awh simsakna a awm ham tyyng ni.
Ce hamna ak khypyikung ingkaw ceityihna tykna kak awm ni; (awitak kqawn nyng, ka qaai ap kqawn nyng;) cangnaak ingkaw awitak awh Gentelkhqi ak cawngpyikung na awm nyng.
Kawsonaak ingkaw oelh qunaak a taak kaana pakhqi ing ami kut ak ciim ce soeng unawh amik cykcah aham ngaih nyng.
Nukhqi ingawm ak boe ngai na thoeih ang cam qu unawh, a cyp a myih ing khaw sak doena, lusam tum nawh sui ing aw pale ing aw angki hinaak a phu ak tlo tlo ing aw thoeihcam qu aham am ngaih nyng.
Cehlai them leek sainaak ing, a cyp amyihna nu ing Khawsa a bawk aham awm hy.
Nu ing a awm dym doena awi ngainaak ing a cawng aham awm hy.
Nu ing cawngpyi aham ingkaw pa ak khanawh saithainaak taak aham am ngaih nyng; a awm dym aham awm hy.
Ikawtih Adam ni sai maana a awm, cekcoengawh ni Evi ce sai na a awm hy.
Cekcoengawh Adam ve thainaak na am awm nawh; nu ni thainaak na awm nawh thawlhnaak awh ang tluuk hy.
Cehlai cangnaak, lungnaak ingkaw ciimcaihnaak ta nawh, kawlung ak dyng cana a awm awhtaw ca taaknaak ak caming hulnaak ce hu kaw.
Ve awih kqawn ve thym hy: “U ingawm sawikung na awm ham a ngaih awhtaw, anih taw bibi ak leek bi ham ak ngaih thlang ni,” tive.
Ceamyihna sawikungna ak awm ak thlang taw coet amak kap, zu pynoet doeng ak ta, thlak chyyp, kawpoek ak dyng, ak ypawm, khin ak ym thai, thlang ak cuk ak kik thai,
zuu amak aw, thlang amak kqaak, kaw ak daaw, tangka awh am thin amak tlo,
kqihchah kawina a cakhqi toeltham nawh a ipkhui khawsak khaw ak khan thaina a awm ham awm hy;
(Thlang ing amah a ipkhui zani ama toek thai awhtaw, ikawmyihna nu Khawsa a thlangboel ce a toek naak thai kaw?)
Cangca thlak thaaina koeh awm seh, cekkaataw oek qunaak na awm kawm saw, setan awidengna a awm amyihna awidengnaak ce hu hau kaw.
Ce am awhawm a leng nakaw thlangkhqi am kyihcah thlangna a awm ham awm hy, cekkaataw kqawnseetna awm kawmsaw setan ak thangawh aawk hau kaw.
Cemyih bai na, Thlangboel bibikung khqi awm, kqihchah kawina ak awm thlangna a awm ham awm hy; awi ak pung, zuu ak aw, amak thyymna ak kamvaa thlangna a awm ham am awm hy.
Kawlung ciimcaihnaak ing awitak cangnaak ak dung ce ak tu khak ak thlang na a awm aham awm hy.
Cemyih ak thlang ce lamma na noek adak aham awm hy; i ikawmyih coetnaak ama awm awhtaw Thlangboel bibikung bi ce bi kaw.
Cemyih lawt bai na, ami zukhqi awm thlang ing amik kqihchah thlangkhqi na ami awm aham awm hy, thlang amak theet ingkaw kawlung ak dyng, ik-oeih soepkep awh ypawm thlang na ak awm ak thlang na a awm aham awm hy.
Thlangboel bibikung taw a zu pynoet doeng ak ta thlang ingkaw a cakhqi ingkaw a ipkhui khawsak khaw ak khan thai thlang na a awm aham awm hy.
Bibik leek bi nawh ak cak na ak dyi ak thlangkhqi taw Jesu Khrih awh cangnaak cak ak ta thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Na venawh law zy ngaih-uu doena vawhkaw awi ynnaak ve qee law nyng;
cehlai am ka law nai khoem awhtaw, Khawsa ipkhui cakawkhqi ing ikawmyih nanu khaw ami sak hly ti na simnaak thai ham qee law nyng; Khawsa ipkhui cakawkhqi taw Khawsa ak hqing Thlangboelkhqi, awitak tung ingkaw ang dyihnaak nace awm hy.
Cawh Khawsa ak kawngaih awihyp taw am oelh thaina sang soeih hy: “Pumsana dang law nawh, Myihla ing dyih pyi nawh, Khan ceityihkhqi ing hu nawh, thlang phyn boeih a venawh khypyi na awm hy, khawmdek awh cangna unawh boeimangnaak ing kaipyi na awm hy.
A hukhit awhtaw thlangvang ing cangnaak ce hlah phlam kawm usaw qaai a cawngpyinaak qaai kqawnkung myihla ben ce hquut kawm uh, tinawh Myihla ing ak caih cana kqawn hawh hy.
Cemyih cawngpyinaakkhqi ce a qaai ak kqawn thlak thailat ak che ak leek simnaak kawlung ce thik hlawk ing ak dawi thlangkhqi venawh kawng law kaw.
Chungvanaak kham kawm usaw, ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ingkaw awitak ak sim thlangkhqi ing zeelnaak awi kqawn doena ai aham a sai awk ai avang ce ama ai aham kham pe kawm uh.
Ikawtih Khawsa ing a sai ik-oeih boeih ve nep hy, zeelawi kqawnnaak ing ni ai awhtaw ikawm hoet kawi am awm hy;
Khawsak awi ingkaw cykcahnaak ing ciim sak hawh hy.
Koeinaakhqi venawh ve ak awi ve nang zaaksak awhtaw, Jesu Khrih a bibikung leek na awm kawm tiksaw, cangnaak awitak ingkaw cawngpyinaak leek nang ing na hquut a dawngawh ak taai thlang na awm kawp ti.
Khawsa amak kqihchah ingkaw nucawngkhqi a syn awi mailaikhqi ce koeh ngaih nawh; Khawsak kawngaih ak sai ak thlang na awm law kawp ti.
Pumsa benawh kaw cawngpyinaak ve a phu taw awm lawt hlai hy, khawsa benawh kaw cawngpyinaak taw a soep hoeiawh a phu awm khqoet hy, tuhawhkaw hqingnaak ingkaw ak law hly kawi hqingnaak aham awm awikamnaak ak cak soeih na awm hy.
Do aham tyng hy tinaak awi ve a ypawm hy.
(Ikawtih vawh bi ni bi nawh ni khuikha hy), thlang boeih a hulkung na ak awm nawh ak tungna ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ak hulkung, ak hqing Khawsa awh ningnih ing ngaih-uunaak ni ta uhy.
Vek awi ve kqawn pe nawh cawngpyi lah.
Na naaseennaak thlang ing koeh ni husit seh; cehlai awikqawnnaak, khawsaknaak, lungnaak, cangnaak ingkaw ciimcaihnaak awh ak cangnaak thlangkhqi a toek kawi na awm kawp ti.
Kai ka law hlan dy, qangpui a venawh awiciim noetnaak, awikqawnnaak ingkaw cawngpyinaak ce ta law kawp ti.
Tawnghakhqi ing awikqawn unawh a hqaamcakhqi kut awhkawng Khawsa ing ani pek kutdo ce koeh dalqa pyi kawp ti.
Thlang boeih a haiawh na taainaak ang dangnaak thai ham cekkhqi awhce nak tha hly sak nawh pum pe qu lah.
Namah ingkaw na cawngpyinaak awh ngaihta nawh; ce a them sai nawh awm poe lah; cemyih na sainaak ing namah ingkaw nak awi ak zaakhqi ce hulkhqi thai kawp ti.
Kum ak hqamkhqi bet ak thlang ce ak tlo na koeh zyi, na pamyihna thapeeknaak awi kqawn pe. Kum ak no bet thlangkhqi ce na naakhqi amyihna poek law nawh,
kum ak hqam bet nukhqi ce nam cawtnu amyihna, kawlung ciimnaak ing poek law lah.
Nuhai ak voet ak hlauhkhqi ce ak leekna kqihchah khqi lah.
Cehlai nuhai ing a cakhqi aw a ca a cakhqi aw a taak awhtaw, cekkhqi ing a mimah a ipkhui kaw ce ak leekna khut a hlepnaak ing a mimah a bawknaak ce lamma na ami sai aham awm hy, cemyihna nu ingkaw pa ingkaw nukdam pakdamkhqi a cawmcahnaak ce thung thai kawm uh, ve ve Khawsa ak kaw zeelnaak na awm hy.
Amah doeng ak awm ak voet ak hlauh nuhai ingtaw Khawsa venawh ngaih-unaak ta nawh than ingkaw dai cykcah doena Khawsa venawh qeennaak thoeh hy.
Cehlai mah doeng awmhlynaak doeng ak sui nuhai taw a hqing hui awhawm ak thi ni.
U ak khanawh awm coet kawi ama awmnaak aham, thlangkhqi venawh awm vawhkaw cawngpyinaak ve kqawn pe.
U awm amah a cakaw amak toek teng, a ipkhui awmpyi cakaw nawn awm amak toek teng ingtaw cangnaak ak oelh ak thlangna awm nawh amak cangnaak thlang anglakawh thawlh khqoet hy.
Nuhai taw kum kqukip ak kai am nawh, thlang pynoet doeng ak vaa naak,
cakhqi khuut nawh, khin ak khai khuut nawh, thlakciimkhqi khaw sil khawi nawh, ak patangkhqi toek kawi nawh them leek a hoei thahlynaak ing bi kawi nawh them leek sainaak awh thlang am kyihcah kawina ak awm taw nuhaina taak thai ni.
Nuhai kum ak no betkhqi taw cemyih nuhaikhqi ak khuiawh paa sak aham am awm hy. Khrih a venawh ang peek qunaak ce pumsa ngaihnaak ing a noeng awhtaw vaa taak tlaih aham ngaih uhy.
Ceamyihna, lamma awhkaw awitaaknaak ce a hqe hawh a dawngawh amah ingkaw amah ak khanawh awidengnaak ce pha sak hy.
Cekcoeng baiawh, amik tha dam sak unawh im im awh van uhy. Amik thakdam doeng am khoek nawh, thlang theetnaak kawsonaak ing a mamik kqawn hly kawi ik-oeih ce kqawn uhy.
Cedawngawh nuhai a kum ak nokhqi taw vaa ta tlaih seh, ca ta u seitaw, ami ipkhui ce ak leekna khoem u seh, cemyihna sainaak ing thlang kqawn seetnaak qaal ce a tym leek koeh pe seh.
Tuhawm thlangvang tloek ingtaw setan lam pan ing khaw kan hawh uhy.
Ak cangnaak nu ing a cakaw ak khuiawh nuhai a taak awhtaw, ak leek na khut a hlep seh, thlangboel phyihqih a peek aham am awm hy, cawh ni thlangboel ing ak voet ak hlauh tang tang nuhaikhqi ce ami toek hly thai.
A Thlangboel ce ak leek cana lam ak sawikung ing ak pyhna kqihcahna awm seitaw, awikqawn ingkaw cawngpyinaak awh tha ak yy ak thlangkhqi taw ce anglakawh ak pyh khqoetna kqihcahna awm seh.
Ikawtih Cakciim ing, “Cang ak leh huili vaitaw a hui ce koeh pin pe, bi ak bi ingtaw a bibi phu ce huh aham tyng hy,” tinawh kqawn hy.
A hqamca pynoet ce simpyikung pakkhih pakthum ama awm awhtaw thawlh koeh puk.
Thawlhnaak ak sai thlang ce ak dangna toel aham awm hy, cawh ni thlang ang ngaih a taak hly.
Vawhkaw awipeekkhqi ve phekbonaak a taak kaana hquut aham ingkaw u a haai awm a toek kaana ak thym bibi aham Khawsa, Jesu Khrih ingkaw ak tyh khan ceityihkhqi amik huh awh awi ni pe nyng.
Thlang ak khanawh angtawnna na kut koeh tloeng nawh, thawlh sainaak ce koeh bawng law. Ak ciimcaih na awm law.
Tui doeng ce koeh aw voel, nak phoen tlawh ingkaw ak chang tlawhnaak na taak a dawngawh misur tui ce awk pe bet bet.
Thlangvang a thawlhnaak taw dang pahoei nawh, awidengnaak hun pahoei hy; thlangvang a thawlhnaak taw am dang pahoei hy.
Cemyih lawtna, them leek sai ak dang pahoei awm nawh, dang hlan seiawm thuh phah toeih thai kawi am awm hy.
Khawsa ang ming ingkaw a cawngpyinaak awi ce kqawnseetna ama awmnaak aham, tamnaa haawngkawl ak aawi boeih ing amimah a boeikhqi ce a soep a hoeiawh kqihchah hlyna ngai useh.
Cangca boei ak ta ing koeinaana ani awm ak camawh koe thekha na seh, cehlai hawihkhangnaak ak hukhqi taw ak cangnaak ca ingkaw a lungnaakkhqi na ami awm awh ami bi ce ak nauh na bik khqoet useh. Cek awi ce cawngpyi nawh yyn kawp ti.
U ingawm amak thym cawngpyinaak ce cawngpyi nawh ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih a cawngpyinaak ak thym ce ang dyih pyi kaana Khawsak kawngaih ik-oeih ce ama cawngpyi awhtaw,
ce ak thlang taw amah ingkaw amah ak oek qu ingkaw ikaw awm amak sim ak thlang ni. Amak caih oelh qunaak ingkaw ytnaak, thintawinaak, awihche kqawnnaak, amak leek upvoetnaak ingkaw,
kawpoek amak leek ak chang chang ak ta thlangkhqi na awm uhy, awitak a taak kaana Khawsak kawngaih them sai ve tangka huhnaak aham mai ni, tinawh ak poek thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Cehlai Khawsak kawngaih naak ingkaw qeennaak ve hawihkhangnaak ak bau soeih na awm hy.
Ikawtih khawmdek awh ikawm amni law pyi thai nawh ikawm amnik cawn pyi thai bai hy.
Cehlai awk ai ingkaw suibai ni taak awhtaw cawh ce nik kaw ni qeem sak aham awm hy.
Boei ak ngaih thlangkhqi taw sykzoeknaak awh tla unawh qawnaak soepkep ingkaw thlanghqing seetnaak ingkaw plal a thamnaak khuina ak tlak sak hyy ngaihnaak amak leek ak khuina tla uhy.
Ikawtih tangka ngaihnaak taw thawlhnaak boeih a kung na awm hy. Cece thlangvang ing oet unawh, cangnaak ce hawitaak unawh, amimah ingkaw amimah kawseetnaak khawzah ing vui qu khoep uhy.
Cehlai nang, khawsak thlang ingtaw, vemyihkhqi ve cehta nawh, dyngnaak, khawsak kawngaih, cangnaak, lungnaak, yh thainaak ingkaw kawdungnaak ce hquut lah.
Cangnaak taa qunaak ce ta nawh, kumqui hqingnaak ce ak cak na tu. Ce ak pang aham ni nang ce Khawsa ing anik khy. Simpyikung thlang khawzah a haiawh dyihpyinaak ak leek ce dyihpyi hawh hyk ti.
Ik-oeih soepkep a venawh hqingnaak pe nawh, Pontia Pilat a haiawh awih leek ak kqawnkung Jesu Khrih a koe na ak awm, Khawsa mik huh awh, awi ni yn nyng.
Ni Bawipa Jesu Khrih ang dang hlan dy coet amak kap ingkaw ciimcaih cana vawhkaw awipeek ve na pawm aham awm hy.
Cetaw Khawsa ing amah a tym awh law pyi kaw – zoseennaak ak hu ingkaw ukkung na ak awm, sangpahrangkhqi boeih a Sangpahrang ingkaw boeikhqi boeih a Boei,
a nih doeng ce kumqui na awm nawh u ingawm ama pha thai vangnaak na awm hy, anih ce u ingawm am hu nawh u ingawm hu hlan hy. Amah a venawh zoeksang naak ingkaw thaawmnaak kumqui dyna awm seh. Amen.
Ve khawmdek awh ak boei thlangkhqi ce ama ming oek qunaak aham ingkaw amak cak boeinaak awh ngaih-unaak a mami taaknaak nawh Khawsa awh ngaih-unaak ami taaknaak aham kqawn law pe. Ikawtih Khawsa ingtaw ningnih ni zeelnaak aham ik-oeih soepkep ce khawzah soeih na ni pek khqi hy.
Them leek sai aham, bibi leek sainaak ing ami boei aham, khawboe leeknaak ing thlang a venawh peek ngaihnaak kawlung ami taak thainaak awh ami boei aham,
ami hailam ham ak tym leek awh a mimah aham dyih hun ak cak khawhthem ce cun thai kawm usaw, hqingnaak tang tang ce tu thai kawm uh.
Timote, na venawh khoem sak na ak awm ce ak nepna khoem lah. Khawsa amak kqihchah awikqawn naak ce hawi taak nawhtaw, amak thym poeknaak cyihnaak ce hawitaak lah.
Cemyih ce thlangvang ing amik tana ngaiqu unawh cangnaak lam ce pleng taak hawh uhy. Am qeennaak na venawh awm seh.
Jesu Khrih awh ak awm awitaak naak amyihna, Khawsak kawngaihnaak amyihna Jesu Khrih a ceityih na ak awm, Paul ing,
Ka lungnaak ka capa Timote a venawh: Pa Khawsa ingkaw ningnih a Bawipa Jesu Khrih a ven awhkaw am qeennaak, thintlawhnaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak awm seh.
Pakdamkhqi amyihna a bi ka bi peek Khawsa venawh, kawlung caihnaak ing zeel nyng saw than ingkaw dai nangmih aham cykcah poepa nyng.
Nang amik phli tuikhqi ce poek nyng, zeelnaak ing ka be thainaak aham, nang a myi ce huh aham ngaih nyng.
Na nukdam Loisi ingkaw na nu Euniki awh ak awm ma cangnaak ce, nang awh awm hy tice sim tlaih nyng, tuh awhtaw cawhkaw cangnaak ce nang awh awm awm hy.
Cedawngawh Khawsa kutdo peek, nak khanawh kut ka thoeng law awhkaw mai kqawng ce a caknaak aham na zah aham kqawn law nyng.
Ikawtih Khawsa ing kqihnaak myihla ce amni pe nawh, thaawmnaak, lungnaak ingkaw yhthainaak myihla ni ani peek hy.
Cedawngawh ni Bawipa akawng kqawn aham koeh chak, thawng ak tla kai akawng awh awm koeh chak. Cehlai awithang leek awh kyinaak ka huhnaak ve ning yh pyi lawt lah, Khawsa ak thaawmnaak ak caming,
anih ing ningnih ce ni thaawng khqi nawh hqing ciimnaak ing hqing aham nik khy hy – ik-oeih pynoet oet ni sai peek awh am nawh amah ang cainaak ingkaw am qeennaak camawh ni. Vawhkaw am qeennaak vetaw a tym ak kqan hlan awhkawng ningnih a venawh Jesu Khrih awh ni pek khqi hawh hy.
Tuhawhtaw thihnaak ce noeng nawh awithang leek ak caming hqingnaak ingkaw kumqui vangnaak ak khuina anik sawikung ningnih a hulkung, Jesu Khrih ak caming dang hawh hy.
Ve awithang leek ve khypyi aham ceityih ingkaw cawngpyi kungna awm aham kai ve ni caksak hy.
Cedawngawh khuikha hu nyng. Cehlai kai ing kak cangnaak thlang ce a u nu, tice ka sim dawngawh ap chak nyng, ce a khawnghi aham kai ing ka khoem sak ce ak nep cana khoem law kaw, tice sim nyng.
Kai a ven awhkaw naming zaak ce, Jesu Khrih awh cangnaak lungnaak ingkaw cawngpyinaak ak thym toek hly kawi na ta law uh.
Nangmih a venawh ik-oeih leek khoem sak na ak awm ce ak leek na qeet na uh – ningnih ak khui awhkaw ak awm Ciim Myihla bawmnaak ak caming ak leek na qeet na uh.
Asia qam awh ak awm thlangkhqi ing ni cehtaak hawh uhy tice sim uhyk ti, Phygelus ingkaw Hermogenes ingawm ni cehta lawt hy nih.
Bawipa ing Onesiphora ipkhui kaw ak khanawh am qeennaak dang sak seh, kawtih anih ing ni caih sak pang nawh thiqui khihna ka awmnaak awh awm ap chak hy.
Rom khaw awh a awm awh kai a mani huh hlan dy awh ni sui khing hy.
Ce a khawnghi awh Bawipa a ven awhkaw qeennaak a huhnaak aham Bawipa ing qeen seh! Ephesa khaw awh ikawmyih dyna kai ani bawm ani ceem tice nang ingawm sim hyk ti.
Cedawngawh, nang ka ca Jesu Khrih awhkaw am qeennaak awh nak tha awm sak lah.
Simpyikung khawzah a haiawh kak kqawn law nang zaak ik-oeihkhqi ce thlang ak cuk ak kik thai yp ak awm thlangkhqi venawh kqawn law pe patoe lah.
Jesu Khrih a qalkap leek amyihna kyinaak ce kaimih ning yh pyi lawt lah.
Qalkap bi ak bi ingtaw thlang mailai amyihna am awm hy – qaalboei ak kawzeelnaak aham ni bibi aham a ngaih.
Cemyih lawtna, taaqunaak awh ak paa thlang ingawm a lawng a lam amyihna taaqunaak ce ama sai awhtaw kutdo am hu hy.
Tha tlawh doena lo bi ak bikung ing a lo cang ce a ai ma khet aham awm hy.
Awi kak kqawn law ve poek lah, ve myihkhqi boeih poek thainaak aham Bawipa ing cyihnaak ni pe bit kaw.
David a cadil na ak awm, thihnaak awhkawng ak tho tlaih, Jesu Khrih ce poek lah. Ve ve kai ak awithang leek ni,
ve a dawngawh khuikha hu nyng saw thlakthawlh amyihna thiqui ing khih dyna awm nyng.
Jesu Khrih awh ak awm kumqui boeimangnaak ingkaw thaawngnaak ce ami huh thainaak aham, ak tyh thlangkhqi aham ik-oeih soepkep ce yh nyng.
Vawhkaw awih kqawnnaak ve thym hy. Amah ing ni thih haih awhtaw, amah ing ni hqing haih lawt kaw;
ningnih ing ning yh awhtaw, amah ingqawi boeimangnaak ce ni pang lawt kaw. Amah ce ni qoeng awhtaw, anih ing ningnih ce ni qoeng khqi lawt kaw;
ypawm na amni awm awhtaw, anih taw ypawm na awm poe kaw, kawtih amah ingkaw amah ce am qoeng qu thai hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi ve kqawn pe poe lah. Amik oelh qukhqi ce Khawsa haiawh ngaihthynnaak awi kqawn pe; ikaw awm a phu am awm nawh ak ngaikhqi seetnaak nani a awm kqoeng.
Kyihnaak ak hu bibikung na na awm amyihna Khawsa haiawh ak leek soeih na pe qu law lah, bibikung ak thym cana awitak ak tu ingtaw chah aham am awm hy.
Khawsa amak pa awi a kaa kqawnnaak ce re lah, vemyih a ik-oeih awh amik paakhqi taw Khawsa amak sim thlangkhqi na awm khqoet khqoet uhy.
A mingmih am cukkiknaak ce qawk ak pawi amyihna pawi kang kaw. Cemyih thlangkhqi ak khuiawh Himenia ingkaw Phileta awm pa lawt hy nih,
cekqawi taw awitak awhkawng ak hla na pleng hawh hy nih. Thlakthi thawh tlaihnaak taw awm coeng hawh hy ti nih nawh, thlang pynoet ak cangnaak ce hqe hy nih.
Cehlai, Khawsak tungling taw ak cak cana awm nawh vawhkaw awi ing hatnaak tahy: “Bawipa ing amah a koekhqi ce noek hy,” nawh, “U awm Bawipa ang ming ak dyih pyi ingtaw ik-oeih amak leek ce cehta seh.”
Im ak bau soeih ak khuiawh sui ingkaw ngun ing a sai ik-oeih doeng am awm nawh, thing ing tamlai ing a sai ik-oeih awm awm hy; pynoet taw qyp awm kawi aham awm hy.
U ingawm a hukhit awhkaw ik-oeih awhkawng ak ciim ak caih na a awm awhtaw, anih taw qyp awm kawi ik-oeih, ak ciim ik-oeih sai na awm kawmsaw, Bawipa aham a phu ak awm ingkaw ik-oeih leek sainaak aham qoek abah na awm kaw.
Cadawng hy ngaihnaakkhqi ce cehta nawhtaw, dyngnaak, cangnaak, lungnaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak ce kawlung ciimnaak ing Bawipa ak khy thlangkhqi mi hquut lawt lah.
Qawnaak ingkaw cyihnaak kaana ikawmyih a ik-oeih awm koeh oelh law, cemyih a ik-oeih ingtaw hqo ang hqitnaak ni a awm sak hy tice sim hawh hyk ti.
Bawipa a tyihzawih thlang ingtaw hqo ang hqitnaak ak khuiawh a paa ham am awm hy: thlang boeih a venawh qeennaak ta kawmsaw, cuk am kik hly thai hy, kawsonaak am ta kaw.
Anih ak oelh thlangkhqi ce, Khawsa ing zutnaak pe kawmsaw awitak simnaak benna sawi ngai kaw tinawh ngaih-unaak kawlung taak doena,
zaksim thainaak kawlung a taaknaak thai aham ingkaw, amah ak kawngaih sai sak aham ak khawhkung setan ak dawng awhkawng a loetnaak thai ham awi zoei cana kqawn caih peek aham awm hy.
Ve ve hat lah: Khawnghi a hukhit awhtaw kqih awm ik-oeih ce awm kaw.
Amah ingkaw amah ak lung qunaakkhqi, tangka ak lungnaakkhqi, ak hoel qukhqi, ak oek qukhqi, amak thym na bi ak bikhqi, a nu ingkaw a pa ak awi amak ngaikhqi, zeelnaak kawlung amak takhqi, amak ciimkhqi,
Lungnaak amak takhqi, qeenkhaw amak ngai thaikhqi, thlang ak theetkhqi, yh thainaak amak takhqi, kaw ak tawikhqi, ik-oeih leek amak lungnaakkhqi,
thlang ak thainaakkhqi, am thin ak tawikhqi, thin sahnaak, Khawsa lungnaak anglakawh awmhly theza ak lungnaak –
Khawsa ak kqih amyihna dang hlai hy a sai thai thaawmnaak ak oelhkhqi na awm kawm uh. Cemyih ak thlangkhqi mi koeh awm law haih uh.
Cemyih ak thlangkhqi taw ipkhui na kun voeh voeh unawh tha amak awm nukhqi ak tu thlangkhqi, thawlh phyihqih ing nam qu nawh ak che ik-oeih hyy ngaihnaak ing hu na hai na ak sawi ak thlangkhqi,
cawng poepa lawt hlai hy awitak amak sim thai thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Janne ingkaw Jambre ing Mosi ani oelh amyihna – kawlung ak plawci thlangkhqi na awm unawh, cangnaak benawh a hoet thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Cemyih ak thlangkhqi ce ak hla na am awm kawm uh, cekkhqi a qawnaak ce thlang boeih a venawh ak caih cana dang bit kaw.
Cehlai nang ingtaw, ka ni cawngpyinaakkhqi, ka khawsak naakkhqi, kang cainaak, cangnaak, kawdungnaak, lungnaak, yh thainaak,
khuikha huhnaak, kyinaak ka huhnaakkhqi – Antiok, Ikonium ingkaw Listra khaw awhkaw mih a ik-oeih aw kak khanawh pha law nawh ka khuikha tice nang ingtaw sim boeih hyk ti. Cehlai cemyih ak khui awhkawng Bawipa ing ni hul hy.
A tang tang awhtaw, Jesu Khrih awh Khawsak kawngaih na khaw sak aham ak ngaih thlangkhqi boeih taw khuikha kawm uh,
thlakchekhqi ingkaw thlak thailatkhqi ce ami seetnaak thai khuina se kawm uh, thlang ce thai na kawm uh, thainaak huili na awm awm hawh hy.
Cehlai nang ingtaw, cawng nawh na sim hawh ik-oeih awh ce awm poe lah, kawtih nang ingtaw nang anik cawngpyi thlangkhqi venawh kawng sim hawh hyk ti,
na naasen awhkawng Cakciim awi ce sim hawh hyk ti, ce Cakciim ing Jesu Khrih cangnaak ak caming hulnaak aham ni cyih sak thai hy.
Cakciim boeih taw Khawsa ing ang hqi ak chan sih na awm nawh cawngpyinaak aham, toelnaak aham, tlaihnaak aham ingkaw dyngnaak benawh cawngpyinaak aham a phu awm hy,
cawh ni Khawsak thlang ing ik-oeih leek soepkep awh thoeih ang cam na a awm hly.
Amah dang nawh a qam a pha awh, thlakthi ingkaw thlanghqing awi ak deng kawi, Khawsa ingkaw Jesu Khrih a haiawh, ve ak awi ve ni yn nyng:
Awi ve khypyi lah; a tym awh awm a tym am awh awm a oepchoeh na awm poepa lah: tlaih lah, toel nawhtaw tha pe lah – kawdungnaak ing ngaihtaak doena cuk am kik lah.
Amak thym cawngnaak ingkaw thlang ing ang oek qunaak khawnghi ce law kaw. A mimah a ngaih sainaak ham ak thak lup lup aming haakhqi ing aming zaak awi kqawnnaak aham cawngpyikungkhqi khawzah ce cawi a khel kawm uh.
Awitak ama ming zaaknaak aham aming haakhqi ce byp unawh syn awi mailai ngainaak aham aming haakhqi keng kawm uh.
Cehlai nang ingtaw, ik-oeih soepkep awh ak leek na poek nawhtaw, kyinaakkhqi ce yh lah, awithang khypyinaak bibi ce bi nawh, na sai hly kawi bibi boeih ce ak soep na bi lah.
Ikawtih kai taw awk hly kawi ik-oeih nawn amyihna hawk li na awm hawh nyng, ka cehnaak hly a tym awm zoe hawh hy.
Qaal tuknaak leek ce tuk coeng hawh nyng, taaqunaak awm coeng hawh nyng, cangnaak ce tu khak hawh nyng.
Tuhawhtaw dyngnaak sui lumyk ce kai aham a oepchoeh na awm hawh hy, awidengkung thlak dyng, Bawipa ing ce a khawnghi awh kai ce ni pe kaw, kai doeng amni pe kaw, amah a lawnaak ak lamtoen thlangkhqi boeih a venawh awm pe lawt kaw.
Ka venawh ang tawnna na lawnaak aham hlah lah,
Ikawtih Dema ing khawmdek ve a lungnaak bet dawngawh ni cehta nawh Thesalonika khaw na cet hawh hy. Krescen khaw Galatia qam na cet nawh, Tita awm Dalmatia qam na cet hawh hy.
Luka doeng ni ka venawh ak awm hy. Marka ce law pyi kawp ti, anih ce ka bibinaak awh anik bawmkung na awm hy.
Tukika ce Ephesa khaw na tyi nyng.
Na law awh Troas khaw awh Karpa a im awh ka cehtaak angki dung ce haw law, cekcoengawh ka cauk, awipui na mehvyn cauk ce haw law bai.
Thi ak deep Alexander ing tlawhnaak ni pehy. A ik-oeih sainaak awh Bawipa ing kut thung seh.
Nang ingawm anih ce ngaihtaak doena oelh law, kawtih ningnih ak awih kqawn ve anih ing oelh hy.
Cang ka lawhnaak kak kqawn awh, kai anik dyih pyi u pynoet awm am law hy, thlang boeih ing ni cehta uhy. A mingmih ak khanawh seetnaak koeh pha seh.
Cehlai kai ak caming awithang ve khypyi khawnghak na a awm nawh Gentelkhqi boeih ing aming zaak thainaak aham Bawipa ce ka venawh dyi nawh tha ni pehy. Sendeih am khak khui awhkawng kai ce ni loet sak hy.
Anik cuhkung ik-oeih amak leek a kut khui awhkawng Bawipa ing ni hul kawmsaw ak khawk khan na a ding a syk na ni ceh pyi kaw. Amah a venawh thangleeknaak kumqui dyna awm seh. Amen.
Priscilla, Akuila ingkaw Onesifora ipkhui kaw ce kut tlaih law.
Erasta ce Korin khaw awh awm nawh, Tqopfima ce a tlawh dawngawh Mileta awh cehta nyng.
Chikca a pha hlanawh vena a pha lawnaak aham tha lo law lah. Eubula, Puden, Linu, Klaudia ingkaw koeinaakhqi boeih ing kut ni tlaih uhy.
Bawipa taw nang myihla awh ce awm seh. Am qeennaak na venawh awm seh.
Khawsa tyihzawih na awm nawh Khawsa ing ak tyh thlangkhqi ak cangnaak ingkaw Khawsa ak kawngaih benna ak sawikung awitak cyihnaak –
Kumqui hqingnaak ngaih-unaak awh ak dyi cangnaak ingkaw cyihnaak, qaai amak kqawn Khawsa ing a tym amik kqan hlan awhkawng awi a taak amyihna,
amah ing a tym hoep nawh a taak amyihna ningnih hulkung Khawsa ak awipeeknaak amyihna ak awi ce vangnaak ak khuina ak haw law kung amah ak awipeek amyihna ak awi ak khypyikung kai Paul ing,
Cangnaak awh ka capa Tita a venawh: Pa Khawsa ingkaw ningnih hulkung Jesu Khrih a ven awhkaw qeennaak ingkaw ngaihqepnaak awm seh.
Krete sanglak anglak na ka ni ceh taaknaak taw ni hu awh ak coeng kaana ka cehtaak bibi coeng aham ingkaw awi ka peek hawh amyihna khaw boeih awh a hqamca taak peek aham ni.
A hqamca taw coet amak awm thlang, a zu pynoet doeng ak ta, a cakhqi ing amik cangnaak ak thlang ingkaw awi am ngai nawh a awm a hqoh a dawngawh thlang a haiawh toelna amak awm ak thlangkhqi na ami awm aham awm hy.
Thlangboel khoemkung taw Khawsa bibi ak khoemkung na a awm a dawngawh, coet kawina amak awm ak thlang na a awm aham awm hy- amah ak kawngaih doeng ak ngaih ak thlang na am awm kaw, am thin amak tawi, zu amak aw, hqo ang hqit amak ngaih, amak thym ik-oeih huh amak ngaih thlang na a awm aham awm hy.
Khin ak khai ak toek thai, ik-oeih leek ak lungnaak, yh thainaak kawlung ak ta, kawpoek ak dyng, ak ciim ingkaw a khawboe ak leek thlang na awm kaw.
Cawngsaknaak amyihna ypawm kawi awihcak ce ak tu ak thlang na awm kaw, cawh ni cangnaak thym ing thlakchang ce tha pe thai nawh ak oelhkhqi ce a hlat hly khqi thai.
Ikawtih, cem a qaal na ak tho thlang khawzah awm hy, am lai ak haalkhqi ingkaw thlang ak thainaak khqi na awm uhy, chahhui ak qeetkhqi ce cemyihna awm khqoet uhy.
Cemyih thlangkhqi ce ami awm dym aham awm hy, ama mi cawngpyi hly kawi ce cawngpyi unawh ipkhuikaw thlang boeih qawk sak uhy - amak thym ik-oeih huhnaak aham cemyihna sai uhy.
A mingmih ak khui awhkaw tawngha pynoet ingawm vemyihna kqawn hy, “Krete thlangkhqi taw qaai ak kqawn thlangkhqi na awm uhy, thlak che cakhqi, thakdam cakhqi na awm uhy,” tinawh.
Vawhkaw awih kqawn ve thym hy. Cedawngawh cekkhqi ce khawteh na toel lah, cawh ni cangnaak awh ak thym na a ming dyih hly.
Judahkhqi a syn awi mailai ing awitak ak oelh thlangkhqi ak awi ce koeh ngai law pe uh.
Ak ciim thlangkhqi ham nataw, ik-oeih boeih caih hy, cehlai ak qawk thlangkhqi ingkaw amak cangnaak thlangkhqi ham ikaw awm am caih hy. Ak cang cang awhtaw, amik kawlungkhqi ing amik kawpoekkhqi boeih awm qawk kang hawh hy.
Khawsa sim nyng ti lawt hlai uhy, a ik-oeih sai ingtaw oelh qu noe noe bai hy. Ce mihkhqi ce tyih ak cu khqi ni, haa amak za thlangkhqi ing ik-oeih leek sai aham amak kawih thlangkhqi ni.
Ak thym cangnaak ing anik qoep ik-oeih ce na cawngpyi aham awm hy.
A kum ak hqam bet thlangkhqi ing a cyp amyih na awm aham, thlang kqihchah kawi na awm aham, yh thainaak kawlung taak aham, ak thym cangnaak taak aham, lungnaak ingkaw kawdungnaak ing awm aham cawngpyi.
Cemyih lawtna, kum ak hqam hawh nukhqi ingawm kqihchah kawi na khaw sak aham, thlang a mami theetnaak aham ingkaw zu a mami awk naak aham, cehlai ak leek ik-oeih ce cawngpyi patoe aham cawngpyi lah.
Cawhtaw kum ak no bet nukhqi ce a va a ca lungnaak aham a mi cawng hly pyi thai,
yh thainaak ta nawh ak caih na awm aham, im awh plawng ang thawh aham, kaw dung aham, a vakhqi ak kaina awm aham cawngpyi, cawh ni u ingawm Khawsak awi ce a kqihchah hly thai hy.
Cemyihna, cadawngkhqi ing yh thainaak kawlung ami taaknaak thai aham tha pe law.
Soepkep awh ik-oeih leek sainaak ak caming cekkhqi a toek kawina awm law lah. Na cawngpyinaak awh ak thym ingkaw ak cang cang na na awm aham awm hy,
upvoet ak awm na awi nak kqawn aham am awm hy, cawh ni nang anik oelhkungkhqi ing ningnih a seetnaak kqawn aham am hu kawmsaw amik chah hly.
Tamnaakhqi ing ik-oeih soepkep awh ami boeikhqi ak awi ngai peek aham kqawn pe, a boeikhqi ak kawzeelnaak sai aham ingkaw awi ama hlat aham,
A ik-oeihkhqi ama quuknaak peek thai aham ingkaw ypawm na ami awmnaak ce dang sak aham awm hy, cawh ni ik-oeih soepkep awh ningnih hulkung Khawsa akawng ni cawngpyi ve thlang ing ngai aham a ngaih hly.
Hulnaak Khawsa qeennaak ing a haw law ce thlang boeih a venawh dang hawh hy.
Khawsa ak kawngaih am ik-oeih ben ingkaw khawmdek ik-oeih ben awh “Amni” ni tinawh, yh thainaak ing khaw sak aham, tuh a mih awh ak dyng na khaw sa nawh, Khawsa ngaih na khaw sak aham ni cawngpyi hy.
Ngaih-unaak ypawm ik-oeih - boeimang Khawsa ingkaw hulkung Jesu Khrih a lawnaak khawnghi ce ning ngaih-u uhy,
Thawlh ama leeknaak boeih khui awhkawng ningnih ce hul aham amah ing amah ce pe qu hy, ik-oeih leek sai ngaihnaak kawlung taak ham amah aham qoe qoe na ni ciimcaih sak khqi hy.
Cedawngawh, vemyih ik-oeihkhqi ve na cawngpyi aham awm hy. Sai thainaak boeih boeih ing tha pe nawh toel lah. U ingawm koeh ni hep seh.
Thlangkhqi ing ukkungkhqi ingkaw anaa ak takungkhqi ak awi ce ngai peek aham, ik-oeih leek sainaak benawh a oepchoeh na ami awm naak thai aham,
thlang ak che na kqawn kaana, a cyp a myih na qoep ang qui cana awm aham, thlang boeih a venawh kawdungnaak tang tang ce dang sak aham kqawn pe.
Ni hu awh ningnih awm thlakqaw, awi amak ngai, hy ngaihnaak soepkep a thainaak a tamnaa na ni awm uhy. yh thainaak, thawlhnaak, thlang a sawhnaak, pynoet ingkaw pynoet sawh qunaak ing ni awm uhy.
Cehlai ningnih hulkung Khawsa qeennaak ce ang dang law awhtaw,
anih ing ningnih ce ni hul khqi hy, dyngnaak ki-oeih ningnih ing ni sai a dawngawh am nawh, amah am qeennaak a dawngawh ni. Thang tlaih silhnaak Ciim Myihla thai saknaak ing ni hul khqi hy,
Ningmih hulkung Jesu Khrih ak caming haainaak taak kaana nik khan awh Ciim Myihla ce ni hawk sih khqi hy,
kumqui hqingnaak ngaih-unaak qoe ce ni pang naak thai aham am qeennaak ing ningnih ce ni dyng sak khqi hy.
Vawhkaw awih kqawn ve yp awm hy. Khawsa ak ypnaak thlangkhqi ing ngaihtaaknaak ing them leek ami sainaak aham vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi awh nak tha lo lah. Vawhkaw them ve ak leek ingkaw thlang boeih hawihkhangnaak aham awm hy.
Cehlai cyihnaak amak awm oelh qunaak ing khuilam kqawnnaak awipungnaak anaa awi awh hqo ang hqitnaak ce qee law lah, kawtih vemyihkhqi ve ikaw hawihkhangnaak am awm hy.
Peknaak ak sai thlang ce toelnaak awi kqawn pe, cekcoengawh a hih voeinaak awh toel tlaih bai. Cekcoengawh taw awm taak dym hlah.
Cemyih ak thlang cetaw thlak dyng am ingkaw thlak thawlh, amah ingkaw amah thlawlh ak pel qu na awm hy, tice sim kawp ti.
Nang a venna Artemas am awhtaw Tukhiko ka tyih law awh Nikopoli khaw na law aham hlah lah, chikca khuiawh cawh awm aham cai nyng.
Upadi ak sim Zenas ingkaw Apolo ce lam ani law awh avoet a hlauhnaak ama awm naak aham bawm law.
Nik thlangkhqi ing ik-oeih leek ami sai thai khui ami sai thainaak aham tha lo law u seh, cawh ni myngawi ngoenaak ce hu kawm u saw ik-oeih sai kaana ama mi awm hly.
Ka venawh ak awmkhqi boeih ing kut ni tlaih uhy. Cangnaak awh kaimih anik lungnaakkhqi ce kut tlaih law. Am qeennaak nangmih boeih a venawh awm seh.
Jesu Khrih a thawk tla Paul ingkaw ningnih a naa Timote ing, Ka lungnaak pyi ingkaw bibi pyikung Filemon ingkaw,
Kaimih a koei nu Apphia, qalkap pyi Arkhipa ingkaw na im awh a mik cun thlangboel a venawh:
Bawipa Jesu Khrih ingkaw Pa Khawsa venawh kaw qeennaak ingkaw ngaihdingnaak awm seh.
Kak cykcah awh nang aham Khawsa venawh zeelnaak awi kqawn poepa nyng,
Bawipa Jesu awh cangnaak na taaknaak ingkaw thlakciimkhqi na lungnaak dawngawh zeelnaak awi kqawn nyng.
Thlang a venawh nak cangnaak ce nak kqawn awh nak tha a hly naak aham cykcah nyng, cawh ni Khrih awh ik-oeih leek ni tahy tice zaksim caihnaak na taak hly thai hy.
Nang, naa pa ing thlak ciimkhqi ak kawlung ce na caih sak peng a dawngawh, nang a lungnaak ing ni zeel sak nawh tha ni awm sak hy.
Cedawngawh, Khrih awh ka qaal leek nawh nang ing na sai hly kawi ik-oeih ce sai aham awi ni pe thai nyng seiawm,
lungnaak awh nang a venawh qeennaak thoeh law nyng. Cedawngawh, kai Paul, pacawng ingkaw Jesu Khrih awh thawng ak tla ing,
ka capa Onesima aham qeennaak thoeh law nyng, thiqui ing khih na ka awm awh anih ce ka capa na coeng hy.
Ak cyk awhtaw anih ve nang aham a hawihkhangnaak am awm hy, cehlai tuh awhtaw nang ingkaw kai aham hawihkhangnaak awm hawh hy.
Anih, kak kawlung tang tang ve, na venna tyi law tlaih nyng.
Awithang leek awh thiqui ing khih na ka awm awh kai anik bawm aham, ka venawh awm sak aham ngaih mai kawng nyng.
Cehlai nang ing na nim lengnaak ve namah ak tha hlynaak ing sai na a awm nawh sai sak ngah ngah amyihna ama awmnaak aham nang ang haa tlaaknaak kaana taw ikaw awm sai aham am ngaih nyng.
Nang a venawh kawng kawlhkalh a pleng qunaak ve nang ing ak nep na na taaknaak tlaih aham va ni hy voei –
tamnaa na taak voel kaana, tamnaa anglakawh ak nep khqoet, naa amyihna na taak thainaak aham ngaih nyng. Kai ing lungna nyng, cehlai pumsa ingkaw Bawipa awh nang ing lungnak khqoet hyk ti.
Kai ve nang ing bi ak bi haih ak thlang na na nik poek awhtaw, kai nani do amyihna anih awm do law lawt.
Nang a venawh ik-oeih a sai thawlh aw laiba sah hly kawi aw a taak awhtaw, kai a venawh kqawn law mai.
Kai, Paul ing kamah a kut qoe qoe ing ve ak ca ve qee law nyng. Namah qoe qoe ka venawh peek qu aham awm hyk ti ti kqawn kaana, kai ing ni pe tlaih bit kawng.
Ka naa, Bawipa awh ce nang a venawh kawng hawihkhang naak ka huh thainaak aham ngaih nyng; Khrih awh kak kawlung ve caih law sak lah.
Nang ak awi ngainaak ce kak cangnaak dawngawh, kai ing ka thoeh law anglakawh khawzah khqoet sai law kawp ti tice sim doena, na venawh ca qee law nyng.
Ik-oeih pynoet awm hyn hy: kai aham pahnaak ce qoek abah law lah, nang ak cykcahnaak qawi a qi na awm kawmsaw na venawh awm kawng tinawh poek nyng.
Jesu Khrih awh thawng kang tlaak pyi Epafra ing kut nim tuk khqi hy.
Cemyih lawtna ka bibi pyikhqi, Marka, Aristarka, Dema ingkaw Luka ingawm kut nim tuk khqi hy.
Bawipa Jesu Khrih am qeennaak ce nang myihla awh awm seh.
Ak kqym awhtaw Khawsa ing ningnih a pakdamkhqi venawh tawnghakhqi hawnaak ing ak chang chang na awi khawzah pek khqi hy,
cehlai tuh tloek a tym a boet lam na taw a Capa ak caming ningnih a venawh awi kqawn law hawh hy, anih ak caming khan ingkaw dek boeih ve ana sai nawh anih ik-oeih boeih boeih qo ak pangkung na tahy.
Capa taw Khawsa boeimang a vangnaak na awm nawh amah coengnaak qoe qoe a dyihthing na awm hy, ak awi thaawmnaak ing ik-oeih boeih boeih ak awm sakkung na awm hy. Thawlh awh ciim saknaak ce a sai coengawh, boeimang kut tang benawh khawk khan na ngawi hawh hy.
Cawh anih taw khan ceityihkhqing lak awh sang khqoet nawh ang ming awm a mingmih ang ming anglakawh sang khqoet hy.
Han awhkaw khan ceityih a venawh Khawsa ing, “Nang taw ka Capa na awm hyk ti; tuhngawi awh na Pa na awm hawh nyng,” a tinaak? Am awhtaw, “Kai taw anih a Pa na awm kawng nyng saw, anih ce ka Capa na awm kaw,” a ti?
Cekcoengawh, khawmdek awh Khawsa ing amah a caming ce a haw law awh, “Khawsak khan ceityih boeih ing anih ce bawk seh,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Khan ceityih akawng ak kqawn awh, Khan ceityihkhqi ce zilh na sai nawh, a tyihzawihkhqi ce maikqawng na sai hy,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cehlai a Capa awhtaw, Aw Khawsa, na ngawihdoelh ce kumqui na awm kawmsaw, dyngnaak ce na qam a sawnghqawl na awm kaw.
Dyngnaak ce nang ing lungna tiksaw ik-oeih che ce sawh na hyk ti; cawh Khawsa, na Khawsa ing na pyikhqi boeih ak khanawh ni ta nawh zeelnaak situi ing ni syp hawh hy,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cekcoengawh vemyihna kqawn bai hy, Ak cyk ca awh, Aw Bawipa, khawmdek ang dyihnaak ce syn tiksaw khan ce nang a kut saikhqi na awm hy.
Vemyihkhqi boeih taw plawci hly hlai hy, nang taw cak poe kawp ti; vekkhqi taw hi amyihna se kawm uh.
Cekkhqi ce hi amyihna nang ing zawl kawm tiksaw; angki amyihna cekkhqi taw hleng qu kaw. Cehlai nang taw ang qui na cak poe hyk ti, nang a kumkhqi taw a dytnaak am awm qoe kaw,”
Han awhkaw khan ceityih a venawh Khawsa ing, “Na qaalkhqi ce na khawk kaina ka taak hlan dy kak tang benawh ngawi lah,” a ti naak?
Khan ceityihkhqi boeih ve hulnaak ak hu thlangkhqi a bibi aham ni tyih na a awm ka ti koe noek?
Cawh, ak chang na am naming plengnaak hau aham ningnih ing ning zaak awi ce ak nep na ning ngaih aham awm hy.
Khan ceityihkhqi ak kqawn awi ing zani thlang pin nawh, awi ak eekkhqi ingkaw awi amak ngaikhqi boeih ing toelnaak ce ami huh awhtaw,
ak bau soeih soeih hulnaak ce ikaw na awm amni sui awhtaw ikawmyihna nu amni loet thainaak khqoet kaw? Vawhkaw hulnaak ve Bawipa ing lamma cyk na phawng law hy, amik zakhqi boeih ing ce ak awi ce caksak uhy.
Khawsa ingawm hatnaak, ngaih kyinaak kawpoek kyinaak ing sim sak hy, cekcoengawh Ciim Myihla kutdo ik-oeih ce amah ak ngaihnaak amyihna pe bai hy.
Ningmih ing nik kqawn uh, ak law hly kawi khawmdek ce khan ceityihkhqi venawh anih ing am pehy.
Cehlai hun pynoet awh thlang pynoet ing: Thlanghqing ve ikawmyih nanu a awm nawh nang ing nak poek loet, thlanghqing capa awm ikawmyihna nu a awm nawh na khoem loet?
Khan ceityih anglakawh ak nem bet na anih ce nang ing sai hyk ti; boeimang kqihchahnaak ing nang ing myk adah tiksaw
a khawk kai awh ik-oeihkhqi boeih ce taak pe hyk ti,” tinawh kqawn hy. A khawk kaiawh ik-oeihkhqi boeih taak pehy tinawh, amah a venawh amak pe qu ik-oeih pynoet awm Khawsa ing am hang hy tinaak ni. Cehlai tuh a venawh ik-oeih boeih boeih peek na ak awm ce amni hu hlan hy.
Cehlai Jesu Khrih, khan ceityih anglakawh ak nem bet na sai na ak awm ce, boeimang kqihchahnaak ing myk adah na awm hawh hy, Khawsam qeennaak ak caming thlang thihnaak ce anih ing yh hy.
Cakpa kawzah boeimangnaak na a ceh pyinaak ce, amah ak caming amah aham ik-oeih boeih ak awm sak Khawsa ing, khuikha ak soep na a huhnaak ak caming amah ce hulnaak ak saikung na sai hy.
Thlanghqing ak ciimcaih sakkung ingkaw ak ciimcaih thlangkhqi taw ipkhui kaw pynoet ni. Cawh cekkhqi ce ka koeinaakhqi tinawh khy aham Jesu ce am chak hy.
Anih ing, Ka koeinaakhqi venawh nang ming ce phawng kawng nyng saw; na thlang kqeng ang cunnaak awh nam kyihnaak laa ce sa kawng nyng,” tihy.
Cek coeng bai awh, Anih ce ypna kawng nyng,” ti bai hy. Cekcoengawh vemyihna kqawn bai hy. “Khawsa ing ani peek naasenkhqi ing vawh awm nyng,” tinawh qee hy.
Naasenkhqi ingtaw thi ingkaw sa ami taak awh thih saithainaak ak tukung ce Khrih ing a thihnaak ak caming a hqe thainaak aham thlanghqing na coeng law hy. Cawhkaw thih a ik-oeih saithainaak ak tukung taw, setan ni.
Thih kqihnaak tamnaa ak kaiawh ak awm thlangkhqi boeih ce loet sak hy.
Anih ing khan ceityihkhqi ce am bawm hy, Abraham a cadilkhqi ni a bawm hy.
Cawh thlang qeenkhaw a ngai thainaak aham, Khawsa bibinaak awh ypawm khawsoeih na a awm thainaak aham ingkaw thlangkhqi a thawlhnaak awh hulnaak a sai thainaak aham ik-oeih soepkep awh anih awm a koeinaakhqi amyihna sai qu aham ngoe hy.
Amah ing sykzoeknaak hu nawh a khuikha hawh awh sykzoeknaak ak hu thlangkhqi ce bawm thai hy.
Cedawngawh, khaw benna kaw khynaak ak za koeinaakhqi, ceityih ingkaw khawsoeih boei na ak awm, ningnih ing nik cangnaak uh Jesu awh ce na mik kawpoekkhqi ce caksak lah uh.
Khawsa ipkhui kaw boeih awh Mosi ing ypawm na a awm amyihna, anih awm amah ak cak sakkung ak khanawh a ypawm hy.
Im anglakawh im ak sakung ce kyihcahnaak a huh khqoet amyihna Jesu awm Mosi anglakawh kyihcahnaak ak bau khqoet huh aham tyng hy.
Im ve thlang ing sa hy, cehlai ik-oeih boeih boeih ak sakung taw Khawsa ni.
Mosi taw Khawsa ipkhui awh ypawm na awm nawh, ni hai benawh kqawn hly kawi ce phawng hy.
Cehlai Jesu taw capamyihna Khawsa ipkhui ak khanawh a ypawm hy. Ningmih ing ni zoeksang qaal leeknaak ing ngaih-unaak ce nim tu awhtaw ningnih taw anih a ipkhui kaw thlang na ni awm uhy.
Cedawngawh Ciim Myihla ing ak kqawn amyihna: “Tuhngawi awh ak awi na ming zaak awhtaw,
nami pungnawi awhkaw thin sah amyihna namim thin koeh sah sak uh, qamkoh awh noekdak na ami awm awh
nami pakhqi ing kai ve ni noekdak unawh kum phlikip ak khuiawh ka ik-oeih saikhqi ce hu uhy.
Cedawngawh maw ce a cadilkhqik khanawh kak kaw so nawh, ‘Amik kawlung ang pleng doeng na pleng uhy, ka lam am sim qoe qoe unawh’, ka ti mah.
Cedawngawh kak kaw so nawh, ‘kang dymnaak awh vekkhqi ve am kun kawm uh,’ ka ti.”
Koeinaakhqi, nangmih ak khuina u awm thlak thawlh na am awm u tiksaw ak hqing Khawsa venawh kawng cangnaak kawlung taak kaana am naming hawi am naming mang taak aham ngaihta lah uh.
Tuhngawi tive a awm khui awhtaw thainaak thawlh ing na mim thin ama sahnaak aham, myngawi pynoet ingkaw pynoet tha pe qu lah uh.
Ak cyk awhkaw ngaikhyknaak kawlung ce a dyt dyna ni taak awhtaw Khrih awh ningnih taw ni awm hawh uhy.
Vemyihna kqawnnaak ana awm amyihna: Tuhngawi awh, ak awi naming zaak awhtaw, nami pungnawi awhkaw kawlung nami sah sak amyihna koeh sah sak voel uh.”
Awi za hlai uhy amik pungnawi ce a ukhqi nu? Izip qam awhkawng Mosi ing a sawi thlangkhqi vam hy nu my?
Ukhqi ak khanawh nu khaw kum Phlikip khuiawh ak kaw a so? Thawlhnaak sai nawh qamkoh awh ak thikhqi ak khanawh ni ka ti my?
Awi ama mik ngaikhqi, am awhtaw ukhqi ak khanawh nu Khawsa ing ang dymnaak awh ama kun aham awi a kam ce?
Cekkhqi ing ama mik cangnaak awh am kun thai uhy, tice ni hu uhy.
Ang dymnaak khuina kunnaak awikamnaak ce ang dyih hun awh, nangmih ak khuiawh u a ca awm a mang tlaaknaak aham ngaihta lah uh.
A mingmih ing awithang leek amik khypyi ceni kaimih a venawh awm amik khy law pyi lawt; cehlai awithang leek ce cangnaak ing a maming zaak awh a mingmih aham a phu am awm hy.
Ningmih ak cangnaak thlangkhqi ingtaw dymnaak ak khui na ni kun hawh uhy. Khawsa ing, “Awi kam nyng saw kawso doena kqawn nyng, ‘A mingmih ce kang dymnaak awh ityk awh awm am kun kawm uh,” tinawh kqawn hawh hy. Cehlai khawmdek a syn cyk awhkawng a bibinaak taw boeih hawh hy.
Hun pynoet awh ak Krih nyn ce, Ak Kqih nyn awh a ik-oeih sainaak boeih awhkawng Khawsa taw dym hy,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Cek coeng bai awh ak chei awhkaw awi awh, “A mingmih ce kang dymnaak awh ityk awh awm am dym kawm uh,” tinawh kqawn bai hy.
Thlang pynoet taw cawhkaw dymnaak ak khuiawh a mi kun aham awm hyn hy, cehlai ak cyk awh awithang leek phawng peek na ak awm thlangkhqi ce awi a maming ngai awh am dym uhy.
Cedawngawh Khawsa ing khawnghi ce hoep pe tlaih hy, tuhngawi tinawh ak khy, ak cyk awh ak kqawn hawh amyihna syn awh David hawnaak ing: “Tuhngawi awh ak awi naming zaak awhtaw, na mik kawlung ce koeh hqam sak voel uh,” tinawh kqawn hy.
Joshua ing a mingmih ce dymnaak ama na peek mantaw, khawnghi ak chang akawng ce Khawsa ing am nak kqawn hawh kaw.
Cedawngawh, Sabbath nyn ce Khawsak thlangkhqi dymnaak khawnghi na ana awm poe hy;
kawtih Khawsa dymnaak khuiawh amik kun thlangkhqi boeih taw Khawsa ing a bibinaak awhkawng ang dym lawt amyihna bibinaak awhkawng dym lawt uhy.
Cedawngawh, u awm awi a mang ngai awh ang tlaak kaana dymnaak ak khuina kun thainaak aham tha lo lah u sih.
Ikawtih Khawsak awi taw hqing nawh ak tha awm hy. Zawzi hu hai ak h qaat anglakawh h qaat ngai nawh, hqingnaak ingkaw Myihla, quhcawng ingkaw quhhlik dyna pek a bo thai hy; lingbyi poeknaak ingkaw ngaihnaak ce hawi a hel thai hy.
Ik-oeih sai boeih boeih ve Khawsa haiawh thuh thai na am awm hy, ni ik-oeih sainaak boeih boeih ak khing ak naikung a haiawh ik-oeih boeih boeih ve hlam qu pheng nawh huh thai boeih na awm hy.
Khawk khan na ak cet khawsoeih boei ak sang soeih, Khawsa Capa Jesu Khrih ce ni taak hawh awh cangnaak ni taak ve ak cak na tu khak lah u sih.
Ningmih nik tha ama awmnaak awh qeennaak amak ta thai khawsoeih boeikhyt amni, ningnih amih lawtna sykzoeknaak soepkep ak hu, cehlai thawlhnaak amak ta ceni ni taak uh.
Cedawngawh qeennaak ce ni hu nawh ningnih a ngoenaak awh bawmnaak ce ni huh thainaak aham am qeennaak ngawihdoelh ben ce ngaikhyknaak kawlung ing zoe lah u sih.
Khawsoih boeikhyt boeih taw pa ak khuiawh kawng tyk na awm nawh Khawsa ing tuqunaak benawh kutdo suum ham ingkaw thawlhnaak awh lucik sai aham caksak uhy.
Ik-oeih amak sim thlangkhqi ingkaw lam ak pleng thlangkhqi ce awih zoei na ak hqui thai thlang na awm nawh amah awm tha ama awmnaak awh pe qu hy.
Cedawngawh amah a thawlhnaak awm lucik ce a suum aham awm nawh, thlangkhqi a thawlhnaak awh awm lucik suum aham awm hy.
U ingawm zoeksangnaak ce amah aham am lo hy; Aaqon taw khy na a awm myihna anih ce Khawsa ing ak khy aham awm hy.
Cedawngawh Khrih awm khawsoeih boeikhyt na a awmnaak awh zoeksangnaak ce amah aham am lo hy. Cehlai Khawsa ing a venawh, “Nang taw ka Capa na awm hyk ti; tuhngawi awh na pa na awm hawh nyng,” tina hy.
A hun ak chang bai awh Nang taw Melkhizadek a myihna kumqui khawsoeih na awm hyk ti,” tinawh kqawn bai hy.
Khawmdek awh Jesu a hqing awh, thihnaak ak khui awhkawng ak hul thaikung a venawh khawteh na khy nawh mikphli tui a baw doena qeennaak thoeh nawh cykcah hy, kqihchahnaak ing a suum qu dawngawh ak cykcahnaak awi ce zaak peek na awm hy.
Anih ce Capa na awm hlai hy, khuikha a huhnaak awhkawng awi ngai ce cawng hy,
cedawngawh anih ce soep sak na awm hy, anih ak awi ak ngai thlangkhqi boeih aham anih ce kumqui hulnaak kung na coeng nawh
Melkhizadek amyihna Khawsa ing anih ce khawsoeih boeikhyt na caksak hy.
Ve akawng ve khawzah kqawn aham awm hy, am naming zaak thai re re awh, kqawn caih aham kyi soeih hy.
A tang tang awhtaw, tuh ve cawngpyikung na ni naming kawih hawh hlai, Khawsak awi a kung awhkawng kqawn tlaih tlaih nawh cuk am kik ngoe hyn uhyk ti!
U awm suktui ak aw hyn taw, naasen ca nani a awm hyn, dyngnaak akawng cukkiknaak ce am sim thai hlan hy.
Buh hqam taw ak hqam thlangkhqi ham ni, ak che ak leek hqimhqa thainaak aham cukkik na ak awm thlangkhqi na awm uhy.
Cedawngawh Khrih akawng a kung cawngpyinaak ce cehta unawh hqam ben ce pan hlah u sih, thihnaak benna lam ak sawi ik-oeih sai zutnaak ing Khawsa cangnaak,
baptisma akawng cawngsak naakkhqi, thlang ak khanawh kut tloengnaakkhqi, thlakthi thawh tlaihnaakkhqi, kumqui thawlh awi dengnaakkhqi ce koeh kqan tlaih tlaih voel u sih.
Khawsa ing ani sai sak awhtaw, ni sai hly ngoen hy.
Vangnaak ing hypoet kah nawh, khan kutdo peek ak tan hawh, Ciim Myihla awh ak awm hawh,
Khawsak awi leeknaak ak tan hawh ingkaw ak law hly kawi chan awh thaawmnaak ak tan hawh thlangkhqi ce,
a ming tluuk tlaih mantaw, cekkhqi zut sak tlaih aham am coeng thai voel hy, cemyihna a ming qeengnaak awh Khawsa Capa ce thinglam awh tai tlaih unawh thlang kqeng a thekhanaak ham pe tlaih uhy.
Khawk-a tui ak aw deklai taw lo ak toenkung aham a phu ak awm cang ce daw sak nawh Khawsa a zoseennaak ce huh sak hy.
Cehlai hling a thing ingkaw bei hqoeng ak awm lo taw a phu am awm nawh awihche zawk aham awm hqoeng hy. A huna taw ce a lo ce dawi na awm kaw.
Ka pyikhqi, vemyihna awi kqawn hlai unyng, nangmih aham ak nep bet ik-oeih – hulnaak ak awm ik-oeih awh ce ypawm na awm unyng.
Khawsa taw amak dyng na am awm hy; nangmih a bibinaak ing ak thlangkhqi bawm u tiksaw nami bawmnaak lungnaak a venawh naming dang sak ce am hilh kaw.
Nang ngaih-unaak ce a caihnaak aham nangmih boeih ing vemyihna thahlynaak ce a dyt dyna naming dang sak aham ngaih nyng.
Ak thakdam na nami awm aham am ngaih unyng, cehlai cangnaak yhnaak ak caming awikamnaak qo ak pangkhqi ce nami oet aham ngaih unyng.
Khawsa ing Abraham a venawh awi a taak awh, awi a kamnaak aham ak bau soeih anih aham u awm ama awm awh amah ingkaw amah ce awikam qu hy.
Zoseennaak ni pe kawng nyng saw cadil khawzah ni pe kawng nyng,” tina hy.
Kawdungnaak ing Abraham ing a qeh coengawh awikamnaak ce hu hy.
Thlang ing amah anglakawh ak bau khqoet ing ni awi a kam, cawhkaw awikamnaak ce cak nawh oelh qunaakkhqi ce boet sak hy.
Amak hleng qu thai amah ang cainaak awitaak cakhqi venawh ak caih na ak awm ce Khawsa ing sai aham a ngaih awh, awikamnaak ing ak awitaak ce caksak hy.
Hleng thai na amak awm ik-oeih pakkhih awh Khawsa taw a qaai ap kqawn thai hy, ningnih a venawh peek na ak awm ngaih-unaak ce tu aham ning dawng nawh ning ngaih a dingnaak aham Khawsa ing vemyihna sai hy.
Myihla ham vawhkaw ngaih-unaak ak cak ingkaw ypawm ve ni ta uhy. Cawhkaw ngaih-unaak cetaw hi zannaak a hu ben awhkaw hun ciim ak khuiawh kun hy,
ce a hun awh ningnih a haina ak cet Jesu ce ningnih ang zyng na kun hy. Melkhizadek amyihna anih taw ningnih aham kumqui khawsoeih boeikhyt na awm hawh hy.
Vawhkaw Melkhizadek vetaw Salem sangpahrang na awm nawh Sawsang soeih Khawsa a khawsoeih na awm hy. Anih ing ce Sangpahrangkhqi noeng nawh ak voei law Abraham ce hqum nawh zoseennaak pehy,
Abraham ing anih a venawh pahqa awh pynoet pehy. Lamma cyk awh anih ang ming kqawn ngaihnaak taw “Dyngnaak Sangpahrang tinawh kqawn ngaihnaak “Salem Sangpahrang” mingna bai hy.
Anu ingkaw a pa am awm hy, ak hlahkung a qui a qawng thih ham qoe am awm hy, ak kqannaak nyn awm am awm nawh a hqing a dytnaak awm am tahy, Khawsa Capamyihna kumqui khawsoeih na awm hy.
Anih ce ikawmyih aih na a bau tice poek lah uh: Pakdam Abraham ing zani thlang a ik-oeih a qawt peek ak khui awhkawng pahqa pynoet ce ana pehy.
Anaa awi ing khawsoeih na ak awm Levi a cadilkhqi ing thlangkhqi venawh pahqa pynoet cawi aham ngoe hy – cawhkaw thlangkhqi taw a koeinaa suum Abqamham a cadilkhqi lawt ni.
Cawhkaw thlang cetaw, Levi a cadil na am awm hlai hy, Abraham a venawh kaw pahqa pynoet ce lo nawh awikamnaak ak ta Abraham ce zoseennaak pehy.
Upvoetnaak a taak kaana ak zawi ce ak bau khqoet ing zoseennaak pehy.
Pynoet benawh, ak thi thlang ing pahqa pynoet ce cawi hy, cehlai pynoet ben bai awhtaw, cawhkaw ak hqing thlang ing ce ana cawi bai hy.
Pahqa pynoet ak cawi Levi ing Abraham ak caming pahqa pynoet pehy, u ingawm ti thai mai hy.
Ikawtih Abraham ing Melkhizadek ang hqum awh Levi taw a pakdam a pum khuiawh ni a awm hyn.
Levikhqi a khawsoeih bibinaak ak caming soepnaak ce huh thai na a awm mantaw (vawh anaa awi peek ce thlangkhqi venawh peek na awm hy), ikaw ham Aaron a mih kaana Melkhizadek amyihna ak awm khawsoeih ak law hly kawi ce a mi na ngoe bai?
Khawsoihkhqi a mi na hleng qu awh, anaa awi peek awm hleng qu aham awm hy.
Vawhkaw ik-oeihkhqi awh kqawn na ak awm anih ce thlak chang ni, ce ak thlang khui awhkawng u ingawm bawkthang awh bibi hlan hy.
Ningmih a Bawipa taw Juda thlang ak khui awhkawng law hy, cehlai ce ak thlang ak khui awhkawng khawsoeih ak awm hly kawi Mosi ing ap kqawn hy.
Melkhizadek amyihna ak awm khawsoeih ak chang ve ang dang law mantaw ningnih ing nik kqawn ve caih khqoet hy,
anih taw pakdamkhqi ing ami sawinaak a lawng a lam amyihna ak awm khawsoeih am nawh amak plawci thai hqing saithainaak ak caming ak awm na awm hy.
Ikawtih vemyihna phawng hyt awm hy: Nang taw Melkhizadek amyihna, kumqui khawsoeih na awm hyk ti,” a tina.
Lamma awhkaw sainaak cetaw ak tha am awm nawh kawna a mang coeng awh hoep na awm hy
(Ikawtih anaa awi peek ing ikaw awm am soep sak hy), cedawngawh ngaih-unaak ak nep bet ce awm sak hy, ce ak caming ningnih taw Khawsa venawh ni zoe bet uhy.
Ce a ik-oeih awh awikam kaana am na awm hy. Thlangkhqi taw awi kam kaana khawsoeih na coeng uhy,
cehlai anih taw Khawsa ak awi kamnaak ing khawsoeih na coeng hy: “Bawipa ing awi ana taak hawh dawngawh ak kaw am thaw voel kaw: ‘Nangtaw kumqui khawsoeih na awm hyk ti,’ tinawh awi kam hawh hy.
Vawhkaw awikamnaak awh, Jesu taw ak nep bet awikamnaak ak caksak na awm hy.
Thihnaak ing kang nawh bi amak bi thai khawsoeih thlang awm hy;
Cehlai Jesu taw a hqing loet awh, anih taw khawsoeih ak cak na awm quiqah hy.
Cedawngawh amah ak caming Khawsa venawh ak law thlangkhqi boeih ce hul thai hy, Ikawtih cekkhqi ham qeennaak thoeh peek aham anih taw awm quiqah hy.
Cemyihna ak awm khawsoeih boeikhyt ing ni ningnih a ngoenaak ce a soep sak thai – ak ciim, coet amak kap, ak caih, thlak thawlh ak khui awhkawng ak hoep qu nawh khan a saw na ak zoeksang qu thlang ing ni ni ngoenaak ce a soep sak thai.
Ak chang khawsoeih boeikhytkhqi amyihna anih ing amah aham ingkaw ak thlangkhqi ham myngawi lucik ce sai aham am ngoe hy. Cekkhqi a thawlhnaak awh hypoet ak khoek koeng na amah ingkaw amah lucik coeng hawh hy.
Anaa awi peek ing tha amak awm thlanghqing ce khawsoeih boeikhyt na caksak hy; cehlai anaa awi peek awi coengawh ak law awikamnaak ing Capa ce a caksak awh anih taw kumqui dy ak soep na awm hy.
Kaimih ing ka mik kqawn ngaihnaak taw veni: Sawsang soeih ngawihdoelh tang benawh ak ngawi, khawsoeih boeikhyt ce ningnih ing ni ta uhy,
anih taw hun ciim, thlanghqing a sai kaana Bawipa ing a sai hi im tang khuiawh bi ak bi na awm hy.
Khawsoih boeikhyt boeih taw ik-oeih suum ham ingkaw hyihphum aham caksak na awm hy, cedawngawh anih ingawm ik-oeih pynoet oet ce a suum ngai khoek aham awm hy.
Anih ce khawmdek awh a awm mantaw, anaa awipeek ing ak kqawnnaak amyihna ik-oeih ak suum hly kawi thlangkhqi ce ami awm hawh awh anih ce khawsoeih na awm aham am ngoe voel hy.
Cekkhqi ing khawk khan na ak awm hun ciim ang myihlip khawmdek awhkaw hun ciim awh bibi uhy. Cedawngawh mah maw Mosi ing hi im sa vang nyng a ti awh: “Hul na na awm awh na venawh ka nim huh amyihna na sak boeih aham ngaihta lah,” a tinaak mah hy.
Cehlai Jesu a bibinaak taw a mingmih a bibinaak anglakawh bau khqoet nawh, awikamnaak ak nep bet awh ang dyih awh, dyihthing na a awmnaak awikamnaak a sai ce awm awikamnaak ak kqym anglakawh bau khqoet bai hy.
Lamma awhkaw awikamnaak sainaak awhkaw thawlhnaak ama awm awhtaw, ak chang awikamnaak ce sui aham am ngoe voel hy.
Cehlai Khawsa ing ak thlangkhqi ak khanawh thawlhnaak ce a huh awh: “Israel ipkhui kaw Judah ipkhui kaw ing awikam thai ka sainaak a tym ce law tawm hawh hy, tinawh Bawipa ing kqawn hy.
Ami pakhqi ce a kut awh tunyng saw Izip qam khui awhkawng ka sawi awh awikamnaak ka sai amyihna am awm voel kaw, kak awikamnaak awh a mingmih taw ypawm na am awm uhy, cedawngawh a mingmih ce hawi taak khqi nyng, tinawh Bawipa ing kqawn hy.
Cekcoengawh vawhkaw awikamnaak ve Israel ipkhui kaw mi kai ing sai kawng nyng, tinawh Bawipa ing kqawn hy. Ka anaa awi peek ce a mingmih a lingbyi khuiawh taak pe kawng nyng saw amik kawklungkhqi awh qee pe kawng nyng. A mingmih a Khawsa na awm kawng nyng saw, cekkhqi taw kai ak thlangkhqi na awm kawm uh.
U ingawm a imceng awhkaw thlang ce am cawngpyi voel kaw, thlang ing a koeinaa a venawh, ‘Bawipa ce sim lah’ am tina voel kaw, kawtih ak zawi khyt awhkawng ak bau khyt dyna cekkhqi ing kai ce ni sim hawh kawm uh.
A mingmih a thawlh sainaak ce kai ing qeenkhaw ngai kawng nyng saw ami thawlhnaakkhqi ce am sim loet voel kawng nyng,” tinawh Khawsa ing kqawn hy.
Vawhkaw awikamnaak ve ak thai a ti awh, ak kqym awikamnaak taw hqe hawh hy; hqe na ak awm nawh ak kqym hawh cetaw qeeng dip hawh kaw.
Awikamnaak lamma awhkaw Khawsa bawknaak ing a lawng a lam ingkaw khawmdek hun ciim tahy.
Hi im ce ana sa uhy. Ipkhui lamma cyknaak awh mai vangnaak, caboei ingkaw phaihpi ce awm hy; ve ve Hun Ciim tinawh khy uhy.
A pakkhihnaak hi zaannaak ak kep awh Hun Ciim Khyt ce awm hy,
cedawngawh ce bawktui dawinaak sui bawkthang ingkaw awikam sainaak sui ing a khym bawm ce awm hy.
Cawhkaw a bawm asaw awh Boeimangnaak cherubim ing hulnaak dahnaak bawm ce asaw nakaw ing dah hy. Cehlai ve a ik-oeihkhqi ve tuh ak soep na am nik kqawn hly thai hy.
Vemyihna ik-oeihkhqi boeih qoekbah na a awm coengawh, khawsoeihkhqi ing a mimah a bibi aham kawt ak khuiawh kun poepa uhy.
Khawsoih boeikhyt doeng ce kum oet awh hypoet doeng ca ipkhui na kun hy, cehlai amah a thawlhnaak ingkaw thlangkhqi ing a mami sim awh ami sai thawlhnaak awh lucik sai aham thisen kaana am kun hy.
Hun Ciim Khyt ak khuina cehnaak lam ce lamma awhkaw hi im ang dyih khui awhtaw khaih na am awm hy tice ve a ik-oeih ingkaw Ciim Myihla ing dang sak hy.
Tuh awhkaw ik-oeih nyhtahnaak aham ce a ik-oeih ce awm hy, ik-oeih suum ingkaw lucik sainaakkhqi ing Khawsa ak bawk thlangkhqi ak kawlung am ciim sak hy tice dang sak hy.
Ce mihkhqi taw awk ai ingkaw silhnaak ak chang changkhqi mai ni – ak thai sainaak a awm hlan khui awhtaw ak khan ben ik-oeih sainaak ce ana haw na uhy.
Vawh a oepchoeh na ak awm ik-oeih leekkhqi a khawsoeih boeikhyt na Khrih ce a law awh, thlanghqing kut ing ama sai, ik-oeih sai ak khuiawh amak paa, ak bau khqoet ingkaw ak soep khqoet hi im ak khuina ce cet hy.
Me ingkaw vaitaw a thi ing am kun hy; amah a thi ing Hun Ciim Khyt ce thlang boeih aham hypoet doeng kun nawh, kumqui hulnaak ce hu law hy.
Me ingkaw vaitawm cai a thi ingkaw vaitaw ca a hlawi ce amak ciim thlangkhqi ak khan benawh ami ciimnaak aham ak khanawh theh sih khqi hy.
Cemyihna a awm awhtaw coet amak kap nawh kumqui Myihla ak caming Khawsa venawh amah ingkaw amah ak suum qu Khrih a thi khqoet ingtaw ikawmyih dyna nu ningnih thihnaak na anik sawikung “ningnih ak kawlung simnaakkhqi ve ak hqing Khawsa bi ni binaak thai aham a ciim law sak khqoet kaw ce!
Vawh ve Khrih taw awikam thai a dyihthing na awm hy, ak khy thlangkhqi ing kumqui qo awikamnaak ce ami pangnaak thai aham ingkaw – lamma awhkaw awikamnaak ak kaiawh a mik thawlh ak thlangkhqi ce hul nawh loet sak aham anih taw thi hawh hy.
Ngaihnaak ik-oeih awh, ce ngaihnaak ak saikung a thihnaak ce dang sak aham ngoe hy,
Ikawtih ngaihnaak taw thlang pynoet oet a thih awh ni a cak hy; Ngaihnaak ak saikung a hqing khuiawh am cak hy.
Cedawngawh mah maw lamma awhkaw awikamnaak ce awm thi ing caksak na a awm lawt mah hy.
Mosi ing thlangkhqi boeih a venawh anaa awi peek boeih ak kqawn peek awh, vaitaw ca a thi ce tui ing lo haih hy, tuu a myi ak thim ingkaw hyssop thing pang ce a lawh coengawh, cazawl ing thlangkhqi ce theh sih khqi boeih hy.
Vetaw awikam sainaak thi ni, vetaw nami khoem aham Khawsa ing nangmih awi ani peek khqi ni,” tina hy.
Cemyih koep lawtna, hi im ingkaw khawning awhkaw ik-oeih hawnaakkhqi boeih awm thi ing theh sih hy.
Anaa awipeek awi ing ik-oeih soepkep ang toek ce ciim sak aham a ngoe awh, thi a mang lawng awhtaw qeenkhaw ngainaak ce am awm hy.
Cedawngawh, khan benna kaw ik-oeihkhqi buk tloep nawh ciim sak aham vawhkaw hyihphumnaak sai ve ngoe hy, cehlai khan benna kaw ik-oeihkhqi qoe taw vekkhqi anglakawh ak leek khqoet na awm hy.
Ikawtih ak thym bawkthang ang myihlip thlanghqing ing kut ing a sai bawkthang ak khuiawh Khrih ce am kun hy; ningnih aham Khawsa haiawh dang aham amah qoe qoe ce khanna kun hy.
Khawsoih boeikhyt ing Hun Ciim Khyt awh kum qoek awh amah a thi ing am nawh thi khyn nawh a kun amyihna, amah ingkaw amah suum qu tlaih tlaih aham khan na am kun hy.
Cemyihna a kun mantaw khawmdek a syn cyk awhkawng khuikha hu quiqah hawh kaw. Cehlai thawlhnaak ciim sak aham amah ingkaw amah ce lucik na a sai qunaak ak caming chan a boetnaak benawh thlang boeih aham ak khoek koeng na hypoet na dang law hawh hy.
Thlanghqing ve hypoet thih aham awm nawh, cekcoengawh awi deng aham a awm amyihna,
thlang khawzah a thawlhnaak ceh pyi aham Khrih awm hypoet lucik na sai qu hy; cekcoengawh a hih voeinaak na dang law bai kaw, thawlhnaak ak yh aham am voel nawh amah ak qeh thlangkhqi aham hulnaak khyn aham ni ang dang hly hawh.
Anaa awipeek taw ak law hly kawi ik-oeih leek ang myihlip ni – ik-oeih a tang tang hlan hyn ni. Cedawngawh, hyihphumnaak sai khawi kum qoek awh a boet qoe kaana sainaak ak caming Khawsa bawk aham ak lawkhqi ce ityk awh awm am soep sak thai kaw.
A soep sak thai mantaw, ik-oeih ami suum quiqah ce qoeng hawh kawm u man, my? Khawsa ak bawk thlangkhqi ce hypoet na ciim kang kawm usaw, thawlhnaak awh ngaihseetnaak am ta voel kawm uh.
Cehlai cawhkaw lucik sainaakkhqi cetaw kum qoek awh thawlhnaak ak sim sak kqoeng mai ni,
Ikawtih vaitaw ingkaw me a thi ing thawlhnaak ce ceh pyi aham am coeng thai hy.
Cedawngawh Khrih ing khawmdek awh a law awh: “Lucik ingkaw ik-oeih suum ce nang ing am ngaih hyk ti cehlai kai aham na qoekbah hyt pum ce ni;
hyih phum suumnaak ingkaw thawlh suumnaakkhqi awh nak kaw am law hy.
Cedawngawh kai ing, ‘kai vawh awm nyng kai akawng ni cazawl awh ana qee – Aw Khawsa, nak kawngaih sai aham law hawh nyng” tinawh anak kqawn hy.
Lamma cyk awh, Lucik sainaak ingkaw ik-oeih suumnaak khqi hyihphumnaak ingkaw thawlh ik-oeih suumnaakkhqi ce am ngaih tiksaw, cekkhqi awh ce nak kaw am hoet hy,” (ce mihkhqi ce sai aham anaa awi ingtaw ngoe hy) tinawh kqawn hy.
Cekcoengawh, Vawh awm nyng, nak kawngaih sai aham law hawh nyng,” ti bai hy. Ahih voeinaak ce dyih sak aham ak cyk awhkaw ce ak chang na tahy.
Cawhkaw kawngaihnaak ak caming, hypoet ak khoek koeng na thlang boeih aham Jesu Khrih, a pum lucik na sainaak ak caming ningnih boeih taw ni ciim hawh uhy.
Khawnghi hypoet coeng hypoet khawsoeih boeih ing dyi nawh beeknaak ben bibi ce sai hy; ityk awh awm thawlhnaak amak ceh pyi thai a sai khawi lucik ce suum bai suum bai hy.
Cehlai vawhkaw khawsoeih ingkaw thawlh lucik ce ak khoek koeng na a suum coengawh taw, Pa tang benawh ce ngawi hy.
Cawhkawng a qaal ce a khawk kaina a taaknaak tym ce qeh hy,
Ikawtih lucik hypoet a sainaak ak caming amah ing a ciim sak thlangkhqi aham kumqui dyna soep hawh hy.
Ciim Myihla ingawm vawhkaw ik-oeih ve ningnih a venawh ni sim sak khqi hy. Lamma cyk awh:
Cek coeng awhtaw vawhkaw awikamnaak ve a mingmih a venawh sai kawng nyng, tinawh Bawipa ing kqawn hy. A mingmih ak kawlung khuiawh ka anaa awikhqi ce taak pe kawng nyngsaw, amik kawlungkhqi ak khuiawh qee pe kawng nyng,” tinawh.
Cekkhqi a thawlhnaak ingkaw khawboe seetnaak khqi ce am sim pe hly voel nyng,” ti bai hy.
Thawlh qeenkhaw ngainaak a awmnaak hoei awh, thawlh lucik am awm voel kaw.
Cedawngawh, koeinaakhqi, Jesu a thi ak caming Hun Ciim Khyt awh kun thainaak ce ni taak hawh dawngawh,
ak thai ingkaw ak hqing lam amah a pum hi zan ce awng law hawh hy,
Khawsa ipkhui awh khawsoeih ak bau ce ni taak hawh dawngawh,
cangnaak ypnaak kawlung tang Khawsa ce zoe lah u sih, ningnih ak kawlung ce thawlh simnaak awhkawng ciimnaak aham syp unawh ningnih a pum awm tuihciim ing sil lah u sih.
Ngaih-unaak ni taak ce ang thoeih kaana tu khak u sih, kawtih awi ak takung ce a ypawm hy.
Lungnaak ing ik-oeih leek sainaak benawh pynoet ingkaw pynoet ikawmyihna nu tha ning peek qu lah voei tice poek u sih.
Huh cunnaak ve koeh hlah phlam u sih, thlang pynoet ingtaw hlah phlam uhy, cehlai ningnih taw pynoet ingkaw pynoet tha pe qu lah u sih – Khawnghi a zoe hawh dawngawh tha hlynaak ing sai khqoet khqoet u sih.
Awitak cyihnaak ni huh coengawh awm ni thawlh bak bak mantaw, thawlh lucik ce am awm voel kaw,
cehlai Khrih awm awidengnaak ingkaw Khawsa qaal a uihnaak hly mai kqawng doeng ni a awm hawh hy.
U awm Mosi a anaa awi ak eek taw thlang pakkhih pakthum a simpyinaak ing qeennaak a awm voel kaana thihnaak ce hu hy.
Cawhtaw Khawsa Capa ce khaw ing ak leh, lucik na a sai a thi ce amak ciim na poek nawh, qeennaak Myihla ak thekhanaak thlang ak khqoet ce kawmih dyna nu kqih awm toelnaak a huh kaw tinawh nak poek?
Kawtih, Lu lawhnaak taw kai a koe ni; kai ing thung bit kawng,” tihy, cekcoengawh, “Bawipa ing ak thlangkhqi ce awi deng kaw,” ti bai hy.
Ak hqing Khawsa kut awh tlaak aham kqih awm soeih hy.
Vangnaak nami huh coeng awhkaw khawnghikhqi ingkaw kyinaak a haiawh hat qunaak ak bau soeih ing naming dyih ce poek lah uh.
Ityk nyn awhtaw thekhanaak aham ingkaw khuikha sak aham qangpui a huh awh nik tun khqi uhy; ityk nyn awhtaw kyinaak ak hukhqi mi voei a vang awh dyi uhyk ti.
Thawngim ak tla thlangkhqi ce qeen u tiksaw, ak leek bet ingkaw kumqui dy ak cak kawn ta uhyk ti tice nami sim awh nami ik-oeihkhqi a mini qawt law awh zeel doena dun uhyk ti.
Cedawngawh ypawmnaak nami taak ce koeh khawng valh uh; cawhtaw kutdo ak bau soeih hu kawm uk ti.
Khawsak kawngaih nami sai coengawh yhnaak nami taak aham awm hy, amah ak awitaak amyihna hu bit kawm uk ti.
Kawlhkalh awh, Ak law hly kawi thlang ce ang yih kaa qoe na law hawh kaw.
Cehlai kak thlakdyng taw cangnaak ing hqing kaw. Ahu na ang thoeih awhtaw, ak khanawh zeelnaak qoe am ta kawng nyng.
Cehlai ningnih taw hu na ak thoeih nawh ak plawci thlang na amni awm uhy. Cangna nawh hulna ak awm thlangkhqi na ni awm uhy.
Cangnaak taw amni hu hlai hy, ning ngaih-u ik-oeih awm mare hy ti simnaak veni.
Vawh ni syn awhkaw thlangkhqi ingawm kyihcahnaak a mina huh.
Cangnaak ak caming khan ingkaw dek ve Khawsa awipeeknaak myihna sai na awm hy tice ning zasim thai uhy, cedawngawh huh thai na ak awmkhqi ve huh ik-oeih awhkawng sai na am awm hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Abel ing Kain anglakawh lucik ak nep khqoet ce Khawsa venawh suum hy. Cangnaak ak caming thlakdyng anang ming na nawh, Khawsa ing a ik-oeih suum ce ak nep na kqawn pehy. Anih ce thi hawh hlai hy, cangnaak ak caming tuh dy na awi kqawn hyn hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Enok taw a hqing na lawh na awm hy, cedawngawh thihnaak ce am sim hy; Khawsa ing a lawh hawh awh, anih ce huh thai na am awm voel hy. Anih ce a lawh hlan awh, anih taw Khawsak kaw ak zeel sakkung kyihcahnaak ak hu thlang na awm hy.
Cangnaak kaana Khawsak kaw zeel sak aham am coeng thai hy, u awm a venawh ak law thlangkhqi boeih ing anih taw awm nawh amah ak sui thlangkhqi ce kutdo pehy tice ak cangnaak aham awm hy.
Cangnaak ing Nova ing ama huh ik-oeih akawng a venawh kqawn peek na a awm awh, ak ciim kqihnaak ing a ipkhui kaw hulnaak aham lawng ce sai hy. Ak cangnaak ak caming khawmdek ce ana dawk sak nawh cangnaak ak caming ak law dyngnaak qo ak pangkung na awm hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Abraham ing, qo na a pang hly kawi hun pynoet na ceh ham khy na a awm awh, han benna nu ka ceh lah voei ti awm am sim hlai hy, awi ngai nawh cet hy.
Cangnaak ak caming awikamnaak ram awh ce im sa nawh thlang a ram awh ce khin a myihna awm hy; hi im sa nawh awm hy, amah ingkaw cawhkaw awikamnaak ak pang haih Isak ingkaw Jakob awm awm lawt hy nih.
Anih ing hai ben awhkaw ak awm Khawsa ing a sak khawk bau ingkaw hun ce dan hy.
Cangnaak ak caming, Abraham ing pacawng hawh nawh – Sarah awm cakkaa bai hlai hy – a venawh awi ak takung ing anih ce ypawm thlang na ak poek awh pa na awm sak hy.
Cedawngawh cawhkaw thlang pynoet awhkawng, anih ce ak thi amih tluk nani a awm hawh hlai, khan na kaw aihchi khawzah ingkaw tuicunli a keng awhkaw noet noeng am dizui zah cadil pung pe sak hy.
Vawhkaw thlangkhqi boeih ve ami thih awh cangnaak ing hqing uhy. Awitaaknaak amak awm ce am hu hlan hyn uhy; ak hla nakawng ni hu unawh ami do hy. Khawmdek awh thlanglang ingkaw khin nani ka mi awm tice sim uhy.
Vemyihna ak kqawnkhqi ing a mimah aham qam ak awm ceni ami sui tice dang sak uhy.
A cehtaak qam ce amik poek tlaih mantaw, ang hlat na awm hlat hawh kawm uh.
Cehlai ak leek khqoet qam – khan qam ce – lamtoen uhy. A mingmih aham khawk bau ce a qoek abah peek hawh dawngawh, a mingmih a khawsa tinawh khy aham khawsa ce ap chak hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Abraham ing, khawsa a noek adak awh, lucik na sai aham a capa Isak ce suum hy. Awitaaknaak ak hu thlang ing a taak chyn a Capa ce lucik sainaak aham pe seng hy.
Khawsa ing, Isak awhkawng ni na cadil ce noet na a awm hly,” tina hy.
Khawsa ingtaw thlakthi awm thawh sak thai hy tice Abraham ing poek hy, cedawngawh Isaak ce thihnaak ak khui awhkawng hu tlaih hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Isak ing Jacob ingkaw Isau ce hailam ben awhkaw ham zoseennaak pehy.
Cangnaak ak caming Jacob ing a thih tawm awh Josep a cakhqi ce zoseennaak peek pehy, a sawnghqawl awh ang hang doena Khawsa ce beek hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Josep ing, a hqing boetnaak a pha tawm awh Izip ram awhkawng Israel thlangkhqi amik conaak akawng ce kqawn nawh a quh khoemnaak akawng ce kqawn pehy.
Cangnaak ak caming Mosi a thang coengawh a nu ingkaw a pa ing hla thum dy awh thuh hy nih, naasen mailai amni tinawh a mi huh awh, sanpahrang ak awi peek zani am nak kqih hy nih.
Cangnaak ak caming Mosi ing a taai law awh, Feqo a canu a capa na awm aham anak tha na hy.
Kawlhkalh awh thawlh awm hlynaak huh anglakawhtaw Khawsak thlangkhqi mi khuikha haih aham tyk bet hy.
Amah a kutdo a huh hly ce a oepchoeh na a huh awh, Khrih a khuikha huhnaak ce Izip qam awhkaw kawn a qaa anglakawh a phu ak awm khqoet na ce poek hy.
Cangnaak ak caming Izip qam ce cehta hy, Sangpahrang ak kawsonaak ce kqih kaana; huh thai na amak awm ce a huh awh yh hy.
Cangnaak ak caming cehtak poei ingkaw thi ing sypnaak ce a sai awh, caming ak himkung ing Israel camingkhqi ce am bi hy.
Cangnaak ak caming thlangkhqi ing tuinuk sen awh cengdek awh cet uhy; cehlai Izipkhqi ami ceh lawt awhtaw, tui awh cum kanglak uhy.
Khaw khqih nyn thlangkhqi ing amik chung coengawh cangnaak ak caming Jeriko vawng ce min hy.
Cangnaak ak caming a pum ak zawi nu Rahab ing, lam amik zamkhqi ce ana do khqi nawh, awi amak ngai thlangkhqi mi him haih na am awm hy.
Kaw kak kqawn bai kaw? Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jepthah, David, Samyl ingkaw tawnghakhqi kawng kqawn aham a tym ing am khoek hy,
cangnaak ak caming cekkhqi ing ramkhqi noeng uhy, am dyngna uk unawh awikamnaak ce hu uhy; cekkhqi ing samthyyn am kha khqi cyp sak uhy,
mai kqawng ce thih unawh zawzi ak hrat awhkawng loet uhy; a mingmih ak tha ama awmnaak ce thaawmnaak na coeng nawh; qaal tuknaak a hun awh thaawmnaak ing rap chang cem a qaal ce hqut a dep uhy.
Nukhqi ing amik thlakthi a hqingna ak tho tlaihkhqi ce hu uhy. Ak changkhqi taw khuikha huh sak unawh am hlah uhy, cekkhqi ing thawh tlaihnaak ak leek bet ce hu kawm uh.
Thlang pynoet ing qaihbu na sainaak ing quiboeng ing vyknaak ce zawk uhy, thlang pynoet bai taw thiqui ing khit unawh thawngim khuina thla uhy.
